# english_title:        The New Testament in Gofa, Ethiopia

# notes:                
40001001	Hayssafe kaallidi xaafettidayssi Dawite na7a Abrahame na7a gidida Yesuus Kiristtoosa yeletethaa .
40001002	Abrahamey Yisaaqa yelis ; Yisaaqi Yayqooba yelis ; Yayqoobi Yihudanne iya ishata yelis ;
40001003	Yihudi Ti7imaarippe Faaresenne Zaara yelis ; Faaresi Asroome yelis ; Asroomey Raame yelis ;
40001004	Raamey Aminaadabe yelis ; Aminaadabey Na7asoona yelis ; Na7asooney Salmoona yelis ;
40001005	Salmooney Ra7abippe Boo7eza yelis ; Boo7ezi Uruutippe Iyobeede yelis ; Iyobeedi Isseyye yelis ;
40001006	Isseyyey kawuwa Dawite yelis ; Dawitey Ooriyo machcheefe Solomone yelis ;
40001007	Solomoney Robi7aama yelis ; Robi7aamey Abiya yelis ; Abiyey Asaafe yelis ;
40001008	Asaafi Iyosaafexe yelis ; Iyosaafixey Iyoraame yelis ; Iyoraamey Ooziyane yelis ;
40001009	Ooziyaney Iyo7ataame yelis ; Iyo7ataamey Akkaza yelis ; Akkazi Hiziqiyasa yelis ;
40001010	Hiziqiyasi Minaase yelis ; Minaasey Amoona yelis ; Amooni Iyosiyaasa yelis ;
40001011	Isra7eele asay di7ettidi Baabiloone biittaa bida wode Iyosiyaasi Ikoniyaananne iya ishata yelis .
40001012	Baabiloone biitta Isra7eele asay di7ettidi bidaappe guye Ikoniyaani Salatiyaale yelis . Salatiyaaley Zerubaabela yelis ;
40001013	Zerubaabeli Abdiyu yelis ; Abdiyuy Eliyaaqeme yelis ; Eliyaaqemey Azaara yelis ;
40001014	Azaari Sadooqe yelis ; Sadooqey Akiime yelis ; Akiimey Eliyuuda yelis ;
40001015	Eliyuudi Alaazara yelis ; Alaazari Maatane yelis ; Maataney Yayqooba yelis ;
40001016	Yayqoobi Yoosefa yelis ; Yoosefi Kiristtoosa giya Yesuusa yelida Mayraami azina .
40001017	Hiza , yeletethay Abrahameppe Dawite gakkanaw tammanne oydda . Dawiteppe bidi Baabiloone di7uwa gakkanaw tammanne oydda . Baabiloone di7uwappe bidi Kiristtoosa gakkanaw tammanne oyddu yeletethi gidees .
40001018	Yesuus Kiristtoosa yeletethaa taarikey hayssafe kaalleyssa . Iya aaya Mayraama Yoosefas oyshetta de7ashe Yoosefara gahettonna Geeshsha Ayyaanaappe qanthatasu .
40001019	Yoosefi Xillo asi gidida gisho iyo asan kessanaw koyibeenna . Yaaniya gisho qosan iyo agganaw qoppis .
40001020	I he qofan de7ishin Xoossaa kiitanchchoy amuhon qonccidi , “ Dawite na7aw , Yoosefa , Mayraama qanthatiday Geeshsha Ayyaanaappe gidiya gisho iyo ekkanaw yayyofa ” yaagis .
40001021	Iya adde na7a yelana , I ba deriya entta nagaraappe ashshiya gisho iya sunthaa ne Yesuusa gada xeegana .
40001022	Goday nabiya Isayaasa doonan ,
40001023	“ Hekko geela7iya qanthatana ; adde na7akka yelana ; iya sunthay Ammanu7eela geetettana ” goyssi polettana mela ha ubbay hanis . Ammanu7eela geyssas birshshethay “ Xoossay nuura de7ees ” guussu .
40001024	Yoosefi dhiskkofe barkkidi Godaa kiitanchchoy kiittidayssa mela Mayraamo ba soo efis .
40001025	Shin ba bayra na7a yelana gakkanaw iyo bochchibeenna ; yelettida na7akka Yesuusa gidi xeegis .
40002001	Kawuwa Heroodisa woden Yesuusi Yihuda biittan Beeteleme kataman yelettidayssafe guye xoolintto taybiya asati dolohappe Yerusalaame yidi ,
40002002	“ Yelettida Ayhude kawoy awun de7ii ? Nuuni doloha baggara keyida iya xoolinttuwa be7idi iyaw goynnanaw yida ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
40002003	Kawoy Heroodisi hessa si7ida wode dagammis . Yerusalaamen de7iya asay ubbayka dagammidosona .
40002004	Heroodisi kahine halaqatanne higge asttamaareta baakko xeegidi , “ Kiristtoosi awun yelettanddeshsha ? ” yaagidi entta oychchis .
40002005	Enttika , “ Yihuda Beetelemena ; nabey ,
40002006	‘ Yihudan de7iya Beeteleme , Yihudan de7iya gooba katamatappe , neeni aybinkka guuxaka . Ta deriya Isra7eele aysanayssi , neeppe keyana ’ gidi xaafis ”
40002007	Hessafe guye , Heroodisi dolohappe yida asata geeman xeegidi , xoolinttuwa entti be7ida wodiya enttafe geeshshidi eris .
40002008	I enttana Beeteleme yeddishe , “ Bidi yelettida na7aa minthidi koyite ; iya hintte demmida wode takka bada iyaw goynnana mela simmidi yishe taw odite ” yaagis .
40002009	Enttika kawoy Heroodisi gidayssa si7idi bidosona . Entti doloha baggara be7ida xoolinttoy enttana kaalethishe na7ay de7iyasuwa gakkanaw efis .
40002010	Entti he xoolinttuwa be7ida wode gita ufayssi ufayttidosona .
40002011	Soo gelidi na7aa ba aaye Mayraamira de7eyssa be7idosona . Iyaw gulbbatidi goynnidosona . Bantta saaxiniya dooyidi worqqa , ixaanenne karbbe iyaw immidosona .
40002012	Entti Heroodisakko guye simmona mela Xoossay amuhon enttaw odin , hara ogera bantta biittaa simmidosona .
40002013	Doloha baggafe yida asati bidaappe guye , Godaa kiitanchchoy Yoosefas amuhon qonccidi , “ Heroodisi na7aa wodhanaw koyaa gisho dendda ; ellesada na7aanne na7aa aayiw ekkada Gibxxe biittaa ba . Ne simmana wodiya ta new odana gakkanaw yan gam77a ” yaagis .
40002014	Hessa gisho , Yoosefi he qamman denddidi , na7aanne na7aa aayiw ekkidi Gibxxe bis .
40002015	Nabiya doonan Xoossay , “ Taani , ta na7aa , Gibxxe biittafe xeegas ” geetettida qaalay polettana mela Heroodisi hayqqana gakkanaw I yan de7is .
40002016	Hessafe guye , doloha baggafe yida asati iya cimmidayssa erida wode daro yilotis . I kase enttafe si7idayssada Beetelemeninne he heeran de7iya nam77u laythi kumidayssatanne nam77u laythafe garssan de7iya adde nayta ubbaa ba wotaddareta yeddidi wodhisis .
40002017	Nabiya Ermmiyasa doonan , “ Yeehoynne zeleelssi , Raama kataman si7ettis . Raahela ba naytas yeekkawusu ; entti hayqqida gisho minettanaw dandda7abuukku ” gidi odidayssi polettis .
40002018	
40002019	Heroodisi hayqqidaappe guye Gibxxen Godaa kiitanchchoy Yoosefas amuhon qonccidi ,
40002020	“ Na7aa wodhanaw koyaa asati hayqqida gisho denddada na7aanne na7aa aayiw ekkada Isra7eele biittaa simma ” yaagis .
40002021	Yoosefi denddidi na7aanne na7aa aayiw ekkidi Isra7eele biittaa simmis .
40002022	Shin Arkkeliyoosi Yihudan ba aawa Heroodisa bessan kawotidayssa si7ida wode yaa baanaw yayyis . Xoossay amuhon iyaw qonccisin Galiila biittaa bis .
40002023	Nabeta doonan , “ Naazirete asi geetettana ” gidi odettidayssi polettana mela Naazirete katamaa bidi yan de7is .
40003001	He wode Xammaqiya Yohaannisi , “ Xoossaa kawotethay matattida gisho hintte nagaraappe simmite ” yaagidi sabbakishe Yihuda bazzo biittaa bis .
40003002	
40003003	Nabiya Isayaasi Yohaannisabaa odidayssa mela , “ Bazzo biittan , issoy ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , ‘ Godaa ogiya giigisite . Iya horogaa piddi oothite ’ gis ”
40003004	Yohaannisi gimale ikiseppe oosettida afila ma77ees . Ba xeessan dafo danccees . I miya kathayka boolenne degera eesi .
40003005	Asay he wode Yerusalaame katamaappe , Yihuda biitta ubbaafenne Yorddaanose Shaafaa heerappe iyaakko yoosona .
40003006	Bantta nagaraa paaxidi Yorddaanose Shaafan Yohaannisa kushen xammaqettosona .
40003007	Yohaannisi , daro Farisaawetinne Saduqaaweti xammaqettanaw baakko yeyssata be7idi , enttako , “ Ha iita shooshatoo , yaana Xoossaa hanquwafe baqatana mela hinttena oone zoriday ?
40003008	Hiza , hinttee , hintte nagaraappe simmidayssa erisiyabaa oothite .
40003009	Hinttee , hintte wozanan , ‘ Abrahamey , nu aaway de7ees ’ gidi qoppofite . Loythi si7ite ! Xoossay ha shuchchatappe Abrahames na7a kessanaw dandda7ees .
40003010	Beexey mithaa xaphuwan giigidi uttis ; lo77o ayfe ayfonna mitha ubbay qanxettidi taman yegettana .
40003011	“ Hinttee , hintte nagaraappe simmidayssa erisanaw taani hinttena haathan xammaqays . Shin taappe guyera yeyssi hinttena Geeshsha Ayyaananinne taman xammaqana . I taappe daro wolqqaamees ; taani hari attoshin iya caammaa tookkanawukka bessike .
40003012	Kathaa geeshshiya pithey iya kushen de7ees . Kathaa loythi geeshshees ; gisttiya ba shaaliyan qolana , shin punuwa to7onna taman xuuggana ” yaagis .
40003013	He wode Yesuusi Yohaannisa kushen xammaqettanaw Galiilappe Yorddaanose Shaafaa bis .
40003014	Shin Yohaannisi iya digganaw koyid , “ Taani nenan xammaqettanaw koshshishin neeni taakko yay ? ” yaagis .
40003015	Shin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Xoossay nuuppe koyabaa ubbaa nu polanaw bessiya gisho ha77i taw ero ga ” yaagis . Yohaannisi iyaw ero gidi ekkis .
40003016	Yesuusi xammaqettida mela haathaafe keyis . Iirakka saloy dooyettin Xoossaa Ayyaanay holleda yishin qassi ba bolla wol77ammidi wodhdhishin be7is .
40003017	He wode “ Ta dosiya , iyan tana ufayssiya ta na7ay hayssa ” yaagiya qaalay saloppe yis .
40004001	Hessafe guye , Xalahey Yesuusa paaccana mela Geeshsha Ayyaanay Yesuusa bazzo biittaa efis .
40004002	Oytamu qammanne oytamu gallas xoomidaappe guye koshattis .
40004003	Xalahey Yesuusakko yidi “ Neeni Xoossaa na7a gidikko , ane ha shuchchati uythi gidana mela kiitta ” yaagis .
40004004	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ ‘ Asi Xoossaa doonappe keyaa qaala ubban daanappe attin uytha xalaalan de7enna ’ geetettidi Xoossaa qaalan xaafettis ” yaagis .
40004005	Kaallidikka , Xalahey Yesuusa geeshsha katamaa efidi , Xoossaa keetha huu7iya kessidi ,
40004006	“ Neeni Xoossaa na7a gidikko , ane duge sa7an kundda . Ays giikko , ‘ Ne tohoy shuchchan dhubetti deshettonna mela , bantta kushiyan nena denthana mela , Xoossay ba kiitanchchota ne gisho kiittana ’
40004007	Yesuusi iyaakko , “ Qassika , ‘ Xoossaa qaalan ne Godaa , ne Xoossaa paaccofa ’ yaagettidi xaafettis ” gidi zaaris .
40004008	Wurssethan Xalahey Yesuusa issi wolqqaama deriya huu7e kessidi alamiya kawotethata entta bonchchuwara issife bessidi ,
40004009	“ Ne taw kunddada goynniko ta new ha ubbaa immana ” yaagis .
40004010	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ha Xalahiyaw , taappe haakka ! ‘ Ne Godaa , ne Xoossaa goynna , iya xalaala haggaaza ’ geetettidi Xoossaa qaalan xaafettis ” yaagis .
40004011	Hessafe guye , Xalahey aggidi bis ; kiitanchchoti yidi iya haggaazidosona .
40004012	Yesuusi , Yohaannisi qashettoyssa si7ida wode Galiila biittaa bis .
40004013	Naazirete katamaa aggidi Zaabiloonaninne Niftaaleme heeran , abbaa matan de7iya Qifirnahoome katamaa bidi yan de7is .
40004014	Hessi haniday nabiya Isayaasa doonan ,
40004015	“ Zaabiloone biittan , Niftaaleme biittan , Yorddaanose Shaafappe hefinthan , abbaa ogiya gaxan de7iya , Ayhude gidonna derey de7iya Galiilan ,
40004016	dhuman de7iya derey , wolqqaama poo7o be7is . Hayqo kuya biittan , de7eyssatas poo7oy keyis ”
40004017	He wodeppe doomidi Yesuusi , “ Xoossaa kawotethay matattida gisho hintte nagaraappe simmite ” yaagidi qaala sabbakees .
40004018	Yesuusi Galiila Abbaa matara aadhdhishe nam77u ishata , Phexiroosa geetettiya Simoonanne iya ishaa Inddiriyasa be7is . Entti molo oykkeyssata gidida gisho bantta gitiya abban yeggoosona .
40004019	Yesuusi enttana , “ Haa yiite ; tana kaallite ! Molo oythi attoshin , ta hinttena ase oythi tamaarssana ” yaagis .
40004020	Enttika , ellesidi bantta gitiya yeggi aggidi Yesuusa kaallidosona .
40004021	Yesuusi yaappe buroo gede sinthe aadhdhishe hara nam77u ishata , Zabdiyoosa nayta , Yayqoobanne Yohaannisa be7is . Bantta aawa Zabdiyoosara issife wogoluwa giddon bantta gitiya giigiseyssata xeegis .
40004022	Enttika , ellesidi bantta wogoluwanne bantta aawa aggidi Yesuusa kaallidosona .
40004023	Yesuusi Ayhude Woosa Keethatan tamaarssishe , salo kawotethaa Wonggelaa odishenne dumma dumma harggiyafe asaa pathishe Galiila biitta ubban yuuyis .
40004024	Hessafe denddoyssan iya sunthay Sooriya biitta ubban keyis . Dumma dumma harggen oykettidayssatanne waayetteyssata , tuna ayyaanan oykettidayssata , shoci yeggiya harggen oykettidayssatanne , gunddata iyaakko ehidosona ; ikka enttana pathis .
40004025	Asay Galiilappe , Tammu Katamatappe , Yerusalaameppe , Yihudappenne Yorddaanose Shaafaa hefinthan de7iya biittaafe yida daro asay iya kaallidosona .
40005001	Daro derey shiiqidayssa Yesuusi be7ida wode deriya bolla keyidi uttis . Iya tamaareti iyaakko shiiqin ,
40005002	hayssada yaagidi tamaarssis :
40005003	“ Bantta ayyaanan manqoti anjjettidayssata , salo kawotethay enttassa .
40005004	Yeekkeyssati anjjettidayssata , entti minthetho demmana .
40005005	Bantta wozanan ashkketi anjjettidayssata , entti sa7aa laattana .
40005006	Xillobaa oothanaw koshatteyssatinne saamotteyssati anjjettidayssata , entti kallana .
40005007	Maareyssati anjjettidayssata , entti maarotethi demmana .
40005008	Wozana geeshshati anjjettidayssata , entti Xoossaa be7ana .
40005009	Sigetheyssati anjjettidayssata , entti Xoossaa nayta geetetti xeegettana .
40005010	Xillobaa oothiya gisho gidi , goodetteyssati anjjettidayssata , salo kawotethay enttassa .
40005011	“ Asay hinttena ta gisho gidi cayaa wode gooddiya wodenne hintte bolla iitabaa ubbaa worddon odisiya wode hintte anjjettidayssata .
40005012	Hintte woytoy salon gita gidiya gisho ufayttite , hashshu giite . Hinttefe kase de7iya nabeta hessada goodidosona .
40005013	“ Hinttee biittaas maxine ; maxiney ba maxinetethaa aggiko , ba mal77otethaa waati zaari demmanee ? Kare holin asan yedhdhettanaappe attin aybiskka maaddenna .
40005014	“ Hintte biittaas poo7o ; dere bolla de7iya katamiya qosettanaw dandda7ukku .
40005015	Xomppe oythidi son de7iya asa ubbaas poo7ana mela dhoqqa son wotheesippe attin daallo gidon wothey baawa .
40005016	Hessa mela asay hintte lo77o oosuwa be7idi , salon de7iya hintte aawa bonchchana mela hintte poo7oy asa sinthan poo7o .
40005017	“ Taani Muse higgiyanne nabeta qaala shaaranaw yida hinttew daanoppo . Taani , entti odidayssi tuma gideyssa qonccisanaw yasippe attin shaaranaw yabiikke .
40005018	Ta hinttew tuma odays ; saloynne sa7ay aadhdhana gakkanaw higge ubbay polettanaappe attin higgiyafe issi qaalay woykko pidaaley aadhdhenna .
40005019	Hessa gisho , ha kiitatappe guuxiya issi kiitaa menthiya oonikka qassi harata hessatho oothana mela tamaarssey oonikka salo kawotethan ubbaafe guutha gidana . Shin ha kiitaa poleysinne haratakka polana mela tamaarssey salo kawotethan gita gidana .
40005020	Ta hinttew odays ; hintte xillotethay Farisaaweta xillotethaafenne higge asttamaareta xillotethaafe aadhdhonna ixxiko , salo kawotethaa gelekketa .
40005021	“ Hintte mayzatas , ‘ Wodhoppite ; shemppo wodhida oonikka pirddettana ’ geetettoyssa si7ideta .
40005022	Shin ta hinttew odays ; ba ishaa hanqettiya ubbay pirddettana . Ba ishaa cayaa oonikka daynna sinthi pirddas shiiqana . Ba ishaakko , ‘ Eeyay ’ giya oonikka qassi gaanname taman pirddettana .
40005023	“ Hessa gisho , neeni ne yarshshuwa yarshshiya wode ne ishaa qohidabay new akeeketiko ,
40005024	ne yarshshuwa he bessan aggada ba ; koyrota bada ne ishaara giiga ; yaata simmada , ne yarshshuwa Xoossaas yarshsha .
40005025	“ Nena mooteyssara pirdda keethi bashe oge bolla iyara giiga . Hessi atto giikko I nena daynna sinthi efana . Daynnay nena qachcheyssas aathi immana ; I nena woynen yeggana .
40005026	Ta tuma odays ; ne bolla pirddettida accuwa issi santimey attonna cigga onggana gakkanaw qasho keethafe keyakka .
40005027	“ Hayssafe kase , ‘ Laymatoppite ’ geetettoyssa si7ideta .
40005028	Shin ta hinttew odays , maccas xeellidi , amottida ubbay ba wozanan iira laymatees .
40005029	Ne ushachcha ayfey new nagaras gaaso gidikko , kessa hola . Ne asatethay kumethi gaanname taman wodhdhanaappe ne asatethaafe issoy dhayikko new lo77o .
40005030	Ne ushachcha kushey new nagaras gaaso gidikko , iya qanxa hola . Ne asatethay kumethi gaanname taman wodhdhanaappe ne asatethaafe issoy dhayikko , new lo77o .
40005031	“ ‘ Ba machchiw yeddiya oonikka anjjo warqqatiya immo ’ geetettis .
40005032	Shin ta hinttew odays ; ba machchiya laymatonna de7ishin billiya oonikka iya laymatana mela oothees . Hessadakka , anjjettida maccasiw ekkiya ubbay laymatees .
40005033	“ Hintte mayzatakko , ‘ Worddon caaqqofite ; hintte Xoossaa sinthan caaqqidayssa polite ’ geetettidayssa si7ideta .
40005034	Shin ta hinttew odays ; ubbarakka caaqqofite . Xoossay uttiya araata gidiya gisho salon caaqqofite .
40005035	Iya tohoy yedhdhiya soo gidiya gisho sa7ankka caaqqofite . Gita kawuwa katama gidiya gisho Yerusalaamenkka caaqqofite .
40005036	Hintte binaanappe issuwaka boothi woykko kareethi oothanaw dandda7onna gisho hinttee hintte huu7enkka caaqqofite .
40005037	Hessa gisho , hintte qaalay , ‘ Ee ’ woykko ‘ Akkay ’ gido . Hessafe kare keyey Xalaheppe yees .
40005038	“ ‘ Ayfe gisho ayfe ; achcha gisho achche ’ geetettidayssa si7ideta .
40005039	Shin ta hinttew odays ; hintte bolla iitabaa oothiya uraara eqettofite . Oonikka ne ushachcha shakalaa baqqiko ne haddirssa shakalaakka bessa .
40005040	Issi asi ne shaamiziya ekkanaw nena mootikko , ne kootiya gujjada imma .
40005041	Issi asi nena wolqqan babaa toossidi issi saate oge baara baana mela nena un77ethiko , iyara nam77u saate oge ba .
40005042	Woossiya ooddeskka imma ; neeppe tal77anaw koyaa oonakka diggofa .
40005043	“ ‘ Nena doseyssa dosa ; nena ixxeyssa ixxa ’ geetettoyssa si7ideta .
40005044	Shin ta hinttew odays ; hintte morkketa dosite ; hinttena qoheyssatas woossite .
40005045	Hessatho hintte oothiko , salon de7iya hintte aawas hintte nayta gidana . I iitatasinne lo77otas awa kessees ; xillotasinne nagaranchchotas ba iraa bukisees .
40005046	Hinttena dosiya asaa xalaala hintte dosikko , hinttew ay woytoy de7ii ? Hari attoshin , qaraxa qanxiseyssatikka hessa oothoosona .
40005047	Hinttee , hintte ishata xalaala sarothiko , haratappe ay hara aadhdhiyabaa oothidetii ? Hari attoshin , Xoossaa ammanonna asaykka hessa oothoosona .
40005048	Hiza , salon de7iya hintte aaway polo gidoyssada hintteka polo gidite .
40006001	“ Asi be7o gidi hintte lo77o oosuwa asa sinthan oothonnaada naagettite . Hessatho hanonna ixxiko salon de7iya hintte Aawappe woyto demmeketa .
40006002	“ Hinttee manqotas immiya wode asa sinthan bonchchettanaw gidi cubboti ogiya doonaninne Ayhude Woosa Keethatan ootheyssada asi be7o gidi oothofite . Ta hinttew tuma odays ; entti bantta kumetha woytuwa ekkidosona .
40006003	Shin hinttee manqotas immiya wode hintte ushachcha kushey ootheyssa hintte haddirssa kushey eroppo ;
40006004	hintte imoy geeman gido . Geeman ootheyssa be7iya hintte aaway hinttew woytuwa qonccen immana .
40006005	“ Woosa woossishe cubbotatho hanoppite . Entti , banttana asi be7o gidi Ayhude Woosa Keethaninne ogiya doonan eqqidi woosseyssa dosoosona . Ta hinttew tuma odays ; entti bantta kumetha woytuwa ekkidosona .
40006006	Shin neeni woossiya wode ne soo gela , wulaa gorddada geeman de7iya ne Aawakko woossa ; geeman oosettidayssa be7iya ne aaway new woytuwa immana .
40006007	Hintte woossiya wode ammanonna asaatho coo qaala darssidi woossofite . Entti adussi woossin Xoossay si7ees gidi qoppoosona .
40006008	Hessa gisho , enttayssada hanoppite . Ays giikko , hintte aaway hinttew ay koshshiyako hintte woossanaappe sinthattidi erees .
40006009	“ Hiza , hintte yaagidi woossite : ‘ Salon de7iya nu aawaw , ne geeshsha sunthay anjjetto .
40006010	Ne kawotethay yo , ne sheney salon hanidayssada sa7ankka hano .
40006011	Gallasa kathaa hachchi hachchi nuus imma .
40006012	Nuuni nuna qohidayssata , atto geyssada , nuuskka nu qohuwa atto ga .
40006013	Nuna iitappe ashshafe attin paacen gelssofa . [ Kawotethay , wolqqaynne bonchchoy merinaw neessa . Amin77i . ] ’
40006014	“ Hintte hinttena qohidayssata atto giikko , salon de7iya hintte Aaway hintte qohuwakka atto gaana .
40006015	Shin hintte hara asa nagara atto goonna ixxiko hintte Aaway hintte nagara atto geenna .
40006016	“ Hintte xoomiya wode cubbotatho kayottofite . Ays giikko , entti xoomeyssa asi erana mela bantta som77uwa qitayoosona . Ta tuma odays ; entti bantta woytuwa ekkidosona .
40006017	“ Shin neeni xoomiya wode ne som77uwa meecca , ne huu7iya tiyetta .
40006018	Hessada ne oothiko ne xoomiya xoomay asappe geemmidayssa , shin geeman de7iya ne Aaway eriya xooma gidana . Geeman oosettidayssa be7iya ne Aaway new woytuwa immana .
40006019	“ Bili miyason , biraati shi7iyason , kaysoy bookkidi ekkiyason , ha sa7an , hinttew shalo shiishoppite .
40006020	Shin bili moonason , biraati shi7onnason , kaysoy bookkidi ekkonnason salon hinttew shalo shiishite .
40006021	Ne shaloy de7iyasuwan ne wozanay de7ana .
40006022	“ Ayfey asatethaas xomppe . Hessa gisho , ne ayfey paxa gidikko ne kumetha asatethay poo7o gidees .
40006023	Ne ayfey hargganchcho gidikko ne kumetha asatethay dhuma gidees . Hiza , nenan de7iya poo7oy dhuma gidikko , dhumay ay mela aadhdhidi dhumanddeshsha !
40006024	“ Issi asi nam77u godas haarettanaw dandda7enna . Issuwa dosikko hankkuwa ixxees ; woykko issuwa bonchchiko hankkuwa kadhees . Xoossasinne miishes haarettanaw dandda7ekketa .
40006025	“ Hiza , si7ite ! Hinttee de7on daanaw , ‘ Ay maanee ? Ay uyanee ? Ay ma77anee ? ’ gidi un77ettofite ; de7oy kathafe woykko ma7oppe aadhdhenee ?
40006026	Salo kafota xeellite ; entti zerokkona , buuccokona , shaalen yeggokona , shin hintte salo aaway entta muzees . Hintte enttafe keehi aadhdheketii ?
40006027	Hintte giddofe daro un7ettidi ba laythaa bolla issi gallas gujjanaw dandda7ey de7ii ?
40006028	“ Qassi hintte ma77iyabaas ays un7ettetii ? Ane ciishshata be7ite , ooson daaburokkona woykko suqqokona .
40006029	Si7ite ! Hari attoshin , kawuwa Solomoney ba bonchcho ubban ha ciishshatappe issuwa melakka ma77ibeenna .
40006030	Hinttenoo , ammanoy paccidayssato , Xoossay hachchi benttidi wontto taman wodhdhanaw de7iya maata yaatidi mayziyabaa gidikko , hinttena enttafe aathidi waati mayzennee ?
40006031	Hessa gisho , ‘ Ay maanee ? Ay uyanee ? Ay ma77anee ? ’ gidi un77ettofite .
40006032	He ubbaa Xoossaa ammanonna asay darssidi demmanaw un77ettoosona . Hintte salo aaway he ubbay hinttew koshsheyssa erees .
40006033	Shin ubbaafe sinthe Xoossaa kawotethaanne iya xillotethaa koyite ; he ubbay hinttew gujji imettana .
40006034	Hessa gisho , wonttos qoppishe un77ettofite . Wonttoyssi wonttos aqo ; issi issi gallasay baw gidiya metora de7ees .
40007001	“ Hintte bolla pirddettonna mela harata bolla pirddofite .
40007002	Ays giikko , harata bolla hintte pirddeyssada hintte bolla pirddettana ; hintte haratas makkidaban hinttew zaari makettana .
40007003	Ne ayfen de7iya tuussu daaneyssa be7onna ne ishaa ayfen de7iya buuriya ays be7ay ?
40007004	Ne ayfen tuussi de7ishin ne ishaa ayfen de7iya buuriya kesso gaanaw waana dandda7ay ?
40007005	Neno cubbuwaw , koyrottada ne ayfen de7iya tuussi daaneyssa kessa . Iyappe guye , ne ishaa ayfen de7iya buuriya kessanaw ne geeshsha xeellana .
40007006	“ Guye simmidi hinttena saxxonna mela geeshshabaa kanatas yeggofite . Bantta tohuwan yedhdhidi iissonna mela hintte al77o inquwa gudunthota sinthan yeggofite .
40007007	“ Woossite hinttew imettana , koyite hintte demmana , kare yidi xeegite hinttew dooyettana .
40007008	Woossiya ooddeskka imettana , koyaa ooddeskka benttana , kare yidi xeegiya ooddeskka dooyettana .
40007009	“ Hintte giddofe ba na7i uythi woossiko shuchchi immey oonee ?
40007010	Woykko molo woossiko shooshi immey de7ii ?
40007011	Yaatin hintte iita gidishe hintte naytas lo77obaa imo erikko , hintte salo aaway bana woosseyssatas lo77obaa waati darssidi immenee ?
40007012	Harati hinttew oothana mela hintte koyabaa ubbaa hintteka haratas oothite . Ays giikko , Muse higgeynne nabeti tamaarssey hayssa .
40007013	“ Xuuntha wulara gelite ; ays giikko , dhayos efiya ogey wogga , wulaykka dalgga . Iyara geliya asaykka daro .
40007014	Shin de7uwakko efiya ogeynne wulay xuunthu ; yaa geliya asaykka guutha .
40007015	“ Bolla baggara dorsse daanidi bantta gaathan suudhume gididi hintte giddo geliya worddanchcho nabetappe naagettite .
40007016	Hintte entta , entta ayfiyaappe erana ; agunthafe woyney , kinchchoteppe laadey maxettenna .
40007017	Hessa mela lo77o mithi ubbay lo77o ayfe ayfees ; iita mithi iita ayfe ayfees .
40007018	Lo77o mithi iita ayfe ayfenna , qassi iita mithi lo77o ayfe ayfanaw dandda7enna .
40007019	Lo77o ayfe ayfonna mithi ubbay qanxettidi taman xuugettana .
40007020	Hessa gisho , hintte entta , entta ayfiyaan erana .
40007021	“ Salon de7iya ta aawa sheniya oothiya uray salo kawotethi gelanaappe attin coo tana ‘ Godaw , Godaw ’ giya ubbay salo kawotethi gelenna .
40007022	Pirdda gallas daroti , ‘ Godaw , Godaw , ne sunthan tinbbite odibookko ? Ne sunthan tuna ayyaanata kessibookko ? Ne sunthan malaatata oothibookkoo ? ’ yaagana .
40007023	He wode taani , ‘ Ta hinttena ubbarakka erikke , hinttee iita ootheyssati taappe haakkite ’ yaagana .
40007024	“ Hiza , ha ta qaala si7idi oothiya oonikka ba keethaa shuchcha bolla keexida wozanaama asa mela .
40007025	Iray bukkis , di7oy di77is , carkkoyka carkkidi he keethaa sugis . Shin keethay shuchcha baaso bolla keexettida gisho kunddibeenna .
40007026	Ha ta qaala si7idi oothonna oonikka ba keethaa shafe bolla keexida eeya uraa mela .
40007027	Iray bukkidi , di7oy di77idi , carkkoyka carkkidi , he keethaa sugin , he keethay kunddis ; iya kunddethaykka wolqqaama ” yaagis .
40007028	Yesuusi ba oda onggida wode iya timirttey higge asttamaareta mela gidonna maatara gidiya gisho asay iya timirttiyan malaalettidosona .
40007029	
40008001	Yesuusi deriyappe wodhdhiya wode daro asay iya kaallidosona .
40008002	Hekko issi baro hargganchchoy iyaakko shiiqidi , iya sinthan gulbbatidi , “ Godaw , ne shene gidikko tana geeshshada pathanaw dandda7aasa ” yaagis .
40008003	Yesuusi ba kushiya yeddidi iya bochchidi , “ Ee , ta shene , paxa ” yaagis . Uray iirakka geeyi aggis .
40008004	Yesuusi iyaakko , “ Ne paxuwa ooddeskka odoppa . Shin bada ne geeyada paxoyssa kahine bessa . Ne paxuwas markka gidana mela bada Musey kiittida yarshshuwa yarshsha ” yaagis .
40008005	Yesuusi Qifirnahoome katama gakkida wode issi mato halaqay iyaakko shiiqidi ,
40008006	“ Godaw , ta aylley asatethay gunddin daro harggettidi , son zin77idi de7ees ” yaagidi woossis .
40008007	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani bada iya pathana ” yaagis .
40008008	Shin mato halaqay zaaridi , “ Godaw , ne ta soo gelanaw bessiya asi gidikke , shin ne han uttada qaala xalaala oda , ta aylley paxana .
40008009	Ays giikko , taappe bollara ta kiitettiya asati de7oosona , qassi taappe garssara taw kiitetteyssati de7oosona . Enttafe issuwa , ‘ Ba ’ giyade bees ; hankkuwa qassi ‘ Haaya ! ’ giyade yees . Ta aylliya , ‘ Hayssa ootha ’ giyade oothees ” yaagis .
40008010	Yesuusi hessa si7ida wode malaalettidi , bana kaalliya asaakko , “ Ta hinttew tuma odays ; taani hayssa mela ammano Isra7eele asankka be7abiikke .
40008011	Ta hinttew odays ; daroti dolohappenne wulohappe yidi , salo kawotethan Abrahamera , Yisaaqaranne Yayqoobara issife imato bolla uttana .
40008012	Shin salo kawotethaa laattanaw bessishin attidayssati kare dhuman holettana . Yan enttaw yeehonne achcha garccethi gidana ” yaagis .
40008013	Yesuusi mato halaqaakko , “ Ne soo ba , ne ammanuwatho new hano ” yaagis . Iya aylley sohuwara paxi aggis .
40008014	Yesuusi Phexiroosa soo geliya wode Phexiroosa machche aayyaa qoxo misha harggen sakettada zin77idaaro be7is .
40008015	Yesuusi I kushiya bochchida wode qoxoynne mishay aggi aggis . Paxa denddada iya mokkasu .
40008016	He wode omarssi tuna ayyaanan oykettida daro asata , asay Yesuusakko ehidosona . Ikka tuna ayyaanata ba qaalan kessis , hargganchchota ubbaa pathis .
40008017	Hessankka nabiya Isayaasi , “ I nu harggiya baw ekkis , i nu harggiya tookkis ”
40008018	Yesuusi daro asay iya yuushuwan eqqidayssa be7idi , abbaafe hefinthi pinnana mela ba tamaareta kiittis .
40008019	Higge asttamaaretappe issoy , “ Asttamaariyaw , ne biyaso ubbaa ta kaallana ” yaagis .
40008020	Yesuusi iyaakko “ Workkanatas olli de7ees , salo kafotas keethi de7ees . Shin Asa Na7aas ba huu7iya shemppisiya bessi baawa ” yaagis .
40008021	Yesuusa kaalliya asatappe issoy , “ Godaw , taani sinthata bada ta aawa moogada yaana ” yaagis .
40008022	Shin Yesuusi , “ Hayqqidayssati bantta hayqota moogo ; neeni tana kaalla ” yaagis .
40008023	Yesuusi baanaw wogoluwan gelida wode iya tamaaretikka iyara baanaw gelidosona .
40008024	Entti qopponna de7ishin , wolqqaama hobbey haatha bolla denddin wogoloy mitettanaw gakkis . Shin Yesuusi dhiskkis .
40008025	Iya tamaareti iyaakko shiiqidi iya barkkethidi , “ Godaw , nu dhayos nuna ashsharkkii ” yaagidosona .
40008026	Yesuusi enttako , “ Hinttenoo , ammanoy paccidayssato , ays yayyetii ? ” yaagis . Denddidi , hobbiyanne gotiya essis . Ellesidi ubbabay si77i gis .
40008027	Iya tamaareti malaalettidi , “ Hayssi , hari attoshin , hobbeynne gotey kiitetteyssi waanida asee ? ” yaagidosona .
40008028	Yesuusi abbaafe hefinthan de7iya Gerggesoone giya biittaa gakkida wode tuna ayyaanay oykkida nam77u asati duufoppe keyidi iyara gahettidosona . Entti daro iitanne yashshiya asata gidiya gisho asi he bessaara aadhdhanaw dandda7enna .
40008029	Enttika , “ Xoossaa Na7aw , nunanne nena aybe gathey ? Wodey gakkonna de7ishin nuna pirddanaw yadii ? ” gidi waassidosona .
40008030	Enttafe daro haakkonna guduntho wudey heemettes .
40008031	Tuna ayyaanati Yesuusa , “ Ne nuna kessanabaa gidikko , hini guduntho wudiya giddo yeddarkkii ” yaagidi woossidosona .
40008032	Yesuusi , “ Biite ” yaagis . Tuna ayyaanati asatappe keyidi gudunthotan gelidosona . Gudunthoti ubbay aafo doonara dirggidi bidi abban mitettidi hayqqidosona .
40008033	Guduntho wudiya heemmeyssati baqatidi katama bidi , hanidabaanne tuna ayyaanay oykkida asata bolla oosettidaba ubbaa odidosona .
40008034	Yaatin , kataman de7iya asa ubbay Yesuusa be7anaw keyidosona . Entti Yesuusa be7ida wode bantta biittaafe keyidi baana mela woossidosona .
40009001	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi wogoluwan gelidi , abbaa pinnidi ba katamaa bis .
40009002	Hanida guutha asati issi gundda uraa alggara tookkidi Yesuusakko ehidosona . Yesuusi entta ammanuwa be7idi , gundda uraa , “ Ta na7aw , yayyofa ! Ne nagaray atto geetettis ” yaagis .
40009003	He saatiyan , Ayhude higge asttamaaretappe issoti issoti , “ Hayssi Xoossaa cashshe gidennee ” yaagidi bantta wozanan qoppidosona .
40009004	Yesuusi entta qofaa eridi , “ Iitabaa hintte wozanan ays qoppeetii ?
40009005	Hanoshin , ‘ Ne nagaray atto geetettis ’ geyssafenne ‘ Dendda eqqada ba ’ geyssafe awussi kawuyii ?
40009006	Shin sa7a bolla nagara atto gaanaw Asa Na7aas maati de7eyssa ta hinttena erisana ” yaagidi , gundda addiyako , “ Dendda eqqa , ne alggaa tookkada , ne soo ba ” yaagis .
40009007	Gundda uray denddidi ba soo bis .
40009008	Derey hessa be7idi malaalettidosona . Hessa mela maata asas immida Xoossaa galatidosona .
40009009	Yesuusi yaappe denddidi bishe Maatoosa geyssa qaraxa qanxisiya bessan uttidashin be7idi , “ Tana kaalla ” yaagis . Ikka denddidi kaallis .
40009010	Yesuusi Maatoosa son gayta bolla uttidashin , qaraxa qanxisiya daro asatinne nagaranchchoti yidi iyaranne iya tamaaretara issife maanaw uttidosona .
40009011	Issi issi Farisaaweti hessa be7idi , Yesuusa tamaareta , “ Hintte asttamaarey qaraxa qanxiseyssataranne nagaranchchotara ays mii ? ” yaagidosona .
40009012	Yesuusi hessa si7idi , “ Dhale koshshey haragganchchotassafe attin paxatassa gidenna .
40009013	Shin hintte bidi , ‘ Taani hintte yarshshuwa gidonnashin hintte harata maarana mela koyays ’ geetettidi xaafettidayssi woy guusseeko erite . Ays giikko , taani nagaranchchota xeeganaw yasippe attin xillota xeeganaw yabiikke ” yaagis .
40009014	He wode Yohaannisa tamaareti Yesuusakko shiiqidi , “ Nunne Farisaaweti xoomos , shin ne tamaareti ays xoomokkonaa ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
40009015	Yesuusi zaaridi enttako , “ Mushuray enttara de7ishin xeegettidi yida asay kayottanaw dandda7oona ? Mushuray entta matappe ekettana wodey yaana , entti he wode xoomana .
40009016	“ Ooratha ma7oppe peedhidi gal77a ma7o bolla sikkey oonikka baawa . Hessatho oothiko oorathay gal77aa peedhees . Peedhethayka gujji dalggees .
40009017	Ooratha woyne gal77a ogoron qoliya oonikka baawa . Hessatho oothiko ooratha woyney gal77a ogoruwa dhusees woyneykka gukkees ; ogoroykka nam77antho maaddonnabaa gidees . Shin ooratha woyney ooratha ogoron qoletanaw bessees . Hessatho oosettiko nam77ayka iitonna naagettoosona ” yaagis .
40009018	Yesuusi hessa odo bolla de7ishin , Ayhude halaqatappe issoy iyaakko yidi , iya sinthan gulbbatidi , “ Ta na7iya ha77i hayqqasu , shin iya paxana mela neeni yada ne kushiya I bolla wotharkkii ” gidi woossis .
40009019	Yesuusi denddidi iyara bis ; iya tamaaretikka kaallidosona .
40009020	I bishin tammanne nam77u laythi kumethi suuthi goggidi waaysiya issi maccasiya guyera shiiqada Yesuusa afilaa macaraa bochchasu .
40009021	Iya ba wozanan , “ Ta iya afilaa macaraa xalaala bochchiyakko paxana ” yaagada qoppasu .
40009022	Yesuusi guye simmi iyo xeellidi , “ Ta naatte , yayyofa ! Nena ne ammanoy pathis ” yaagis . Maccasiya sohuwara paxa aggasu .
40009023	Yesuusi Ayhude halaqaa soo gakkiya wode zaye punneyssatanne yeekkeyssata be7idi ,
40009024	“ Ane kichchite ; guutha na7iya dhiskkasuppe attin hayqqabuukku ” yaagis . Shin asay iya bolla miicidosona .
40009025	Asaa kare kessidaappe guye soo gelidi , na7ee kushiya oykkis , na7iya dendda eqqasu .
40009026	He worey he biitta ubbaa gakkis .
40009027	Yesuusi yaappe denddidi gede sinthe biya wode nam77u qooqeti bantta qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Dawite na7aw , nuna maararkii ” yaagishe iya kaallidosona .
40009028	Yesuusi soo gelida wode qooqeti iya kaallidi yidosona . Yesuusi enttako , “ Taani hessa oothanaw dandda7eyssa hintte ammaneetii ? ” yaagis . Enttika , “ Ee , Godaw ” yaagidi zaaridosona .
40009029	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi entta ayfiyaa bochchidi enttako , “ Hinttew , hintte ammanuwatho hano ” yaagis .
40009030	Entta ayfeykka dooyettis . Yesuusi enttako , “ Hayssa ooddeskka odoppite ” yaagidi minthi odis .
40009031	Shin asati bidi Yesuusabaa he biitta ubban odidosona .
40009032	Entti yaappe keyaa wode asay tuna ayyaanay oykkidi muumisida issi asi Yesuusakko ehidosona .
40009033	Tuna ayyaanay keyidaappe guye muume uray odettis . Dereykka malaalettidi , “ Hayssa mela oorathabay Isra7eele biittan hanibeenna ” yaagidosona .
40009034	Shin Farisaaweti , “ Tuna ayyaanata halaqan tuna ayyaanata kessees ” yaagidosona .
40009035	Yesuusi Ayhude Woosa Keethatan tamaarssishe , salo kawotethaa Wonggelaa sabbakishe , asaa hargge ubbaafe pathishe katamataninne guta ubban yuuyis .
40009036	Daro derey , heemmiya asi baynna dorssada enttana be7iya asi dhayin un77ettidi de7eyssata be7idi enttaw qadhettis .
40009037	Ba tamaaretakko , “ Shiiqana kathay daro , shin kathaa shiishiya asay guutha .
40009038	Hessa gisho , Goday kathaa shiishiya oosanchchota yeddana mela woossite ” yaagis .
40010001	Yesuusi tammanne nam77u tamaareta baakko xeegidi , tuna ayyaanata kessana melanne hargge ubbaa pathana mela enttaw maata immis .
40010002	Yesuusi kiittida tammanne nam77u hawaareta sunthay : koyroy Phexiroosa giya Simoonanne iya ishaa Inddiriyasa , Zabdiyoosa na7aa Yayqoobanne iya ishaa Yohaannisa ,
40010003	Filphoosanne Bartolomiyoosa , Toomasanne qaraxa qanxisiya Maatoosa , Ilfiyoosa na7aa Yayqooba , Taadiyosa ,
40010004	ba biittaas mishettiya Simoonanne Yesuusa aathi immida Asqoroota Yihuda .
40010005	He tammanne nam77ata Yesuusi kiittidi yeddishe , “ Ayhude gidonna deriyakko booppite , qassi Samaareta katamakka geloppite .
40010006	Shin Isra7eele keethaafe gidida hini dhayida dorssatakko biite .
40010007	Yaa bidi , ‘ Salo kawotethay matattis ’ gidi odite .
40010008	Hargganchchota pathite , hayqqidayssata hayqoppe denthite , baro hargganchchota geeshshi pathite , tuna ayyaanata kessite . Hintte coo ekkidayssa coo immite .
40010009	Hintte kiisen worqqa , woykko bira santime oykkofite .
40010010	Hintte ogiyas karxiito , nam77u afila , woykko caamma woykko xam77a oykkofite ; oosanchchuwas gallasa kathi koshshees .
40010011	“ Hintte issi katamaa woykko gutaa geliya wode hinttena mokkidi ekkanaw ufayttiya uraa koyidi iya son shemppite ; hintte baana gakkanaw yan gam77ite .
40010012	Qassi oodde sookka gelishe sarothite .
40010013	He keethay hinttena mokkiko hintte sarothida saroy enttana gakko , shin entti mokkonna ixxiko hintte sarothida saroy hinttew guye simmo .
40010014	Oonikka hinttena mokkonnanne hintte odiyabaa si7onna ixxiko he keethaafe woykko he katamaappe keyishe hintte tohuwan de7iya baana pittidi keyite .
40010015	Ta hinttew tuma odays ; Xoossaa pirdda gallasan he katamaappe Soodomesinne Gamoora katamatas pirdday kawuyana .
40010016	“ Ta hinttena dorssatada suudhumeta giddo yeddana . Hessa gisho , shooshada cinccata , holleda aadata gidite .
40010017	Asay hinttena pirdda daynnatas aathi immana , qassi Ayhude Woosa Keethan hinttena garaafana . Hessa gisho , enttafe naagettite .
40010018	Ta gisho gidi hinttena deriya haareyssata sinthenne kawota sinthe efana . Entta sinthaninne Ayhude gidonna deriya sinthan eqqidi hintte tabaa markkattana .
40010019	Shin hinttena pirddas aathi immiya wode woygidi zaarino gidi un77ettofite ; he saatiyan hintte gaanabaa Xoossay hinttew immana .
40010020	Ays giikko , hinttenan haasayey hintte Aawa Geeshsha Ayyaanaappe attin hinttena gidekketa .
40010021	“ Ishay ba ishaa , aaway ba na7aa , hayqos aathi immana , nayti banttana yelidayssata bolla denddidi enttana wodhisana .
40010022	Ta gisho gidi asa ubbay hinttena ixxana , shin wurssethi gakkanaw minniday attana .
40010023	Issi heerappe hinttena entti gooddiko hara katama baqatite . Taani hinttew tuma odays ; Asa Na7ay yaana gakkanaw , hintte Isra7eele katama ubbaa kantheketa .
40010024	“ Tamaarey ba asttamaariyappe , aylley ba godaappe aadhdhenna .
40010025	Tamaarey ba asttamaariya , aylley ba godaa daanikko iyaw gidana . Keethaawa Bi7elzebuula giikko iya soo asaa waanidi iissidi xeegenne ?
40010026	“ Hiza , asas yayyofite . Kamettidabay qoncconna , qosettidabay geeshshi keyonna attenna .
40010027	Taani hinttew dhuman odiyabaa hintte poo7on odite ; ta hinttew haythan kalkkashidabaa dabaaban awaajjite .
40010028	Ashoppe attin shemppo wodhanaw dandda7onnayssatas yayyofite . Shin shemppuwanne ashuwa gaannamen dhayssanaw dandda7iya Xoossaas yayyite .
40010029	Nam77u buubbeti issi santimen bayzettokonaayye ? Hanoppe attin , enttafe issinnaka hintte Xoossay goonna de7ishin sa7an wodhdhuku .
40010030	Hari attoshin , hintte huu7e binaanaykka paydettidi de7ees .
40010031	Hiza , daro buubbetappe hintte aadhdhiya gisho yayyofite .
40010032	“ Asa sinthan taw markkattiya ubbaas taanikka saluwan de7iya ta aawa sinthan markkattana .
40010033	Shin asa sinthan tana kaddeyssa taanikka salon de7iya ta aawa sinthan kaddana .
40010034	“ Taani sa7an saro ehanaw yida hinttew daanoppo . Taani toorappe attin sarotethi ehanaw yabiikke .
40010035	Taani yiday , ‘ Na7aa aawappe macca na7iw aayeppe na7aa machchiw azina aayeppe shaakkanaassa .
40010036	Asas morkketi iya soo asata gidana . ’
40010037	“ Taappe aathidi ba aawa woykko ba aayiw dosey , tabaa gidanaw bessenna . Ba adde na7a woykko ba macca na7iw taappe aathidi dosey , tabaa gidanaw bessenna .
40010038	Ba masqaliya tookkidi tana kaallonna oonikka tabaa gidanaw bessenna .
40010039	Ba shemppuwa ashshanaw koyey dhayssana , shin ba shemppuwa ta gisho aathi immey ashshana .
40010040	“ Hinttena mokkey tana mokkees , tana mokkey qassi tana kiittidayssa mokkees .
40010041	Nabiya nabe sunthan mokkey , nabiyatho woytettana ; qassi xilluwa xillo sunthan mokkey , xilluwatho woytettana .
40010042	Ta hinttew tuma odays ; ha ta tamaaretappe guuxiya issuwas tana kaalliya gisho hari attoshin guutha irxxa haathi immiko iya woytoy dhayenna ” yaagis .
40011001	Yesuusi tammanne nam77u tamaareta kiitaa onggidaappe guye yaappe denddidi tamaarssanawunne sabbakanaw Galiila katamata bis .
40011002	Yohaannisi qasho keethan de7ishe Kiristtoosi oothiyabata si7idi , ba tamaaretappe iyaakko kiittidi ,
40011003	“ Yaana geetettiday neneyye ? Woykko nuuni haraa naaginoo ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
40011004	Yesuusi enttako zaaridi , “ Bidi hintte si7iyabaanne hintte be7iyabaa Yohaannisas odite .
40011005	Qooqeti xeellosona , wobbeti hamuttoosona , baro hargganchchoti paxoosona , tulleti si7oosona , hayqqidayssati hayqoppe denddoosona ; manqotas Wonggelay sabbakettees .
40011006	Tanan dhubettonay anjjettidayssa ” yaagis .
40011007	Yohaannisa tamaareti guye simmidi bin , Yesuusi deriyas Yohaannisabaa odishe , “ Ha bazzuwa ay be7anaw keyidetii ? Carkkoy qaathiya maqqaa be7anaw yidetiyye ?
40011008	Yaatin , ay be7anaw keyidetii ? Kitte ma7o ma77ida ase be7anaaseyye ? Kitte ma7o ma77idayssati kawota keethan de7oosona .
40011009	Yaatin , ay be7anaw keyidetii ? Nabe be7anaaseyye ? Hekko , hintte nabeppekka aadhdheyssa be7eeta .
40011010	“ Ne ogiya ne sinthan giigisiya ta kiitanchchuwa neeppe sinthe kiittana ”
40011011	Ta hinttew tuma odays ; maccasappe yelettidayssata giddofe Yohaannisappe aadhdhey oonikka baawa ; salo kawotethan ubbaafe guuxey I , iyappe aadhdhana .
40011012	Xammaqiya Yohaannisa wodiyappe doomidi hachchi gakkanaw salo kawotethay daro naaqettees , minnida asati wolqqan yaa gelana .
40011013	Nabeti ubbaynne Muse higgey Yohaannisa wode gakkanaw salo kawotethaabaa tinbbite odidosona .
40011014	Hiza , hintte entta kiitaa ammanana gidikko , yaana geetettida Eliyaasi , I Yohaannisa .
40011015	Hiza , si7iya haythi de7ey si7o .
40011016	“ Hiza , ha wodiya yeletethaa aybira daaniso ? Giya giddon uttidi woli xeegidi ,
40011017	‘ Nu hinttew suusul77e punnin ; hintte yexxeketa . Nu sabbidi zeleelin ; hintte yeekkeketa ’
40011018	Xammaqiya Yohaannisi moonnanne uyonna yin , ‘ Tuna ayyaani de7ees ’ yaagideta .
40011019	Asa Na7ay mishenne uyishe yin , ‘ Yarambbanne ushshanchcho , qaraxa qanxiseyssatanne nagaaranchchota dabbo ’ yaagideta . Hiza , cinccatethaa tumatethay iya oosuwan qonccees ” yaagis .
40011020	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi daro malaatata oothida katamatan de7iya asati bantta nagaraappe simmidi maarotan gelonna ixxida gisho enttana ,
40011021	“ Ayye Koraaziine katamaw , ayye Beetesayda katamaw , ays giikko , hintte giddon oosettida malaatati Xiroosaninne Sidoonan oosettida gidiyakko , entti beni bido tiyettidi , kalle ma77idi bantta nagaraappe simmi aggana .
40011022	Shin ta hinttew odays ; pirdda gallas hinttefe aathidi Xiroosasinne Sidoonas pirdday kawuyana .
40011023	Qassi , Qifirnahoome , neeni pude salo keyanaw koyay ? Hanenna ! Neeni Si7oolen yegettana . Ays giikko , ne giddon oosettida malaatati Soodomen oosettidabaa gidiyakko , Soodomey hachchi gakkanaw de7anashin .
40011024	Shin ta new odays ; pirdda gallas neeppe aathidi Soodomes pirdday kawuyana ” yaagidi hanqettis .
40011025	He wode Yesuusi , “ Aawaw , saluwanne sa7aa Godaw , neeni hayssa eranchchotappenne cinccatappe genthada naytas qonccisida gisho nena galatays .
40011026	Ee , ta Aawaw , hayssi ne lo77o sheniyada hanis .
40011027	“ Ubbay taw ta Aawappe imettis . Aawappe hari Na7aa erey baawa , Na7aappenne I enttaw qonccisanaw koyeyssatappe hari Aawa eranaw dandda7ey baawa .
40011028	“ Hinttenoo , daaburanchchoto , toohoy deexida ubbay taakko haa yiite ; taani hinttena shemppisana .
40011029	Taani ta wozanan ashkkenne aada gidiya gisho ta qambbaran gelite , taappe tamaarite ; hinttee , hintte shemppuwas shemppo demmana .
40011030	Ta qambbaray liiqo , qassi ta toohoykka kawushshe ” yaagis .
40012001	Hessafe guye , Sambbaata gallas , Yesuusi gade giddora aadhdhees . Yesuusa tamaareti koshattida gisho tiya bangga shirikidi moosona .
40012002	Shin Farisaaweti hessa be7idi Yesuusakko , “ Hekko , ne tamaareti Sambbaata gallas oothanaw bessonnabaa oothoosona ” yaagidosona .
40012003	Yesuusi enttako zaaridi , “ Dawitey koshattida wode Iyara de7eyssatara ay oothidaakko nabbabibeekketii ?
40012004	Dawitey Xoossaa keethi gelidi kahineta xalaalappe attin inne iyara de7eyssatas bessonna geeshsha daabbuwa mis .
40012005	Woykko kahineti Sambbaata wogaa shaaridi Xoossa Keethan Sambbaata gallas ooso oothiko enttaw bala gidonnayssa Muse higgiyan nabbabibeekketii ?
40012006	Shin si7ite ! Xoossa Keethaafe aadhdhey hayssan de7ees .
40012007	‘ Taani hintte yarshshuwa gidonnashin hintte harata maarana mela koyays ’ giya qaalay woy guusseeko hintte eridaakko xillo asa bolla pirddeketa .
40012008	Asa Na7ay Sambbaata Godaa ” yaagis .
40012009	Yesuusi yaappe bidi Ayhude Woosa Keethi gelis .
40012010	Yan kushey gunddida issi uray de7ees . Yesuusa mootanaw gaaso koyaa asati , “ Sambbaata gallas pathanaw bessi bessennee ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
40012011	I enttako , “ Hintte giddofe issuwas dorssi Sambbaata gallas aafon wulliko , goochchidi kessonnay oonee ?
40012012	Yaatin asi dorssafe waanidi daro aadhdhenee ? Hessa gisho , Sambbaata gallas lo77obaa oosoy bessees ” yaagis .
40012013	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi addiyako , “ Ne kushiya piddi ootha ” yaagin , uray piddi oothis . Iya kushey paxidi hankko kushiyada hanis .
40012014	Shin Farisaaweti yaappe kare keyidi , Yesuusa waati wodhaneekko maqettidosona .
40012015	Yesuusi entta qofaa eridi he bessaa aggidi hara soo bis . Daro asay iya kaallidi bidosona , hargganchchota ubbaa pathis .
40012016	Yesuusi , “ Tabaa hara ooddeskka odoppite ” yaagidi minthi odis .
40012017	Hessika nabiya Isayaasi ,
40012018	“ Hekko ta doorida aylley , ta doseyssi , tana ufaysseyssi , taani ta ayyaanaa , iya bolla shemppisana ; I , Ayhude gidonna deriyas suure pirddabaa awaajjana .
40012019	I palamenna woykko kaccenna ; ba qaalakka denbban coo sissenna .
40012020	Suure pirddan xoono demmana gakkanaw , dinccettida maqqaa menthenna , cuyiya muqaadaa toysenna .
40012021	Ayhude gidonna derey ubbay iyan ufayssi wothana ”
40012022	Hessafe guye , tuna ayyaanan oykettida qooqenne muume ase de7eyssa iyaakko ehidosona . Yesuusi uraa pathin , uray be7isinne odettis .
40012023	Asa ubbay malaalettidi , “ Hayssi Dawite Na7aa gidanddeshshaa ? ” yaagidosona .
40012024	Shin Farisaaweti hessa si7idi , “ Ha uray tuna ayyaanata kessey tuna ayyaanata halaqaa Bi7elzebuula wolqqaana ” yaagidosona .
40012025	Yesuusi entta qofaa eridi , “ Woli giddon shaakettiya kawotetha ubbay kunddana ; qassi woli giddon shaakettiya katamay woykko keethay minnidi eqqenna .
40012026	Xalahey Xalahe kessiyabaa gidikko ba giddon shaakettis guussu . Hessatho haniyabaa gidikko iya kawotethay waanidi minnidi eqqanaw dandda7ii ?
40012027	Taani tuna ayyaanaa kessey Bi7elzebuula wolqqan gidikko hinttena kaalliya asati oodde wolqqan kessannee ? Hessa gisho , hinttena kaalliya asati hinttena pirddana .
40012028	Shin taani tuna ayyaanata kessey Xoossaa Ayyaanan gidikko , Xoossaa kawotethay hintteko yis .
40012029	“ Woykko issi asi wolqqaama asa soo gelidi iya shaluwa bonqanaw koykko koyrottidi he uraa qachchonna ixxiko waattidi dandda7ii ? Yaatikko iya shaluwa bonqanaw dandda7ees .
40012030	“ Taara gidonnay oonikka taara eqettees ; qassi taara issife shiishonna ubbay laallees .
40012031	Hessa gisho , si7ite ; asay oothiya ay nagarinne cashsha qaali ubbay atto geetettana , shin Geeshsha Ayyaana cayaa ooddeskka iya nagaray atto geetettenna .
40012032	Oonikka Asa Na7a bolla iitabaa odettiko iyaw atto geetettana , shin Geeshsha Ayyaana bolla iitabaa odettiya ooddeskka ha sa7an gidin yaana alamiyan iya nagaray atto geetettenna .
40012033	“ Lo77o mithay lo77o ayfe ayfees ; qassi iita mithay iita ayfees . Hiza , mithay erettey ba ayfiyaana .
40012034	Hinttenoo , shoosha nayto , hintte iita gidishe waanidi lo77obaa odettanaw dandda7etii ? Asi ba wozanan kumidabaappe doonan odettees .
40012035	Lo77o asi ba wozanan wothida lo77obaappe , lo77obaa kessees ; iita asi ba wozanan wothida iitabaappe , iitabaa kessees .
40012036	Shin si7ite , asay odettiya coo oda ubbaas pirdda gallas zaaro immana .
40012037	Ays giikko , ne odettiya ne qaalan xillana ; ne odettiya ne qaalay ne bolla pirddana ” yaagis .
40012038	Hessafe guye , issi issi Farisaawetinne higge asttamaareti Yesuusakko , “ Asttamaariyaw , neeni malaata oothada nuna bessa ” yaagidosona .
40012039	Shin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ammanettonnanne iita yeletethay malaata koyees . Shin nabiya Yoonasa malaatappe hara malaati iyaw imettena .
40012040	Yoonasi gita molo ulon heedzu gallasinne heedzu qamma gam77idayssa mela Asa Na7ay heedzu gallasinne heedzu qamma biitta garssan gam77ana .
40012041	Nanawe asay pirdda gallas denddidi ha yeletethaa bolla pirddana ; ays giikko , entti Yoonasa sibkkatiya si7idi bantta nagaraappe simmidosona . Hekko , Yoonasappe aadhdheyssi hayssan de7ees .
40012042	Pirdda gallas dugeha kawiya denddada ha yeletethaa bolla pirddana ; ays giikko , iya Solomone cinccatethaa si7anaw biittaa gaxappe yasu . Hekko , Solomoneppe aadhdhey hayssan de7ees .
40012043	“ Tuna ayyaanay asappe keyidaappe guye baw shemppiyaso koyidi haathi baynna mela bessan daaburees , shin ba koyaa shemppuwa demmenna .
40012044	Yaanin , ‘ Ta agga keyida keetha simmada baana ’ yaagees . I simmiya wode keethay kaysi gideyssanne pitettidi giigi uttidayssa demmees .
40012045	Hiza , simmi bidi , baappe iitiya hara laappun iita ayyaanata ekkidi yees ; enttika uraa giddo gelidi de7oosona . He uraas kaseyssafe guyeyssi daro iitees . Ha iita yeletethaa bolla hessa mela hanana ” yaagis .
40012046	Yesuusi deriyas oda bolla de7ishin iya aayyaanne iya ishati iya odisanaw koyidi karen eqqidosona .
40012047	Issi asi iyaakko , “ Ne aayyaanne ne ishati nena odisanaw koyidi karen eqqidosona ” yaagis .
40012048	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ta aayyaa oonee ? Ta ishatikka oonantee ? ” yaagis .
40012049	Ba kushiyara tamaareta mallishe , “ Be7ite , ta aayanne ta ishati hayssata .
40012050	Salon de7iya ta Aawa sheniya oothiya ubbay ta isha , ta michchonne ta aayo ” yaagis .
40013001	He gallas Yesuusi sooppe keyidi abbaa gaxan uttis .
40013002	Daro derey iya yuushuwan shiiqin asaa abbaa gaxan aggaagidi wogolon gelidi uttis .
40013003	Asaas darobaa leemison yaagidi odis : “ Issi goshshanchchoy zerethi zeranaw keyis .
40013004	I zeriya wode issi issi zerethati oge gaxan wodhdhidosona ; enttaka kafoti yidi maxi midosona .
40013005	Issi issi zerethati garssan shaalloy de7iya biitta bolla wodhdhidosona . Daro biitti baynna gisho ellesidi dolis .
40013006	Shin away keyin shullis ; xaphoy baynna gisho melis .
40013007	Issi issi zerethay aguntha giddon wodhdhis ; agunthay diccidi he dolaa cuullis .
40013008	Harati qassi aradda biitta bolla wodhdhis ; dolidi ayfe ayfis . Issoy xeeta , issoy usuppun tamma , issoy qassi hasttama ayfis .
40013009	Si7iya haythi de7iya uray si7o ” yaagis .
40013010	Yesuusa tamaareti iyaakko shiiqidi , “ Ays neeni deriyas leemison oday ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
40013011	I zaaridi , “ Hinttew salo kawotethaa xuuraa eray imettis , shin enttaw imettibeenna .
40013012	De7iya ubbaas guzhettana , iyaw darana , shin baynnayssafe hari attoshin iyaw de7iyarakka ekettana .
40013013	Hessa gisho , taani entti , xeellishe demmonna mela , si7ishe si7onna mela woykko akeekonna mela enttaw leemison odays .
40013014	“ Isayaasi ba maxaafan odidayssi entta bolla polettis . I odishe , ‘ Hintte sissaa si7eeta , shin akeekekketa ; hintte xeelleta , shin be7ekketa .
40013015	Ays giikko , ha asaa wozanay zel77umis ; bantta haythaa erishe tullisidosona , bantta ayfiyaa goozidosona . Hessi baynneeko entti bantta ayfiyaan be7idi , bantta haythan si7idi , bantta wozanan akeekidi , taakko simmana , takka entta pathanashin ’ yaagis .
40013016	“ Shin hintte ayfeti be7iya gishonne hintte haythati si7iya gisho hintte anjjettidayssata .
40013017	Ta hinttew tuma odays ; daro nabetinne xillo asati hintte be7eyssa be7anawunne hintte si7eyssa si7anaw amottidosona , shin enttaw hanibeenna .
40013018	“ Hiza , ha zerethaa zeriya uraa leemisuwa si7ite .
40013019	Oge gaxan wodhdhida zerethaa leemisoy hayssa : salo kawotethaa qaala si7idi akeekonna uraa wozanappe Xalahey yidi iya wozanan de7iya zerethaa maxi digees .
40013020	Shaalloy garssan de7iya biitta bolla zerettidayssi qaala si7idi ellesidi ufaysan ekkeyssata .
40013021	Shin xapho yeddanaw dandda7onna gisho daro gam77okona . Qaala gaason metoy woykko goodetethi yaa wode ellesi dhubettoosona .
40013022	Aguntha gaathan zerettidayssi qaala si7is , shin ha alamiya duussaa hirggaynne duretetha qofay qaala cuulliya gisho ayfe ayfonna attees .
40013023	Shin aradda biittan zerettida zerethay akeekan qaala si7iya uraa . I ayfe ayfees ; issoy xeeta , issoy usuppun tamma issoy qassi hasttama ayfees ” yaagis .
40013024	Yesuusi enttaw hara leemiso odis , “ Xoossaa kawotethay ba goshshan lo77o zerethi zerida uraa daanees .
40013025	Shin asi ubbay dhiskkin iya morkkey yidi gisttiya giddon leeshsho zeridi bis .
40013026	Gisttey diccidi ayfiyaa wode leeshshoy iya giddon benttis .
40013027	“ Gadiya godaa aylleti godaakko bidi , ‘ Godaw , ne goshshan ne lo77o zerethi zerabikkishsho ? Yaatin , leeshshoy awuppe yidee ? ’ yaagidosona .
40013028	“ I enttako , ‘ Hessa morkkey oothis ’ yaagis . “ Aylleti godaakko , ‘ Nu bidi leeshshuwa shoddana mela koyay ? ’ yaagidosona .
40013029	“ Shin I , ‘ Atto bochchofite ; hintte leeshshuwa shoddays gishin gisttey shodettana .
40013030	Bochchofite ; caka wodey gakkanaw issife dicco . He wode cakkiya asata leeshshuwa sinthattidi maxidi taman xuugganaw mirqen mirqen qachchite . Shin gisttiya shiishidi ta shaaliyan qolite ’ yaagana ” yaagis .
40013031	Qassi hara leemiso yaagidi odis ; “ Salo kawotethay issi asi ba goshshan bakkida guutha mithee ayfe daanees .
40013032	He mithee ayfey hara mitha ayfetappe guutha , shin iya dolaa diccida hara mithata ubbaafe aadhdha gitatawusu . I tashiyan kafoti keexidi uttana gakkanaw wolqqaama mithi gidawusu ” yaagis .
40013033	Kaallidikka , Yesuusi hara leemiso odis ; “ Salo kawotethay issi maccasi heedzu gabate dhiille ekka munuqada , munuqay denddana mela iyan gujjida irshsho daanees ” yaagis .
40013034	Yesuusi deriyas he leemisuwa ubbaa odis . Leemisoy baynna issibaakka odibeenna .
40013035	Nabey ba maxaafan , “ Taani ta doona , leemison dooyana ; saloynne sa7ay medhettosappe , geemmidayssa odays ”
40013036	Yesuusi deriya moyzidi soo gelis . Iya tamaareti iyaakko shiiqidi , “ Goshshan de7iya leeshshuwa birshshethaa nuus oda ” yaagidosona .
40013037	I zaaridi , “ Lo77o zerethaa zeriday Asa Na7a .
40013038	Goshshay ha alamiya . Lo77o zerethay salo kawotethaa nayta . Leeshshoy Xalahe nayta .
40013039	Leeshshuwa zeriday morkkiya Xalahe . Caka wodey , wodiya wurssethaa . Cakkeyssati kiitanchchota .
40013040	“ Leeshshoy maxettidi taman xuugetteyssa mela wodiya wurssethan hessada hanana .
40013041	Asa Na7ay ba kiitanchchota kiittana . Entti nagaras gaaso gideyssatanne iita oothiya ubbaa maxidi iya kawotethaafe kessana .
40013042	Maxi shiishidi yeehoynne achcha garccethi de7iya to7onna taman yeggana .
40013043	He wode xilloti bantta Aawa kawotethan awada poo7ana . Si7iya haythi de7ey si7o !
40013044	“ Xoossaa kawotethay goshshan moogettida miishe daanees . Issi asi he miishiya demmidi zaari moogis . Daro ufayttidi bidi baw de7iyaba ubbaa bayzidi he goshsha gadiya shammis .
40013045	“ Hessadakka , qassi salo kawotethay inqo giya al77o shuchchata koyaa zal77anchcho daanees .
40013046	Daro al77o inquwa demmidi bidi baw de7iyaba ubbaa bayzidi iya shammis .
40013047	“ Qassi Xoossaa kawotethay abban yegettida dumma dumma qommo molo oykkiya gitiya daanees .
40013048	Molo oykkiya asati moloy gitiyan kumin abbaafe gaxa kessidosona . Yan uttidi lo77uwa qori qori daachchon yeggidosona , shin iita molota wora holidosona .
40013049	Wodiya wurssethan hessatho hanana . Kiitanchchoti yidi nagaranchchota xillotappe shaakkidi ,
40013050	yeehoynne achcha garccethi de7iya to7onna taman yeggana .
40013051	“ Ha ubbay hinttew gelidee ? ” yaagidi entta oychchis . Entti zaaridi , “ Ee ” yaagidosona .
40013052	Yesuusi , “ Hiza , salo kawotethaa eraa ekkidi higgiya tamaarssiya ubbay , ba minjjida shaluwappe oorathaanne gal77a kessiya ase daanees ” yaagis .
40013053	Yesuusi ha leemisuwa odi wurssidaappe guye yaappe denddidi bis .
40013054	Ba yelettida biittaa bidi Ayhude Woosa Keethan deriya tamaarssis . Entti malaalettidi , “ Ha uray ha cinccatethaanne ha malaatata oothiya wolqqaa awuppe ekkidee ?
40013055	Hayssi anaaxiya na7aa gidenneyye ? Iya aaye sunthay Mayraamo gidennee ? Iya ishati Yayqooba , Yoosefa , Simoonanne Yihuda gidokkonaayye ?
40013056	Iya michcheti nuura de7oosona gidokkonaa ? Yaatin , ha uray ha ubbaa awuppe ekkidee ? ” yaagidosona .
40013057	Hessa gisho , I giyabaa ekkonna ixxidosona . Shin Yesuusi , “ Nabey ba yelettida biittaninne ba soo asaa matan bonchchettenna ” yaagis .
40013058	Entti ammanonna ixxida gisho daro malaatata he bessan oothibeenna .
40014001	He wode Galiila aysiya Heroodisi Yesuusabaa si7is .
40014002	Ba aylletakko , “ Hayssi Xammaqiya Yohaannisa ; I hayqoppe denddis . Yaanida gisho ha ubbaa malaatata I oothees ” yaagis .
40014003	I hessa giday Heroodisi ba ishaa Filphoosa machche Heroodiyadi gaason Yohaannisa qasho keethi gelssida gishossa .
40014004	Yohaannisi Heroodisa , “ Ne iyo ekkanaw woga gidenna ” yaagis .
40014005	Heroodisi Yohaannisa wodhanaw koyis , shin derey Yohaannisa nabe oothidi be7iya gisho yashettis .
40014006	Heroodisi ba yelettida gallasa bonchchiya wode Heroodiyada na7iya asaa sinthan yethan durada iya ufayssasu .
40014007	Yaatin , I , “ Iya koyaba ubbaa immana gidi ” caaqqis .
40014008	Na7iya ba aaye zoriya si7ada Heroodisakko , “ Xammaqiya Yohaannisa huu7iya keren wothada taw imma ” yaagasu .
40014009	Iya yaagin kawoy qiirottis , shin ba caaquwa gishonne baara de7iya imathata gisho gidi I oyshay polettana mela kiittis .
40014010	Kawoy ase kiittidi Yohaannisi qasho keethan de7ishin iya qoodhiya goyrisis .
40014011	Huu7iya keren wothi ehidi na7ees immidosona ; na7iyakka ekkada ba aayes efasu .
40014012	Yohaannisa tamaareti yidi iya ahaa efidi moogidosona . Iyappe guye hanidabaa ubbaa bidi Yesuusas odidosona .
40014013	Yesuusi hanidabaa si7ida wode wogoluwan gelidi he bessaafe issi geemmiya soo barkka bis . Asay hessa si7idi katamatappe denddidi tohon iya kaallidosona .
40014014	Yesuusi wogoluwappe wodhdhidi daro asaa be7idi enttaw qadhettis . Entta giddon de7iya hargganchchota pathis .
40014015	Sa7ay omarssishe biya wode Yesuusa tamaareti iyaakko shiiqidi , “ Ha bessay asi baynna bessi , sa7aykka qammis . Yaaniya gisho , heeran de7iya gutata bidi banttaw shammidi maana mela deriya yedda ” yaagidosona .
40014016	Shin Yesuusi enttako , “ Derey moonna baanaw koshshenna ; entti maanabaa hintte immite ” yaagis .
40014017	Entti zaaridi , “ Nuus hayssan ichchashu uythaafenne nam77u moloppe hari baawa ” yaagidosona .
40014018	Ikka , “ Ane entta haa ehite ” yaagis .
40014019	Kaallidikka , derey maatan uttana mela odis . Ichchashu uythaanne nam77u molota ekkidi , salo xeellidi galati simmidi , uythaa menthidi ba tamaaretas immis ; entti qassi deriyas immidosona .
40014020	Ubbay midi kallidosona . Yesuusa tamaareti mishin attidayssa tammanne nam77u gayta denthidosona .
40014021	Kathaa mida asay maccasaynne nayti attin ichchashu mukulu gidees .
40014022	Yesuusi ba tamaareti wogoluwan gelidi baappe sinthattidi abbaafe he finthi pinnana mela kiittidi baw deriya moyzanaw guye attis .
40014023	Deriya moyzi simmidi barkka woossanaw issi deriya bolla keyis . Sa7ay qamminkka I barkka yan gam77is .
40014024	He wode wogoloy abbaa bolla bishin sintha baggara carkkoy denddin hobbey wogoluwa un77ethis .
40014025	Wontimaatha bolla Yesuusi abbaa bolla hamuttishe ba tamaaretakko yis .
40014026	Iya tamaareti , I abbaa bolla hamuttishe banttako yeyssa be7idi yayyidosona . Enttika , “ Hayssi moytille ” gidi yayyidi waassidosona .
40014027	Shin Yesuusi ellessidi , “ Aykkoy baawa ! Yayyofite ! Tanabay ” yaagis .
40014028	Phexiroosi iyaakko , “ Godaw , nena gidikko , taani haatha bollara hamuttada neekko baana mela tana kiitta ” yaagis .
40014029	Yesuusi Phexiroosakko , “ Haaya ” yaagis . Phexiroosi wogoluwappe wodhdhidi haatha bollara hamuttishe Yesuusakko buussu oykkis .
40014030	Shin wolqqaama carkkuwa be7idi yayyis . Haathan mitetethi oykkida wode “ Godaw , tana ashsharkkii ” yaagidi waassis .
40014031	Yesuusi ellesidi ba kushiya yeddi iya oykkidi , “ Neno , ammanoy paccidaysso ays sidhay ” yaagis .
40014032	Yesuusaranne Phexiroosara wogoluwan gelida wode carkkoy si77i gis .
40014033	Wogoluwa giddon de7iya iya tamaareti , “ Neeni tumakka Xoossaa Na7a ” gidi goynnidosona .
40014034	Entti abbaa pinnidi Gensareexe biittaa gakkidosona .
40014035	He biittan de7iya asay Yesuusa erida wode bantta heeran de7iya guta ubbaa kiita yedidosona . Asay hargganchchota ubbaa iyaakko ehidosona .
40014036	Hargganchchoti iya afila macaraa xalaala bochchana mela woossidosona . Bochchida ubbayka paxidosona .
40015001	Hessafe guye , issi issi Farisaawetinne higge asttamaareti Yerusalaameppe Yesuusakko yidi ,
40015002	“ Ne tamaareti ays nu aawata wogaa menthonaa ? Entti kathi maanappe sinthe bantta kushiya meecettokona ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
40015003	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Hinttee , hintte wogaa gisho Xoossaa kiitaa poleyssa ays ixxeeti ?
40015004	Ays giikko , Xoossay , ‘ Ne aawanne ne aayiw bonchcha . I ba aawa woykko ba aayiw cayeyssi hayqo gibeennee ? ’ yaagis .
40015005	Shin hintte , issi asi ba aawa woykko ba aayiw maaddanabay de7ishin , ‘ Hayssa ta Xoossas yarshshas giikko ,
40015006	ba aawa woykko ba aayiw bonchchanaw bessenna ’ yaageeta . Yaatidi hinttee , hintte wogaa polanaw Xoossaa qaala mentheeta .
40015007	Hinttenoo , cubboto , Isayaasi hinttebaa likke odis ,
40015008	“ ‘ Ha asay tana bantta doonan bonchchees , shin entta wozanay taappe haahon de7ees .
40015009	Asay tana coo goynnosona ; entti asi medhdhida kiitaa Xoossaa higge daanisidi tamaarssoosona ’ gis ” yaagis .
40015010	Yesuusi daro asaa baakko xeegidi , “ Si7ite ! Akeekite !
40015011	Ase tunisiyabay doonara geliyaba gidonnashin doonappe keyaabaa ” yaagis .
40015012	Hessafe guye , Yesuusa tamaareti iyaakko yidi , “ Farisaaweti neeni gidayssa si7idi dhubettidayssa akeekay ? ” yaagidosona .
40015013	Shin Yesuusi enttaw zaaridi , “ Saluwan de7iya ta aaway tokkiboonna mithay ubbay shodettana .
40015014	Enttabaa hirggofite ; entti qooqe kaalethiya qooqeta . Qooqey qooqe kaalethiko , nam77ayka ollan kunddana ” yaagis .
40015015	Phexiroosi zaaridi , “ Ha leemisuwa birshshethaa nuus odarkkii ” yaagis .
40015016	Yesuusi enttako , “ Hinttewuka ha77i gakkanaw gelibeennee ?
40015017	Doonara geliyabaa ubbay ulo gelidi kare keyeyssa erekketii ?
40015018	Shin doonara keyaabay wozanappe keyees . Ase tunisiyabati hessata .
40015019	Enttika asa wozana giddofe keyaa iita qofa , wodho , laymatethi , iita ooso , kayso , worddo markkatethi , cashshe .
40015020	Hessa daaniyabati ase tuniseesippe attin meecettonna kushera meyssi tunisenna ” yaagis .
40015021	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi yaappe keyidi Xiroosanne Sidoona katamati de7iya biittaa bis .
40015022	Issi Kanaane biitta maccas Yesuusakko yada , ba qaalaa dhoqqu oothada , “ Godaw , Dawite na7aw , taw qadhettarkii ; ta na7iw tuna ayyaanay oykkidi iita waayses ” yaagasu .
40015023	Shin Yesuusi issi qaalakka zaaronna si77i gis . Yesuusa tamaareti iyaakko yidi , “ Ha maccasiya nu geedo kaalla kaallada , woossawusu . Hessa gisho , neeni iyo moyzarkkii ” yaagidi woossidosona .
40015024	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani wudeppe dhayida dorssada Isra7eele keethaafe dhayida asata xalaalas kiitettas ” yaagis .
40015025	Shin iya , iya sinthan kunddada , “ Godaw , tana maaddarkii ? ” yaagasu .
40015026	I zaaridi , “ Nayta kathi ekkidi kanatas yeggeyssi lo77o gidenna ” yaagis .
40015027	Maccasiyakka , “ Godaw , hessi tuma , shin hari attoshin kanati bantta godati mishin , gaytappe wodhdhiya tiifiya moosona ” yaagasu .
40015028	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ha maccasete , ne ammanoy gita ; ne koyidayssada new hano ” yaagis . I na7iya iirakka paxa aggasu .
40015029	Yesuusi yaappe denddidi Galiila Abbaa mati bis . Issi dere bolla keyidi , yan uttis .
40015030	Daro asay banttara , wobbeta , qooqeta , kuunata , doona muumetanne , hara daro hargganchchota ekkidi , iyaakko ehidi iya sinthan wothidosona . Yesuusi enttana pathis .
40015031	Hessa gisho , muumeti odettishin , kuunati piddi gishin , wobbeti hamuttishin , qooqeti xeellishin asay be7idi malaalettidi , Isra7eele Xoossaa galatidosona .
40015032	Yesuusi ba tamaareta baakko xeegidi , “ Ha daro asay taara heedzu gallas gam77ida gishonne enttaw ha77i miyabay baynna gisho taani enttaw qadhettays . Entti ogen daaburidi kunddonna mela aykko muzonna entta mela yeddanaw koyikke ” yaagis .
40015033	Iya tamaareti zaaridi , “ Nuuni ha bazzuwan hayssa keena asaas gidiya kathi awuppe demmanee ? ” yaagidosona .
40015034	Yesuusi enttako , “ Hinttew aappun uythi de7ii ? ” yaagidi oychchis . Entti zaaridi , “ Laappun uythinne laafa molotappe guuthi de7ees ” yaagidosona .
40015035	Yesuusi deriya sa7an uttite yaagidi kiittis .
40015036	Hessafe guye , he laappun uythaanne moluwa ekkidi Xoossaa galatis . Menthidi ba tamaaretas immis . Iya tamaareti asaas gishidosona .
40015037	Asay ubbay midi kallidosona . Iya tamaareti , mishin attida tiifiya laappun gita gayta kumethi denthidosona .
40015038	Mida asay maccasinne na7a paydonna adde xalaali oyddu mukulu .
40015039	Yesuusi deriya yeddidaappe guye wogoluwan gelidi Magedoona giya biittaa bis .
40016001	Farisaawetinne Saduqaaweti Yesuusakko yidosona . Iya paaccanaw koyidi , banttana saloppe malaata besso gidi oychchidosona .
40016002	Shin I enttako , “ Sa7i omarssiya wode ‘ Saloy zo77ida gisho wontto booqallana ’ yaageta .
40016003	Wonttiya wode , ‘ Saloy zo77idi shaaratida gisho iray bukkana ’ yaageta . Yaatin hintte salo mallaa be7idi ereeta , shin wodiya malla eranaw dandda7ibeekketa .
40016004	Iitanne ammanonna yeletethay malaata koyees . Shin iyaw Yoonasa malaatappe hara malaati imettenna ” yaagis . Hessafe guye , enttana yan aggidi hara soo bis .
40016005	Entti abbaafe hefinthi pinnida wode daabbo ekkidi yaanayssa dogidosona .
40016006	Yesuusi enttako , “ Farisaawetappenne Saduqaaweta irshshuwaafe naagettite ” yaagis .
40016007	Enttika bantta garssan , “ I hessa giday nu daabbo ekkidi yoonna gishossa gidana ” yaagidosona .
40016008	Yesuus entta qofaa eridi , “ Hinttenoo , ammanoy paccidayssato ! Daabbo ekkonna yida gisho woli gidon ays odetteetii ?
40016009	Ha77ika hintte akeeketii ? Ichchashu mukulu asaas ichchashu uythaa gishidayssanne entti midi kallin hintte aappun gayta kumethi denthidaakko dogidetii ?
40016010	Hessadakka , laappun uythaa oyddu mukulu asaas gishidayssanne entti midi kallin , hintte aappun gita gayta kumethi denthidaakko akeekekketii ?
40016011	Hiza , taani Farisaawetanne Saduqaaweta irshshuwaafe naagettite gada odeyssi daabbobaa gidonnayssa akeekekketii ? ” yaagis .
40016012	Yaatin , iya tamaareti Yesuusi odey munuqa denthanaw yegettiya irshshobaa gidonnashin Farisaawetanne Saduqaaweta timirttiyafe naagettanayssa gideyssa akeekidosona .
40016013	Yesuusi Qisaariya Filphoosa biittaa gakkida wode ba tamaaretakko , “ Asay , Asa Na7aa oona goonaa ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
40016014	Enttika , “ Issoti issoti Xammaqiya Yohaannisa , harati Eliyaasa qassi hankkoti Ermmiyasa woykko nabetappe issuwa goosona ” yaagidosona .
40016015	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Yaatin , hintte tana oona geeti ” gidi entta oychchis .
40016016	Simoona Phexiroosi zaaridi , “ Neeni Kiristtoosa , de7o Xoossaa na7a ” yaagis .
40016017	Yesuusi Phexiroosakko , “ Yoona na7aa Simoona , neeni anjjettidayssa ! Hayssa new qonccisiday saluwan de7iya ta aawappe attin ase gidenna .
40016018	Ta new odays Phexiroosa , neeni zaalla ! Taani ha zaalla bolla ta woosa keethaa keexana . Hayqo wolqqatikka iyo xoonokkona .
40016019	Salo kawotethaa qulppeta ta new immana . Sa7an neeni diggiyabay ubbay salon Xoossaa matan digettidabaa gidana . Sa7an neeni hano giyabay ubbay salon Xoossaa matan hanidabaa gidana ” yaagis .
40016020	Hessafe guye , I , Kiristtoosa gideyssa ooddeskka odonna mela ba tamaareta minthidi kiittis .
40016021	He wodiyappe doomidi Yesuusi ba tamaaretas , “ Taani Yerusalaame baanaw bessees . Yan deriya cimatan , kahine halaqatanne higge asttamaareta kushen waaye ekkanaw bessees . Entti tana wodhana , shin taani heedzantho gallas hayqoppe denddana ” yaagidi qonccisis .
40016022	Phexiroosi Yesuusa gaxa kessidi , “ Godaw , hessi hanenna ! Hessa melabay nena ubbarakka gakkofo ! ” yaagidi hanqettis .
40016023	Yesuusi Phexiroosakko guye simmidi , “ Ha Xalahiyaw , taappe haakka ! Neeni asa qofa qoppasappe attin Xoossaa qofa qopponna gisho taw dhube gidaasa ” yaagis .
40016024	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi ba tamaaretakko , “ Oonikka tana kaallanaw koyabaa gidikko bana kaddo , ba masqaliya tookkidi tana kaallo .
40016025	Ba de7uwa ashshanaw koyaa ubbay dhayssees . Shin ba de7uwa ta gisho gidi aathi immeyssi ashshees .
40016026	Asi alame kumethaa babaa oothidi , gidoshin ba shemppuwa dhayssikko iya ay maaddii ? Woykko asi ba shemppuwa laame ay immanaw dandda7ii ?
40016027	Asa na7ay ba aawa bonchchuwan ba kiitanchchotara yaana . He wode issi issi uraas iya oosuwada immana .
40016028	Ta tuma odays ; asa Na7ay kawo gididi simmeyssa be7ana gakkanaw hayssan eqqida asaappe hayqqonnayssati de7oosona ” yaagis .
40017001	Usuppun gallasappe guye Yesuusi , Phexiroosa , Yayqoobanne iya ishaa Yohaannisa baara ekkidi banttarkka gidanaw deriya bolla keyis .
40017002	Yan entta sinthan Yesuusa malay kumethi laamettis ; iya som77oyka awada xolqqis . Iya ma7oykka daro booxis .
40017003	Hekko , Museynne Eliyaasi iyara odettishin be7idosona .
40017004	Phexiroosi Yesuusakko , “ Nuuni hayssa hashshu yida . Ne koykko issino new , issino Muses , issino Eliyaasas hayssan heedzu shaqara shaqarana ” yaagis .
40017005	Phexiroosi hessa buroo odishin bootha shaaray enttana kammis . Shaara giddora , “ Tana ufayssiya , ta dosiya na7ay hayssa , iya si7ite ! ” yaagiya qaalay yis .
40017006	Yesuusa tamaareti hessa si7ida wode dagammidi bantta som77uwara sa7an kunddidosona .
40017007	Shin Yesuusi enttako shiiqidi entta bochchidi , “ Denddite , yayyofite ! ” yaagis .
40017008	Entti dhoqqu gidi be7iya wode Yesuusappe hara oonakka be7ibookkona .
40017009	Entti deriyappe wodhdhishin Yesuusi enttako , “ Asa Na7ay hayqoppe denddana gakkanaw ha hintte be7idabaa ooddeskka odoppite ” gidi kiittis .
40017010	Yesuusa tamaareti , “ Yaatin , higge asttamaareti Eliyaasi Kiristtoosappe kasetidi yaana giday aybisse ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
40017011	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ee ! Eliyaasi kaseti yidi ubbabaa giigisana .
40017012	Shin ta hinttew tuma odays ; Eliyaasi kasetidi yis . Enttika iya bolla koyidabaa oothidosonappe attin iya shaakki eribookkona . Hessada Asa Na7ay entta kushen waayettana ” yaagis .
40017013	He wode Yesuusi giday Xammaqiya Yohaannisabaa gideyssa akeekidosona .
40017014	Entti deriyappe asaakko simmiya wode issi asi Yesuusa sinthan gulbbatidi ,
40017015	“ Godaw , hayyana ta na7as qadhettarkii ; iya shocidi yeggiya harggey daro un77ethidi tamaninne haathan yeggees .
40017016	Ne tamaaretakko ehas , shin entti pathanaw dandda7ibookkona ” yaagis .
40017017	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Hinttenoo , ammanonna geella yeletethaw awude gakkanaw ta hinttera daane ? Awude gakkanaw ta hinttena dandda7anee ? Ane na7aa haa ekki yiite ” yaagis .
40017018	Yesuusi tuna ayyaanaa hanqqin , tuna ayyaanay na7aappe keyis ; he saatenkka na7ay paxis .
40017019	Hessafe guye , Yesuusa tamaareti banttarkka iyaakko shiiqidi , “ Nuuni tuna ayyaanaa kessanaw dandda7iboonnay aybisse ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
40017020	I enttako , “ Hinttew ammanoy laafida gishossa . Ta hinttew tuma odays ; gaashe ayfe mela ammanoy hinttew de7ikko ‘ Ha deriya hayssafe denddada gede aadhdha ’ giikko hinttew kiitettana . Hinttew dandda7ettonabay deenna .
40017021	[ Shin hessa melay woosappenne xoomappe attin haran keyenna ] ” yaagis .
40017022	Yesuusa tamaareti Galiilan shiiqidi de7ishin Yesuusi enttako , “ Asa Na7ay asa kushen aadhdhidi imettana .
40017023	Entti iya wodhana , shin I heedzantho gallas hayqoppe denddana ” yaagis . Iya tamaaretikka daro qiirottidosona .
40017024	Yesuusaranne iya tamaaretara Qifirnahoome katama gakkida wode Xoossa Keetha giira qanxiseyssati Phexiroosakko yidi , “ Hintte asttamaarey Xoossa Keetha giira giirii ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
40017025	Phexiroosi zaaridi , “ Giirees ” yaagis . Phexiroosi soo geliya wode Yesuusi kasetidi , “ Phexiroosa , new ay daanii ? Ha sa7aa kawotethati qaraxanne giira ooppe ekkonaa ? Gade asappeyye woykko asa gade asappe ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
40017026	Phexiroosi “ Asa gade asappe ” gidi zaaris . Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Gade asay giira giirokkona guussu .
40017027	Shin entti dhubettonna mela abbaa bada moluwa oykkiya manxxaqo yegga . Koyro ne oykkiya moluwa doona dooyada giiras gidiya miishiya ne gishonne ta gisho efada giira ” yaagis .
40018001	He wode Yesuusa tamaareti yidi , “ Salo kawotethan ubbaafe aadhdhey oonee ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
40018002	Yesuusi issi guutha na7a xeegidi entta giddon essidi hayssada yaagis .
40018003	“ Taani hinttew tuma odays ; hintte laamettonanne guutha naytada hanonna ixxiko salo kawotethaa ubbarakka gelanaw dandda7ekketa .
40018004	Hiza , ha guutha na7aada bana kawushshiya oonikka salo kawotethan ubbaafe aadhdheyssa gidana .
40018005	Hayssa mela na7a ta sunthan mokkiya oonikka tana mokkees .
40018006	“ Shin tanan ammaniyaa ha guuthatappe issuwa naagara oothana mela dhube gidiya oonikka gita gaachcha woxa ba qodhen qachchidi ciimmo abban mitettiko iyaw lo77o .
40018007	Alamen asay nagara oothana mela oothiyabati de7iya gisho alamiya ayye . Hessa melabati yoonna attenna , shin dhubey iya gaason yaa uraa ayye .
40018008	“ Ne kushey woykko ne tohoy nena balethikko neeppe qanxa yegga . Neeni nam77u kushera woykko nam77u tohora merinaa taman yeggettanayssafe kushe woykko toho duuxa gidada merinaa de7o demmeyssi new lo77o .
40018009	Qassi ne ayfey nena balethikko iyo wooca kessada wora hola . Neeni nam77u ayfera gaanname taman yeggetteyssafe issi ayfera merinaa de7uwa geleyssi new lo77o .
40018010	“ Ta hinttew odays ; salon de7iya entta naagiya kiitanchchoti ubba wode salon de7iya ta Aawa sinthan de7iya gisho hintte ha guuthatappe issuwaka kadhonna mela naagettite .
40018011	Asa Na7ay dhaydayssata ashshanaw yis ” yaagis .
40018012	Qassi Yesuusi , “ Hinttew ay daanii ? Issi uraas xeetu dorssati de7eyssatappe issoy dhayikko uddufun tammanne uddufunata deriya bolla yeggi aggidi he dhayidayssa koyanaw beenne ?
40018013	Ta tuma odays ; I demmida wode uddufun tammanne uddufunatappe aathidi dhayidi benttida issi dorssan ufayttees .
40018014	Hessadakka , salon de7iya hintte aaway ha guuthatappe issoy dhayana mela koyenna .
40018015	“ Ne ishay nena qohikko nerkka iyaakko bada iya balaa iyaw oda . I nena si7ikko ne ishaa new isha ootha .
40018016	Shin I nena si7onna ixxiko , nam77u woykko heedzu asa markkan mootoy lasettiya gisho issi woykko nam77u asi ekkada iyaakko ba .
40018017	I enttana si7onna ixxiko , woosa keethas oda . Woosa keethi giyabaa si7onna ixxiko ammanonna asada woykko qaraxa qanxisiya asada iya payda .
40018018	“ Ta hinttew tuma odays ; sa7an hintte diggiyabati ubbay salon Xoossaa matan digettidaba gidana . Sa7an hintte hano giyabati ubbay salon Xoossaa matan hanidabaa gidana .
40018019	“ Qassika ta hinttew odays ; sa7an hinttefe nam77ay bantta woossiyabas issi wozanan gididi Xoossaa woossiyabaa gidikko salon de7iya ta Aaway hinttew oothana .
40018020	Tana kaalleyssatappe nam77a woykko heedza gididi shiiqiya bessan taani entta giddon benttana ” yaagis .
40018021	He wode Phexiroosi Yesuusakko yidi , “ Godaw , ta ishay tana qohikko aappun toho taani atto gaanaw bessii ? Laappun toho gakkanaaseyye ? ” gidi oychchis .
40018022	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Gidenna , laappun tammu toho laappunappe attin laappun toho gidenna .
40018023	“ Hessa gisho , Xoossaa kawotethay ba oosanchchotara ba miishey paccidaakkonne palahidaakko be7anaw qoppida kawuwa daanees .
40018024	He kawoy miishey paccidaakkonne palahidaakko be7iya wode daro ginddigindda acoy de7iya issi uraa iyaakko ehidosona .
40018025	Shin he aylley acuwa qanxanaw xoonettin iyara , iya machcheera , iya naytinne iyaw de7iyabay ubbay bayzettidi acoy cigettana mela iya goday kiittis .
40018026	Yaatin aylley ba godaa tohuwa bolla gulbbatidi , ‘ Ta godaw , hayyana guutha wode takkarkki , ta acuwa ubbaa ta ciggana ’ yaagidi woossis .
40018027	Kawoy iyaw qadhettidi , yeddi aggis ; iya acuwa maaris .
40018028	“ Shin he aylley keyi bidi ba lagge oosanchchotappe issoy baappe daro guutha miishe tal77idayssa , ‘ Ne bolla de7iya ta miishiya taw cigga ’ gidi qoodhe oykkis .
40018029	“ He iya lagge aylley iya sinthan gulbbatidi , ‘ Hayyana guutha wode takkarkki taani ta acuwa ubbaa ciggana ’ yaagidi woossis .
40018030	“ Shin ixxidi ekki efidi ba laggey acuwa qanxana gakkanaw qasho keethi gelssis .
40018031	Hessa gisho , hara lagge oosanchchoti hessa be7ida wode daro yilotidi , bidi bantta godaas I oothidabaa ubbaa odidosona .
40018032	“ Yaatin kawoy he aylliya xeegisidi , ‘ Ha iita aylliyaw , neeni tana woossida gisho ta ne acuwa ubbaa new maaras .
40018033	Yaatin , taani ne acuwa maaridayssada neeni ne lagge aylliya acuwa maaranaw new bessennee ? ’ yaagis .
40018034	Hessa gisho , kawoy daro yilotidi , I ba acuwa ubbaa ciggana gakkanaw paxa kaa7ettana mela qasho keethan yeggis .
40018035	“ Hessadakka , hintte issoy issoy hintte ishaa wozanappe maaronna ixxiko salon de7iya ta Aaway hinttena hessada oothana ” yaagis .
40019001	Yesuusi hessa odi onggidaappe guye Galiilappe denddidi Yorddaanose Shaafappe hefinthan de7iya Yihuda biittaa bis .
40019002	Daro asay iya kaallidi bin entta giddofe hargganchchota pathis .
40019003	Farisaaweti iya paaccanaw koyidi iyaakko yidi , “ Issi asi ay gaasonkka ba machchiw yeddanaw bessii ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
40019004	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Xoossay koyro addenne maccas oothi medhdhidayssa hintte nabbabibeekketii ?
40019005	‘ Hessa gisho , Issi asi ba aawanne ba aayiw aggidi ba machcheera issino gidees , nam77ayka issi asho gidoosona . ’
40019006	Hessa gisho , entti issi asho gidoosonappe attin nam77a gidokkona . Hiza , Xoossi qachchidayssa asi shaakkofo ” yaagis .
40019007	Farisaaweti , “ Yaatin , Musey issi asi anjjo worqqate immidi yeddana mela ays kiittidee ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
40019008	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Hinttee , hintte machcheta yeddana mela Musey hinttena kiittiday , hintte wozanaa minotethaa gishoppe attin koyroppe hessa mela gidenna .
40019009	Ta hinttew odays ; ba machchiya laymatonna de7ishin yeddidi hara ekkiya oonikka laammees ” yaagis .
40019010	Iya tamaareti iyaakko , “ Azinabaynne machchibay hessa mela gidikko ekko geloy attiko lo77o ” yaagidosona .
40019011	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Hessa mela timirttey Xoossay dandda7a immidayssatassafe attin asa ubbaassa gidenna .
40019012	Hiza , yelettishe shuufa gididi yelettidayssati de7oosona , qassi asi qaaratidayssati de7oosona , qassi salo kawotethaa gisho gidi banttana shuufaydayssati de7oosona . Hessa gisho , hayssa ekkanaw dandda7iya oonikka ekko ” yaagis .
40019013	Yesuusi ba kushiya guutha nayta bolla wothidi enttaw woossana mela issi issi asay nayta iyaakko ehidosona . Shin iya tamaareti asaa hanqettidosona .
40019014	Shin Yesuusi , “ Xoossaa kawotethay hayssata melassa gidiya gisho guutha nayti taakko yeyssa diggofite ; yo giite ” yaagis .
40019015	Ba kushiya entta bolla wothidaappe guye he bessaafe aggidi bis .
40019016	Issi gallas issi uray Yesuusakko yidi , “ Asttamaariyaw , taani merinaa de7o demmanaw ay lo77obaa ootho ? ” yaagis .
40019017	Yesuusi iyaakko , “ Lo77obaa ne tana ays oychchay ? Issi Xoossaafe attin hari lo77oy baawa . Shin neeni merinaa de7uwa ekkanaw koykko kiitata naaga ” yaagis .
40019018	Uray zaaridi , “ Awussa kiitata ” yaagidi oychchis . Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Wodhoppa , laymatoppa , kaysotoppa , worddo markkattofa ,
40019019	ne aawanne ne aayiw bonchcha , ne shooruwa ne huu7iyatho dosa ” yaagis .
40019020	He na7atethay , “ Taani hayssata ubbaa na7atethafe doomada naagas . Yaatin , hari taw pacciyabay aybee ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
40019021	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Neeni polo gidanaw koykko bada new de7iyabaa bayzada manqotas imma ; neeni salon duretana . Yaata simma yada tana kaalla ” yaagis .
40019022	Shin he naatetha uray daro dure gidiya gisho hessa si7ida wode azzanishe aggidi bis .
40019023	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi ba tamaareta , “ Taani hinttew tuma odays ; durey salo kawotethi gelanayssi daro meto .
40019024	Dure asi Xoossaa kawotethaa gelanayssafe gimaley marppe luhora aadhdheyssi kawuyees ” yaagis .
40019025	Yesuusa tamaareti hessa si7idi malaalettidi , “ Yaatin , ooni attanaw dandda7ii ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
40019026	Yesuusi entta caddi xeellidi , “ Hayssi asas dandda7ettenna , shin Xoossas ubbay dandda7ettees ” yaagis .
40019027	Phexiroosi zaaridi , “ Nuuni ubbabaa aggidi nena kaallida . Yaatin , nuuni ay demmanee ? ” yaagis .
40019028	Yesuusi enttako hayssada yaagis : “ Taani hinttew tuma odays ; Asa Na7ay yaana alamiyan ba bonchcho araatan uttiya wode hintte tammanne nam77ati , tana kaallidayssati , tammanne nam77u araatan uttidi tammanne nam77u Isra7eele zerethata bolla pirddana .
40019029	Ta sunthaa gisho keethe woykko ishata woykko michcheta woykko aawa woykko aayiw woykko nayta woykko gadiya aggiday oonikka xeetu kushe ekkana . Qassi merinaa de7uwakka ekkana .
