40019030	Shin daroti ha77i dethan sinthe gididayssati guye gidana , qassi guye gididayssati sinthe gidana ” yaagis .
40020001	“ Xoossaa kawotethay ba woyniya giddon oosanchchota kera oosisanaw wontta guura keyida keethaawa daanees .
40020002	I he oosanchchotas hachchi hachchi issi dinaare qanxanaw enttara giigidi , entta ba woyniya giddo yeddis .
40020003	“ Qassi wonttafe heedzu saate gidishin keyidi ooso dhayidi giya bolla eqida hara asata demmis .
40020004	I enttako , ‘ Hintteka ta woyniya giddo bidi oothite , taani hinttew bessiya gatiya qanxana ’ yaagis .
40020005	Enttika bidosona . Qassika I usuppun saateninne uddufun saaten keyidi hessada oothis .
40020006	Tammanne issi saate gidishin I keyaa wode harati yan eqqidayssata demmidi , ‘ Hintte ooso oothonna gallas kumethi hayssan ays eqqidi pee7idetii ? ’ yaagis .
40020007	“ Entti zaaridi , ‘ Nuna kera oosisiya asi dhayida gishossa ’ yaagidosona . “ Ikka , ‘ Hintteka ta woyniya giddo bidi oothite ’ yaagis .
40020008	“ Sa7i omarssin , woyniya goday oosanchchota halaqaakko , ‘ Oosanchchota xeegada wurssethan ooso gelidayssatappe doomada koyro gelidayssata gakkanaw entta gatiya qanxa ’ yaagis .
40020009	Tammanne issi saaten ooso oykkidayssati yidi , huu7en huu7en issi issi dinaare ekkidosona .
40020010	Koyro ooso oykkidayssati yidi , banttaw daro imettana gidi qoppidosona . Shin enttika huu7en huu7en issi issi dinaare ekkidosona .
40020011	Bantta miishiya ekki simmidi keethaawa bolla zuuzummidosona .
40020012	‘ Hayssati guyeppe yidi issi saate xalaala oothidosona . Shin gallas kumethi awa suulan daaburidi pee7ida nuura entti waanidi issino gidoona ’ yaagidosona .
40020013	“ Woyniya keethaaway oosanchchotappe issuwako , ‘ Ta ishaw , taani nena qohabikke ; ne taara giigiday issi dinaaressa gidennee ?
40020014	Ne miishiya ekkada ne soo ba . Ta omarssi yidayssaskka neyssa mela immanaw koyays .
40020015	Taani ta miishiyan koyidabaa oothanaw taw maati baawe ? Woykko taani keeha gidida gisho neeni qanaatay ? ’ yaagis .
40020016	“ Hessada ha77i dethan guye gididayssati sinthatana , sinthattidayssati qassi guyetana ” yaagis .
40020017	Yesuusi Yerusalaame bishe , tammanne nam77u tamaareta dumma gaxa kessidi enttako yaagis :
40020018	“ Hekko , nuuni ha77i Yerusalaame buussa bolla de7oos . Yan Asa Na7ay kahine halaqatasinne higge asttamaaretas aadhdhi imettana . Enttika iya bolla hayqo pirdda pirddana .
40020019	Iya Ayhude gidonna deriyas aathi immana . Entti iya kawushshana , garaafana , yaatidi iya masqaliya bolla kaqqana . Shin I heedzantho gallas hayqoppe denddana ” yaagis .
40020020	He wode Zabdiyoosa machchiya ba nam77u adde naytara Yesuusakko yada , iya sinthan gulbbatada issibaa iya woossasu .
40020021	Yesuusi iikko , “ Ne ay koyay ? ” yaagis . Iya zaarada , “ Ne kawotethan ha ta nam77u nayti issoy ne ushachchan issoy ne haddirssan utto garkkii ! ” yaagasu .
40020022	Shin Yesuusi naytakko zaaridi , “ Hintte ay woossiyako erekketa ; taani uyanaw de7iya waaye xuu7aa uyanaw dandda7etii ? ” yaagis . Enttika , “ Ee dandda7os ” yaagidosona .
40020023	Yesuusi , “ Tumakka taani uyanaw de7iya xuu7appe hintte uyana . Shin ta ushachchaninne haddirssan uttanayssata doorey tana gidikke . He bessay imetey , ta aaway immanaw giigisida asatassa ” yaagis .
40020024	Attida tammu iya tamaareti hessa si7ida wode nam77u ishata bolla hanqettidosona .
40020025	Shin Yesuusi entta ubbaa xeegidi hayssada yaagis . “ Ayhude gidonna asaa haareyssati bantta asaa bolla godateyssanne entta kaaletheyssati wolqqan haareyssa hintte ereeta .
40020026	Shin hintte giddon hessada gidoppo . Hinttefe gitatanaw koyaa oonikka hinttew aylle gido .
40020027	Hintte giddon ubbaafe bolla gidanaw koyaa oonikka hinttew aylle gidanaw bessees .
40020028	Hessadakka , Asa Na7ay ase haggaazanawunne daro asaa wozanaw ba shemppuwa immanaw yisippe attin asan haggaazetanaw yibeenna ” yaagis .
40020029	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi ba tamaaretara Iyaarkkofe keyidi bishin , daro asay enttana kaallidosona .
40020030	Oge gaxan uttida nam77u qooqeti Yesuusi yaara aadhdheyssa si7idi , “ Godaw , Dawite Na7aw , nuus qadhettarkii ” yaagidi waassidosona .
40020031	Daro asay enttana , “ Hayzite ” yaagidi kaccidosona . Shin entti , “ Godaw , Dawite na7aw , nuus qadhettarkii ” gidi gujji waassidosona .
40020032	Yesuusi eqqidi , entta xeegidi , “ Ta hinttew ay oothana mela koyeetii ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
40020033	Enttika , “ Godaw , nu ayfey xeellana mela koyoos ” yaagidosona .
40020034	Yesuusi enttaw qadhettidi , entta ayfiyaa bochchis . Ellesidi entta ayfey xeellis ; entti iya kaallidi bidosona .
40021001	Yesuusaranne iya tamaaretara Yerusalaame matidi , Shamaho Deriya bolla de7iya Beetefaage giya gutaa gakkishe , Yesuusi ba tamaaretappe nam77ata baappe sinthe yaagidi kiittis :
40021002	“ Hinttefe sinthan de7iya guta biite . Yan issi harey qashon de7iyaro I maarara hintte sohuwara demmana . Entta billidi haa ekki yiite .
40021003	Oonikka hinttena oychchiko , ‘ Goday enttana koyees ’ yaagite . I enttana iirakka yeddi aggana ” yaagis .
40021004	Hessika nabey ,
40021005	“ Xiyoone katamaas , ‘ Hekko , ne kawoy ashkke gididi , hare bollanne hare mara bolla uttidi , neekko yees ’ yaagite ”
40021006	Iya tamaareti bidi Yesuusi entta kiittidayssada oothidosona .
40021007	Hariwunne hare maraa ehidi bollara ma77ida bantta ma7uwa entta zokkon yeggidosona . Yesuusi ma7ota bolla uttis .
40021008	Daro asay bantta ma7uwa ogiyan hiixidosona . Harati boncco tashidi ogiya bolla yeggidosona .
40021009	Yesuusappe sinthara hamutteyssatinne iyappe guyera kaalliya daro asay , “ Hosaana ! Dawite na7ay galatetto ! Godaa sunthan yeyssi anjjettidayssa ! Bonchchoy Ubbaafe Dhoqqa Saluwan Xoossaas gido ! ”
40021010	Yesuusi Yerusalaame katamaa gelida wode he kataman de7iya asa ubbay , “ Hayssi oonee ? ” yaagidi yarkkidosona .
40021011	Asay , “ Hayssi Galiilan de7iya Naazirete katamaappe yida nabiya Yesuusa ” yaagidosona .
40021012	Yesuusi Xoossa Keethi gelidi , yan bayzeyssatanne shammeyssata ubbaa kare goodis . Miishe laammeyssata xarpheezatanne holleta bayziya oydeta shiri yeggis .
40021013	Ikka enttako , “ Xoossaa qaalan , ‘ Ta keethay Xoossaa woossiya keethi geetettana ’ geetetti xaafettis . Shin hintte panggati qosettiya gonggolo oothideta ” yaagis .
40021014	Yesuusi Xoossa Keethan de7ishin qooqetinne gunddati iyaakko yin entta pathis .
40021015	Shin kahine halaqatinne higge asttamaareti Yesuusi oothida malaalisiyabata be7idayssasinne guutha nayti Xoossa Keethan , “ Dawite na7ay , galatetto ” yaagidi waasseyssa si7idi hanqettidosona .
40021016	Entti Yesuusakko , “ Hayssati geyssa ne si7ay ? ” yaagidosona . Yesuusi , “ Ee si7ays , Xoossaa qaalan , ‘ Guutha nayta doonaninne dhammiya nayta doonan galata wothadasa ’ geetettidi xaafettidayssa hintte nabbabibeekketii ? ” yaagis .
40021017	Enttana yan aggidi Bitaaniya katamaa bidi aqis .
40021018	Yesuusi wontta guura katama simmidi yishe koshattis .
40021019	Oge gaxan issi balase mithi be7idi iikko bis . Shin haythafe attin hara aykkoka demmibeenna . Hessa gisho , iyo , “ Hizappe nam77antho ayfe ayfoppa ! ” yaagis . He balase mithiya ellesada mela aggasu .
40021020	Iya tamaareti hessa be7idi , “ Ha balasiya waanada ellesa meladee ? ” yaagidi malaalettidosona .
40021021	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani hinttew tuma odays ; hinttew ammanoy de7ikko , qassi hintte sidhonna ixxiko balase bolla taani oothidayssa mela xalaala ootheketa , shin ‘ Ha deriya shodettada abban wodhdha ’ yaagikko hanana .
40021022	Ammanidi hintte woossiyabaa aybibaa gidikkoka hintte ekkana ” yaagis .
40021023	Yesuusi Xoossa Keetha gelidi tamaarssishin , kahine halaqatinne Ayhude cimati iyaakko yidi , “ Neeni hayssa oothana mela new ay maati de7ii ? New ha maata immiday oonee ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
40021024	Yesuusi enttako , “ Taanikka hinttena issibaa oychchays ; hintte taw hessa zaarikko , taani ay maatan oothiyako hinttew odana .
40021025	Yohaannisi xammaqana mela maatay awuppe imettidee ? Xoossafeyye asappe ? ” yaagis . Entti bantta giddon zorettidi , “ Nuuni , ‘ Xoossafe ’ giikko , I nuna , ‘ Yaatin ays ammanibeekketii ? ’ yaagana .
40021026	Nuuni , ‘ Asappe ’ giikko , asa ubbay Yohaannisa nabe oothi xeelliya gisho asaa yayyoos ” yaagidosona .
40021027	Hessa gisho , “ Nuuni erokko ” yaagidi zaaridosona . Ikka , “ Hiza , taanikka hayssa ay maatan oothiyako hinttew odikke ” yaagis .
40021028	“ Yesuusi kaallidikka hayssada yaagis : Nam77u adde nayti de7iya issi uray de7ees . He uray bayra na7aakko bidi , ‘ Ta na7aw , hachchi woyniya giddo bada ootha ’ yaagis .
40021029	Na7ay zaaridi , ‘ Atto biikke ’ yaagis . Shin guyeppe ba wozanan qoppi ekkidi oothanaw bis .
40021030	Aaway ba kaalo na7aakko bidi , ba bayra na7aakko gidayssada kiittis . Ikka , ‘ Ero , ta aawaw ’ yaagis . Shin bibeennna .
40021031	Ha nam77u naytappe ba aawas kiitettidayssi awussee ? ” yaagis . Enttika , “ Bayra ” yaagidosona . Yesuusi enttako , “ Ta hinttew tuma odays ; qaraxa qanxiseyssatinne laymateysati hinttefe sinthattidi Xoossaa kawotethaa gelana .
40021032	Xammaqiya Yohaannisi suure ogiya tamaarssishe yin I geyssa ammanibeekketa . Shin qaraxa qanxiseyssatinne laymateysati ammanidosona . Hintte hari attoshin , entta be7idikka hintte nagaraappe simmidi ammanibeekketa ” yaagis .
40021033	Qassika Yesuusi hayssada yaagis ; “ Hara leemiso si7ite , woyne tokkida issi uray de7ees . He woyniya yuushuwa diris . Woyniya gum77iya olaaka bookkis . Woyniya naaganaw shakkoka shaakkis . Hessafe guye , gadiya kothe immidi hara biitta bis .
40021034	Woyne ayfiyaa maxiya wodey gakkin bana gakkiya baggaa ekkidi yaana mela ba aylleta enttako yeddis .
40021035	Kothe aawati iya aylleta oykkidi issuwa wadhdhidosona , hankuwa wodhidosona qassi attidayssa shuchchan caddidosona .
40021036	Woyne atakilttiya goday kaseyssatappe dariya hara aylleta kiittis . Kothe aawati entta bollaka hankkoyssata bolla oothidayssada oothidosona .
40021037	Wurssethan I , ‘ Ta na7aa entti bonchchana ! ’ yaagidi ba na7aa enttako kiittis .
40021038	“ Shin kothe aawati na7aa be7idi bantta giddon ‘ Gadiya laattanayssi hayssa , iya wodhidi gadiya nuuni laattoos ! ’ yaagidosona .
40021039	Na7aa oykkidi woyniya giddofe gaxa kissidi wodhidosona .
40021040	“ Hiza , woyne atakilttiya goday yaa wode he kothe aawata waatanee ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
40021041	Entti zaaridi , “ I he iita asata iita wodho wodhidi , woyney ayfiyaa wode iya gakkiya baggaa woden woden immiya hara kothe aawatas immana ” yaagidosona .
40021042	Yesuusi zaaridi enttako , Xoossaa qaalan , “ ‘ Gimbbeyssati boridi ixxida shuchchay , godaa xaphuwa minthiya , ubbaafe aadhdhiya shuchchaa gidis . Hayssi Goday oothidabaa ; nu ayfiyaas malaalisiyabaa ’
40021043	“ Hessa gisho , taani hinttew odays ; Xoossaa kawotethay hinttefe ekettidi lo77o ayfe ayfiyaa asatas imettana .
40021044	[ Ha shuchchaa bolla kunddiya ubbay meqerettana . Qassi he shuchchay iya bolla wodhdhiya uraykka gaacettana ] ” yaagis .
40021045	Kahine halaqatinne Farisaaweti Yesuusi odida leemisuwan banttana odidayssa eridosona .
40021046	Entti Yesuusa oykkanaw koyidosona , shin asay Yesuusa nabe oothidi xeelliya gisho asaas yayyidosona .
40022001	Yesuusi asaas zaaridi hayssada yaagidi leemiso odis .
40022002	“ Xoossaa kawotethay ba na7aas yaagano giigisida kawuwa daanees .
40022003	He kawoy yaagano yaana mela odi wothida asata xeeganaw ba aylleta kiittis . Shin asati yaanaw koyibookkona .
40022004	Qassi hara aylleta xeegidi , xeegettida asatakko bidi , ‘ Taani ta sanggatanne modhdhida gatarmenthota shukkas ; ubbabay giigis . Ta yaaganuwa haa yiite yaagite ’ yaagidi kiittis .
40022005	Shin xeegettidayssati xeessaa ixxidi , bantta oosos oosos bidosona . Issoy ba goshshaas , hankkoy ba zal77iyas bis .
40022006	Harati qassi kawuwa aylleta oykkidi , kawushshi wadhdhidi wodhidosona .
40022007	“ Kawoy daro yilottidi , ba wotaaddareta yeddidi shemppo wodhidayssata wodhisis , entta katamakka xuuggis .
40022008	Hessafe guye , ba aylletakko , ‘ Yaaganoy giigis , shin xeegettidayssati yaaganuwas bessiya asi gidokkona .
40022009	Hessa gisho , wogga ogeta bidi , demmida asi ubbaa yaaganuwa yaana mela xeegite ’ yaagis .
40022010	Aylleti ogiya bolla bidi bantta demmida asi ubbaa lo77otanne iitata ehidi yaagano shaqara gelssidi kunthidosona .
40022011	“ Shin kawoy kathaa maanaw uttida asaa be7anaw gelida wode yaagano ma7o ma77iboonna issi asi demmis .
40022012	Iyaakko , ‘ Laa , ne yaagano ma7o ma77onna waanada hayssa geladii ? ’ yaagis . Shin uray si77i gis .
40022013	“ Kawoy ba aylletakko , ‘ Ha uraa kushiyanne tohuwa qachchidi , kare dhumaa kessi yeggite . Yan iyaw yeehonne achcha garccethi gidana ’ yaagis .
40022014	“ Hessadakka , Xoossaa kawotethaas xeegettidayssati daro shin doorettidayssati guutha ” yaagis .
40022015	Hessafe guye , Farisaaweti bidi , Yesuusa waati odan oykkaneekko zorettidosona .
40022016	Bantta tamaaretanne Heroodisa baggatappe issota issota kiittidosona . Enttika , “ Asttamaariyaw , ne tuma odeyssa nu eroos . Neeni asappe ase shaakkaka , asa woyganddes gada aykkoka oothaka , Xoossaa ogiya tumatethan tamaarssasa .
40022017	Ane nuus oda , nuuni Roome Kawuwas giira giiranaw bessi bessennee ? ” yaagidosona .
40022018	Shin Yesuusi entta iita qofaa eridi , “ Ha cubboto , tana ays paacetii ?
40022019	Giira giiriya miishiya tana bessite ” yaagis . Enttika iyaw santime ehidosona .
40022020	I , “ Ha sunthaynne malay ooddebaye ? ” yaagis .
40022021	Entti , “ Roome Kawuwayssa ” yaagidosona . Yaatin Yesuusi enttako , “ Hiza , Kawuwas besseyssa kawuwas , Xoossas besseyssa Xoossas immite ” yaagis .
40022022	Entti hessa si7ida wode malaalettidi iya matappe aggidi bidosona .
40022023	He gallas hayqoppe denddoy baawa yaagiya Saduqaaweti Yesuusakko yidi , yaagidi iya oychchidosona .
40022024	“ Asttamaariyaw , ‘ Musey , issi asi na7a yelonna hayqqiko , he hayqqidayssa ishay iya machchiw ekkidi , ba ishaas na7a yelo ’ yaagidi kiittis .
40022025	Nu eriya laappun ishati de7oosona . Bayray machcho ekkidi na7a yelonna hayqqis . Iya machchiw iya kaalo ishay ekkis .
40022026	Hessadakka , he maccasiw ekkida nam77anthoyka , heedzanthoyka , bidi laappunati wurana gakkanaw ubbay hayqqidosona .
40022027	Ubbaafe guye he maccasiya hayqqasu .
40022028	Yaatin , laappunati ubbay iyo ekkida gisho hayqoppe denddiya gallas , he maccasiya laappunatappe awussas machcho gidanee ? ” yaagidosona .
40022029	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Hintte Xoossaa qaalay tamaarssiyabaa woykko iya wolqqaa eronna gisho baleeta .
40022030	Asay hayqoppe denddiya wode salon de7iya kiitanchchota mela gidanaappe attin ekkokona gelokkona .
40022031	Qassi hayqqida asati hayqoppe denddanabaa Xoossay hinttew odidayssa nabbabibeekketii ?
40022032	Xoossay , ‘ Taani Abrahame Xoossaa , Yisaaqa Xoossaa , Yayqooba Xoossaa ’ yaagis . Hessa gisho , Xoossay paxa de7eyssata Xoossaafe attin hayqqidayssata Xoossaa gidenna ” yaagis .
40022033	Daro asay hessa si7idi , iya timirttiyan malaalettidosona .
40022034	Yesuusi Saduqaawetas gaanabaa dhayssidayssa Farisaaweti si7ida wode issife shiiqidosona .
40022035	Entta giddofe issi higge asttamaarey Yesuusa paace oysho oychchis .
40022036	“ Asttamaariyaw , higge ubbaafe aadhdheyssi awussee ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
40022037	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ ‘ Ne Godaa , ne Xoossaa , ne kumetha wozanappe , ne kumetha shemppuwafe , ne kumetha qofaappe dosa .
40022038	Ubbaafe aadhdheyssinne bayra kiitay hayssa .
40022039	Nam77antho ubbaafe aadhdhiya kiitay , ase ubbaa ne huu7iya ne doseyssada dosa ’ yaageyssa .
40022040	Muse higgeynne nabeta timirttey ubbay ha kiitata bolla katoosona ” yaagis .
40022041	Farisaaweti issi bolla shiiqidi de7ishin , Yesuusi enttana ,
40022042	“ Kiristtoosabaa hintte woygetii ? I oodde na7ee ? ” yaagidi oychchis . Entti , “ I Kawuwa Dawite na7a ” yaagidi zaaridosona .
40022043	Yesuusi enttako , “ Yaatin , Dawitey Geeshsha Ayyaanan gididi waattidi Kiristtoosa , ‘ Godaa ’ gidi xeegii ? Dawitey gishe ,
40022044	‘ Godaa Xoossay , ta Godaakko , ne morkketa ne tohoy yedhdhiyaso oothana gakkanaw , hayssan taappe ushachcha baggan utta ’ gis .
40022045	Hiza , Dawitey Kiristtoosa Godaa gidi xeegikko , waanidi Kiristtoosi Dawite na7a gidii ? ”
40022046	Yesuusas issi qaala zaaranaw dandda7ida asi oonikka baawa . Qassi he gallasappe doomidi hara oysha oychchanaw oonikka dandda7ibeenna .
40023001	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi shiiqida asaasinne ba tamaaretas hayssada yaagis .
40023002	“ Higge asttamaaretinne Farisaaweti Muse higgiya billanaw maatara de7oosona .
40023003	Hessa gisho , entti hinttena kiittiya ubbaa oothitenne naagite . Shin entti ootheyssada oothofite . Ays giikko , entti ooddeyssada oothokona .
40023004	Entti tookkanaw dandda7ettona tooho qachchidi asaa toossoosona . Shin banttaw hari attoshin , he toohuwa asay tookkiya wode biradhdhe xeeran bochchanaw koyokkona .
40023005	“ Shin entti bantta ooso ubbaa asi be7ana mela oothoosona . Bantta som77oninne qesen qachchiya maxaafaa xiqisey de7iya kitaafe dalggisosona , bantta ma7uwa macaraakka adussoosona .
40023006	Mokettiya bessan bonchcho bessinne Ayhude Woosa Keethatan daro lo77iya oyde dosoosona .
40023007	Asay giyan enttana bonchchon sarothanayssanne ‘ Asttamaariyaw ’ gidi xeeganayssa koyoosona .
40023008	“ Shin hintte asttamaarey issuwa xalaala gidida gishonne hintte ubbay ishata gidida gisho ‘ Asttamaariyaw ’ geetettidi xeegettofite .
40023009	Hinttew salon issi aawa xalaali de7iya gisho ha sa7an oonakka ‘ Aawaw ’ gidi xeegoppite .
40023010	Hinttew issi Goday Kiristtoosa xalaali de7iya gisho ‘ Godaw ’ geetetti xeegettofite .
40023011	Hintte giddon bayratey hintte aylle gido .
40023012	Bana gitayaa oonikka kawuyana ; bana kawushshiya oonikka gitatana .
40023013	“ Hinttenoo , cubboto , higge asttamaaretonne Farisaaweto , asa sinthan salo kawotethaa gorddeyssato hinttena ayye . Hinttee , hintte huu7en gelekketa qassi haratakka gelssekketa .
40023014	[ “ Hinttenoo cubboto , higge asttamaaretonne , Farisaaweto , am77eta keetha hintte bonqishe , asi be7o gidi woosa adusseeta . Hessa gisho , hinttena ayye . Ubbaafe aadhdhiya pirdday hinttena naagees . ]
40023015	“ Hinttenoo , cubboto , higge asttamaaretonne Farisaaweto , hintte issi uraa ammanthanaw abbaranne sa7ara yuuyeta . Shin hintte iya ammanthida wode he uraa hinttefe aathidi Gaannames giigettidayssa oothiya gisho hinttena ayye .
40023016	“ Oonikka Xoossa Keethan caaqqiko aykkoyka baawa . Shin Xoossaa Keethan de7iya worqqan caaqqiko , he caaqoy iya gomana giya qooqeto , hinttew qooqidi harata kaaletheyssato , hinttena ayye .
40023017	Hinttenoo , eeyato , qooqeto , worqqay aadhdhiyye ? Worqqiya Xoossaas dummayaa Xoossa Keethay aadhdhii ?
40023018	Qassi ‘ Oonikka yarshsho yarshshiya bessan caaqqiko , aykkoyka baawa . Shin oonikka iya bolla de7iya yarshshuwan caaqqiko , he caaqoy iya gomana ’ yaagidi tamaarsseta .
40023019	Hinttenoo , qooqeto , yarshshoy aadhdhiyye ? Yarshshuwa Xoossaas dummayaa bessay aadhdhii ?
40023020	Hessa gisho , yarshsho bessan caaqqiya uray , he yarshsho bessaaninne iya bolla de7iya ubbaban caaqqees .
40023021	Xoossa Keethan caaqqiya uray , he Xoossa Keethaninne iyan de7iya Xoossan caaqqees .
40023022	Salon caaqqiya uray Xoossaa araataninne he araata bolla uttiya Xoossan caaqqees .
40023023	“ Hinttenoo , cubboto , higge asttamaaretonne Farisaaweto , hinttena ayye . Hintte kareetha sawoppe , naatiroppenne okasheppe asraata kesseta . Shin higgiyan de7iya aadhdhi koshsheyssata aggideta . Hessika suure pirdda , qadhetethinne ubbaban ammanetethi . Haratakka aggonnashin hayssata hintte oothanaw bessees .
40023024	Hinttew qooqidi hara asi kaaletheyssato , hintte ushshaafe udunxe kessidi gimale mitteeta .
40023025	“ Hinttenoo , cubboto , higge asttamaaretonne Farisaaweto , hinttena ayye . Hintte shaatiyasinne keriyas bolla baggaa geeshsheeta . Shin enttaw garssan bonqeynne uuzetethi kumi uttis .
40023026	Neno qooqe Farisaawiyaw , shaatiyasinne keriyas garssaa kasetada geeshsha . Hessafe guye , bolla baggayka geeshshi gidana .
40023027	“ Hinttenoo , cubboto , higge asttamaaretonne Farisaaweto , hinttena ayye . Kare baggara qalame tiyettidi lo77idi , giddon meqethinne wooqidabay kumida duufota daaneta .
40023028	Hessadakka , bolla baggara asas lo77o daaneta . Shin hintte garssan cubbotethinne iitatethi kumis .
40023029	“ Hintteno , cubboto , higge asttamaaretonne Farisaaweto , hinttena ayye . Hintte nabetas duufo keexeta , qassi xillota duufuwakka loytheeta .
40023030	Qassi hintte , ‘ Nuuni beni nu aawata wode de7idabaa gidiyakko , enttara issife nabeta suuthaa guussokoshin ’ yaageeta .
40023031	Hessa gisho , hintte nabeta wodhida asaa nayta gideyssa hinttee hintte huu7en markkatteeta .
40023032	Hiza , hintte aawati doomidayssa hintte polite .
40023033	“ Ha shooshatoo , shoosha nayto , hintte Gaanname pirddaafe waanidi attanee ?
40023034	Hessa gisho , ta odeyssa si7ite ; taani nabeta , cincca asatanne asttamaareta hintteko kiittana . Enttafe issota issota hintte wodhananne masqaliya bolla kaqqana . Baggata Ayhude Woosa Keethatan lisson garaafananne katamaappe katama gooddana .
40023035	Hessa gisho , xilluwaa Aabela wodhida wodiyappe doomidi , Xoossa Keethasinne yarshsho bessaafe giddon hintte wodhida Barakiya na7aa Zakkariyaasa wode gakkanaw hayqqida xillo asa ubbaa gisho hintte seerettana .
40023036	Taani hinttew tuma odays ; hinttenne hintte aawati oothida balaas ha pirdda ubbay ha yeletethaa bolla gakkana .
40023037	“ Yerusalaame , Yerusalaame , nabeta wodhiyare ! Xoossay neekko kiittidayssata shuchchan caddiyare ! Kuttoy ba nayta ba qefen haphpheyssada taani ne asaa ta qesiyan gechchanaw aappun toho koyadina ! Shin tana diggadasa .
40023038	Hiza , hintte Xoossaa keethay kaysi gidana .
40023039	Taani hinttew odays ; ‘ Godaa sunthan yeyssi anjjettidayssa ’ hintte gaana gakkanaw nam77antho tana be7ekketa ” yaagis .
40024001	Yesuusi Xoossa Keethafe keyidi bishin , iya tamaareti iyaakko yidi , malaalettidi Xoossa Keetha gimbbiya bessidosona .
40024002	Yesuusi enttako zaaridi , “ Ee ! Hayssa ubbaa be7etii ? Taani hinttew tumaa odays ; shuchchi shuchcha bolla gimbbettida mela laalettonna attenna ” yaagis .
40024003	Yesuusi Shamaho Deriya bolla uttidashin , iya tamaareti banttarkka iyaakko yidi , “ Hessi awude hananeekko nuus oda . Qassi ne yuussasinne wodiya wurssethaas malaatay aybee ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
40024004	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Hinttena oonikka balethonna mela naagettite !
40024005	Ays giikko , daro asati ta sunthan , ‘ Taani Kiristtoosa , Xoossay asaa ashshanaw kiittidayssa ’ yaagishe yidi daro asaa balethana .
40024006	Matan de7iya ola girssaa , haahon de7iya ola wore si7anaw de7eeta . Hessa melabay hananaw bessiya gisho hirggofite . Shin wurssethay buroona .
40024007	Derey deriyara , issi kawotethay hara kawotethaara olettana . Koshaynne biittaa qaaxoy ubba bessan hanana .
40024008	Hessi ubbay yelo iqethas zooke mela .
40024009	“ He wode asay hinttena waayes aathi immana , qachchananne wodhana . Ta sunthaa gisho asa ubbay hinttena ixxana .
40024010	He wode daroti ammano aggana . Bantta giddon issoy issuwa aathidi immana , issoy issuwa ixxana .
40024011	Qassi daro worddo nabeti denddidi darota balethana .
40024012	Geellatethi dariya gisho daro asaa siiqoy irxxana .
40024013	Shin wurssethi gakkanaw gencciya uray attana .
40024014	Asa ubbaas markka gidana mela Xoossaa kawotethaa Wonggelay biitta ubban odettana . Hessafe guye , wurssethay yaana .
40024015	“ Hessa gisho , nabiya Daaneli odida bashshaa tunatethay geeshsha bessan eqqidayssa hintte be7ana . ( Akeekiso : Hessi woy guusseeko nabbabeyssi akeeko ! )
40024016	He wode Yihuda biittan de7eyssati deriyakko baqato .
40024017	Keetha huu7en de7iya uray ba son de7iyabaa ekkanaw soo gelonna baqato .
40024018	Gaden de7eyssi ba ma7uwa ekkanaw guye simmofo .
40024019	He wode qantha maccasatasinne dhanthiya maccasatas daro un77a gidana .
40024020	Balggon woykko Sambbaatan hintte baqatoy gidonna mela Xoossaa woossite .
40024021	Ays giikko , sa7i medhettosappe hachchi gakkanaw hanonnabay , qassi sinthafekka ubbarakka hanonna waayey he wode hanana .
40024022	Xoossay he gallasata taybuwa guuthonnaako ase gidida oonikka attenna . Shin I ba doorida asata gisho he gallasata taybuwa guuthana .
40024023	“ He wode oonikka hinttena , ‘ Hekko , Kiristtoosi hayssan ’ woykko ‘ Hinin de7ees ’ yaagikko ammanoppite .
40024024	Ays giikko , worddo Kiristtoosatinne worddo nabeti denddana . Enttaw dandda7ettiko , hari attoshin Xoossay dooridayssatakka balethanaw gita malaatatanne malaalisiyabata oothana .
40024025	Akeekite , taani hinttew hayssa kasetada odas .
40024026	“ Hessa gisho , asay hintteko , ‘ Hekko , Kiristtoosi bazzon de7ees ’ giikko , yaa booppite . Woykko hintteko , ‘ Hekko , qol77an de7ees ’ giikko , enttabaa ammanoppite .
40024027	Ays giikko , wol77anthi salon wol77ammidi , dolohappe wuloha gakkanaw bentteyssada , Asa Na7aa yuussay hessada hanana .
40024028	“ Bawuti de7iyson ankkoti shiiqana .
40024029	“ He wode he waaye gallasatappe guye , sohuwara away dhumana , ageenay ba poo7uwa diggana . Xoolinttoti saloppe wodhdhana , qassi salon de7iya wolqqati buqettana .
40024030	He wode Asa Na7aa yuussaa mallay saluwa bolla benttana . Sa7an de7iya asi ubbay yeekkana . Qassi Asa Na7ay , wolqqaranne gita bonchchuwara saluwa shaara giddora yishin entti be7ana .
40024031	I ba kiitanchchota gita punniya moyzera kiittana . Entti sa7aa oyddu baggaa bidi , ha gaxappe ya gaxa gakkanaw de7iya iyaw doorettidayssata shiishana .
40024032	“ Balase mithaafe tamaarite . I aacidi hayxiya wode torchchey matattidayssa hintte ereeta .
40024033	Hessadakka , hintte ha ubbabaa be7iya wode Yesuusi matidi penggen de7eyssa erite .
40024034	Taani hinttew tuma odays ; ha ubbabay polettana gakkanaw , ha yeletethay aadhdhenna .
40024035	Saloynne sa7ay aadhdhana , shin ta qaalay ubbaka aadhdhenna .
40024036	“ He gallasaanne he saatiya salon de7iya ta aawappe attin hari salo kiitanchchota gidin woykko Na7aa gidin oonikka erenna .
40024037	Asa Na7aa yuussay , Nohe wode hanidayssa mela gidana .
40024038	He wode dhayo haathay yaanappe sinthe Nohey markkabiyan gelida gallasa gakkanaw , asay mishenne uyishe , ekkishenne gelishe gam77is .
40024039	Bashsha haathay yidi , entta ubbaa dhayssana gakkanaw akeekibookkona . Asa Na7aa yuussayka hessada hanana .
40024040	“ He wode nam77u asati gaden oothana . Enttafe issoy ekettana , hankkoy attana .
40024041	Nam77u maccasati issife gaaccana . Enttafe issiniya ekettana hankkiya attana .
40024042	“ Hiza , hintte Goday ay gallas yaanekko hintte eronna gisho minnidi naagite .
40024043	Shin kaysoy qammafe ay saaten yaanekko keethaaway eriyakko , ba keethay bookettonna mela barkkidi naaganashin .
40024044	Hessadakka , Asa Na7ay hintte qopponna saaten yaana gisho hintteka giigidi de7ite .
40024045	“ Yaatin , ba soo asaas kathaa koshshiya wodiyan immana mela iya goday doorida ammantheysinne wozanaama aylley oonee ?
40024046	I ba goday kiittidayssa oothishin iya goday yidi demmiya aylley anjjettidayssa .
40024047	Taani hinttew tuma odays ; goday he aylliya babaa ubbaa bolla shuumana .
40024048	Shin he aylley iita gidikko , ‘ Ta goday gam77idi yaana ’ yaagidi ba wozanan qoppidi ,
40024049	ba lagge oosanchchota wadho doomikko , mathotteyssatara miikkonne uyikko ,
40024050	he aylliya goday I qopponna gallasinne I eronna saaten ,
40024051	yidi iya qanxerethana . Iya qaadaa cubbotara oothana . He bessan iyaw yeehonne achche garccethi gidana .
40025001	“ He wode salo kawotethay bantta kuraaziya oykkidi , machcho ehanaw bida addiya mokkanaw keyida tammu geela7ota daanees .
40025002	Enttafe ichchashati eeya , qassi ichchashati cincca .
40025003	Eeyati kuraaze oykkidosona , shin hara lambba oykkibookkona .
40025004	Shin cinccati bantta kuraaziyanne hara guzha lambba oykkidosona .
40025005	Machchiw ekkeyssi gam77in , he geela7oti banttana dhiskkoy oykkin dhiskkidosona .
40025006	“ Giddi bilahe gidiya wode ‘ Hekko , machchiw eheyssi gakkis , iya mokkanaw keyite ’ yaagiya gita cabboy si7ettis .
40025007	“ He wode he geela7oti ubbay barkkidi , bantta kuraaziya giigisidosona .
40025008	Eeyati cinccatakko , ‘ Nu kuraazey to7ana haniya gisho hintte lambbaafe nuus immerkketi ’ yaagidosona .
40025009	“ Shin cinccati enttako zaaridi , ‘ Akkay , nuusinne hinttes gidiya lambbi baawa . Hessa gisho , hinttew bidi shammidi ekkite ’ yaagidosona .
40025010	Eeya geela7oti lambba shammanaw bin , machchiw ekkeyssi puttu gis . Giigeti uttida ichchashu geela7oti iyara issife yaagano keethaa gelidosona ; kareykka gorddetti aggis .
40025011	“ Guyeppe hankko geela7oti yidi , ‘ Godaw , godaw , nuus dooyarkii ’ yaagidosona .
40025012	“ Shin I enttako zaaridi , ‘ Taani hinttew tuma odays ; ta hinttena erikke ! ’
40025013	“ Hiza , Asa Na7ay yaana gallasaa woykko saatiya hintte eronna gisho barkkidi naagite .
40025014	“ Xoossaa kawotethay ba oosanchchota xeegidi baw de7iyabaa enttaw sheedhdhidi oge baanaw keyida uraa daanees .
40025015	Enttaw huu7en huu7en entta wolqqaa mela issuwas ichchashu karxiite bira , issuwas nam77u karxiite bira qassi issuwas issi karxiite bira immidi ba ogiya bis .
40025016	Ichchashu karxiite bira ekkida aylley sohuwara bidi zal77idi , hara ichchashu karxiite bira wodhisis .
40025017	Hessadakka , qassi nam77u karxiite bira ekkida aylley hara nam77u karxiite bira wodhisis .
40025018	Shin issi karxiite bira ekkidayssi bidi , olla bookkidi , ba godaa miishiya moogis .
40025019	“ Daro wodeppe guye he aylleta goday yidi , ba miishiya enttara salla77is .
40025020	Ichchashu karxiite bira ekkida aylley yidi , hara ichchashu karxiite bira ehidi , ‘ Ta godaw , neeni taw ichchashu karxiite bira immadasa . Shin taani hara ichchashu karxiite bira wodhisas ’ yaagis .
40025021	Iya goday , ‘ Zambboy ! Neeni lo77onne ammanthiya aylle ; neeni guuthaban ammanettadasa . Taani nena darobaa bolla shuumana ; haa gelada ne godaara ufaytta ’ yaagis .
40025022	“ Qassi nam77u karxiite bira ekkidayssi yidi , ‘ Ta godaw , neeni taw nam77u karxiite bira immadasa . Shin taani hara nam77u karxiite bira wodhisas ’ yaagis .
40025023	Iya goday , ‘ Zambboy ! Neeni lo77onne ammanthiya aylle ; neeni guuthaban ammanettadasa . Taani nena darobaa bolla shuumana ; haa gelada ne godaara ufaytta ’ yaagis .
40025024	“ Qassi issi karxiite bira ekkidayssi yidi , ‘ Ta godaw , neeni zeronna bessafe cakkeyssanne dharcconna bessafe maxiya iita asi gideyssa taani erays .
40025025	Hessa gisho , yayyada ne biraa biittan moogas . Ne miishey hayssish ’ yaagis .
40025026	“ Iya goday zaaridi , ‘ Ha iita azalla aylliyaw , taani zeronna bessafe cakkeyssanne dharcconna bessafe maxiya asi gideyssa eradasa .
40025027	Yaatin , neeni ta miishiya bankken wothidabaa gidiyakko , taani simmiya wode ta miishiya wodhera ekkanayssa diggadasa .
40025028	Hessa gisho , miishiya iyappe ekkidi , tammu karxiite biri de7eyssas immite .
40025029	Ays giikko , de7iya ubbaas guzhettananne darana . Shin baynnayssafe hari attoshin , he iyaw de7iya guuthiyaka ekettana .
40025030	Ha maaddonna aylliya kare dhumaa kessi yeggite . Yan iyaw yeehonne achche garccethi gidana ’ yaagis .
40025031	“ Asa Na7ay , kiitanchcho ubbatara , ba bonchchuwara yaa wode I ba bonchcho kawota araata bolla uttana .
40025032	Biittan de7iya asi ubbay iya sinthe shiiqana . Henthanchchoy dorssata deeshatappe shaakkeyssada I he asaa nam77an shaakkana .
40025033	Qassi dorssata ushachcha baggara deeshata haddirssa baggara essana .
40025034	“ Hessafe guye , kawoy ushachcha baggara de7eyssatakko hayssada yaagana : ‘ Ta Aaway anjjidayssato , haa yidi sa7ay medhettiya wode hinttew giigida kawotethaa laattite .
40025035	Ays giikko , taani koshattin muzideta , saamottin ushshideta , erettona imatha asi gidada bin mokkideta ,
40025036	kallottin mayzideta , harggettin harggisideta , qashettin tana oychchideta ’ yaagana .
40025037	“ Hessafe guye , xilloti zaaridi , ‘ Godaw , neeni koshattin awude be7idi muzidoo ? Woykko neeni saamottin awude be7idi ushshidoo ?
40025038	Neeni imathe gidada yin awude be7idi mokkidoo ? Woykko neeni kallottin awude mayzidoo ?
40025039	Neeni harggin woykko qashettin neekko bidi nena awude oychchidoo ? ’ yaagana .
40025040	Kawoy zaaridi , ‘ Taani hinttew tuma odays ; hintte tana kaalliya ha ubbaafe guuxeyssas oothidayssa taw oothideta ’ yaagana .
40025041	“ He wode haddirssa baggara de7eyssatakko , ‘ Ha qanggettidayssato , ta matappe haakkite . Xalahesinne iya kiitanchchotas giigida merinaa taman biite .
40025042	Ays giikko , koshattin tana muzibeekketa ; saamottin ushshibeekketa .
40025043	Taani imathe gidada bin tana mokkibeekketa , kallottin mayzibeekketa , harggininne qashettin tana oychchibeekketa ’ yaagana .
40025044	“ He wode entti , ‘ Godaw , neeni koshattin woykko saamottin woykko imathe gidada bin woykko kallottin woykko harggin woykko qashettin be7idi nena awude maaddonna ixxido ? ’ yaagidi zaarana .
40025045	“ He wode kawoy zaaridi enttako , ‘ Taani hinttew tuma odays ; hintte tana kaalliya ha ubbaafe guuxeyssa maaddonna ixxidayssi , tana maaddonna ixxidayssa ’ yaagana .
40025046	Hessa gisho , he asati merinaa pirddas qassi xilloti merinaa de7uwas baana ” yaagis .
40026001	Yesuusi ha timirttiya ubbaa wurssida wode ba tamaaretakko ,
40026002	“ Nam77u gallasappe guye , Paasika Baale bonchchiya gallas gideyssa ereeta . He gallas Asa Na7ay masqaliya bolla kaqettanaw asa kushen aadhdhi imettana ” yaagis .
40026003	He wode kahine halaqatinne cimati , Qayyaafa giya kahine halaqaa keethan shiiqidi ,
40026004	asi eronna Yesuusa oykkidi , wodhanaw maqettidosona .
40026005	Shin entti , “ Asay ooshshi kessonna mela gidi , Paasika bonchchiya gallas hessa oothoko ” yaagidosona .
40026006	Yesuusi Bitaaniya kataman baro harggida Simoona son de7ees .
40026007	Yesuusi imatuwa bolla de7ishin issi maccasiya albasxiroose philqqaaxe kumetha daro al77o shitto ekka yada Yesuusa huu7en tigasu .
40026008	Shin Yesuusa tamaareti hessa be7idi hanqettidi , “ Ha shittoy coo iitey aybisse ?
40026009	Ha shittoy al77o gaten bayzettidi , miishey manqotas imettanaw dandda7ettees ” yaagidosona .
40026010	Yesuusi entti geyssa eridi , enttako , “ Ha maccasiw ays waaysetii ? Iya taw lo77obaa oothasu .
40026011	Manqoti ubba wode hinttera daana . Shin taani hinttera ubba wode de7ikke .
40026012	Iya ha shittuwa ta bolla tigidayssi tana mooganaw giigisanaassa .
40026013	Taani hinttew tuma odays ; biitta ubban ha Wonggelay sabbakettiya bessan awunkka , asay iyo hassayana mela iya oothidayssi odettana ” yaagis .
40026014	He wode tammanne nam77u Yesuusa tamaaretappe issoy , Asqoroota Yihuda geetetteyssi kahine halaqatakko ,
40026015	bidi , “ Taani hinttew Yesuusa aatha immiko , hintte taw ay immanee ? ” yaagidi entta oychchis . Entti zorettidi hasttamu bira santime immidosona .
40026016	Hessafe guye , Yihudi Yesuusa aathidi immanaw injjetiya wode wochchees .
40026017	Uytha Baale bonchchiya koyro gallas , Yesuusa tamaareti iyaakko yidi , “ Paasika bonchchiya gallas neeni maana kathi nuuni awun giigisino ? ” yaagidosona .
40026018	Yesuusi enttako , “ Kataman de7iya addiyako bidi , ‘ Asttamaarey , taw wodey gakkida gisho ta tamaaretara Paasika bonchchiya gallasa ne son aathana yaagees ’ yaagite ” yaagis .
40026019	Iya tamaareti Yesuusi banttana kiittidayssada oothidi , Paasika Baale gallas maana kathaa giigisidosona .
40026020	Sa7ay omarssiya wode Yesuusi tammanne nam77u hawaaretara kathi maanaw uttis .
40026021	Entti miishin , Yesuusi enttako , “ Taani hinttew tuma odays ; hinttefe issi uray tana aathidi immana ” yaagis .
40026022	Entti daro dagammidi , huu7en huu7en , “ Godaw , tuma taneshsha ? ” gidi iya oychchidosona .
40026023	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ba kushiya taara issife shaatiyan yeddeyssi I tana aathidi immana .
40026024	Asa Na7ay , Xoossaa qaalan iyaw xaafettidayssada hayqqana . Shin Asa Na7aa aathidi immiya uraa ayye ; he uray yelettonna attidaakko iyaw lo77oshin ” yaagis .
40026025	Iya aathi immanaw de7iya Yihudi zaaridi , “ Asttamaariyaw , neeni gey taneyye ? ” yaagis . Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Neeni ne huu7en gadasa ” yaagis .
40026026	Entti mishin , Yesuusi uythaa ekkidi Xoossaa galatis . He uythaa menthidi ba tamaaretas immidi , “ He7ite , miite , hayssi ta ashuwa ” yaagis .
40026027	Xuu7aa ekkidi , Xoossaa galatis . Enttaw immidi , “ Ubbay hayssafe uyite .
40026028	Hayssi daro asaa nagaray atto geetettana mela gukkiya ta suuthaa . Ha suuthay Xoossay hinttera geliya caaquwa mintheyssa .
40026029	Shin taani hinttew odays ; taani ta Aawa kawotethan ooratha woyne ushshaa hinttera uyana gallasa gakkanaw nam77antho ha woyne ushshaa uyikke ” yaagis .
40026030	Galata mazmure yexxidayssafe guye Shamaho Deriya bidosona .
40026031	He wode Yesuusi enttako , “ ‘ Xoossay henthanchchuwa shocana dorssatikka laalettana ’
40026032	Shin taani hayqoppe denddidaappe guye hinttefe sinthatada Galiila baana ” yaagis .
40026033	Phexiroosi zaaridi , “ Entti ubbay nena aggidi baqatikkoka , taani nena aggike ” yaagis .
40026034	Yesuusi Phexiroosakko , “ Taani new tuma odays ; hachchi qamma kuttoy waassanaappe sinthe neeni tana heedzu toho kaddana ” yaagis .
40026035	Phexiroosi zaaridi , “ Taani neera issife hayqoppe attin nena ubbaka kaddike ” yaagis . Hankko iya tamaareti ubbayka hessada gidosona .
40026036	Yaatidi , Yesuusi ba tamaaretara Geetesemaane giya bessaa bidi , enttako , “ Taani hini bada Xoossaa woossashshana , hintte hayssan uttite ” yaagis .
40026037	Phexiroosanne Zabdiyoosa nayta nam77ata baara ekki bidi daro azzanonne un77etethi doomis .
40026038	Qassika enttako , “ Taani hayqos gathiya un77a un77ettas . Hayssan taara gam77itenne minnidi naagite ” yaagis .
40026039	Guuthi sinthe bidi biittan gufannidi , “ Ta Aawaw , dandda7ettiyaba gidikko ha waaye xuu7aa taappe digga . Shin ne sheney hanoppe attin ta sheney hanoppo ” yaagidi Xoossaa woossis .
40026040	Yesuusi ba tamaaretakko simmi yidi entti dhiskkidashin demmis . Phexiroosakko , “ Hintte issi saatekkonne dhiskkonna taara minnanaw dandda7ibeekketii ?
40026041	Paacen hintte gelonna mela barkkidi naagitenne Xoossaa woossite . Hinttew lo77o amoy de7ees , shin hintte daaburanchcho asi ” yaagis .
40026042	Yesuusi qassi nam77antho bidi , “ Ta Aawaw , taani ha waaye xuu7appe uyonna de7ishe aadhdhanaw dandda7ettonnabaa gidikko ne sheney hano ” yaagidi Xoossaa woossis .
40026043	Qassika simmi yaa wode iya tamaareta ayfiyaa dhiskkoy goozin , zin77idashin demmis .
40026044	Qassika entta aggi bidi , kase qaalaa zaari heedzantho woossis .
40026045	Hessafe guye , ba tamaaretakko yidi , “ Ha77i gakkanaw dhiskkeetinne shemppetii ? Hekko , Asa Na7ay , nagaranchchota kushen aadhdhi imettiya saatey gakkis .
40026046	Denddidi yedhdhite , tana aathidi immeyssi hayssish gakkis ” yaagis .
40026047	Yesuusi buroo hessa haasayishin , tammanne nam77u tamaaretappe issoy , Yihudi gakki wodhdhis . Kahine halaqatinne deriya cimati kiitida daro asati mashshenne xam77a oykkidi iyara issife yidosona .
40026048	Yesuusa aathi immiya Yihudi he daro asaakko , “ Taani yeereyssi hintte koyeyssi iya , iya oykkite ” yaagidi malla immi wothis .
40026049	Iirakka Yesuusakko shiiqidi , “ Asttamaariyaw , saro de7ay ” yaagidi iya yeeris .
40026050	Yesuusi iyakko , “ Ta laggiyaw , neeni oothanabaa ootha agga ” yaagis . Hessafe guye , shiiqidi , Yesuusa oykkidosona .
40026051	Yesuusara de7eyssatappe issoy ba mashsha shoddidi kahine halaqaa aylliya shocidi , iya haythaa qanxidi yeggis .
40026052	Shin Yesuusi , “ Ne mashshaa guye shoohuwan zaara . Ays giikko , mashsha shoddiya ubbay mashshan hayqqana .
40026053	Ta , ta Aawa woossiyako daro mukulun taybettiya kiitanchchota yeddanaw dandda7onnabaa new daanii ?
40026054	Yaatin , Xoossaa qaalan hessada hananaw bessees geetettidayssi waanidi polettanee ? ” yaagis .
40026055	He saatiyan , Yesuusi he shiiqida daro asaakko , “ Tana pangga oothidi oykkanaw mashshenne xam77a oykkidi yidetii ? Taani Xoossa Keethan gallas gallas tamaarssashe hinttera de7iya wode tana oykkibeekketa .
40026056	Shin hayssi ubbay hanidayssi nabeti Xoossaa qaalan xaafidayssi polettana melassa ” yaagis . He wode iya tamaareti ubbay iya aggidi baqatidosona .
40026057	Yesuusa oykkidayssati kahine halaqaa Qayyaafakko iya efidosona . Yan higge asttamaaretinne biitta cimati shiiqidi de7oosona .
40026058	Shin Phexiroosi kahine halaqaa zabbaa gakkanaw haahon iya kaallis . Iya wurssethay shaakettana gakkanaw zabbaa gelidi naageyssatara uttis .
40026059	Kahine halaqatinne shiiqida asa ubbay Yesuusa wodhanaw iya bolla worddo markka koyidosona .
40026060	Daroti yidi iya bolla worddo markka markkattidosona , shin aykkoka demmibookkona . Guyeppe nam77u asati yidi ,
40026061	“ Ha uray , ‘ Taani Xoossa Keetha laallada heedzu gallasan zaara keexanaw dandda7ays ’ yaagis ” yaagidosona .
40026062	Kahineta halaqay denddi eqqidi Yesuusakko , “ Hayssati nena mootiya mootowas neeni zaariyabay baawe ? ” yaagis .
40026063	Shin Yesuusi si77i gis . Qassika kahine halaqay , “ Taani nena de7o Xoossaa sunthan oykkays ; neeni Xoossaa Na7aa Kiristtoosa gidikko nuus oda ” yaagis .
40026064	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Neeni ne huu7enkka gadasa . Shin taani hinttew odays ; hizappe guye , Asa Na7ay wolqqaama Xoossaa ushachcha baggan uttidashin , qassi salo shaarara yishin hintte be7ana ” yaagis .
40026065	He wode kahine halaqay daro yilotidi ba ma7uwa peedhidi , “ Hayssa be7ite Xoossaa cayis ! Nuna hara markka ay koshshii ? I ha77i cayidayssa hintte si7ideta .
40026066	Hintte qofay aybee ? ” yaagis . Enttika , “ Iyaw hayqo bessees ” yaagidi zaaridosona .
40026067	Yaatin , entti iya som77on cuttidi dechchidosona . Harati iya baqqidi ,
40026068	“ Kiristtoosaa ! Nena dechchiday oonee ? Ane nuus oda ” yaagidosona .
40026069	Phexiroosi zabban uttidashin , issi aylliya iyaakko yada , “ Neenikka Galiila Yesuusara issife de7aasa ” yaagasu .
40026070	Shin I entta ubbaa sinthan he aylleko , “ Neeni giyabay aybeekko taani erikke ” yaagidi kaddis .
40026071	Qassi bidi dirssaa penggeko gakkishin hara aylliya iya be7ada , yan de7iya asaakko , “ Ha uray Naazirete Yesuusara de7ees ” yaagasu .
40026072	Phexiroosi nam77antho caaqqidi , “ Taani he uraa erikke ! ” yaagis .
40026073	Guuthu gam77ishin , yan eqqida asati Phexiroosakko yidi , “ Nekka tuma enttara issife de7aasa ; neeni ne haasayan erettasa ” yaagidosona .
40026074	Hessafe guye , Phexiroosi , “ Taani he uraa erikke ! ” yaagidi , bana qanggethinne caaqo doomis . He wode iirakka kuttoy waassi aggis .
40026075	Yesuusi iyakko , “ Neeni kuttoy waassanaappe sinthe tana heedzu toho kaddana ” gidayssa Phexiroosi akeekidi , kare keyidi iita yeeho yeekkis .
40027001	Wontta guura kahine halaqatinne biitta cimati ubbay Yesuusa wodhisanaw maqettidosona .
40027002	Entti Yesuusa qachchi efidi deriya haariya Philaaxoosas aathidi immidosona .
40027003	He wode Yesuusa oythida Yihudi , Philaaxoosi Yesuusa bolla pirddidayssa be7idi , qiirottidi , he hasttamu biraa santimiya kahine halaqatasinne deriya cimatas guye zaaris .
40027004	“ Taani xillo asi hayqos aatha immada nagara oothas ” yaagis . Shin entti , “ Hessi nu meto gidenna ne meto ” yaagidosona .
40027005	Yihudi miishiya Xoossaa Keethan yeggi aggidi entta matappe bidi , sulleti hayqqis .
40027006	Kahine halaqati miishiya ekkidi , “ Ha miishey suutha miishe gidiya gisho nuuni Xoossa Keethaa miishiyara gatheyssi woga gidenna ” yaagidosona .
40027007	Hessafe guye , issife zorettidi , bete asi mooganaw mana biitta shammidosona .
40027008	Hessa gisho , he gadey hachchi gakkanaw suutha biitta geetetti xeegettees .
40027009	Nabiya Ermmiyasi , “ Isra7eele asay iyaw qanxanaw gammattida hasttamu bira santime ekkidosona .
40027010	Goday tana kiittidayssada mana biitta shammanaw immidosona ” gidayssi he wode polettis .
40027011	Yesuusi deriya haariya Philaaxoosa sinthe shiiqin , Philaaxoosi iyaakko , “ Neeni Ayhude kawo ? ” yaagidi oychchis . Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ne gadasa ” yaagis .
40027012	Kahine halaqatinne biitta cimati iya mootiya wode enttaw aybi zaarokka immibeenna .
40027013	He wode Philaaxoosi Yesuusakko , “ Hayssati nena mootiya mootuwa ubbaa si7ikkii ? ” yaagis .
40027014	Yesuusi hari attoshin , issi qaalakka zaaronna ixxin , deriya haareyssi daro malaalettis .
40027015	Deriya haareyssi laythan laythan Paasika Baale bonchchiya gallasan , asay koyaa issi asi qashoppe birshshiya wogi de7ees .
40027016	He wode issi Barbbaana Yesuusa giya daro erettida iita asi qasho keethan de7ees .
40027017	Hessa gisho , daro asay shiiqidi de7ishin Philaaxoosi , “ Taani hinttew Barbbaana Yesuusa birshshoyye , woykko Yesuusa giya Kiristtoosa birshsho ? ” yaagidi asaa oychchis .
40027018	I hessa giday entti qanaattidi Yesuusa oythidayssa eriya gishossa .
40027019	Philaaxoosi pirdda keethan uttidashin , iya machchiya , “ Taani hachchi qamma amuhon iyabaa daro waayettashe aqida gisho he xillo uraa bolla aybibaakka oothofa ” yaagada kiittasu .
40027020	Shin kahine halaqatinne deriya cimati Philaaxoosi Barbbaana birshshidi , Yesuusa wodhana mela , asay iya woossana mela , asaa cimmidosona .
40027021	Philaaxoosi zaaridi enttako , “ Taani entta nam77aafe hinttew oona billana mela koyeetii ? ” yaagidi oychchis . Entti , “ Barbbaana billana mela koyoos ” yaagidosona .
40027022	Philaaxoosi , “ Yaatin , Yesuusa giya Kiristtoosa waato ? ” yaagidi entta oychchis . Ubbay zaaridi , “ Masqaliya bolla iya kaqqa ” yaagidosona .
40027023	Philaaxoosi asaakko , “ Ays ? I ay iitabaa oothidee ? ” yaagidi oychchis . Shin asay kaseyssafe aathidi , “ Masqaliya bolla iya kaqqa ” gidi waassidosona .
40027024	Ooshshi denthethofe hara aybibaakka oothanaw dandda7ettonayssa Philaaxoosi be7idi , haathe ekkidi , “ Ha uraa hayquwan taani de7ikke . Hessa oothey hinttena ” yaagidi asaa sinthan ba kushiya meecettis .
40027025	Asa ubbay zaaridi , “ Iya suuthaa gomey nunanne nu nayta gakko ” yaagidosona .
40027026	Yaatin , Philaaxoosi Barbbaana enttaw billidi , Yesuusa lisson garaafidi , masqaliya bolla kaqettidi hayqqana mela enttaw aathidi immis .
40027027	Hessafe guye , Philaaxoosa wotaaddareti Yesuusa deriya haareyssa soo ekki efin , wotaaddareti ubbay iya yuushuwan eqqidosona .
40027028	Iya afilaa qaari ekkidi zo7o afila mayzidosona .
40027029	Qassi aguntha kalachcha giigisidi , iya huu7en wothidosona . Iya ushachcha kushiyan mayre xam77a oythidi , iya sinthan gulbbatidi , “ Ayhude kawaw , mukulu laythi kawota ! ” yaagidi , iya bolla qelqisidosona .
40027030	Iya bolla cuttidosona . He mayre xam77aa ekkidi , iya huu7en shocidosona .
40027031	Entti iya bolla qelqisidayssafe guye zo7o afilaa iyappe qaari ekkidi , iya afilaa iya mayzidosona . Masqaliya bolla iya kaqqanaw ekki efidosona .
40027032	Entti kare keyidi , issi Simoona giya Qereena biitta asi demmidi , Yesuusa masqaliya wolqqan toossidosona .
40027033	Golggotta giya bessi gakkidosona . “ Golggotta ” guussay “ Guugge bessi ” guussu .
40027034	Hessan entti ciiye walakettida woyne ushshaa uyo gidi iyaw immidosona . Shin I hessa ganxi ekkidi , uyonna ixxis .
40027035	Entti masqaliya bolla iya kaqqidayssafe guye iya afilaa shaakkidi , saama yeggidi ekkidosona .
40027036	Hessafe guye , yan uttidi iya naagidosona .
40027037	Qassi , “ Hayssi Ayhude Kawuwa Yesuusa ” yaagiya mooto xuufiya iya huu7e son wothidosona .
40027038	Yesuusara he wode nam77u panggata issuwa iyappe ushachcha baggan , hankkuwa iyappe haddirssa baggara , masqaliya bolla kaqqidosona .
40027039	Ogiyara aadhdhiya asay Yesuusa boridi , iya bolla cuttishe ,
40027040	“ Xoossa Keethaa laallada heedzu gallasa giddon keexeysso , nena ashsha . Neeni Xoossaa Na7a gidikko , ane masqaliya bollafe wodhdha ” yaagidosona .
40027041	Hessadakka , kahine halaqati , higge asttamaaretinne biitta cimati issife Yesuusa bolla qelqisidosona . Hayssada yaagidosona :
40027042	“ Harata ashshis , shin bana ashshanaw dandda7ibeenna . I Isra7eele kawo gidikko , ane masqaliya bollafe ha77i wodho , nukka iya ammanana .
40027043	Xoossan I ammanettees , Xoossay iya ashshanaw koykko ane ashsho . Ays giikko , I bana , ‘ Taani Xoossaa Na7a ’ gees ” yaagidosona .
40027044	Qassi hari attoshin , iyara masqaliya bolla kaqettida panggatika hessada gidi iya bolla qelqisidosona .
40027045	Usuppun saateppe bidi , uddufun saate gakkanaw biitta ubbay dhumis .
40027046	Uddufun saate gidiya wode Yesuusi , “ Elohee , Elohee , lama sabaqitani ? ” gidi gita waaso waassis . “ Elohee , Elohee , lama sabaqitani ? ” geyssa birshshethay “ Ta Xoossaw , ta Xoossaw , tana ays aggadi ? ” guussu .
40027047	Hessan eqqida asaappe issoti issoti hessa si7idi , “ Ha uray Eliyaasa xeegees ” yaagidosona .
40027048	Iira enttafe issoy woxxi bidi , ispponjje ekkidi , caala woyne ushshaa kunthis . Hessa mayre xam77a xeeran wothidi ushshanaw iya doonakko shiishis .
40027049	Shin hankkoti , “ Naaga , Eliyaasi iya ashshanaw yaanekko ane be7oos ” yaagidosona .
40027050	Yesuusi nam77antho gita waaso waassidi , hayqqi aggis .
40027051	He saaten Xoossa Keethan kaqettida magaraajjoy qommofe duge gakkanaw nam77u keyidi , peedheti wodhdhis . Biittay qaaxxis , zaallayka phalqqettis .
40027052	Duufoti dooyettin Xoossaa asatappe daroti hayqoppe denddidosona .
40027053	Entti duufoppe keyidi , Yesuusi hayqoppe denddidayssafe guye geeshsha katamaa bidosona ; yan entti daro asaas benttidosona .
40027054	Mato halaqaynne iyara Yesuusa naagiya wotaaddareti biittay qaaxxidayssanne hessan hanidabaa be7ida wode daro yayyidi “ Tuma hayssi Xoossaa Na7aa ” yaagidosona .
40027055	Hessan daro maccasati , Galiilappe doomidi Yesuusa haggaazishe kaallidayssati haahon eqqidi xeellosona .
40027056	Entta giddon Magdela Mayraama , Yayqoobanne Yoosefa aayyaa Mayraamanne Zabdiyoosa machchiya de7oosona .
40027057	Sa7ay omarssiya wode Yoosefa giya issi dure uray , Armmatiyasa katamaappe yis . I ba huu7enkka Yesuusa kaalliya asi .
40027058	Yoosefi Philaaxoosakko bidi , Yesuusa ahaa ekkanaw woossis . Philaaxoosi ahay Yoosefas imettana mela kiittis .
40027059	Yesuusa ahaa ekkidi , geeshsha moogo afilan xaaxis .
40027060	Baw moogettanaw shuchchafe woocida ooratha gonggolon iya ahaa wothis . Qassi he gonggoluwa doonan gita shuchchaa gonddorssi wothidi aggi bis .
40027061	Magdela Mayraamanne hankko Mayraama he gonggoluwakko simmidi uttidosona .
40027062	Wontethe Sambbaata gallas , kahine halaqatinne Farisaaweti Philaaxoosakko yidi , hayssada yaagidosona :
40027063	“ Godaw , ha worddanchchoy paxa de7ishe , ‘ Taani heedzu gallasappe guye hayqoppe denddana ’ yaagidayssi nuus hassayettis .
40027064	Hessa gisho , I moogettida gonggoluwa heedzu gallas gakkanaw , minthi naagana mela kiittarkki . Hessi hanonna ixxiko , iya tamaareti bidi iya ahaa kaysi dhayssidi , ‘ Hayqoppe denddis ’ yaagidi asaas odikko nam77antho balesoy koyroyssafe ubba haa iitana ” yaagidosona .
40027065	Philaaxoosi enttako , “ Hinttew naageyssati de7oosona ; bidi hinttew dandda7ettida mela naagisite ” yaagis .
40027066	Hessa gisho , entti bidi duufoy boshettonna mela shuchchaa bolla maatame wothidi wotaaddaretan naagisidosona .
40028001	Sambbaati aadhdhin Wogga wode wontta guura , Magdela Mayraamanne hankko Mayraama Yesuusi moogettida gonggoluwa be7anaw bidosona .
40028002	Qopponna wolqqaama biitta qaaxoy hanis . Godaa kiitanchchoy saloppe wodhdhidi duufuwa doonan de7iya shuchchaa gonddorssidi iya bolla uttis .
40028003	Iya malay wol77anthi daanees . Iya ma7oykka shachchada boothi .
40028004	Naageyssati kiitanchchuwa be7idi , yashshan kokkoridi , hayqqida asada hanidosona .
40028005	Kiitanchchoy maccasatakko , “ Hintte masqaliya bolla kaqettida Yesuusa koyeyssa taani eriya gisho yayyofite .
40028006	I kase odidayssa mela hayqoppe denddis ; hayssan deenna . Haa yidi iya zin77isida bessaa be7ite .
40028007	Hintte ha77i ellessi bidi , iya tamaaretas , ‘ Yesuusi hayqoppe denddis . Qassi I hinttefe sinthattidi Galiila baana ; hintte iya yan be7ana ’ yaagidi odite . Taani hinttew hayssa odanaw yas ” yaagis .
40028008	Entti yayyishenne daro ufayttishe , duufuwa matappe ellessidi bidi , iya tamaaretas odanaw woxxidosona .
40028009	Qopponna Yesuusi enttara gahettidi enttako , “ Saroy hinttew gido ” yaagis . Entti iyaakko shiiqidi , iya tohuwa oykkidi iyaw goynnidosona .
40028010	He wode Yesuusi enttako , “ Yayyofite ; bidi ta tamaareti Galiila baana mela enttaw odite . Entti yan tana be7ana ” yaagis .
40028011	He maccasati bishin , duufuwa naagiya wotaaddaretappe baggati katamaa bidi , hanidabaa ubbaa kahine halaqatas odidosona .
40028012	Kahine halaqatinne cimati shiiqidi zorettidi , wotaaddaretas daro miishe immidi ,
40028013	“ ‘ Nuuni dhiskkidashin iya tamaareti qamma yidi , iya ahaa kaysidosona ’ yaagite .
40028014	Ha odaa deriya haareyssi si7ikko , hessi hintte bala gidonnayssa nuuni iya odi ammanthana . Hinttena aybikka hirggisoppo ” yaagidosona .
40028015	Wotaaddareti miishiya ekkidi , kiitettidayssada oothidosona . Ha oday Ayhude matan hachchi gakkanaw odettishe de7ees .
40028016	Tammanne issi iya tamaareti Yesuusi banttana biite gida Galiilaa Deriya bolla bidosona .
40028017	Yan entti iya be7ida wode iyaw goynnidosona , shin enttafe issoti issoti sidhidosona .
40028018	Yesuusi enttako shiiqidi , “ Saloninne sa7an maati ubbay taw imettis .
40028019	Hiza , hintte ubba bessi bidi , Aawa , Na7aa , Geeshsha Ayyaana sunthan ase ubbaa xammaqidi tana kaalleyssata oothite .
40028020	Taani hinttena kiittidaba ubbaa entti naagana mela entta tamaarssite . Taani wodiya wurssethaa gakkanaw ubba wode hinttera de7ays ” yaagis .
41001001	Hayssi Xoossaa Na7aa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Wonggelaa doomethaa .
41001002	Nabiya Isayaasi xaafida maxaafan Xoossay , “ Hekko , taani ta kiitanchchuwa neeppe sinthe yeddana . I ne ogiya giigisana .
41001003	Issoy bazzo gidon ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , ‘ Godaa ogiya giigisite ; I hamuttana horogaa iyaw suurisite gis ’ ”
41001004	Xammaqiya Yohaannisi asaa xammaqishe , “ Hintte nagaraappe simmidi xammaqetite ; Xoossay hintte nagaraa atto gaana ” yaagidi qaala odishe bazzo biittafe yis .
41001005	Yihuda biittan de7iya asay ubbaynne Yerusalaame katamaa asa ubbay Yohaannisakko yoosona . Bantta nagara paaxin , Yohaannisi entta Yorddaanose Shaafan xammaqees .
41001006	Yohaannisi gimale ikiseppe dadettida afila ma77ees . Ba xeessan dafo danccees ; qassi boolenne degera eessi mees .
41001007	Yohaannisi qaala odishe , “ Taappe guyera daro minneyssi yees . Hari attoshin , taani iya caammaa wodoruwa hokkada billanaw bessike .
41001008	Taani hinttena haathan xammaqays , shin I hinttena Geeshsha Ayyaanan xammaqana ” yaagis .
41001009	Yesuusi he wode Galiila biittan de7iya Naazirete katamaappe yin , Yohaannisi Yorddaanose Shaafan iya xammaqis .
41001010	Yesuusi haathaafe keyaa wode saloy dooyettin , Geeshsha Ayyaanay ba bolla holeda wodhdhishin be7is .
41001011	Qassi saloppe , “ Taani dosiya ta na7ay nena ; ta nenan ufayttays ” yaagiya qaalay yis .
41001012	Iira Geeshsha Ayyaanay Yesuusa bazzo biitta efis .
41001013	Yesuusi bazzo biittan Xalahen paacettishe oytamu gallas gam77is . Do7atara de7is , shin kiitanchchoti yidi iya maaddidosona .
41001014	Yohaannisi qashettidaappe guye Yesuusi Xoossaa kawotethaa Wonggelaa odishe Galiila biittaa bis .
41001015	Yan , “ Wodey gakkis ; Xoossaa kawotethay matattis . Hintte nagaraappe simmidi , Wonggelan ammanite ” yaagis .
41001016	Yesuusi Galiila Abbaa matara aadhdhishe , molo oykkiya , Simoonanne iya ishaa Inddiriyasa , bantta gitiya abban yeggeyssata be7is .
41001017	Enttako , “ Tana kaallite ; taani hinttena ase oythu tamaarssana ” yaagis .
41001018	Entti sohuwara bantta gitiya yeggi aggidi Yesuusa kaallidosona .
41001019	Yesuusi guuthi sinthe bidi , nam77u ishata Zabdiyoosa nayta , Yayqoobanne Yohaannisa wogoluwa giddon bantta gitiya giigiseyssata be7is .
41001020	I entta be7ida mela xeegis . Entti bantta aawa Zabdiyoosa , iya oosanchchotara wogoluwa giddon yeggi aggidi Yesuusa kaallidi bidosona .
41001021	Entti Qifirnahoome katamaa gelidosona . Sambbaati gelida mela Yesuusi ellesidi Ayhude Woosa Keethi gelidi tamaarsso oykkis .
41001022	Maatara de7iya asada tamaarssesippe attin higge asttamaaretatho tamaarssonna gisho asay iya timirttiyan malaalettidosona .
41001023	He wode tuna ayyaanay oykkida issi uray Ayhude Woosa Keethi gelidi ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi ,
41001024	“ Naazirete Yesuusa , neeni nuuppe ay koyay ? Nuna dhayssanaw yadi ? Neeni ooneekko ta erays ; neeni Xoossaa Geeshshaa gidikkii ? ” yaagis .
41001025	Yesuusi he tuna ayyaanaa , “ Hayza , ha addiyafe keya ” gidi kiittis .
41001026	Tuna ayyaanay uraa daferethidi , waassidi iyappe keyis .
41001027	Asay ubbay malaalettidi , “ Hayssi aybee ? Ha uray ba maatan hari attoshin tuna ayyaanatakka kiittees . Entti iyaw kiitettosona ; hayssi aybi ooratha timirtte ? ” gidi , bantta giddon issoy issuwa oychchidosona .
41001028	Yesuusa sunthay ellesidi Galiila biittan de7iya heera ubban keyis .
41001029	Yesuusi Ayhude Woosa Keethafe keyidi , Yayqoobaranne Yohaannisara Simoona soonne Inddiriyasa soo bis .
41001030	Simoona machche aayyaa qoxo misha harggada zin77idaaro Yesuusi yaa gakkiya wode iyaw odidosona .
41001031	I iikko shiiqidi , I kushiya oykkidi , iyo denthi essis . Qoxoynne mishay aggin iya entta mokkasu .
41001032	Harggida asa ubbaanne tuna ayyaanati oykkida asa ubbaa omarssi away wullidaappe guye iyaakko ehidosona .
41001033	Kataman de7iya asa ubbay he keetha kare shiiqidosona .
41001034	Yesuusi dumma dumma harggen oykettida daro asaa pathidi , daro tuna ayyaanata kessis . I ooneekko tuna ayyaanati erida gisho entta odisonna diggis .
41001035	Yesuusi wontta guura denddidi , asi baynna bessi bidi , yan Xoossaa woossis .
41001036	Simooninne iyara de7eyssati iya koyishe bidosona .
41001037	Entti iya demmidi , “ Asay ubbay nena koyees ” yaagidosona .
41001038	Yesuusi qassi entta , “ He heeran de7iya hara katamata yedhdhite . Taani yiday Wonggelaa odanaw gidiya gisho yankka qaala odanaw bessees ” yaagis .
41001039	Ayhude Woosa Keethatan qaala odishenne tuna ayyaanata kessishe , Galiila biitta ubban yuuyis .
41001040	Baroy oykkida issi uray Yesuusakko yidi , iya sinthan gulbbatidi , “ Neeni koykko tana geeshshanaw dandda7aasa ” yaagidi woossis .
41001041	Yesuusi iyaw qadhettidi , ba kushiya yeddidi iya bochchidi , “ Taani koyays , geeya ” yaagis .
41001042	Sohuwara baroy uraa yeddin uray paxis .
41001043	Yesuusi uraa minthi naagisidi kessi yeddis .
41001044	Yesuusi iya , “ Nena era , hayssa ooddeskka odoppa . Shin bada ne asatethaa kahine bessa . Neeni ha77i geeshshi gididayssa asaa erisanaw , Musey kiittida yarshshuwa yarshsha ” yaagis .
41001045	Shin uray bidi , guta ubban asa ubbaas odis . Hessa gisho , Yesuusi qoncce keyidi , katama gelanaw dandda7ibeenna . Shin asi baynnason gaxan de7is ; qassi asay ubba bessafe iyaakko yoosona .
41002001	Guutha gallasappe guye Yesuusi Qifirnahoome simmidi , son de7ees giya oday si7ettis .
41002002	Asaa keethay ekkonna ixxin , hari attoshin kareykka xuummana gakkanaw daro asay shiiqin , Yesuusi qaala tamaarssis .
41002003	Oyddu asati issi gundda uraa tookkidi iyaakko ehidosona .
41002004	Asay darida gisho uraa Yesuusakko shiishanaw enttaw dandda7ettona ixxin , Yesuusi de7iya ginaara keetha qaaridi , kaara qawuxidi uraa I zin77ida alggara duge yeddidi Yesuusa sinthan wodhisidosona .
41002005	Yesuusi entta ammanuwa be7idi , he gundda uraa , “ Ta na7aw , ne nagaray atto geetettis ” yaagis .
41002006	Higge asttamaaretappe he bessan uttida issoti issoti bantta wozanan ,
41002007	“ La ha uray hayssa mela iitabaa Xoossaa bolla ays odetii ? Xoossaa xalaalappe attin hari ooni nagara atto gaanaw dandda7ii ? ” gidi qoppidosona .
41002008	Entti bantta wozanan hessada qoppidayssa Yesuusi sohuwara ba ayyaanan eridi , enttako , “ Hinttee hintte wozanan ays hessada qoppeetii ?
41002009	Gundda uraa , ‘ Ne nagaray atto geetettis ’ geyssi mateyye ? Woykko , ‘ Dendda eqqada ne alggaa tookkada ba ’ geyssi matee ?
41002010	Shin taw , Asa Na7aas , sa7a bolla nagara atto gaanaw maati de7eyssa hintte erana mela ” gidi he gundda uraakko ,
41002011	“ Nena gays , dendda eqqada ne alggaa tookkada ne soo ba ” yaagis .
41002012	Uray ellesi denddi eqqidi , ba alggaa tookkidi asa ubbay be7ishin bis . Asay ubbay malaalettidi , “ Nuuni hayssa mela malaalisiyabaa be7i erokko ” yaagidi Xoossaa galatidosona .
41002013	Yesuusi qassi Galiila Abbaa doona simmi bidi , baakko yida asa ubbaa tamaarssis .
41002014	Yaara aadhdhishe , Ilfiyoosa na7aa Leewe geetetteyssi qaraxa qanxisiya bessan uttidayssa be7idi , “ Tana kaalla ” yaagis . Leewey denddi eqqidi iya kaallis .
41002015	Yesuusi kathi maanaw Leewe son uttis . Iya kaalliya asay daro gidiya gisho qaraxa qanxisiya daro asaynne nagaranchchoti iyaranne iya tamaaretara issife uttidosona .
41002016	Higge astamaare gidida issi issi Farisaaweti Yesuusi nagaranchchotaranne qaraxa qanxiseyssatara kathi mishin be7idi , “ I ays nagaranchchotaranne qaraxa qanxiseyssatara kathi mi ? ” yaagidi , iya tamaareta oychchidosona .
41002017	Yesuusi entti geyssa si7idi , “ Hargganchchotappe attin paxatas aakime koshshenna . Taani nagaranchchota xeeganaw yasippe attin xillota xeeganaw yabiikke ” yaagidi enttaw zaaris .
41002018	Xammaqiya Yohaannisa tamaaretinne Farisaaweti xoomosona . Issi issi asati Yesuusakko yidi , “ Yohaannisa tamaaretinne Farisaaweta tamaareti xoomosona , shin ne tamaareti ays xoomokkonaa ? ” yaagidosona .
41002019	Yesuusi enttako , “ Yaaganuwa yida asati machchiw ekkeyssi enttara de7ishin , xoomanaw dandda7onnaa ? Machchiw ekkeyssi enttara de7ishin , xoomanaw dandda7okkona .
41002020	Shin machchiw ekkeyssi entta matappe ekettana wodey yaana , entti he wode xoomana .
41002021	“ Ceega ma7o bolla ooratha wothidi sikkiya asi baawa . Wothidi sikkiko , oorathay ceega ma7uwa daakkees ; daakethaykka kaseyssafe darees .
41002022	Qassi mal77antto woyne ceega ogoron qoliya asi baawa . Shin qolikko , he woyney ogoruwa daakkees , bawukka gukkees , ogoroykka iitees . Shin mal77antto woyney ooratha ogoron qolettees ” yaagis .
41002023	Yesuusi issi Sambbaata gallas bangga gade giddora aadhdhishin , iya tamaareti iyara bishe bangga tiya shirkkidi moosona .
41002024	Farisaaweti Yesuusakko , “ Hekko , ne tamaareti Sambbaata gallas woga gidonnabaa ays oothonna ? ” yaagidosona .
41002025	Yesuusi enttako , “ Dawitey koshattidi , miyabaa koyida wode baara de7eyssatara oothidayssa nabbabibeekketii ?
41002026	Abiyaatari kahine halaqa gididi de7iya wode Dawitey Xoossa keethi gelidi , kahineta xalaali maanappe attin oonikka maanaw woga gidonnayssa Godaa sinthan wothida daabbuwa mis , baara de7eysstaskka immis ” yaagis .
41002027	Qassika Yesuusi enttako , “ Sambbaati asa na7a go77as medhettisippe attin asi Sambbaatas medhettibeenna .
41002028	Hessa gisho , Asa Na7ay , hari attoshin Sambbaataskka Goda ” yaagis .
41003001	Yesuusi Ayhude Woosa Keethi simmi gelis . Yan kushey gunddida issi uray de7ees .
41003002	Issi issi asay Yesuusa mootanaw koyidi , kushey gunddida uraa Sambbaata gallas I pathikonne aggiko be7anaw koyidi minthidi naagoosona .
41003003	Yesuusi kushey gunddida uraa , “ Dendda eqqada haa sinthe ya ” yaagis .
41003004	Hessafe guye , asaakko , “ Sambbaata gallas lo77obaa ootheyssi wogeyye iitabaa ootheyssi wogee ? Asa shemppo ashoyye woykko wodho ? ” yaagidi oychchis . Shin asay si77i gis .
41003005	Yesuusi hanqettidi , entta yuushshi aathi xeellidi , entti odin si7onnayssata gidiya gisho entta bolla daro azzanis . He addiyako , “ Ne kushiya piddi ootha ” yaagis . Uray piddi oothin iya kushey paxis .
41003006	Ellesidi Farisaaweti Ayhude Woosa Keethafe kare keyidi , Yesuusa waati wodhanekko maqettanaw Heroodisa baggatara issi soo shiiqidosona .
41003007	Yesuusi ba tamaaretara Galiila Abbaako bis . Galiilappenne Yihudappe yida daro asay iya kaallidosona .
41003008	Qassika Yerusalaameppe , Idumiyasappe , Yorddaanose Shaafa pinthafe , Xiroosa katamaappenne Sidoona katamaappe Yesuusi oothidabaa si7idi , daro asay iyaakko yidosona .
41003009	Asaa darotethaafe denddoyssan iya un77ethonna mela iya tamaareti wogolo iyaw giigisana mela kiittis .
41003010	Daro asaa I pathida gisho harggiya asa ubbay iya bochchanaw sugettoosona .
41003011	Tuna ayyaanay oykkida asati iya be7ida wode iya sinthan kunddidi , bantta qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa gidikkii ? ” yaagosona .
41003012	Yesuusi he tuna ayyaanati banatethaa ooddeskka Qonccisonna mela entta minthidi hanqettis .
41003013	Yesuusi deriya bolla keyidi , ba koyida asata baakko xeegis ; enttika iyaakko bidosona .
41003014	Entti baara daana melanne qaala tamaarssana mela tammanne nam77ata dooridi , entta , “ Hawaareta ” gidi sunthis .
41003015	Tuna ayyaanatakka kessana mela enttaw maata immis .
41003016	I doorida tammanne nam77ati hayssata : Phexiroosa yaagidi sunthida Simoona ,
41003017	Bo7anergges ( Dada daaniya asata ) yaagidi sunthidayssata , Zabdiyoosa nayta Yayqoobanne Yayqooba ishaa Yohaannisa ,
41003018	Inddiriyasa , Filphoosa , Bartolomiyoosa , Maatoosa , Toomasa , Ilfiyoosa na7a Yayqooba , Taadiyosa , ba biittaas mishettiya Simoonanne ,
41003019	Yesuusa aathi immida Asqoroota Yihuda .
41003020	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi soo bis . Qassi daro asay shiiqin , inne iya tamaareti hari attoshin kathi maanawukka dandda7ibookkona .
41003021	Asay iya , “ Gooyees ” giya gisho iya dabboti hessa si7idi iya ekkanaw bidosona .
41003022	Higge asttamaaretappe issoti issoti Yerusalaameppe yidi , “ Iya bolla Bi7elzebuuli de7ees ” , I , “ Xalahey wolqqan tuna ayyaanata kessees ” yaagidi odettidosona .
41003023	Yesuusi asaa baakko xeegidi leemiso odis . “ Xalahey Xalahe waati kessanaw dandda7ii ?
41003024	Issi kawotethay ba giddon shaakettiko he kawotethay eqqanaw dandda7enna .
41003025	Hessadakka , issi keetha asay bantta giddon shaakettiko dhayanaappe attin daanaw dandda7okkona .
41003026	Hiza , Xalahey baara kacettidi shaakettiko dhayoppe attin daanaw dandda7enna .
41003027	“ Shin koyrottidi wolqqaama uraa qachchonna de7ishe iya keetha gelidi , iya miishiya bonqanaw dandda7iya asi baawa . Qachchi simmidi iya keetha bonqanaw dandda7ees .
41003028	“ Taani hinttew tuma odays ; Xoossay asa naytas nagara ubbaanne entti cayaa cashshe ubbaa atto gaana .
41003029	Shin Geeshsha Ayyaana bolla iitabaa odettiya ooddeskka merinaa nagara gidanaappe attin Xoossay ubbarakka iya maarenna ” yaagis .
41003030	Yesuusi hessa giday , issi issi asati , “ Iya bolla tuna ayyaanay de7ees ” yaagida gishossa .
41003031	Iya aayyaanne iya ishati yidi karen eqqidi , iyaakko ase kiittidi iya xeegidosona .
41003032	Iya matan uttida daro asati , “ Hekko , ne aayeranne ne ishatara karen eqqidi nena koyoosona ” yaagidosona .
41003033	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ta aayyaa oonee ? Qassi ta ishati oonantee ? ” yaagis .
41003034	Ba matan uttida asa yuushshi aathi xeellidi , “ Hekko , ta aayyaaanne ta ishati hayssata .
41003035	Xoossay sheniya oothiya ubbay ta isha , ta michchonne ta aayo ” yaagis .
41004001	Yesuusi zaaridi Galiila Abbaa matan tamaarssees . Daro asay iya yuushuwan shiiqin , abban de7iya wogoluwa giddo gelidi uttis , asa ubbay Abbaa matan de7ees .
41004002	I entta darobaa leemison tamaarssis . Tamaarssishe hayssada yaagis :
41004003	“ Si7ite ! Issi uray zerethi zeranaw keyis .
41004004	I zerishin , issi issi zerethay oge gaxan wodhdhis ; kafoti yidi midosona .
41004005	Issi issi zerethay garssan shaalloy de7iya biitta bolla wodhdhis . Daro biitti baynna gisho he zerethay ellesidi dolis .
41004006	Shin awi keyida wode shullis . Loythidi xapho yeddiboonna gisho ellesi melis .
41004007	Issi issi zerethay aguntha giddon wodhdhis . Dolidayssa agunthay diccidi cuullida gisho ayfe ayfonna attis .
41004008	Issi issi zerethay aradda biittan wodhdhidi dolis . Diccidi issoy hasttama , issoy usuppun tamma issoy xeeta ayfis ” yaagis .
41004009	“ Si7iya haythi de7iya oonikka si7o ” yaagis .
41004010	Yesuusi odidayssa si7ida issi issi asatinne tammanne nam77u tamaareti Yesuusi barkka de7ishin , iyaakko shiiqidi he leemisuwa birshshethaa oychchidosona .
41004011	Yesuusi enttako hayssada yaagis : “ Hinttew Xoossaa kawotethaa xuuraa eroy imettis . Shin haratas kawotethaafe karen de7eyssatas ubbabay leemison odettees .
41004012	Gaasoykka , ‘ Entti xeellosona , shin demmokona . Si7oosona , shin akeekokkona . Entti demmiyakkonne akeekiyakko , Xoossaakko simmana ikka entta maaranashin ’ ”
41004013	Yesuusi enttako , “ Ha leemisoy hinttew gelennee ? Yaatin , leemiso ubbaa hintte waati akeekanee ?
41004014	Zereyssi Xoossaa qaala zerees .
41004015	Qaalay zerettiya wode oge gaxan wodhdhidayssati qaala si7idayssata . Shin Xalahey sohuwara yidi , entta wozanan zerettida qaala maxi digees .
41004016	Hessadakka , garssan shaalloy de7iya biittan zerettidayssi qaala si7idi , ellesidi ufayssan ekkeyssa .
41004017	Shin enttaw mino xaphoy baynna gisho ha77issafe attin gam77okona . Guutha wodeppe guye qaala gaason waayey woykko goodi gakkiya wode ellesidi dhubettoosona .
41004018	Aguntha giddon zerettidayssi qaala si7eyssata .
41004019	Shin ha sa7a de7uwas hirggoy , duretethaa dosoynne harabaa amotteyssi iya wozanan gelidi qaala cuulliya gisho ayfe ayfonna attis .
41004020	Shin aradda biittan zerettidayssati qaala si7idi ekkeyssata . Entti issoy hasttama , issoy usuppun tamma issoy xeeta ayfis ” yaagis .
41004021	Yesuusi gujjidi , “ Xomppe ekkidi , daachchofe woykko alggafe garssan wothiya asi de7ii ? Dhoqqa bessan wotheneyye ?
41004022	Hiza , qosettidabay ubbay qoncce keyana ; geemmidabay ubbay erettonna attenna .
41004023	Si7iya haythi de7iya oonikka si7o ” yaagis .
41004024	Qassi enttako , “ Hintte si7iyabaa akeekidi si7ite ! Xoossaa qaala hintte si7eyssa mela I hinttew akeeka immana . Ubbaka hinttew darssidi immana .
41004025	Issibay de7iya uraas gujji imettana , baynnaysafe hari attoshin , iyaw de7iya he guuthiyaka ekettana ” yaagis .
41004026	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Xoossaa kawotethay ba gaden zerethi zeriya asa mela .
41004027	He uray qamma dhiskkees ; wontta denddees . I ba huu7en waaniyakko eronna de7ishin he zerethay doleesinne diccees .
41004028	Biittay kathi barkka immees . Koyro dolidi diccees , kaallidi ayfanaw gambbuxees , wurssethan kumetha ayfe ayfees .
41004029	Shin kathay gakkiya wode uray sohuwara baacara geli aggees ” yaagis .
41004030	Yesuusi , “ Nuuni Xoossaa kawotethaa ay daanees gaanee ? Woykko aybira leemisanee ?
41004031	Xoossaa kawotethay ayfe guutha mithi daanees . He mithaa ayfiyaa zeriya wode sa7an de7iya mitha ayfe ubbaafe guuxees .
41004032	Zerin dolidi atakiltte ubbaafe gitatees ; daro daashshi daayees . Kafoti iya tashiya bolla keexidi uttana gakkanaw dayees ” yaagis .
41004033	Yesuusi hayssa mela daro leemison asay akeekanaw dandda7eyssa mela qaala odis .
41004034	Asaas leemisoy baynna odenna . Shin Yesuusi ba tamaareta xalaalara de7iya wode enttaw ubbabaa birshshidi odis .
41004035	He gallas sa7ay omarssin , Yesuusi ba tamaaretakko , “ Abbaafe hefinthi pinnoos ” yaagis .
41004036	Iya tamaareti daro asa yeggi aggidi , Yesuusi kase geli uttida wogoluwan gelidi Yesuusa banttara efidosona . Hara wogolotikka yan de7oosona .
41004037	Wolqqaama gotey denddidi , hobbey wogoluwa shocin , kumana gakkanaw wogoluwa giddo haathi gelis .
41004038	He wode Yesuusi wogoluwan guye baggara borkkottidi dhiskkis . Iya tamaareti iya denthidi , “ Asttamaariyaw , nuuni dhayaa wode ne si77i gada xeellay ? ” yaagidosona .
41004039	Yaatin , I barkkidi gotiya , “ Si7i ga ” gidi , abbaaka , “ Woppu ga ” gis . Goteykka si77i gin ubbabay woppu gis .
41004040	Yesuusi ba tamaaretakko , “ Ays hayssada babbetii ? Hinttew ammanoy waanidi dhayide ? ” yaagis .
41004041	Entti daro babbidi bantta giddon , “ Hayssi hari attoshin , goteynne abbay kiitetteyssi oonee ? ” yaagidosona .
41005001	Yesuusinne iya tamaareti abbaa pinnidi , Gerggesoone giya biittaa gakkidosona .
41005002	Yesuusi wogoluwappe wodhdhiya wode tuna ayyaanay oykkida issi uray duufoppe keyidi iyara gahettis .
41005003	He uray duufuwan aqi pee7idi de7ees . Iya oonikka santhalaatan qachchanaw dandda7enna .
41005004	I daro toho duthaninne santhalaatan qashettidi de7ees . Shin santhalaata duuserethees , duthaa mentherethees . Iya teqqanaw dandda7iya oonikka baawa .
41005005	I qammanne gallas he duufuwaninne dere bolla waasses , ba bollaaka shuchchan gaarees .
41005006	Yesuusa haahon be7ida wode woxxi bidi iya sinthan gulbbatis .
41005007	He uray ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa Na7aw Yesuusa , nenanne tana aybe gathey ? Tana dhayssona mela taani nena Xoossaa sunthan woossays ” yaagis .
41005008	I hessa giday Yesuusi iya , “ La ha tuna ayyaanaw , ha addiyafe keya ” yaagida gishossa .
41005009	Yesuusi iyaakko , “ Ne sunthay oonee ? ” yaagidi oychchis . I , “ Nuuni daro gidiya gisho ta sunthay Leegiyona ” yaagis .
41005010	Tuna ayyaanati bantana he biittaafe kessi yeddonna mela Yesuusa minthidi woossidosona .
41005011	He deriya bolla daro guduntho wudey hamuttees .
41005012	Tuna ayyaanati Yesuusakko , “ Nuna hini guduntho wudiyakko yeddarkki , enttan bidi geloos ” yaagidi woossidosona .
41005013	Yesuusi enttako , “ Biite ” yaagis . Yaatin tuna ayyaanati addiyafe keyidi gudunthotan gelidosona . Nam77u mukulu gidiya guduntho wudey aafo doonara dirggidi bidi abban gelidi mitettidosona .
41005014	Guduntho wudiya heemmeyssati baqati bidi hanidabaa katamaaninne gaxariyan odidosona . Yaatin asay hanidabaa be7anaw keyidosona .
41005015	Asay Yesuusakko yaa wode tuna ayyaanan oykettida uraa be7idosona . I ba wozanaakko simmidi , ma7o ma77idi , yan uttidayssa be7ida wode ubbay yayyidosona .
41005016	Hessa be7ida asati tuna ayyaanati oykkida uraa bollanne gudunthota bolla hanidabaa ubbaa asaas odidosona .
41005017	Hessa gisho , asay bantta biittaafe Yesuusi baana mela woossidosona .
41005018	Yesuusi wogoluwan geliya wode kase tuna ayyaanay oykkidi yeddida uray , Yesuusa kaallanaw iya woossis .
41005019	Shin Yesuusi ixxidi iyaakko , “ Ne soo simmada , Goday new ay mela gitabaa oothidakkonne new ay mela keehidakko ne soo asaas oda ” yaagis .
41005020	Uray bidi Tammu Katamaa giyason yuuyidi , Yesuusi baw ay mela gitabaa oothidaakko odis . I odidayssa si7ida asa ubbay malaalettidosona .
41005021	Yesuusi simmidi , wogoluwan gelidi , abbaa pinnidaappe guye daro asay abbaa gaxan iya yuushuwan shiiqidosona .
41005022	Iyaroosa giya Ayhude Woosa Keetha halaqatappe issoy , Yesuusa be7ida wode iyaakko yidi iya tohuwa bolla
41005023	kunddidi , “ Ta na7iya harggada hayqqana hanawsu . Iya paxada de7ana mela yada ne kushiya I bolla wotharkkii ” yaagidi Yesuusa minthidi woossis .
41005024	Yesuusi Iyaroosara bis . I bishin daro asay iya kaallidi un77ethidosona .
41005025	Tammanne nam77u laythi I bollaafe suuthi goggiya issi maccasiya de7awusu .
41005026	Daro aakimeti iyo aakimidosona , shin iya paxa kaa7ettasu . Iya ba miishiya ubbaa wurssinkka iw haa iitisppe attin aykkoka maaddibeenna .
41005027	He maccasiya Yesuusabaa si7ada , asaa kanthada Yesuusa guyera yada iya ma7uwa bochchasu .
41005028	Iya , “ Taani hari attoshin iya ma7uwa bochchiyakko paxana ” gada qoppasu .
41005029	Iippe goggiya suuthay sohuwara eqi aggis . Iya ba waayappe paxidayssa ba asatethan erasu .
41005030	Yesuusi baappe wolqqi keyidayssa ba huu7en eridi , ellesidi daro asa giddon guye simmidi , “ Ta ma7uwa bochchiday oonee ? ” yaagis .
41005031	Iya tamaareti , “ Asay nena sugeyssa be7ashe , ‘ Woygada tana oone bochchiday yaagay ? ’ ” yaagidosona .
41005032	Yesuusi hessa ooni oothidaakko be7anaw yuushshi aathi xeellis .
41005033	Shin maccasiya baw hanidabaa erada , yashshan kokkorashe yada Yesuusa sinthan gufannasu ; qassi hanidabaa ubbaa tumaa iyaw odasu .
41005034	Yaanin , Yesuusi iikko , “ Ta naatte , nena ne ammanoy pathis , saron ba , ne waayappeka paxa ” yaagis .
41005035	Yesuusi buroo hessa odishin , Ayhude Woosa Keetha halaqaa sooppe kiitettida asati yidi , “ Ne na7iya hayqqasu , asttamaariya ays daaburissay ? ” yaagidosona .
41005036	Shin Yesuusi entti geyssa si7idi , Ayhude Woosa Keetha halaqaakko , “ Ammano xalaala ammanappe attin babbofa ” yaagis .
41005037	Yesuusi Phexiroosappe , Yayqoobappenne Yayqooba ishaa Yohaannisappe hari oonikka bana kaallonna mela diggis .
41005038	Entti Ayhude Woosa Keetha halaqaa soo gakkiya wode Yesuusi asay kaha dhayidi yeekkeyssanne zeeleleyssa be7is .
41005039	Gelidi asaakko , “ Ays kaha dhayidi yeekketii ? Na7iya dhiskkasuppe attin hayqqabuukku ” yaagis .
41005040	Asay iya bolla miiccis . Shin asa ubbaa kare kessidi , na7ee aawa , aayyiwunne heedzu tamaareta baara ekkidi na7iya de7iyasuwa gelis .
41005041	Yesuusi na7ee kushiya oykkidi , “ Xaalita , quumi ” ( Guutha naatte , nena gays dendda ) yaagis .
41005042	Na7iya sohuwara dendda eqqada hamuttasu . Iya tammanne nam77u laytha na7a . Hessan asay daro malaalettidosona .
41005043	Yesuusi hessa entti ooddeskka odonna mela entta minthi kiittis . Entti iw miyabaa immana mela odis .
41006001	Yesuusi yaappe keyidi , ba tamaareta kaalethidi , ba katama Naazirete bis .
41006002	Sambbaata gallas Ayhude Woosa Keethan tamaarsso oykkis . I tamaarsseyssa si7ida daro asay malaalettidi , “ Hayssi ha ubbaa awuppe demmide ? Ha cinccatethaa I awuppe ekkidee ? Ha malaatata oothiya maata I awuppe demmide ?
41006003	Hayssi anaaxiya gidennee ? Mayraami na7a , Yayqooba , Yoosa , Yihudanne Simoona ishaa gidenneyye ? Iya michcheti nuura hayssan de7okkonayye ? ” yaagidi , I giyabaa ekkonna ixxidosona .
41006004	Yesuusi he asaakko , “ Nabey ba biittan , ba dabbotaninne ba soo asan bonchchettennafe attin harata matan bonchchettees ” yaagis .
41006005	I he bessan ba kushiya guutha asaa bolla wothidi pathidayssafe attin hara malaatata oothanaw dandda7ibeenna .
41006006	Asay ammaniboonna gisho daro malaalettis . Hessafe guye , Yesuusi he heeran de7iya gutatan asaa tamaarssees .
41006007	Yesuusi tammanne nam77u tamaareta baakko xeegidi , nam77aa nam77aa gathidi kiittis . Enttaw tuna ayyaanata kessiya wolqqaa immis .
41006008	Entta , “ Oge xam77afe attin kathi , karxiita , hintte kiisen miishe aybibaakka oykkofite .
41006009	Hintte tohuwan caamma aathite , shin nam77u afila oykkofite ” yaagis .
41006010	Qassika , “ Hinttena asi mokkida soo awunkka gidin he bessaa yeddidi baana gakkanaw he keethan gam77ite .
41006011	Hinttena asi mokkonnasuwa woykko hintte odiyabaa si7onnasuwa awun gidikkoka , he biittan de7iya asaas hessi naagiso markka gidana mela he bessaafe keyishe , hintte tohuwappe baana pittite ” yaagis .
41006012	Tammanne nam77u tamaareti bidi , asay bantta nagaraappe simmanaada qaala odidosona .
41006013	Entti asappe daro tuna Ayyaanata kessidosona . Daro hargganchchota zayte tiyidi pathidosona .
41006014	Yesuusa sunthay ubba bessan keyida gisho Kawoy Heroodisi iyabaa si7is . Issi issi asay , “ Xammaqiya Yohaannisi hayqoppe denddis , hessa gisho ha malaatata oothey iya ” yaagidosona .
41006015	Baggati , “ Hayssi Eliyaasa gidennee ? ” yaagidosona . Harati qassi , “ Hayssi beni wode nabetapp issuwa gidonna aggenna ” yaagidosona .
41006016	Shin Heroodisi hessa si7ida wode “ Hayssi taani qoodhiya qanxisida Xammaqiya Yohaannisa gidennee ? I hayqoppe denddis ” yaagis .
41006017	Heroodisi ba ishaa Filphoosa machchiw Heroodiyada ekkida gisho I gaason Yohaannisa oythidi qashisis .
41006018	Yohaannisi Heroodisa , “ Neeni ne ishaa machchiw ekkanaw bessenna ” yaagis .
41006019	Heroodiyada Yohaannisa ba ulon morkkada iya wodhisanaw koyasu , shin dandda7abukku .
41006020	Yohaannisi xillonne geeshsha asi gididayssa Heroodisi erida gisho iyaw babbidi loythi naagisees . Heroodisi Yohaannisi giyabaa si7anaw dosikkoka I giyabaa si7iya wode daro dagammees .
41006021	Heroodisi ba yelettida gallasa bonchchanaw deriya haareyssatas , shaalaqatasinne Galiilan de7iya gita asaas imato giigisis . Hessi Heroodiyadas injje gallas gidis .
41006022	Heroodiyada na7iya imathay mokettiya bessaa gela durada , Heroodisanne iya imathata ufayssasu . Kawoy na7iw , “ Ne koyabaa aybaa gidikkoka tana oychcha , taani new immana ” yaagis .
41006023	Qassi iw caaqqidi , “ Neeni oychchiyabaa aybaa gidikkoka , taani new immana . Hari attoshin , ta kawotethaa baggaa gidikkoka taani new immana ” yaagis .
41006024	Na7iya kare keyada ba aayeekko , “ Ay imma go ? ” gada oychchasu . I aayyaa , “ Xammaqiya Yohaannisa huu7iya imma ga ” yaagasu .
41006025	Na7iya ellasada kawuwakko bada , “ Xammaqiya Yohaannisa huu7iya saanen wothada ha77i taw immana mela koyays ” yaagasu .
41006026	Yaanin Kawoy daro qiirottis , shin ba imathata gisho iw caaqqida ba caaquwa menthanaw koyibeenna .
41006027	Hessa gisho , ellesidi naageyssa Yohaannisa huu7iya ehana mela kiittis . Naageyssi qasho keethi bidi Yohaannisa qoodhiya qanxis .
41006028	He qanxettida huu7iya saanen wothi ehidi na7ees immis . Na7iya qassi ba aayes immasu .
41006029	Yohaannisa tamaareti hessa si7ida wode bidi iya ahaa ekki efidi moogidosona .
41006030	Tammanne nam77u hawaareti simmi yidi entti oothidabaanne tamaarssidabaa ubbaa Yesuusas odidosona .
