42004021	I , “ Hayssi hintte haythan hintte si7iya ha maxaafaa qaalay hachchi polettis ” yaagis .
42004022	Ubbay iyabaa darssidi odettoosona . Qassi iya doonappe keyaa aadho keehatethan kumida qaalan malaalettishe , “ Hayssi Yoosefa na7aa gidenneyye ? ” yaagidosona .
42004023	I , “ ‘ Neno dhale aawaw nena ashsha , Qifirnahoomen ne oothidabaa nu si77oyssa qassi hayssan ne kataman ootha ’ yaagiya leemisuwan hintte tana gaanayssas sidhey baawa ” yaagis .
42004024	Qassi , “ Tuma odays ; nabey ba yelettida biittan bonchchettena .
42004025	“ Ta hinttew tuma odays ; saloy heedzu laythinne bagga gorddettin mino koshi biitta ubban de7iya Eliyaasa wode daro am77eti Isra7eelen de7oosona .
42004026	Eliyaasi enttafe issinnekokka kiitettibeenna . Shin Sarapttan de7iya am77eeko kiitettis .
42004027	Nabiya Elssa7e wode Isra7eelen daro baro hargganchchoti de7oosona . Shin Soore uraa Ni7imaaneppe attin oonikka paxibeenna ” yaagis .
42004028	Ayhude Woosa Keethan de7iya asa ubbay hessa si7ida wode daro yilotidosona .
42004029	Bantta uttida bessaafe denddidi zuma bolla keexettida katamaappe gaxa kessidi sugi yeddanaw aafo doona efidosona .
42004030	Shin I entta giddora kanthidi aadhdhis .
42004031	Yaappe Galiila biittan de7iya Qifirnahoome katamaa bis . Yan Sambbaata gallas asaa tamaarssis .
42004032	I tamaarssey maatara gidiya gisho ubbay iya timirttiyan malaalettidosona .
42004033	Ayhude Woosa Keethan tuna ayyaanay oykkida uray de7ees .
42004034	I , “ Naazirete Yesuusa nuna ays waaysay nuuppe haakka ; neeni yiday nuna dhayssanaaseyye ? Neeni ooneekko taani erays . Neeni Xoossaafe yida Geeshsha ” yaagidi waassis .
42004035	Yesuusi tuna ayyaanaakko , “ Si7i gada ha uraappe keya ” yaagidi hanqis . Tuna ayyaanay uraa asaa ubbaa sinthan holi yeggidi aykkoka qohonna yeddidi keyis .
42004036	Asa ubbay malaalettidosona . Wolikko , “ Hanos , hayssi aybi timirtte ? Tuna ayyaanata maataninne wolqqan kiittees ; enttika keyosona ” yaagidosona .
42004037	Iya sunthay heera ubban keyis .
42004038	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi Ayhude Woosa Keethafe keyidi Simoona soo gelis . Simoona machche aayyaa mino qoxo misha harggen sakettasu . Iyo pathana mela Yesuusa woossidosona .
42004039	I hiixaakko shiiqi hokkidi I harggiya hanqis . Mishay aggin ellesa denddada entta mokkasu .
42004040	Away wullana hanishin dumma dumma harggiyan oykettida asaa iyaakko ehidosona . I issuwa issuwa bolla ba kushiya wothidi pathis .
42004041	Tuna ayyaanati qassi , “ Neeni , Xoossaa na7aa ” gidi waassishe daro asaappe keyidosona . Shin I enttana hanqis . I Kiristtoosa gideyssa entti eriya gisho issibaakka odettonna mela diggis .
42004042	Buroo wonttiya wode Yesuusi issi geema bessi bis . Asay koyishe I de7iya bessaa yidosona . Enttafe I shaakettidi boonna mela butetidosona .
42004043	Shin I , “ Taani hara katamata bada Xoossaa kawotethaa Wonggelaa markkattanaw bessees . Ta kiitettiday hessassa ” yaagis .
42004044	Yihuda biittan de7iya Ayhude Woosa Keethan sabbakis .
42005001	Issi gallas Yesuusi Gensareexe Abbaa matan eqqidashin daro asay iya yuushuwa un77ethidi , I tamaarssiya Xoossaa qaala si7oosona .
42005002	Yan haatha gaxan de7iya nam77u wogolota be7is . Molo oykkiya asati wogolotappe wodhdhidi bantta gitiya meeccosona .
42005003	He wogolotappe Simoonayssan gelidi biittaafe guuthi giddo shiishana mela oychchis . Yaatidi , he wogoluwa bolla uttidi asaa tamaarssis .
42005004	Ba tamaarssuwa onggidaappe guye Simoonakko , “ Gede ciimmuwako shiishada moluwa oykkanaw hintte gitiya yeggite ” yaagis .
42005005	Simooni zaaridi , “ Asttamaariyaw , qamma kumethaa daaburishe aqidi aykkoka oykkibookko , shin ne giikko gitiya yeggana ” yaagis .
42005006	Entti gitiya yeggida wode gitey daakettana gakkanaw daro molo oykkidosona .
42005007	Hara wogoluwan de7iya bantta laggeti yidi , banttana maaddana mela wuttidi xeegidosona . Entti yidi nam77u wogolota , haathan mitettana gakkanaw molon kunthidosona .
42005008	Simoon Phexiroosi hessa be7ida wode Yesuusa sinthan kunddidi , “ Godaw , taani nagaranchcho asi gidiya gisho taappe shaaketta ” yaagis .
42005009	Hessa I giday inne iyara de7eyssati oykkida moluwa darotethan malaalettida gishossa .
42005010	Qassi Simoona lagge gidida Zabdiyoosa nayti Yayqoobaranne Yohaannisara malaalettidosona . Yesuusi Simoonakko , “ Babbofa ! Hizappe neeni ase oykkiya asi gidana ” yaagis .
42005011	Entti wogolota gaxa shiishidaappe guye ubbaa aggidi Yesuusa kaallidosona .
42005012	Yesuusi katamatappe issuwan de7ishin issi baro harggen oykettida asi he kataman de7ees . He uray Yesuusa be7idi iya sinthan gufannidi , “ Godaw , ne shene gidikko tana geeshshanaw dandda7aasa ” gidi woossis .
42005013	Yesuusi ba kushiya yeddi bochchidi , “ Ee , ta shene ; geeya ” yaagis . Iira baro harggey uraappe kichchis .
42005014	Yesuusi , “ Hayssa ooddeskka odoppa , shin bada nenatethaa Ayhude kahiniya bessa . Ne geeyidayssas markka gidana mela Musey kiittida yarshshuwa yarshsha ” gidi kiittis .
42005015	Gidoshin , iya sunthay kaseppe aadhdhidi dalggishe bis . Daro asay I odiyabaa si7anawunne bantta harggiyafe paxanaw yoosona .
42005016	Shin Yesuusi daro wode geema bessi bidi woossees .
42005017	Issi gallas Yesuusi tamaarssishin Galiilappenne Yihuda heera ubbaafe qassi Yerusalaameppekka yida Farisaawetinne higge asttamaareti yan uttidosona . Asaa pathiya Godaa wolqqayka iyara de7ees .
42005018	He wode asay issi gundda asi halara tookkidi ehidosona . Soo gelssidi iya sinthan wothanaw qoppidosona .
42005019	Shin asaa darotethaafe denddoyssan soo gelssanaw xoonettidi keethaa bolla keyidi , kaara qawuxidi , hargganchchuwa halara asaa shaakkidi Yesuusa sinthan yeggidosona .
42005020	Yesuusi entta ammanuwa be7idi , “ La addiyaw , ne nagaray qushettis ” yaagis .
42005021	Higge asttamaaretinne Farisaaweti , “ Hayssi Xoossaa bolla yaagidi odettey oonee ? Issi Xoossaafe attin hari nagara quchchanaw dandda7ey oonee ? ” yaagidi qoppidosona .
42005022	Yesuusi entta qofaa erida gisho enttako , “ Hintte wozanan hessatho ays qoppeetii ?
42005023	‘ Ne nagaray qushettis geyssafenne denddada ba geyssafe awussi kawuyii ? ’
42005024	Shin ta hessa giday Asa Na7ay sa7a bolla nagara quchchanaw maati de7eyssa hintte erana melassa . ” Hessafe kaallidi , gundda uraakko , “ Dendda ; ne alggaa tookkada ne soo ba ” yaagis .
42005025	I ellesi denddidi entta sinthan eqqis ; I tookettidi yida alggaa tookkidi Xoossaa galatishe ba soo bis .
42005026	He wode ubbayka malaalettidosona . Xoossaa galatishe , “ Hachchi gita malaata be7ida ” yaagidi yashettidosona .
42005027	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi yaappe keyidi bis . Leewe geetettiya issi qaraxa qanxiseyssi qaraxa qanxisiya bessan uttidayssa be7idi , “ Tana kaalla ” yaagis .
42005028	I ubbabaa aggi denddidi iya kaallis .
42005029	He Leewey ba son gita gibira giigisis . Daro qaraxa qanxiseyssatinne hara asati kathaa maanaw uttidosona .
42005030	Farisaawetinne higge asttamaareti , “ Qaraxa qanxeyssataranne nagaranchchotara ays meetinne uyeetii ? ” yaagidi Yesuusa tamaareta bolla zuuzummidosona .
42005031	Yesuusi enttako , “ Hargganchchotassafe attin paxatas aakime koshshenna .
42005032	Taani nagaranchchota maarotaakko zaaranaassafe attin geeshshata xeeganaw yabiikke ” yaagidi zaaris .
42005033	Entti Yesuusakko , “ Yohaannisa tamaareti daro wode xoomosona , woossosona ; qassi Farisaaweta tamaaretikka hessatho oothoosona . Shin neyssati ubba wode moosonanne uyoosona ” yaagidosona .
42005034	Yesuusi enttako , “ Mushuray enttara de7ishin xeegettida asay xoomana mela oothanaw dandda7etii ?
42005035	Shin mushuray enttafe shaakettana gallasay yaana , he wode entti xoomana . ”
42005036	Qassi yaagidi leemiso odis ; “ Ooratha ma7oppe peedhidi gal77a ma7o bolla sikkey oonikka baawa . Hessatho oothiko ooratha ma7uwa peedhees , oorathay gal77aas giigenna .
42005037	Mal77antto woyniya gal77a ogoron qoliya oonikka baawa . Hessa oothiko , ooratha woyney gal77a ogoruwa dhusees ; woyney gukkees ogoroykka maaddonabaa gidees .
42005038	Hessa gisho , ooratha woyney ooratha ogoron qolettanaw bessees .
42005039	Hiza , caalay lo77o giya gisho caala woyne uyi simmidi mal77antto koyey oonikka baawa ” yaagis .
42006001	Issi Sambbaata gallas Yesuusi gistte gade giddora aadhdhees . Yesuusa tamaareti tiya bangga duuthidi bantta kushen shirkkidi moosona .
42006002	Shin Farisaaweta giddofe issoti issoti , “ Sambbaata gallas oothanaw bessonnabaa ays ootheetii ? ” yaagidosona .
42006003	Yesuusi enttako zaaridi , “ Dawitey koshattida wode baara de7eyssatara issife oothoyssa nabbabibeekketii ?
42006004	Xoossa Keethi gelidi Ayhude kahineta xalaalas bessiya daabbuwa mis ; baara de7eyssataskka immis ” yaagis .
42006005	Qassi Yesuusi , “ Asa Na7ay Sambbaata Goda ” yaagis .
42006006	Hara Sambbaata gallas Yesuusi Ayhude Woosa Keethi gelidi tamaarssees . He bessan ushachcha kushey gunddida issi asi de7ees .
42006007	Higge asttamaaretinne Farisaaweti iya mootanaw gaaso koyidi Sambbaata gallas pathiko be7ana gidi naagoosona .
42006008	Shin Yesuusi entta qofaa eridi kushey gunddida uraakko , “ Denddada asaa gidduwan eqqa ” yaagis . Uraykka denddi eqqis .
42006009	Yesuusi , “ Ane ta hinttena issibaa oychchays ; Sambbaata gallas oothanaw bessey lo77obayeyye iitabaye ? Shemppo ashoyye woykko dhaysso ? ” yaagis .
42006010	Qassi Yesuusi iya yuushuwan de7iya asaa yuushshi xeellidi uraakko , “ Ne kushiya piddi ootha ” yaagis . Uraykka I gidayssada oothin kushey paxis .
42006011	Shin higge asttamaaretinne Farisaaweti daro yilotidosona . Yesuusa bolla ay oothinoo gidi bantta giddon maqettidosona .
42006012	He wode gallasatappe issuwan Yesuusi woossanaw deriya bolla keyis . Qamma kumethaa Xoossaa woossishe aqis .
42006013	Wonttethe ba tamaareta xeegidi entta giddofe tammanne nam77ata dooridi , enttana , “ Hawaareta ” gidi sunthis .
42006014	Enttika , Phexiroosa gidi sunthida Simoona , iya ishaa Inddiriyasa , Yayqooba , Yohaannisa , Filphoosa , Bartolomiyoosa ,
42006015	Maatoosa , Toomasa , Ilfiyoosa na7aa Yayqooba , ba biittaas mishettiya Simoona ,
42006016	Yayqooba na7aa Yihudanne Yesuusa aathi immida Asqoroota Yihuda .
42006017	Yesuusi enttara issife deriyappe wodhdhidi denbba bessan eqqis . Iya tamaaretappe daroti he bessan de7oosona Yihuda biitta ubbaafe Yerusalaameppe , Xiroosappenne Sidoona abbaa gaxappe yida daro asay de7ees .
42006018	Entti yiday I tamaarssiyabaa si7anawunne bantta harggiyafe paxanaassa . Tuna ayyaanan waayettiya asatikka paxidosona .
42006019	Wolqqay iyappe keyidi asa ubbaa pathiya gisho asay iya bochchanaw koyoosona .
42006020	Ba tamaaretakko xeellidi hayssada yaagis : “ Hinttenoo , manqoto , hintte anjjettidayssata ; Xoossaa kawotethay hinttessa .
42006021	Hintte ha77i koshatteyssati anjjettidayssata , hintte kallana . Hintte ha77i yeekkeyssati anjjettidayssata hintte miicana .
42006022	Asay hinttena Asa Na7aa gisho ixxiya wode hinttena hiliya wode hinttena entti toochchiya wodenne , iita sunthi entti hinttew immiya wode hintte anjjettidayssata .
42006023	“ Hekko , hintte woytoy salon gita gidiya gisho he wode ufayssan guppite . Ays giikko , beni entta aawati nabeta bolla hessada oothidosona . ”
42006024	“ Shin dureto hinttena ayye ; hintte ha77i lo77o duussaa ekkideta .
42006025	Ha77i kallidayssato hinttena ayye ; hintte koshattana . Ha77i miiceyssato hinttenoshsho hintte kayottananne yeekkana .
42006026	Asi ubbay hintte lo77otethaa xalaala odiya wode hinttena ayye . Entta aawati beni worddanchcho nabeta bolla hessada oothidosona .
42006027	“ Shin tana si7iya hinttes ta odays ; hintte morkketa siiqite ; hinttena ixxeyssatas lo77obaa oothite .
42006028	Hinttena qanggeyssata anjjite , hinttena naaqqeyssatas woossite .
42006029	Issi bagga shakalaa baqqeyssas hankko baggaaka bessa . Ne laxana ekkana geyssas ne shaamiziyakka gujjada imma .
42006030	Nena woossiya ubbaas imma ; neeppe ekkida oonakka zaaro gada oychchofa .
42006031	Asay hinttew oothana mela hintte koyabaa ubbaa hintteka asaas oothite .
42006032	“ Hintte hinttena dosiya asata xalaala dosikko , ay galati hinttew de7ii ? Hari attoshin , nagaranchchotikka banttana siiqeyssata siiqoosona .
42006033	Hinttew lo77obaa ootheyssata xalaalas lo77obaa oothiko hinttew ay galati de7ii ? Nagaranchchotikka hessada oothoosona .
42006034	Tal77e zaarana asa xalaalas hintte tal77iko ay dumma galatetteetii ? Nagaranchchotikka guye zaarana asi be7idi tal77osona . ”
42006035	“ Shin hintte morkketa siiqite ; enttaw lo77obaa oothite . Guye ekkanaw qopponna tal77ite . Hessan hintte ekkana woytoy gita gidana . Hintte Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa nayta gidana . I bana galatonnayssatasinne iitatas keeha .
42006036	Hintte aaway keeha gidoyssada hintteka keeha gidite .
42006037	“ Asa bolla pirddofite ; hintte bolla pirddettenna . Hintte borettonna mela oonakka boroppite . Atto giite ; Xoossay hinttew atto gaana .
42006038	Immite ; hinttew imettana . Hintte makkidaban hinttew zaari makettana , ubbarakka lo77o makkiyaban baqqidi , suuddi kunthidi , laalettana gakkanaw hinttew maketi imettana ” yaagis .
42006039	Qassika Yesuusi yaagidi enttaw leemiso odis ; “ Qooqey qooqe kaalethanaw dandda7ii ? Kaalethiko nam77ayka woli ekkidi aafon wullokonayye ?
42006040	Tamaarey asttamaareppe aadhdhenna . Shin loythi tamaarida uray ba asttamaariyatho hanees .
42006041	“ Ne ishaa ayfiyaan de7iya buuriya ays be7ay ? Ne ayfiyaan de7iya tuussi daaneyssa ays be7ikki ?
42006042	Ne ayfiyaan de7iya tuussi daaneyssa be7onna ne ishaakko , ‘ Ta ishaw ne ayfiyaan de7iya buuriya kesso ’ gaanaw waana dandda7ay ? Neno cubbuwaw , koyrottada ne ayfiyaan de7iya tuussi daaneyssa kessa . Hessafe guye , ne ishaa ayfiyaan de7iya buuriya kessanaw geeshshada xeellana .
42006043	“ Lo77o mithi iita ayfe ayfenna ; hessadakka iita mithi lo77o ayfe ayfena .
42006044	Ayfe ayfiyaa mithi ubbay ba ayfiyaan erettees . Agunthafe balase mitha ayfey maxettenna qassi laadeppe woyne ayfey maxettenna .
42006045	Lo77o asi ba wozanan kumida lo77obaappe lo77obaa kessees . Iita asi ba wozanan kumida iitabaappe iitabaa kessees . Asi ba wozanan kumidi palahidabaappe ba doonan haasayees .
42006046	“ Ta geyssa ootheketa , shin yaatin ays tana , ‘ Godaw , Godaw , geeti ? ’
42006047	Taakko yeynne ta qaala si7idi poliya ubbay oona daaniyakko ta hinttena bessana .
42006048	I keethe keexanaw ziqqi oothi , olla bookkidi , garssan de7iya zaalla bolla keethaa essida cincca uraa daanees . Di7oy di77idi he keethaa sugis , shin minthidi keexida gisho qaaxxanaw dandda7ibeenna .
42006049	Shin ta qaala si7idi oothonay ba keethaa shafe biitta bolla keexida uraa daanees . Di7oy di77idi he keethaa sugida wode ellesidi kunddis . He keethay wolqqaama kunddethi kunddis ” yaagis .
42007001	Yesuusi hessa ubbaa asaa sinthan tamaarssidi onggidaappe guye , Qifirnahoome katamaa bis .
42007002	He bessan issi mato halaqay de7ees . I daro dosiya aylley harggettidi hayqos gakkis .
42007003	I Yesuusabaa si7ida wode ba aylliya pathana mela iya woosso gidi issi issi Ayhude cimata Yesuusakko kiittis .
42007004	Kiitettidayssati , Yesuusakko bidi , “ Ne iyaw hayssa oothanaw bessees .
42007005	Ays giikko , ha uray nu asaa dosees , Ayhude Woosa Keethaka keexxis ” gidi minthi woossidosona
42007006	Yesuusikka enttara bis . Mato halaqaa sookko matiya wode ba laggeta iyaakko kiittidi , “ Godaw , ta kaarappe garssan ne gelanaw ta bessonna gisho daaburoppa .
42007007	Takka tana ne sinthe shiiqanaw bessiya asi gada qoppike . Shin ne issi qaala oda ; ta aylley paxana .
42007008	Taw taappe bollara halaqay de7ees , taappe garssan ta kiittiya wotaaddareti de7oosona . Issuwa , ‘ Ba ’ giikko bees , hankkuwa , ‘ Haaya ’ giikko yees . Ta aylliyakko , ‘ Hanno ootha ’ giikko oothees ” yaagis .
42007009	Yesuusi hessa si7ida wode malaalettis . Guye simmidi baara yaa asaakko , “ Taani hinttew tuma odays ; hari attoshin Isra7eelenkka hayssa mela gita ammano demmabiikke ” yaagis .
42007010	Kiitettidayssati soo simmiya wode aylley paxin demmidosona .
42007011	Guutha wodeppe guye Yesuusi Nayne katamaa bis . Iya tamaaretaranne hara daro asati iyara bidosona .
42007012	I katamaa gelana haniya wode aha tookkida daro asati katamaappe keyosona . Hayqqida na7ay ba aayes issuwa , iyakka am77o gidada da7awusu . Katama asaappe daroti iira de7oosona .
42007013	Goday iyo be7ida wode qadhettidi , “ Yeekkofa ” yaagis .
42007014	Shiiqidi halaa bochchin tookkida asati eqqidosona . Yesuusi , “ La , yalagaw dendda ” yaagis .
42007015	Hayqqidayssi denddi uttidi oda oykkis . Yesuusi na7aa ekkidi aayes immis .
42007016	Asa ubbay yashettidi , “ Gita nabey nu giddon denddis ; Xoossay ba asaa be7is ” yaagidi Xoossaa galatidosona .
42007017	Iya sunthay Yihudaninne he heeran de7iya biitta ubban si7ettis .
42007018	Xammaqiya Yohaannisa tamaareti hessa ubbaa Yohaannisas odidosona . I entta giddofe nam77ata xeegidi ,
42007019	“ Yaana geetettiday neneyye ? Woykko haraa naaginoo ? ” yaagidi oychchite gidi Godaakko kiittis .
42007020	Asati Yesuusakko bidi , Xammaqiya Yohaannisi , “ Yaana geetettiday neneyye ? Woykko haraa naaginoo ? ” giite gidi nuna neekko kiittis yaagidosona .
42007021	He saatenkka Yesuusi daro asaa harggiyafe pathis . Tuna ayyaanata kessis , qooqida ayfiyakka xeelisis .
42007022	Yohaannisa matappe kiitettidi yidayssatakko , “ Bidi hintte be7idayssanne si7idayssa Yohaannisas odite . Ayfe qooqeti xeellosona , gunddati birshshettidi hamuttoosona , baro hargganchchoti geeyosona , tulleti si7oosona , hayqqidayssati hayqoppe denddoosona , manqotas Wonggelay sabbakettees .
42007023	Tanan dhubettonna oonikka anjjettidayssa . ”
42007024	Yohaannisi kiittidayssati bidaappe guye Yesuusi asaas Yohaannisabaa yaagidi odis : “ Hintte ay be7anaw bazzo biitta keyidetii ? Carkkoy qaathiya maata be7anaaseye ?
42007025	Yaatin , ay be7anaw keyidetii ? Koyse ma7o ma77ida asaa be7anaaseyye ? Koyse ma7o ma77idayssatinne sa7i injjetida asay kawo keethan de7oosona .
42007026	Yaatin , ay be7anaw keyidetii ? Nabiya be7anaaseye ? Ee , ta yaagays : hintte be7anaw keyiday nabeppe aadhdheyssa .
42007027	‘ Ne ogiya ne sinthan giigisiya ta kiitanchchuwa neeppe sinthe ta kiittana ’
42007028	Ta hinttew odays ; maccasappe yelettidayssata giddofe Yohaannisappe aadhdhey baawa . Xoossaa kawotethan ubbaafe guuxeyssi , I ubbaafe gita gidana ” yaagis .
42007029	Hari attoshin , Yesuusa qaala si7ida qaraxa qanxiseyssati ubbay Yohaannisa kushen xammaqettidi Xoossay xillo gideyssa qonccisidosona .
42007030	Shin Farisaawetinne higge asttamaareti Yohaannisa kushen xammaqettonna ixxidi Xoossaa zoriya leqisidosona .
42007031	Yesuusi kaallidi hayssada yaagis : “ Hiza , ha wodiya yeletethaa aybira daaniso ? Enttika oona daanoona ?
42007032	Giya giddon uttidi woli xeegidi , ‘ Nu hinttew suusul77e punnin , hintte yexxeketa . Nu sabbidi zeleelin , hintte yeekkeketa ’ yaagiya nayta daanosona .
42007033	Xammaqiya Yohaannisi moonnanne uyonna yin , ‘ Iita ayyaanara de7ees gideta . ’
42007034	Asa Na7ay mishenne uyishe yin , ‘ Yarambbanne ushshanchcho , qaraxa qanxiseyssatanne nagaranchchota dabbo ’ gideta .
42007035	Hiza , cinccatethaa tumatethay iya nayta ubbaa matan erettis ” yaagis .
42007036	Issi Farisaawey Yesuusa kathi muzanaw ba soo xeegis . I Farisaawiya soo bidi gayta bolla uttis .
42007037	He kataman issi nagaranchcho maccasi de7iyara Yesuusi Farisaawiya son gibira bolla de7eyssa si7ida wode daro al77o philqqaaxe shitto ekkada yasu .
42007038	Yesuusas guye baggara , iya tohuwa matan eqqada yeekkashe iya tohuwa ba afuthaara laakethawsu . Ba binaanara iya tohuwa quchchashenne yeerashe shitto tiyasu .
42007039	Gibira giigisida Farisaawey hessa be7ida wode ba wozanan , “ Hayssi nabe gidiyakko ha maccasiya iya bochchiyara ooneekko qassi iya nagaranchcho gideyssakka I eranashin ” yaagis .
42007040	Yesuusi , “ Simoona , ta new odiyabay de7ees ” yaagis . I , “ Asttamaariyaw , taw oda ” yaagis .
42007041	Yesuusi iyaakko , “ Nam77u asati issi uraappe miishe tal77idosona . Issoy ichchashu xeetu bira hankkoy qassi ishatamu bira tal77idosona .
42007042	Nam77ayka tal77iya cigganaw xoonettin , nam77ataskka tal77iya maaris . Hiza , ha nam77atappe he uraa daro dosanay new awussa daanii ” yaagis .
42007043	Simooni , “ Daro acoy maarettida uray daro dosana daanees ” yaagis . Yesuusi , “ Ne tuma pirddadasa ” yaagis .
42007044	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi maccaseekko simmi xeellidi , Simoonakko , “ Hanno maccasiw be7ay ? Taani ne soo gelin hari attin ne taw toho haathe immabaakka , shin iya ta tohuwa ba afuthan laakothada ba binaanan quchchasu .
42007045	Neeni tana yeera ekkabaakka , shin iya ta ne soo geloodeppe doomada ta tohuwa yeero aggabukku .
42007046	Neeni ta huu7iyan zayte tiyabaka , shin iya ta tohuwa shitto tiyawusu .
42007047	Iya tana daro dosida gisho I daro nagaray atto geetettis . Iya guutha nagaray atto geetettiday guuthara dosees . ”
42007048	Yesuusi maccaseekko , “ Ne nagaray atto geetettis ” yaagis .
42007049	Iyara issife gaytan uttidi miya imathati , “ Nagara atto yaagey , I hayssi oonee ? ” yaagidi bantta wozanan qoppidosona .
42007050	Yesuusi maccaseekko , “ Ne ammanoy nena ashshis ; saro ba ” yaagis .
42008001	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi Xoossaa kawotethaa Wonggelaa sabbakishe katamaaranne gutaara aadhdhis . He wode tammanne nam77u hawaareti iyara de7oosona .
42008002	Qassi tuna ayyaanaappenne dumma dumma harggiyafe paxida issi issi maccasati iyara de7oosona . Enttika , laappun tuna ayyaanati keyida Magdela Mayraamo ,
42008003	Heroodisa shuumaa Kuuza machchiw Yohaanna , Soosinnaranne qassi hara daroti enttana miishen maaddeyssati de7oosona .
42008004	Daro asay dumma dumma katamaappe iyaakko shiiqin leemison enttaw odis .
42008005	“ Issi goshshanchchoy zerethi zeranaw keyis . I zerishin issi issi zerethay oge gaxan wodhdhidi yedhdhettis , salo kafoti maxidosona .
42008006	Harati shaalloy garssan de7iya biitta bolla wodhdhidosona . Buroo dolida mela biittan laahoy baynna gisho miccidosona .
42008007	Hara zerethay qassi aguntha giddon wodhdhis . Agunthaara wolla diccida gisho agunthay cuullidi bessan ashshis .
42008008	Harati lo77o biitta bolla wodhdhidosona . Dolida wode xeetu kushe ayfidosona . ” Hessa odi onggidi , ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Si7iya haythi de7iya ubbay si7o ” yaagis .
42008009	Iya tamaareti , “ Ha leemisuwa birshshethay aybee ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona
42008010	I , “ Xoossaa kawotethaa xuuraa erana mela hinttew imettis . Shin harati be7ishe demmonna mela , si7ishe akeekonna mela leemison odays .
42008011	“ Hiza , ha leemisuwa birshshethay hayssa : zerethi yaagettiday Xoossaa qaala .
42008012	Oge gaxan wodhdhida zerethay qaala si7eyssata . Gidoshin , entti ammanidi attonna mela Xalahey qaala entta wozanaappe maxi digees .
42008013	Shaalloy garssan de7iya biitta bolla wodhdhida zerethay qaala si7idi ufayssan ekkeyssata . Entti ha77is ammanoosonappe attin xaphoy baynna gisho paacey gakkiya wode ellesidi kaddoosona .
42008014	Aguntha giddon zerettidayssati qaala si7eyssata . Enttika alamiya qofan , duretethaaninne sa7aa duussaa miikkotethan cuulettidi besseyssada ayfibookkona .
42008015	Lo77o biittan wodhdhida zerethay lo77o wozanan qaala si7idi naageyssatanne dandda7an minnidi ayfe ayfeyssata .
42008016	“ Xomppe xomppidi , daachcho kammey woykko arssafe garssan wothey deenna . Geliya asi be7ana mela dhoqqa bessan wothees .
42008017	“ Hessa gisho , qoncce keyonna qosettidi attiyaabay , erettonna geemmidi attiyaabay deenna .
42008018	“ Hiza , hintte qaala waati si7iyakko akeekite . De7iya ubbaas guzhetidi imettana , baynnayssas hari attoshin iyaw de7iya guuthiyaka iyappe ekettana ” yaagis .
42008019	Yesuusa aayeranne ishatara iyaakko yidosona . Shin asaa darotethaafe denddoyssan iya demmanaw dandda7ibookkona .
42008020	Issi asi Yesuusakko , “ Ne aayeranne ne ishatara nena koyidi karen naagoosona ” yaagis .
42008021	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Xoossaa qaala si7idi ooson peeshsheyssati ubbay taw aayonne taw isha ” yaagis .
42008022	Issi gallas Yesuusaranne iya tamaaretara issife wogolon gelidi , “ Abbaa pinnoos ” yaagis . Enttika baanaw denddidosona .
42008023	Abbaa bollara entti pinnanaw bishin Yesuusi dhiskkis . Qopponna mino carkkoy abbaa bolla denddis . Haathay wogoluwan gelin wogoloy mitetethi oykkiya wode ubbay babbidosona .
42008024	Iya tamaareti iyaakko shiiqidi , “ Nu Godaw , nu Godaw , nu dhayos yaagidi ” Yesuusa denthidosona . Yesuusi denddidi carkkuwanne gotiya seeris . Ellesidi carkkoynne gotey woppu gis . Sarotethayka simmis .
42008025	Yesuusi ba tamaaretakko , “ Hintte ammanoy awunee ” yaagis . Enttika , yayyishenne malaalettishe issoy issuwako , “ Carkkoynne haathay kiitetteyssi , I hayssi oonee ” yaagidosona .
42008026	Abbaa pinnidi Galiila baggara de7iya Gerggesoone biittaa gakkidosona .
42008027	Yesuusi wogoluwappe keyidi sa7an wodhdhishin tuna ayyaanan oykettida uray katamaappe keyidi iyara gahettis . Daro laythi afili ma77onna kallo duufon de7eesippe attin soo gelenna .
42008028	Yesuusa be7ida wode iya sinthan gufannidi , ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa na7aw Yesuusa neera taw aybi issifetethi de7ii ? Hayyana tana ha77i un77ethofarkkii ” yaagis .
42008029	Hessa I giday , tuna ayyaanay uraappe keyana mela Yesuusi hanqettida gishossa . Daro wode tuna ayyaanay iya haarida gisho santhalaataninne toho qachchiya biraatan qashettidi naagettees . Shin qashuwa duuthidi tuna ayyaanan laagettidi bazzo gelis .
42008030	Yesuusi , “ Ne sunthay oonee ” yaagidi oychchis . I , daro tuna ayyaanati iya oykkidi gisho bana , “ Leegiyona ” gis .
42008031	Tuna ayyaanati banttana Si7oole kiittonna mela woossidosona .
42008032	He bessan zooze bolla miya guduntho wudey hamuttees . Hini gudunthotan gelino gidi woossidosona , ikka “ Gelite ” gis .
42008033	Tuna ayyaanati uraappe keyidi gudunthotan gelidosona . Wudey deriyappe duge gurgguxidi abban gelis .
42008034	Henthanchchoti hanidayssa be7ida wode woxxi bidi , katamaninne guta ubban odidosona .
42008035	Asay hanidabaa be7anaw keyidi Yesuusakko yidosona . Tuna ayyaanay keyida uray ma7o ma77idi , iya wozanay simmin , Yesuusa toho matan uttidayssa demmidi yayyidosona .
42008036	Iya be7ida asay tuna ayyaanan oykettida uray waanidi paxidaakko odidosona .
42008037	Gerggesoone yuushuwan de7iya asay gita yashshi yashettidi Yesuusi bantta matappe baana mela woossidosona . I wogoluwan gelidi guye simmis .
42008038	Tuna ayyaanay keyida uray Yesuusara daanaw woossis .
42008039	Shin Yesuusi iyaakko , “ Ne soo simma , Xoossay ay mela gitabaa new oothidaakko oda ” yaagidi mooyzis . Uraykka Yesuusi ay mela gitabaa iyaw oothidaakko katama ubban markkattishe bis .
42008040	Asay naagidi gam77ida gisho Yesuusi simmiya wode mokki ekkidosona .
42008041	Ayhude Woosa Keetha halaqa gidida Iyaroosa giya uray ba soo yaana mela Yesuusa tohuwa bolla wodhdhidi woossis .
42008042	Iyaw tammanne nam77u laythi gidida macca na7a de7iyara sakettada hayqos gakkada de7awusu . Yesuusi biya wode asay iya un77ethees .
42008043	Tammanne nam77u laythi suuthi goggishe gam77ida maccasi de7iyara de7awusu . Iya baw de7iya miishiya aakimetas immada onggasu . Shin paxanaw dandda7abukku .
42008044	Iya Yesuusas guye baggara shiiqada , iya afilaa macaraa bochchasu , sohuwara goggiya suuthay eqqi aggis .
42008045	Yesuusi , “ Tana bochchiday oonee ? ” yaagis . Ubbay “ Nu bochchibookko ” yaagin , Phexiroosi , “ Asttamaariyaw , daro asay kaallishininne un77ethishin be7ashe waanada , ‘ Tana bochchiday oonee ? ’ gay ” yaagis .
42008046	Shin Yesuusi , “ Issi asi tana bochchis ; ays giikko , wolqqi taappe keyoyssi taw erettis ” yaagis .
42008047	Maccasiya , ibay qonccidayssa erida wode kokkorashe yada Yesuusa tohuwa bolla kunddasu . Ays bochchidaakkonne waanada ellesada paxidaakko asaa ubbaa sinthan markkattasu .
42008048	I , “ Ta naatte , ne ammanoy nena pathis ; saron ba ” yaagis .
42008049	Yesuusi oda onggonna de7ishin , Ayhude Woosa Keetha halaqaa , Iyaroosa sooppe issi asi yidi , “ Iyaroosa , ne na7iya hayqqasu ; asttamaariya mela daaburissofa ” yaagis .
42008050	Shin Yesuusi hessa si7idi Iyaroosakko , “ Babbofa ! Ammana , ne na7iya paxana ” yaagis .
42008051	Yesuusi Iyaroosa soo gakkida wode Phexiroosappe , Yohaannisappe , Yayqoobappe , na7ee aawappenne aayeppe attin hari gelana mela koyibeenna .
42008052	He bessan de7iya asa ubbay na7ees mishettidi yeekkishin , Yesuusi , “ Yeekkofite ! Na7iya dhiskkasuppe attin hayqqabuukku ” yaagis .
42008053	Asay na7iya hayqqidayssa eriya gisho iya oda leqqidi miicidosona .
42008054	Shin Yesuusi na7ee kushiya oykkidi , “ Naatte dendda ” yaagis .
42008055	Na7ees shemppoy simmin dendda eqqasu . Yesuusi enttako , “ Iwu miyabaa immite ” yaagis .
42008056	Na7ee aawaranne aayera malaalettidosona . Shin Yesuusi hayssa , “ Ooddeskka odoppite ” yaagis .
42009001	Yesuusi tammanne nam77u hawaareta baakko xeegidi , tuna ayyaanata kessana melanne hargge ubbaa pathana mela wolqqanne maata immis .
42009002	Xoossaa kawotethaabaa markkattanaadanne hargganchchota pathanaada kiittis .
42009003	I enttako , “ Xam77a gidin ogoro gidin kathi gidin miishe gidin laammi ma77iya afila gidin oges gidi aykkoka oykkofite .
42009004	He katamaappe hintte keyana gakkanaw imathatethan hintte gelidasuwan gam77ite .
42009005	Oonikka hinttena mokkonna ixxiko he katamaappe keyishe enttaw markka gidana mela hintte tohuwan de7iya baana pittidi keyite . ”
42009006	Enttika kiitettidayssada keyidi Wonggelaa odishenne dumma dumma gutatan hargganchchota pathishe aadhdhidosona .
42009007	Galiila biittaa haariya Heroodisi Yesuusi oothidabaa ubbaa si7ida wode dagammis . Ays giikko , issi issi asati Yohaannisi hayqoppe denddonna aggenna yaagosona .
42009008	Baggati , “ Eeliyaasi qonccis ” goosona ; harati qassi , “ Beni nabetappe issoy hayqoppe denddis ” yaagidi odettoosona .
42009009	Shin Heroodisi , “ Yohaannisa qoodhiya ta qanxisada wodhas . Yaatin , hayssatho yaagettidi iyabaa odettey , I oonee ? ” yaagidi ba ayfen be7anaw koyees .
42009010	Tammanne nam77u hawaareti guye simmi yidi , entti oothidabaa ubbaa Yesuusas odidosona . I enttana ekkidi Beetesayda katamaappe gaxa efis .
42009011	Shin daro asay Yesuusa gideyssa eridi iya kaallidosona . I entta mokki ekkidi Xoossaa kawotethaabaa tamaarssis ; paxanaw koyeyssatakka pathis .
42009012	Sa7i omarssiya wode tammanne nam77u hawaareti iyaakko shiiqidi , “ Nu de7ey bazzo biitta gidiya gisho asay dumma dumma gutatanne katamata bidi , kathinne aqiyaso koyana mela asaa moyza ” yaagidosona .
42009013	Shin I , “ Enttaw miyabaa hintte immite ” yaagis . Entti , “ Nuus de7ey ichchashu uythinne nam77u molo gidiya gisho ha asaas gidiya kathi nuuni bidi shammonna ixxiko gidenna ” yaagidosona .
42009014	He bessan ichchashu mukulu gidiya addeti de7oosona . Yesuusi ba tamaaretakko , “ Ishataman ishataman shaakki shaakki asaa utisite ” yaagis .
42009015	Iya tamaareti , I kiittidayssada asaa utisidosona .
42009016	I ichchashu uythaanne nam77u molota ekkidi , salo xeellidi , Xoossaa galatidi , meenthidi asaa ubbaa gathana mela ba tamaaretas immis .
42009017	Ubbay midi kallidosona . Enttafe attida tiifey tammanne nam77u gayta kumethi gidis .
42009018	Yesuusi ba xalaala woossishin , iya tamaareti iyaakko yidosona . I , “ Asay tana oona goonaa ? ” gidi oychchis .
42009019	Entti zaaridi “ Issoti issoti , ‘ Xammaqiya Yohaannisa , baggati Eliyaasa , harati qassi , beni nabetappe issoy hayqoppe denddis ’ yaagosona ” yaagidosona .
42009020	I zaaridi , “ Yaatin hintte tana oona geeti ” yaagis . Phexiroosi , “ Neeni Xoossaafe kiitettida Kiristtoosa ” yaagidi zaaris .
42009021	Yesuusi hayssa ooddeskka odoppite gidi minthidi odis .
42009022	Qassika Yesuusi , “ Asa Na7ay daro metuwa ekkana . Biitta cimatan , kahine halaqatan , higge asttamaaretan aadhdhi imettana . Entti iya wodhana , shin I heedzantho gallas hayqoppe denddana ” yaagis .
42009023	Yesuusi asaa ubbaako , “ Tana kaallanaw koyey oonikka de7ikko bana kaddo , ba masqaliya gallas gallas tookkidi tana kaallo .
42009024	Ba shemppiw ashshanaw koya ubbay iyo dhayssees , ba shemppiw ta gisho gidi dhayssiya oonikka iyo ashshees .
42009025	Asi alame ubbaa haaridi , gidoshin ba shemppiw dhayssiyabaa woykko qohiyabaa gidikko iya ay maaddii ?
42009026	Oonikka tananinne ta qaalan yeellatikko Asa Na7ay ba bonchchuwara hessadakka aawa bonchchuwaranne Geeshsha kiitanchchota bonchchuwara yaa wode iyan yeellatana .
42009027	Ta hinttew tuma odays ; hayssan eqqidayssata giddofe Xoossaa kawotethaa be7onnashin hayqqonna asati de7oosona ” yaagis .
42009028	Yesuusi he oda odin , hosppun gallasappe guye Phexiroosa , Yayqoobanne Yohaannisa baara ekkidi woossanaw deriya bolla keyis .
42009029	I woosa bolla de7ishin iya ayfe karey laamettis ; afilaykka awa mela phoolidi booxis .
42009030	Nam77u asati , enttika Museranne Eliyaasara bonchchon qonccidi ,
42009031	Yerusalaamen polettanaw de7iyabaa , hessika , I ha alamiyappe shaakettanabaa iyara odettoosona .
42009032	Phexiroosanne iyara de7eyssata dhiskkoy efin , entti dhiskkofe barkkiya wode iya bonchchuwanne iyara eqqida nam77u asata be7idosona .
42009033	Asati Yesuusappe shaakettidi baana hanishin , Phexiroosi Yesuusakko , “ Godaw , hayssan gideyssi nuus ay mela lo77o ! Issino new , issino Muses , issino Eliyaasas oothidi heedzu shaqara shaqaroos ” yaagis . Shin I ay gidaakko erenna .
42009034	I yaagidi odettishin shaaray yidi enttana kammis . Entti he shaara giddo gelishe babbidosona .
42009035	Shaara giddofe , “ Ta doorida na7ay hayssa iya si7ite ” yaagiya qaalay si7ettis .
42009036	He qaalay si7ettidaappe guye Yesuusi barkka de7ishe benttis . He wode entti be7idabaa ooddeskka odonna , bantta wozanan oykkidi si77i gidosona .
42009037	Wonttethe entti deriyappe wodhdhiya wode daro asay yidi iyara gahettidosona .
42009038	He wode asaa giddofe issi asi , “ Asttamaariyaw , ta issi na7aa yada be7arkki .
42009039	Tuna ayyaanay qopponna oykkidi waasises ; goppontto yegisidi qakerethees , asatethaa qohidi un77ethidi yeddees .
42009040	Ne tamaareti kessana mela woossas , shin entti dandda7ibookkona ” yaagidi woossis .
42009041	Yesuusi , “ Ammanoy baynna geella yeletethato , awude gakkanaw ta hinttera daane , hinttena dandda7anee ? Ne na7aa bada haa ekkaya ” yaagis .
42009042	Na7aa ekkidi yaa wode tuna ayyaanay sa7an holi yeggidi kokkorssis . Shin Yesuusi tuna ayyaanaa hanqidi na7aappe kessis . Na7aakka na7aa aawas immis .
42009043	Asay ubbay Xoossaa gita wolqqan malaalettidosona . Entti I oothidaban malaalettishin , Yesuusi ba tamaaretakko ,
42009044	“ Hayssa ta hinttew odeyssa loythi si7ite ; Asa Na7ay morkketa kushen aadhdhi imettana ” yaagis .
42009045	Shin I gidabay enttafe geemmida gisho akeekibookkona . Hessa gisho , zaaridi oychchanaw babbidosona .
42009046	Yesuusa tamaareti , “ Nu giddon gita gidanay oonee ? ” gidi palama oykkidosona .
42009047	Yesuusi entta wozanaa qofaa eridi yooga na7aa ba matan essidi ,
42009048	“ Ha yooga na7aa ta sunthan mokkiya oonikka tana mokkees , tana mokkey tana kiittidayssa mokkees , hintte ubbaafe guuxeyssi , I gita gidana ” yaagis .
42009049	Yohaannisi , “ Godaw , issi asi ne sunthan tuna ayyaanata kessishin be7idi I nuura gidonna gisho diggida ” yaagis .
42009050	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Hinttera eqettonnayssi , I hintte bagga . Hessa gisho , iya diggofite ” yaagis .
42009051	Yesuusi salo biya wodey matattida gisho Yerusalaame baanaw qanxidi denddis .
42009052	Samaare biittan de7iya issi gutaa bidi , ubbabaa iyaw giigisana mela ase yaa kiittis .
42009053	Shin I bey Yerusalaame gidiya gisho entti iya mokki ekkibookkona .
42009054	Yesuusa tamaareti Yayqoobaranne Yohaannisara hessa be7idi , “ Godaw , saloppe tami wodhdhidi entta mo gaana mela ne koyay ” yaagidosona .
42009055	Shin Yesuusi guye simmi entta hanqettidi , “ Hintte garssan aybi ayyaani de7iyakko hintte erekketa . Asa Na7ay ase ashshanaw yisippe attin dhayssanaassa gidenna ” yaagis .
42009056	Yaappe denddidi hara guta bidosona .
42009057	Entti ogiyara bishin , issi asi , “ Ne biyaso ubbaa ta kaallana ” yaagis .
42009058	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Workkanatas olli , salo kafotas keethi de7ees , shin Asa Na7ay ba huu7iya shemppisiyasoy baawa ” yaagis .
42009059	Hankkuwako , “ Neeni tana kaalla ” yaagis . Shin uray , “ Godaw , koyrottada ta aawa moogada yaana ” yaagis .
42009060	Shin Yesuusi , “ Hayqqidayssati hayqqidayssata moogana mela enttaw aggaaga ; neeni bada Xoossaa kawotethaa sabbaka ” yaagis .
42009061	Qassi hara asi , “ Godaw , ta nena kaallana , shin koyrottada ta soo asa sarothada yaana ” yaagis .
42009062	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Koxe oykkidi guye xeelliya oonikka Xoossaa kawotethaas bessenna ” yaagis .
42010001	Hessafe guye , Goday haraa laappun tammanne nam77u asata dooris . I baanaw qoppida katamaanne guta ubbaa sinthattidi baanada nam77a nam77a oothidi kiittis .
42010002	Yesuusi enttako , “ Hekko shiiqana kathay daro shin oosanchchoti guutha . Yaaniya gisho , kathaa goday oosanchchota kiittana mela woossite .
42010003	Hiza , biite , dorssatada suudhumeta giddo hinttena taani yeddana .
42010004	Hintte biya ogiyas aykkoka oykkofite , miishe gidin kathi gidin caamma oykkofite . Oge bolla oonakka sarothofite
42010005	Hintte geliya keethaa ubbaa koyrottidi , ‘ Saroy ha keethaas gido ’ yaagite .
42010006	Saro dosiya asi he bessan de7ikko , hintte saroy yan shemppana ; ixxas giikko hintte saroy hinttew simmana .
42010007	Oosanchchos damooze bessiya gisho hintte gelida keethan hinttew shiishidaba ubbaa mishenne uyishe yan gam77ite . Issuwa sooppe issuwa soo yuuyoppite .
42010008	Ay katamakka hintte geliya wode asay hinttena mokkidi , hinttew shiishidaba ubbaa miite .
42010009	He kataman de7iya hargganchchota pathishe , ‘ Xoossaa kawotethay hintteko matis ’ yaagidi odite .
42010010	Shin issi katamaa geliya wode asay hinttena mokkonna ixxiko dabaaba keyidi hayssada giite :
42010011	‘ Nu tohuwa bolla de7iya hintte katamaa baana pittoos , shin Xoossaa kawotethay hintteko matattidayssa erite . ’
42010012	Pirdda gallasan ha katamaappe Soodome katamaas pirdday kawushshe gidanayssa ta hinttew odays ” yaagis .
42010013	Kaallidikka , Yesuusi , “ Neno Koraaziine , neno Beetesayda , ayye , hinttenan oosettida malaatati Xiroosaninne Sidoonan oosettidaakko yan de7iya asay kalle ma77idi , bidintha bolla uttidi beni maarotan geli agganashin .
42010014	Hessa gisho , hinttefe aathidi Xiroosasinne Sidoonas Xoossaa pirdday kawuyana .
42010015	Nekka Qifirnahoome , salo gakkanaw nena dhoqqu oothanaw koyay ? Ne duge Si7oole holettana ” yaagis .
42010016	Qassika Yesuusi ba tamaaretakko , “ Hinttena si7ey tana si7ees , hinttena ekkonnay tana ekkena , tana ekkonnay tana kiittidayssa ekkenna ” yaagis .
42010017	Laappun tammanne nam77u tamaareti kiitettida bessaafe keehi ufayttishe simmidosona . Yesuusakko shiiqidi , “ Godaw , ne sunthan tuna ayyaanatikka nuus kiitettidosona ” yaagidosona .
42010018	Yesuusi enttako , “ Xalahey saloppe wol77anthada wodhdhishin ta be7as .
42010019	Hekko , shooshaanne kornne yedhdhana melanne morkkiya wolqqaa zaarana mela maata hinttew immas . Hinttena qohanabay aykkoyka deenna .
42010020	Gidoshin , hintte sunthay salo mazggaban xaafettida gisho ufayttiteppe attin tuna ayyaanati kiitettida gisho ufayttofite ” yaagis .
42010021	He wode Yesuusi Geeshsha Ayyaanan ufayttidi , “ Saluwa sa7aa Godaw , hayssa cinccatappenne eranchchotappe geenthada yalagatas qonccisida gisho galatetta . Ee ta aawaw , hessa ne oothanaw lo77o shene gidis .
42010022	“ Ubbabay ta aawappe taw imettis . Na7ay ooneekko aawappe attin hari woykko na7ay qonccisanaw koyeyssafe hari oonikka aawa erey baawa ” yaagis .
42010023	Kaallidikka , Yesuusi dumma ba tamaaretakko , “ Hintte be7eyssa be7eyssati anjjettidayssata .
42010024	Tuma daro nabetinne kawoti hintte be7eyssanne si7eyssa be7anawunne si7anaw amottidosona , shin be7ibookkona , si7ibookkona ” yaagis .
42010025	Hekko , issi gallas Muse wogaa eriya issi uray denddidi Yesuusa yaagidi paace oysho oychchis . “ Asttamaariyaw , merinaa de7uwa laattanaw taani ay ootho ? ” yaagis .
42010026	Yesuusi , “ Muse maxaafan xaafettiday woygii ? Ne waata nabbabay ? ” yaagis .
42010027	Addey zaaridi , “ ‘ Ne Godaa ne Xoossaa , ne kumetha wozanappe , ne kumetha shemppuwafe , ne kumetha wolqqaafenne ne kumetha qofaappe dosa . Qassi ase ne shooruwa ne huu7iyada dosa ’ yaagees ” yaagis .
42010028	Yesuusi iyaakko , “ Neeni likke zaaradasa , nekka hessada ootha . Neeni merinaw de7on daana ” yaagis .
42010029	Shin uray bana xillo oothanaw koyidi , “ Hanos I ta shooroy oonee ? ” yaagis .
42010030	Iya oyshaas Yesuusi yaagidi zaaro immis , “ Issi ase de7eyssi Yerusalaame katamaappe duge Iyaarkko katamaa bishin oge bolla panggati keyidi shocidosona . Iya ma7uwa qaari ekkidi hayqoppenne paxappe giddon yeggidi bidosona .
42010031	Guyeppe , Ayhude kahine issoy he ogiyara ba buussu bishe uraa be7idi deshshi gidi aadhdhis .
42010032	Qassi issi Leewe de7eyssi he bessaa gakkishe uraa be7idi harasoora aadhdhidi bis .
42010033	Shin , issi Samaare biitta ase de7eyssi he ogiyara yishe uraa be7idi iyaw qadhettis
42010034	Iyaakko shiiqidi , iya madunthaa bolla zaytenne woyne tigidi qachchis . Ba hariya bolla utisidi imathi aqiya keethi efis . He bessan iyaw koshshiyaba ubbaa oothis .
42010035	Wonttethe nam77u dinaare kessidi imatha keethaawas immidi , ‘ Hayyana ha uraa loytha xeella . Taani new immidayssafe bollara ne kessiyabaa ubbaa ta new ciggana ’ yaagis .
42010036	“ Hiza , ha heedzu asatappe panggati shocida uraas shoorotey new oona daanii ? ”
42010037	Uray zaaridi , “ Iyaw qadhettidayssaka ” yaagis . Yesuusi , “ Nekka bada hessada ootha ” yaagis .
42010038	Yesuusi ba tamaaretara oge bishe issi guta gakkis . Yan Martta geetettiya issi maccasiya iya ba son mokkasu .
42010039	Iwukka Mayraamo giya michchiya de7awusu , Mayraama qaala si7ashe Godaa tohuwa matan uttasu .
42010040	Shin Martta daro ooson un77ettada Yesuusakko shiiqada , “ Godaw , ta michchiya oosuwa ta xalaalas yeggada utta aggin ta daaburiya wode neeni be7ashe si77i gay ? Iya tana maaddana mela odikkii ” yaagasu .
42010041	Shin Goday hayssada gidi zaaris , “ Martta , Martta , neeni daroban un77ettasaanne metootasa .
42010042	Gidoshin , koyettey issibaa xalaala . Mayraama lo77obaa doorasu , hessika iippe ekettenna ” yaagis .
42011001	Issi gallas Yesuusi issi bessan woossees . Woosaa wurssida wode iya tamaaretappe issoy , “ Godaw , Yohaannisi ba tamaareta woosa tamaarssida mela nekka nuna woosa tamaarssa ” yaagis .
42011002	Yesuusi , “ Hayssada yaagidi woossite : ‘ Saluwan de7iya nu aawaw ne geeshsha sunthay anjjetto ; ne kawotethay yo .
42011003	Nu gallasa kathaa hachchi hachchi nuus imma .
42011004	Nuna qoheyssata nuuni atto geyssada , nu nagara atto ga ; paacen nuna gelssofa ’ yaagite ” yaagis .
42011005	Kaallidikka , Yesuusi ba tamaaretakko yaagis : “ Leemisos hinttefe issuwas laggey de7ees . I giddi bilahe ba laggiya soo bidi , ‘ Ta laggiyaw , heedzu soollo taw tal77arkki .
42011006	Taw lagge gidida issi asi ogeppe yin , iyaw aathiyabaa dhayas ’ yaagikko ,
42011007	“ Iya laggey keethaa giddon gididi , ‘ Hayyana tana waaysoppa , wulay gorddettis . Ta naytikka taara arssa bolla zin77idosona . Yaaniya gisho , denddada ne koyabaa immanaw dandda7ikke ’ yaagiyye ?
42011008	Ta hinttew odays ; laggetethaa gisho denddidi immanaw koyonna ixxikokka woosan salethida gisho denddidi koshshiyaba ubbaa immees .
42011009	“ Hessa gisho , taani hinttew odays ; woossite hinttew imettana ; koyite hintte demmana ; kare yidi xeegite hinttew dooyettana .
42011010	Gaasoykka woossiya ubbay ekkees ; koyey demmees ; kare yidi xeegeyssas dooyettees .
42011011	“ Hinttenoo , aawato hintte giddofe na7i uythi woossin shuchchu immey oonee ? Molo woossin shooshi immey oonee ?
42011012	Woykko phuuphphulle woossiko kornne immi ?
42011013	Hintte iitata gidishe hintte naytas lo77obaa immo erikko , salon de7iya hintte aaway woosseyssatas Geeshsha Ayyaana waati aathi immenne ? ” yaagis .
42011014	Issi gallas Yesuusi doona muumisida tuna ayyaanaa issi uraappe kessis . Tuna ayyaanay keyida mela muume uray odettis . Asaykka malaalettis .
42011015	Shin issoti issoti , “ Tuna ayyaanaa halaqaa , Bi7elzebuula wolqqan tuna ayyaanata kessees ” yaagidosona .
42011016	Harati qassi paaces saloppe malla bessana mela koyidosona .
42011017	Shin Yesuusi entta qofaa eridi enttako , “ Woli giddon shaakettiya kawotethi ubbay dhayees ; woli giddon shaakettiya keethi kunddees .
42011018	Xalahey woli giddon shaakettiko iya kawotethay waanidi minnidi eqqanee ? Hintte tana , ‘ I tuna ayyaanata Bi7elzebuula wolqqan kessees ’ yaageta .
42011019	Hiza , taani tuna ayyaanaa Bi7elzebuula wolqqan kessiyabaa gidikko hintte nayti oodde wolqqan kessonashsha ? Hessa gisho , entti hintte bolla pirddeyssata gidana .
42011020	Shin taani tuna ayyaanata Xoossaa biradhdhen kessiyabaa gidikko hiza Xoossaa kawotethay hintteko matidayssa erite .
42011021	“ Mino asi danccettidi ba keethaa naagiyabaa gidikko , iya shaloy boshettenna .
42011022	Hanoshin , iyappe aadhdhi mino gidida asi yidi , iya qohidi xoonikko ammanettidi danccida danccuwa bilisidi , iya shaluwa bonqqidi haraas shaakkees .
42011023	“ Taara gidonnayssi tana ixxees ; taara shiishonnaysika laallees .
42011024	“ Tuna ayyaanay asappe keyida wode shemppiyaso koyidi haathi baynnasoora yuuyees . Shemppiyaso dhayida wode ‘ Ta keyidasuwa simmana ’ yaagees .
42011025	I simmiya wode keethay pitettidi lo77idi de7ishin demmis .
42011026	Hessafe guye , bidi iyappe aadhdhidi iitida haraa laappun tuna ayyaanata ekkidi yees . Iyan gelidi duussu oykkees . He uraas koyroyssafe guyeyssi aadhdhidi iita gidees ” yaagis .
42011027	Yesuusi hessa oda bolla de7ishin issi maccasi asaa gaathafe denddada , ba qaala dhoqqu oothada , “ Nena tookkida uloynne neeni dhammida dhanthati anjjettidosona ” yaagasu .
42011028	Shin I , “ Anjjettidayssati Xoossaa qaala si7idi kiitetteyssata ” yaagis .
42011029	Daro asay shiiqida wode Yesuusi , “ Ha yeletethay iita ; ooratha malla koyees . Shin Yoonasa malaatappe attin hari enttaw imettena .
42011030	Yoonasi Nanawe asaas malla gidida mela Asa Na7aykka ha yeletethaas malla gidana .
42011031	Dugeha kawiya pirdda gallas ha yeletethaara denddada pirddana . Gaasoykka , iya Solomone cinccatethaa si7anaw biitta gaxappe denddada yasu . Hekko Solomoneppe aadhdheyssi hayssan de7ees
42011032	Nanawe asati pirdda gallas ha yeletethaara denddidi entta bolla pirddana . Gaasoykka Yoonasa sibkkatiyan maarota gelidosona . Hekko , Yoonasappe aadhdhey hayssan de7ees ” yaagis .
42011033	“ Xomppe xomppidi qosa bessan woykko oto giddon wothiya asi deenna . Asi poo7uwa be7ana mela dhoqqa bessan wothees .
42011034	Ne asatethaas poo7oy ne ayfiyaa . Ne ayfey lo77o gidikko , ne kumetha asatethay poo7ees . Nena ayfey sakkiko ne asatethay ubbay dhumees .
42011035	Hessa gisho , ne garssan de7iya poo7oy dhumonna mela naageeta .
42011036	Hiza , ne kumetha asatethay poo7o gidikko , ne asatethankka hari dhuma bessi dhayikko , ne asatetha kumethay wolile poo7o mela gidees ” yaagis .
42011037	Yesuusi ba oda onggida mela issi Farisaawey baara kathi maana mela xeegis . I iyara issife gelidi gibira bolla uttis .
42011038	Farisaawey Yesuusi kathi maanappe sinthe kushe meecconayssa be7idi malaalettis .
42011039	Goday iyaakko , “ Hintte Farisaaweti quuliyanne shaatiya bolla bagga meecetta . Shin hintte gaathay uuzetethaninne iitatethan kumis .
42011040	Hinttenoo , eeyato , kare baggaa medhdhidayssi gaatha medhdhiday iya gidenneyye ?
42011041	Shin quuliyaninne shaatiyan de7eyssa manqotas immite . He wode hinttew ubbabay geeshshi gidana .
42011042	“ Farisaaweto hinttena ayye , sawoppe , xalooteppe , hessa melabaappe asraata kesseta . Shin xillotethinne Xoossaa dosoy hinttenan baawa . Harata aggonna hayssatakka oothanaw bessees , shin aggideta .
42011043	“ Farisaaweto hinttena ayye , Ayhude Woosa Keethan bonchcho oyde , giya giddon bonchcho sarotho doseeta .
42011044	“ Malay dhayin asay eronna bollara biya duufo daaneyssato hinttena ayye ” yaagis .
42011045	Higge asttamaarey zaaridi , “ Asttamaariyaw , ne hessa gashe nuna cayaasa ” yaagis .
42011046	Yesuusi , “ Hinttenoo , higge asttamaareto , hinttenakka ayye , asay tookkanaw dandda7onna deexo tooho toosseeta , shin hinttee hintte huu7es hari attoshin biradhdhe xeerankka bochcheketa .
42011047	“ Hintte aawati wodhida nabeta duufuwa hintte giigisiya gisho hinttena ayye .
42011048	Hiza , hintte aawata oosuwa minthanaw entti wodhida nabeta duufuwa hintte loythiya gisho entta iita oosuwas hintte markka .
42011049	Hessa gisho , Xoossay ba cinccatethan , ‘ Nabetanne hawaareta ta hinttew kiittana , shin hintte baggata wodhana ; harata gooddana ’ yaagis .
42011050	Hessa gisho , ha yeletethay alamey medhettoosappe hanno gakkanaw gukkida nabeta ubbaa suuthas oyshettana .
42011051	Aabelappe doomidi yarshsho bessaasinne Xoossa Keethaafe gidduwan gukkida Zakkariyaasa suutha gisho ha yeletethay oyshettana .
42011052	“ Higge asttamaareto , hinttena ayye , eratetha qulppiya hintte kushen oykkideta , shin hinttew gelekketa haratakka gelsseketa . ” yaagis .
42011053	Yesuusi yaappe baanaw keyaa wode higge asttamaaretinne Farisaaweti iyara eqettidi oyshon waaysosona .
42011054	Iya doonappe keyaa qaalan iya oykkanaw koyidi hessa oothidosona .
42012001	He wode daro mukulun taybettiya asay woli bolla yedhdhettana gakkanaw asi asa bolla shiiqidi de7ishin , Yesuusi ba tamaaretakko , “ Farisaaweta irshshuwaafe naagettite . Hessika entta cubbotethaa .
42012002	Qoncconna qosettidi , erettonna geemmidi attiyaabay aykkoyka baawa .
42012003	Hiza , hintte dhuman odidabay ubbay poo7on si7ettana , qol77a gaathan kalkkashidabay dabaaban odettana .
42012004	“ Ta baggato , ta odeyssa si7ite ; ashuwa wodhoosonappe attin haraa aykkoka oothanaw dandda7onnayssatas babbofite .
42012005	Hanoshin , hintte babbanaw besseyssa ta hinttew qonccisana . Hessika wodhidaappe guye Gaannamen yegganaw wolqqay de7eyssas iyaw babbite . Ee , tuma gays ; iyaw babbite .
42012006	Ichchashu buubbeti issi santimes bayzettokonaayye ? Hanoppe attin enttafe issinnaka Xoossaa sinthan dogetuku .
42012007	Hari attoshin , hintte huu7e binaanaykka paydettidi de7ees . Hiza , babbofite ; daro buubbetappe hintte aadhdheeta .
42012008	“ Ta odeyssa si7ite ; asa sinthan taw markkattiya ubbaas Asa Na7ay Xoossaa kiitanchchota sinthan markkattana .
42012009	Asa sinthan tana kaddeyssas Xoossaa kiitanchchota sinthan ta iya kaddana .
42012010	Asa Na7a bolla kadhe qaala haasayaa ubbay maarota demmana , shin Geeshsha Ayyaana bolla kadhe qaala odetteyssi maaretenna .
42012011	“ Asi hinttena oykkidi Ayhude Woosa Keethan , daynnata sinthaninne kawota sinthan gooshechchiya wode ay odaneekkonne woygi zaaraneekko hirggofite .
42012012	He wode hintte odanabaa Geeshsha Ayyaanay hinttena tamaarssana ” yaagis .
42012013	Asaa giddofe issi asi Yesuusakko yidi , “ Ta ishay taw nu aawa laatappe shaakkana mela iyaw oda ” yaagis .
42012014	Yesuusi zaaridi , “ La addiyaw , hintte bolla tana daynnanne laata shaakkiya cima oothiday oonee ? ” yaagis .
42012015	Qassika Yesuusi , “ Asa de7oy shalo darotethan gidonna gisho yaare aggidi minthidi hinttena naagite ” yaagis .
42012016	Kaallidikka leemison , “ Gadey daro kathi immiya issi dure uray de7ees .
42012017	He uray , ‘ Ta kathaa taani shiishanaw bessi guuxida gisho ay ootho ? ’ yaagidi ba wozanan qoppis .
42012018	Hizappe yaatana ; kase de7iya shaaleta laallada haraa dalgga shaaleta keexana . Kathaanne taw de7iyaba ubbaa iyan yeggana .
42012019	Ba shemppeeko , ‘ Ta shemppete , daro laythas new gidiya shalo shiishas . Hiza , shemppada ma , uya , ufaytta ’ yaagana .
42012020	“ Shin Xoossay , ‘ La , eeya addiyaw , hachchi qamma ne shemppiya neeppe ekettawusu . Hiza , ne shiishidabay ooddees gidanee ? ’ yaagis .
42012021	“ Hessa gisho , baw duretethi sa7an shiishiya asas , Xoossaa matan dure gidonna asaas wurssethay ha urayssa mela ” yaagis .
42012022	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi ba tamaaretakko , “ Hiza , ta odiyabaa si7ite , hintte shemppuwas ay mino hintte bollaas ay ma77ino yaagidi un77ettofite .
42012023	Shemppoy kathafe bolli afilappe aadhdhees .
42012024	Kafota be7ite zerokkona , kiishokkona , eleykka shaaleykka baawa . Shin Xoossay enttana muzees . Hintte kafotappe daro aadhdheeta .
42012025	Hanoshin , hinttefe un77ettidi ba laythaa bolla issi qamma gujjanaw dandda7ey oonee ?
42012026	Hiza , ha guuthabaa oothanaw dandda7onna hintte harabaas ays un77etteetii ?
42012027	Ane cishshati waanidi dicciyakko be7ite . Waayokkonanne suqqokona . Hari attoshin , Solomoney ba de7iya bonchcho ubban enttafe issuwa melakka ma77ibeena .
42012028	Hinttenoo , ammanoy paccidayssato , hiza , Xoossay hachchi benttidi wontto taman yegettana cishshata hayssada mayzikko , hinttena waati aathi mayzennee ?
42012029	Hessa gisho , ay miino woykko ay uyino gidi un77ettofite .
42012030	He ubbaas Xoossaa ammanonna asati un77ettoosona . Shin hintte aaway Xoossay hessi ubbay hinttew koshsheyssa erees .
42012031	Ubbaafe aathidi Xoossaa kawotethaa koyite hessi ubbay hinttew gujji imettana .
42012032	“ Hinttenoo , guutha deretoo , yayyofite ; hintte aawa Xoossay kawotethaa hinttew immanaw ufayttees .
42012033	Hinttew de7iyabaa bayzidi manqotas immite . Kaysoy ekkonnason , bili moonnason , cimonna karxiitan , wuronna shaluwa saluwan shiishite .
42012034	Hintte wozanay hintte shaloy de7iyasuwan gidana .
42012035	“ Qanthan danccidi giigettite ; hintte xomppey poo7idayssa gido .
42012036	Bantta goday yaaganoppe simmana gakkanaw barkkidi naageyssatada , goday yidi xeegiya wode ellesidi dooyanaw giigida asata daanite .
42012037	Bantta goday simmiya wode dhiskkonna de7ishe naageyssati anjjettidayssata . Tuma gays ; goday qanthan danccidi gayta yuushuwan utisidi mokkees .
42012038	Goday laade gidin giddi bilahe gidin woykko wonttimaathe gidin yidi , hessa mela dhiskkonna naagishin demmiya he aylleti anjjettidayssata .
42012039	Shin hayssa erite ; kaysoy awude yaanekko keethaaway eriyakko keethay boketiya wode si77i gidi be7enna .
42012040	Hintteka giigidi naagite ; Asa Na7ay hintte qopponna wode yaana ” yaagis .
42012041	Phexiroosikka , “ Godaw ha leemisuwa nu xalaalas odayye woykko asa ubbaasee ? ” yaagis .
42012042	Goday zaaridi , “ Hiza , kathaa muzanaw bessiya wodiyan immana mela goday ba aylleta bolla shuumida ammantheysinne wozanaama halaqay oonee ?
42012043	Goday simmiya wode hessa mela oothishe benttiya aylley I anjjettidayssa
42012044	Ta hinttew tuma odays ; ba godaas de7iya shalo ubbaa bolla I shuumettana .
42012045	Shin he aylley , ‘ Ta goday elle yeenna ’ yaagidi ba wozanan qoppidi , macca aylletanne adde aylleta wadhdhiko , qassi baw koyida mela mishenne uyishe mathottiko ,
42012046	he aylliya goday I qopponna gallasaninne hirggonna wode yaana . Yidi iya qanxerethidi , iya qaada ammanonna asatara oothana .
42012047	“ Godaa sheniyada giigonnayssinne iya goday ay dosiyakko erishe oothonna aylley daro garaafettana .
42012048	Shin ba godaa sheniya eronna attidi garaafettanaw besseyssa oothiday guuthara garaafettana . Gaasoykka daro imettidayssafe daro koyettees , daro hadara ekkidayssafekka daro immana gidi naagettees .
42012049	“ Taani yiday biitta bolla tama oythanaassa . Ha77i tamay oykkiyako tana waati ufayssanddeshsha !
42012050	Hanoshin , ta ha77i xammaqettiya xinqqatey de7ees . I polettana gakkanaw ta daro un77ettays .
42012051	Sa7a bolla sarotethi ehanaw yida hinttew daanii ? Gidenna , ta yiday shaakkanaassa .
42012052	Ha77ife doomidi woli giddon shaakettida ichchashu keethaa asati issife de7oosona . Nam77ati heedzata bolla , heedzatikka nam77ata bolla , denddidi shaakettoosona .
42012053	Aaway na7aa bolla , na7aykka aawa bolla , aayyaa na7ee bolla , na7iya aaye bolla , azinaa aayyaa na7aa machche bolla , na7aa machchiya azinaa aaye bolla , denddidi shaakettana . ”
42012054	Qassika asaakko , “ Wuloha baggara saloy shaaratiya wode be7idi , ellesidi , ‘ Iri yaana ’ yaageta , hessadakka hanees .
42012055	Dugeha carkkoy carkkiya wode ‘ Sa7ay awana ’ yaageta , hessadakka hanees ” yaagis .
42012056	Hinttenoo , cubboto , Salobaanne sa7abaa shaakki ereetashin ha wodiya shaakki eroy hinttena waanidi xoonidee ?
42012057	“ Yaatin , hintte huu7es ays tuma pirddeketii ?
42012058	Ne morkkiyara wolla daynna sinthan eqqanaw bashe oge bolla giiganaw koya . Ne giigonna ixxiko gooshechchidi daynna sinthi nena efana . Daynnay nena poolisees aathi immana . I nena woynen yeggana .
42012059	Si7ite , issi bakkani attonna cigga onggana gakkanaw ne yaappe keyonnayssa era ” yaagis .
42013001	He wode Yesuusakko asay yidi Philaaxoosi wodhidi entta suuthaara entta yarshshuwa walakkida Galiila asaabaa odida asati he bessan de7oosona .
42013002	I hayssada yaagidi zaaris ; “ Yaatin he Galiila asati he iita hayqo hayqqida gisho Galiilan de7iya asa ubbaafe aadhdhida nagaranchcho daanoona ?
42013003	Gidenna ! Gidoshin , hintteka maarotan simmona ixxiko , ubbay hessada dhayana .
42013004	Woykko qassi Salihoome giya bessan gimbbey woddidi wodhida tammanne hosppun asay Yerusalaamen de7iya asa ubbaafe aadhdhida nagaranchcho daanoona ?
42013005	Gidenna ! Shin hintteka maarotan simmona ixxiko ubbay hessada dhayana . ”
42013006	Qassika Yesuusi hayssada gidi leemiso odis : “ Issi uraas woyne gaden tokettida balase mithiya de7awusu . I iippe ayfe koyii yidi aykkoka demmibeenna .
42013007	Gadiya goday woyne oosanchchuwakko , ‘ Ayfe demmanaw koyada heedzu laythi simerettada aykkoka demmabiikke . Hessa gisho , qanxa digga ; ays biittaa melisay ? ’ yaagis .
42013008	“ Shin oosanchchoy , ‘ Godaw , I yuushuwa oothada osha yeggana gakkanaw ha laythas aggarkii .
42013009	Ha laythi ayfikko lo77o , ixxiko qanxa agga ’ ” yaagidi zaaris .
42013010	Yesuusi Sambbaata gallas Ayhude Woosa Keethan tamaarssees .
42013011	He bessan tammanne hosppun laythi tuna ayyaani zokko kuunisida issi maccasiya de7awusu . Iya kuunappe denddoyssan suure eqqanaw dandda7ukku .
42013012	Yesuusi iyo be7ida wode xeegidi , “ Ha maccasete , ne harggiyafe paxadasa ” yaagis .
42013013	Ba kushiya I bolla wothin , iya sohuwara suurada eqqasu . Xoossaaka galatasu .
42013014	Shin Ayhude Woosa Keetha halaqay yilotidi asaakko , “ Ooso oothiya usuppun gallasati de7oosona . Hessa gisho , he gallasatan yidi paxiteppe attin Sambbaata gallas gidenna ” yaagis .
42013015	Goday , “ Cubboto , hintte giddofe boori woykko hare Sambbaata gallas zadalope billidi haathe ushshanaw efonnay oonee ?
42013016	Yaatin , ha maccasiya Abrahame na7aa gidashe xalahen qashettada tammanne hosppun laythi kumethi de7idaaris Sambbaata gallas birshshetethi koshshennee ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
42013017	I hessa odida wode eqetteyssati ubbay yeellatidosona . Shin asa ubbay I oothida malaalisiya ooso ubban ufayttidosona .
42013018	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi hayssada yaagis , “ Xoossaa kawotethay ay daanii ? Iya aybira daaniso ?
42013019	Xoossaa kawotethay issi asi ba goshshan tokkida wola ayfe mela . I diccidi mithi gidis . Salo kafoti iya tashiya bolla shemppidosona .
42013020	Qassi , “ Xoossaa kawotethaa aybira daaniso ?
42013021	Issi maccasiya daro dhiillera walakkada munuqida guutha irshsho daanees ” yaagis .
42013022	Hessafe guye , Yesuusi Yerusalaame bishe I kanthiya ogiyan de7iya katamataninne gutatan tamaarssishe aadhdhis .
42013023	Issi asi Yesuusakko , “ Godaw , attanay guutha asa xalaalee ? ” yaagidi oychchis . Yesuusi enttako ,
42013024	“ Si7ite , xuuntha wulaara gelanaw baaxetite . Daroti gelanaw koyoosona shin enttaw hanenna .
42013025	Keethaaway denddidi wulaa gorddidaappe guye ‘ Nuus dooyarkii ’ yaagishe karen eqqidi xeessi oykkeeta . Shin I , ‘ Hintte ooneekkonne awuppe yidaakko ta erikke ’ gidi zaarana .
42013026	He wode hintte , ‘ Neera wolla mida , uyida , nu dabaabankka tamaarssadasa ’ yaagana .
42013027	“ I zaaridi , ‘ Hintte ooneekkonne awuppe yidaakko erikke . Hinttenoo , geellato taappe haakkite ’ yaagana .
42013028	Abrahame , Yisaaqa , Yayqoobanne nabeta ubbaa Xoossaa kawotethan be7ana , shin hintte karen wodhdhidi attiyaa wode hinttew yeehonne achche garccethi gidana .
42013029	Asay dolohappe , wulohappe , pudehappenne dugehappe yidi Xoossaa kawotethan gibira bolla uttana .
42013030	Hessa gisho , ha77i dethan guye gididayssatappe sinthe gidanayssati , sinthe gididayssatappe guye gidanayssati de7oosona ” yaagis .
42013031	He wode Farisaawetappe issoti issoti yidi , “ Heroodisi nena wodhanaw koyaa gisho ha bessafe denddada ba gidosona .
42013032	I zaaridi , “ Bidi , he workkanaas hekko , ‘ Hachchinne wontto tuna ayyaanata kessana , hargganchchota pathana , heedzantho gallasan kuushsha bolla gakkana ’ yaagis giite .
42013033	Hanoppe attin , nabey Yerusalaameppe karen hayqqanaw bessenna . Hessa gisho , hachchi , wonttonne wontti pee7in he bessaa baanaw denddas .
42013034	“ Yerusalaame , Yerusalaame , nabeta wodhiyare , neekko kiitettidayssata shuchchan caddiyare , kuttoy ba nayta ba qefiyappe garssan shiishiyada ne nayta ta qesiyappe garssan aappun toho shiishanaw koyadina , shin hintte ixxas gideta .
42013035	Ta hinttew odays ; hintte keethay kaysattana . Godaa sunthan yeyssi anjjettidayssa hintte gaana gakkanaw tana demmeketa ” yaagis .
42014001	Issi Sambbaata gallas Yesuusi issi Farisaaweta halaqaa soo kathi maanaw geliya wode asay caddi xeellosona .
42014002	He bessan shawuhe harggen waayettiya issi asi iyaw sintha baggara zin77is .
42014003	Yesuusi Farisaawetakkonne higge asttamaaretakko , “ Sambbaata gallas hargganchcho pasoy wogeyye woga gidennee ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
42014004	Entti si77i gidosona . Yesuusi harggettiya uraa bochchi pathidi moyzis .
42014005	“ Qassika hinttefe issuwas na7i woykko boori Sambbaata gallas aafon wulliko ellesidi kessonnay oonee ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
42014006	Entti issibaakka zaaranaw dandda7ibookkona .
42014007	Yesuusi imatuwas xeegettidayssati bonchcho bessi doorishin be7idi , ha leemisuwa odis :
42014008	“ Issi asi nena yaagano xeegikko bonchcho bessan uttofa . Neeppe aadhdhi bonchchettiya asi xeegettanaw dandda7ees .
42014009	Hinttena nam77atakka xeegidayssi yidi , ‘ Ne bessaa ha imathaas yedda ’ yaagiya wode neeni yeellatashe ziqqa bessi wodhdhaasa .
42014010	Gidoshin , ne xeegettida wode koyrottada ziqqa bessi be7ada utta . Xeegoyssi yidi , ‘ Ta laggiyaw , ha bonchcho bessan utta ’ yaagana . He wode neera issife xeegettida asa ubbaa sinthan ne bonchchettana .
42014011	Bana dhoqqu dhoqqu oothiya ubbay kawuyana ; bana ziqqi ziqqi oothiya ubbay dhoqqu dhoqqu gaana . ”
42014012	Qassi Yesuusi iya mokkida keethaa aawakko , “ Quma woykko kaho imato xeegiya wode neeni kushe zaaro xeegonna mela ne laggeta woykko ne ishata woykko ne dabbota woykko ne dure shoorota imato xeegoppa .
42014013	Gidoshin , ne imato giigisida wode manqota , wobbeta , gunddatanne qooqeta xeega ; neeni anjjettana .
42014014	Hayssati kushe zaaranaw dandda7onna gisho kushe zaaroy geeshshata denddo gallasan new simmana ” yaagis .
42014015	Yesuusara wolla imato bolla uttoyssata giddofe issoy hessa si7idi , “ Xoossaa kawotethan imato bolla utteyssi anjjettidayssa ” yaagis .
42014016	Yesuusi , “ Issi asi gita imato giigisidi daro asata xeegis .
42014017	Imatoy mokettiya saatey gakkiya wode xeegettida imathata , ‘ Hekko ubbabay giigis , haa yiite ’ yaagidi xeeganaada ba aylliya kiittis .
42014018	“ Shin ubbayka bantta gaaso gaaso medhdhidosona . Issoy , ‘ Ha77i buroo gade shammida gisho bada be7anaw koshshees hayyana tana aggarkii yaaga ’ yaagis .
42014019	Hankkoy , ‘ Ichchashu waatha boori shammas enttana waaxa be7ana gisho hayyana tana lanccofa ’ yaagis .
42014020	Qassi haray , ‘ Taani buroo meddan de7iya gisho yaanaw dandda7ikke ’ yaagis .
42014021	“ Aylley simmi yidi he ubbaa ba godaas odis . He wode yaagano aaway hanqettidi aylliyako , ‘ Ellesada kataman de7iya wogga ogetanne daggalata bada , manqota , wobbeta , qooqetanne gunddata haa eha ’ yaagis .
42014022	“ Aylley , ‘ Ta godaw , ne kiittidayssi ubbay polettis , shin ha77ika bessi de7ees ’ yaagis .
42014023	“ Goday aylliyako , ‘ Horogata bollanne , gade giddo ogeta keya , ta keethay kumana gakkanaw demmida ubbaa yaana mela ootha .
42014024	Ta hinttew odays ; imatotidayssatappe oonikka ta gibiraappe moonnayssa erite ’ gis ” yaagis .
42014025	Daro asay iyara wolla bishin Yesuusi enttako guye simmidi ,
42014026	“ Taakko yaa ubbay ba aawanne ba aayiw , ba machchiwunne ba nayta , ba ishatanne ba michcheta , hari attoshin ba de7uwa ixxonnay ta tamaare gidanaw dandda7enna .
42014027	Ba masqaliya tookkidi tana kaallonnay ta tamaare gidanaw dandda7enna .
42014028	“ Hinttefe issi asi shuchcha keethi keexanaw koykko , keethaa keexidi ongganaw ay mela miishe koshshiyako koyrottidi eranaw qoppi be7onnay oonee ?
42014029	Hessa gidonna ixxiko , ha uray baaso shuchchaa hiixin qusttethi xoonikko ,
42014030	be7iya ubbay , ‘ Ha uray gimbbethi oykkin qusttanaw iya xoonis ’ yaagidi boroosona .
42014031	“ Woykko issi kawoy hara kawora olettanaw denddishe laatamu mukulu olanchchota ekki yaa kawuwara tammu mukulu olanchchotara eqettanaw dandda7anayssanne dandda7onayssa uttidi zorettonnay oonee ?
42014032	Eqettanaw dandda7ettonaba gidikko , he hara kawuwara haahon de7ishin giiganaw koyrottidi cima yeddidi oychchees .
42014033	Hessadakka , hinttefe oonikka baw de7iyaba ubbaa aggonna ixxiko ta tamaare gidanaw dandda7enna .
42014034	“ Maxiney lo77o , shin maxiney ba mal77uwa aggiko , waanidi maxine geetettanaw dandda7ii ?
42014035	Biittatethaaskka araddatethaaskka maaddonabaa gidiya gisho wora yegettees . Hiza , si7iya haythi de7iya asi si7o ” yaagis .
42015001	Issi gallas qaraxa qanxeyssatinne nagaranchchoti Yesuusa timirttiya si7anaw iya yuushuwan shiiqidosona .
42015002	Shin Farisaawetinne higge asttamaareti , “ Hayssi uray nagaranchchota shiishidi ekkees , enttara issife mees ” yaagidi zuuzummidosona .
42015003	Yesuusi yaagidi hayssa leemiso enttaw odis :
42015004	“ Hintte giddofe issuwas xeetu dorssati de7iyabaa gidikko enttafe issoy dhayikko uddufun tammanne uddufunata bazzon aggidi dhayoyssa demmana gakkanaw koyonnay oonee ?
42015005	Demmida wode ufayttidi ba gannan tookkidi ,
42015006	ba soo simmees . Ba laggettanne shoorota issife xeegidi , ‘ Dhayida ta dorssaa demmas , taara issife ufayttite ’ yaagees .
42015007	Hessadakka , maaroti koshshonna uddufun tammanne uddufun xillotappe aathidi maarotan geliya issi nagaranchchuwa gaason salon gita ufayssi gidees .
42015008	“ Woykko tammu biri de7iya issi maccasiya tammaafe issiya dhayikko demmana gakkanaw xomppe oythada keethaa pittada mintha koyonnara oonee ?
42015009	Demmida wode ba laggettanne ba shoorota xeegada ‘ Dhayida ta issi bira demmida gisho taara ufayttite ’ yaagawusu .
42015010	Si7ite , hessa mela issi maarotethan geliya nagaranchchuwan Xoossaa kiitanchchota sinthan ufayssi gidees ” yaagis .
42015011	Zaaridi Yesuusi , “ Issi uraas nam77u nayti de7oosona .
42015012	Enttafe kaalo na7ay ba aawakko , ‘ Ta aawaw , ne shaluwappe ta gishuwa taw imma ’ yaagis . Aaway ba shaluwa ba naytas shaakkis .
42015013	Guutha gallasappe guye kaalo na7ay ba gishuwa ubbaa qachchi ekkidi haaho biitta bis . Yan alttacan shaluwa toochchidi onggis .
42015014	I baw de7iyaba ubbaa wurssidaappe guye he biitta ubban mino koshi keyin metootis .
42015015	Hessa gisho , he biittaa asaappe issuwa soo gaata gelis . Uray iya guduntho heemmana mela ba moothaa yeddis .
42015016	Gudunthoti miya harquwafe maanaw amottis , shin iyokka iyaw immiya asi benttibeenna .
42015017	Wozani simmin , ‘ Aappun ta aawa aylletas kathi wora wodhdhin ta hayssan koshara hayqqanaw gakkadina ? ’
42015018	Denddada ta aawakko bada , ‘ Ta aawaw , salon Xoossaa , sa7an nena qohas .
42015019	Hizappe ne na7a geetettada xeegettanaw taw bessonna gisho ne son de7iya aylletappe issuwada tana payda ’ yaagana ” yaagis .
42015020	Hessa gisho , denddidi ba aawakko bis . “ Hanoshin , I buroo haahon de7ishin aaway qadhettidi , iyaakko woxxi bidi idimmidi yeeris .
42015021	Na7aykka , ‘ Ta aawaw salon Xoossaa , sa7an nena ta qohas . Hizappe ne na7a geetettada xeegettanaw bessike ’ yaagis .
42015022	“ Iya aaway aylleta xeegidi , ‘ Ellesidi ubbaafe lo77o gidida ma7o ehidi iya mayzite ; iya biradhdhen sagaayo , iya tohuwan caamma aathite .
42015023	Modhdho gatarmentho ehidi shukkite , moos , ufayttoos .
42015024	Ta na7ay hayssi hayqqis , shin ha77i paxis ; dhays , shin benttis ’ yaagis . Hessafe guye , ufayetethi oykkidosona .
42015025	“ He wode bayra na7ay goshsha gaden de7ees . Yaappe yishe soo matishin yethinne gufa girssi si7is .
42015026	I , aylletappe issuwa xeegidi haniyabay aybeekko eranaw oychchis .
42015027	Aylley , ‘ Ne ishay saro yida gisho ne aaway modhdho gatarmentho iyaw shukkis ’ yaagis .
42015028	“ Bayra ishay yilotidi soo gelanawukka koyibeenna . Aaway kare keyidi soo gelana mela iya woossis .
42015029	Shin I ba aawakko , ‘ Hekko , hayssa mela laythi ta new aylletada ne kiitaappe issuwaka pacisonna new kiitettin ta ta laggetara ufayttana mela hari attoshin issi laaqa deeshe immabaakka .
42015030	Hanoshin , hayssi ne na7ay ne shaluwa laymatara doomisidi yin modhdho gatarmentho shukkadasa ’ ” yaagis .
42015031	“ Aawaykka , ‘ Ta na7aw , neeni ubba wode taara de7aasa , tabay ubbay neessa .
42015032	Hayssi ne ishay hayqqis , shin paxis ; dhays , shin benttis . Hessa gisho , daro ufayttanaw bessees ’ yaagana ” yaagis .
42016001	Yesuusi ba tamaaretakko , “ Issi dure uraas iyappe garssara issi shuumay de7ees . He shuumay ba godaa shaluwa toochchees yaagiya worey keethaawa gakkis .
42016002	Keethaaway shuumaa xeegisidi , ‘ Taani woygiyabaa si7adinaa ? Hizappe neeni ta keethas shuuma gidada oothanaw dandda7onna gisho ta shaluwa taw sheedhdha ’ yaagis .
42016003	“ He shuumaykka ba wozanan hayssada yaagidi qoppis . ‘ Ta goday tana shuumatethaafe wothana hanees , goya aqanaw wolqqi baawa , woossa maanaw yeellayees ; yaatin ta waano ?
42016004	Shuumatethaafe ta wodhdhiya wode asay tana mokkana mela oothanabaa ta erays ’ yaagis .
42016005	“ Hessa gisho , iya godaa acoy de7iya asaa issuwa issuwa xeegi ehidi koyro uraakko , ‘ Ne bolla ta godaa acoy ay meli de7ii ? ’ yaagidi oychchis .
42016006	“ I , ‘ Laatamu barmeele zayte acoy de7ees ’ yaagis . “ Shuumay , ‘ Wule warqattiya he7e , ellesada , tammu barmeele zayte acoy de7ees gada xaafa ’ yaagis .
42016007	“ Hessafe kaallidi nam77anthuwako , ‘ New aappuni de7ii ? ’ yaagis . “ I , ‘ 370 kunttaale gistte acoy de7ees ’ yaagis . “ Shuumay , ‘ Ne wule warqattiya he7e , ellesada , 296 kunttaale yaagada xaafa ’ yaagis .
42016008	Keethaaway ammanettiboonna shuumaa iya bilaamatethaas nashshis . Ha alamiya nayti ase oythan poo7o naytappe aadhdhida wozanaamata .
42016009	“ Hessa gisho , ta hinttew odays ; ha alamiya miishey wuriya wode merinaa keethan mokettana mela ha miishiyara hinttew laggeta shammite .
42016010	Ubbaafe guuthaban ammanettiday daroban ammanettidayssa gidees . Qassi ubbaafe guuthaban ammanettonnayssi daroban ammanettenna .
42016011	Hiza , ha alamiya miishen hintte ammanettonna ixxiko tuma miishe hinttew ooni hadara immanee ?
42016012	Hintte hara asa miishen ammanettonna ixxiko , hintte buzo miishe hinttew ooni immanee ?
42016013	“ Issi aylley nam77u godatas haarettanaw dandda7enna . Issuwa ixxiko hankkuwa dosees woykko issuwako shiiqikko hankkuwa kadhees . Hessadakka , hintte Xoossasinne miishes haarettanaw dandda7ekketa . ”
42016014	Miishe dosiya Farisaaweti hessa si7ida wode Yesuusa qelqisidosona .
42016015	I , “ Hinttee hinttena asa sinthan xilliseeta , shin Xoossay hintte wozanaa erees . Asa sinthan bonchchettidayssi Xoossaa sinthan borettidayssa .
42016016	“ Muse higgeynne nabeta kiitay Yohaannisa gakkanaw hinttew odettishe gam77is . Hessafe guye , Xoossaa kawotethaa Wonggelay sabbakettishe gam77is . Asi ubbay yaa gelanaw dafettees .
42016017	Gidoshin , higgiyafe issi laafa pidaaley attanaappe saloynne sa7ay aadhdheyssi kawuyees .
42016018	“ Ba machchiw yeddidi haraa ekkiya ubbay laammees . Ba azinaappe anjjettidaaro ekkeysika laammees ” yaagis .
42016019	“ Al77onne alleeqo afila ma77iya , sa7i injjetin gallas gallas ufayssan de7iya issi dure asi de7ees .
42016020	Hari qassi asatethay kumethi madunxida issi Alaazara geetettiya manqoy he dure uraa karen yegetidi attidayssi de7ees .
42016021	Koshappe denddoyssan dure uraa gaytappe wodhdhiya tiifiya maanaw amottishe de7ees . Hari attoshin , kanati yidi iya madunthaa laaccosona .
42016022	“ He manqoy hayqqis ; kiitanchchoti iya Abrahame ki7uwa efidosona . Qassi dure uraykka hayqqidi moogettis .
42016023	Si7oolen un77ettidi de7ishe dhoqqu gidi haahon Abrahamenne iya ki7on de7iya Alaazara be7is .
42016024	I , ‘ Aawaw Abrahame , taw qadhettarkii ; ha laco taman un77ettada de7iya gisho Alaazari ba biradhdhiya haathan yeddidi ta inxarssaa laakothana mela hayyana iya yeddarkki ’ yaagidi waassis .
42016025	“ Shin Abrahamey iyaakko , ‘ Ta na7aw , ne sa7an de7iya wode lo77obaata ekkidayssa , qassi Alaazari iitabata ekkidayssa akeeka . Shin ha77i I hayssan ufayttees , qassi neeni waayettashe de7aasa ’ yaagis .
42016026	Ha ubbaafe aadhdhidi , ‘ Haappe hintteko , hinippe haa nuukko aadhdhanaw koyeyssati pinnonna mela nuusinne hinttes giddon gita aafoy de7ees ’ yaagis .
42016027	“ Dure uray , ‘ Aawaw , yaakko Alaazara ta aawa soo kiittana mela ta nena woossays .
42016028	Taw ichchashu ishati de7idosona , enttika ha waaye bessaa yoonna mela enttaw bidi markkatto ’ yaagis .
42016029	“ Shin Abrahamey , ‘ Enttaw Museranne nabetara de7oosona ; entti odiyabaa si7ona ’ yaagis .
42016030	“ Dure uray , ‘ Aawaw Abrahame , hessatho gidenna ; issi asi hayqoppe denddidi biikko entti maarotan gelana ’ yaagis .
42016031	“ Abrahamey , ‘ Musenne nabeta si7onna ixxiko , hari attoshin hayqoppe issi asi denddi odikkoka ammanokkona ’ yaagis . ”
42017001	Yesuusi ba tamaaretakko , “ Ase dhubethidi nagaran gelssiyabay yoonna aggenna . Gidoshin , nagaran gelana mela oothiya uraa ayye ” yaagis .
42017002	He uray kaalotappe issuwa balethanaappe woxa ba qoodhen qachchidi abban wulliko iyaw lo77o .
42017003	Hessa gisho naagettite . “ Ne ishay nagara oothiko hanqetta ; qiirottidi maarotethan simmiko , iyaw atto yaaga .
42017004	Issi gallasan laappun toho qohidi , laappun toho , ‘ Taani ta balaa eras tana maara ’ yaagidi neekko yiikko iyaw atto ga . ”
42017005	Hawaareti Godaakko , “ Ammano nuus gujjarkkii ” yaagidosona .
42017006	Goday , “ Gaashe ayfe mela ammanoy hinttew de7ikko ‘ Hayssa wolaa shodettada abbaa giddon toketta ’ yaagikko hinttew kiitettana ” yaagis .
42017007	Gujjidikka Yesuusi , “ Hintte giddofe issuwas goshshanchchoy woykko dorsse heemmiya aylley de7ikko ooso gadeppe woykko wudeppe soo simmiya wode ‘ Elle haayada kathi maanaw utta ’ yaagey de7ii ?
42017008	Deenna , ‘ Taw kaho giigisa ; taani mada , uyada aggana gakkanaw eqqada muza . Hessafe guye , neeni qassi maasanne uyaasa ’ yaagenneyye ?
42017009	Hiza , goday , aylley kiitaa polida gisho anjjiyye ?
42017010	Hessa gisho , hintteka kiitettoyssa ubbaa polida wode ‘ Nu pathonna aylleta ; oothanaw bessiya oosuwa polida ’ yaagite ” yaagis .
42017011	Yesuusi Yerusalaame bishe Samaarisinne Galiila biittaas giddora kanthidi aadhdhis .
42017012	Issi gutaa geliya wode baro harggen oykettida tammu asati iya demmidosona . Enttika haahon eqqidi ,
42017013	“ Godaa Yesuusa , nuus qadhettarkii ” yaagidi waassidosona .
42017014	I entta be7ida wode “ Bidi hinttenatethaa Ayhude kahine bessite ” yaagis . Entti ogiya bolla bishe paxidosona .
42017015	Enttafe issoy ba paxuwa be7ida wode dhoqqu gida qaalan Xoossaa bonchchishe Yesuusakko simmis .
42017016	I Samaare biitta asi , shin Yesuusa tohuwa bolla gufannidi iya galatis .
42017017	Yesuusi , “ Paxiday tammu asata gidokkonaayye ? Yaatin , uddufunati aw bidonaa ?
42017018	Ha allaga uraappe attin hari simmidi Xoossaa galatey deenna guusseyye ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
42017019	Uraakko , “ Ne ammanoy nena pathis ; denddada ba ” yaagis .
42017020	Farisaaweti , “ Xoossaa kawotethay awude yaanee ? ” gidi Yesuusa oychchidosona . I , “ Xoossaa kawotethay benttiya mallan yeenna .
42017021	Qassika iyo , ‘ Hannina woykko hinina yaaganaw dandda7enna . Ays giikko , Xoossaa kawotethay hintte giddon de7ees ’ ” yaagidi zaaris .
42017022	Yesuusi ba tamaaretakko , “ Asa Na7aa gallasatappe issuwa be7anaw hintte amottiya wodey yaana , shin hintte be7ekketa .
42017023	Asay , ‘ I yan de7ees ’ woykko , ‘ Hayssan de7ees ’ yaagana , shin enttana kaallidi booppite .
42017024	Wol77anthi wol77ammidi saluwa gaxappe gaxa poo7isiya mela Asa Na7aa yuussaa gallasay hessada hanana .
42017025	Shin hessi hananaappe sinthe Asa Na7ay daro waayanawunne ha yeletethan ixettanaw bessees .
42017026	Nohe wode hanidayssa mela Asa Na7aa wodiyankka hessada hanana .
42017027	Nohey Markkabiyan gelida qammaa gakkanaw asay mishenne uyishe , ekkishenne gelishe de7ishin dhayo haathay yidi ubbaa dhayssis .
42017028	Looxe laythankka hessatho hanis . Asay mishenne uyishe , shammishenne bayzishe , tokkishenne keexishe , gam77idosona .
42017029	Looxey Soodomeppe keyida gallas diinne geetettiya xuuggiyabay saloppe bukkidi ubbaa dhayssis .
42017030	Asa Na7ay qoncciya wodekka hessada hanana .
42017031	“ He gallasan oonikka karen de7ey keethaa giddon de7iyabaa ekkanaw soo geloppo . Hessadakka , gaden de7iya asi aykkoskka soo simmofo .
42017032	Looxe machchiw akeekite ;
42017033	ba shemppiw ashshanaw koyaa asi oonikka dhayssana ; ba shemppiw aathi immiya oonikka I ashshana .
42017034	Ta hinttew odays ; he gallasan nam77u asati issi arssan zin77ana . Issoy ekettana , hankkoy attana .
42017035	Nam77u maccasati wolla gaaccishin issiya ekettana , hankkiya attana .
42017036	Nam77u asati wolla gaden goyeyssatappe issoy ekettana , hankkoy attana ” yaagis .
42017037	Entti , “ Godaw aw ekettanee ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona . I , “ Bawuti de7iya bessan ankkoti shiiqoosona ” yaagis .
42018001	Yesuusi ba tamaareta azalonna ubba wode woossana mela tamaarssanaw koyidi yaagidi leemiso odis :
42018002	“ Issi kataman Xoossaas yashettonna asaskka yeellatonna issi daynni de7ees
42018003	He kataman issi am77iya da7awusu . Iyakka , ‘ Tawunne ta morkkiyas giddon de7iya mootuwa pirdda ’ yaagada ubba wode he daynnaako simerettawusu .
42018004	Daynnay guutha wodes I odaa si7onna ixxis , shin guyeppe ba wozanan , ‘ Taani Xoossaas yayyonna , asas yeellatonna ixxikokka ,
42018005	ha am77iya tana waaysiya gisho iw pirddana ; yaatonna ixxiko ubba wode yada tana salethana ’ yaagidi qoppis ” yaagis .
42018006	Godaykka , “ Geella daynnay gidayssa si7ideta ;
42018007	Xoossay qammanne gallas iyaakko waassiya ba dooridayssatas pirddeneyye ? Enttana maaddanaw gam77iyye ?
42018008	Ta hinttew odeyssa si7ite , ellesidi pirddana . Gidoshin , Asa Na7ay yaa wode sa7a bolla ammano demmanddeshsha ? ” yaagis .
42018009	Qassi zaaridi , Yesuusi , banttana xillo asada oothidi ceeqetteyssatasinne harata kadheyssatas hayssada yaagidi leemiso odis :
42018010	“ Nam77u asati woossanaw Xoossa Keethi bidosona . Issoy Farisaawe hankkoy qassi qaraxa qanxisiya asi .
42018011	Farisaawey eqqidi baw woossishe , ‘ Xoossaw taani harata mela bonqanchcho , geellanne laymatiya asi , aadhdhida qassi ha qaraxa qanxisiya uraa mela gidonna gisho nena galatays .
42018012	Saaminttafe nam77u toho xoomays , ta demmiyaba ubbaafe asiraata kessays ’ yaagis .
42018013	“ Shin qaraxa qanxiseyssi qassi haahon eqqidi hari attoshin salo dhoqqu gidi xeellanawukka yayyidi ba tiraa iccishe ‘ Xoossaw , tana nagaranchchuwa maararkii ’ gidi woossis .
42018014	Ta hinttew odeyssa si7ite ; Farisaawiyappe hayssi qaraxa qanxiseyssi Xoossaa sinthan xillo gididi ba soo simmis . Ays giikko , bana dhoqqu dhoqqu oothiya asi kawuyana , bana kawushshiya asi dhoqqu dhoqqu gaana ” yaagis .
42018015	Yesuusi yooga nayta bolla ba kushiya wothidi anjjana mela asay iyaakko ehoosona . Yesuusa tamaareti hessa be7idi ays Yesuusakko eheeti yaagidi kaccidosona .
42018016	Shin Yesuusi nayta baakko xeegidi , “ Yooga nayti taakko yaanayssa diggofite ; yo giite . Ays giikko , Xoossaa kawotethay enttada hanidayssatassa .
42018017	Taani hinttew tuma odays ; Xoossaa kawotethaa yooga naytatho ekkonnay oonikka yaa gelenna ” yaagis .
42018018	Ayhude halaqatappe issoy , “ Keeha asttamaariyaw , merinaa de7uwa demmanaw ay ootho ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
42018019	Yesuusi iyaakko , “ Ays tana keehaw yaagada xeegay ? Issi Xoossaafe attin hari keehi baawa .
42018020	Laammofa , wodhoppa , kaysotoppa , worddo markkattofa , ne aawanne ne aayiw bonchcha yaagiya kiitaa eray ” yaagidi oychchis .
42018021	Uraykka , “ Hessata ubbaa taani na7atethafe doomada naagashe gam77as ” yaagis .
42018022	Yesuusi hessa si7ida wode “ Hiza , new issibay paccees ; new de7iyaba ubbaa bayzada manqotas imma ; salon nena shaloy naagees . Yaata simmada tana kaalla ” yaagis .
42018023	Shin uray hessa si7ida wode iyaw daro shaloy de7iya gisho daro qiirottis .
42018024	Yesuusi uraa be7idi , “ Dure asas Xoossaa kawotethaa geloy waanidi un77anddeshsha ?
