44004026	Sa7aa kawotinne deriya haareyssati issife Godaa bollanne Kiristtoosa bolla denddidosona ’ yaagadasa .
44004027	“ Tumakka , Heroodisinne Phenxe Philaaxoosi Ayhude gidonna asaaranne Isra7eele asaara ne doorida ne geeshsha Na7aa Yesuusa bolla denddanaw ha kataman shiiqidosona .
44004028	Qassi neeni ne wolqqaaninne ne sheniyan oothana gada qoppa uttidabaa ubbaa polidosona .
44004029	Ha77ika Godaw , entta manddethaa be7a ; nuuni ne aylleti ne qaala kumetha wozanan odana mela nuna dandda7isa .
44004030	Ne geeshsha na7aa Yesuusa sunthan hargganchchota pathanaw , oorathabaynne malaatati oosettana mela ne kushiya micca ” gidi woossidosona .
44004031	Entti Xoossaa woossidaappe guye he entti shiiqidasoy qaaxxis . Entta ubban Geeshsha Ayyaani kumin Xoossaa qaala minotethan odidosona .
44004032	Ammaneysati ubbay qofaninne wozanan issino gididosona . Entti banttaw de7iyabaa tabaa goonnashin issife shaakettoosona .
44004033	Hawaarti Godaa Yesuusi hayqoppe denddidayssa gita wolqqan markkattosona . Xoossay entta ubbaas aadho keehatethaa darssidi immis .
44004034	Biitti woykko keethi de7eyssati ubbay bayzi ekkida miishiya ehiya gisho ammaneyssata giddon metootanchchoy issoykka baawa .
44004035	Miishiya ehidi hawaaretas immoosona ; he miishiya issuwas issuwas koshsheyssada shaakki shaakki immees .
44004036	Qoophiroosa giya bessan yelettida Yoosefa giya Leewe sheeshaappe gidida issoy de7ees . Iya sunthaa hawaareti Barnnabaasa ( Minthetho na7a ) gidosona .
44004037	Barnnabaasi baw de7iya biittaa bayzidi miishiya ehidi hawaaretas immis .
44005001	Issi Hananiya giya addey ba machche Saphphiirira gade bayzis .
44005002	He bayzida miishiyappe ba machchiya erishin baggaa ashshidi , attidayssa ehidi hawaaretas immis .
44005003	Shin Phexiroosi Hananiyakko , “ Neeni Geeshsha Ayyaana cimmana melanne gadiya bayzida miishiyappe shaakkada ashshana mela Xalahey ne wozanan ays gelidee ?
44005004	Neeni bayzanaappe kase gadey nebaa gidenneyye ? Qassi neeni bayza simminkka miishey nebaa gidenneyye ? Yaatin , hessa melabaa oothanaw ays ne wozanan qoppadii ? Neeni Xoossaa bolla worddotadasappe attin asa bolla worddotabaakka ” yaagis .
44005005	Hananey he qaala si7ida mela kunddidi hayqqis ; hessa si7ida ubbay daro yayyis .
44005006	Na7atetha asati soo gelidi iya ahaa xaaxidi efidi moogidosona .
44005007	Heedzu saateppe guye Hananiya machchiya hessa eronna de7ashe Phexiroosi de7iyasuwa gelasu .
44005008	Phexiroosi iikko , “ Hintte gadiya hayssa mela miishes bayzideti ? Ane taw oda ” yaagis . Iyakka , “ Ee , hayssa mela miishes bayzida ” yaagasu .
44005009	Phexiroosi maccasiw , “ Neeranne ne azinaara Godaa Ayyaana paaccanaw ays zorettidetii ? Hekko , ne azina moogida asati karen de7oosona ; nenakka entti kare kessana ” yaagis .
44005010	Maccasiya iirakka Phexiroosa tohuwa matan kunddada hayqqa aggasu ; na7atethati geliya wode hayqqidaaro demmidi kare kessidi , I azina matan moogidosona .
44005011	Kumetha woosa keethaynne hessa si7ida hara asa ubbay daro yayyidosona .
44005012	Hawaareti daro malaatatanne oorathabata asaa giddon oothoosona . Ammaniya ubbay Solomone baaranddan issife shiiqosona .
44005013	Hara asappe enttara gahettanaw issi asikka minnibeenna , shin asay entta bonchchees .
44005014	Ammaniya addetanne maccasata tayboy kaseyssafe darishe bis .
44005015	Hessa gisho , asay hargganchchota halaninne alggan tookkidi Phexiroosi aadhdhiya wode iya kuyay enttafe issota issota bolla shemppana mela oge doonan kessidi wothoosona .
44005016	Qassi daro asay Yerusalaame matan de7iya katamatappe hargganchchotanne tuna ayyaani waaysiya asata ekkidi yoosona ; ubbayka paxidosona .
44005017	Kahine halaqaynne iyara de7iya Saduqaaweti ubbay qanaaten kumidi hawaareta bolla denddidosona .
44005018	Hawaareta oykkidi deriya qasho keethan yeggidosona .
44005019	Shin Godaa kiitanchchoy qamma qasho keethaa penggiya dooyidi hawaareta kare kessidi ,
44005020	“ Bidi , Xoossa Keethan eqqidi ha ooratha de7o qaala asa ubbaas odite ” yaagis .
44005021	Hawaareti hessa si7ida wode wontta guura Xoossa Keethi gelidi tamaarsso doomidosona . Kahineta halaqaynne iyara de7eyssati yidi , Isra7eele cimata ubbaa xeegi shiishidi hawaareta bantta sinthe ehana mela wotaaddareta qasho keethi kiittidosona .
44005022	Shin wotaaddareti qasho keethi bidi hawaareta demmibookkona . Guye simmi yidi deriyas ,
44005023	“ Nuuni biya wode qasho keetha penggey minthi gorddettin , naageyssati penggen eqqidayssata demmida . Shin nuuni kariya dooyaa wode giddon hari attoshin issi asikka baawa ” yaagidosona .
44005024	Hessa gisho , Xoossa Keethaa wotaaddareta kiitteysinne kahine halaqati hessa si7ida wode “ Hawaareta bolla aybi haanidee ? ” yaagidi hirggidosona .
44005025	He wode issi addey enttako yidi , “ Hekko , qasho keethi hintte gelssida asati Xoossa Keethan eqqidi asaa tamaarssoosona ” yaagidi enttaw odis .
44005026	Xoossa Keethaa wotaaddareta kiitteyssi ba wotaaddaretara bidi hawaareta ehis . Shin entti banttana asay shuchchan caddana gidi yayyida gisho entta aaddashidi ehidosona .
44005027	Entti hawaareta ehidi , shiiqida shangguwa sinthan essin kahine halaqay enttako ,
44005028	“ Hinttena nuuni he uraa sunthan tamaarssonna mela minthidi kiittibookko ? Hekko , hintte timirttiya Yerusalaame katamaa ubbaa gathideta . He uraa shemppuwas nuna oythanaw qoppeeti ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
44005029	Phexiroosaranne hankko hawaaretara enttaw zaarishe , “ Nuuni asas kiitettanaappe Xoossas kiitettanaw bessees .
44005030	Masqaliya bolla hintte kaqqidi wodhida Yesuusa nu aawata Xoossay hayqoppe denthis .
44005031	Isra7eeleti nagaraappe simmana melanne entta nagaray atto geetettana mela Xoossay Yesuusa haareyssanne ashsheyssa oothidi bonchchon baappe ushachcha baggan utisis .
44005032	Hessas nuuni markka ; qassi Xoossay bana ammaneyssatas immida Geeshsha Ayyaanaykka markka ” yaagidosona .
44005033	Shiiqida asay hessa si7ida wode daro yilottidi , hawaareta wodhanaw qoppidosona .
44005034	Shin asa ubban daro bonchchettida , higge asttamaarey , Gamaaliyale giya issi Farisaawey denddi eqqidi hawaareta guutha wodes kare kessana mela kiittis .
44005035	Hessafe guye , shiiqida asaakko , “ Isra7eele asaw , ha asata bolla hintte oothanaw qoppiyabaappe naagettite .
44005036	Ays giikko , hayssafe kase Tewodaasi bana , ‘ Taani gita ’ gidi denddin , oyddu xeetu gidiya asati iyara issifidosona . Shin iya wodhin iya kaallida ubbay laalettin pathonna asi gididi attidosona .
44005037	Hessafe guye , asay taybettiya wode Galiila Yihudi denddidi daro asa panggayidi kaalethis , shin iyakka wodhin iya kaallida asa ubbay laalettis .
44005038	Ha77ika ta hinttew odays ; ha asatappe shaakettite ; entta bochchofite . Ays giikko , ha qofaanne ha oosuwa asi oothiyabaa gidikko dhayana .
44005039	Shin ha qofaynne ha oosoy Xoossafe yidabaa gidikko , hintte entta dhayssanaw dandda7ekketa . Geellada yaanishe hintte Xoossaara kaccettana ” yaagidi odis . Hessa gisho , shiiqida asay Gamaaliyale zoriya ekkidosona .
44005040	Hawaareta soo xeegidi lisson garaafisis . Hessafe guye , enttako , “ Yesuusa sunthaa nam77antho denthofite ” gidi birshshi yeddidosona .
44005041	Yesuusa sunthaa gisho entti kawuyanayssi bessiyabaa gideyssa erida gisho shangguwa sinthafe ufayttishe keyidosona .
44005042	Entti ubba wode Xoossa keethaninne asaa son Yesuusi I Kiristtoosa gideyssa tamaarssonne sabbako aggibookona .
44006001	He wode kaalleyssata tayboy dari dari bishin , Girike doona odettiya Ayhudeti Yihudan yelettidi de7iya Ayhudeta bolla zuuzummidosona . Ays giikko , Girike doona odettiya Ayhudeti , “ Gallas gallas imettiya kathan nu am77eti naaqettosona ” yaagidosona .
44006002	Tammanne nam77u hawaareti woosa keethaa asa ubbaa xeegidi , “ Nuuni Xoossaa qaala odeyssa aggidi kathi gishanaw nuus bessenna .
44006003	Hiza , ishato , lo77o asata , Geeshsha Ayyaananinne cinccatethan kumida laappun asata hintte giddofe doorite ; nuuni entta ha oosuwas shuumana .
44006004	Shin nuuni , nu kumetha wodiya Xoossaa woosaninne qaala tamaarsson peeshshana ” yaagidosona .
44006005	Hawaareti odida oday asa ubbaa ufayssis . Hessa gisho , ammanoynne Geeshsha Ayyaani kumida Isxifaanose , Filphoosa , Phirokoroosa , Niqaarone , Ximoona , Pharmmeenanne Ayhude ammano geli simmida Anxookiya Niqolawoosa dooridosona .
44006006	Entta hawaareta sinthan essin , hawaareti entta bolla kushe wothidi Xoossaa woossidosona .
44006007	Xoossaa qaalay dalggi dalggi bis . Yerusalaamen de7iya ammaneyssata tayboy dari dari bis ; daro kahinetikka ammanidosona .
44006008	Isxifaanosey aadho keehatethaaninne wolqqan kumidi asaa giddon oorathabatanne malaatata oothees .
44006009	Aylletethafe keyida Ayhude Woosa Keetha asay Qereenappenne Iskkinddiriyappe Kilqiyafenne Iisiyappe yida issi issi asati denddidi Isxifaanosera palamidosona .
44006010	Shin Isxifaanosey Ayyaana wolqqan odettiya cinccatethaa entti eqettanaw dandda7ibookkona .
44006011	He wode entti , “ Musenne Xoossaa I cayishin si7ida ” giya worddo asata shammidosona .
44006012	Hessada oothidi biitta cimatanne higge asttamaareta iya bolla denthidosona . Isxifaanose oykkidi Shangguwa sinthe efidosona .
44006013	Iya bolla paydida worddo markkati , “ Ha uray ha Xoossa Keethanne Muse higgiya zaari zaari cayees .
44006014	I , ‘ Hayssi Naazirete Yesuusi , ha Xoossa Keethaa laallana ; qassi Musey nuus immida higgiya laammana ’ yaagishin nuuni si7ida ” yaagidosona .
44006015	Shanggo shiiqon uttida asa ubbay Isxifaanose loythidi xeelliya wode iya som77oy kiitanchcho som77o daanees .
44007001	Kahineta halaqay Isxifaanosekko , “ Hayssi tumee ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
44007002	Isxifaanosey , “ Ta ishato , ta aawato , si7ite ! Nu aawa Abrahamey Kaaranen daanaw baanappe sinthe Masephexoomiyan de7ishin , bonchcho Xoossay iyaw qonccidi ,
44007003	‘ Ne biittaafenne ne dabbotappe shaakettada taani nena bessiya biittaa ba ’ yaagis .
44007004	He wode Abrahamey Kalddaaweta biittaafe keyidi Kaaranen daanaw bis . Iya aaway hayqqidaappe guye Xoossay iya ha biittaa ha77i hintte de7iya bessaa ehis .
44007005	I ha biittaafe hari attoshin tohoy yedhdhiya bessika Abrahames immibeenna . Shin na7i iyaw baynna wode Xoossay ha biittaa iyawunne iya sheeshaas laata oothidi immanayssa qaala gelis .
44007006	Xoossay Abrahamekko , ‘ Ne sheeshay hara biittan imathatethan daana ; yan oyddu xeetu laythi entti aylletethan haarettana .
44007007	Shin taani ne sheeshaa haariya deriya bolla pirddana . Hessafe guye , entti he biittaafe keyidi hayssan taw goynnana ’ yaagis .
44007008	Xoossay Abrahame sheeshay qaxxarettana mela iyara caaqqin , Yisaaqi yelettida hosppuntha gallasan qaxxaris . Yisaaqi Yayqooba qaxxaris ; qassi Yayqoobi tammanne nam77u ba nayta , nu aawata mayzata qaxxaris .
44007009	“ Yayqooba nayti Yoosefa qanaattidi Gibxxe biittan aylletethas bayzidosona , shin Xoossay iyara de7ees .
44007010	Iya , iya waaye ubbaafe kessis . Gibxxe kawuwa sinthan sabanne cinccatethi iyaw immis . Gibxxe kawoy Yoosefas Gibxxe biittaanne ba keetha ubbaa aysanaada halaqatethi immis .
44007011	“ Gibxxe biittaninne Kanaane biitta ubban koshi gelidi daro asaa un77ethis . He wode nu mayzati kathi demmanaw dandda7ibookkona .
44007012	Yayqoobi Gibxxe biittan kathi de7eyssa si7idi nu aawata koyro yaa yeddis .
44007013	Nam77antho buussan Yoosefi ba ishatas banatethaa erisis . Gibxxe kawoykka Yoosefa sheeshaa eris .
44007014	Yoosefi ba aawa Yayqoobanne ba dabbo ubbaa , laappun tammanne ichchashu asaa baakko yaana mela kiittidi ehisis .
44007015	Yayqoobi Gibxxe biittaa wodhdhis ; inne iya nayti yan hayqqidosona .
44007016	Entta ahay he bessaafe Seekeme biittaa tookettidi bidi , yan Abrahamey Hamoore naytappe daro biran shammida duufon moogettis .
44007017	“ Shin Xoossay Abrahames immana gidayssa poliya wodey gakkanaw matida wode Gibxxe biittan de7iya nu asay dari dari bis .
44007018	Hessafe guye , Yoosefa eronna hara kawoy Gibxxe biittan kawotis .
44007019	He kawoy nu zerethaa genidi guutha nayti hayqqana mela entta kare kessi yeggana mela nu aawata un77ethis .
44007020	“ He wode Musey yelettis ; I Xoossaa sinthan daro lo77o na7a . Ba aawa keethan heedzu ageena gakkanaw diccis .
44007021	Musey wora holettida wode Gibxxe kawuwa na7iya demma ekkada ba na7a oothada iya dichchasu .
44007022	Musey Gibxxeta cinccatetha ubbaa tamaaridi odaninne ooson mino asi gidis .
44007023	“ Muses laythay oytama kumida wode ba ishata , Isra7eeleta be7anaw ba wozanan qoppis .
44007024	Isra7eelatappe issuwa Gibxxe issoy qohishin be7idi he Isra7eele uraa maaddidi , he qohida Gibxxe uraa wodhidi kushe zaaris .
44007025	Musey ba ishata ba baggara Xoossay ashshanaw haneyssa entti akeekana gidi qoppis , shin entti akeekibookkona .
44007026	“ Wonttetha gallas nam77u Isra7eele asati issoy issuwara wadhettishin demmidi entta sigethanaw koyidi , ‘ Asato , hintte ishantta ; ays issoy issuwa qohetii ? ’ yaagis .
44007027	“ Shin ba laggiya qoheyssi Musekko , ‘ Nena nu bolla haareyssanne daynna oothiday oonee ?
44007028	Neeni zine Gibxxe uraa wodhidayssada tana wodhanaw koyay ? ’ yaagidi Muse sugi yeddis .
44007029	Musey hessa si7ida wode Gibxxefe betidi Miidiyaame biittan bete asi gididi de7ishe nam77u adde nayta yelis .
44007030	“ Godaa kiitanchchoy oytamu laythafe guye Siina Deriya matan de7iya bazzo tushiya giddon eexiya tama laco giddon Muses benttis .
44007031	Musey ba be7idayssan malaalettidi , loythi be7anaw tushiya mati shiiqidi de7ishin , Godaa qaalay ,
44007032	‘ Taani ne aawata , Abrahame Xoossaa , Yisaaqa Xoossaa , Yayqooba Xoossaa ’ yaagishe Musekko yis . Musey yashshan kokkoridi xeellanaw dandda7ibeenna .
44007033	“ Goday Musekko , ‘ Neeni eqqida biittay geeshshi gidiya gisho ne tohuwan de7iya caammaa kessa .
44007034	Taani Gibxxen de7iya ta asaa un77etethaa be7as . Entta waasuwa si7ada entta ashshanaw wodhdhas . Ha77i haaya ! Taani nena Gibxxe kiittana ’ yaagis .
44007035	“ Isra7eeleti Muse , ‘ Nena nuna haareyssanne daynna oothiday oonee ? ’ yaagidi ixxidayssa tushiya giddon iyaw benttida kiitanchchuwa baggara haareyssanne ashsheyssa oothidi Xoossay kiittis .
44007036	Musey Isra7eeleta Gibxxefe kessidi malaalisiyabatanne oorathabata Gibxxe biittaninne Zo7o Abban oothidi entta oytamu laythi bazzo biittan kaalethis .
44007037	“ Isra7eele asaakko , ‘ Xoossay tana denthidayssada hintte sheeshaa giddofe ta mela nabe hinttew denthana ’ yaagiday he Muse .
44007038	Bazzo biittan shiiqida Isra7eele asaara de7idayssi , nu aawataranne Siina Deriya bolla iyaw odida kiitanchchuwara de7ida Musey iya . Yaatidi , Xoossaa de7o qaala nuus immanaw ekkis .
44007039	“ Shin nu mayzati Muses kiitettanaw dosibookkona ; iya ixxidi guye Gibxxe simmanaw amottidosona .
44007040	Qassi Aaronakko , ‘ Nuna kaalethiya xoossata nuus ootha . Ays giikko , hayssi nuna Gibxxefe ehida Musey , waanidaakko nuuni erokko ’ yaagidosona .
44007041	He wode mari daanisidi eeqa oothidosona . He eeqaas yarshsho yarshshidi bantta kushen oothida oosuwan ufayttidosona .
44007042	Shin Xoossay enttaw zokko zaaris . Entti salo xoolinttota goynnana mela entta yeggi aggis . Nabeta maxaafan , ‘ Isra7eele asaw , oytamu laythi kumethi bazzo biittan shukkida mehiyanne yarshshida yarshshuwa taw yarshshidetii ?
44007043	Hinttee , hinttew goynnanaw kessida eeqaanne Moloke dunkkaaniya Refaana giya hintte xoossaa xoolintto misiliya tookkideta . Taani hinttena Baabilooneppe hini bagga yeddana ’ geetettidi xaafettis .
44007044	“ Nu aawatas bazzo biittan markka dunkkaaney de7ees . Iyakka Xoossay Muse kiittidayssadanne iya bessidayssada oothis .
44007045	Qassi nu aawati he dunkkaaniya bantta aawatappe ekkidi Xoossay kase yedethida Ayhude gidonna asaa biittaa oykkida wode Iyyaasura yaa ekkidi gelidosona . He dunkkaaney Dawite wode gakkanawukka he bessan de7is .
44007046	Dawitey Xoossan sabettis . Qassi Yayqooba Goday de7ana keethaa keexanaw Xoossaa woossis .
44007047	Shin iyaw keethaa keexiday Solomone .
44007048	“ Hanoshin , Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossay asi keexida keethan deenna . Nabey gidayssa mela ,
44007049	‘ Saloy ta araata , sa7aykka ta tohoy yedhdhiyaso . Yaatin , taw hintte ay mela keethi keexanee ? Woykko taani shemppiyasoy awunee ?
44007050	Ha ubbaa ta kushiyan oothabiikkinaa ? ’ yaagees Goday .
44007051	“ Hintte waanida si7onna asee ? Hintte wozanay Xoossaa qaala ekkanaw ays ixxide ? Hintte haythay ays tullidee ? Hinttee , hintte aawatatho ubba wode Geeshsha Ayyaanaara eqetteeta .
44007052	Nabeta giddofe hintte aawati gooddonnay oonee ? Xoossaa Na7ay , Xilloy yaanayssa kasetidi odidayssata wodhidosona . Ha77i hintte iya aathi immidi wodhideta .
44007053	Hintte kiitanchchuwa kusheppe Xoossaa higgiya ekkideta , shin kiitettibeekketa ” yaagis .
44007054	Entti hessa si7ida wode bantta wozanan Isxifaanose bolla daro yilottidi , bantta mettershshaa saxxidi manddidosona .
44007055	Shin Isxifaanosey Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumidi , salo pude xeellidi , Xoossaa bonchchuwanne Yesuusa Xoossaa ushachcha baggan eqqidayssa be7is .
44007056	“ Hekko , taani saloy dooyettin , Asa Na7ay , Xoossaa ushachcha baggan eqqidayssa be7ays ” yaagis .
44007057	Qaalaa dhoqqu oothidi waassishe , bantta haythaa oykkidi issife iyaakko woxxidosona
44007058	Iya katamaappe gaxa kessidi , shuchchan caddidosona . Markkati bantta ma7uwa issi Saa7ola giya na7atethaa matan wothidosona .
44007059	Isxifaanosey , “ Ta Godaa Yesuusaa , ta shemppuwa ekka ” yaagidi xeegishin entti iya shuchchan caddoosona .
44007060	Gulbbatidi , ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Ta Godaw , ha nagaraa enttaw atto ga ” yaagis . Hessa yaagidi simmida mela hayqqi aggis .
44008001	Saa7oli Isxifaanose hayquwan ufayttis . He gallas Yerusalaamen de7iya woosa keethan gita goodi denddis . Hawaareti attin ammaneyssati ubbay Yihuda biittaninne Samaare biittan laalettidosona .
44008002	Issi issi Xoossaa asati Isxifaanose moogidosona ; qassi iyaw daro yeekkidosona .
44008003	Shin Saa7oli woosa keethaa dhayssanaw koyees . Soo soo yuuyi gelidi , ammaniyaa addetanne maccasata goochchi goochchi kessidi qasho keethi gelssees .
44008004	Laalettida ammaneyssati bida bessa ubban qaala odidosona .
44008005	Filphoosi Samaare katamaa bidi Kiristtoosabaa asaas odis .
44008006	Daro asay Filphoosi gidayssa si7ida wodenne I oothiya malaatata be7ida wode iya akeekidi si7idosona .
44008007	Tuna ayyaanati waassidi daro asaappe keyidosona ; qassi daro gunddatinne wobbeti bilettidosona .
44008008	He kataman de7iya asay daro ufayttidosona .
44008009	Shin Simoona giya issi uray he kataman de7ees . I , ‘ Bana gita ’ gidi Samaare asaa marotethan malaalisishe gam77is .
44008010	Guuthafe gita gakkanaw de7iya asa ubbay , “ Gita Xoossaa wolqqay hayssa ” gidi iyabaa si77oosona .
44008011	Daro wodeppe doomidi marotishe Samaare asaa malaalisida gisho asay iyabaa si7oosona .
44008012	Shin Filphoosi Xoossaa kawotethaabaanne Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunthabaa addetasinne maccatas odin , entti iyabaa ammanidi xammaqettidosona .
44008013	Qassi Simoonikka ba huu7en ammanidi xammaqettis . Filphoosara issife bida bessa ubban oosettiya gita malaatata be7idi malaalettis .
44008014	Yerusalaamen de7iya hawaareti Samaare asay Xoossaa qaala ekkidayssa si7ida wode Phexiroosanne Yohaannisa enttako yeddidosona .
44008015	Phexiroosinne Yohaannisi bidi , ammaneyssati Geeshsha Ayyaana ekkana mela enttaw Xoossaa woossidosona .
44008016	Ays giikko , Samaare asati Godaa Yesuusa sunthaa xalaalan xammaqettidosonappe attin enttafe issuwa bollaka Geeshsha Ayyaani wodhdhibeenna .
44008017	He wode Phexiroosinne Yohaannisi bantta kushiya entta bolla wothin , entti Geeshsha Ayyaana ekkidosona .
44008018	Hawaareti bantta kushiya entta bolla wothin , enttaw Geeshsha Ayyaanay imettidayssa Simooni be7ida wode Phexiroosasinne Yohaannisas miishe ehidi ,
44008019	“ Taanikka ta kushiya wothiya ubbay Geeshsha Ayyaana ekkana mela ha maata tawukka immerkketi ” yaagis .
44008020	Shin Phexiroosi iyaakko , “ Neeni Xoossaa imotaa miishen shammanaw qoppida gisho ne miishey neera dhayo .
44008021	Ne wozanay Xoossaa sinthan suure gidonna gisho new hayssan gishoy woykko qaadi baawa .
44008022	Hiza , ha ne wozanaa iitatethaa gisho nagaraappe simma . Ne wozanan de7iya iita qofaa Xoossay atto gaana mela Xoossaa woossa .
44008023	Gaasoykka , neeni iita qanaateninne nagara qashuwan de7eyssa taani be7ays ” yaagis .
44008024	Simooni zaaridi , “ Hintte gidayssafe issoykka tana gakkonna mela taw Xoossaa woossite ” yaagis .
44008025	Phexiroosinne Yohaannisi markkattidaappenne Godaa qaala odidaappe guye Yerusalaame simmidosona . Samaaren de7iya daro gutatan Wonggelaa odidosona .
44008026	Godaa kiitanchchoy Filphoosakko , “ Denddada Yerusalaameppe Gaaza efiya bazzo biitta ogiyakko ba . He ogey dugeha baggara de7ees ” yaagis .
44008027	Filphoosi denddidi bis . Hinddeke giya Tophphiya kawees I miishe ubbaa naagiya Tophphiya asi de7ees . Ikka goynnanaw Yerusalaame bis .
44008028	Para gaariyan uttidi , Yerusalaameppe ba biittaa simmishe nabiya Isayaasa maxaafaa nabbabees .
44008029	Geeshsha Ayyaanay Filphoosakko , “ He gaariyakko bada iya mati shiiqa ” yaagis .
44008030	Yaatin Filphoosi woxxi bidi gakkiya wode moorinnay nabiya Isayaasa maxaafappe nabbabishin si7idi , “ Ne nabbabeyassi new geli ? ” yaagis .
44008031	Moorinnay , “ Taw odi gelssiya asi baynna waanidi gelanee ? ” yaagis . Baara gaariyan keyidi uttana mela Filphoosa woossis .
44008032	Moorinnay nabbabiya maxaafaa kifiley , “ I dorssada shukettanaw laagettis ; Dorssa mari ba ikisiya meedeyssata sinthan si77i geyssada , ikka ba doona dooyibeena .
44008033	I kawuyis ; iyaw xillo pirddi dhays . iya de7oy ha sa7aappe qanxettida gisho iya sheeshaabaa oone odanay ? ” yaagees .
44008034	Moorinnay zaaridi Filphoosakko , “ Nabey odebaa odi ? Babaa odiyye woykko hara asabaa odi ? Taw odarkkii ” yaagis .
44008035	Filphoosi zaaridi , Xoossaa qaala he bessaafe doomidi , Yesuusabaa odiya Wonggelaa iyaw odis .
44008036	Entti bishe haathi de7iyaso gakkidosona . Moorinnay , “ Haathe hayssa be7a ; ta xammaqettonna mela aybi diggii ? ” yaagis .
44008037	Filphoosi iyaakko , “ Neeni ne kumetha wozanaappe ammanikko dandda7aasa ” yaagis . I zaaridi , “ Yesuus Kiristtoosi Xoossaa Na7aa gideyssa taani ammanays ” yaagis .
44008038	Gaarey eqqana mela moorinnay kiittin , nam77ay wodhdhidi haathan gelidosona ; Filphoosi iya xammaqis .
44008039	Entti haathaafe gaxa keyida wode Godaa ayyaanay Filphoosa qopponna ekkis . Nam77antho moorinnay Filphoosa be7ibeenna , shin ba ogiya ufayttishe bis .
44008040	Filphoosi Azaaxonan bana demmis . Qassi Qisaariya yaana gakkanaw katamatan yuuyidi Wonggelaa markkattis .
44009001	He wode Saa7oli Godaa kaalleyssata wodhanaw manddidi kahine halaqaakko bis .
44009002	Godaa ogiya kaalliya addetanne maccata demmiko , qachchishe Yerusalaame ehanaw , Damasqqon de7iya Ayhude Woosa Keethatas dabddaabbey xaafettana mela iya woossis .
44009003	I bidi , Damasqqo katamaa gakkanaw matishin , qopponna saloppe wolqqaama poo7oy iya yuushuwan poo7is .
44009004	I sa7an kunddidashin , “ Saa7olaa , Saa7olaa , ays tana goodday ? ” giya qaala si7is .
44009005	Saa7oli , “ Godaw , neeni oonee ? ” yaagidi oychchis . “ Taani , neeni gooddiya Yesuusa ” yaagis .
44009006	Shin Saa7oli kokkorishenne malaalettishe , “ Godaw , taani ay oothana mela koyay ? ” yaagis . Goday iyaakko , “ Denddada katamaa gela ; neeni oothanaw bessiyabay yan new odettana ” yaagis .
44009007	Saa7olara ogiya biya asati aykkoka odettonna eqqi attidosona . Qaalaa si7oosona , shin oonakka be7ibookkona .
44009008	Saa7oli kunddida bessaafe denddidi xeelliya wode iya ayfey demmonna ixxis . Hessa gisho , entti iya kushiya oykkidi kaalethidi Damasqqo gelssidosona .
44009009	Heedzu gallas gakkanaw I xeellanaw dandda7ibeenna ; aykkoka mibeenna ; uyibeenna .
44009010	Damasqqon issi Hananiya giya Yesuusa tamaarey de7ees . Goday qonccethan , “ Hananiya ” yaagidi xeegis . Hananey zaaridi , “ Ta Godaw , hayssan de7ays ” yaagis .
44009011	Goday iyaakko , “ Denddada Suure geetettiya ogiya bada , Yihuda son Saa7ola giya terseseppe yida uraa koya ; Saa7oli woossees .
44009012	Qassi Hananey gelidi , Saa7oli nam77antho xeellana mela ba kushiya iya bolla wothishin qonccethan be7is ” yaagis .
44009013	Hananey zaaridi , “ Godaw , Yerusalaamen ne geeshsha asaa bolla he uray ay mela iitabaa oothidaakko taani daro asaappe si7as .
44009014	Qassi Damasqqon ne sunthaa xeegeyssata ubbaa qachchanaw , kahine halaqati iyaw maata immidosona ” yaagis .
44009015	Shin Goday iyaakko , “ Saa7oli Ayhude gidonna asaa sinthan , kawota sinthaninne Isra7eele asaa sinthan , ta sunthaa erisanawunne taw oothanaw doorettida miishe gidiya gisho neeni iyaakko ba .
44009016	Ays giikko , ta sunthaa gisho I ay mela waaye ekkanaw bessiyako taani iya bessana ” yaagis .
44009017	Hananey bidi , soo gelidi , ba kushiya Saa7ola bolla wothidi , “ Ta ishaa Saa7ola , neeni yaa ogiyan new benttida Godaa Yesuusi , neeni xeellana melanne Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumana mela tana kiittis ” yaagis .
44009018	Ellesidi , Saa7ola ayfiyaappe issi poqo melabay wodhdhin , Saa7oli nam77antho xeellis . Qassi denddidi xammaqettis .
44009019	Kathi midi xaalidi , Damasqqon de7iya ammaneyssatara guutha gallas gam77is .
44009020	Ellesidi Saa7oli , “ Yesuusi Xoossaa Na7a ” yaagidi Damasqqon de7iya Ayhude Woosa Keethatan qaala tamaarssis .
44009021	Hessa si7ida ubbay malaalettidi , “ Hayssi Yerusalaamen Yesuusa sunthaa xeegeyssata qachcheyssa gidenneyye ? Qassi haa yiday entta qachchidi , kahine halaqata sinthe efanaassa gidennee ? ” yaagidosona .
44009022	Shin Saa7oli qaala odon minni minni bis . Yesuusi , I Kiristtoosa gideyssa qonccisidi odida gisho Damasqqon de7iya Ayhudeti iyaw zaariyaba dhayidosona .
44009023	Daro gallasappe guye Ayhudeti shiiqidi , Saa7ola wodhanaw zorettidosona .
44009024	Shin Ayhudeti bana wodhanaw qoppidayssa Saa7oli si7is . Entti iya wodhanaw qammanne gallas katamaa penggiyan naagoosona .
44009025	Shin iya tamaareti iya qamma efidi , gimbbe dirssaa maskkotiyara daachchora wodhisidosona .
44009026	Saa7oli Yerusalaame gakkida wode ammaneyssatara gahettanaw koyis . Shin I Kiristtoosa ammanidayssi enttaw tuma daanonna ixxin iyaw yayyidosona .
44009027	Shin Barnnabaasi Saa7ola hawaaretakko efis . Ogen Goday waanidi qonccidaakkonne haasayisidaakko , qassi Saa7oli Damasqqon Yesuusa sunthan yayyonna waattidi qaala odidaakko enttaw geeshshidi odis .
44009028	Saa7oli Yerusalaamen yuuyidi Godaa sunthan yayyonna qaala odishe , hawaaretara issife de7is .
44009029	Qassi Saa7oli Girike qaala haasayaa Ayhudetara odettishe palamees . Shin entti iya wodhanaw koyidosona .
44009030	Ammaniya asati hessa si7idi , Saa7ola Qisaariya efidi Terseese yeddidosona .
44009031	Yihudan , Galiilaninne Samaare ubban de7iya woosa keethati sarotethaan de7idosona . Qassi minnidosona ; Godaas yayyishe Geeshsha Ayyaana minthethuwan dari dari bidosona .
44009032	Phexiroosi biitta ubbaa yuuyishe Liidan de7iya ammaniyaa asatakko gakkis .
44009033	Yan hosppun laythi kumethi gunddidi arssan zin77idi de7iya Eeniya giya addiya demmis .
44009034	Phexiroosi , “ Eeniya , Yesuus Kiristtoosi nena pathana ; denddada ne hiixa dentha ” yaagis . Ikka ellesidi denddi eqqis .
44009035	Liidaninne Saaronan de7iya asa ubbay Eeniya be7idi , Godaakko simmidosona .
44009036	Yoophe kataman issi Xaabito giya ammaniyaara de7awusu . ( Xaabito guussay gen77e guussu ) Iya ba de7ida wode ubban lo77obaa oothashenne manqota maaddashe de7asu .
44009037	He wode iya harggada hayqqin , asay I ahaa meeccidi , pooqiya bolla kessidi zin77isidosona .
44009038	Liidi Yoophes mata . Ammaneyssati Phexiroosi Liidan de7eyssa si7idi , “ Hayyana nuukko ellessada ya ” yaagiya kiitaa nam77u asata bolla iyaakko kiittidosona .
44009039	Hessa gisho , Phexiroosi denddidi , enttara bis . Yaa gakkin , pooqiya bolla de7iya kifiliya iya gelssidosona . Am77eti Phexiroosa yuushuwan eqqidi yeekkishe Dorqqa enttara paxa de7ashe oothida qamisetanne afilata ubbaa Phexiroosa bessidosona .
44009040	Phexiroosi entta ubbaa kare kessidi , gulbbatidi Xoossaa woossis . Qassi ahaako simmidi , “ Xaabite , dendda ” yaagis . Xaabita ba ayfiyaa dooyada Phexiroosa be7ada , dendda uttasu .
44009041	Phexiroosi iyo ba kushiyan maaddidi denthi essis . Hessafe guye , ammaneyssatanne am77eta xeegidi , denddidaaro entta sinthe shiishis .
44009042	Ha oday Yoophe katama ubbaa gakkis . Daro asay Godaa ammanidosona .
44009043	Phexiroosi Yoophen Simoona giya galbba haasheyssa son daro gallas gam77is .
44010001	Qisaariyan , “ Xaale ola asata ” geetettiya olanchchota giddon issi Qornneliyoosa geetettiya mato halaqay de7ees .
44010002	Qornneliyoosi ba soo asaara Xoossaa minthi ammaniyaa asinne Xoossaa goynniya asi . Ayhude manqotakka daro maaddees , qassi Xoossaa ubba wode woossees .
44010003	Issi gallas uddufun saate heeran Xoossaa kiitanchchoy iyaakko yidi , “ Qornneliyoosaa ” gidi xeegishin I qonccethan geeshshidi be7is .
44010004	Qornneliyoosi dagammidi kiitanchchuwa tishshi oothi xeellidi , “ Godaw , I aybee ? ” yaagis . Kiitanchchoy zaaridi , “ Ne woosaynne manqota ne maaddeyssi Xoossaa sinthan hassayettis .
44010005	Ha77i Yoophe ase kiittada , Phexiroosa giya Simoona ehisa .
44010006	Phexiroosi abbaa doonan galbba haashiya Simoona son imathatethi siiratis ” yaagis .
44010007	Qornneliyoosi baw odida kiitanchchoy bin , ba aylletappe nam77atanne Xoossaa goynniya ba mata wotaaddaretappe issuwa xeegidi ,
44010008	enttaw ubbabaa odidi Yoophe kiittis .
44010009	Wonttetha gallas entti bidi , Yoophe katama matishin usuppun saate heeran Xoossaa woossanaw Phexiroosi pooqe bolla keys .
44010010	I koshattidi kathi maanaw koyis , shin kathi kaxishin I qonccethi be7is .
44010011	Saloy dooyettin , gita afila daaniyabay oyddu baggara oykettidi wodhdhishin I be7is .
44010012	Iyan oyddu tohora de7iya meheti , wora do7ati , ulora gooshettiya medhetethatinne salo kafoti ubbay de7ees .
44010013	He wode “ Phexiroosaa , dendda eqqada shukkada ma ” giya qaali iyaakko yis .
44010014	Shin Phexiroosi , “ Godaw , akkay ! Ta tunabaa ubbarakka ma erikke ” yaagis .
44010015	Qassi , “ Xoossay geeshshidayssa neeni tuna gooppa ” giya qaali nam77antho iyaakko yis .
44010016	Hessika , heedzu toho hanidaappe guye he gita afila daaneyssi ellesidi pude salo ekettis .
44010017	Phexiroosi ba be7ida qonccethaa birshshethay , “ Ay gidanddeshsha ? ” gidi ba wozanan qoppishin , Qornneliyoosi kiittida asati Simoona soo oychchi demmidi karen eqqidosona .
44010018	Bantta qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Phexiroosa giya Simooni imathatethan de7ey hayssanee ? ” yaagidi oychchidosona .
44010019	Phexiroosi qonccethan be7idabaa qofa bolla de7ishin , Geeshsha Ayyaani iyaakko , “ Hekko , heedzu asati nena koyoosona .
44010020	Denddada wodhdha , taani entta kiittida gisho sidhonna enttara ba ” yaagis .
44010021	Phexiroosi asatakko wodhdhidi , “ Hintte koyey tana ; ays yidetii ? ” yaagis .
44010022	Entti zaaridi , “ Nuna mato halaqay Qornneliyoosi kiittis . I xillo , Xoossaa goynniya asinne Ayhude asa ubban daro bonchchettida asi . Qornneliyoosi , nena ba soo ehisidi qaala neeppe si7ana mela geeshsha kiitanchchoy iyaw odis ” yaagidosona .
44010023	Phexiroosi asata soo gelssidi mokkis . Wonttetha gallas , denddidi enttara bis . Yoophe kataman de7iya ammaneyssatappe issoti issoti iyara issife bidosona .
44010024	Wonttetha gallas , Qisaariya gakkidosona . Qornneliyoosi ba dabbotanne ba mata laggeta issife xeegi shiishidi , Phexiroosa naagees .
44010025	Phexiroosi soo gelana hanishin , Qornneliyoosi iyara gahettidi iya sinthan kunddidi iyaw goynnanaw koyis .
44010026	Shin Phexiroosi , “ Dendda , takka ta huu7en ne mela ase ” yaagidi iya denthis .
44010027	Phexiroosi Qornneliyoosara odettishe soo geliya wode daro asay shiiqidayssa demmis .
44010028	I asaakko , “ Ayhude asi hara derera issifanaw woykko gahettanaw woga gidonnayssa hintte ereeta . Shin taani oonakka tuna woykko geeshshi gidenna goonna mela Xoossay tana bessis .
44010029	Hessa gisho , hintte taakko kiittin ixoy baynna yas . Ha77i tana ays xeegisidaakko taw odite ” yaagis .
44010030	Qornneliyoosi , “ Taani hachchi oyddu gallasappe kase hannoode uddufun saate woosa woossishin , phooliya ma7o ma77ida asi ta sinthan eqqis .
44010031	I taakko , ‘ Qornneliyoosa , Xoossay ne woosaa si7is , neeni manqota maaddidayssaka hassays .
44010032	Hiza , ase Yoophe kiittada , Simoon Phexiroosa geyssa xeegisa . I , Simoona giya galbba haashiya uraa son abbaa doonan siiratis ’ yaagis .
44010033	Hessa gisho , taani neekko ellesada kiittas ; ne lo77o yadasa . Hiza , Xoossay nena Kiittidaba ubbaa si7anaw ha77i nuuni ubbay hayssan Godaa sinthan de7oos ” yaagis .
44010034	Kaallidikka , Phexiroosi , “ Xoossay asa som77o be7idi ase asappe shaakkenna .
44010035	Shin ase ubbaa oona gidikkoka baw yayyeyssanne xillo ooso ootheyssan Xoossay ufaytteyssa taani tuma akeekas .
44010036	Xoossay , ubbaa Goda gidida Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara sarotethaa odishe ha Wonggelaa Isra7eele asaas kiittidayssa hintte ereeta .
44010037	Yohaannisi xinqqatebaa Galiilan sabbakida wodiyappe doomidi Yihuda biitta ubbaa gakkanaw hanidabaa hintte ereeta .
44010038	Xoossay Naazirete Yesuusas Geeshsha Ayyaananne wolqqaa immis . Xoossay iyara de7iya gisho lo77obaa I oothishe Xalahe kushen haarettida ubbaa pathishe yuuyis .
44010039	“ Ayhude biittaninne Yerusalaamen I oothida ubbabaas nuuni markkatta . Entti masqaliya bolla kaqqidi iya wodhidosona .
44010040	Shin Xoossay heedzantho gallasan hayqoppe iya denthidi asaas qonccana mela oothis .
44010041	He qonccethay Xoossay koyro doorida markkatassafe attin asa ubbaas gidenna . I hayqoppe denddidaappe guye iyara midanne uyida .
44010042	Nuuni Wonggelaa asaas odana melanne paxa de7eyssata bollanne hayqqidayssata bolla pirddanaw Xoossay shuumiday Yesuusa gideyssa markkattana mela nuna kiittis .
44010043	Xoossay iya ammaniyaa ubbaa nagaray , iya sunthan atto geetetteyssa nabeti markkattoosona ” yaagis .
44010044	Phexiroosi buroo he oda onggonnashin qaala si7iya ubbaa bolla Geeshsha Ayyaani wodhdhis .
44010045	Phexiroosara Yoophefe yida ammaniyaa qaxxarettida Ayhude ubbay , Ayhude gidonnayssata bolla Geeshsha Ayyaani gukkida gisho malaalettidosona .
44010046	Gaasoykka , entti dumma dumma doonan haasayishininne Xoossaa gitatethaa sabbishin si7idosona . He wode Phexiroosi zaaridi ,
44010047	“ Hayssati qassi nu mela Geeshsha Ayyaana ekkidayssati xammaqettonna mela haathe digganay oonee ? ” yaagis .
44010048	Entti Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunthan xammaqettana mela entta kiittis . Hessafe guye , entti banttara guutha gallas uttana mela Phexiroosa woossidosona .
44011001	Hawaaretinne Yihuda ubban de7iya ammaneyssati , Ayhude gidonnayssatikka Xoossaa qaala ekkidayssa si7idosona .
44011002	Phexiroosi Yerusalaame bida wode qaxxarettida ammaneyssati ,
44011003	iyaakko , “ Neeni qaxxarettiboonayssatakko gelada enttara kathi ays madii ? ” yaagidosona .
44011004	Shin Phexiroosi hanidabaa koyroppe doomidi maaran maaran odis :
44011005	“ Taani Yoophe kataman Xoossaa woossashe qonccethi be7as . Gita afila daaniyabay oyddu baggara oykettidi saloppe wodhdhishe taakko yis .
44011006	Taani tishshi ootha iya giddo xeelliya wode oyddu tohora de7iya meheta , wora do7ata , ulora gooshettiya medhetethatanne salo kafota be7as .
44011007	‘ Phexiroosaa , dendda , shukkada ma ’ giya qaala si7as .
44011008	“ Shin taani , ‘ Godaw , akkay , tunabay woykko geeyonnabay ubbaka ta doonaakko shiiqi erenna ’ yaagas .
44011009	“ ‘ Xoossay geeshshidayssa neeni tuna gooppa ’ yaagiya qaali nam77antho saloppe yis .
44011010	“ Hessi heedzu toho hanin , wurssethan ubbabay salo pude ekettis .
44011011	He saatenkka heedzu asati Qisaariyappe taakko kiitettidi taani de7iya keetha gakki aggidosona .
44011012	Sidhonna enttara baana mela Ayyaanai taw odis . Qassi ha usuppun ishati Yoophefe taara Qisaariya bidayssatara Qornneliyoosa soo gelida .
44011013	Kiitanchchoy iya son eqqidi , ‘ Yoophe kiittada Phexiroosa geetettiya Simoona xeegisa .
44011014	Nenanne ne soo asa ubbaa ashshiya qaala I new odana ’ gidayssa Qornneliyoos nuus odis .
44011015	“ Taani haasaya doomiya wode Geeshsha Ayyaanay koyro nu bolla wodhdhidayssada entta bollaka wodhdhi aggis .
44011016	He wode ‘ Yohaannisi haathan xammaqis , shin hintte Geeshsha Ayyaanan xammaqettana ’ yaagida Godaa qaalay taw qofettis .
44011017	Xoossay nuus Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammanidayssatas immida imotaa Ayhude gidonnayssataska immiko , yaatin Xoossaa digganaw taani oonee ? ” yaagis .
44011018	Entti hessa si7ida wode bantta palamaa aggidi , “ Hesaa gidikko , Xoossay Ayhude gidonnayssatikka nagarappe simmidi de7on daanada qaada immis ” yaagidi Xoossaa galatidosona .
44011019	Isxifaanose hayqos gathida gooda gaason laalettida ammaneyssati qaala Ayhudeta xalaalas odishe Siroofinqe , Qoophiroosanne Anxookiya gakkanaw yuuyidosona .
44011020	Shin Qoophiroosappenne Qereenaappe yida issi issi ammaniyaa asati Anxookiya bidi , Godaa Yesuusa Wonggelaa Girike asaaskka odidosona .
44011021	Godaa wolqqay enttara de7ees ; qassi daro asay ammanidi Godaakko simmidosona .
44011022	He odaa Yerusalaamen de7iya woosa keethay si7ida gisho Barnnabaasa Anxookiya kiittis .
44011023	Barnnabaasi Anxookiya bida wode Xoossaa aadho keehatethaa oosuwa be7idi ufayttis . Entti ubbay bantta kumetha wozanan Godan minnidi daana mela entta zoris .
44011024	Barnnabaasi Geeshsha Ayyaanaynne ammanoy kumida lo77o asi gidiya gisho daro asay Godaa ammanidosona .
44011025	Hessafe guye , Barnnabaasi Saa7ola koyanaw Terseese bis .
44011026	Yan Saa7ola demmida wode Anxookiya ekkidi yis . Barnnabaasinne Saa7oli woosa keetha asaara laythi kumethi uttidi daro asaa tamaarssidosona . Ammaneyssati Anxookiyan “ Kiristtaane ” geetettidi koyro xeegettidosona .
44011027	He wode issi issi nabeti Yerusalaameppe Anxookiya wodhdhidosona .
44011028	Entta giddofe Agaboosa geyssi denddidi biitta ubban gita koshi keyanayssa Ayyaana wolqqan tinbbite odis . Hessi haniday Roome Kawuwa Qalawudiyoosa wodena .
44011029	Ammaneyssati huu7en huu7en bantta wolqqaa mela miishe kessidi Yihudan de7iya ammaneyssatas maade yeddanaw qofa qachchidosona .
44011030	Entti hessada oothidi , miishiya Barnnabaasa bollanne Saa7ola bolla woosa keethaa cimatas yeddidosona .
44012001	He wode Kawoy Heroodisi woosa keetha asaappe baggaa gooda doomis .
44012002	Yohaannisa ishaa Yayqooba mashshan wodhisis .
44012003	Hessi Ayhudeta ufayssidayssa be7idi , gujjidi Phexiroosakka oythis . Hessi haniday Paasika Baale bonchchiya gallasatana .
44012004	Phexiroosa oykkidi qachchis . Paasika bonchchiya gallasatappe guye deriya sinthe aathanaw qoppidi , oyddu oyddu wotaaddareti iya naagana mela tammanne usuppun wotaaddaretas aathi immis .
44012005	Hessa gisho , Phexiroosi qasho keethan naagettees . Shin woosa keetha asay iyaw minthidi Xoossaa woossosona .
44012006	Heroodisi Phexiroosa asaa sinthe shiishanaappe kase qamma Phexiroosi nam77u baggara nam77u wotaaddaretara santhalaatan qashettidi entta giddon dhiskkis . Naageyssati qasho keethaa penggetan eqqidi naagoosona .
44012007	Akeekonna de7ishin Godaa kiitanchchoy qonccis . Qasho keethan poo7oy poo7is . Kiitanchchoy Phexiroosa miyaa bochchi barkkisidi , “ Elle dendda ” yaagis . Iirakka santhalaatay iya kushiyappe wodhdhi aggis .
44012008	Kiitanchchoy iyaakko , “ Ne ma7uwa ma77a , ne caammaaka aatha ” yaagis . Phexiroosi hessada oothis ; kiitanchchoy , “ Ne laxana ma77ada tana kaalla ” yaagis .
44012009	Phexiroosi qasho keethafe keyidi kiitanchchuwa kaallis . Iyaw qonccethi be7iyabaa daanisippe attin kiitanchchoy oothiyabay tuma daanibeenna .
44012010	Kiitanchchoynne Phexiroosi koyruwanne nam77antho wotaaddariya aadhdhidi katamaa efiya biraata penggiyako gakkidosona . Penggey enttaw barkka dooyetti aggis . Entti keyidi issi ogiyara bishin kiitanchchoy akeekonna Phexiroosappe shaaketti aggis .
44012011	Phexiroosas wozani simmin , “ Tana Goday ba kiitanchchuwa kiittidi , Heroodisa kusheppenne naagidi uttida Ayhude asa ubbaafe ashshidayssa ha77i tuma eras ” yaagis .
44012012	I hessa akeekida wode daro asay issife shiiqidi Xoossaa woossiya bessaa , Marqqoosa giya Yohaannisa aaye Mayraami soo bis .
44012013	Yan karen eqqidi xeegis . Issi Rooda giya oosanchchiya penggiya dooyanaw yasu .
44012014	Rooda Phexiroosa qaala gididayssa erida wode ufayssan kumada kariya dooyenna guye woxxa bada , “ Phexiroosi karen eqqis ” yaagada asaas odasu .
44012015	Asay iikko , “ Neeni gooyay ! ” yaagidosona . Rooda Phexiroosa gididayssa geeshshada odasu . Entti , “ Hessi iya naagiya kiitanchchuwa ” yaagidosona .
44012016	Shin Phexiroosi karen eqqidi xeegidi aggonna ixxin asay kariya dooyidi iya be7idi malaalettidosona .
44012017	Shin entti si77i gaana mela Phexiroosi ba kushiyan mallidi Goday qasho keethafe iya waati kessidaakko enttaw qonccisi odidi , “ Hayssa Yayqoobasinne ammaniyaa asatas odite ” gidi yaappe keyidi harasoo bis .
44012018	Sa7i wonttiya wode “ Phexiroosi aw bide ” gidi wotaaddareti woli giddon daro kaccidosona .
44012019	Heroodisi Phexiroosa koyisin , I dhayida wode naageyssata qoridi , entta wodhana mela kiittis . Hessafe guye , Heroodisi Yihudappe Qisaariya wodhdhidi yan guutha wode uttis .
44012020	Heroodisi Xiroosa asaa bollanne Sidoona asaa bolla daro hanqettis . Entta biittay kathi Heroodisa biittaafe demmiya gisho entti issife gididi iya moorinnaa Bilasxoosa banttaw cima oothidi giiganaw Heroodisakko bidosona .
44012021	Heroodisi sunthida gallasan ba kawotethaa afilaa ma77idi , araata bolla uttidi asaas odis .
44012022	Asay , “ Hessi Xoossaa qaala , asa qaala gidenna ” yaagidi waassidosona .
44012023	Heroodisi Xoossaa bonchchiboonna gisho iirakka Godaa kiitanchchoy iya dechchin guxunen meetettidi hayqqis .
44012024	Shin Xoossaa qaalay diccishenne dalggishe bees .
44012025	Barnnabaasinne Saa7oli bantta oosuwa polidi Marqqoosa giya Yohaannisa banttara ekkidi Yerusalaameppe simmidosona .
44013001	Anxookiyan de7iya woosa keethan nabetinne asttamaareti de7oosona . Entti Barnnabaasa , Kareethi geetettiya Simoona , Qereenaappe yida Luukiyosa , Kawuwa Heroodisara diccida Minaahenne Saa7ola .
44013002	Entti Godaa goynnishininne xoomishin Geeshsha Ayyaanay , “ Taani xeegida oosuwas Barnnabaasanne Saa7ola taw dummayite ” yaagis .
44013003	Hessa gisho , entti xoomidaappenne woossidaappe guye bantta kushiya entta bolla wothidi yeddidosona .
44013004	Hessa gisho , Geeshsha Ayyaani entta kiittis . Selewuqe bidosona ; yaappe markkaben gelidi Qoophiroosa haathan teqettida biitta bidosona .
44013005	Entti Silmmaana gakkidi Ayhude Woosa Keethatan Xoossaa qaala odidosona . Yohaannisi maaddishe enttara de7ees .
44013006	Entti Qoophiroosa haathan teqettida biittaa kanthidi Phaafu gakkiya wode issi worddanchcho nabiya Bar-Yesuusa giya Ayhude maruwa demmidosona .
44013007	He maroy deriya aysiya Sarggiyoos Phawuloosa giya akeekanchcho addiyara de7ees . Sarggiyoos Phawuloosi Barnnabaasanne Saa7ola baakko xeegidi Xoossaa qaala si7anaw koyis .
44013008	Shin Girike doonan maruwa sunthay “ Elmmaasa ” geetettees . I deriya haareyssi ammanonna mela digganaw koyidi Barnnabaasaranne Phawuloosara eqettis .
44013009	Shin Phawuloosa giya Saa7oli Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumidi maruwa caddi xeellidi ,
44013010	“ La , Xalahe na7aw , iitatethi ubbay kumidaysso , xillotetha ubbaas morkkiyaw , suure Godaa ogiya mirqeyssa aggikii ?
44013011	Hekko , ha77i Godaa kushey ne bolla de7ees . Neeni qooqe gidana ; guutha wodes awa poo7o be7akka ” yaagis . Iira caaganaynne dhumay iya ayfiyaa goozin , ba kushiya oykkidi kaalethiya asi koyishe yuuyis .
44013012	Deriya haareyssi hessa be7ida wode Godaaba tamaarsseysan malaalettidi ammanis .
44013013	Phawuloosinne iyara de7eyssati Phaafuppe denddidi , Phinfiliyan de7iya Phergge markkabera bidosona . Yohaannisi enttafe shaakettidi Yerusalaame simmis .
44013014	Shin entti Pherggefe aadhdhidi Phisidiyan de7iya Anxookiya gakkidosona . Sambbaata gallas Ayhude Woosa Keethi gelidi uttidosona .
44013015	Muse higgeynne nabeta maxaafay nabbabettidaappe guye Ayhude Woosa Keetha halaqati , “ Nu ishato , asaa minthethiya qaali hinttew de7iyakko asaas oderkketii ” yaagidi enttako kiittidosona .
44013016	Phawuloosi denddi eqqidi ba kushe mallidi , “ Isra7eele asataw , qassi Xoossaa goynniya Ayhude gidonna asaw , si7ite .
44013017	Ha Isra7eele asaa Xoossay , nu mayzata dooris . Gibxxe biittan imathatethan entti de7ishin , entta darssidi ba gita wolqqan Gibxxe biittaafe entta kessis .
44013018	Bazzo biittan oytamu laytha mela entta dandda7is .
44013019	Kanaane biittan Ayhude gidonna laappun kawotethata diggidi entta biittaa ba asaa laatisis .
44013020	Hessafe guye , nabiya Saamu7eela wode gakkanaw oyddu xeetanne ishatamu laytha mela aysiya daynnata enttaw immis .
44013021	Hessafe guye , entti banttaw kawo immana mela woossin , Xoossay Biniyame sheeshaappe Qiise na7aa , Saa7ola oytamu laythi kawotana mela enttaw immis .
44013022	Xoossay Saa7ola shaaridaappe guye entta bolla Dawite kawothis . Xoossay Dawitebaa markkattishe , ‘ Taani koyaa ubbaa ta wozanaa mela oothiya Isseyye na7aa Dawite demmas ’ yaagis .
44013023	“ Xoossay , ‘ Taani Dawite sheeshaappe Isra7eele deriya ashsheyssa ehana ’ gidayssa mela Yesuusa ehis .
44013024	Yesuusi yaanappe sinthe Isra7eele asa ubbay bantta nagaraappe simmidi xammaqettana mela Yohaannisi qaala odis .
44013025	Qassi Yohaannisi ba oosuwa wurssana hanishe asaakko , ‘ Tana oona gidi qoppeetii ? Taani hintte naagiya Kiristtoosa gidikke , shin taani iya caammaa birshshanaw taw bessonnayssi taappe guyera yees ’ yaagis .
44013026	“ Ishato , Abrahame sheeshatoo , qassi hayssan Ayhude gidonnashin Xoossas yayyeyssato , ha atotethaa qaalay nuus kiitettis .
44013027	Ays giikko , Yerusalaamen de7iya asaynne entta halaqati Yesuusa eribookkona . Sambbaata ubban nabbabettiya nabeta qaala akeekiboonna gisho iya bolla pirddidi nabeti odida qaala polidosona .
44013028	Yesuusa wodhisanaw issi gaasoykka dhayin Philaaxoosi iya wodhana mela woossidosona .
44013029	Entti Yesuusabay Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettidaba ubbaa polida wode masqaliyappe iya wodhisidi moogidosona .
44013030	Shin Xoossay hayqoppe Yesuusa denthis .
44013031	Hessafe guye , I baara Galiilappe Yerusalaame yidayssatas daro toho benttis . Entti ha77i iyabaa asaas markkattoosona .
44013032	“ Xoossay nu aawatas immana gida Wonggelaa nuuni hinttew odoos .
44013033	Dawitey ba Mazmure Maxaafan nam77antho shemppuwan , ‘ Neeni , ta Na7a , taani hachchi nena yelas ’ ‘ Taani Dawites immana gida ammanettida geeshsha anjjuwaa hinttew immana ’ yaagidi odis . ‘ Ne Geeshsha Na7aa ahaa wooqisakka ’ yaagees .
44013034	
44013035	
44013036	“ Dawitey ba wode Xoossaa qofaa polidaappe guye hayqqidi ba aawatara moogettidi wooqis .
44013037	Shin Xoossay hayqoppe denthidayssi wooqibeenna .
44013038	“ Hessa gisho , ta ishato , nagara atotethay Yesuusa baggara kasetidi hinttew odettidayssa erite . Muse higgey nagarappe xillisanaw dandda7enna .
44013039	Shin Yesuusa ammaniyaa ubbay nagarappe xillees .
44013040	Hessa gisho , nabeti gidayssi hintte bolla gakkonna mela naagettite .
44013041	‘ Xoossay gidabaa leeqiseyssato ! Be7ite ! Malaalettite ! Dhayite ! oonikka odin , hintte ammanonna oosuwa taani hintte wodiyan oothana ’ ” yaagis .
44013042	Phawuloosinne Barnnabaasi Ayhude Woosa keethafe keyishin , kaalliya Sambbaatan hessa gujjidi odana mela asay enttana woossidosona .
44013043	Shiiqoy laalettidaappe guye daro Ayhudetinne Ayhudeta ammanuwan gelidi Xoossaa goynniya daroti Phawuloosanne Barnnabaasa kaallidosona . Ammanidayssati Xoossaa aadho keehatethan minnidi daana mela entta zoridosona .
44013044	Kaalliya Sambbaatan kataman de7iya asaappe daroti Xoossaa qaala si7anaw shiiqidosona .
44013045	Shin Ayhudeti daro asaa be7ida wode Phawuloosa qanaattidi iya haasaya ixxidi iya cayidosona .
44013046	Phawuloosinne Barnnabaasi yayyonna , “ Xoossaa qaalay koyrottidi hinttew odettanaw koshshees . Shin hintte qaala ixxidi merinaa de7uwa ekkanaw nuus bessenna gidi hinttee , hintte huu7en pirddida gisho hiza nuuni Ayhude gidonnayssatakko simmos .
44013047	Gaasoykka Goday , ‘ Alame kumethay ne baggara attana mela , taani nena Ayhude gidonna deriyas poo7o oothas ’ yaagidi nuna kiittis ” yaagidosona .
44013048	Ayhude gidonnayssati hessa si7ida wode ufayttidi Xoossaa qaala bonchchidosona . Qassi merinaa de7uwas doorettida ubbay ammanidosona .
44013049	Godaa qaalay he biitta ubbaa gakkis .
44013050	Shin Ayhudeti , Ayhude gidonna Xoosse goynniya dure maccasatanne kataman de7iya gita asata Phawuloosa bollanne Barnnabaasa bolla denthethidosona . He asati entta gooda doomidi bantta biittaafe kessidosona .
44013051	Shin Phawuloosaranne Barnnabaasara ixxeyssatas malla gidana mela bantta tohuwappe baana pittidi Iqooniyone katama bidosona .
44013052	Qassi Anxookiyan de7iya ammaneyssati Geeshsha Ayyaananinne ufayssan kumidosona .
44014001	Kaseyssadakka , Phawuloosinne Barnnabaasi Iqooniyonen Ayhudeta woosa keethi gelidi daro Ayhudetinne Ayhude gidonnayssati ammanana gakkanaw qaala odidosona .
44014002	Shin ammaniboonna Ayhudeti , Ayhude gidonnayssata wozanaa laammidi ishata bolla denthethidosona .
44014003	Hawaareti yan daro wode gam77idosona . Entti yayyonna Godaabaa odidosona . Goday malaatatanne oorathabaa entti oothana mela enttaw maata immidi ba aadho keehatethaa qaalay tuma gideyssa qonccisis .
44014004	Shin he katamaa asay shaakettidi , baggay Ayhudetara baggay qassi Hawaaretara gidis .
44014005	Ayhude gidonnayssatinne Ayhudeti bantta halaqatara issife gididi hawaareta qohanawunne shuchchan caddanaw koyidosona .
44014006	Hawaareti hessa eridi , Lisxiranne Darbbe giya Liqaa7oniya katamatanne entta heeran de7iya biittaa baqatidosona .
44014007	Yan Wonggelaa odidosona .
44014008	Yelettoosappe doomidi nam77u tohoy wobbin hamuti eronna issi addey Lisxiran de7ees .
44014009	He addey Phawuloosi odishin uttidi si7ees . Phawuloosi iya caddidi xeelliya wode paxanaw iyaw ammanoy de7eyssa be7idi ,
44014010	ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Sitti gada ne tohuwan eqqa ” yaagis . Yaatin , guppi denddi eqqidi hamuthi doomis .
44014011	Phawuloosi oothidayssa asay be7idi bantta qaala dhoqqu oothidi Liqaa7oniya doonan , “ Xoossati ase daanidi nuukko wodhdhidosona ” yaagidosona .
44014012	Barnnabaasa , “ Diya ” gidi , Phawuloosi haasayan waannatiya gisho iya , “ Hermmeesa ” gidi sunthidosona .
44014013	Katamaappe gaxan de7iya eeqaa Diya keethaa kahineynne asay kormmatanne alleeqo ciishshata hawaaretas yarshshanaw koyidi katamaa pengge ehidosona .
44014014	Shin Barnnabaasinne Phawuloosi hessa si7ida wode entti oothanaw qoppidayssa ixxidi bantta ma7uwa peedhidosona . Asaa giddo woxxi gelidi ,
44014015	bantta qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Asaw , hayssa ays ootheetii ? Nukka hintte mela ase . Ha pathonnabaappe saluwanne sa7aa , abbaanne entta giddon de7iya ubbabaa medhdhida de7o Xoossaakko hintte simmana mela hinttew nuuni Wonggelaa odoos .
44014016	I beni asaa bantta ogiya baana mela yeddi aggis .
44014017	Shin iraa saluwappe bukisis , kathaaka woden woden immis , kathi immidi hinttena daro ufayssis , yaatidi hinttew lo77obaa oothidi baw markka dhayssibeenna ” yaagidosona .
44014018	Hawaareti hessa gidi banttaw asay yarshshonna mela waayidi diggidosona .
44014019	Anxookiyappenne Iqooniyoneppe yida Ayhudeti , asaa bantta bagga zaaridi shuchchan Phawuloosa caddidosona . Enttaw I hayqqidabaa daanin katamaappe gaxa goochchi efidi yeggidosona .
44014020	Shin ammaneysati yidi , iya yuushuwan eqqidashin I denddidi katamaa gelis . Wonttetha gallas Barnnabaasara issife Darbbe bis .
44014021	Entti Darbbe kataman Wonggelaa odidi darota ammanthidaappe guye Lisxira , Iqooniyonenne Phisidiya Anxookiya simmidosona .
44014022	Yan ammaneyssata minthethishenne entti ammanon minnidi de7ana mela zorishe , “ Xoossaa kawotethaa gelanaw nuuni daro waaye ekkanaw bessees ” yaagidi tamaarssidosona .
44014023	Qassi woosa keethatas huu7en huu7en cimata dooridosona . Xoomidaappenne woossidaappe guye entti ammanida Godaas entta hadara immidosona .
44014024	Phisidiya biittaa kanthidi aadhdhidi Phinfiliya bidosona .
44014025	Pherggen qaala odidaappe guye Axaaliya bidosona .
44014026	Yaappe entti bantta polida oosuwas Xoossaa aadho keehatethaas entta hadara immida Anxookiya markkabera simmidosona .
44014027	Anxookiya gakkida wode woosa keethaa asaa shiishidi Xoossay enttara oothida oosuwa ubbaanne Ayhude gidonna asay ammanana mela enttaw waati pengge dooyidaako odidosona .
44014028	Hessan ammaneyssatara daro wode gam77idosona .
44015001	Issi issi asati Yihudappe Anxookiya bidi , “ Muse wogaatho hintte qaxxarettonna ixxiko attanaw dandda7ekketa ” gidi ammaneyssata tamaarsso doomidosona .
44015002	Hessi Phawuloosanne Barnnabaasa enttara daro palamanaadanne kaccanaada oothis . Hessa gisho , Anxookiyan de7iya issi issi asati Phawuloosaranne Barnnabaasara Yerusalaame bidi Hawaaretaranne cimatara gahettidi he odaa billana mela qofa qachchidosona .
44015003	Woosa keethay entta kiittin bidosona . Entti Siroofinqe Samaarera aadhdhishe Ayhude gidonnayssati Xoossako waanidi simmidaakko odidosona . Hessi ammaneyssata ubbaa daro ufayssis .
44015004	Entti Yerusalaame gakkida wode woosa keethay , Hawaaretinne cimati entta mokkidosona . Xoossay banttara oothidabaa ubbaa odidosona .
44015005	Shin Farisaaweta baggafe ammanida issi issi asati denddi eqqidi , “ Ayhude gidonnashin ammanida asati qaxxaretanawunne Muse higgiya naaganaw bessees ” yaagidosona .
44015006	Hawaaretinne cimati hessa zorettanaw shiiqidosona .
44015007	Daro haasayidaappe guye , Phexiroosi denddi eqqidi , “ Ta ishato , Ayhude gidonnayssati Wonggelaa qaala ta doonappe si7idi ammanana mela kasetidi tana Xoossay hintte giddofe dooridayssa hintte ereeta .
44015008	Asa wozana eriya Xoossay Geeshsha Ayyaanaa nuus immidayssada enttawuka immidi tumays .
44015009	Ammanon entta wozanaa geeshshida gisho nu giddoninne entta giddon dummatethi wothibeenna .
44015010	Hessa gisho , nu aawatinne nuuni tookkanaw dandda7iboonna qambbara ammaneyssata morggen wothidi ha77i ays Xoossaa paacetii ?
44015011	Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethan entti attidayssada nukka attidayssa ammanoos ” yaagis .
44015012	Asay si77i gidi , Barnnabaasinne Phawuloosi Ayhude gidonna asaa giddon bantta baggara Xoossay oothida malaatatanne oorathabaa ubbaa odishin si7oosona .
44015013	Entti haasaya onggidaappe guye Yayqoobi , “ Ishato , ta geyssa si7ite .
44015014	Xoossay Ayhude gidonnayssata giddofe ba ase dooranaw koyidi enttana koyro waattidi qoppidaakko Simooni odis .
44015015	Nabeta qaalay hayssara ginees . Geeshsha Maxaafan ,
44015016	‘ Hayssafe guye , taani simmana , kunddida Dawite kawotethaa denthana . Laalettida keethaaka zaara essana .
44015017	Attida asa ubbay taakko yaana , taani xeegida Ayhude gidonna asa ubbay tana koyana .
44015018	Benippe doomada hessi erettana mela oothida Xoossay , taani yaagays ’ yaagees .
44015019	“ Hessa gisho , ta qofay Xoossako simmiya Ayhude gidonnayssata nuuni waaysonnaako lo77o .
44015020	Shin entti eeqas yarshshettidi tunidabaa moonna mela , laymatonna mela , bawuta moonna melanne suuthi uyonna mela enttaw nuuni dabddaabbe xaafanaw koshshees .
44015021	Muse higgey benippe doomidi Sambbaatan Sambbaatan Ayhude Woosa Keethatan nabbabettishe katama ubban sabbakettees ” yaagis .
44015022	Hessafe guye , hawaaretinne cimati woosa keethaa asa ubbaara issife bantta giddofe guutha asata dooridi Phawuloosaranne Barnnabaasara Anxookiya yeddanaw qofa qachchidosona . Entti daro bonchchettida nam77u asata Barssabaasa geetettiya Yihudanne Sillaase dooridosona .
44015023	Hayssada geetetti xaafettida dabddaabbiya entta bolla yeddidosona : “ Nuuni hawaaretinne cimati hintte ishati , Anxookiyan , Sooriyaninne Kilqiyan de7iya Ayhude gidonna ishatas nu sarothuwa kiittoos .
44015024	“ Nuuni kiittonna asati nu giddofe bidi , ‘ Hintte qaxxarettanawunne higgiya naaganaw bessees ’ gidi , hinttena waaysidayssanne yiloyidayssa si7ida .
44015025	Nuuni dosiya Barnnabaasanne Phawuloosa doorettida asatara issife hintteko kiittanaw issi wozanan nu qofaa qachchida .
44015026	Entti nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa gisho bantta de7uwa aathi immidosona .
44015027	Hessa gisho , nuuni xaafidayssa entti bantta doonan gujjidi hinttew odana mela Yihudanne Sillaase kiittida .
44015028	“ Ha koshsheyssatappe attin hara tooho hinttena toossonna mela nunne Geeshsha Ayyaanay oda qachchida .
44015029	Eeqas yarshshettidi tunidabaa mooppite , suuthu uyoppite , bawuta mooppite , laymatoppite . Ha ubbaafe hinttee , hintte huu7iya naagikko lo77obaa ootheeta ” yaagidosona .
44015030	Hessa gisho , kiitettidayssati moyzettidi Anxookiya bidi ammaniyaa asaa shiishidi , dabddaabbe immidosona .
44015031	Entti he minthethiya dabddaabbiya nabbabida wode ufayttidosona .
44015032	Qassi Yihudinne Sillaasey bantta huu7en nabe gidiya gisho ammaneyssata loythi zoridi minthethidosona .
44015033	Entti Anxookiyan guutha gallas uttidaappe guye ishati lo77ora moyzin banttana kiittidayssatakko simmidosona .
44015034	[ Shin Sillaasey yan attanaw koyis . ]
44015035	Qassi Phawuloosinne Barnnabaasi hara daro asatara issife Godaa qaalaa tamaarssishenne Wonggelaa odishe Anxookiyan gam77idosona .
44015036	Guutha gallasappe guye Phawuloosi Barnnabaasako , “ Nuuni Godaa qaala odida katama ubban ammaneysati waanidi de7iyakko guye simmishe xomoosana ” yaagis .
44015037	Barnnabaasi Marqqoosa geetettiya Yohaannisa banttara efanaw koyis .
44015038	Shin Phawuloosi Marqqoosa banttara efanaw koyibeenna . Gaasoykka , I Phinfiliyan shaakettidi enttara oothanaw bibeenna .
44015039	Entta giddon iita ooshshi keyin issoy issuwafe shaakettidosona . Barnnabaasi Marqqoosa ekkidi markkabera Qoophiroosa bis .
44015040	Shin Phawuloosi Sillaase dooris ; ammaneysati Phawuloosa Xoossaa aadho keehatethaas hadara immidaappe guye i keyidi bis .
44015041	Yaatidi , woosa keethata minthethishe Sooriyaranne Kilqiyara aadhdhis .
44016001	Phawuloosi Darbbenne Lisxira bis . Yan Ximotiyoosa giya ammaniyaa asi de7ees . Iya aayyaa ammaniyaa Ayhude maccas , iya aaway Girike asi .
44016002	Lisxiraninne Iqooniyonen de7iya ammaneysati Ximotiyoosabaa loythidi markkattidosona .
44016003	Phawuloosi Ximotiyoosa baara efanaw koyidi , iya aaway Girike asi gididayssa he bessan de7iya Ayhude ubbay eriya gisho iya qaxxaris .
44016004	Entti katamatara bishe Yerusalaamen de7iya hawaaretinne cimati wothida higgiya ammaneyssati naagana mela enttaw odishe aadhdhidosona .
44016005	Hessa gisho , woosa keethati ammanon minnishe , taybonkka gallas gallas dari dari bidosona .
44016006	Iisiyan qaala odonna mela Geeshsha Ayyaanay entta diggida gisho Phirggeranne Galaatiya biittaara aadhdhidosona .
44016007	Entti Miisiya zawaa gakkida wode Bitiiniya baanaw koyidosona . Shin Yesuusa Ayyaanay entta diggis .
44016008	Hessa gisho , entti Miisiya matara aadhdhishe Xiro7aada wodhdhidosona .
44016009	Phawuloosi qamma qonccethan issi Maqedooniya asi baakko , “ Maqedooniya pinnada nuna maaddarkii ” yaagishe eqqidi woossishin be7is .
44016010	Qonccethaa I be7idaappe guye ellesidi nuuni Maqedooniya baanaw koyida . Hessika , Wonggelaa yan de7iya asaas odanaw Xoossay nuna xeegidayssa erida gishossa .
44016011	Xiro7aadappe denddidi markkaben gelidi Samotiraaqe bida , wonttetha gallas Naaphule bida .
44016012	Yaappe denddidi Maqedooniya biittan de7iya Filphisiyuusa giya koyro katama bida . Qassi Filphisiyuusi Roome asay de7iya katama . Nuuni he kataman guutha gallas uttida .
44016013	Sambbaata gallas katamaappe gaxan Shaafaa doonan Ayhudeti Xoossaa woossiya bessi de7eyssa eridi yaa bida . He bessan shiiqida maccasaas qaala odida .
44016014	Nuna si7iya asaappe issi Liidiya geetettiya Tiyatiroona katamaappe yida , Xoossaa ammanida zo7o afila zal77iya , maccasiya de7awusu . Phawuloosi odeyssa iya si7ana mela Xoossay I wozanaa dooyis .
44016015	Liidiya ba soo asaara issife xammaqettidaappe guye nuukko , “ Hintte tana Godaa tuma ammanasu giikko ta soo yedhdhite ” gada miinthada woossasu .
44016016	Nuuni Xoossaa woossiya bessaa bishin iita ayyaani I bolla de7idi kaaysiya issi geela7o aylley nuura gahettasu . Iya kaayada daro miishe ba godatas ehawusu .
44016017	Phawuloosanne nuna kaallada , “ Hayssati Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa aylleta ! Entti hintte attana ogiya odeyssata ” gada waassasu .
44016018	Ubba gallas hessada gawusu . Shin Phawuloosi yilotidi guye simmidi , he ayyaanaa , “ Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunthan iippe keya ” gidi kiittis . Iirakka iita ayyaanay iippe keyi aggis .
44016019	Shin I godati banttaw miishe demmiya ogey dhayidayssa be7idi , Phawuloosanne Sillaase oykkidi , dabaaba daynnata sinthe goochchi efidosona .
44016020	Daynnata sinthe entta efidi , “ Hayssati Ayhude asi gidishe nu katamaa asaa daro waaysosona .
44016021	Nuuni Roome biitta asi gidishe ekkanawunne oothanaw woga gidonnabaa tamaarssosona ” yaagidosona .
44016022	Asay issi bagga gididi , Phawuloosa bollanne Sillaase bolla denddidosona . Daynnati entta ma7uwa qaaridi xam77an entta shocana mela kiittidosona .
44016023	Entta daro wadhdhidaappe guye qasho keethi gelssidosona . Qasho keethaa naageysi entta minthi naagana mela kiittidosona .
44016024	Qasho keethaa naageyssi he kiitaa ekkidi , Phawuloosanne Sillaase qasho keethas qol77a gelssis . Entta tohuwa duuxis
44016025	Shin giddi bilahe gidiya wode Phawuloosaranne Sillaasera woossishenne mazmure yexxishe Xoossaa galatoosona . Qasho keethan de7iya hara asatikka entti giyabaa si7oosona .
44016026	Qopponna qasho keethaa baasoy qaaxxana gakkanaw biitta qaaxoy hanis . He saatenkka pengge ubbay dooyetti aggis ; qashettida asa ubbaa santhalaatay birshsheti wodhdhis .
44016027	Qasho keethaa naageyssi dhiskkofe barkida wode qasho keethaa pengge ubbay dooyettidayssa be7idi qasho asay kessi ekki bidabaa daanin bana wodhanaw mashshe ekkis .
44016028	Shin Phawuloosi qaala dhoqqu oothidi “ Nu ubbay hayssan de7iya gisho neeni nena qohoppa ” yaagis .
44016029	Qasho keethaa naageyssi xomppe woossi ekkidi ellesidi gaathi woxxis . Kokkorishe Phawuloosa sinthaninne Sillaase sinthan gufannis .
44016030	Entta kare kessidi , “ Ta godato , taani attanaw ay oothanaw bessii ? ” yaagis .
44016031	Phawuloosaranne Sillaasera iyaakko , “ Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammana ; neeranne ne soo asaara attana ” yaagidosona .
44016032	Entti iyasinne iya son de7iya ubbaas Godaa qaala odidosona .
44016033	Qamma he saatenkka qasho keethaa naageyssi entta efidi entta madunthaa meeccis . Ellesidi ba soo asa ubbaara xammaqettis .
44016034	Phawuloosanne Sillaase ba soo efidi enttaw kathi aathis . I ba soo asa ubbaara Xoossaa ammanida gisho ufayttis .
44016035	Sa7ay wonttin daynnati , “ He asata billa ” yaagidi poolise halaqata iyaakko kiittidosona .
44016036	Qasho keethaa naageyssi , “ Hintte bilettana mela daynnati kiittidosona . Hiza , keyidi saro biite ” yaagidi he kiitaa Phawuloosas odis .
44016037	Shin Phawuloosi he poolise halaqatakko , “ Nuuni Roome asi gidishin entti nuna pirddi baynna asaa sinthan wadhdhidi , qasho keethan yeggidosona . Ha77i nuna geeman keyidi bo goonaa ? Hanenna , entti bantta huu7en yidi nuna kesso ” yaagis .
44016038	Poolise halaqati daynnatas hessa odin , Phawuloosaranne Sillaasera Roome biitta asi gididayssa si7ida wode yayyidosona .
44016039	Hessa gisho , daynnati yidi enttako , “ Nuuni hinttena qohida ” gidosona . Qasho keethafe kare entta kessidi , katamaappe keyidi baana mela woossidosona .
44016040	Phawuloosaranne Sillaasera qasho keethafe keyidi Liidiya soo bidosona . Yan ammaneyssatara gahettidi entta minthethidi keyidi bidosona .
44017001	Phawuloosaranne Sillaasera Amfipholisaranne Apholoniyara aadhdhidi Teselonqe bidosona . Yan Ayhude Woosa Keethi de7ees .
44017002	Phawuloosi kaseyssada yaa gelis . Yan heedzu saamintta Xoossaa qaalappe asaas odis .
44017003	Kiristtoosi waaye ekkanawunne hayqoppe denddanaw besseyssa enttaw qonccisidi odishe , “ Yesuusi ha taani hinttew odeyssi Kiristtoosa ” yaagis .
44017004	Enttafe issoti issoti oday tuma gideyssa ma77idi Phawuloosaranne Sillaasera issifidosona . Hessadakka , Xoossaa goynniya daro Girike asaynne daro bonchchettida maccasatikka enttara issifidosona .
44017005	Shin Ayhudeti qanaattidi issi issi oosoy baynna iita asata ogeppe shiishidosona . Kataman buqethi kessidosona ; Phawuloosanne Sillaase asaas aathi immanaw koyidi Yaasona keethaa teqqidosona .
44017006	Phawuloosinne Sillaasi enttaw benttonna ixxin , Yaasonanne issi issi ammaneyssata katamaa halaqatakko goochchi efidi , “ Hayssati biitta ubbaa buqeyssati ha77i nuukko yidosona .
44017007	Yaasoni entta ba son wothis . Hayssati , ‘ Yesuusa giya hara kawoy de7ees ’ gidi Qeesare kiitaa menthosona ” yaagidi dhoqqu gida qaalan odidosona .
44017008	Shiiqida asaynne katamaa halaqati hessa si7idi hananabaa dhayidosona .
44017009	Halaqati Yaasonanne harata waasen birshshidosona .
44017010	Ammaneysati Phawuloosanne Sillaase qammara Beeriya yeddidosona . Beeriya gakkidi , Ayhude Woosa Keethi gelidosona .
44017011	Beeriya asati Teselonqe asatappe aadhdhida suureta . Entti qaala kumetha wozanaappe ekkidosona ; Phawuloosi gidayssi tuma gideyssa shaakki eranaw gallas gallas Geeshsha Maxaafata xanna7oosona .
44017012	Hessa gisho , enttafe daroti , Giriketappeka bonchchettida daro maccasatinne daro addeti ammanidosona .
44017013	Shin Teselonqen de7iya Ayhudeti Phawuloosi Xoossaa qaala Beeriyankka odidayssa si7ida wode Beeriyaa yidi asaa buqidosona .
44017014	Hessafe guye , ammaneyssati ellesidi Phawuloosa abbaa mati yeddidosona . Shin Sillaaseynne Ximotiyoosi Beeriyan attidosona .
44017015	Phawuloosa moyzida asati Ateena gathidosona . He asati Sillaaseynne Ximotiyoosi banttaw dandda7ettida mela ellesidi baakko yaana mela Phawuloosi kiittida kiitaa ekkidi Beeriya simmidosona .
44017016	Phawuloosi Ateenan Sillaasenne Ximotiyoosa naagishe , kataman eeqi kumidayssa be7idi yilotis .
44017017	Hessa gisho , Ayhude Woosa Keethan Ayhudetaranne Xoossaa goynniya Ayhude gidonna asatara qassi baara gahettiya asatara ubba wode palamees .
44017018	Ephiqoroosanne Isttoyke geetettiya cugatappe issi issi eranchchoti Phawuloosara palamidosona . Enttafe issoti issoti , “ Ha yooyamay ay odanaw koyii ? ” yaagidosona . Harati Phawuloosi Yesuusabaanne hayqoppe I denddidayssa banttaw odida gisho “ Ooratha xoossatabaa odiya daanees ” yaagidosona .
44017019	Phawuloosa oykkidi Aryoospaagosa giya shiiqo bessaa efidi , “ Ha neeni tamaarssiya oorathabay aybeekko nuna erisikkii ?
44017020	Ays giikko , neeni nuus oorathabaa odaasa ; hiza hessi aybeekko nuuni eranaw koyoos ” yaagidosona .
44017021	Ateena asa ubbaynne yan de7iya imathati oorathabaa odettonnanne si7onna pee7okkona .
44017022	Phawuloosi Aryoospaagosan shiiqida asaa sinthan eqqidi , “ Ateena asaw , hintte xoossatas ubbaban daro yayyeyssa taani be7ays .
44017023	Taani hintte katamaara yuuyashe hintte goynniya bessata be7iya wode ‘ Erettonna Xoossas ’ geetetti xaafettida yarshsho bessaa demmas . Ha hintte eronnashin goynneyssa taani hinttew odays .
44017024	Sa7aanne sa7an de7iya ubbabaa medhdhida Xoossay , saluwanne sa7aa Goday , asi keexida keethan deenna .
44017025	I de7o , shempponne ubbabaa asa ubbaas immiya gisho paci de7iya asada asa maade koyenna .
44017026	Xoossay asa zerethi ubbaa issi addiyafe medhdhidi biitta ubban wothis . Yaatidi entti de7ana wodiyasinne bessaas zawa immis .
44017027	I hessa oothiday asi iya koyana melanne pilggidi demmana melassa . Hanikkoka I nuuppe geemmibeenna .
44017028	Hinttefe issi issi yexxeyssati , ‘ Nuuni iya nayta ’ gidayssada , ‘ Nuuni iyan paxa de7oos , qaaxoos . ’
44017029	Hiza , nuuni Xoossaa nayta gidiya gisho ‘ Xoossay asa hiillatethaninne qofan worqqafe woykko birappe woykko shuchchafe oosettidabaa daanees ’ yaagidi qoppanaw bessenna .
44017030	Hessa gisho , Xoossay kase wode asay eronna oothidayssa aggidi aadhdhis , shin ha77i ubbason de7iya asi ubbay nagarappe simmana mela kiittees .
44017031	Ays giikko , Xoossay ba doorida addiyan sa7an de7iya asa ubbaa bolla xillo pirdda pirddanaw qamma giigisi wothis . Iya hayqoppe denthidi hessa asa ubbaas tumayis ” yaagis .
44017032	Enttafe issi issi asati hayqoppe denddobaa Phawuloosappe si7idi , iya bolla qelqisidosona . Shin harati , “ Nuuni hessa neeppe gujjidi si7anaw koyoos ” yaagidosona .
44017033	Hessa gisho , Phawuloosi entta giddofe keyis .
44017034	Shin issi issi addeti Phawuloosara gahettidi ammanidosona . Entta giddofe Aryoospaagosan shiiquwan de7iya Diyonasyoosa giya addey , Damarsso giya issi maccasiyanne harati de7oosona .
44018001	Hessafe guye , Phawuloosi Ateenappe keyidi , Qoronttoosa bis .
44018002	Yan Aqiila giya Phanxoosan yelettida issi Ayhude asi demmis . Ayhude asa ubbay Roomeppe keyana mela kawoy Qalawudiyoosi kiittida gisho guutha wodeppe kase I ba machche Phirisqilara Xaaleppe yis . Phawuloosi enttara gahettanaw bis .
44018003	Iya oosoy enttayssada dunkkaane siko gidiya gisho enttara uttidi issife oothis .
44018004	Phawuloosi Sambbaata ubban Ayhudetanne Giriketa ammanthanaw Ayhude Woosa Keethan palamees .
44018005	Sillaaseynne Ximotiyoosi Maqedooniyappe yida wode Phawuloosi ba kumetha wodiya immidi Ayhudetas Yesuusi I , Kiristtoosa gidi qaala odis .
44018006	Shin entti Phawuloosa ixxidi iya cayin Phawuloosi ba ma7uwappe baanaa qoqqofishe , “ Hintte gomey hinttena oykko ; taani hessan de7ikke . Hizappe guye , taani Ayhude gidonna asaakko bays ” yaagis .
44018007	Yaappe keyidi Xoossaa goynniya Titoos Yosxoosa giya uraa soo bis . Yosxoosa keethay Ayhude Woosa Keetha matan de7ees .
44018008	Ayhude Woosa Keetha halaqay Qarisphoosi ba soo asa ubbaara Godaa ammanis . Qoronttoosa asatappeka daroti Xoossaa qaala si7ida wode ammanidi xammaqettidosona .
44018009	Goday issi qamma Phawuloosas qonccidi , “ Yayyofa ; oda , si77i gooppa .
44018010	Taani neera de7ays . Taw ha kataman daro asi de7iya gisho nena qohidi iitaban yeggana asi oonikka baawa ” yaagis .
44018011	Hessa gisho , Phawuloosi Xoossaa qaala asaa tamaarssishe issi laythinne usuppun ageena enttara uttis .
44018012	Gaaliyoosi Akkaya biittaa aysiya wode Ayhudeti issife Phawuloosa bolla denddidi pirdda keethi iya efidi ,
44018013	“ Ha addey higgiya ixxidi , asay Xoossaa goynnana mela oothees ” yaagidosona .
44018014	Phawuloosi haasayana hanishin , Gaaliyoosi Ayhudetakko , “ Ayhudetoo , hessi iita ooso woykko naaqo gidiyakko taani hinttebaa dandda7ada si7anaw bessees .
44018015	Shin qaalas , sunthasinne hintte higgiyas hintte palamiyabaa gidikko hinttee , hinttew billite ; hessa taani pirddike ” yaagis .
44018016	Yaatidi , entta pirdda keethafe kare kessis .
44018017	Hessafe guye , Girike asa ubbay Ayhude Woosa Keetha halaqaa Sostenisa oykkidi pirdda keethaa sinthan wadhdhidosona . Shin Gaaliyoosi hessa paxabaa gibeenna .
44018018	Phawuloosi daro gallas Qoronttoosan uttidaappe guye ammaniyaa asaa sarothidi , Phirisqiliranne Aqiilara markkabera Sooriya bis . Shin I baanappe sinthe baw gasoy de7iya gisho Kinkkiriya kataman ba huu7iya buluusettis .
44018019	Entti Efesoona gakkida wode Phawuloosi Phirisqilonne Aqiila yan aggis . Shin baw Ayhude Woosa Keethi gelidi Ayhudetara odettis .
44018020	Entti banttara daro wode uttana mela Phawuloosa woossidosona shin I ixxis .
44018021	Enttafe shaakettishe , “ Taani yaa baaliya Yerusalaamen bonchchanaw bessees . Shin Xoossi giikko hintteko simmada yaana ” yaagidi Efesoonappe markkabera bis .
44018022	Qisaariya gakkida wode Yerusalaame bidi woosa keethaa asaa sarothidaappe guye Anxookiya bis .
44018023	Yan guutha wode gam77idaappe guye ammaniyaa asata ubbaa minthethishe Galaatiyaranne Phirggera aadhdhis .
44018024	Iskkinddiriyan yelettida issi Aphiloosa giya Ayhude asi Efesoona bis . I oda eriya asinne Xoossaa qaala daro eriya asi .
44018025	I Godaa ogiya tamaaridi , ayyaanan xuugettidi Yesuusabaa suure tamaarssees . Gidoshin , Yohaannisa xinqqatiya xalaala erees .
44018026	I Ayhude Woosa Keethan yayyonna tamaarssees . Phirisqilinne Aqiili I odeyssa si7ida wode iya banttara soo efidi Xoossaa ogiya kaseyssafe geeshshidi iyaw odidosona .
44018027	Aphiloosi Akkaya baanaw koyin Efesoonan de7iya ammaniyaa asay iya qofaa ekkidi Akkayan de7iya ammaneysati iya mokkana mela enttaw dabddaabbe xaafidosona . I yaa gakkida wode Xoossaa aadho keehatetha baggara Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammanidayssata daro maaddis .
44018028	Ays giikko , Yesuusi I Kiristtoosa gideyssa Ayhudetas Xoossaa qaalappe qonccisidi deriya sinthan minthi odidi entta lathis .
44019001	Aphiloosi Qoronttoosan de7ishin , Phawuloosi qommo baggara aadhdhidi Efesoona bis . Yan issi issi ammaniyaa asata demmis .
44019002	Enttako , “ Hintte ammanida wode Geeshsha Ayyaana ekkideti ? ” yaagidi oychchis . Entti , “ Akkay , ekkibookko ; hari attoshin , Geeshsha Ayyaani de7iyabaakka si7ibookko ” yaagidosona .
44019003	Phawuloosi enttako , “ Yaatin , aybin xammaqettidetii ? ” yaagis . Entti , “ Nuuni Yohaannisa xinqqatiyan xammaqettida ” yaagidi zaaridosona .
44019004	Phawuloosi , “ Yohaannisi baappe guyera yaa Yesuus Kiristtoosan asay ammanana mela asaas odishe , nagarappe simo bessiya xinqatiyan xammaqis ” yaagis .
44019005	Entti hessa si7ida wode Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa tamaare gidanaw xammaqettidosona .
44019006	Phawuloosi ba kushiya entta bolla wothida wode Geeshsha Ayyaani entta bolla wodhdhin , dumma dumma doonan odettidosona ; qassi tinbbite odidosona .
44019007	He bessan tammanne nam77a gidiya asati de7oosona .
44019008	Phawuloosi Ayhude Woosa Keetha gelidi , Xoossaa kawotethaabaa yayyonna palamishenne loythi qonccisishe enttara heedzu ageena gakkanaw gam77is .
44019009	Shin enttafe issoti issoti dhube gididi daro asaa sinthan Godaa ogiya cayidi ammanonna ixxidosona . Phawuloosi ammaneyssata enttafe shaakki ekkidi Xiranoosa giya timirtte keethan ubba wode entta tamaarssis .
44019010	Phawuloosi nam77u laythi gakkanaw qaala odis . Hessa gisho , Iisiyan de7iya asa ubbay , Ayhudetinne Ayhude gidonnayssati Godaa qaala si7idosona .
44019011	Xoossay Phawuloosa kushen wolqqaama malaatata oothis .
44019012	Hessa gisho , asay iya bollaa bochchida maarabiya woykko ma7uwa hargganchchotas efoosona . Enttika paxoosona ; tuna ayyaanatikka enttafe keyoosona .
44019013	Tuna ayyaanata kessishe yuuyaa Ayhudetappe issoti issoti , “ Phawuloosi sabbakiya Yesuusa sunthan keyite gidi hinttena kiittoos ” yaagidi , tuna ayyaanati oykkida asata bolla Godaa Yesuusa sunthaa xeegidosona
44019014	Kahine halaqaa Asqeewe giya issi Ayhude addiyaas hessa oothiya laappun nayti de7oosona .
44019015	Shin tuna ayyaanay enttako , “ Taani Yesuusakka Phawuloosakka erays , shin hintte oonantee ? ” yaagis .
44019016	Tuna ayyaanay oykkida addey entta bolla guppi wodhdhidi , entta madunxisidi , he keethaafe kallo baqatana gakkanaw wolqqaamis .
44019017	Efesoonan de7iya Ayhudetinne Ayhude gidonnayssati ubbay hessa si7idi daro yayyidosona . Godaa Yesuusa sunthay daro bonchchettis .
44019018	Ammaneyssatappe daroti bantta oothida iita oosuwa paaxishenne qonccen odishe yoosona .
44019019	Biteyssatappe daroti bantta maxaafata shiishidi asa ubbaa sinthan xuuggidosona . He maxaafata gatiya qooday ishatamu mukulu bira santime gidis .
44019020	Hessada hanidi Xoossaa qaalay diccishenne dalggishe bis .
44019021	Hessi polettidaappe guye Phawuloosi , “ Taani Yerusalaame ba simmada Roomekka baanaw bessees ” yaagidi Maqedooniyaranne Akkayara aadhdhidi Yerusalaame baanaw qofa qachchis .
44019022	Qassi bana maaddeyssatappe nam77ata Ximotiyoosanne Erasxoosa Maqedooniya kiittidi , baw Iisiyan guutha wode gam77is .
44019023	He wode Godaa ogiya gisho Efesoonan wolqqaama kachchi keyis .
44019024	Issi biraa oothiya Dimexiroosa giya uray Arxemiisi eeqa keethaa misiliya birappe oothidi daro wodhe demmees .
44019025	Hessa gisho , hessa mela ooso ootheyssata issife shiishidi , “ Asaw , nu duretethay ha oosuwan gideyssa hintte ereeta .
44019026	Hayssi Phawuloosi , ‘ Asa kushen oosettidayssati xoossata gidokkona ’ yaagidi , Efesoonaninne guutha biittatappe attin kumetha Iisiya ubban de7iya daro asaa odi ammanthidayssanne balethidayssa hintte be7idetanne si7ideta .
44019027	Meto gididay , nu oosoy kadhetteyssa xalaala gidonnashin Iisiyaninne biitta ubban de7iya asi goynniya gita xoossee Arxemiisi keethay bonchchettonna atteyssanne I gitatethayka kunddanayssa ” yaagis .
44019028	Asay hessa si7ida wode shenen xuugettidi , “ Efesoona Arxemiisa gita ” yaagidi waassidosona .
44019029	He waasoy katama ubbaa gakkis . Phawuloosara hamuttiya Maqedooniya asata , Gaayoosanne Arsxirokoosa oykkidi goochchishe kaassa bessaa woxxidosona .
44019030	Phawuloosikka asay shiiqidasuwa gelanaw koyis , shin ammaneysati iya diggidosona .
44019031	Iisiya biittaa halaqatappe Phawuloosa lagge gidida issoti issoti Phawuloosakko kiittidi , “ Kaassa bessaa qonccen keyada benttofa ” gidi iya woossidosona .
44019032	Shiiqida asaas hananabay dhays ; dariya bagga asay hari attoshin ays shiiqidaakko eronna gisho issoy issibaas waassiya wode hankkoy harabaas waassees .
44019033	Ayhudeti Iskkinddire giya addiya aathi bessin , issi issi asay I gaanabaa odidi iya sinthe aathidosona . I asay si77i gaana mela ba kushiyan malli bessidi , asaas mootettanaw eqqis .
44019034	Shin Iskkinddirey Ayhude asi gididayssa asay erida wode nam77u saate gidanayssa mela ubbay issi qaalan , “ Efesoona Arxemiisa gita ” yaagidi waassidosona .
44019035	Wurssethan Katamaa xaafey asaa si77i oothidi , “ Efesoona asaw ! Efesoona katamay gita Arxemiisi eeqa keethaanne saloppe wodhdhida , I shuchcha misiliya naageyssa gideyssa eronna asi baawa .
44019036	Hayssa kashi giya asi baynna gisho hintte si77i gaanawunne dirggidi aykko oothonna agganaw bessees .
44019037	Hintte ha asata , eeqa keetha miishe kaysotiboonnayssatanne nu Xoossata cayboonayssata ehideta .
44019038	Hessa gisho , Dimexiroosinne iyara de7iya oosanchchoti asaa mootanaw koykko , pirdda keethay dooya de7ees ; daynnatikka de7oosona ; entti mootanaw dandda7osona .
44019039	Shin hintte hara oda koykko , Shanggo shiiqon oday be7etto .
44019040	Hessa gidonna ixxiko hachchi hanidabaas Roome kawotethay nuna oychchana . Ha buqethaas gaasoy baynna gisho nuuni gaaso odanaw dandda7okko ”
44019041	yaagidi shiiquwa laallis .
44020001	Waasoy decidaappe guye Phawuloosi ammaniyaa asata xeegisidi entta zoridaappe guye sarothidi Maqedooniya baanaw keyis .
44020002	I aadhdhiya biittatan de7iya ammaniya asaa qaala odidi minthethidaappe guye Girike biittaa bis .
44020003	I yan heedzu ageena uttidi , markkabera Sooriya baanaw qoppidi de7ishin , Ayhudeti bana wodhanaw koyeyssa eridi Maqedooniyara guye simmanaw koyis .
44020004	Phawuloosa moyzidayssati Beeriyappe Pharhuusa na7aa Sophaxiroosa , Teselonqefe Arsxirokoosanne Sikondduusa , Derbbefe Gaayoosa , Iisiyappe Tikiqoosa , Xirofimoosanne Ximotiyoosa .
44020005	Hessati sinthe bidi nuna Xiro7aadan naagoosona .
44020006	Nuuni Uytha Baaliya bonchchidaappe guye Filphisiyuusappe markkabera denddidi , ichchashantho gallasan entta Xiro7aadan gakkidi yan laappun gallas gam77ida .
44020007	Saaminttafe koyro gallasan nuuni uythaa menthanaw shiiqidi de7ishin , Phawuloosi wonttethe baanaw qoppida gisho enttaw qaala odishe giddi bilahe gakkanaw odaa adussis .
44020008	Nuuni shiiqidi uttida pooqiyan daro poo7oy de7ees .
44020009	Ewuxikoosa giya issi na7atethay maskkoote bolla uttidi , baana dogidi dhiskkis . Phawuloosi oda adussida wode Ewuxikoosi dhiskko eeyidi heedzantho pooqiyappe kunddidi hayqqidayssa asay denthis .
44020010	Shin Phawuloosi wodhdhidi , iya bolla gufannis . Iya idimmidi , “ I hayqqibeenna , hirggofite ” yaagis .
44020011	Hessafe guye , pude pooqiya bolla keyidi uythaa menthidi mis . Sa7i wonttana gakkanaw asaas odidaappe guye denddidi bis .
44020012	He paxida naatethaa soo efidi daro ufayttidosona .
44020013	Shin Phawuloosi bana yaappe mokkana mela nuus odida gisho kasetidi markkabiyakko bidi , Asoosa baanaw denddida . Ays giikko , I tohon baanaw qoppida gisho nuna hessatho kiittis .
44020014	I nuura Asoosan gahettin markkabiyan iya ekkidi Mixiliine bida .
44020015	Wonttetha gallas yaappe denddidi markkabera Kiyoosa sinthen de7iya bessaa gakkida ; qassi wonttetha gallas Saamosa pinnidi kaalliya gallas Miliixe gakkida .
44020016	Phawuloosi Iisiyan daro gam77onna Efesoona matara aadhdhanaw qoppis . Baw dandda7ettiko Phenxeqosxe Baaliya gallas Yerusalaame gakkanaw eesotees .
44020017	Phawuloosi Miliixeppe Efesoona kiittidi woosa keethaa cimata xeegisis .
44020018	Woosa keetha cimati iyaakko yin , enttako hayssada yaagis : “ Taani Iisiya gelida koyro gallasappe doomida hinttera de7ida wode ubban waana de7idaakko hintte ereeta .
44020019	Ayhudeti duulatidi ta bolla meto gathikokka taani ashkketethaninne daro afuthan Godaas oothas .
44020020	Dabaabankka hintte keethan keethan hinttena tamaarssishe hinttena maaddiyabaappe issibaakka pacisabiikke .
44020021	Taani Ayhudetasinne Ayhude gidonnayssatas nagarappe Xoossaako simmana melanne nu Godaa Yesuusa ammanana mela markkattas .
