44020022	“ Yan tana aybi gakkaneekko erikke , shin ha77i taani Geeshsha Ayyaanas kiitettada Yerusalaame bays .
44020023	Geeshsha Ayyaanay qashoynne waayey tana naageyssa katama ubban taw maarkkattis .
44020024	Shin ta wothaa polanawunne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe ekkida oosuwa , Xoossaa aadho keehatethaa Wonggelaa markkatteyssa polanaw ta shemppiw pathonnabaada qoodays .
44020025	“ Taani ha77ika Xoossaa kawotethaa markkattashe hintte ubbaa giddon yuuyas . Hizappe guye hinttefe oonikka tana be7onnayssa erays .
44020026	Hessa gisho , hinttefe issi uray dhayikkoka ta oyshettonayssa hachchi hinttew geeshshada odays .
44020027	Ays giikko , Xoossay oothanaw qoppidabaa ubbaa hinttew aybibaakka ashshonna odas .
44020028	“ Ba na7aa suuthan wozida Xoossaa woosa keethaa naagite . Geeshsha Ayyaanay hinttena halaqaa oothidi doorida wudiyasinne hintte huu7iyas naagettite .
44020029	Taani bidaappe guye , wudiyas qadhettonna iita suudhumeti hintte giddo gelanayssa ta erays .
44020030	Ammaneyssata bantta geedo kaalethanaw worddo tamaarssiya asati hintte giddofe denddana .
44020031	Hessa gisho , taani heedzu laythi qammanne gallas afuthan hinttena huu7en huu7en minthethidayssa qoppishe naagettite .
44020032	“ Ha77ika hinttena minthanawunne geeshsha asaara laatisanaw dandda7iya Xoossaasinne iya aadho keehatetha qaalas hinttena hadara immays .
44020033	“ Taani ooppekka bira woykko worqqa woykko afila amottabiikke .
44020034	Taani ta kushen oothada tananne taara de7eyssata koshshidabaa maaddidayssa hinttee , hintte huu7en ereeta .
44020035	Hintte hayssada daaburidi oothishe daaburanchchota maaddanayssanne Godaa Yesuusi , ‘ Ekkeyssafe immeyssi anjjettidayssa ’ gida qaala hintte qoppanaw besseyssa taani hinttena ubbaban bessas ” yaagis .
44020036	Phawuloosi hessa odi onggidi entta ubbaara gulbbatidi Xoossaa woossis .
44020037	Entti ubbayka Phawuloosa idimmidi yeekkidi yeeridosona .
44020038	I Zaaridi , “ Tana be7ekketa ” yaagida qaalay entta daro azzanthis . Entti markkabiya gakkanaw iya moyzidosona .
44021001	Nuuni Efesoona cimatappe shaakettida mela Qoose bida . Wonttetha gallas Rooda gakkidi yaappe Phaxara bida .
44021002	Siroofinqe pinniya markkabe demmidi iyan gelidi baanaw denddida .
44021003	Nuuni Qoophiroosa be7anaw dandda7iya soo yidi , Qoophiroosa haddirssa bagga aggidi Sooriya bida . Markkabey ba caanaa yan wothanaw koyida gisho Xiroosa bida .
44021004	Yan ammaniyaa asata demmidi enttara laappun gallas uttida . Phawuloosi Yerusalaame boonna mela entti iyaw Ayyaanan odidosona .
44021005	Nuuni enttara uttiya wodey wurin keyidi bida . Entti ubbay bantta maccasataranne bantta naytara issife katamaappe kare kessidi nuna moyzidosona . Nuuni abbaa doonan gulbbatidi Xoossaa woossida .
44021006	Hessafe guye , woli sarothidi nu markkabiyan gelida ; entti bantta soo simmidosona .
44021007	Nuuni abbaa ogiya onggidi , Xiroosappe Phexelemaysa gakkida . Yan ammaniyaa asata sarothidi , entta matan issi gallas pee7ida .
44021008	Wonttetha gallas keyidi , Qisaariya bida . Sabaakiya Filphoosa soo gakkidi iya matan uttida . I Yerusalaamen kase doorettida laappunatappe issuwa .
44021009	Filphoosas nabe gidida oyddu geela7o nayti de7oosona .
44021010	Nuuni unddenna gallas yan uttidi de7ishin Agaboosa giya nabey Yihudappe Qisaariya yis .
44021011	Nuukko yidi Phawuloosa saqqiya ekkidi ba kushiyanne ba tohuwa qachchidi , “ Geeshsha Ayyaanay ha saqqiya godaa , Yerusalaamen Ayhudeti hayssada qachchidi , Ayhude gidonna asaas aathidi immana yaagees ” yaagis .
44021012	Nuuni hessa si7ida wode nunne yan de7iya asati Phawuloosi Yerusalaame boonna mela woossida .
44021013	Shin Phawuloosi zaaridi , “ Hintte hayssada yeekkishe ays ta wozanaa shugiseeti ? Taani , Godaa Yesuusa sunthaa gisho qashetetha xalaala gidonnashin Yerusalaamen hayqqanawukka giigettas ” yaagis .
44021014	Nu zoriya I ekkonna ixxin , “ Godaa sheney hano ” yaagidi si77i gida .
44021015	Yan guutha wode gam77idaappe guye giigettidi Yerusalaame baanaw keyida .
44021016	Qisaariyan de7iya ammaniyaa asatappe guuthati nuura bidosona . Entti nuuni shemppanasuwa Minaasona giya Qoophiroosa addiya soo efidosona . Minaasoni koyro ammanida asaappe issuwa .
44021017	Nuuni Yerusalaame gakkida wode ammaniyaa asati nuna ufayssan mokkidosona .
44021018	Wonttetha gallas Phawuloosinne nuuni Yayqoobara gahettanaw bida . Woosa keethaa cimati ubbatikka yan de7oosona .
44021019	Phawuloosi entta sarothidaappe guye Ayhude gidonna asaa giddon ba baggara Xoossay oothidabaa ubbaa enttaw odis .
44021020	Entti hessa si7ida wode Xoossaa galatidi Phawuloosakko hayssada yaagidosona : “ Nu ishaw , Ayhudeta giddon aappun mukulati Xoossaa ammanidaakko ne be7aasa ; entti ubbayka higgiya minthi naagoosona .
44021021	Neeni Ayhude gidonnayssata biittan de7iya Ayhude ubbay bantta nayta qaxxaronna mela , Ayhudeta wogaa kaallonna melanne Muse higgiya ixxana mela neeni tamaarsseyssa Yerusalaamen de7iya Ayhudeti si7idosona .
44021022	Yaatin aybi lo77o ? Neeni yidayssa daroti si7ana .
44021023	“ Hessa gisho , nuuni new odeyssa si7a ; gasoy de7iya oyddu asati nu matan de7oosona .
44021024	Entta ekkada enttara geeya ; qassi entti bantta huu7iya meedettana mela enttaw miishe imma . Entti kase nebaa si7idayssi tuma gidonnayssanne neeni ne huu7enkka higge naagiya asi gideyssa ubbay erana .
44021025	“ Shin ammanida Ayhude gidonna asata gidikko , entti eeqas yarshshettidabaa moonna mela , suuthu uyonna mela , bawuta moonna melanne laymatonna mela , nuuni oda qachchidi , enttaw dabddaabbe xaafida ” yaagidosona .
44021026	Hessafe guye , Phawuloosi wonttetha gallas asata ekkidi , enttara geeyis . I bantta geeya gallasay awude polettiyakko erisanawunne bantta yarshshuwa awude yarshshaneekko erisanaw Xoossa Keethi gelis .
44021027	Laappun gallasay wurana hanishin , Iisiyappe yida Ayhudeti Xoossa Keethan Phawuloosa be7idi , asa ubbaa denthethidi Phawuloosa oykkidosona .
44021028	“ Isra7eele asaw , nuna maaddite ; ha uray , nu deriya , nu higgiyanne ha Xoossa Keetha ixxana mela asa ubbaa tamaarssees . Hessika gidonna ixxin Ayhude gidonnayssata Xoossa Keethi gelssidi , ha geeshsha bessaa tunisis ” yaagidi waassidosona .
44021029	Entti hessa giday kase Efesoona Xirofimoosa Phawuloosara kataman be7ida gisho ha77i Phawuloosi Xoossa keethi iya ekki gelidabaa enttaw daanis .
44021030	Katama ubbay buqettis ; asa ubbay shiiqidi Phawuloosa oykkidi Xoossa Keethafe kare goochchidosona . Xoossa Keethaa penggeti ellesidi gorddettidosona .
44021031	Asay Phawuloosa wodhana hanishin , “ Yerusalaame katamay kumethi buqettis ” giya oday Roome shaalaqaakko gakkis .
44021032	Shaalaqay wotaaddaretanne mato halaqata ekkidi woxxishe yis . Asay shaalaqaanne wotaaddareta be7ida wode Phawuloosa wadhdheyssa aggaagidosona .
44021033	He wode shaalaqay shiiqidi , Phawuloosa oykkidi , nam77u santhalaatan qashettana mela kiittis . Yaatidi , I ooneekkonne ay oothidaakko asaa oychchis .
44021034	Asaappe baggay issibaa gidi waassiya wode harati harabaa gidi waasses . Waasoy darida gisho shaalaqay tumaa shaakkanw dandda7ettonna ixxin , wotaaddareti Phawuloosa bantta de7iyaso efana mela kiittis .
44021035	Phawuloosi yedhdhi keyaa dethaa gakkiya wode asaa sugethaa gisho wotaaddareti iya tookkidosona .
44021036	Daro asay , “ I hayqqo ! ” yaagidi waassishe kaalloosona .
44021037	Wotaaddareti Phawuloosa bantta de7iyasuwa gelssana hanishin , Phawuloosi shaalaqaakko , “ Taani new issibaa odo ? ” yaagis . I Phawuloosakko , “ Neeni Girike doona eray ?
44021038	Neeni hayssafe sinthe buqethi medhdhidi shemppo wodhida oyddu mukulu asata ekkidi bazzo gelida Gibxxe uraa gidikkii ? ” yaagis .
44021039	Shin Phawuloosi , “ Taani , Kilqiyan de7iya erettida Terseese kataman yelettida Ayhude asi . Hayyana tana odisarkkii ? ” yaagis .
44021040	Shaalaqay iyaakko , “ Oda ” yaagin Phawuloosi dethaa bolla eqqidi , asay si77i gaana mela ba kushiyan mallis . Asay si77i gin Ibraysxe doonan hayssada yaagis :
44022001	“ Ta ishato , ta aawato , taani ha77i hinttew immiya zaaruwa si7ite . ”
44022002	Phawuloosi enttaw Ibraysxe doonan odeyssa si7idi kaseyssafe aathidi si77i gidosona . I kaallidi ,
44022003	“ Taani Kilqiyan de7iya Terseesen yelettada ha kataman diccas . Ta asttamaareykka Gamaaliyale ; taani nu aawata higgiya mintha tamaarida , hachchi hintte ubbay haneyssada Xoossaas mishettiya Ayhude asi .
44022004	Taani ha ogiya kaalliya maccatanne addeta oykkada qasho keethan yeggashenn entta wodhisana gakkanaw waaye bessida asi .
44022005	Hessadakka , kahine halaqaynne Shanggo ubbay tabaa markkattanaw dandda7ees . Taani Damasqqon de7iya entta ishatas enttafe dabddaabbe ekkada yan de7iya asati qashettidi seerettana mela Yerusalaame entta ehanaw yaa bas .
44022006	“ Taani bada Damasqqo matida wode seeta gallas qopponna saloppe gita poo7oy ta yuushuwan poo7is .
44022007	Taani sa7an kundda de7ishin , ‘ Saa7ola , Saa7ola , tana ays goodday ? ’ giya qaala si7as .
44022008	Taani zaarada , ‘ Godaw , neeni oonee ? ’ yaagas . I zaaridi , ‘ Taani , neeni gooddiya Naazirete Yesuusa ’ yaagis .
44022009	Taara de7eyssati poo7uwa be7idosonappe attin taw odeyssa qaala akeekibookkona .
44022010	“ Taani , ‘ Godaw , ta ay ootho ? ’ yaagas . “ Goday taakko , ‘ Denddada Damasqqo ba . Neeni oothana mela Xoossay qoppidaba ubbay yan new odettana ’ yaagis .
44022011	He wolqqaama poo7uwa gaason ta ayfey qooqin , taara de7iya asati ta kushiya oykkidi , tana goochchin Damasqqo gakkas .
44022012	“ Damasqqon de7iya Ayhude ubbay daro bonchchiya issi Hananiya giya addey , nu higgiya bonchcheysinne Xoossaa minthi woosseyssi de7ees .
44022013	Hananey taakko yidi , ta matan eqqidi , ‘ Ta ishaw Saa7olaa , xeella ’ yaagis . Ellesada taani iya xeella aggas .
44022014	“ I taakko , ‘ Nu aawata Xoossay neeni iya sheniya erana mela , iya xillo Na7aa be7ana melanne iya doonappe qaala si7ana mela kasetidi nena dooris .
44022015	Neeni be7idabaanne si7idabaa asa ubbaa sinthan iyaw markkattana .
44022016	Ha77i ays gam77ay ? Denddada xammaqetta ; iya sunthaa xeegada ne nagaraappe meecetta ’ yaagis .
44022017	“ Taani guye Yerusalaame simmada Xoossa Keethan woossishin , taw qonccethi benttis .
44022018	Qonccethan Goday taakko , ‘ Ne taw markkattiya markkatethaa asay ekkonna gisho ellesada Yerusalaameppe keya ’ yaagishin be7as .
44022019	“ Taani , ‘ Godaw , Ayhude Woosa Keetha ubban nena ammaneyssata oykkada wadhdhidayssanne qasho keethan yeggidayssa entti eroosona .
44022020	Entti ne markka Isxifaanose wodhiya wode taani he odan issifas . Qassi entta matan eqqada iya wodheyssata ma7uwa naagays ’ yaagis .
44022021	“ Goday taakko , ‘ Taani nena Ayhude gidonna asaakko haahoso kiittiya gisho denddada ba ’ ” yaagis .
44022022	Phawuloosi he qaala odidi ongana gakkanaw asay I geyssa si7oosona . Hessafe guye , bantta qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Hayssa biittafe dhayssa ! I daanaw bessenna ” yaagidosona .
44022023	Entti wocamishin , bantta ma7uwa bolla holishininne baana bolla laallishin ;
44022024	Shaalaqay be7idi wotaaddareti Phawuloosa bantta de7iyasuwa efana mela kiittis . Qassi asay ays hessada wocamidaakko eranaw koyidi Phawuloosa lisson garaafidi pilggana mela entta kiittis .
44022025	Shin wotaaddareti Phawuloosa dafon minthi qachchidi garaafana haniya wode Phawuloosi ba matan eqqida mato halaqaakko , “ Roome asi pirddi baynna garaafeyssi hinttew wogee ? ” yaagis .
44022026	Mato halaqay hessa si7ida wode shaalaqaakko bidi , “ Ha addey Roome asi . Neeni ay oothanaw qoppay ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
44022027	Shaalaqay Phawuloosakko shiiqidi , “ Neeni Roome ase ? Ane taw oda ” yaagis . Phawuloosi , “ Ee ” yaagis .
44022028	Shaalaqay zaaridi , “ Taani ha gadetethaa daro miishen shammas ” yaagis . Shin Phawuloosi , “ Ta ha gadetethaa yeletethan demma ekkas ” yaagis .
44022029	Hessa gisho , Phawuloosa pilgganaw qoppidayssati iira iyappe shaakettidosona . Shaalaqay Roome asi santhalaatan qachchidayssa erida wode yayyis .
44022030	Wonttetha gallas Shaalaqay , Ayhudeti Phawuloosa ays mootidaakko geeshshi eranaw koyis . Kahine halaqatinne shanggo ubbay shiiqana mela kiittis ; qassi Phawuloosa qashoppe bilisidi entta sinthan essis .
44023001	Phawuloosi shiiquwa caddi xeellidi , “ Ta ishato , taani hachchi gakkanaw Xoossaa sinthan ta de7o ubban lo77o wozanan de7as ” yaagis .
44023002	Kahine halaqay Hananey , Phawuloosa doonan baqqana mela iya matan eqqidayssata kiittis .
44023003	He wode Phawuloosi iyaakko , “ La ne booqqinte tiyida goda daaneysso , Xoossay nena baqqana . Neeni ta bolla higgiyatho pirddanaw uttada de7ashe higgey baynna tana baqqana mela kiitay ? ” yaagis .
44023004	Phawuloosa matan eqqidayssati iyaakko , “ Ne Xoossaa kahine halaqaa cayay ? ” yaagidosona .
44023005	Phawuloosi , “ Ta ishato , I kahine halaqa gididayssa taani erabiikke ; ays giikko Xoossaa qaalan , ‘ Ne deriya ayseyssa bolla iita qaala haasayoppa ’ geetetti xaafettis ” yaagis .
44023006	Shin Phawuloosi he bessan de7iya asaappe baggati Saduqaaweta , baggati Farisaaweta gideyssa be7idi , “ Ta ishato , taani Farisaawenne Farisaawe na7a ; ‘ Hayqqidayssati hayqoppe denddana ’ gada taani ufayssan naagiya gisho entti ta bolla pirddoosona ” yaagidi odis .
44023007	Phawuloosi hessa gida wode Farisaaweta giddoninne Saduqaaweta giddon ooshshi keyin shaakettidosona .
44023008	Ays giikko , Saduqaaweti , “ Hayqqida asi denddenna ; kiitanchchoyka ayyaanikka baawa ” yaagosona . Shin Farisaaweti nam77ayka de7eyssa ammanoosona .
44023009	Gita kachchi keyis ; Farisaaweta bagga gidida higge asttamaareti denddi eqqidi , “ Ha uraa bolla aybi balakka demmibookko ; iyaw ayyaani woykko kiitanchchoy haasayonna aggenna ” yaagidi palamidosona .
44023010	Ooshshay darin asay Phawuloosa shaqerethonna mela gidi , shaalaqay ba wotaaddareti wodhdhidi entta giddofe iya ellesi kessidi bantta de7iyasuwa efana mela kiittis .
44023011	He qamma Goday Phawuloosa matan eqqidi , “ Phawloosaa , neeni taw Yerusalaamen markkattidaysada Roomenkka markkattanaw bessees ; minna ; aykkoy baawa ” yaagis .
44023012	Wonttetha gallas Ayhudeti , “ Phawuloosa wodhonna de7ishe mookko uyokko ” gidi caaqqidosona .
44023013	Phawuloosa bolla hessa maqettida asati oytamappe daroosona .
44023014	Entti kahine halaqatakkonne deriya cimatakko bidi , “ Nuuni Phawuloosa wodhonna de7ishe kathi giyabaa mookko gidi caaqqida .
44023015	Hiza , hinttenne shanggoy iyabaa geeshshidi pilggiyabay de7iya daanisidi , Phawuloosa hintteko ehana mela shaalaqaa oychchite . Nuuni I ha shiiquwa gakkanaappe sinthe iya wodhanaw giigidi uttida ” yaagidosona .
44023016	Shin Phawuloosa michche na7ay he maqquwa si7ida wode bidi wotaaddareti de7iyasuwa gelidi , Phawuloosas odis .
44023017	Phawuloosi mato halaqatappe issuwa xeegidi , “ Ha na7ay shaalaqas odiyabay de7iya gisho iya shalaqaakko efa ” yaagis .
44023018	Mato halaqay na7aa shaalaqaakko efidi , “ Qasho keethan de7iya Phawuloosi tana baakko xeegidi , ha na7ay new odiyabay de7iya gisho iya neekko ehana mela tana woossis ” yaagis .
44023019	Shaalaqay na7aa kushiya oykkidi , dumma kare kessidi , “ Neeni taw odanabay aybe ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
44023020	Na7ay shaalaqaakko , “ Ayhudeti Phawuloosabaa kaseppe minthi pilgganaw koyidabaa daanisidi neeni wontto iya shiiquwa ehana mela nena woossanaw zoretaa qachchidosona .
44023021	Shin neeni entti giyabaa si7oppa . Ays giikko , oytamappe dariya asati Phawuloosa wodhonna de7ishe ‘ Kathi mookko , haathe uyokko ’ gidi caaqqidi , qosettidi iya naagoosona . Ha77i ne giyabaa xalaala si7anaw naagoosona ” yaagis .
44023022	Shaalaqay zaaridi , “ Ha oda ne taw odidayssa hara ooddeskka odoppa ” yaagidi na7aa guye yeddis .
44023023	Shaalaqay mato halaqatappe nam77ata xeegidi , “ Qammafe heedzu saaten Qisaariya baanaw , nam77u xeetu wotaaddareta , laappun tammu para asatanne nam77u xeetu tooranchchota giigisite .
44023024	Deriya aysiya Filkkisakko Phawuloosa saro gathanaw toga mehe giigisite ” yaagidi entta kiittis .
44023025	Shaalaqay Filkkisas hayssada giya dabddaabbe xaafis :
44023026	“ Qalawudiyoosa Luusiyosappe deriya aysiya bonchcho Filkkisas , saroy new gido .
44023027	Ayhudeti ha uraa oykkidi wodhana hanishin , I Roome biitta asi gidoyssa erada wotaaddaretara gakkada iya ashshas .
44023028	Entti iya ays mootiyakko eranaw koyada entta shiiquwan iya shiishas .
44023029	Entti bantta higgiyas iya mootidayssafe attin iya wodhisiyabaa woykko qashisiyabaa gidonnayssa ta demmas .
44023030	Entti ha uraa bolla maqettida zigirssay tana gakkin , taani ellesada iya neekko yeddas . Iya mooteyssati ne sinthan bidi mootana mela kiittas ” yaagis .
44023031	Hessa gisho , wotaaddareti kiitettidayssada Phawuloosa ekkidi , qamma Antiphaxirisa gathidosona .
44023032	Wonttetha gallas para asati iyara baana mela oothidi toho asati guye simmidosona .
44023033	Togay Qisaariya gakkidi dabddaabbiya deriya ayseyssas immidi , Phawuloosa iya sinthe aathidosona .
44023034	Deriya ayseyssi dabddaabbiya nabbabidaappe guye “ Phawuloosa , ne aw awuraajja asee ? ” gidi iya oychchis . I Kilqiya asi gidoyssa erida wode
44023035	“ Taani nebaa nena mooteyssati yaa wode si7ana ” yaagis . Wotaaddareti Phawuloosa Heroodisa keethan naagana mela kiittis .
44024001	Ichchashu gallasappe guye kahine halaqay , Hananey , cimataranne Xerxeluusa giya issi xabaqaara Qisaariya bis . Entti deriya ayseyssa bolla Phawuloosa mootidosona .
44024002	Phawuloosi xeegettidi gelida wode Xerxeluusi iya hayssada yaagidi mootis : “ Bonchcho Filkkisa , nuuni ne baggara daro sarotethaa demmida , ne lo77o aysuwan nu biittay daro laamettis .
44024003	Bonchcho Filkkisa , nuuni awunkka awude gidin daro galatan hessa ekkoos .
44024004	Taani nena gam77isonnashin neeni ne keehatethan nubaa qanthan si7ana mela nena woossays .
44024005	Ha uray dhube gididi biitta ubban de7iya Ayhudeta giddon buqethi medhdhidi Naaziraweta bagga asaa kaaletheyssa gidoyssa erida .
44024006	Hari attoshin , Xoossa Keetha tunisana hanishin nuuni iya oykkida ; nu higgiyada iya bolla pirddanaw qoppida .
44024007	Shin shaalaqaa Luusiyosi yidi , wolqqan nu kusheppe iya wothi ekkis .
44024008	Iya mooteyssatikka neekko yaana mela kiittis . Neeni ne huu7en ha uraa pilggada nuuni iya mootiya mootuwa ubbaa eranaw dandda7aasa ” yaagis .
44024009	Ayhudetikka , “ Ha oday tuma ” gidi iya qofaa ma77idosona .
44024010	Deriya ayseyssi Phawuloosa oda gidi mallis . Phawuloosi hayssada gidi zaaris : “ Neeni daro wodeppe doomada , ha asaas pirddashe de7eyssa erada ta odas ufayssan zaaro immays .
44024011	Taani goynnanaw Yerusalaame keyin tammanne nam77u gallasappe aadhdhonnayssa neeni ne huu7en eranaw dandda7aasa .
44024012	Ayhudeti tana Xoossa Keethan gidin Ayhude Woosa Keethan gidin kataman gidin oodderakka palamishin woykko ase shiishada maqqishin issi asikka demmibeenna .
44024013	Ha77ika entti tana mootiyabaas markka demmanaw dandda7okkona .
44024014	“ Shin taani issibaa ammanays ; taani higgen de7iyabaanne nabeti xaafida ubbabaa ammanada , nu aawata Xoossaa , entti worddo giya ogiyan goynnays .
44024015	Entti bantta huu7en ammaneyssa mela xillotinne nagaranchchoti hayqoppe denddanayssa takka ammanays .
44024016	Hessa gisho , taani Xoossa sinthaninne asa sinthan ubba wode lo77o kahi taw daana mela minnays .
44024017	“ Taani Yerusalaameppe keyoosappe daro laythafe guye ta biittaa manqotas maade immanawunne yarshsho yarshshanaw Yerusalaame bas .
44024018	Taani Xoossa Keethan hessa oothada geeshsha wogaa pola simmin tana demmidosona . He wode taara asi baawa , ooshshikka keyibeenna .
44024019	Shin Iisiyappe yida issi issi Ayhudeti yan de7oosona ; entti ta bolla oda koykko yidi tana ne bolla mootanaw dandda7osona .
44024020	Woykko taani shangguwa sinthe shiiqida wode oothida bali de7ikko hayssati ne sinthan de7eyssati odona .
44024021	Taani entta giddon eqqada , ‘ Hayqqidayssati denddana gada waassada odida gisho hachchi hintte sinthan ta bolla pirddoosona ’ gas ; hessafe harabaa oothabikke ” yaagis .
44024022	Shin Filkkisi Xoossaa ogiyabaa geeshshi erida gisho “ Taani hintte oda shaalaqaa Luusiyosi yaa wode pirddana ” yaagidi moyzis .
44024023	Filkkisi qassi Phawuloosa qachchonna naagana melanne iya dabbotappe oonikka iya oychchanaw yishin diggonna mela mato halaqaas odis .
44024024	Guutha gallasappe guye , Filkkisi Ayhude bagga gidida ba machche Dirusillara yidi Phawuloosa kiitti ehisidi Yesuus Kiristtoosan ammanobaa iyappe si7is .
44024025	Phawuloosi xillotethabaa , ba huu7e haarobaanne yaanaw de7iya pirddabaa odishin , Filkkisi yayyidi , “ Neeni ha77is ba ; taw injjetida wode nena xeegisana ” yaagis .
44024026	He wode Phawuloosappe gubbo ekkanaw qoppidi iya zaari zaari xeegisidi iyara odettees .
44024027	Nam77u laythafe guye , Filkkisa bessaa Phorqiyoos Fisxoosi ekkis . Filkkisi Ayhudeta ufayssanaw koyidi Phawuloosa billonna aggaagis .
44025001	Fisxoosi kawotida heedzu gallasappe guye Qisaariyappe Yerusalaame bis .
44025002	Yan kahine halaqatinne Ayhudeta kaaletheyssati Phawuloosa mootidosona .
44025003	Phawuloosa Yerusalaame ehishin ogen qosettidi iya wodhanaw enttaw injjetana mela banttana maaddo gidi Fisxoosa woossidosona .
44025004	Fisxoosi enttako , “ Phawuloosi , Qisaariyan qasho keethan de7ees ; taani ta huu7enkka ellesada guye simmana hanays .
44025005	I balidabay de7ikko hintte giddon aawateyssati taara Qisaariya bidi iya mootona ” yaagidi zaaris .
44025006	Fisxoosi entta matan hosppun woykko tammu gallasa mela gam77idaappe guye Qisaariya bis . Wonttetha gallas pirdda oydiyan uttidi Phawuloosa ehana mela kiittis .
44025007	I yin Yerusalaameppe yida Ayhudeti iya yuushuwan eqqidi entti lathanaw dandda7onna daro deexo mooto iya bolla shiishidosona .
44025008	Phawuloosi zaaridi , “ Taani Ayhude higgiya gidin Xoossa Keethaa woykko Roome Kawuwa Qeesare naaqqabiikke ” yaagis .
44025009	Shin Fisxoosi Ayhudeta ufayssanaw koyidi Phawuloosakko , “ Yerusalaame bada ha mootuwabaa yan ta sinthan pirddettanaw koyay ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
44025010	Shin Phawuloosi , “ Taani pirddettanaw bessiya Qeesare pirdda keethan eqqa kichchas . Neeni loytha ereyssada taani Ayhudeta aybinkka naaqqabiikke .
44025011	Hiza , taani naaqqidabay woykko hayqos gathiyaba oothidabaa gidikko hayqoppe tana ashsha giikke . Shin entti tana mootiya mootoy coo gidaappe guye oonikka tana enttaw aathi immanaw dandda7enna . Qeesarey tabaa pirddo gada oychchays ” yaagis .
44025012	He wode Fisxoosi ba zoranchchotara zorettidi , “ Neeni Qeesarey tabaa pirddo gada oychchadasa ; Qeesarekko baasa ” yaagidi zaaris .
44025013	Guutha gallasappe guye Kawoy Agirphinne Barnniiqey Fisxoosa sarothanaw Qisaariya bidosona .
44025014	Yan entti daro gallas gam77in , Fisxoosi Kawuwas Phawuloosabaa hayssada yaagidi odis ; “ Filkkisi billonna aggidi bida issi addey hayssan de7ees .
44025015	Taani Yerusalaame bida wode kahine halaqatinne Ayhude cimati iya bolla pirddana mela tana woossidi iyabaa taw odidosona .
44025016	Taani , ‘ Mootettida uray bana mooteyssata sinthan eqqidi ba mootidabaas zaaro immonnashin , oona gidikkoka aadhdhidi imetteyssi Roome higge gidenna ’ yaagada enttaw zaaras .
44025017	“ Hessa gisho , entti hayssan shiiqida wode taani gam77onna wonttetha gallas pirdda keethaa gelada Phawuloosa ehana mela kiittas .
44025018	Iya mooteyssati iya matan eqqidi , iitaban iya mootonna aggokona gada taani qoppidayssa mela iya mootibookkona .
44025019	Shin entti bantta ammanobaanne Phawuloosi , ‘ Paxa de7ees ’ giya issi hayqqida Yesuusa geetettiya addiyabaa iyara palamoosona .
44025020	Ha oday tana shaakkanaw metida gisho Phawuloosi Yerusalaame bidi , yan pirddettanaw koyakko gada iya oychchas .
44025021	Shin Phawuloosi ba oda Qeesarey be7ana gakkanaw qasho keethan gam77anaw oychchis . Taani iya Qeesarekko yeddana gakkanaw I qashettana mela kiittas ” yaagis .
44025022	Hessa gisho , Agirphi Fisxoosakko , “ Taani ta huu7enkka he uray giyabaa si7anaw koyays ” yaagis . Fisxoosi iyaakko , “ Neeni wontto I giyabaa si7ana ” yaagis .
44025023	Wonttetha gallas Agirphinne Barnniiqey gita bonchchon shaalaqataranne kataman de7iya gita asatara yidi pirdda keethi gelidosona . Fisxoosi Phawuloosa xeegisidi ehis .
44025024	Fisxoosi , “ Kawaw Agirpha , hayssan nuura de7iya asaw , Ayhudeti Yerusalaamenkka hayssankka waassidi , ‘ I hizappe guye paxa daanaw bessenna ’ yaagidi , tana woossida uraa hayssa be7eeta .
44025025	Shin iya hayqos gathiyabaa aybibaakka taani demmabiikke . I ba huu7en , ‘ Qeesarey tabaa pirddo yaagada oychchays ’ gida gisho Qeesarekko iya yeddanaw qofa qachchas .
44025026	Taani iyabaa ta godaa Qeesares xaafanaw gidiya gaasoy aybikka baawa . Hessa gisho , iyabaa hintte be7ikko ta xaafiyabay benttaneekko gada hintte sinthe ubbarakka Kawaw , Agirpha , ne sinthe iya ehas .
44025027	Ays giikko , qashettida asi bolla daynnas aathiya wode I ays mootettidaakko Qonccisonna aggeyssi taw eeyatethi daanees ” yaagis .
44026001	Agirphi Phawuloosakko , “ Neeni nebaa odanaw dandda7aasa ” yaagis . He wode Phawuloosi ba kushiya denthidi hayssada yaagis :
44026002	“ Kawaw , Agirpha , Ayhudeti tana mootidabaas zaaro immanaw hachchi ne sinthan eqqashe ta qaaday lo77o gada qoppays .
44026003	Neeni Ayhude wogaanne palamaa loythada eriya gisho tana salettonna si7ana mela woossays .
44026004	“ Taani na7atethafe doomada ta asaa giddoninne Yerusalaamen de7ida ta de7uwa Ayhude ubbay eroosona .
44026005	Taani koyroppe doomada , nu ammano higgiya minthidi naagiya Farisaaweta yaraappe gideyssa entti markkattanaw koykko eroosona .
44026006	Ha77ika taani Xoossay nu aawatas immana gida ufayssaa naagiya gisho mootettada hayssan eqqas .
44026007	Qassi tammanne nam77u nu aawata sheeshay Xoossaa qammanne gallas minthidi goynnishe Xoossay immana gidayssa ekkanaw ufayssan naagoosona . Kawaw Agirphaa , Ayhudeti tana mootey taani ufayssan hessa naagiya gishossa .
44026008	Ayhudetoo , Xoossay hayqqidayssata dentheyssa ays ammanekketii ?
44026009	“ Kase taani ta huu7enkka Naazirete Yesuusa sunthaa teqqanaw dandda7ettidaba ubbaa oothanaw bessees gada qoppas .
44026010	Taani Yerusalaamen oothiday hayssa . Kahine halaqatappe maata ekkada Xoossaa asatappe darota qashisas . Entta wodhiya wodekka entta hayquwa dosas .
44026011	Daro wode Ayhude Woosa Keethaa ubban entti seerettana melanne Yesuusa cayidi kaddana mela un77ethas . Taani wogi baynna entta hanqettada hari attoshin , hara biitta katamata gakkanaw entta goodas .
44026012	“ Taani ha odas kahine halaqatappe maatanne kiitaa ekkada Damasqqo bays .
44026013	Kawaw , taani seeta gallas ogiyan de7ishin awa poo7oppe daro aadhdhiya poo7oy ta yuushuwaninne taara beyssata yuushuwan saloppe poo7is .
44026014	Nuuni ubbayka sa7an kunddida wode Ibraysxe doonan , ‘ Saa7ola , Saa7ola , tana ays goodday ? Neeni nena caddiya xam77aa qakkiko nena qohaasa ’ yaagidi taw odishin si7as .
44026015	“ Taani , ‘ Godaw , neeni oonee ? ’ yaagas . “ Goday , ‘ Taani , neeni gooddiya Yesuusa ;
44026016	shin dendda eqqa . Hachchi neeni tana be7idayssaninne sinthafe ta nena bessanyssa haratas markkattana mela ta oosanchcho oothada nena shuumanaw new benttas .
44026017	Isra7eele asatappenne taani nena enttako kiittiya Ayhude gidonnayssatappe nena ashshana .
44026018	Neeni entta ayfiyaa dooyana , dhumappe poo7okko , Xalahe kusheppe Xoossako entta zaarana . Entti tanan ammanidi nagara atotethaa ekkana . Xoossay doorida asaa giddon bantta laata demmana ’ yaagis .
44026019	“ Kawaw Agirphaa , hessa gisho , taw saloppe benttida qonccethas kiitettanayssa ixxabiikke .
44026020	Shin taani koyrottada Damasqqon hessafe guye Yerusalaameninne Yihuda biitta ubban de7eyssatinne Ayhude gidonnayssati bantta nagaraappe Xoossaakko simmana melanne nagaraappe simuwa bessiya ooso oothana mela qaala odas .
44026021	Hessa gisho , Ayhudeti tana Xoossa Keethan oykkidi wodhanaw koyidosona .
44026022	Hachchi gakkanaw Xoossaa maadey taappe shaakettibeenna ; yaaniya gisho , guuthaasinne gitaas markkattashe hayssan eqqas . Nabetinne Musey hanana gidi odidayssafe haraa issibaakka taani odidabay baawa .
44026023	Hessika , ‘ Kiristtoosi waaye ekkanaw bessees ; qassi hayqoppe koyro denddidi Ayhudetasinne Ayhude gidonnayssatas atotetha poo7o odanaw bessees ’ gidayssa ” yaagis .
44026024	Phawuloosi hessa yaagidi zaarishin , Fisxoosi ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Phawloosaa , ne gooyadasa ; ne daro timirttey nena gooshshas gathis ” yaagis .
44026025	Shin Phawuloosi , “ Bonchcho Fisxoosaa , taani tumaabanne bessiyabaa odaysippe attin gooyabiikke .
44026026	Taani qonccen odiya odaa Kawoy erees . Ha oday geeman oosettiboonna gisho issoykka iyappe geemmonayssa taani geeshshada erays .
44026027	“ Kawaw Agirphaa , neeni nabeta ammanaasa gidikkii ? Neeni ammaneyssa taani erays ” yaagis .
44026028	Kawoy Agirphi , Phawuloosakko , “ Ha guutha saaten tana ammanthanaw koyay ? ” yaagis .
44026029	Phawuloosi , “ Daro wode gidin guutha wode ne xalaala gidonnashin hachchi taana si7iya ubbay ha qashuwappe attin ta mela gidana mela Xoossaa woossays ” yaagis .
44026030	Hessafe guye , Kawoy Fisxoosi , Barnniiqeynne enttara uttida ubbayka denddidosona .
44026031	Yaappe keyidi bishe issoy issuwara , “ Ha uray hayqos woykko qashos gathiyabaa aykkoka oothibeenna ” yaagidi odettidosona .
44026032	Agirphi Fisxoosakko , “ Ha uray ‘ Qeesarey tabaa pirddo ’ goonnaako bilettanaw dandda7ees , shin attis ” yaagis .
44027001	Nuuni markkabera Xaale baanaw qachchida wode Awugisxoosa wotaaddareta geetetteyssatappe issi Yuuliyoosa giya mato halaqaas Phawuloosanne hara guutha qasho asata immidosona .
44027002	Iisiya gaxan de7iya biittata biya Adiramixiyoone markkaben gelidi denddida . Maqedooniya asi gidida Teselonqe Arsxirokoosi nuura de7ees .
44027003	Wonttetha gallas nuuni Sidoona gakkishin , Yuuliyoosi Phawuloosas keehidi ba laggetakko bidi koshshiyaban maadettana mela enttako yeddis .
44027004	Yaappe denddidi sinthara nu bolla carkkiya gisho haathan teqettida biittaa , Qoophiroosan zemppidi aadhdhida .
44027005	Kilqiyanne Phinfiliya matan de7iya abbaa pinnidi Liiqiyan de7iya Muura gakkida .
44027006	Yan mato halaqay Xaale biya Iskkinddiriya markkabe demmidi , iyan nuna gelssis .
44027007	Nuuni daro gallas loddara bidi , daro meton Qanddoosa katamaa mata gakkida . Yaara baanaw nuna carkkoy diggin Salmoonara aadhdhidi haathan teqettida biittaa , Qarxeesan zemppidi aadhdhida .
44027008	Daro meton gaxa gaxa oykkidi Laasiya katamaa matan de7iya abbaa doonan “ Markkabey Woppu Gidi Shemppiyaso ” giya bessaa gakkida .
44027009	Nuuni yan daro wodiya gam77idaappe guye xoomi bilettin , markkabera buussi metiya gisho Phawuloosi entta zoris .
44027010	“ Asaw , nu buussan gita boshinne daro qohoy de7eyssi taw benttees ; qohoy caanaa bollanne markkabiya bolla xalaala gidonnashin nu de7uwa bollaka gakkana ” yaagis .
44027011	Shin mato halaqay Phawuloosi gidayssafe aathidi markkabiya laaggeysinne markkabiya goday geyssa ammanis .
44027012	He abbaa doonan de7iya katamay balggo ageena aathanaw enttaw injjetonna gisho dariya asati banttaw dandda7ettiko Finqqe katamaa gakkidi balggo ageena yan aathanaw zorettidosona . Finqqey pudeha-wulohappenne dugeha-wulohappe giddon abbaa doonan de7iya katama .
44027013	Kawushsha dugeha carkkoy loddara carkkida wode bantta qoppidayssada hanidabaa daanin denddidi , markkabey qaaxxonna mela oykkiya biraata pude ekkidi Qarxeesa matara aadhdhidosona .
44027014	Shin daro gam77onna “ Awuraqiis ” giya wolqqaama gotey haathan teqettida biittaafe duge entta bolla denddis .
44027015	He gotey markkabiya sugidi efonna diggida gisho carkkoy markkabiya ba dosida soo efis .
44027016	Nuuni Qeeda giya haathan teqettida biittaa zemppidi bishe daro metootettidi markkabiya wogoluwa ashshanaw dandda7ida .
44027017	Entti wogoluwa pude kessidaappe guye wodoruwan markkabiya bolla xaaxidi , minthi qachchidosona . Surtiisa giya shafiyan banttana dom77ethana gidi hirggidi , markkabiya sharaa wodhisidi markkabiya coo yeddi aggidosona .
44027018	Gotey wolqqaamishe bin wonttetha gallas caanaappe baggaa abban holo oykkidosona .
44027019	Heedzantho gallas markkabiya miishiya ekkidi bantta kushen holidosona .
44027020	Nuuni daro gallas awa ayfenne xoolintto be7onna gishonne wolqqaama uushoy nu bolla uushida gisho sinthafe shemppora attana gidi qoppibookko .
44027021	He wode entti daro gallas kathi moonna gam77ida gisho Phawuloosi entta giddon denddi eqqidi , “ Asaw , hintte ta zoriya ekkidi Qarxeesappe denddonna aggidaako ha metoynne qohoy nuna gakkenna .
44027022	Shin taani hinttena yayyofite gada zorays ; ays giikko , ha markkabey dhayanaappe attin hinttefe issi asa shemppoykka dhayenna .
44027023	Zine qamma ta iyabaa gididayssinne ta goynniya Xoossay kiittida kiitanchchoy ta matan eqqidi ,
44027024	‘ Phawuloosa , yayyofa ; neeni Roome Kawuwa Qeesare sinthan eqqanaw bessees . Hekko Xoossay ne gisho neera biya asa ubbaa shemppuwa ashshis ’ yaagis .
44027025	Hessa gisho , asaw , yayyofite . He kiitanchchoy taw odidayssi hananayssa taani ammanays .
44027026	Shin carkkoy nuna efidi issi haathan teqettida biittaa gaxan holana ” yaagis .
44027027	Tammanne oyddantho qamman Meditiraane Abban nuna carkkoy gedenne haa sugishin , gidi bilahe gidiya wode markkabiyan ootheyssatas biittako matidabaa daanis .
44027028	Entti ciimmotethaa eranaw koyidi wodoro xeeran deexiyabaa qachchidi abban yeggin , abbay hosppun tammu wadha gidis . Guuthi gam77idi , zaari yeggin usuppun tammu wadha gidis .
44027029	Entti abbaa gaxan de7iya shuchchan dom77ettona mela yayyidi , markkabey boonna mela oykkiya oyddu biraatata markkabiyappe guyera abban yeggidi , sa7ay wonttana mela Xoossaa woossosona .
44027030	Markkabiyan ootheyssati markkabiyappe baqatanaw koyidi , markkabey boonna mela oykkiya biraatata markkabiyappe sintha baggara abban yeggiya daanin wogoluwa abban yeggidosona .
44027031	Phawuloosi mato halaqaakkonne wotaaddaretakko , “ Hayssati markkabiyan shemppi uttonna ixxiko hintte attanaw dandda7ekketa ” yaagis .
44027032	Hessa gisho , wotaaddareti wogoloy qashettida wodoruwa qanxidi yeddi aggidosona .
44027033	Sa7i wonttana hanishin ubbay kathi maana mela Phawuloosi asaakko , “ Hintte kathi moonna naagishe hachchira tammanne oyddu gallas gam77ideta .
44027034	Hessa gisho , guutha kathi hintte maana mela taani hinttena woossays . Hintte gashttana mela guutha kathi maanaw koshshees ; hari attoshin hintte huu7e binaanaappe issoykka dhayenna ” yaagis .
44027035	Phawuloosi hessa gidi uythi ekkidi ubbaa sinthan Xoossaa galatis ; uythaa menthidi muusu doomis .
44027036	Ubbay minettidi banttaw kathi ekkidi midosona .
44027037	Nuuni markkabiyan de7eyssati nam77u xeetanne laappun tammanne usuppuna .
44027038	Entti midi kallida wode caana gisttiya abban yeggidi markkabiya deexuwa kawushshidosona .
44027039	Sa7i wonttida wode markkabiya oosanchchoti aw biitta gakkidaakko eronashin , abbaa gaxan de7iya shafenne silimo be7idosona . Banttaw dandda7ettiko markkabiya he shafiyakko shiishanaw qoppidosona .
44027040	Yaatidi , markkabey boonna mela oykkiya biraatata birshshidi abban yeggidosona . He wode laaggiya mithaa qachchiya wodoruwa birshshidosona . Hessafe guye , carkkoy markkabiya sinthe sugana mela markkabiya efiya sharaa sintha baggara dhoqqu oothidi buussu doomidosona .
44027041	Shin markkabey shafe dooren dom77ettidi mitettis . Markkabiyas sintha baggay xuggunidi shafiya caddi oykkidi qaaxxonna ixxin , guye baggay zuliya sugethan meqeretethi oykkis .
44027042	Wotaaddareti qasho asaappe issoykka haathaa wadhdhidi kessi ekkonna mela entta wodhanaw zorettidosona .
44027043	Shin mato halaqay Phawuloosa ashshanaw koyidi wotaaddareta zoretaa ixxis . Haathe wadho eriya ubbay markkabiyappe haathan guppi guppi wodhdhidi kasetidi gaxa keyana mela kiittis .
44027044	Attidayssati sanqqaa bollanne , markkabiya me7uwa bolla keyana mela kiittis . Hessada hanidi ubbay gaxa sarora keyidosona .
44028001	Nuuni gaxa saro keyida wode gakkida haathan teqettida biittay Maltta geetetteyssa erida .
44028002	Maltta asay nuus daro keeha keehidosona . Iri bukkiya gishonne meeggiya gisho tama eethidi nuna ubbaa mokkidosona .
44028003	Phawuloosi daro afira shiishidi taman wothishin , shooshi seelaa gisho keyidi iya kushiya bolla xaaxettidi iya dukkis .
44028004	Maltta asay shooshi Phawuloosa kushen xaaxettidayssa be7ida wode issoy issuwako , “ Tuma ha uray shemppo wodhida asi ; hari attoshin abbaafe I attinkka xoossa pirddafe attidi paxa daanaw dandda7ibeenna ” yaagidosona .
44028005	Shin Phawuloosi ba kushiyappe shooshaa wuxarkkidi , taman yeggis ; iya aykkoka qohibeenna .
44028006	Entti , “ Iya asatethay kixxees , woykko akeekonna kunddidi hayqqees ” gidi naagoosona . Shin daro wode naagidi iya asatethan aybikka dummattidabay dhayin , “ Hayssi xoosse ” yaagidi bantta qofaa laammidosona .
44028007	He heeran haathan teqettida biittaa halaqaa , Pupliyoosa geyssas gadey de7ees ; heedzu gallas gakkanaw i nuna siiqon mokkis .
44028008	Pupliyoosa aaway qoxo , mishanne ulo uttison harggettidi zin77idi de7ees . Phawuloosi iya soo gelidi iyaw Xoossaa woossis ; ba kushiya iya bolla wothidi pathis .
44028009	Hessafe guye , Malttan de7iya harggiya hara asatikka yidi paxidosona .
44028010	Entti nuna daro bonchchidosona ; nuuni markkabera baanaw denddida wode oges koshshiyabaa nuus immidosona .
44028011	Heedzu ageenappe guye , Malttan balggo aathidi Iskkinddiriya markkabera baanaw denddida . He markkabiya bolla Diyosqoroosa giya mentte eeqata misiley de7ees .
44028012	Sirakuuse katamaa gelidi yan heedzu gallas uttida .
44028013	Yaappe denddidi Regiyume katamaa gakkida . Issi gallasappe guye , dugeha bagga carkkoy carkkin , wonttetha gallas Putiyoole katamaa gakkida .
44028014	Yan nuuni issi issi ammaniyaa asata demmin , banttara saamintta gam77ana mela nuna woossidosona . Hessafe guye , Roome bida .
44028015	Roomen de7iya ammaniyaa asati nubaa si7idi , Afiyoosa Giyaan , Heedzu Aqiyaso giya bessaa gakkanaw nuna mokkanaw yidosona . Phawuloosi entta be7ida wode Xoossaa galatidi minettis .
44028016	Nuuni Roome gelida wode Phawuloosi bana naagiya wotaaddariyara barkka de7o geetettis .
44028017	Heedzu gallasappe guye , Phawuloosi Ayhudeta halaqata baakko xeegisis . Entti shiiqida wode enttako , “ Ta ishato , taani nu asaa woykko nu aawata wogaa bolla aybi qohokka oothabiikke , shin tana Yerusalaamen qachchidi Roome asaas aathidi immidosona .
44028018	Entti ta mootuwa be7idi hayqos gathiyabaa ta bolla aybibaakka demmiboonna gisho tana billanaaw qoppidosona .
44028019	Shin Ayhudeti hessa ixxida wode ‘ Tabaa Qeesarey pirddo ’ yaagasippe attin taani ta deriya mootiyabay de7in gidenna .
44028020	Taani hinttena xeegisiday hinttena be7anawunne hinttew hayssa odanaassa . Taani ha santhalaatan qashettiday Isra7eele asay naagiya ufayssaa gishossa ” yaagis .
44028021	Ayhude halaqati Phawuloosakko , “ Nuus Yihudappe nebaa xaafettida dabddaabbey gakkibeenna . Yaappe yida asatappe issoykka nebaa iita odiday baawa .
44028022	Shin ha ne kaalliya ammanuwa dumma dumma bessan asay ixxeyssa nuuni eriya gisho ne qofaa si7anaw koyoos ” yaagidosona .
44028023	Entti bantta yaana gallas Phawuloosas qaxaridi , he gallas daridi i de7iyasuwa yidosona . I wonttafe omarssi gakkanaw Xoossaa kawotethaabaa enttaw markkattis . Qassi entti Yesuusabaa ammanana mela Muse higgiyafenne nabeta maxaafappe qonccisidi entta tamaarssis .
44028024	Issoti issoti Phawuloosi gidayssa ammanidosona , shin harati ammanibookkona .
44028025	Entti bantta giddon oda ma77onna ixxida wode Phawuloosi issibaa gidaappe guye bidosona . I hayssada yaagis : “ Geeshsha Ayyaanay nu aawatas nabiya Isayaasa doonan odidayssi tuma .
44028026	‘ Neeni he asaakko bada , hintte sissaa si7eeta , shin hinttew gelenna ; hintte be7o be7eeta , shin demmeketa .
44028027	Ha asaa wozanay muumis ; entta haythay tullis ; entta ayfeykka goozettis . Hessi baynneeko , entti bantta ayfiyaan be7idi , bantta haythan si7idi , bantta wozanan akeekidi , entti taakko simmana ; takka entta pathanashin ’ yaaga ” yaagis .
44028028	“ Hiza , hayssi Xoossaa atotethaa kiitay Ayhude gidonnayssatas gideyssa ereeta . Enttika si7ana ” yaagis .
44028029	Phawuloosi hessa gidaappe guye Ayhudeti bantta giddon daro palamishe keyidi bidosona .
44028030	Phawuloosi kera keethan nam77u laythi kumethi de7is ; yan de7ishe baakko yaa ubbaa mokkees .
44028031	Yashshi baynnanne oonikka diggonnashin Xoossaa kawotethaabaa sabbakis ; Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosabaa qonccisidi tamaarssees .
45001001	Yesuus Kiristtoosa aylle gidida , hawaare gidana mela xeegettidayssafenne Xoossaa Wonggelaa sabbakana mela doorettida Phawuloosi kiittida kiitaa .
45001002	Xoossay daro wodeppe sinthe ba nabeta baggara immana yaagida Xoossaa Wonggelay Geeshsha Maxaafatan xaafettis .
45001003	He Wonggelay ashon Dawite sheeshaappe yelettida , Xoossaa Na7aa , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosabaa .
45001004	Qassi I ba geeshsha Ayyaanan hayqoppe denddidi , Xoossaa Na7aa gideyssa gita wolqqan bessis .
45001005	Iya baggara Ayhude gidonna asa ubbay , ammanidi kiitettana mela Kiristtoosa sunthaa gisho Xoossay aadho keehatethinne hawaaretetha maata nuus immis .
45001006	Yesuus Kiristtoosas gidana mela xeegettida asatappe baggati hinttena .
45001007	Roomen de7iya , Xoossay siiqeyssatasinne iya geeshsha dere gidana mela dooridayssatas . Xoossaa nu Aawappenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hinttew gido .
45001008	Ubbaafe koyrottada , hintte ammanoy biitta ubban si7ettida gisho Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara hintte gisho ta Xoossaa galatays .
45001009	Taani iya Na7aa wonggelabaa kumetha wozanan odiya Xoossay , taani ta woossan ubba wode hinttena qoppeyssas I markka .
45001010	Wurssethan , Xoossaa shene gidikko , taani hintteko baanaw ogey taw injjetana mela ubba wode woossays .
45001011	Taani hinttew Ayyaana imuwa shaakkanawunne hinttena be7anaw laamotays .
45001012	Hessika , taani hintte ammanuwan , qassi hintte ta ammanuwan minettana melassa .
45001013	Ta ishato , taani Ayhude gidonna asaappe ayfe demmidayssada , hinttefekka ayfe demmanaw hintteko baanaw qoppas , shin digettas .
45001014	Tamaarida asaasinne tamaariboonna asaas qassi cinccatasinne eeyatas taw acoy de7ees .
45001015	Hessa gisho , Roomen de7iya hinttewuka Wonggelaa odanaw amottays .
45001016	Iya ammaniyaa ubbaa , koyrottidi Ayhudeta , kaallidi Ayhude gidonnayssata ashshanaw Wonggelay Xoossaa wolqqaa gidiya gisho ta Wonggelan yeellatikke .
45001017	Xilloy ammanon de7on daana geetettidi Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettis . Wonggelaan Xoossaa xillotethay qonccis ; koyroppe wurssethi gakkanaw asay xilley ammanona .
45001018	Tumay erettonna mela bantta iita ooson kammiya asaa bollanne nagara ubbaa bolla , Xoossaa hanqoy saloppe wodhdhees .
45001019	Xoossay enttaw qonccanaw bessiyabaa qonccisida gisho entti Xoossabaa eroosona .
45001020	Alamey medhettosappe doomidi , asaas benttonna Xoossaa kanddoy , hessika iya merinaa wolqqaynne Xoossatethay iya medhetethan qonccidi de7iya gisho asay bantta iitatethaas gaasoyaabay baawa .
45001021	Entti Xoossaa erishe , iya bonchchibookonanne galatibookkona . Entta qofay maaddonnabaa gidis ; entta akeekonna wozanay dhumis .
45001022	Entti banttana cinccata goosona , shin eeyata .
45001023	Entti hayqqonna Xoossaa goynnanayssa aggidi , hayqqiya asa medhon , kafota medhon , do7ata medhoninne ulora gooshettiyabata daanisidi oothida misileta goynnidosona .
45001024	Hessa gisho , entti issoy issuwara borssobaa oothidi , bantta asatethaa kawushshana mela Xoossay entta wozanay amottiya tuna oosos entta yeggi aggis .
45001025	Hessi haniday entti Xoossaa tumaa worddon laammida gishonne medhdhida Xoossaa aggidi , medhetethi goynnida gishossa . Xoossay merinaw galatettidayssa . Amin77i .
45001026	Hessa gisho , Xoossay enttana entta borsso amuwaas yeggi aggis . Entta maccasay banttaw bessiya addera gahetethi aggidi , bessonnabaa hanidi maccasi maccasara gahettidosona .
45001027	Hessadakka , addeti banttaw bessiya maccasara gaytethi aggidi , addey addera gahettidosona . Addeti issoy issuwara amon xuugettidi , borssobaa oothidosona . Bantta oothida balaas bessiya pirddaa ekkidosona .
45001028	Entti Xoossaa erishe , hari attoshin iyabaa qoppanaw koyonna ixxida gisho bessonnabaa oothana mela Xoossay enttana pathonna qofas aathi immis .
45001029	Enttan geellatethi , iitatethi , yiiqey , geney , qanaatey , shemppo wodhoy , palami , cimoynne iita amoy kumis . Entti zigireyssata ,
45001030	asa sunthi iisseyssata , Xoossaa ixxeyssata , cayeyssata , otoreyssata , ceeqetteyssata , iitabaa oothanaw koyeyssatanne bantta aayesinne aawas kiitettonayssata ,
45001031	akeekonnayssata , caaqo mentheyssata , siiqoy baynnayssata , qadhey baynnayssata .
45001032	Hayssata mela ootheyssatas hayqoy bessees giya Xoossaa higgiya erishe , hayssata oothoosona . Entti banttaw ooso xalaala gidonnashin oothiya haratakka nashshoosona .
45002001	Hessa gisho , neno harata bolla pirddeysso , neeni gaasoyaabay baawa . Neeni harata bolla pirddashe , he neeni pirddiya uraa mela oothiko , nee , ne bolla pirddaasa .
45002002	Hessa mela ooso ootheyssata bolla Xoossay xillo pirddaa pirddeyssa nu eroos .
45002003	Neno , hessa mela ooso ootheyssata bolla pirddeysso , entti ootheyssa mela ootheysso , neeni Xoossaa pirddaafe attanabaa daanii ?
45002004	Woykko Xoossaa keehatethaa , genccaanne dandda7a darotethaa kadhayye ? Xoossay new keehiday nena nagaraappe zaaranaw gideyssa erikkiyye ?
45002005	Shin hinttew shuchcha wozaninne si7onna haythi de7ees . Hessa gisho , Xoossaa hanqoynne xillo pirdday qoncciya gallas , ne bolla pirdday darana mela oothaasa .
45002006	Xoossay issuwas issuwas iya oosuwa mela immana .
45002007	Lo77o ooson minnidi , galataa , bonchchonne dhayonna de7uwa koyeyssatas Xoossay merinaa de7uwa immana .
45002008	Shin banttana siiqeyssata , tumaa ixxeyssatanne iitabaa oothanaw koyeyssata bolla Xoossaa hanqoynne pirdday yaana .
45002009	Iitabaa oothiya asa ubbaa , koyrottidi Ayhudeta , kaallidi Ayhude gidonna asaa metoynne waayey gakkana .
45002010	Shin Xoossay lo77o ooso oothiya ubbaas , koyrottidi Ayhudetas , kaallidi Ayhude gidonnayssatas galataa , bonchchonne sarotethaa immana .
45002011	Xoossay som77o be7idi ase shaakkenna .
45002012	Higgey baynna nagara oothida ubbay higgey baynna dhayana . Higgey de7ishin , nagara oothida ubbay higgen pirddettana .
45002013	Xoossaa sinthan xilleyssati higge naageyssatappe attin higge sissa xalaala si7eyssata gidokkona .
45002014	Higgey baynna Ayhude gidonna asay medhon higgey kiitteyssa oothoosona . Enttaw xaafettida higgey baynna ixxikokka entti bantta wozanan higgiya eroosona .
45002015	Entta hanotay , higge kiitay entta wozanan xaafettidayssa bessees . Qassi entta kahay entta bolla markkattees . Entta qofay issi issi toho enttana bala gees ; issi issi toho enttana likke gees .
45002016	Ta tamaarssida Wonggelaa mela Xoossay Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara asa wozanan geemmida qofaa pirddiya wode hessi erettana .
45002017	Shin ne nena Ayhude gaasa ; higgen zemppaasa ; Xoossan ceeqaasa .
45002018	Ne oothana mela Xoossay koyabay aybeekko eraasa . Higgiya tamaarida gisho tuma gidiyabaa dooranaw eraasa .
45002019	Neeni qooqeta kaaletheyssa , qassi dhuman de7eyssatas poo7o gideyssa shaakka eraasa .
45002020	Neeni higgiyafe demmida eratethaaninne tumatethan eeyata eriseyssanne yoogata tamaarsseyssa gideyssa eraasa .
45002021	Yaatin , ne harata tamaarsseyssi ne nena ays tamaarssikii ? Neeni , “ Kaysotoppa ” gashe , neeni ne huu7en kaysotayye ?
45002022	Neeni , “ Laammofa ” gashe , neeni ne huu7en laammayye ? Neeni eeqa ixxashe , eeqay de7iya keethaa bonqayye ?
45002023	Neeni Xoossaa higgiyan ceeqettasa , shin higgiyas kiitettonna ixxada Xoossaa yeellayay ?
45002024	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Hintte gaason Xoossaa sunthay Ayhude gidonna asatan cayettees ” geetettidi xaafettis .
45002025	Ne higges kiitettiko , ne qaxxaretethaas maadey de7ees , shin neeni higgiyas kiitettonna ixxiko ne qaxxaretethay qaxxarettiboonna mela gidees .
45002026	Ayhude gidonna asi qaxxarettonna de7ishe , higgiyas kiitettiko , Xoossay iya qaxxarettida mela taybenne ?
45002027	Hintte , Ayhude asati , hinttew xaafettida higgeynne qaxxaroy de7ishin , hintte higges kiitettonna ixxiko , Ayhude gidonna asay qaxxarettonna ixxikokka higges kiitettidi , hintte bolla pirddana .
45002028	Hiza , sunthan Ayhude gidida ubbay tuma Ayhude gidenna . Qassi kare asatethaa qaxxaroy tuma qaxxaro gidenna .
45002029	Shin tuma Ayhudetethi gaatha baggan Ayhude gideyssa . Tuma qaxxaretethi Xoossaa Ayyaanan oosettiya wozana qaxxaretethafe attin xaafettida higgiyan oosettiya asatetha qaxxaro gidenna . He uray galataa Xoossafe ekkeesippe attin asappe gidenna .
45003001	Yaatin , Ayhude gidon ay dummatethi de7ii ? Woykko qaxxaretethan ay maadey de7ii ?
45003002	Tumakka Ayhude gidoy daro ogera maaddees . Ubbaafe sinthe Xoossay ba qaala hadara Ayhudetas immis .
45003003	Yaatin , enttafe issoti issoti qaala ammanonna ixxiko , entta ixoy Xoossaa ammanetethaa diggiyye ?
45003004	Diggenna ! Asa ubbay worddanchcho gidikkoka Xoossay tuma gido . Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Ne qaalan ne xillasa ; nena mooteyssa pirddan lathaasa ”
45003005	Yaatin , nu nagaray Xoossay xillo gideyssa bessiyabaa gidikko , nu woyganee ? Xoossay nu nagaraa gisho nu bolla pirddiko , likke gidenneyye ? Hayssa taani asa qofatho gays .
45003006	Hessi ubbarakka hanenna . Hessada hanikko , Xoossay ha alamiya bolla waati pirddanee ?
45003007	Shin ta worddotethay Xoossaa tumaa qonccisidi , iya bonchchuwa darssi bessiyabaa gidikko , yaatin , ays ta bolla nagaranchchoda pirddeetii ?
45003008	Issi issi asay , “ Lo77oy yaana mela iita oothoos ” yaagidi tamaarssiyaada oothidi tana mootosona . Hessa mela asaa bolla yaa Xoossaa pirdday likke .
45003009	Yaatin , nuuni woyganee ? Nu Ayhudeti , Ayhude gidonnayssatappe aadhdhonaayye ? Gidenna ! Ayhude gidin , Ayhude gidonna ixxin ubbay nagaranchcho gideyssa taani kasetada hinttew odas .
45003010	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Xillo asi issoykka baawa .
45003011	Akeekiya asi baawa , Xoossaa koyaa oonikka baawa .
45003012	Asa ubbay Xoossaas zokko zaaridosona ; ubbay issife pathonnabaa gididosona . Lo77o oothiya oonikka baawa ; issi asikka baawa .
45003013	Entta doonappe keyaa qaalay , dooyettida duufoppe keyaa xinqqo mela ; bantta inxarssan cimmoosona . Entta doonappe ase wodhiya , shoosha marzey keyees .
45003014	Entta doonan camo odaynne baadethi kumis .
45003015	Entti suuthi gussanaw ellesoosona .
45003016	Entta ogiyan dhayoynne qohoy de7ees .
45003017	Entti sarotetha ogiya erokkona .
45003018	Bantta de7uwan Xoossaas yayyokona ”
45003019	Ase ubbaa doona oythanawunne kumetha alamiya Xoossaa pirddaafe garssan shiishanaw , higgey imettiday higgefe garssan aqeyssatas gideyssa nu eroos .
45003020	Hessa gisho , oonikka higges kiitettidi Xoossaa sinthan xillanaw dandda7enna . Higgey asi ubbay nagaranchcho gideyssa bessees .
45003021	Shin ha77i Xoossay asi higgey baynnashin xilliya oge qonccisis . He ogiya Muse higgeynne nabeti markkattidosona .
45003022	Ha xillotethaa , Xoossay Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara asa ubbaas shaakoy baynna immees .
45003023	Asa ubbay nagara oothidosona ; Xoossay enttaw immida bonchchuwafe haakkidi attidosona .
45003024	Shin entti Xoossaa aadho keehatethan , woziya Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara coo xillidosona .
45003025	Xoossay Yesuus Kiristtoosa yarshsho oothidi immiday , iya ammaniyaa ubbay iya suuthan nagara maarotethi demmana melassa . Xoossay hessa oothiday ba dandda7an kase nagaraa taybonna aggidi , ba xillotethaa bessanaassa .
45003026	Ha77i wodiyan Yesuusa ammaniyaa ubbaa xillisidi , Xoossay ba huu7en xillo gideyssa bessees .
45003027	Yaatin , nu ceeqettiyabay aybi de7ii ? Aybikka baawa . Nuuni ceeqettey higges kiitettiya gishoyye ? Akkay ! Ammano gishossa .
45003028	Xoossay ase xillisey ammanonnappe attin higges kiitetethan gidonnayssa nu akeekos .
45003029	Woykko Xoossay Ayhudeta xalaala Xoosseyye ? Ayhude gidonnayssatas Xoosse gidenneyye ? Tuma , Ayhude gidonnayssataskka I Xoosse .
45003030	Xoossay isso ; Ayhudetanne Ayhude gidonnayssata ammanon xillisey iya .
45003031	Yaatin , nuuni higgiya ammano gisho shaaros guusseyye ? Gidenna ! Higgiya minthosippe attin .
45004001	Yaatin , nu mayzay Abrahamey ay demmidee ?
45004002	Abrahamey ooson xillidabaa gidiyakko , I ceeqettiyabay de7ees , gidoshin , Xoossaa sinthan ceeqettanaw dandda7enna .
45004003	Geeshsha Maxaafay , “ Abrahamey Xoossaa ammanis ; Xoossay hessa iyaw xillotethi oothidi ekkis ” yaagees .
45004004	Oothiya uray ekkiya daamozey , iya ooso wolqqaas cigettiya gateppe attin iyaw imota gidenna .
45004005	Shin ooso oothonna oonikka nagaranchchuwa xillisiya Xoossaa ammanikko , iya ammanoy iyaw xillotethi gididi taybettees .
45004006	Geeshsha Maxaafan Dawitey , oosoy baynna Xoossay xillisiya asati ay mela anjjettidaakko hayssada yaagidi qonccisees :
45004007	“ Entta balay atto geetettidayssatinne entta nagaray kamettidayssati anjjettidayssata .
45004008	Goday iya nagaraa taybonna asi anjjettidayssa ” yaagees .
45004009	Yaatin , Dawitey odida anjjoy qaxxarettida asaa xalaalaseyye ? Woykko qaxxarettiboona asaase ? Nuuni , “ Geeshsha Maxaafay , ‘ Abrahamey Xoossaa ammanis ; Xoossay hessa iyaw xillotethi oothidi ekkis ’ yaagees ” gida .
45004010	Yaatin , hessi awude hanidee ? Abrahamey qaxxaretineyye ? Woykko qaxxarettonna de7ishinee ? Qaxxarettanaappe sinthe hanisippe attin guye gidenna .
45004011	Abrahamey qaxarettanaappe sinthe iya ammanoy iyaw xillotethi gididi taybettidayssa erisanaw , iya qaxxaroy malaata gidis . Hessa gisho , Abrahamey qaxxarettonna ammaneyssatasinne ammanon xilleyssata ubbaas aawa gidis .
45004012	I qaxxarettidayssataskka aawa . Abrahamey enttaw aawa gididay entti qaxxarettida gisho xalaalas gidonnashin I qaxxaretanaappe sinthe ammanida ammanuwa entti kaallida gishossa .
45004013	Abrahamesinne iya sheeshas , “ Alamiya ta hinttew immana ” yaagida ufayssay , Abrahamey ammanon xillida gishossafe attin higge naagidi polida gisho gidenna .
45004014	Higges kiitettidayssati Xoossay immana gida ufayssaa laataeyssata gidikko , asaa ammanoy maaddenna ; Xoossaa ufayssayka hada gidis .
45004015	Higge menthoy Xoossaa hanqo ehees , shin higgey baynnason higge menthoy baawa .
45004016	Hessa gisho , Xoossay immida ufayssay ammanon ekettees . Ha ufayssay Abrahame sheeshaa ubbaas Xoossaa aadho keehatethaa baggara imettidayssa qonccisees . Hessika higge naageyssata xalaalas gidonnashin Abrahameda ammanida ubbaassa . Abrahamey nu ubbaas aawa .
45004017	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Ta nena daro kawotethatas aawa oothas ” geetettidi Abrahame gisho xaafettis . Ha ufayssay Abrahames imettiday hayqqidayssatas de7o immeysinne oorathabaa oothiya Xoossay iya gideyssa I ammanida gishossa .
45004018	Xoossay Abrahames daro zerethi immanayssa caaqqis . Ufayssi oothanaw aykkoka dandda7ettona wode Abrahamey Xoossan ammanida gishonne ufayssi oothida gisho daro kawotethatas aawa gidis .
45004019	Abrahames xeetu laythi kumana hanikkoka , ba daaburida asatethaanne Saara na7a yelanaw dandda7onnayssa erishe ba ammanuwan daaburibeenna .
45004020	Gidoshin , I ba ammanuwan minnidi Xoossaas bonchcho immisppe attin Xoossay immida ufayssaa ammanonna ixxidi , sidhibeenna .
45004021	Abrahamey , Xoossay caaqqida caaquwa polanayssa ba kumetha wozanan ammanis .
45004022	Hessa gisho , Xoossay iya ammanuwa xillotethan taybis .
45004023	Shin , “ Iyaw xillotethan taybis ” giya qaalay Abrahame xalaalas xaafettibeenna .
45004024	He qaalay nu Godaa Yesuusa hayqoppe denthida Xoossaa ammaniyaa nuuskka nu ammanoy xillotethan taybettana mela xaafettis .
45004025	Xoossay iya nu nagara gisho hayqos aathidi immis ; I nuna xillisanaw hayqoppe denddis .
45005001	Hiza , nu ammanon xillida gisho nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara Xoossaara nuus sarotethi de7ees .
45005002	Nuuni iya baggara ha77i nu eqqida aadho keehatethaa giddo ammanon gelida . Hessa gisho , nu Xoossaa bonchchuwa shaaketanaw de7iya ufayssan ceeqettoos .
45005003	Hessa xalaala gidonnashin metoy dandda7a eheyssa nu eriya gisho nu metuwankka ceeqettoos .
45005004	Qassi dandda7ay genccaa , genccay ufayssi immeyssa nu eroos .
45005005	Nuus immida Geeshsha Ayyaana baggara Xoossay ba siiquwa nu wozanan gussida gisho he ufayssay nuna yeellayenna .
45005006	Nuuni buroo daaburanchchota gididi de7ishin , Xoossaa wodey gakkin , Kiristtoosi nagaranchchota gisho hayqqis .
45005007	Xillo asa gisho hayqqana asi demmanayssi daro meto , shin keeha asa gisho hayqqana asi ooni eri benttonna aggenna .
45005008	Shin nuuni buroo nagaranchcho gididi de7ishin , Kiristtoosi nu gisho hayqqis . Hessi Xoossay nuna ay mela siiqiyakko iya siiquwa bessees .
45005009	Hiza , nuuni Kiristtoosa suuthan xillidabaa gidikko , ubbaafe aathidi iya baggara Xoossaa hanquwafe attana .
45005010	Nuuni Xoossaara kase morkke , shin iya Na7aa hayquwan iyara sigettida . Hessafe aathidi , ha77i nuuni Xoossaara sigettidaappe guye iya na7aa de7uwa gaason nuuni attana .
45005011	Hessa xalaala gidonnashin ha77i nuna Xoossaara sigethida nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara nu Xoossan ceeqettoos .
45005012	Addaame baggara nagari ha alamiya gelis . He nagaraa baggara hayqoy yis . Asi ubbay nagara oothida gisho hayqoy asa zare ubbaa gakkis .
45005013	Higgey imettanaappe sinthe alamen nagari de7ees , shin higgey baynna wode nagari nagara gididi taybettenna .
45005014	Shin Addaameppe Muse gakkanaw hayqoy asa ubbaa haaris . Hari attoshin , Addaameda higges kiitettonna ixxidi , nagara oothiboonayssata bollaka hayqoy kawotis . Addaamey yaana Yesuusas leemiso .
45005015	Shin Xoossaa aadho keehatethay Addaame nagaraa mela gidenna . Issi asa nagara baggara daro asay hayqqis . Shin Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara Xoossaa aadho keehatethay asa ubbaas daridi imettis .
45005016	Addaame nagaraa giddoninne Xoossaa imotaa giddon daro dummatethi de7ees . Issi asa nagara gaason Xoossay iya bolla pirddis . Shin asay daro nagara oothinkka Xoossaa aadho keehatethay xillotethaa ehis .
45005017	Issi asa nagara gaason hayqoy asa ubbaa bolla kawotis . Shin Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara Xoossaa aadho keehatethaanne xillotetha imota ekkiya ubbay , xoono de7on de7oosona .
45005018	Hiza , issi asi nagara oothida gaason asa ubbaa bolla pirddi yidayssada issi asi xillo oothida gaason , Xoossay ase ubbaa xillisidi enttaw de7o immees .
45005019	Issi asi kiitettonna ixxida gaason , daro asay nagaranchcho gididayssada issi asa kiitetethan daro asay xillana .
45005020	Asay nagara wolqqaa erana mela higgey yis , shin nagara wolqqay darida wode Xoossaa aadho keehatethay aadhdhidi daris .
45005021	Nagari hayqo wolqqan kawotidayssa mela Xoossaa aadho keehatethay xillotethaa wolqqan kawotidi , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara nuna merinaa de7uwakko kaalethees .
45006001	Yaatin , nuuni woyganee ? Xoossaa aadho keehatethay darana mela nagaran minnidi de7ino ?
45006002	Akkay , nuuni nagaras hayqqidabaa gidikko , yaatin , nuuni hizappe waanidi nagaran daane ?
45006003	Nu ubbay Kiristtoos Yesuusara issifanaw xammaqettida wode iya hayquwan iyara issifanaw xammaqettidayssa erekketiyye ?
45006004	Nu xammaqettida wode Kiristtoosara hayqqidanne moogettida . Kiristtoosi Xoossaa Aawa bonchcho wolqqan hayqoppe denddidayssa mela nukka ooratha de7on daana .
45006005	Nu iya hayquwan iyara issino gidikko , hessadakka , iya dendduwan iyara issino gidana .
45006006	Nu hizappe nagaras aylle gidonna melanne nu nagaranchcho asatethaa wolqqay dhayana mela nu cima asatethay Kiristtoosara kaqettidayssa eroos .
45006007	Issi asi Kiristtoosan hayqqidabaa gidikko , I nagara wolqqafe la77a keyis .
45006008	Nuuni Kiristtoosara hayqqiko , iyara de7on daanayssa ammanoos .
45006009	Kiristtoosi hayqoppe denddida gisho zaari I hayqqonnayssanne hayqoy sinthafe iya haaronnayssa nu eroos .
45006010	I hayqqida wode nagaras issi toho wurssethi gakkanaw hayqqis , shin ha77i de7on Xoossaas de7ees .
45006011	Hessadakka , hintte nagaras hayqqidi , Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara Xoossaas de7on de7eyssa qoppite .
45006012	Hessa gisho , hinttee , hintte asatethaa amuwaas kiitettonna mela hayqqiya hintte asatethaa nagari haaroppo .
45006013	Qassi hintte asatethaa nagara oothanaw geellatetha miishe oothidi immofite . Shin hintte hayqoppe denddidi , de7on de7iya asada hintte asatethaa Xoossaas immite . Qassi hintte kumetha asatethaa xillo ooso oothanaw Xoossaas aathi immite .
45006014	Hintte Xoossaa aadho keehatethaa garssan de7eetappe attin higgefe garssan de7onna gisho nagari hinttena haaranaw bessenna .
45006015	Yaatin , nu woyganee ? Higgefe garssan gidonnashin Xoossaa aadho keehatethaa garssan de7iya gisho nagara oothaneeyye ? Akkay !
45006016	Hintte issi asas kiitettanaw hinttena aylle oothidi immiya wode he hintte kiitetteyssas aylle gideyssa ereeta . Hessadakka , hintte nagaras kiitettiko , hinttew hayqo ehiya nagaraas aylle gideeta . Woykko hintte Xoossas kiitettiko xillotethi ehiya Xoossaas aylle gideeta .
45006017	Kase hintte nagaras aylle , shin ha77i hintte ekkida tuma timirttiyas kumetha wozanappe kiitettida gisho Xoossaas galati gido .
45006018	Hintte nagara aylletethaa qashoppe bilettidi xillotetha aylle gidideta .
45006019	Hinttee hintte qofan daaburanchcho gidiya gisho taani ooddeskka geliya ogen odays . Kase hinttee , hintte asatethaa tunanne iitabaa oothanaw aylle oothidi immidayssa mela ha77i hintte asatethaa geeshshi gidana mela xillotetha aylle oothidi immite .
45006020	Hintte nagaras ayllettidi de7iya wode xillotethas haaretteketa .
45006021	Hinttena ha77i yeellayaa beni hintte iita oosuwappe ay maade demmidetii ? He oosota wurssethay hayqo .
45006022	Shin hintte nagara aylletethaa qashoppe bilettidi , Xoossaas aylle gidideta . Hessi hinttena geeshshi oothidi merinaa de7uwakko kaalethees .
45006023	Nagara gatey hayqo . Shin Xoossay , nu Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara immiya imotay merinaa de7o .
45007001	Ta ishato , taani odey higge eriya asatassa . Higgey issi asi paxa de7iya wode ubban iya haarees .
45007002	Leemisos , azina gelida maccasiya I azinay paxa de7iya wode higgen iyara qashettasu . Shin I azinay hayqqiko iyara iya caaqqida caaqoy iyo haarenna .
45007003	Hessa gisho , iya ba azinay paxa de7ishin , hara adde gelikko , iya laammidaaro geetettawusu . Shin I azinay hayqqiko , caaqoy iyo haaronna gisho iya hara azina gelikko , iya laammidaaro geetettuku .
45007004	Hessa gisho , ta ishato , hintte Kiristtoosa asatethaa baggara higge wolqqaas hayqqidi , Xoossaas ayfe ayfanaw hayqoppe denddida Kiristtoosas gidideta .
45007005	Nu asho amoy nuna haarin , nu de7iya wode higgey gujji nagara oothana mela nuna denthethees . Nu asatethaa giddon iita amotethi de7iya gisho nuuni hayqo ayfe ayfana mela oothis .
45007006	Shin ha77i nuuni nuna qachchida higgiyas hayqqida gisho nuuni higge qashoppe bilettida . Hessa gisho , Geeshsha Ayyaana ogen Xoossaas kiitettosippe attin xaafettida cima higgiyas kiitettoko .
45007007	Yaatin , nuuni woyganee ? Higgey ba huu7en nagaree ? Gidenna ! Shin higgey nagari aybeekko tana erisis . Higgey , “ Amottofa ” goonnako , amotethi aybeekko taani erikke .
45007008	Shin ta ubbabaa amottana mela nagari higge baggara tanan oge demmis . Higgey bayneekko nagari hayqqidayssa .
45007009	Kase higgey baynna wode ta paxa , shin higgey imettida wode nagari paxin ta qassi hayqqas .
45007010	Taani de7on daana mela Xoossay immida higgey taw hayqo ehis .
45007011	Nagari higge baggara tana cimmiya oge demmidi , wodhdhis .
45007012	Hessa gisho , higgey geeshshi ; iyan xaafettida kiitaykka geeshshi , xillonne lo77o .
45007013	Yaatin , lo77o gididabay ta bolla hayqo ehideyye ? Gidenna ! Shin nagari nagara gideyssi qonccana mela lo77oban maaddettidi taw hayqo ehis . Hessa gisho , nagara nagaratethay higge baggara aadhdhidi erettis .
45007014	Nuuni higgey ayyaanabaa gideyssa eroos . Shin taani nagaras bayzettida asho asi .
45007015	Taani oothiyabaa akeekikke ; taani dosiyabaa oothanayssa aggada ta ixxiyabaa oothays .
45007016	Taani ixxiyabaa oothiyabaa gidikko , higgey lo77o gideyssa ma77ays .
45007017	Hessa gidikko , he oosuwa tanan de7iya nagaray oothaysippe attin ta oothike .
45007018	Tanan , hessika ta ashuwan lo77obay baynnayssa erays . Lo77obaa oothiya amotethi tanan de7ees , shin lo77obaa oothanaw dandda7ikke .
45007019	Taani ixxiya iitabaa oothaysippe attin ta dosiya lo77obaa oothike .
45007020	Taani ixxiyabaa oothiyabaa gidikko , hessa tanan de7iya nagaray ootheesippe attin oothey tana gidikke .
45007021	Hiza , ta lo77obaa oothanaw dosishin , iitabaa oosoy woga gideyssa demmas .
45007022	Taani ta wozanan Xoossaa higgiyan ufayttays .
45007023	Shin ta asatethaa giddon de7iya ta qofaa higgiyara olettiya dumma higge be7ays . He higgey ta asatethaa giddon oothiya nagara higgiyas tana aylle oothidi immis .
45007024	Taani waanida yibbata asee ? Hayqos efiya ha asatethaafe tana ashshanay oonee ?
45007025	Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara tana ashshiya Xoossaas galati gido . Hiza , taani ta qofan Xoossaa higgiyas haarettays ; shin ta asatethan tana nagara oosisiya higgiyas haarettays .
45008001	Hessa gisho , Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7eyssati ha77i pirddettokona .
45008002	Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara nuus de7o immiya Geeshsha Ayyaana higgey , tana nagaranne hayqo higge aylletethaafe kessis .
45008003	Nu nagara asatethaa gaason , higgey daaburanchcho gidiya gisho nuna ashshanaw dandda7ibeenna . Xoossay ba na7aa nagaranchcho asa leemison nagaras yarshsho gidana mela kiittidi hessa oothis . Yaatidi , Xoossay Kiristtoosa ashuwa baggara nagara , nagaranchcho asa giddon pirddis .
45008004	Xoossay hessa oothiday , nu asho amoy koyeyssada gidonnashin Geeshsha Ayyaanay koyeyssada de7iya nu bolla higgiya xillo kiitay polettana melassa .
45008005	Bantta asho amuwaa kaallidi de7eyssati banttana ufayssiyabaa qoppoosona . Shin Geeshsha Ayyaana shenen de7eyssati Geeshsha Ayyaana ufayssiyabaa qoppoosona .
45008006	Nu qofay asho amos haarettiko hayqo ehees , shin ayyaana amos haarettiko de7onne sarotethi ehees .
45008007	Asho amos haarettiya asi Xoossaa higgiyas kiitettanaw koyonna gishonne kiitettanaw dandda7onna gisho Xoossaara morkke .
45008008	Bantta asho amuwaas haaretteyssati Xoossaa ufayssanaw dandda7okkona .
45008009	Shin Xoossaa Ayyaanay hinttenan de7ikkonne hinttena haarikko , hintte Ayyaana shenen de7eetappe attin hintte asho amuwaas haaretteketa . Kiristtoosa Ayyaanay baynna oonikka Kiristtoosabaa gidenna .
45008010	Shin Kiristtoosi hinttenan de7ikko , hintte asatethay nagara gaason hayqqidayssa . Shin hintte ayyaanay xillotethaa gaason de7on de7ees .
45008011	Shin Yesuusa hayqoppe denthida Xoossaa Ayyaanay hinttenan de7ikko , Kiristtoosa hayqoppe denthida Xoossay , hinttenan de7iya ba Geeshsha Ayyaanan hayqqiya hintte asatethaas de7o immana .
45008012	Hiza , ta ishato , nuuni nu asho amuwaa kaallidi daanaw bessenna .
45008013	Hinttee , hintte asho amuwaas de7ikko hayqqana , shin Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqqan nagara oosuwa wodhikko hintte de7on daana .
45008014	Xoossaa Ayyaanay kaalethiya ubbay Xoossaa nayta .
45008015	Nuuni , “ Abbaa , ta Aawaw ” yaagidi xeegiya , Xoossaa nayta oothiya Geeshsha Ayyaana ekkidaappe attin zaaridi yashshan daanaw aylle oothiya ayyaana ekkibookko .
45008016	Xoossaa Ayyaanay nu ayyaanara gididi nuuni Xoossaa nayta gideyssa markkattees .
45008017	Nuuni iya nayta gidikko Xoossaa anjjuwaa laattana ; Kiristtoosara wolla he anjjuwaa laattana . Qassi nuuni Kiristtoosara metuwa ekiko iyara wolla iya bonchchuwan shaakettana .
45008018	Nuuni ha77i waayettiya waaya , sinthafe nuus qonccana bonchchuwara gathi be7ikko , ginisanaw dandda7ettenna gada qoppays .
45008019	Medhetetha ubbay Xoossaa nayta qonccethaa daro laamotidi naagoosona .
45008020	Medhetetha ubbay hada gidis ; hessika , medhetethaa dooron gidonnashin ufayssan naagana mela oothida Xoossaa shenen hanis .
45008021	Medhetethay ba huu7en dhayo aylletethaafe wozettidi , Xoossaa naytara wolla bonchcho la77aa shaakettana .
45008022	Medhetethay issife hanno gakkanaw miixoy oykkida maccasada ooleninne un77an de7eyssa nu eroos .
45008023	Qassi hessa medhetethaa xalaala gidonnashin Geeshsha Ayyaanaa bayra imotada ekkida nuuni , nu huu7en nu asatethaas wozo gidida Xoossaa nayta gidana ufayssaa naagishe nu asatethan oolos .
45008024	Ha ufayssan nuuni attida . Shin nuuni ufayssi oothiyabay benttiya gidikko hessa ooni ufayssi oothi ?
45008025	Shin nu be7onnabaa demmana gidi ufayssan naagikko hessa dandda7an naagoos .
45008026	Hessada Geeshsha Ayyaanay nu daaburan maaddees . Nuuni Xoossaa waati woossanaw bessiyako erokko , shin Geeshsha Ayyaanay ba huu7en , asi odanaw dandda7ettona qaalan nuus gaannatees .
45008027	Qassi asa wozana eriya Xoossay Geeshsha Ayyaana qofay aybeekko erees . Geeshsha Ayyaanay Xoossaa sheniyada geeshshatas gaannatees .
45008028	Xoossaa siiqeyssatasinne iya sheniyada xeegettidayssatas Xoossay ubbaa lo77os ootheyssa eroos .
45008029	Xoossay koyrottidi eridayssati ba Na7aa daanana melanne na7aykka ammaneyssata giddon bayra gidana mela entta dummayidi wothis .
45008030	Xoossay koyrottidi dummayidayssata xeegis ; he xeegidayssata xillisis ; he xillisidayssata qassi bonchchis .
45008031	Yaatin , nu ha ubbaas woyganee ? Xoossay nu bagga gidikko nuura oone eqettanay ?
45008032	I hari attoshin , ba na7aas qadhettonashin , nu gisho aathi immis . Yaatin , ba na7aa nuus aathi immidayssi waanidi ubbabaa coo immenne ?
45008033	Xoossay enttana xillisida gisho I dooridayssata oone mootanay ?
45008034	Yaatin , entta bolla pirddanaw dandda7ey oonee ? Oonikka baawa . Hayqoppe denddidi Xoossaa ushachchan uttida , Kiristtoos Yesuusi , I nuus gaannatees .
45008035	Hiza , nuna Kiristtoosa siiquwappe shaakkanay oonee ? Waayeyye woykko metoyye woykko goodeyye woykko kosheyye woykko kallotetheyye woykko yashsheyye woykko oleyye ?
45008036	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Nuuni ne gisho gallasa kumethaa hayqqoos ; shukkas efiya dorssada taybettida ”
45008037	Shin nuuni , nuna siiqida Kiristtoosan ha ubbaa polo xoonos .
45008038	Hessa gisho , hayqo gidin de7o gidin kiitanchchota gidin haareyssata gidin ha77i de7eyssa gidin sinthafe yaanayssa gidin wolqqaamata gidin ,
45008039	salo wolqqaa gidin sa7a wolqqaa gidin ay medhetethi gidin nu Godaa , Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7iya Xoossaa siiquwappe nuna shaakkanaw dandda7onnayssa taani eras .
45009001	Taani Kiristtoosan tuma odays , worddotikke . Geeshsha Ayyaanay kaalethiya ta kahay taani worddotonnayssa taw markkattees .
45009002	Ta wozanan Isra7eeletas daro qadhettaysinne qamma gallas qoppays .
45009003	Taani , ta ishata gisho Kiristtoosappe shaakettada Xoossaa qanggethafe garssan de7idaakko dosaysishin .
45009004	Entti Isra7eeleta , Xoossay entta ba nayta oothis , ba bonchchuwa enttaw qonccisis . Enttara caaqqis ; higgiya enttaw immis . Entti Xoossaa goynnana tuma ogiya bessis ; Xoossay ufayssa qaala enttaw immis .
45009005	Entti yeletethan mayzata zare ; qassi Kiristtoosi ashon entta zare gididi yis . Ubbaafe bolla gidida Xoossay merinaw galatetto . Amin77i !
45009006	Gidoshin , Xoossay gelida qaalay polettonna attis guussu gidenna . Isra7eele asa ubbay Xoossaa asi gidokkona .
45009007	Qassi Abrahame zare ubbay Abrahame nayta gidokkona . Xoossay Abrahames , “ Ne zerethay Yisaaqa baggara xeegettana ” yaagis .
45009008	Hessa guussay ashon yelettida nayti ubbay Xoossaa nayta gidokkona . Shin tuma Isra7eele nayti Xoossay Abrahames gelida qaalada yelettida nayta .
45009009	Xoossay immana gidi gelida qaalay , “ Taani wontto laythi hannoode yaana ; Saarakka adde na7a yelana ” yaageyssa .
45009010	Hessa xalaala gidonnashin Irbbiqinne Yisaaqi yelida mentte adde naytabaa akeekite .
45009011	Entti yelettanaappe woykko iita woykko lo77o oothanaappe sinthe Xoossaa dooroy ooson gidonnashin xeessan gideyssa qonccisanaw ,
45009012	“ Bayray kaaluwas kiitettana ” yaagidi Goday Irbbiqas odis .
45009013	Hessika Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Yayqooba dosas , Eesawe ixxas ” geetettidi xaafettis .
45009014	Yaatin , nuuni woyganee ? Xoossay ase asappe shaakkiyye ? Gidenna .
45009015	Goday Musekko , “ Ta maaranaw koyidayssata maarana ; ta qadhettanaw koyidayssatas qadhettana ” yaagis .
45009016	Hiza , Xoossaa dooroy asa shenen woykko ooson gidonnashin iya maarotethaana .
45009017	Geeshsha Maxaafan , Gibxxe kawuwakko , “ Taani , ta wolqqaa nenan bessanawunne ta sunthay alame ubban erettana mela hessas nena kawothas ” geetettidi xaafettis .
45009018	Hiza , Xoossay maaranaw koyeyssa maarees ; wozanaa muumisanaw koyeyssa wozanaa muumisees .
45009019	Hinttefe issoy , “ Yaatin , Xoossay ase iita ooso gisho ays borii ? Xoossaa sheniya ixxas gaanay oonee ? ” yaagidi oychchanaw dandda7ees .
45009020	Shin ta ishaw , Xoossaara palamanaw neeni oonee ? Urqqafe medhettida miishey bana medhdhidayssa , “ Tana hayssada oothada ays medhdhadi ? ” gidi oychchanaw dandda7ii ?
45009021	Woykko urqqa medhdheyssi issi urqqafe issuwa bonchcho miishe , hankkuwa qassi tooshe miishe oothidi medhdhanaw maati baawe ?
45009022	Xoossay ba hanquwa bessanawunne ba wolqqaa erisanaw koyidi , pirddas giigida hanqo nayta daro genccan dandda7idaakko ne ay eray ?
45009023	Hessa I oothiday koyrottidi bonchchoos giigisida , ba doorida naytas ba bonchchuwa qonccisanassa .
45009024	Ayhude gidin , woykko Ayhude gidonna asa ubbay Xoossan doorettida .
45009025	Nabiya Hose7e maxaafan , “ Ta ase gidonnayssata , ‘ Ta ase ’ gada xeegana . Ta siiqaboonna deriya , ‘ Siiqetidayssata ’ gada xeegana .
45009026	Entti , ‘ Ta ase gidekketa ’ geetetti xeegettida bessan , ‘ De7o Xoossaa nayta ’ geetettidi xeegettana ” yaagees .
45009027	Nabiya Isayaasi Isra7eele asaabaa , “ Isra7eele asay abbaa gaxan de7iya shafiyada darikkoka , enttafe guutha asa xalaali attana .
45009028	Goday alamiya ubbaa bolla ellesidi polo pirddaa pirddana . ”
45009029	Qassika Isayaasi , “ Ubbaafe Wolqqaama Goday nuus guutha zerethi ashshonnabaa gidiyakko , nuuni Soodomenne Gamoora katamaada dhayanashin ”
45009030	Yaatin , nu woyganee ? Xillotethaa koyiboonna Ayhude gidonna asay ammanon xillotethi demmidosona .
45009031	Shin xillotethako gathiya higgey de7iya Isra7eele asay xillotethi demmibookkona .
45009032	Ays demmibookkonaa ? Entti xillotethaa ammanon gidonnashin ooson ekkanaw koyida gishossa . Yaaniya gisho , entti , “ Dhubbiya shuchchan ” dhubettidosona .
45009033	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Taani Xiyoonen dhubbi kunddisiya shuchchaa wothana . Iyan ammaniyaa oonikka yeellatenna ”
45010001	Ta ishato , ta kumetha wozanan ta amotteynne Xoossaa woossey Isra7eeley attana melassa .
45010002	Entti Xoossaas mishettosonashin , tuma eratethan mishettonnayssa ta markkattays .
45010003	Entti Xoossaa xillotethaa ogiya eronna ixxidi , bantta huu7e xillotethaa kaallidosonappe attin Xoossaa xillotethaa koyibookkona .
45010004	Asi ubbay ammanon xillana mela Kiristtoosi higgiya polis .
45010005	Asi higge naagidi ekkiya xillotethabaa Musey xaafishe , “ Higge naagiya oonikka he higgiya naagida mela de7ees ” yaagis .
45010006	Shin ammanon ekkiya xillotethabaa geetettiday hayssa : “ Ne wozanan , ‘ Ooni salo keyanee ? ’ yaagoppa ; hessi Kiristtoosa wodhisanaassa .
45010007	Woykko , ‘ Duge sa7a garssi wodhdhanay oonee ? ’ gooppa ; hessi Kiristtoosa duufoppe kessanaassa .
45010008	Shin yaagidi xaafettis : ‘ Xoossaa qaalay ne matana ; ne doonaninne ne wozanan de7ees ’ Nuuni hinttew odiya ammano qaalay hayssa .
45010009	“ Yesuusi Goda ” gada ne doonan markkatikonne Xoossay iya hayqoppe denthidayssa ne wozanan ammanikko , ne attana .
45010010	Asi ba wozanan ammanidi xillees ; ba doonan markkattidi attees .
45010011	Geeshsha Maxaafay , “ Iyan ammaniyaa oonikka yeellatenna ” yaagees .
45010012	Issi Xoossay ubbaa Goda gidiya gisho Ayhudeta giddoninne Ayhude gidonna asaa giddon dummatethi baawa . I bana xeegiya ubbaas daro keeha .
45010013	Geeshsha Maxaafay , “ Godaa sunthaa xeegiya oonikka attana ” yaagees .
45010014	Yaatin , entti ammanonna de7ishe waanidi iya xeeganaw dandda7onna ? Entti iyabaa si7onna de7ishe waattidi iya ammananaw dandda7onaa ? Qassi enttaw qaala odiya asi baynna de7ishin , waanidi si7anaw dandda7onaa ?
45010015	Kiitettida asi baynna de7ishin , qaalay waanidi odettanaw dandda7ii ? Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Ufayssa Wonggelaa odiya asaa tohoti waanidi lo77onaa ! ” yaagidi xaafettis .
45010016	Shin Isayaasi , “ Godaw , nu markkatethaa ooni ammanidee ? ” yaagidayssada , ubbay Wonggelaa ammanibookkona .
45010017	Hessa gisho , ammanoy sissafe yees ; sissi Kiristtoosa qaalappe yees .
45010018	Gidoshin , Isra7eele asay qaala si7ibookkona guusseyye ? Akkay si7idosona . Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Entta qaalay biitta ubban si7ettis , entta oday sa7aa gaxa gakkis ” yaagettis .
45010019	Shin Isra7eele asay eribookkona guusseyye ? Musey kase , “ Taani hinttena leqettida asan qiiroysana ; qassi eeya asan hinttena yiloyana ” yaagis .
45010020	Qassi Isayaasi , “ Tana koyiboonna asaas benttas ; tana oychchiboonna asaas qonccas ”
45010021	Shin Isayaasi Isra7eeletabaa odishe , “ Ubba wode kiitettonna asaasinne tana ixxiya asaas ta kushiya miccas ” yaagees .
45011001	Ane ta oychchays : yaatin , Xoossay ba asaa aggideyye ? Aggibeenna ! Taani ta huu7en Isra7eele ; Abrahame sheeshi ; Biniyame zare .
45011002	Xoossay koyro doorida ba asata yeggenna . Geeshsha Maxaafan , Eliyaasi Isra7eelata Xoossaa sinthan waati mootidaakko , hintte erekketii ?
45011003	Eliyaasi , “ Godaw , entti ne nabeta wodhidosona , ne yarshsho bessaaka laallidosona . Ta tarkka attas ; entti tanakka wodhanaw koyoosona ” yaagis .
45011004	Xoossay iyaw woygi zaaridee ? “ Ba7aale eeqas goynniboonna laappun mukulu asaa taw ashshas ” yaagis .
45011005	Hessadakka , ha wodiyan Xoossay ba aadho keehatethan doorida guutha Isra7eeleti de7oosona .
45011006	I entta dooriday ba aadho keehatethaanappe attin entta ooson gidenna . Dooroy ooson gidikko , iya aadho keehatethay tuma aadho keehatethi gidenna .
45011007	Yaatin , waanidee ? Isra7eeleti bantta koyabaa demmibookkona , shin Xoossay doorida guuthati demmidosona . Attidayssati bantta wozanaa muumisidosona .
45011008	Hessika , Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Entti bantta ayfiyaan be7onnaada bantta haythan si7onnaada , hanno gakkanaw enttaw Xoossay azalla ayyaana immis ” “ Entti miya gaytay entta xiheda oykko ; entta gufanthiya aafo gido ; entta iitatethay entta bolla gakko .
45011009	
45011010	Entti xeellonnaada entta ayfey goozetto ; ubba wode meton entti kuunidi de7o ” yaagis .
45011011	Yaatin , Ayhudeti zaari denddonna mela kunddidonayye ? Gidenna ! Entta kunddethay Ayhude gidonna asay attana mela gaaso gidis . Hessika Ayhudeti entta bolla qanaatanaada oothis .
45011012	Ayhudeta nagaray alamiyas daro anjjo ehis ; qassi entta kunddethay Ayhude gidonna asaas daro anjjo gidis . Yaatin , doorettida Ayhudeti kumethi attiyaa wode anjjoy ay mela daranddeshsha !
45011013	Taani , ha77i hinttew Ayhude gidonna asaas odays . Ayhude gidonna asaas hawaare gidada ootheyssan taani daro ceeqettays .
45011014	Ta hessa oothiday taw ashon zare gidida Isra7eeleta qiiroyada enttafe guuthata ashshanaassa .
45011015	Xoossay entta yeggida wode ha alamey Xoossaara sigettis . Xoossay entta shiishi ekkiya wode hayqqida asi hayqoppe denddida mela gidees .
45011016	Koyro menthida baso uythay Xoossaas yarshshettidi geeshshi gidikko , muume uythayka geeshshi . Mithaas xaphoy geeshshi gidikko , tasheykka geeshshi .
45011017	Gaden tokkida shamaho tashe gidida Ayhudeti karettin , hintte bazzon dolida shamaho tashe gidida Ayhude gidonnayssati entta bessan dhanthettidi entta anjjuwaanne duretethaa shaakettideta .
45011018	Hiza , hintte tasheda karetti wodhdhida Ayhudeta bolla otorttofite . Hintte otorttiyabaa gidikko , xaphoy hinttena tookkesippe attin hintte xaphuwa tookkonayssa akeekite .
45011019	Neeni , “ He tasheti karettiday , ta entta bessan dhanthettana melassa ” gaanaw dandda7aasa .
45011020	Hessi tuma . Entti ammaniboonna gisho karettidosona . Neeni ammanida gisho he bessan eqqadasa . Neeni yayyanaw besseesppe attin otoranaw bessenna .
45011021	Xoossay medhon tashe gidida Ayhudetas qadhettonna ixxiko hinttewuka qadhettenna .
45011022	Hiza , Xoossay ay mela keehekonne ay mela yashshiyako be7a . I yashshey kiitettonayssata , qassi I keehey iya ammanidi minnidi eqqidayssatassa . Minnidi eqqonna ixxiko hintteka karettana .
45011023	Ayhudeti ammanikko , kase entti de7iya bessaa simmana . Xoossay entta zaaridi , wothanaw dandda7ees .
45011024	Hinttena bazzon de7iya shamaho gidida Ayhude gidonnayssata qanxidi , gaden tookettida shamahuwa bolla hinttena tokkiko , medhon gade shamaho gidida Ayhudeta bantta koyro bessan zaari tokkanaw waanidi dandda7ettennee ?
45011025	Ta ishato , hintte hinttena eranchcho gidi ceeqettofite . Ta hinttew odiya issi xuuri de7ees . Hessika Isra7eeletappe baggay si7onna ixxiday wurssethi gakkanaw gidonnashin attanaw de7iya Ayhude gidonna asay kumethi Xoossako yaana gakkanaassa .
45011026	Hessadakka , Isra7eele asa ubbay attana . Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Nuna ashsheyssi Xiyooneppe yaana ; Yayqooba zerethaafe iita ubbaa diggana .
