45011027	Taani entta nagara atto giya wode enttara caaqqana caaqoy hayssa ”
45011028	Ayhudeti Wonggelaa ekkonna ixxidi , hintte gisho Xoossaara morkke gididosona . Gidoshin , ha77ika entti doorettidayssata , Xoossay entta aawata gisho entta dosees .
45011029	Xoossay ba imuwaninne ba xeessan qiirottenna .
45011030	Hintte Ayhude gidonnayssati kase Xoossaas kiitettibeekketa . Shin ha77i Ayhudeti kiitettonna ixxin , hintte Xoossaa maarotethaa ekkideta .
45011031	Hessadakka , hintte ekkida maarotethaa Ayhudeti ekkana mela ha77i Xoossaas kiitettonna ixxidosona .
45011032	Xoossay asa ubbaa ba maarotethaa bessanaw koyidi , asi ubbay kiitettonna ixxana mela oothis .
45011033	Xoossaa duretethaa , cinccatethaanne eratethaa akeekidi odanay oonee ? Iya pirdday pilggettena , iya ogey erettenna .
45011034	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Godaa qofaa erey oonee ? Iya zoranaw dandda7ey oonee ?
45011035	Xoossaas tal77eynne tal77iya zaaridi ekkey oonee ? ”
45011036	Ubbaa I medhdhis ; ubbay iyan de7ees ; ubbay iya bonchchossa . Xoossaas merinaw bonchchoy gido . Amin77i .
45012001	Hiza , ta ishato , hinttee , hintte asatethaa Xoossaa ufayssiya , de7onne geeshsha yarshsho oothidi , immana mela taani hinttena Xoossaa maarotethan woossays . Xoossaa hintte goynnanaw bessiya tuma ogey hessa .
45012002	Lo77o , ufaysseyssanne polo gidida Xoossaa sheniya hintte shaakki eranaw hintte qofan laamettiteppe attin ha alamiya daanopite .
45012003	Xoossay hintte issuwas issuwas immida ammanuwa mela wozanaama asada qoppite . Qoppanaw besseyssafe aathidi hinttena dummayidi , otoron qoppofite gada taw imettida aadho keehatethan hinttew odays .
45012004	Nu issi asatethaa giddon dumma dumma kifileti de7oosona ; he dumma dumma kifiletas dumma dumma oosoy de7ees .
45012005	Hessada , nuuni daro asi gidikkoka Kiristtoosan issi asatethi gidida . Nuuni issi asatethi gididi dumma dumma kifileti issoy issuwara oykettida .
45012006	Nuus imettida aadho keehatethan dumma dumma imotati de7oosona . Nu imoy tinbbit odo gidikko , nuus de7iya ammanuwa mela odanaw bessees .
45012007	Nu imoy harata maade gidikko , he oosuwan minnanaw bessees ; tamaarsso gidikko , he tamaarssuwan minnanaw bessees .
45012008	Nu imoy harata minthetho gidikko , minnidi minthethanaw bessees . Nu imoy nuus de7iyabaappe haratas imo gidikko , wozanappe immanaw bessees . Nu imoy ayso gidikko , minnidi aysanaw bessees . Nu imoy haratas keeho gidikko , ufayssan keehanaw bessees .
45012009	Hintte siiqoy qoodheppe qommon gidanaw bessenna . Iitabaa ixxite ; lo77obaa minthidi oykkite .
45012010	Issoy issuwara ishada siiqetite ; issoy issuwa bonchchite .
45012011	Azallofite ; hintte ayyaanan minnidi Godaas oothite .
45012012	Xoossay immida ufayssan ufayttite ; metuwa dandda7ite ; ubba wode Xoossaa woossite .
45012013	Ammaniya geeshshata koshshiyaban maaddite ; imathata mokkite .
45012014	Hinttena goodeyssata anjjite ; anjjiteppe attin baaddofite .
45012015	Ufayttessatara ufayttite ; yeekkeyssatara yeekkite .
45012016	Issoy issuwara issi qofan de7ite . Otoro qofaa aggidi , hinttena kawushshidi , kawushsha ooso oothite . Hintte hinttena cincca gidi qoppofite .
45012017	Oonikka hinttew iitabaa oothiko , he uraas iita zaaroppite . Asa ubbaa sinthan nashisiya lo77o ooso oothite .
45012018	Asa ubbaara saron daanaw hinttew dandda7ettiya ubbaa oothite .
45012019	Ta ishato , hinttee , hintte huu7en asas halo keyoppite . Xoossay halo keyana mela iyaw aggaagite . Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Taani halo keyana ; taani kushe zaarana ”
45012020	Shin Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Ne morkkey koshattiko muza ; I saamotiko ushsha . Neeni hessa oothiko iya huu7en yeella tama bonqqo qolaasa ”
45012021	Iitaa lo77on xoonappe attin iitaan xoonettofa .
45013001	Xoossaa shene gidonnashin maati imettonna gishonne ha77i de7iya shuumatikka Xoossaa shenen shuumettida gisho asi ubbay deriya ayseyssatas kiitettanaw bessees .
45013002	Hessa gisho , maatara de7eyssatas kiitettonna ixxiya oonikka Xoossaa kiitaa ixxees . Kiitettonna ixxiya oonikka ba bolla pirddaa ehees .
45013003	Ayseyssati iita ootheyssatappe attin lo77o ootheyssata yashshokona . Ayseyssatas yayyonna agganaw koyay ? Yaakko lo77o ootha ; entti nena galatana .
45013004	Entti new lo77obaa oothanaw shuumettida Xoossaa aylle . Shin neeni iitabaa oothiko , entti iitabaa oothidayssa seeriya gisho iyaw yayya . Entti iita ootheyssata seeridi , Xoossaa hanquwa qonccisiya Xoossaa aylle .
45013005	Hessa gisho , Xoossaa hanquwa xalaalas gidonnashin hintte kahay markkattiya gisho deriya ayseyssatas kiitettanaw bessees .
45013006	Hintte giira giireykka hessassa . Deriya ayseyssati he oosuwa oothey , entti Xoossaa aylleta gidida gishossa .
45013007	Issuwas issuwas besseyssa immite . Giira giiranaw besseyssas giirite ; qaraxa qanxanaw besseyssas qaraxa qanxite ; yayyanaw besseyssas yayyite ; bonchchoy besseyssa bonchchite .
45013008	Issoy issuwara siiqetite . Siiqo acoppe attin hintte bolla hara acoy dooppo . Ase siiqiya oonikka higgey geyssa polis .
45013009	“ Laammofa ; wodhoppa ; kaysotoppa ; amottofa ” giya kiitaynne hara kiita ubbay , “ Ase ne huu7eda dosa ” giya kiitan qashettis .
45013010	Ase siiqiya oonikka iya bolla iitabaa oothenna . Hessa gisho , ase siiqeyssi higge kiitaa polis .
45013011	Dhiskkofe hintte barkkiya wodey ha77i gideyssa akeekidi hessa oothite . Nu attana wodey koyro nu ammanida wodiyappe ha77i nuukko matis .
45013012	Dhuma wodey aadhdhanaw hanees ; wonttay matis . Hiza , nuuni dhuma ooso aggidi poo7o ola miishe oykkoos .
45013013	Ane gallas poo7on de7iya asada maaran de7oos . Mathoninne laymatethara gahettiya dumma dumma tuna oosotan , palamaninne qanaaten gidoppo .
45013014	Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa kandduwa ma77ite ; hintte nagaranchcho asatethay ba amuwaa polana mela iyaw qoppofite .
45014001	Ammanon daaburida oonakka shiishi ekkiteppe attin iya qofaa bolla pirddofite .
45014002	Leemisos , ammanon minnida issi asi ay kathika maanaw dandda7ees . Shin ammanon daaburiya asi atakiltte xalaala mees .
45014003	Ubbabaa miya asi moonna uraa kadhoppo . Ubbabaa moonna asi miya uraa bolla pirddofo . Xoossay ubbaa miya uraa shiishi ekkis .
45014004	Hara asa aylle bolla pirddey neeni oonee ? I daaburin woykko minnin ba Godaassa . Goday iya essanaw dandda7iya gisho I minnidi eqqana .
45014005	Qassi “ Issi gallasay hara gallasappe aadhdhees ” yaagidi qoppiya asi de7ees . Haray qassi , “ Gallasati ubbay issi mela ” gidi qoppees . Shin issoy issoy ba qofaa akeekidi qachcho .
45014006	Issi gallasaa hara gallasatappe aathidi bonchchiya oonikka Godaa bonchchos gidi oothees . Ubba kathi miya asi Godaa bonchchos gidi mees . I miya he kathaa gisho Xoossaa galatees . Ubba kathi moonna asi Godaa bonchchos moonna aggees ; qassi moonna agon Xoossaa galatees .
45014007	Nuuppe oonikka baw deenna ; qassi nu giddofe oonikka baw hayqqenna .
45014008	Nu de7on de7ikko Godaas de7oos ; qassi hayqqikokka Godaas hayqqoos . Hiza , nu de7on de7in woykko hayqqin Godaassa .
45014009	Kiristtoosi hayqqidi hayqoppe denddiday , de7on de7eyssatasinne hayqqidayssatas Goda gidanaassa .
45014010	Yaatin , neeni ne ishaa bolla ays pirdday ? Woykko neeni ne ishaa ays kadhay ? Nuuni ubbay Xoossaa pirdda araata sinthan eqqana .
45014011	Geeshsha Maxaafan Goday , “ Taani de7on de7ays ; asa ubbay ta sinthan gulbbatana ; taani Xoosse gideyssa markkattana ”
45014012	Hiza , nu oothidabaas nu huu7en huu7en Xoossaa sinthan shiiqidi zaaro immana .
45014013	Hessa gisho , nuuni issoy issuwa bolla pirddeyssa aggoos . Shin hintte ishaa dhubsidi woykko qaxxidi nagaran gelssiyaba oothonnaada naagettite .
45014014	Godaa Yesuusa ammaniyaa asada , ba huu7en tuna gidida kathi baynnayssa taani geeshshada erays . Shin issi asi issibaa tuna gidi qoppiko hessi iyaw tuna gidees .
45014015	Ne miya katha gisho ne ishaa dhubbiyabaa gidikko , Kiristtoosan de7iya ne ishaa siiqakka . Kiristtoosi iya gisho hayqqida uraa ne miya kathan iya ayyaana de7uwa dhayssofa .
45014016	Hiza , hinttew de7iya la77atethaa harati borana mela oothofite .
45014017	Xoossa kawotethay Geeshsha Ayyaanan benttiya xillotethi , sarotethinne tuma ufayssife attin muussabaanne ushshabaa gidenna .
45014018	Hessada Kiristtoosas oothiya asi Xoossaa ufayssees ; asankka anjjettees .
45014019	Hessa gisho , ane nuuni sarotethi benttiya ogiyanne issuwa issuwa ammanon minthiya ogiya koyoos .
45014020	Katha gisho gada Xoossaa oosuwa dhaysssofa . Ubba kathi meetetees , shin hara asi nagaran dhubsiya kathi muussi iita .
45014021	Ne ishay dhubettonna mela asho moonna woykko ushshu uyonna woykko ne ishaa dhubbiya harabaa oothonna agoy lo77o .
45014022	Hiza , ha ne ammanuwa ne giddoninne ne Xoossaa giddon naaga . Likke gidi qoppidabaa oothiya wode iya kahay mootonna uray anjjettidayssa .
45014023	Shin sidhishe miya uraas iya muussay ammanon gidonna gisho pirddettees . Ammanoy baynna oosettida ooso ubbay nagara .
45015001	Nuuni ammanon minnidayssati daaburanchchota toohuwa tookkanaw bessees . Nuuni nuna ufayssanaw bessenna .
45015002	Nuuni nu ishaa ammanon minthanaw iya maaddanawunne ufayssanaw bessees .
45015003	Kiristtoosi bana ufayssibeenna . Shin Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Asay nena cayida cashshay tana gakkis ” geetetti xaafettidayssada hanis .
45015004	Geeshsha Maxaafay immiya genccaaninne minthethuwan nu ufayssaa ekkana mela Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida ubbay nuna tamaarssanaw xaafettis .
45015005	Genccaanne minotethi immiya Goday hintte Kiristtoos Yesuusa kaalliya wode issifetethi hinttew immo .
45015006	Hessika , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Aawa , Xoossaa , issi wozananinne issi qaalan hintte bonchchana melassa .
45015007	Kiristtoosi hinttena ekkidayssada Xoossaa bonchchos issoy issuwa ekkite .
45015008	Xoossay beni aawatas immida ufayssay polettana melanne iya tumatethay erettana mela Kiristtoosi Ayhudeta aylle gididi yidayssa ta hinttew odays .
45015009	Kiristtoosi Ayhudeta aylle gidida hara gaasoy qassi Ayhude gidonna asati Xoossaa iya maarotethaa gisho galatana melassa . Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Ta nena Ayhude gidonna asaa giddon galatana ; ne sunthaa sabbana ”
45015010	Qassi , “ Ayhude gidonna asaw , Xoossaa deriyara ufayttite ”
45015011	Qassi zaaridi , “ Ayhude gidonna asaw , Godaa galatite ; kawotetha ubbay iya sabbite ”
45015012	Hessada Isayaasi , “ Isseyye zareppe yelettiya issoy yaana ; I kawotetha ubbaa haarana . Entti bantta ufayssaa iya bolla wothana ”
45015013	Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqqan hintte diccana mela ufayssi immiya Xoossay , hintte ammanuwa gaason hinttew ufayssinne sarotethi kumethi immo .
45015014	Ta ishato , hinttenan lo77otethinne eratethi kumidayssa qassi issoy issuwa zoranaw dandda7eyssa ta geeshshada erays .
45015015	Taani hinttena issi issibaa gujja akeekisanaw koyada yayyonna ha dabddaabbiya hinttew xaafas .
45015016	Taani Kiristtoos Yesuusa aylle gidada , Ayhude gidonna asaas kahineda oothada , Wonggelaa odana mela Xoossay taw aadho keehatethaa immis . Ayhude gidonna asay Geeshsha Ayyaanan geeyidi , Xoossaa ufayssiya yarshsho gidana mela Xoossay hessa oothis .
45015017	Taani Kiristtoos Yesuusan gidada Xoossaas oothiya oosuwan ceeqettays .
45015018	Ayhude gidonna asay Xoossaas kiitettanaada , Kiristtoosi ta qaalanne ta oosuwa baggara oothida oosuwappe attin hari ta ceeqettiyabay baawa .
45015019	Xoossay hessa malaataninne Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqqan waati oothidaakko ta hinttew odana . Taani Yerusalaameppe doomada , Iliwarqoone gakkanaw Kiristtoosa Wonggelaa sabbakas .
45015020	Taani hara asi baasida bessan keexanaw koyikke . Kiristtoosa sunthay xeegettiboonna bessan Wonggelaa odanaw amottays .
45015021	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Iyabay odettiboonna asati iya be7ana ; iyabaa si7iboonna asati akeekana ”
45015022	Hessa gaason , taani hintteko yaanaw dandda7abiikke .
45015023	Shin taani ha77i ha heeran ta oosuwa onggida gishonne daro laythafe doomada hinttena be7anaw laamotida gisho
45015024	taani Isppeene bashe hinttena be7anaw qoppas . Qassi guutha wode hinttera ufayttidaappe guye Isppeene biya wode hintte ta ogiyas tana maaddana mela koyays .
45015025	Shin ha77i taani Xoossaa asata maaddanaw Yerusalaame bays .
45015026	Maqedooniyanne Akkayan de7iya Xoossaa asati , Yerusalaamen de7iya manqota miishen maaddanaw koyida gishossa .
45015027	Entti manqota maaddanayssi enttaw attonnabaa gidida gisho bantta huu7en hessa oothanaw qofa qachchidosona . Ayhudeti Ayhude gidonnayssatara ayyaana anjjuwa shaakettiko , entti qassi banttaw de7iyaban Ayhudeta maaddanaw bessees .
45015028	Hessa gisho , taani he shiiqida miishiya enttaw immidaappe guye Isppeene bashe hintte matara aadhdhana .
45015029	Taani hintteko biya wode Kiristtoosa anjjuwaan kumada baanayssa erays .
45015030	Ta ishato , taw Xoossaa woossishe ta baaxiyan taara eqqana mela Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosaninne Geeshsha Ayyaana siiquwan hinttena woossays .
45015031	Xoossay tana Yihudan de7iya ammanonna asatappe ashshanaadanne Yerusalaamen ta oothana oosoy Xoossaa asata matan ekettana mela taw woossite .
45015032	Qassi Xoossi giikko , taani hintteko bada ufayssan hinttera shemppana mela taw woossite .
45015033	Sarotethaa Xoossay hintte ubbaara gido . Amin77i .
45016001	Kinkkiriya kataman de7iya woosa keethan oothiya nu michchiya Feeba lo77o maccas gideyssa hintte erana mela koyays .
45016002	Hintte iyo ammaniyaa asati Godaa sunthan mokkanaw bessiya ammaniyaa asatappe issuwada mokkite . Iya hinttefe koyabaa ubbaa iyo maaddite . Iya ba huu7en daro asaa maaddasu ; qassi tana ta huu7enkka daro maaddasu .
45016003	Kiristtoos Yesuusa oosuwa taara issife oothiya Phirisqilanne Aqiila saro giite .
45016004	Entti ta gisho bantta shemppuwa aathi immidosona . Ta xalaala gidonnashin Ayhude gidonna asaa woosa keetha ubbay entta galatees .
45016005	Entta son shiiqiya ammaniyaa asaa saro giite . Iisiya biittan Kiristtoosa koyro ammanida , ta dosiya Ephanexoosas ta sarothuwa odite .
45016006	Hintte gisho ooson daro daaburida Mayraamo saro giite .
45016007	Taara qasho keethan aathida ta Ayhude laggeta Anddironiqoosanne Yuuniyasa saro giite . Entti Yesuusa hawaareta giddon erettidayssata . Qassi entti Kiristtoosa taappe sinthe ammanidosona .
45016008	Godan ammaniyaa ta siiqo laggiya , Amphiliyaxoosa saro giite .
45016009	Kiristtoosa oosuwa nuura issife oothiya Urbbanoosenne ta dosiya Isttakuusa saro giite .
45016010	Kiristtoosan ammanthiya aylliya Apheliisas ta sarothuwa odite . Arsxobuloosa soo asaas ta sarothuwa odite .
45016011	Ta Ayhude laggiya Heroodiyoona saro giite . Narssisanne iya soo asaappe Kiristtoosa ammanidayssata saro giite .
45016012	Godaa oosuwan daaburiya Tirufaynanne Tirufoosa saro giite . Qassi Godaas daro daaburada oothiya , ta dosiya Phersiiso saro giite .
45016013	Godaa oosuwan daro erettida Rufoosasinne tana ba na7ada be7iya iya aayes ta sarothuwa odite .
45016014	Asinikirttoosas , Filegoonas , Hermmeesas , Patirobaasasinne enttara de7iya ammaniyaa ishata ubbaas ta sarothuwa odite .
45016015	Filoloogusa , Yuuliya , Neeriya , iya michchiw , Olumppoosanne enttara de7iya ammaniyaa asa ubbaa saro giite .
45016016	Geeshsha yeeretethi yeerettishe , issoy issuwa sarothite . Kiristtoosa woosa keetha ubbay hinttena saro yaagosona .
45016017	Ta ishato , hintte tamaarida timirttiya ixxidi , hintte giddon shaaketethinne meto medhdhiya asatappe naagettite . Enttafe haakkite .
45016018	Hessa mela asati banttaw oothosonappe attin nu Godaa Kiristtoosas oothokona . Bantta mal77iya doonaninne saphothiya qaalan aykko eronna asaa wozanaa balethoosona .
45016019	Wonggelaas hintte kiitettidayssa asa ubbay si7idayssi tana ufayssees . Shin hintte lo77obaa erana melanne iitabaappe haakkana mela ta koyays .
45016020	Sarotethaa Xoossay Xalahiya hintte tohuwappe garssan gaaci yeggana . Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethay hinttera gido .
45016021	Taara oothiya Ximotiyoosi hinttena saro yaagees . Hessadakka , ta dabboti Luuqiyosi , Yaasoninne Sosphaxiroosi hinttena saro yaagosona .
45016022	Ha dabddaabbiya Phawuloosas xaafida taani , Xarxiyoosi , hinttena Godaa sunthan saro yaagays .
45016023	Tana mokkidaynne woosa keetha ubbay iya son shiiqiya Gaayoosi , hinttena saro yaagees . Katamaa miishiya oykkiya Erasxoosinne nu ishaa Qarxoosi hinttena saro yaagosona . [
45016024	Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethay hintte ubbaara gido . Amin77i . ]
45016025	Xoossas galati gido . Taani , Yesuus Kiristtoosabaa odiya Wonggelaa qaalaninne daro wodeppe qosettidi gam77ida tumatethan , Xoossay hinttena ammanon minthidi essanaw dandda7ees .
45016026	Shin ha77i he tumay qonccis . Kawotetha ubbay ammanidi kiitettana mela merinaa Xoossaa kiitan nabeti he tumabaa xaafidosona .
45016027	Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara cinccatethi iya xalaalas de7iya , issi Xoossaas merinaw bonchchoy gido . Amin77i .
46001001	Xoossaa sheniyan Yesuus Kiristtoosa hawaare gidanaw xeegettida Phawuloosinne , nu ishaa Sostenisi ,
46001002	Qoronttoosan de7iya Xoossaa woosa keethaas , Yesuus Kiristtoosan geeyidayssatasinne geeshshi gidana mela xeegettidayssatas ; qassi enttasinne nuus Goda gidiya nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunthaa ubba bessan xeegiya ubbaas ;
46001003	Xoossay , nu Aawaynne Goday Yesuus Kiristtoosi hinttew aadho keehatethaanne sarotethaa immo .
46001004	Xoossay Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara hinttew immida aadho keehatethaa gisho taani ubba wode Xoossaa galatays .
46001005	Iyan odaninne eratetha ubban hintte durettideta .
46001006	Taani Kiristtoosabaa markkattidayssi tuma gideyssa hessi qonccisees .
46001007	Hessa gisho , hintte nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa yuussaa naagishe de7ishin , ay ayyaana imoykka hinttew paccenna .
46001008	Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosi simmiya wode hintte borettonnayssata gidana mela I wurssethi gakkanaw hinttena miinthana .
46001009	Ba Na7aa , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosara issifetethay daana mela hinttena xeegida Xoossay ammanettidayssa .
46001010	Ta ishato , hintte gidon shaaketethi doonnaada hintte issi wozananinne issi qofan isso gididi , daana mela nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunthan ta hinttena woossays .
46001011	Ta ishato , Qelo7e soo asay hintte giddon ooshshi de7eyssa taw odidosona .
46001012	Hinttefe issoti issoti , “ Taani Phawuloosassa ; taani Aphiloosassa ; taani Phexiroosassa ; taani Kiristtoosassa ” yaageeta .
46001013	Kiristtoosi shaakettideyye ? Hintte gisho masqaliya bolla kaqettiday Phawulooseyye ? Woykko hintte Phawuloosa sunthan xammaqettidetiyye ?
46001014	Taani Qarisphoosinne Gaayoosi attin hinttefe oonakka xammaqaboonna gisho Xoossaa galatays .
46001015	Hessa gisho , oonikka hinttena ta sunthan xammaqettideta gaanaw dandda7enna . [
46001016	Qassi Isxifaanose soo asaakka ta xammaqidayssa akeekays , shin haraa oona xammaqidaakko hassayikke . ]
46001017	Kiristtoosi tana kiittiday Wonggelaa odana melassafe attin xammaqana mela gidenna . Kiristtoosi masqaliya bolla hayqqidayssi hada gidonna mela taani asa cinccatetha qaalan odikke .
46001018	Kiristtoosi masqaliya bolla hayqqidayssa odiya qaalay dhayeyssatas eeyatethi , shin nuus atteyssatas Xoossaa wolqqaa .
46001019	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Taani cinccata cinccatethaa dhayssana ; akeekanchchota akeekaa balethana ”
46001020	Yaatin , cincci awun de7ii ? Higge asttamaarey awun de7ii ? Woykko ha sa7aa eranchchoy awun de7ii ? Xoossay ha sa7aa cinccatethaa eeyatethi oothibeennee ?
46001021	Ha sa7aa asay bantta cinccatethan Xoossaa eronna mela ba cinccatethan diggidi , eeyatethan taybettiya , nuuni odiya qaalan ammaneyssata ashshanaw Xoossaa shene gidis .
46001022	Ayhudeti malaata be7anaw koyoosona ; qassi Giriketi cinccatethi koyoosona .
46001023	Shin nuuni masqaliya bolla kaqettida Kiristtoosa sabbakoos . Hessi Ayhudatas dhube ; qassi Giriketas eeyatethi .
46001024	Shin Xoossay xeegidayssatas , Ayhude gidin , Girike gidin Kiristtoosi Xoossaa wolqqaanne iya cinccatethaa .
46001025	Xoossaa eeyatethay asa cinccatethafe aadhdhees ; qassi Xoossaa daaburay asa minotethafe minnees .
46001026	Hiza , ta ishato , Xoossay hinttena xeegiya wode hintte ay mela aseekko qoppite . Asa qofan hintte giddon cinccati , wolqqaamatinne dhoqqa zareti dookkona .
46001027	Shin Xoossay cinccata yeellayanaw alamen de7iya eeyata dooris ; qassi minota yeellayanaw alamen de7iya daaburanchchota dooris .
46001028	Xoossay ha alamiyan gita geetettidabaa dhayssanaw , ha sa7aa kawushshabaa , kadhettidabaanne pathonnabaa dooris .
46001029	Oonikka Xoossaa sinthan ceeqqettonna mela hessa oothis .
46001030	Shin Xoossay hinttew Kiristtoos Yesuusara issifetethi daana mela oothis . I nuus Xoossaafe cinccatethi , xillotethi , geeshshatethinne atotethi gidis .
46001031	Hessa gisho , Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Ceeqettiya oonikka Godan ceeqqo ” yaagees .
46002001	Ta ishato , taani koyro Xoossaa qaala hinttew odashe yida wode doona bilatethaninne cinccatethan yabiikke .
46002002	Taani hinttera de7iya wode masqaliya bolla kaqettida Yesuus Kiristtoosappe attin harabaa eranaw koyikke gada ta qofa qachchas .
46002003	Ta hinttera de7iya wode daaburan , yashshaninne daro kokkorssan de7as .
46002004	Ta kiitaynne ta timirttey doona bilatethaninne cinccatethan gidonnashin Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqqaa qonccisethaana .
46002005	Hessika , hintte ammanoy Xoossaa wolqqaanappe attin asa cinccatethan zempponna melassa .
46002006	Ayyaana de7on diccidayssatas nuuni cinccatethaa qaalan odoos . Shin he cinccatethay , ha sa7aa cinccatethaa woykko dhayanaw de7iya ha sa7aa haareyssata cinccatethaa gidenna .
46002007	Shin nuuni odiya cinccetethay , daro wodeppe sinthe Xoossay nu bonchchuwas giigisidayssanne geemmidi de7iya xuura cinccatethaa .
46002008	Ha sa7aa haareyssatappe oonikka ha cinccatethaa eribeenna . Entti eridabaa gidiyakko , bonchcho Godaa masqaliya bolla kaqqokona .
46002009	Shin Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Ayfey be7iboonnabaa , haythi si7iboonnabaa , wozani qoppiboonabaa , Xoossay bana siiqeyssatas giigisis ” yaagees .
46002010	Xoossay ba xuuraa ba Ayyaana baggara nuus qonccisis . Geeshsha Ayyaanay hari attoshin geemmida Xoossaa xuura ubbaa pilggees .
46002011	Asan de7iya asa ayyaanaappe attin asabaa oonikka erenna . Hessadakka , Xoossabaa Xoossaa Ayyaanaappe attin oonikka erenna .
46002012	Xoossay nuus coo immidabaa nu erana mela Xoossaa Ayyaanaa ekkidappe attin ha sa7aa ayyaana ekkibookko .
46002013	Nuuni ayyaanabaa , ayyaana asatas asa cinccatethan gidonnashin Xoossaa Ayyaanay immiya cinccatethan tamaarssos .
46002014	Shin Geeshsha Ayyaanay baynna asi Xoossaa Ayyaana imotata ekkenna . Hessi iyaw eeyatethi ; ubbay Geeshsha Ayyaanan pilggettiya gisho I eranaw dandda7enna .
46002015	Shin Geeshsha Ayyaani de7iya asi ubbabaa pilggees , shin iya oonikka pilggenna .
46002016	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Godaa wozanaa erey oonee ? Iya zoranaw dandda7ey oonee ? ”
46003001	Ta ishato , hintte Kiristtoosan buroo yooganne ammanonna asaatho de7iya gisho taani ayyaanabaa hinttew odanaw dandda7abiikke .
46003002	Hintte mino kathi maanaw dandda7iboonna gisho taani hinttena maathi paahas ; ha77ika dandda7ibeekketa .
46003003	Ha77ika hintte ammanonna asada de7eeta . Hintte giddon de7iya qanaateynne palamay hintte ammanonna asada de7eyssa erisenne ? Hintte ammanonna asada haneeta .
46003004	Hinttefe issoy , “ Taani Phawuloosassa ” haray qassi , “ Taani Aphiloosassa ” giikko , ammanonna asa mela gidekketii ?
46003005	Yaatin , Aphiloosi oonee ? Phawuloosi oonee ? Nuuni hinttena ammanthida Xoossaa oosaanchchota . Xoossay issuwas issuwas immida oosuwa mela oothiya oosanchchota gidokkonaayye ?
46003006	Ta tokkas ; Aphiloosi haathe ushshis , shin dichchey Xoossaa .
46003007	Hessa gisho , dichchida Xoossaafe attin tokkeyka haathe ushsheyka aykkoka gidenna .
46003008	Tokkeynne haathe ushshey woli mela , shin issoy issoy ba oosuwa mela Xoossay immiya woytuwa ekkana .
46003009	Nuuni issife Xoossaas oothiya iya oosanchchota gidiya gisho hintte Xoossaa shooqa ; Xoossaa keethi .
46003010	Xoossay taw immida aadho keehatethaa mela hiillanchcho anaaxeda baasuwa yeggas . Hara uray iya bolla keexees . Shin iya bolla keexiya oonikka waattidi keexiyako , baw naagetto .
46003011	Issi toho yegettida baasuwappe hara baaso yegganaw oonikka dandda7enna . He baasoykka Yesuus Kiristtoosa .
46003012	Shin ha baasuwa bolla oonikka worqqan woykko biran gidin , al77o shuchchan woykko mithan gidin , maatan woykko maqan keexiko ,
46003013	issi issi asi he baasuwa bolla aybin keexidaakko pirdda gallas taman paacettidi qonccana .
46003014	Oonikka he baasuwa bolla keexida keethay taman xuugettonna attiko , ba woytuwa ekkana .
46003015	Shin oodde oosoykka taman xuugetiko , he uraas woytoy baawa . Gidoshin , I ba huu7en tamappe kessi ekkida asada attana .
46003016	Hintte Xoossaa keethi gideyssanne Xoossaa Ayyaanay hinttenan de7eyssa erekketii ?
46003017	Oonikka Xoossaa keethi laallikko , Xoossaykka iya laallana . Xoossaa keethay geeshshi ; he keethayka hinttena .
46003018	Oonikka bana cimmofo . Ha sa7aa cinccatethan bana cincca oothidi ekkiya oonikka Xoossaa sinthan cincca gidanaw eeya gido .
46003019	Ha sa7aa cinccatethay Xoossaa sinthan eeyatethi . Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Xoossay cinccata entta gene qofan oykkees ” yaagees .
46003020	Qassi , “ Cinccata qofay maaddonnabaa gideyssa Goday erees ” yaagees .
46003021	Hessa gisho , ubbay hinttessa gidiya gisho oonikka asan ceeqettofo .
46003022	Phawuloosi , Aphiloosinne Phexiroosi , ha alamey , de7oy , hayqoy , ha77i de7ey , sinthafe yaanayssi , ubbay hinttessa .
46003023	Hintte Kiristtoosassa ; Kiristtoosi Xoossassa .
46004001	Asay nuna Kiristtoosa aylledanne Xoossaa xuuraa qonccisanaw hadari imettida asada oothidi qoppo .
46004002	He hadaraa ekkida asati bantta Godaas ammanettidayssata gidanaw bessees .
46004003	Shin hintte woykko haray tana pirddiko , taw aykkoka gidenna . Haray atto , takka ta bolla pirddike .
46004004	Ta kahay geeshshi , shin hessi ta polo xillo gideyssa bessenna . Ta bolla pirddanay Godaa xalaala .
46004005	Hessa gisho , wodey gakkonna , Goday yoonna oodde bollaka pirddofite . I dhuman geemmidabaa poo7o kessenna ; asa wozanan qosettida qofa qonccisana . He wode issoy issoy Xoossaafe galataa ekkana .
46004006	Ta ishato , hintte gisho Aphiloosanne tana leemiso oothada hinttew odas . Hessa ta oothiday , “ Xaafettidayssafe aadhdhofa ” yaagiya zoriya hintte nuuppe tamaarana melassa . Hessa gisho , oonikka issuwa sabbidi hankkuwa kadhanaw bessenna .
46004007	Ne haratappe aybin aadhdhay ? Neeni ekkaboonnabay aybi de7ii ? Yaatin , neeni ekkidabaa hara asappe ekkida gidikko , ekkiboonna asada ays ceeqettay ?
46004008	Ha77i hintte kallideta . Ha77i hintte durettideta . Nuuni baynna hintte xalaala kawotideta . Hintte tuma kawotidabaa gidiyakko , nukka hinttera kawotanashin .
46004009	Xoossay nuna hawaareta , hayqo pirddettida asada asa ubbaafe nuna guye aathida taw daanees . Nuuni ha alamiyas , kiitanchchotasinne asaas kaassaba gidida .
46004010	Nuuni Kiristtoosa gisho eeya gidida , shin hintte Kiristtoosan cinccata gidideta . Nuuni daaburanchcho , shin hintte mino gidideta . Hintte bonchchettideta , shin nuuni tooshettida .
46004011	Ha77i gakkanaw nu koshattoos , saamottoos , kallottoos , wadhettoos ; daana soo dhayidi toylattoos .
46004012	Nuuni nu kushen oothi aqoos . Nuna asi baaddiya wode anjjoos ; nuna gooddiya wode dandda7os .
46004013	Nu bolla iitabaa odettiya wode lo77o qaala zaaroos . Nu ha77i gakkanaw ha alamiya pitonne wora yegettiya buure gidida .
46004014	Taani hessa xaafiday , ta siiqiya naytada , hinttena zoranaw xaafasippe attin yeellayanaw gidenna .
46004015	Kiristtoosan hinttena dichchiya tayboppe bolla gidida kaaletheyssati de7ikkoka , hinttew issi aawu de7ees . Ta hinttena Kiristtoos Yesuusa Wonggelaan yelas .
46004016	Hiza , hintte tana leemiso oothidi kaallana mela hinttena woossays .
46004017	Hessa gisho , ammanettida , ta siiqiya , Godan ta na7aa , Ximotiyoosa hintteko kiittas . I dumma dumma bessan de7iya woosa keethan ta tamaarssida , Kiristtoosa Yesuusan de7iya ta ogiya hinttena hassayisana .
46004018	Taani hintteko yoonnabaa daanin , otoriya issi issi asati de7oosona .
46004019	Shin Goday giikko , mata wode taani hintteko baana . He wode otoranchchota odaa xalaala gidonnashin entta wolqqaaka erana .
46004020	Xoossaa kawotethay oda gidonnashin wolqqa .
46004021	Taani hintteko xam77ara booyye woykko siiqoranne ashkke ayyaanara bo ? Awussa dooreti ?
46005001	Hintte giddon laymatethi de7eyssi zigirettees . Hessa mela laymatethi hari attoshin , ammanonna asaykka oothokona . Hintte giddon ba aawa machcheera tunida asi de7ees .
46005002	Hessan hintte qiirottanawunne yeellatanaw bessenne , shin otorttideta . Hessa mela borssobaa oothida uraa hintte giddofe kessanaw bessennee ?
46005003	Taani ashon hinttera doona ixxikokka ayyaanan ta hinttera de7ays . Taani hinttera de7iya asada hanada hessa mela oosuwa oothida uraa bolla pirddas .
46005004	Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunthan hintte shiiqiya wode taani ayyaanan hinttera daana . Hessan Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa wolqqay hinttera gidana .
46005005	He uraa nagara ashoy dhayidi , iya ayyaanay Godaa Yesuusa pirdda gallasan attana mela I Xalahes aadhdhi imetto .
46005006	Hintte ceeqoy lo77o gidenna . Guutha irshshoy munuqa ubbaa dentheyssa erekketiyye ?
46005007	Hintte ha77i irshshoy baynna munuqa gidana mela , nagara irshshuwaa hinttefe kessite . Nuus Paasika dorssaa gidida Kiristtoosi yarshshettis .
46005008	Hessa gisho , geneynne iitatethi de7iya irshshuwaara gidonnashin tumatethinne geeshshatethi de7iya uythara nu baaliya bonchchoos .
46005009	Ta kase xaafida dabddaabbiyan hintte laymatiya asaara gahettonna mela hinttew odas .
46005010	Hessa guussay ha alamiyan de7iya laymateyssatara woykko uuzetara woykko kaysotara woykko eeqa goynneyssatara polo gahettofite guussu gidenna . Hessa gidikko , ha alamiyappe hintte keyanaw bessees shin attis .
46005011	Shin ammanays yaagishe laymateyssatara woykko uuzetara woykko eeqa goynneyssatara woykko cayeyssatara woykko mathotteyssatara woykko kaysotara gahettofite gada hinttew odays . Hessa mela asara hari attoshin , kathika mooppite .
46005012	Woosa keethafe karera de7eyssata bolla pirddanaw tana aybe gathey ? Woosa keethan de7eyssata bolla hintte pirddeketiyye ?
46005013	Shin karera de7eyssata bolla Xoossay pirddana . He iitabaa oothiya uraa hintte giddofe kessite .
46006001	Hintte giddofe issoy issuwara mootoy de7ikko , hessa ammaniyaa asaa sinthan pirddettanayssa aggidi ammanonna asa sinthan pirddettanaw waanidi bii ?
46006002	Geeshshati alamiya bolla pirddanayssa hintte erekketii ? Yaatin , hintte alamiya bolla pirddiyabaa gidikko , hayssa mela guuthabaa pirddanaw waanidi dandda7ekketii ?
46006003	Nuuni kiitanchchota bolla pirddanayssa erekketii ? Yaatin , ha sa7a duussabaa bolla pirddanayssi hinttena waanidi xoonii ?
46006004	Yaatin , hessa mela metoy hintte giddon medhettiko , woosa keetha ayfen kadhettida asaa sinthan pirddettanaw waati efeetii ?
46006005	Taani hinttena yeellayanaw hessa gays . Hintte giddon kaccettida asata sigethanaw dandda7iya akeeka asi baawe ?
46006006	Yaatin , issi ammaneyssi hankko ammaneyssa pirdda keethan ammanonna asaa sinthan mootanaw bessii ?
46006007	Hiza , hintte issoy issuwa mootiyabaa gidikko hessi hintte kunddethaa bessees . Hessafe hintte qohettikonne cimettiko keehenne ?
46006008	Shin hintte woli giddon ammaneyssati issoy issuwa qoheetanne cimmeeta .
46006009	Geellati Xoossaa kawotethaa laattonayssa hintte erekketii ? Hinttena cimmofite ; laymateyssati woykko eeqa goynneyssati woykko qayxeyssati woykko addera addera gahetteyssati ,
46006010	woykko kaysoti woykko uuzeti woykko mathotteyssati woykko cayeyssati woykko bonqeyssati Xoossaa kawotethaa laattokona .
46006011	Hinttefe issi issi asati kase hessa mela . Shin hintte ha77i Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunthaaninne Xoossaa Ayyaanan meecettideta ; geeyideta ; xillideta .
46006012	Hintte , “ Nu koyidabaa oothanaw dandda7os ” yaageta . Shin ubbay hinttena maaddenna . Taani koyidabaa ubbaa oothanaw dandda7ays , shin aybikka tana haarenna .
46006013	Hintte , “ Kathi ulossa ; uloykka kathassa ” yaageta . Shin Xoossay uluwaka kathaaka dhayssanayssa ta hinttew odays . Nu asatethay Godaassafe attin laymatethassa gidenna . Godaykka nu asatethaassa .
46006014	Xoossay Godaa hayqoppe denthidayssada , nunakka hayqoppe ba wolqqan denthana .
46006015	Hintte asatethay Kiristtoosa asatethaafe baggaa gideyssa erekketii ? Yaatin , taani Kiristtoosa asatethaafe baggaa efada laymatetha asatethi gidana mela ootho ? Hanenna !
46006016	Laymatiya uray i gahettiya aseera issi asatethi gideyssa erekketii ? Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Entti nam77ay issi asatethi gidana ” geetettidi xaafettis .
46006017	Shin Godaara issifiya uray iyara ayyaanan isso gidees .
46006018	Laymatethafe haakkite . Issi uray oothiya hara nagaray iya asatethaafe karera oosettees , shin laymatiya asi ba asatethaa bolla nagara oothees .
46006019	Hintte asatethay Xoossay hinttew immida hinttenan de7iya Geeshsha Ayyaana keethi gideyssa erekketii ? Hintte hinttebaa gidekketa .
46006020	Xoossay hinttena gaten shammis . Hessa gisho , hintte asatethan Xoossaa bonchchite .
46007001	Hintte taw xaafida dabddaabbiyas zaaroy hayssa . Issi asi machchonna de7ikko lo77o .
46007002	Shin laymatethafe attanaw issi issi addey machcho ekko ; qassi issi issi maccasas azini de7o .
46007003	Azinay ba machchees , qassi machchiya ba azinaas bessiyabaa kuntho .
46007004	Machchees ba asatethaa bolla iw maati baawa , shin maatay I azinaassa . Hessadakka , azinaas iya asatethaa bolla maati baawa , shin maatay machcheessa .
46007005	Hintte woosan guutha wode gam77anaw zoretethan gidonna ixxiko , issoy issuwa diggofite . Hessa gaason hinttenatethaa haaranaw xoonettin , Xalahey hinttena paacconna mela issife de7ite .
46007006	Shin taani hinttena zoranaw hayssa gaysippe attin kiita gidenna .
46007007	Asi ubbay taada machcho ekkonna de7iyakko dosays , shin Xoossay issuwas issuwas immida dumma imoti de7ees . Issuwas hayssa mela hankkuwas hessa mela imoti de7ees .
46007008	Machcho ekkiboonnayssatasinne azina geliboonnayssatas qassi am77etas taani gey , taada ekkonna woykko gelonna de7ite gada zorays .
46007009	Shin amon xuugetteyssafe ekkeysinne geleyssi lo77o gidiya gisho entti banttana haaranaw dandda7onna ixxiko , ekkonne gelo .
46007010	Taani ekkidayssatanne gelidayssata hayssada gada zorays ; tana gidikke Goday kiittees ; machchiya ba azinaappe shaakettofo .
46007011	Shin shaakettiko hara azina gelonna barkka de7o woykko ba azinaara giigo . Azinay ba machchiw billofo .
46007012	Shin haratas Godaa gidonnashin taani hayssada gays . Ammanonna machcha de7iya ammaniyaa azini de7ikko , iya machchiya iyara issife daanaw koykko iyo billofo .
46007013	Qassi ammanonna azini de7iya ammaniyaa machchaa de7ikko , I azinay iira issife daanaw koykko iyappe bilettofo .
46007014	Ammanonna azinay ba ammaniyaa machche baggara geeyees ; qassi ammanonna machchiya ba ammaniyaa azinaa baggara geeyawusu . Hessi baynneeko , hintte nayti tuna gidoosona , shin ha77i entti geeshshi .
46007015	Shin ammanonna azinay woykko machchiya billanaw koykko billo . Ammaniya machchiya woykko azinay hessa melaban qashettokona . Xoossay nuna sarotethan daana mela xeegis .
46007016	Ammaniya machchete , neeni ammanonna ne azinaa ashshaneekko ay eray ? Woykko ammaniyaa azinaw , neeni ammanonna ne machchiw ashshaneekko ay eray ?
46007017	Issi issi asi Goday iyaw immida imotaadanne Xoossay iya xeegidayssada de7o . Woosa keetha ubban taani tamaarssida wogay hayssa .
46007018	Oonikka qaxxarettidi ammanidabaa gidikko , qaxxarettonaada hanoppo . Qaxxarettonna ammanida oonikka de7ikko , qaxxarettanaw koyoppo .
46007019	Xoossa kiitaa polanaw besseesppe attin qaxxarettin qaxxarettonna aggin aykkoka maaddenna .
46007020	Issi issi asi Xoossay bana xeegiya wode de7eyssada de7o .
46007021	Xoossay nena xeegiya wode neeni aylle ? Aykkoy baawa hessas un77ettofa . Shin neeni aylletethafe la77a keyanaw dandda7ikko yeda keya .
46007022	Aylle gidi de7ishe Godan xeegettida asi Godan aylletethaafe la77a keyis . Hessadakka , aylle gidonna de7ishe , Godan xeegettida asi Kiristtoosa aylle .
46007023	Xoossay hinttena gaten shammida gisho asa aylle gidoppite .
46007024	Ta ishato , hintte issoy issoy xeegettiya wode de7iya de7uwan Xoossaara issife de7ite .
46007025	Geela7otabaa Goday tana kiittidabay baawa . Shin Goday taw immida maarotethaa mela taani hinttena zorays .
46007026	Hiza , ha77i metuwa gisho ekkonna woykko gelonna duussi taw lo77o daanees .
46007027	Ne machcho ekkidabaa gidikko , billanaw koyoppa . Ne machcho ekkaboonnabaa gidikko , ekkanaw koyoppa .
46007028	Shin ne machcho ekkiko nagari baawa . Hessada geela7iyakka azina gelikko nagari baawa . Shin ekkiya geliya asaas ha sa7an daro metoy de7iya gisho hintte hessafe attana mela ta koyays .
46007029	Ta ishato , ta gey hessa ; wodey wuris . Hizappe sinthe machcha de7eyssi machcho ekkonayssada de7o .
46007030	Yeekkeyssati yeekkonaada , ufaytteyssati ufayttonaada , shammeyssati aykkoyka baynnaada banttana taybo .
46007031	Ha sa7aa shaluwan maadetteyssati maadettiboonaada hano . Ha alamiya malay aadhdhana .
46007032	Hintte hirggi baynna daana mela ta dosays . Machcho ekkiboonnayssi Godaa ufayssanaw koyaa gisho Godabaa qoppees .
46007033	Shin machcho ekkidayssi ba machchiw ufayssanaw koyaa gisho ha sa7abaa qoppees .
46007034	Iya qofay nam77an shaakettees . Azina gelaboonna geela7iya ba asatethaaninne ba shemppuwan geeyada Godaa ufayssanaw koyaa gisho Godaaba qoppawusu . Shin azinaa gelidaara ba azinaa ufayssanaw koyaa gisho sa7abaa qoppawusu .
46007035	Taani hessa hinttew odey , hintte maadettana melassafe attin hinttena un77ethanaw gidenna . Shin hintte qofay shaakettonna maaran de7idi Godaa ufayssiyabaa hintte oothana mela taani odays .
46007036	Oonikka ba oychchida geela7ees gelo wodey aadhdhis gidi iyo agganaw qoppiko , hessi qassi iw lo77o gidonnayssi iyaw si7ettiko , ba koyidayssa ootho ; entti eketto , geletto ; hessan nagari baawa .
46007037	Shin issi asi un77ethiyabay dhayin , ba wozanan minnidi , bana haaridi , ba oychchida geela7iw ekkonna agganaw koykko loythis .
46007038	Hessa gisho , geela7iw ekkiya uray loythis ; qassi ekkonna uray daro loythis .
46007039	Machchiya ba azinay paxa de7iya wode ubban iyara qashettasu . Shin I azinay hayqqiko , ba dosida azina gelanaw dandda7awusu . Gidoshin , iya geliya addey ammaniyaa asi gidanaw bessees .
46007040	Ta qofan gidikko , iya gelonna de7ikko ufayssan daana . Qassi taw , ta bolla Xoossaa Ayyaani de7iya daanees .
46008001	Eeqas yarshshettiya kathabaa gidikko nu ubbay eroos . Eratethi otorssees , shin siiqoy dichchees .
46008002	Oonikka bana erays gidi qoppiko , I buroo eranaw besseyssa eribeenna .
46008003	Shin oonikka Xoossaa siiqikko I Xoossaa matan erettidayssa .
46008004	Hessa gisho , eeqas yarshshettida kathi muussabaa gidikko ha alamiyan Godi issi Xoossaafe attin hari baynna gisho eeqi pathonnabaa gideyssa nuuni eroos .
46008005	Xoosse gidonnashin saloninne sa7an xoosse geetetti xeegettiya daro xoossatinne godati de7ikkoka ,
46008006	ubbabaa medhdhida , nu iyabaa gidida , issi Xoossay , Aaway , nuus de7ees . Ubbay iya baggara medhettida , nukka iya baggara de7o demmida issi Goday , Yesuus Kiristtoosi nuus de7ees .
46008007	Shin hayssa erey ubbaa gidenna . Issi issi asay eeqa goynnora meezetida gisho kathi miya wode eeqas yarshshettidabaa oothidi ekkoosona . He wode entta kahay daabura gidiya gisho tunees .
46008008	Shin kathi nuna Xoossaara dabboyenna . Nu monna aggidi aykkoka qohettoko ; qassi midi dumma go7ettoko .
46008009	Shin hintte koyidabaa maanaw la77atethi hinttew de7ikkoka hessi ammanon minnonnayssata dhubbonna mela naagettite .
46008010	Neeni nena eranchcho gada eeqas yarshshettida kathi maanaw eeqa keethan uttidashin , ammanon minnonayssi nena be7ikko hessi iya eeqas yarshshettida kathi maana mela denthetheneyye ?
46008011	Hiza , ne eratethaa gaason Kiristtoosi iya gisho hayqqida , ammanon minnonna ne ishay , dhays .
46008012	Hessada oothidi , ammanon minnonna hintte ishata qohishenne entta kaha madunxisishe Kiristtoosa qoheeta .
46008013	Hessa gisho , kathi ta ishaa dhubbiyabaa gidikko , I dhubettonna mela asho ubbarakka miikke .
46009001	Taani yeda de7iya asi gidikkinaa ? Ta hawaare gidikkinaa ? Taani nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa be7abiikkina ? Hintte Godan ta daabura ayfe gidekketii ?
46009002	Hintte Godaaba gidiya gisho ta haratas hawaare gidonna ixxikokka , hinttew hawaare gideyssas hintte markka .
46009003	Tana hawaare gidenna geyssatas ta immiya zaaroy hayssa .
46009004	Nu hinttefe maanawunne uyanaw tuma nuus maati baawe ?
46009005	Hankko hawaaretada , Godaa ishatadanne Phexiroosada , ammaniyaa nu machcheta ekki hamuttanaw nuus maati baawe ?
46009006	Woykko oothidi maanaw bessey taaranne Barnnabaasa xalaalee ?
46009007	Ba miishen wotaaddaretathi oothey oonee ? Woykko woyne tokkidi , iyaappe ayfe moonnay oonee ? Woykko wude heemmishe , he wudiyappe maathi uyonnay oonee ?
46009008	Taani hessa asa qofatho gaynaayye ? Higgey hessa geenne ?
46009009	Muse Higgiyan , “ Wudumman kathaa yedhdhiya booraa doona qachchofa ” geetettidi xaafettis . Yaatin Xoossay hessa booras qoppidi gidee ?
46009010	Xoossay hessa giday nuus qoppidi gidennee ? Ee nu gishossa . Goyeysika , kathaa geeshsheysika bana gakkeyssa ekkana gidi ufayssan oothanaw bessees geetettidi tuma nu gisho xaafettis .
46009011	Nuuni hintte giddon ayyaana zerethi zerida gidikko ashos koshshiyabaa nu hinttefe ekkiko , hessi gitabaye ?
46009012	Harati hessa hinttefe ekkanaw enttaw maati de7ikko , nuus enttayssafe aadhdhiya maati de7ees . Shin nuuni Kiristtoosa Wonggelaas dhube gidonna mela , ubbaa genccoosippe attin he maatan go7ettibookko .
46009013	Xoossa keethan oothiya asati bantta kathaa Xoossa Keethafe ekkeyssa erekketii ? Qassi yarshsho bessan ootheyssati yarshshuwafe ekkeyssa erekketii ?
46009014	Hessadakka , Wonggelaa markkatteyssati duussas koshshiyabaa Wonggelaappe ekkana mela Goday kiittis .
46009015	Shin taani ha maata ubban aykkoka go7ettabiikke . Taani hayssa xaafiday ta maata bonchchisanaw koyada gidenna . Oonikka ta ceequwa hada oothanaappe hayqoy taw lo77o .
46009016	Taani Wonggelaa odey kiitettida gishossafe attin tana ceeqisiyabaa gidenna . Wonggelaa odonna ixxiko , tana ayye .
46009017	Taani Wonggelaa dosada sabbakikko taw woytoy de7ees . Shin taani Wonggelaa dosonna kiitettada sabbakiyabaa gidikko hessa Xoossay taw hadara immis .
46009018	Yaatin , ta woytoy aybee ? Taani Wonggelaa sabbakiya wode ta maatan go7ettonna Wonggelaa coo sabbakeyssi taw woyto .
46009019	Taani ooddeskka aylle gidikke , shin darota ashshanaw ubbaas aylle gidas .
46009020	Taani Ayhudeta ashshanaw enttara entta gidas . Ta huu7en higgefe garssan de7ikke , shin higgefe garssan de7eyssata ashshanaw higgefe garssan de7iya asi gidas .
46009021	Xoossaa higgiyafe kare keyonna , Kiristtoosa higgiyas kiitettashe , higgey baynnayssata ashshanaw higgey baynna asada gidas .
46009022	Taani daaburanchchota ashshanaw daaburanchcho gidas . Taani guuthata ashshanaw ubbaara ubbaa hanas .
46009023	Taani Wonggelaa anjjuwaa shaakettanaw , ha ubbaa Wonggelaa gisho hanas .
46009024	Wothan gaaddetiya ubbay woxxees , shin issuwa xalaali woyto ekkeyssa erekketii ? Hessada hintteka woytuwa ekkanaw woxxite .
46009025	Gaaddetiya asa ubbay ubbaban banttana haarees . Entti hessa daaburey dhayaa kallachcha woyto ekkanaassa . Shin nuuni daaburey merinaa kallachcha woytuwa ekkanaassa .
46009026	Hessa gisho , taani qofi baynna asada woxxike . Carkko yimppiya asada coo kushe yeddike .
46009027	Shin taani haratas Wonggelaa sabbakidaappe guye ta huu7en yeggettida asi gidonna mela ta asatethaa wolqqan haarada taw kiitettana mela oothays .
46010001	Ta ishato , taani hintte hayssa akeekana mela koyays . Nu aawati ubbay shaarappe garssara hamuttidosona ; ubbay abbaa pinnidosona .
46010002	Entti Musera issifanaw shaaraninne abban xammaqettidosna .
46010003	Entti ubbay issi ayyaana kathaa midosona .
46010004	Qassi ubbay issi ayyaana ushshaa uyidosona . Entti banttana kaalliya ayyaana zaallafe pulttida ushshaa uyidosona ; he zaallayka Kiristtoosa .
46010005	Shin Xoossay enttafe darotan ufayttiboonna gisho entta ahay bazzo biittan wodhdhidi attis .
46010006	Entti iitabaa amottidayssada , nukka iitabaa amottonna mela hessi ubbay nuus leemiso gidis .
46010007	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Asay maanawunne uyanaw uttidosona ; qassi yexxanaw denddidosona ” geetettidayssada enttafe issoti issoti eeqa goynnidayssa mela hintte eeqa goynnofite .
46010008	Enttafe issoti issoti laymatidayssada nu laymatanaw bessenna . Hessa gaason enttafe issi gallas laatamanne heedzu mukulu asi hayqqis .
46010009	Enttafe issoti issoti Godaa paaccidi shooshan dukettidi hayqqidayssada nu Godaa paaccanaw bessenna .
46010010	Enttafe issoti issoti zuuzummidi hayqo ehiya kiitanchchuwan dhayidayssada hintteka zuuzummofite .
46010011	Ha entta bolla gakkida ubbay nu naagettana mela nuus leemiso gidis . Qassi wode wurssethaa bolla de7iya nuus timirtte gidana mela ha ubbay xaafettis .
46010012	Hessa gisho , ta eqqas giya oonikka kunddonna mela bana naago .
46010013	Ase ubbaa gakkiya paaceppe attin dumma paacey hinttena gakkibeenna . Hintte wolqqay dandda7eyssafe aadhdhiya paacen hintte paacettonna mela aathi immonna Xoossay ammanettidayssa . Hinttena paacey gakkiya wode he paaciya I hinttena dandda7isana . Qassi he paaciyappe hintte keyana ogiya I giigisana .
46010014	Hiza , ta al77o ishato , eeqa goynnofe haakkite .
46010015	Hintte wozanaama asi gidida gisho ta hayssa odays . Taani geyssi tuma gideyssa hinttee hintte huu7en pirddite .
46010016	Nuuni Xoossaa galatidi shaakettiya anjjo xuu7ay Kiristtoosa suuthaara issifetethi de7eyssa gidenneyye ? Qassi nuuni bathiya uythay Kiristtoosa ashuwara issifetethi de7eyssa gidenneyye ?
46010017	Nuuni daro gidikkoka uythay issino , nu he issi uythaa shaakettiya gisho issi asatethi .
46010018	Ane Isra7eele asay oothidayssa akeekite . Yarshshettida yarshshuwa meyssatas yarshsho bessaara issifetethi baaweyye ?
46010019	Taani ay gaanaw koyada gaynaa ? Eeqas yarshshettida kathay woykko eeqay pathiyabaa gidenna .
46010020	Entti yarshshey Xoossaas gidonnashin tuna ayyaanatassa . Hessa gisho , hinttew tuna ayyaanatara issifetethi daana mela koyikke .
46010021	Hintte Godaa xuu7appe uyishe , qassi tuna ayyaanata xuu7appe uyanaw dandda7ekketa . Godaa gaytappe mishe qassi tuna ayyaanata gaytappe maanaw dandda7ekketa .
46010022	Nu hessa oothidi Godaa yiloynoo ? Nu iyappe aadhdhiya minoyye ?
46010023	Hintte , “ Ubbabaa oothonna mela diggiyabay baawa ” geeta , shin ubbay maaddenna . Hintte , “ Ubbabaa oothonna mela diggiyabay baawa ” geeta , shin ubbabay dichchenna .
46010024	Issi issi asi , hara asi maaddiyabaa qoppanaw bessesippe attin bana maaddiyabaa xalaala qoppofo .
46010025	Hintte kahaa sidhen gelssiya oysha denthonna giyan bayzettiya ashuwa coo miite .
46010026	Ays giikko , “ Sa7inne sa7an de7iya ubbay Godaassa . ”
46010027	Issi ammanonna asi hinttena imatanaw koyidi xeegikko baanaw koykko biite . Hintte kahan medhettiya oyshan sidhonna hintte sinthe aathiyabaa ubbaa miite .
46010028	Shin issi asi , “ Hayssi eeqas yarshshettidabaa ” giikko , he hinttew odida addiya gishonne hintte kaha gisho he kathaa mooppite .
46010029	Taani , kaha gisho gey he hinttew odida uraa kaha guussufe attin hintte kaha gidenna . Hara asa kaha gisho gada taani ta la77atethaa bolla ays pirddo ?
46010030	Taani miya kathaa Xoossaa galatada miikko balidaada ays borettiyana ?
46010031	Hiza , hintte ay miikko ay uyikko , woykko ay oothikokka ubbabaa Xoossaa bonchchos oothite .
46010032	Ayhudeta gidin Giriketa gidin woykko Xoossaa woosa keethi gidin ooddeskka dhube gidoppite .
46010033	Taani ubba wode darota ashshanaw entti maaddettiya oge koyaysippe attin tana maaddiya oge koyikke .
46011001	Taani Kiristtoosa leemisuwa kaalleyssada , hintteka tana kaallite .
46011002	Hintte ubbaban tana qoppiya gishonne ta tamaarssida timirttiya minthidi naagida gisho ta hinttena galatays .
46011003	Shin Kiristtoosi adde ubbaas huu7e , addey maccasas huu7e , qassi Xoossay Kiristtoosas huu7e gideyssa hintte erana mela ta koyays .
46011004	Ba huu7iya guulunttidi Xoossaa woossiya woykko tinbbite odiya adde ubbay huu7e gidida Kiristtoosa toochchees .
46011005	Ba huu7iya qaconna Xoossaa woossiya woykko tinbbite odiya maccasiya huu7e gidida ba azinaa toochchawusu . Ba huu7iya qaconna maccasiya ba huu7iya meedettida maccasa mela .
46011006	Maccasi ba huu7iya qaconna ixxiko , ba huu7iya qanxxetto . Shin iw huu7iya qanxoy woykko meedoy borsso gidikko ba huu7iya qaco .
46011007	Addey Xoossaa leemisonne Xoossaa bonchcho gidiya gisho ba huu7iya qachchanaw bessenna , shin maccasi addes bonchcho .
46011008	Maccasi addefe medhettasuppe attin addey maccasappe medhettibeenna .
46011009	Maccasi addes medhettisippe attin addey maccasas medhettibeenna .
46011010	Hayssa gishonne kiitanchchota gisho maccasi baw maati de7eyssa bessiya malla ba huu7en qacanaw bessees .
46011011	Shin Godaa qofan maccasi addey baynna deenna ; addeyka maccasi baynna de7enna .
46011012	Maccasi addefe medhettidayssada addeyka maccasappe yelettis . Shin ubbabaykka Xoossafe medhettis .
46011013	Ane hintte pirddite . Maccasi ba huu7e qaconna Xoossaa woossanaw bessii ?
46011014	Addey ba huu7iya dichchiko iyaw borsso gideyssa hari attoshin medhetethi hinttena tamaarssenne ?
46011015	Shin maccasi ba huu7iya dichchiko iw bonchcho gidennee ? Maccasas huu7ey imettiday iya bana kammana melassa .
46011016	Shin hayssa bolla palamanaw koyaa asi de7ikko , nuus gidin woykko Xoossa woosa keethatas gidin hayssafe hara wogi baawa .
46011017	Hintte issife shiiqey go77as gidonnashin qohos gidiya gisho ha77i ta immiya kiitan hinttena nashshike .
46011018	Ta koyro si7iday , hintte woosa keethan shiiqiya wode hintte giddon shaahetethi de7eyssa . He ta si7idayssafe baggay tuma gideyssa ammanays .
46011019	Hintte giddofe tumi de7eyssati oonanteeko erettana mela hintte giddon shaakoy daanayssi attenna .
46011020	Hintte issife shiiqiya wode hintte shiiqey Godaa kahuwa maanassa gidenna .
46011021	Hintte kathi miya wode issoy issuwa naagonna bayssa bayssa miya gisho issoy koshattees hankkoy qassi mathottees .
46011022	Tuma hintte maanawunne uyanaw hinttew keethi baawe ? Woykko Xoossa woosa keethaa kadhetii ? Aykkoy baynna manqota yeellayeetii ? Ta hinttena woygo ? Hayssas ta hinttena nashshoo ? Nashshike .
46011023	Taani hinttew immida timirttiya Godaappe ekkas . Godaa Yesuusi aadhdhidi imettiya qamman uythaa ekkidi ,
46011024	Xoossaa galatis . Uythaa bathidi “ He7ite ; miite . Hayssi hinttew imettiya ta ashuwa . Hayssa mishe tana hassayite ” yaagis .
46011025	Hessadakka , kahuwa midi simmin , xuu7aa ekkidi , “ Hayssi xuu7ay ta suuthan eqqiya ooratha caaquwa . Hintte iyappe uyaa wode ubban tana hassayite ” yaagis .
46011026	Hintte ha uythaa miya wodenne ha xuu7aa uyaa wode ubban Goday yaana gakkanaw iya hayquwa odeeta .
46011027	Hessa gisho , bessonna ogiyan Godaa uythaa miya woykko Godaa xuu7aa uyaa oonikka iya ashuwanne suuthaa toochchida gisho ba nagaran oyshettees .
46011028	Shin asi bana paacco . Yaatidi uythaa mo ; xuu7appeka uyo .
46011029	Godaa ashuwabaa shaakki eronna , uythaa meynne xuu7appe uyey , ba bolla pirdda meesinne uyees .
46011030	Hessa gisho , hintte giddofe daroti daaburidosona ; harggidosona ; qassi unddenna asati hayqqidosona .
46011031	Shin nu nuna paaci be7idabaa gidiyakko , nu bolla pirddettanashin .
46011032	Alamey pirddettiya wode nu alamiyara pirddettonna mela ha77i Goday nuna seeres .
46011033	Hessa gisho , ta ishato , Godaa kahuwa maanaw hintte shiiqiya wode issoy issuwa gathi ekkite .
46011034	Hintte shiiqoy pirddas gidonna mela koshattida oonikka de7ikko , ba son mo . Attidabaa taani yaa bada hinttew odana .
46012001	Ta ishato , Geeshsha Ayyaana imotatabaa hintte erana mela ta koyas .
46012002	Hintte Xoossaa ammanonna wode dooni baynna eeqatan gooshettidi , hintte eronna soo bidayssa ereeta .
46012003	Xoossaa Ayyaanay kaalethiya asi oonikka , “ Yesuusi qanggetto ” yaagenna . Qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanay kaalethonna de7ishin , oonikka , “ Yesuusi Goda ” gaanaw dandda7onayssa hintte erana mela koyays .
46012004	Dumma dumma Ayyaana imotati de7oosona , shin imotata immiya Ayyaanay issuwa .
46012005	Nu Godaas oothiya dumma dumma oosoti de7oosona , shin Goday issuwa .
46012006	Nu Godaas oothiya dumma dumma ogeti de7oosona , shin he ogetan asa ubban oothiya Xoossay issuwa .
46012007	Shin issuwas issuwas imettida imotatan harata maaddana mela Geeshsha Ayyaanay qonccees .
46012008	Geeshsha Ayyaanay issuwas cinccatethi kumida qaala immees ; qassi issuwas eratethi kumida qaala immees .
46012009	He Geeshsha Ayyaanay issuwas ammano , hankkuwas qassi pathiya wolqqaa immees .
46012010	Geeshsha Ayyaanay issuwas malaata oothiya wolqqaa , issuwas tinbbite odiya wolqqaa immees . Issuwas ayyaanappe ayyaana shaakki eriya wolqqaa , issuwas dumma dumma doonan odiya wolqqaa , qassi issuwas dumma dumma doonan odettidayssa birshshiya wolqqaa immees .
46012011	Shin ha ubbaa oothey he issi Geeshsha Ayyaana . I koyaa mela issi issi asaas dumma dumma imota immees .
46012012	Issi asatethan daro billiteti de7oosona , shin he dumma dumma billiteti issi asatethi gidoosona . Hessadakka , Kiristtoosi dumma dumma billiteti de7iya asatethaa mela .
46012013	Nuuni Ayhude gidin Girike gidin aylle gidin womaano gidin , ubbay issi asatethi gidanaw Geeshsha Ayyaanan xammaqettida . Qassi nu ubbay issi Geeshsha Ayyaana ekkida .
46012014	Nu asatethan dumma dumma billiteti de7oosonappe attin issi billite gidenna .
46012015	Tohoy , “ Taani kushe gidonna gisho billite gidikke ” giikko , I hessa gida gisho billitetethay attiyye ?
46012016	Haythi , “ Taani ayfe gidonna gisho billite gidikke ” giikko , I hessa gida gisho asatethaafe issi billite gideyssi attiyye ?
46012017	Asatetha ubbay ayfe xalaala gididaakko , nu aybin si7anee ? Qassi asatethi ubbay haytha xalaala gididaakko nu aybin singganee ?
46012018	Shin Xoossay ba koyidayssada , asatethaa giddon dumma dumma billiteta wothis .
46012019	Ubbay issi billite gididaakko asatethi waanidi daanee ?
46012020	Shin billiteti daro gidikkoka , asatethay isso .
46012021	Ayfey kushekko , “ Ne taw koshshakka ” gaanaw dandda7enna . Woykko huu7ey tohokko , “ Ne taw koshshakka ” gaanaw dandda7enna .
46012022	Shin daabura daaniya asatethaa billiteti nuus aadhdhidi koshshosona .
46012023	Bonchcho koshshenna gidi nu qoppiya nu billitetappe baggata daro bonchchoos . Qassi nu borssettiya nu asatethaa billiteta aathi bonchchidi naagoos .
46012024	Nu be7in borssonna asatethaa billitetas bonchcho koshshenna . Shin Xoossay nu asatethaa billiteta wolira gasethidi borssiya billitetas aadhdhiya bonchcho immis .
46012025	Asatethaa billiteti issoy issuwara shaako medhdhonna wolis qoppana mela oothidi medhdhis .
46012026	Asatethaa billitetappe issoy sakettiko billiteti ubbay iyara sakettoosona . Asatethaa billitetappe issoy bonchchetiko billiteti ubbay iyara ufayttoosona .
46012027	Hintte ubbay Kiristtoosa asatethi ; qassi hintte issoy issoy iya billiteta .
46012028	Woosa keethan Xoossay , koyro hawaareta , nam77antho nabeta , heedzantho asttamaareta , kaallidi malaata ootheyssata , patheyssata , harata maaddeyssata , woosa keetha ayseyssatanne , dumma dumma doonan haasayeyssata wothis . Qassi ubbaafe aadhdhiya ogiya ta hinttena bessana .
46012029	Ubbay hawaare ? Ubbay nabe ? Ubbay asttamaare ? Ubbay malaata oothi ?
46012030	Ubbay pathiyye ? Ubbay dumma dumma doonan odetti ? Ubbay dumma dumma doonan odettoyssa birshshi ?
46012031	Shin ubbaafe aadhdhiya imotaa minthidi koyite . Qassi ubbaafe aadhdhiya ogiya ta hinttena bessana .
46013001	Taani asa qaalanne kiitanchcho qaala odettanaw dandda7ikkoka , taw siiqoy dhayikko , coo giiriya daala mela .
46013002	Tinbbite odiya imoy taw de7ikkoka , xuura ubbaa erikkoka , eratethi ubbay de7ikkoka , qassi deriya denthidi harasoo efiya ammanoy taw de7ikkoka , siiqoy dhayikko , ta aykkoka gidikke .
46013003	Taw de7iyaba ubbaa manqotas immikokka , hari attoshin , tana tamas aatha immikokka , siiqoy dhayikko tana aykkoka maaddenna .
46013004	Siiqoy dandda7anchcho . Siiqoy keeha . Siiqoy qanaatenna . Siiqoy ceeqettenna . Siiqoy otorenna .
46013005	Siiqoy bessonnabaa oothenna . Siiqoy uuzettenna . Siiqoy yilotenna . Siiqoy ba qoho paydenna .
46013006	Siiqoy tuman ufayttesippe attin worddon ufayttenna .
46013007	Siiqoy ubbaa dandda7ees ; ubbaa ammanees ; lo77obay hanana gidi , ufayssan naagees ; ubbaa genccees .
46013008	Siiqoy wurssethi gakkanaw dhayenna . Shin tinbbitey attana ; dumma dumma doonan odetteyssi attana ; eratethika aadhdhana .
46013009	Nu eratethaafe guuthi eroos ; tinbbitiyappe baggaa odoos .
46013010	Shin polo gididayssi yaa wode polo gidonnayssi attana .
46013011	Taani na7a de7iya wode na7ada haasays ; na7ada qoppays ; na7ada akeekays . Ta kahaamida wode na7atetha hanuwa aggas .
46013012	Ha77i poo7oy baynnason masttooten be7eyssada be7oos , shin he wode nu qonccen be7ana . Ha77i nu eratethaafe guutha eroos , shin he wode Xoossay nuna ereyssada polo erana .
46013013	Hiza , ammanoy , ufayssinne siiqoy , ha heedzati eqqidi daana . Shin hayssatappe aadhdhey siiqo .
46014001	Siiqo kaallite . Ayyaana imotata minthidi koyite ; ubbaafe aathidi , tinbbite imotaa minthidi koyite .
46014002	Dumma dumma doonan odettiya asi Xoossaas odeesippe attin asas odenna . Shin asas qoncciboonna xuuraa Ayyaana wolqqan odettiya gisho oonikka I odetteyssa akeekenna .
46014003	Shin tinbbite odeyssati ase dichchanaw , minthethanawunne minthanaw asas odees .
46014004	Dumma dumma doonan odiya asi bana dichchees . Shin tinbbite odiya asi woosa keethaa dichchees .
46014005	Hintte ubbay dumma dumma doonan odettiyako ta dosays , shin tinbbite odanayssa aathada dosays . Dumma dumma doonan odetteyssa woosa keethi dichchanaw birshshiya asi dhayikko , dumma dumma doona odetteyassafe tinbbite odeyssi aadhdhees .
46014006	Shin ta ishato , taani hintteko bada qonccethan woykko eratethan woykko tinbbite odon woykko timirtten gidonnashin dumma dumma doonan odettiko hinttena ay maaddanee ?
46014007	Dumma dumma yetha miishetas issi qommo girssi de7ikko , suusul77e girssinne diitha girssi waattidi shaakki eranee ?
46014008	Qassi moyze punoy geeyidi erettonna ixxiko olas giigettey oonee ?
46014009	Hessadakka , dumma dumma doonan hintte odetteyssi qoncce gidonna ixxiko hintte odeyssa ooni eranee ? Hessi carkkos odiya mela .
46014010	Ha alamiyan daro doonati de7oosona ; he ubbaas birshshethi de7ees .
46014011	Shin issi asi odettiya doona taani eronna ixxiko I taw imathe gidees ; takka iyaw imathe gidays .
46014012	Hessadakka , Geeshsha Ayyaana imotaa hintte ekkanaw minthidi koykko , woosa keethi dichchanaw ubbaafe aadhdhiya imotaa koyite .
46014013	Dumma dumma doonan odettiya asi ba odaa birshshanaw birshshetha imotay imettana mela Xoossaa woosso .
46014014	Taani dumma dumma doonan Xoossaa woossiko , ta ayyaanay woossees , shin ta wozanay aykkoka go7ettenna .
46014015	Yaatin , ta ay oothanaw koshshii ? Taani ta ayyaanan woossays ; ta wozanankka woossays . Taani ta ayyaanan yexxays ; ta wozanankka yexxays .
46014016	Hessa gidonna ixxiko neeni ne ayyaanan Xoossaa galatiya wode he bessan neeni geyssa eronna asi ne galateyssa woygidi , “ Amin77i ” gaanee ?
46014017	Neeni Xoossaa galateyssi lo77o , shin hara asi maaddenna .
46014018	Ta hintte ubbaafe aathada dumma dumma doonan odettiya gisho Xoossaa galatays .
46014019	Shin taani woosa keethan harata tamaarssanaw dumma dumma doonan tammu mukulu qaala odettanaappe erettiya doonan ichchashu qaala odettanaw dosays .
46014020	Ta ishato , hintte qofan naytada hanoppite . Hintte iitabaas naytada haniteppe attin hintte qofan kahaamata gidite .
46014021	Goday , Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Taani ha asaas , dumma dumma doonan odettiya asaaninne imatha inxarssan odettiya asan odana . Shin hessi haninikka tana si7okkona ” yaagees .
46014022	Hiza , dumma dumma doonan haasayoy , ammanonna asaas malla gideesippe attin ammaniyaa asaassa gidenna . Tinbbitey ammaniyaa asaas malla gideesippe attin ammanonna asaassa gidenna .
46014023	Woosa keethaa asay issife shiiqiya wode ubbay dumma dumma doonan odettiko eronna woykko ammanonna asay hintte shiiquwa yidi , “ Hayssati gooyosona ” gokkonayye ?
46014024	Shin eronna woykko ammanonna asay woosa keethi yaa wode asay tinbbite odishin , si7ikko ba nagaraa akeekana ; qassi I si7ida qaalan pirddettana .
46014025	Entti iya wozanan geemmida qofaa qonccisana . Hessadakka , “ Tuma Xoossay hintte giddon de7ees ” yaagidi markkattidi , gufannidi Xoossaas goynnana .
46014026	Ta ishato , nu woyginoo ? Hintte issife shiiqiya wode issuwas mazmurey de7ees ; issuwas tamaarsso imoti de7ees ; issuwas qonccethi de7ees ; issuwas dumma dumma doonan haasayoy de7ees ; issuwas birshshetha imoti de7ees . He ubbay woosa keethi dichchiyabaa gidanaw bessees .
46014027	Dumma dumma doonan odettiya asati de7ikko , nam77a woykko darikko heedza gididi maaran maaran haasayanaw bessees . Entti odetteyssa hara asi birshsho .
46014028	Shin birshshiya asi dhayikko , dumma dumma doonan odetteyssi woosa keethan si77i go . Bawunne ba Xoossaas odo .
46014029	Tinbbite odeyssati nam77a woykko heedza gididi odo . Qassi harati entti giyabaa pirddona .
46014030	He shiiquwan de7iya hara asas issibay qoncciko kase odetteyssi si77i go .
46014031	Ubbay tamaarana melanne ubbay minnana mela maaran maaran tinbbite odanaw dandda7eeta .
46014032	Nabeta ayyaanay nabetas kiitettees .
46014033	Geeshshata woosa keetha ubbay meezetidayssada Xoossay sarotetha Xoossaafe attin cabbo Xoossi gidenna .
46014034	Maccasi woosa keethan si77i go . Muse higgey geyssada entti haarettofe attin woosa keethan odanaw enttaw maati baawa .
46014035	Maccasi woosa keethan haasayoy borsso gidiya gisho issibaa eranaw koykko son bantta azinata oychchona .
46014036	Xoossaa qaalaa koyro hintte ehidetii ? Woykko Xoossaa qaalay hintte xalaalakko yidee ?
46014037	Oonikka bana nabe woykko bana Xoossaa asi gidi qoppiko , taani hinttew xaafeyssi Godaa kiitta gideyssa akeeko .
46014038	Shin oonikka akeekonna ixxiko ikka akeekettofo .
46014039	Hessa gisho , ta ishato , tinbbite odanaw minthidi amottite ; qassi dumma dumma doonan odetteyssaka diggofite .
46014040	Shin ubbayka woganinne maaran gido .
46015001	Ta ishato , ta hinttew markkattida Wonggelaa hintte ekkidayssanne hintte ammanoy iyan eqqidayssa hintte akeekana mela koyays .
46015002	Ta tamaarssida Wonggelaa minthidi oykkiko hintte iyan attana . Hessi hanonna ixxiko hintte ammanaoy hada gidana .
46015003	Taani ekkida ubbaafe aadhdhiya kiitaa kasetada hinttew immas . Hessika , Geeshsha Maxaafay geyssada , Kiristtoosi nu nagaraa gisho hayqqis .
46015004	Moogettis ; Geeshsha Maxaafay geyssada , heedzantho gallasan hayqoppe denddis .
46015005	Phexiroosas qonccis . Hessafe guye , tammanne nam77u hawaaretas qonccis .
46015006	Hessafe guye , ichchashu xeetappe dariya asaas issi toho qonccis . Enttafe dariya baggay ha77i gakkanaw paxa de7oosona , shin guuthati hayqqidosona .
46015007	Hessafe guye , Yayqoobas qonccis ; guyeppe ba hawaareta ubbaas qonccis .
46015008	Qassi wurssethan awuccaya mela gidida taw qonccis .
46015009	Taani Yesuusa hawaareta ubbaafe laafa . Taani Xoossaa woosa keethaa gooddida gisho Yesuusa hawaare geetettada xeegettanaw bessonnayssa .
46015010	Shin Xoossaa aadho keehatethan ta ha77i gididayssa gidas ; I taw immida aadho keehatethay mela attibeenna . Taani hankko hawaaretappe aathada daaburas . Shin taara de7iya Xoossaa aadho keehatethay oothisppe attin tana gidikke .
46015011	Hiza , tana gidin entti , nu ubbay tamaarsey hessa ; hintteka he kiitaa ammanideta .
46015012	Kiristtoosi hayqoppe denddidayssa nu sabbakiya wode hinttefe issoti issoti yaatin , woygidi , “ Hayqoppe denddoy baawa ” yaagonaa ?
46015013	Hayqoppe denddoy baynnabaa gidikko Kiristtoosi hayqoppe denddibeenna guussu .
46015014	Kiristtoosi hayqoppe denddiboonnabaa gidikko nu timirttey qassi hintte ammanoykka hada .
46015015	Hayqoppe denddoy baynnashin , nuuni Xoossay , “ Kiristtoosa hayqoppe denthis ” yaagidi sabbakishe Xoossaa worddanchcho markkatta gidida guussu .
46015016	Hayqqida asay hayqoppe denddiboonnabaa gidikko hiza , Kiristtoosi hayqoppe denddibeenna .
46015017	Kiristtoosi hayqoppe denddonnabaa gidikko , hintte ammanoy hada ; qassi hintte ha77i gakkanaw hintte nagaran de7eeta .
46015018	Hiza , Kiristtoosa ammanidi hayqqidayssatikka dhayidosona guussu .
46015019	Nuuni ha alamiya de7uwa xalaalas Kiristtoosan ufayssi oothidabaa gidikko , ha sa7an de7iya asa ubbaafe nubay aadhdhida yibbata .
46015020	Shin Kiristtoosi hayqqidayssatas hayqoppe denddon bayra gididi tuma denddis .
46015021	Hayqoy issi asa baggara ha alamiya yidayssada hayqoppe denddoy issi asa baggara yis .
46015022	Addaame baggara asa ubbay hayqqidayssada Kiristtoosa baggara asa ubbay de7on daana .
46015023	Shin issoy issoy ba maaran maaran denddana . Kiristtoosi ubbaafe kasetidi denddis ; hessafe guye , Kiristtoosayssati I yaa wode denddana .
46015024	Hessafe guye , Kiristtoosi haareyssa , maatanne wolqqa ubbaa dhayssidi , kawotethaa Xoossaa Aawas immiya wode wodiya wurssethay yaana .
46015025	Xoossay iya morkketa ubbaa iya tohuwappe garssan wothana gakkanaw Kiristtoosi haaranaw bessees .
46015026	Wurssethan I dhayssanaw de7iya morkkey hayqo .
46015027	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Xoossay ubbabaa iya maatappe garssan haarisis ” geetettidi xaafettis . Shin ubbaa iya maatappe garssan haarisis geyssi , ubbabaa iya maatappe garssan haarisida Xoossaa gujjenna .
46015028	Ubbabay Kiristtoosa maatappe garssan haarettidaappe guye Kiristtoosi qassi ba huu7en ubbabaa baw haarisida Xoossaas haarettana . He wode Xoossay ba xalaala ubbaa haarana .
46015029	Hayqqidayssati denddonabaa gidikko entta gisho asaas aybi wodhey de7ii ? Hayqqidayssati denddonabaa gidikko yaatin , ays , asay hayqqidayssata gisho xammaqettoona ?
46015030	Yaatin , nuuni ays ubba wode nunatethaa metos aathi immoonaa ?
46015031	Ta ishato , ta gallas gallas hayqos aadhdhada imettays . Hessika , Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7iya de7uwa issifetethan hinttenan ceeqqiya gishossa .
46015032	Asa qofatho gidikko , taani Efesoonan do7ara butetidayssi tana ay maaddii ? Hayqqidayssati hayqoppe denddonnabaa gidikko , “ Wontto nu hayqqiya gisho hachchi maana uyana ” yaagiya asaa mela gidoos .
46015033	Cimettofite ! Iita laggetethi lo77o amaliya iissees .
46015034	Hintte akeekaakko simmite . Nagara oothofite . Hinttefe issi issi asay Xoossaa erokkonna . Taani hinttena yeellayanaw hessa gays .
46015035	Issi asi , “ Hayqqida asay waanidi denddanee ? Entti ay mela asatethaara yaanee ? ” yaagonna aggenna .
46015036	Neno eeyaw , neeni biittan zeriya zerethay hayqqonna dolenna .
46015037	Neeni zerey gistte gidin woykko hara katha qommo ayfe xalaala zerasaappe attin dolida dolaa gidenna .
46015038	Shin Xoossay zerethaas ba dosida mela medhetethi immees . Dumma dumma zerethaas dumma dumma asatethi immees .
46015039	Medhetetha ubbaa ashoy isso gidenna . Shin asa ashoy issuwa ; mehe ashoy dumma ; kafota ashoy dumma ; qassi molo ashoy dumma .
46015040	Salo asatethi de7ees ; qassi sa7a asatethi de7ees . Shin salo asatetha bonchchoy dumma ; qassi sa7a asatetha bonchchoy dumma .
46015041	Awa bonchchoy dumma ; ageena bonchchoy dumma ; xoolinttota bonchchoy dumma ; issi xoolinttoy hankko xoolintuwafe bonchchon dummatees .
46015042	Hayqqidayssati hayqoppe denddiya wode hessada hanana . Hayqqiya asatethay zerettees ; hayqqonna asatethi gididi denddees .
46015043	Tooshen zerettidi , bonchchon denddana ; daaburan zerettidi , wolqqan denddana .
46015044	Medhetetha asatethay zerettidi , ayyaana asatethi gididi denddana . Medheta asatethi de7ikko , ayyaana asatethi de7ees .
46015045	Hessadakka , Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Koyro addey , Addaamey , paxa de7iya ase gididi medhettis ” yaagees . Shin wurssetha Addaamey , Kiristtoosi , de7o immiya ayyaanaa gidis .
46015046	Shin medheta asi koyro yin , guyeppe ayyaana asi yisippe attin ayyaana asi koyro yibeenna .
46015047	Koyro Addaamey biittafe medhettida biitta asi ; nam77antho Addaamey saloppe yida salo asi .
46015048	Biittafe medhettidayssati biittafe medhettidayssa daanosona . Saloyssati saloppe yidayssa daanosona .
46015049	Nuuni biittafe medhettida addiya daaneyssa mela saloppe yida addiya daanana .
46015050	Ta ishato , ta geyssi hessa ; ha77i nu ma77ida asatethay Xoossaa kawotethaa laattanaw dandda7enna . Wooqiya asatethay wooqonna asatethaa laattenna .
46015051	Ta hinttew issi xuura odana . Nu ubbay hayqqoko , shin wurssethan ubbay laamettana .
46015052	Moyzey punettiya wode ayfey qiphi xeellanaw hassayonna laamettana . Hayqqida asay wooqonna asi gididi denddana ; nukka laamettana .
46015053	Hayssi wooqeyssi wooqonnayssa , hayssi hayqqeyssi hayqqonnayssa ma77anaw bessees .
46015054	Hayssi wooqeyssi wooqonnayssa , qassi hayssi hayqqeyssi hayqqonnayssa ma77iya wode Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Hayqoy xoonon mitettis ” giya qaalay polettana .
46015055	Hessadakka , “ Hayqo , ne xoonoy awun de7ii ? Hayqo , ne qohiya wolqqay awun de7ii ? ”
46015056	Hayqoy dukkiya wolqqay nagara ; qassi nagara wolqqay higge .
46015057	Shin nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara nuus xoono immiya Xoossaa galati gakko .
46015058	Hessa gisho , ta siiqo ishato , qaaxxonna minnidi eqqite . Godaa oosuwan hintte daabureyssi coo gidonnayssa eridi ubba wode Godaa oosuwa azallonna oothite .
46016001	Ammaniya asaas miishe shiishobaa Galaatiya woosa keethatas taani kiittidayssada hintteka oothite .
46016002	Miishiya shiishoy ta hintteko biya wode gidonna mela issoy issoy saaminttafe koyro gallas , wogga wode wogga wode ba demmeyssafe kessidi ba son dagayo .
46016003	Taani yaa bida wode miishiya Yerusalaame gathana mela hintte dooriya asaas dabddaabbe immada entta Yerusalaame kiittana .
46016004	Enttara ta buussay koshshiyabaa gidikko entti taara baanaw dandda7osona .
46016005	Taani Maqedooniyara aadhdhanaw qoppida gisho yaa bada hintteko yaana .
46016006	Ta biyaso aw gidikkoka , ta buussan hintte tana maaddana mela hintte matan guutha wode gam77onna aggike . Balggo ageenata hintte matan aathonna waaya aggana .
46016007	Taani ogera aadhdhashe hinttena be7anaw koyikke . Goday giikko , hintte matan guutha wode takkanaw qoppays .
46016008	Shin taani Phenxeqosxe Baaley gakkanaw Efesoonan gam77ana .
46016009	Taw oosoy kumida dalgga penggey dooyettis , shin daro eqettiya morkketi de7oosona .
46016010	I ta mela Godaa ooso oothiya asi gidiya gisho Ximotiyoosi hintteko biikko , hintte matan I hirggonna daana mela oothite .
46016011	Oonikka iya kadhoppo . I taakko saro simmana mela iya maaddidi moyzite . Taani I hankko ammaneyssatara simmanayssa naagays .
46016012	Nu ishaa Aphiloosi hankko ammaneyssatara hintteko baana mela ta iya mintha woossas . Ha77i hintteko baanaw koyibeenna , shin iyaw injjetiya wode hintteko baana .
46016013	Barkkite ; Ammanon eqqite ; xaalite ; minnite .
46016014	Ooso ubbaa siiqon oothite .
46016015	Ta ishato , Isxifaanoseynne iya soo asay Akkayan entti koyro ammanidayssata gideyssanne ammaneyssata maaddanaw banttana aathi immidayssa hintte ereeta .
46016016	Hintteka entta mela asaasinne , enttara ooson daaburiya ubbaas kiitettana mela ta hinttena woossays .
46016017	Isxifaanosey , Forchchunaasinne Akkayqoosi taakko yidayssi tana ufayssis . Hintte baynna bessan entti hinttena gididi ta pacaa kunthidosona .
46016018	Entti hinttena ufayssidayssada tanakka ufayssidosona . Hessa mela asata dogoppite .
46016019	Iisiya woosa keetha asay hinttena saro goosona . Aqiilinne Phirisqila bantta son shiiqiya woosa keethaa asaara issife hinttena Godaa sunthan wozanappe sarothoosona .
46016020	Ammaniya ishati ubbay hinttena saro yaagosona . Geeshsha yeeretethi yeerettishe issoy issuwa sarothite .
46016021	Taani , Phawuloosi , ha sarothuwa ta kushen xaafas .
46016022	Godaa dosonna asi de7ikko , qanggettidayssa gido . Nu Godaw , haaya !
46016023	Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethay hinttera gido .
46016024	Ta siiqoy Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7iya hintte ubbaara gido . Amin77i .
47001001	Xoossaa shenen Yesuus Kiristtoosa hawaare gidida Phawuloosinne , nu ishaa Ximotiyoosi , Qoronttoosan de7iya Xoossaa woosa keethaasinne Akkaya biittan de7iya Xoossaa asa ubbaas xaafida kiitaa .
47001002	Xoossaa nu Aawappenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe , aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hinttew gido .
47001003	Maarotetha Aawas , ubba wode nuna minthethiya Xoossaas , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Aawas galati gido .
47001004	Xoossay nuus immida minthethuwan , meton de7eyssata nu minthethana mela Xoossay nuna nu meto ubban minthethees .
47001005	Nuuni Kiristtoosa daro waaya shaakettidayssada qassi nuuni iya daro minthethuwan minnana .
47001006	Nuuni waayettiko hessi hinttena minthethanaassanne hinttena ashshanaassa . Qassi nuuni minettiko nuuni genccida waaya mela hintteka genccidi , Xoossay hinttew immiya minthethuwan minnana .
47001007	Hintte nu ekkida metuwa mela ekkidi , nu minthethuwan shaakettanayssa nu eriya gisho nu ufayssay hinttenan mino .
47001008	Nu ishato , Iisiya biittan nuna gakkida metuwa hintte erana mela koyoos . He nuna gakkida metoy nu wolqqaafe darin , hayqqonna attoko gidi ufayssi qanxidashin .
47001009	Nuuni nu bolla hayqo pirddi pirddettida mela qoppida . Shin nuuni nu huu7en gidonnashin , hayqqidayssata denthiya Xoossan ammanettana mela hessi hanis .
47001010	Xoossay hessa mela iita hayqoppe nuna ashshis ; ha77ika ashshana ; sinthafekka I nuna ashshana gidi iyan ufayssi wothoos .
47001011	Woosan nuna maaddite . Daro woosa gaason Xoossaa maaduwa nu demmiya wode daro asay nu gisho Xoossaa galatoosona .
47001012	Nuuni nu geeshsha kahan ceeqettoos . Nuuni ha alamiyan de7ida de7uwan ubbarakka nu de7ida de7uwan tumatethaninne suuretethan hinttera de7ida . Hessika , ha alamiya cinccatethan gidonnashin Xoossaa aadho keehatethaana .
47001013	Nu hinttew xaafida dabddaabbey hintte nabbabanawunne akeekanaw dandda7iyabaappe attin haraa gidenna . Hintte iya akeekanaw dandda7eyssa ta ammanays .
47001014	Ha77i hintte nuna hanida keena ereeta , shin sinthafe kumethi eranayssa ta ammanettays . Nu Godaa Yesuusi simmiya wode nuuni hinttenan ceeqettidayssada hintteka nunan ceeqettana .
47001015	Hessa taani loytha erida gisho hintte nam77antho go7ettana mela kasetada hintteko baanaw qofa qachchas .
47001016	Taani Maqedooniya bashenne yaappe simmashe hinttena be7ana . Taani yaappe Yihuda biya wode hintte tana ta ogiyan maaddana gada qoppas .
47001017	Taani hessa gashe ay oothanaw bessiyako eronna asi daanaynaa ? Woykko taani ta qofaa qachchiya wode asa qofada , issi toho “ Ee ” qassi issi toho “ Akkay ” giya asa meleyye ?
47001018	Shin Xoossay ammanetteyssa gidiya gisho nu hinttew odiya qaalay “ Ee ” woykko “ Akkay ” geyssa gidenna .
47001019	Taani , Sillaaseynne Ximotiyoosi hinttew markkattida Xoossaa Na7ay , Yesuus Kiristtoosi ubba wode “ Eeppe ” attin “ Ee ” nne “ Akkay ” gidenna .
47001020	Xoossay immana gida ubbay Kiristtoosa baggara “ Ee ” gidees . Nuuni Kiristtoosa baggara Xoossaa bonchchoos , “ Amin77i ” gey hessa gishossa .
47001021	Nunne hintte Kiristtoosan minnidi eqqana mela oothidaynne ba oosuwas dooriday Xoossaa .
47001022	Nuuni iyabaa gideyssa erisanaw ba maatamiya nu bolla wothis ; qassi ba Geeshsha Ayyaana oythi oothidi nu wozanan wothis .
47001023	Taani Qoronttoosa boonna aggiday hintte azanonna attana melassa ; hessi worddo gidikko Xoossay ta shemppuwa taappe ekko .
47001024	Hinttee , hintte ammanuwan minnidi de7iya gisho nu hinttena ufayssanaw hinttera issife ootheyssatappe attin hinttena wolqqan ammantheyssata gidokko .
47002001	Taani nam77antho hintteko biikke gada qofa qachchiday hinttena azzanthonna agganaassa .
47002002	Taani hinttena azzanthikokka ta azzanthida hinttefe hari tana ufayssanaw de7ey oonee ?
47002003	Taani hinttew he dabddaabbiya xaafiday , ta hinttena be7anaw biya wode tana ufayssanaw bessiya asan ta azzananaw koyonna gishossa . Ta ufayttiya wode hintte ubbayka ufayttanayssa ta ammanays .
47002004	Taani daro waayeninne un77an qassi daro afuthan xaafiday , hinttena azzanthanaassa gidonnashin taani hinttena ubbaa ay mela dosiyakko hinttena erisana melassa .
47002005	Ase azzanthida oonikka de7ikko ta iya balaa darssanaw koyikkefe attin tana gidonnashin hinttefe darota azzanthis .
47002006	Hinttefe dariya asay he uraa seerida seeray iyaw gidana .
47002007	Hessa gisho , he uray daro azzanidi , ufayssi qanxonna mela hintte iya maaranawunne minthethanaw bessees .
47002008	Hintte iya siiqeyssa zaari iyaw qonccisana mela ta hinttena woossays .
47002009	Ta he dabddaabbiya hinttew xaafiday , hintte paacettidi , ubbaban taw kiitetteyssa eranaw koyida gishossa .
47002010	Hintte maariya uraa takka maarana . Taani maaranabay aybi de7ikkoka , Kiristtoosa sinthan hintte gisho gada maaras .
47002011	Taani hessa oothiday Xalahiya cimo oosuwa nu eriya gisho xalahen cimettonna attana melassa .
47002012	Taani Kiristtoosa Wonggelaa sabbakanaw Xiro7aada bida wode Goday yan taw ooso oge giigisidi wothis .
47002013	Shin taani ta ishaa Tito yan demmaboonna gisho ta wozanay shemppibeenna . Hessa gisho , yan de7iya asaa sarothada iya koyanaw Maqedooniya bas .
47002014	Shin Kiristtoosa baggara ubba wode nuna xoonon kaalethiyanne shitto mela sawiya Kiristtoosabaa nu eriya timirttiya ubba bessi gathana mela oothiya Xoossaa galati gakko .
47002015	Nuuni attiyaa asaa giddoninne dhayaa asaa giddon Kiristtoosa baggara Xoossaas imettida sawiya shitto mela .
47002016	Dhayaa asaas hayqqoko efiya hayqo peeno ; qassi attiyaa asaas de7okko efiya de7o sawo ; yaatin , hessa mela oosuwas gidanay oonee ?
47002017	Nuuni Xoossaa qaala wodhe demmanaw koyidi walakkidi zal77iya daro asaa mela gidokko . Shin Xoossay kiittida suure asata mela Kiristtoosan de7idi Xoossaa sinthan qaala odoos .
47003001	Nuuni zaaridi nuna sabbinooyye ? Woykko hara asada , saba dabddaabbiya hinttew yeddanaw woykko hinttefe ekkanaw nuna koshshiyye ?
47003002	Asi ubbay hinttena erana melanne nabbabana mela hintte nu wozanan xaafettidi de7iya nu dabddaabbe .
47003003	Hintte qalamen gidonnashin de7o Xoossaa Ayyaanan , shuchcha bolla gidonnashin asa wozanan xaafettidayssatanne nunan haggaazettida Kiristtoosa dabddaabbe gideyssa bessideta .
47003004	Nu hessa giday , Kiristtoosa baggara Xoossan ammanoy nuus de7iya gishossa .
47003005	Nu hessa oothanaw dandda7iday Xoossaa wolqqaanappe attin nuuni nu wolqqan aykkoka oothanaw dandda7okko .
47003006	Nu ooratha caaquwa oosanchchota gidana mela Xoossay nuna dandda7isis . He ooratha caaqoy Geeshsha Ayyaanan benttidayssafe attin xaafettida higgen gidenna . Higgey wodhees , shin Geeshsha Ayyaanay de7o immees .
47003007	Shuchcha bolla xaafettida higgey imettiya wode Xoossaa bonchchoy qonccis . Muse som77uwan de7iya bonchchoy dhayishe biyabaa gidikkoka , Isra7eele asay iya som77uwa tishshi oothidi xeellanaw dandda7ibookkona . Hiza , hayqo ehiya higgey hessa mela bonchchon qoncciko ,
47003008	yaatin , Geeshsha Ayyaanan oosettiya oosuwa bonchchoy waanidi aadhdhenee ?
47003009	Asa bolla pirdda ehiya higgey bonchcho gidikko yaatin , ase xillisiya ooratha ogey waanidi aadhdhidi bonchchettenne ?
47003010	Kase bonchcho gididayssa ha77i aadhdhiya bonchchoy de7eyssara gathi be7iya wode bonchchoy baynnabaa gidis .
47003011	Guutha wodes qonccidi guyeppe dhaydayssi hayssada bonchchetiko , merinaw de7eyssi waanidi aadhdhidi bonchchettenne ?
47003012	Nuus hayssa mela ufayssay de7iya gisho yeellatonna odettoos .
47003013	Nuuni , Isra7eele asay dhayishe biya bonchchuwa wurssethaa be7onna mela ba som77uwa kammida Muse mela gidokko .
47003014	Shin entta wozanay doccis . Hachchi gakkanaw entti gal77a caaquwa nabbabiya wode entta wozanay he kaman kameti de7ees . He kamay Kiristtoosa xalaalan qaarettees .
47003015	Shin hachchi gakkanawukka entti Muse maxaafaa nabbabiya wode ubban he kamay entta wozanaa kammees .
47003016	Shin oonikka Godaakko simmiya wode awudekka he kamay qaarettees .
47003017	Goday Ayyaana ; Godaa Ayyaanay de7iya bessan la77atethi de7ees .
47003018	Nuuni ubbay kametiboonna som77on Godaa bonchchuwa be7ana . Nuuni Ayyaana gidida Godaa malaa daananaw bonchchofe bonchchon laamettana .
47004001	Hiza , Xoossay ba maarotethan ha oosuwa nuus immida gisho nuuni ufayssi qanxoko .
47004002	Nuuni yeellaya geema ooso ubbaa aggida ; gene ooso oothoko ; Xoossaa qaala worddora walakkoko . Tumaa qonccen haasayishe , asa ubbaa kahay nuna ekkana mela Xoossaa sinthan nuna shiishoos .
47004003	Nu odiya Wonggelay geemmidabaa gidikkoka , geemmiday dhayo ogen de7iya asaassa .
47004004	Ha alamiya haariya xoossay ammanonna asaa wozanaa goozis . Entti Xoossa malan qonccida Kiristtoosa bonchcho Wonggelaa poo7uwa be7onna mela diggis .
