47004005	Nuuni , Yesuus Kiristtoosi Goda gideyssanne nu iya gisho hintte oosanchcho gideyssa odoosippe attin nubaa odokko .
47004006	“ Dhuman poo7oy poo7o ” gida Xoossay , Kiristtoosa som77uwan poo7iya Xoossaa bonchchuwa eraa poo7uwa immanaw ba poo7uwa nu wozanan poo7isis .
47004007	Shin ubbaafe aadhdhiya wolqqay nubaa gidonnashin Xoossabaa gideyssa bessanaw ha bonchcho shaloy meqqa miishe gidida nu asatethan de7ees .
47004008	Nu ubba baggarakka waayettida , shin meqerettibookko . Nuus haddirssi gidis , shin ufayssi qanxibookko .
47004009	Nu , morkketan goodettida , shin lagge dhayibookko . Nu morkketan shocettidi kunddida , shin dhayibookko .
47004010	Yesuusa de7oy nu asatethan qonccana mela iya hayquwa ubba wode nu asatethan tookkidi yuuyoos .
47004011	Yesuusa de7oy hayqqiya nu asatethan qonccana mela paxa de7iya nuuni iya gisho ubba wode hayqos aadhdhidi imettoos .
47004012	Hiza , hayqoy nunan oothiya wode de7oy hinttenan oothees .
47004013	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Ta ammanas ; hessa gisho haasayas ” yaagettis . Hessa mela ammanoy nuus de7iya gisho haasayos .
47004014	Godaa Yesuusa hayqoppe denthida Xoossay , nunakka Yesuusara hayqoppe denthanayssanne hinttera issife ba sinthe shiishanayssa eroos .
47004015	Hessi ubbay haniday hintte gishossa . Xoossaa aadho keehatethay daro asaa gakkiya wode asay Xoossaa bonchchuwas daro galataa immana .
47004016	Hessa gisho , nuuni ufayssi qanxoko . Nu benttiya asatethay daaburishe biyabaa gidikkoka , nu ayyaana asatethay gallas gallas ooraxees .
47004017	Ha77is nuuni waayettiya ha kawushsha waayey , ubbaafe keehi gitatiya merinaa bonchchuwa nuus immisana .
47004018	Nuuni benttiyabaa gidonnashin benttonnabaa xeellos . Benttiyabay ha77issa , shin benttonnabay merinaassa .
47005001	Ha77i nu de7iya dunkkaane daaniya ha sa7a asatethay laalettikokka , asi keexiboonna , Xoossay keexida merinaa keethay nuus salon de7eyssa eroos .
47005002	Salo asatethaa ma77anaw amottishe ha77i ha sa7an de7ishe oolos .
47005003	Nuuni hessa ma77iya wode kallottoko .
47005004	Dunkkaane daaniya ha sa7a asatethan nu de7ishe deexettidi oolos . Hayqqiya nu asatethay de7on laamettana mela salo asatethaa ma77anaw koyoosippe attin ashuwappe shaakettanaw koyidi gidenna .
47005005	Nuna hayssas giigisiday Xoossaa . Qassi sinthafe yaanabaas oythi oothidi ba Ayyaana nuus immis .
47005006	Hessa gisho , nuuni ha sa7a asatethan de7iya wode ubban Godaappe haakkidi de7eyssa erikkoka ubba wode ammanettidi de7oos .
47005007	Nuuni de7ey ammanonnappe attin be7iyaban gidenna .
47005008	Nu ha sa7a asatethaafe shaakettidi , nu soo bidi Godaara issife daanaw amottiya gisho ammanettidi de7oos .
47005009	Hessa gisho , nu ha asatethan de7in woykko ha asatethaafe shaakettin , nu amoy iya ufayssanayssa .
47005010	Nuuni issoy issoy ha sa7an de7ishe lo77o gidin woykko iita gidin , oothida oosuwas bessiya pirddaa ekkanaw Kiristtoosa pirdda araata sinthan shiiqana .
47005011	Hiza , nuuni Godaa bonchcheyssi ay guussekko eriya gisho asay nu odeyssa ekkana mela zoroos . Xoossay , nuuni ooneekko nuna erees ; qassi hintteka hintte kahan nu ooneekko ereeta yaagada qoppays .
47005012	Wozanan gidonnashin malan ceeqettiya asaa doona oythanaw hintte nunan ceeqettana mela hinttew gaaso gidanaw koyoosippe attin nu nuna zaaridi nashshanaw koyokko .
47005013	Nu gooshshi gidikko Xoossaa bonchchossa ; wozanaama gidikko hinttessa .
47005014	Issoy ubbaas hayqqidayssanne ubbay qassi iyara hayqqidayssa nu eriya gisho Kiristtoosa siiqoy nuna haarees .
47005015	De7on de7eyssati hizappe guye banttaw gidonnashin enttaw hayqqidayssasinne hayqoppe denddidayssas daana mela Kiristtoosi asa ubbaa gisho hayqqis .
47005016	Hizappe guye , nuuni oonakka asa qofan pirddoko . Hayssafe kase nuuni Kiristtoosakka asa qofan pirddidabaa gidikkoka , hizappe hessada pirddoko .
47005017	Hessa gisho , oonikka Kiristtoosan de7ikko ooratha medhetethi ; gal77a medhetethay aadhdhis ; ubbayka oorathi gidis .
47005018	Hessa ubbaa Xoossay oothis . I Kiristtoosa baggara nuna baara sigethis . Qassi harata baara sigethana mela nuus sigetho ooso immis .
47005019	Xoossay Kiristtoosa baggara asa ubbaa baara sigethees . Entta nagaraa taybibeenna ; qassi asaa baara sigethiya qaala nuus immis .
47005020	Xoossay asaa nu baggara xeegiya gisho nu Kiristtoosan kiitettidi asaa Xoossaara sigettite gidi Kiristtoosa gisho woossos .
47005021	Nuuni Xoossaa xillotethaa Kiristtoosa baggara ekkana mela , nagara eronna Kiristtoosa nu gisho nagaranchcho asada oothis .
47006001	Nuuni Xoossaara issife oothiya asi gideyssada , hintte ekkida aadho keehatethaa hada oothonna mela nu hinttena woossos .
47006002	Xoossay , “ Ta nena si7ana woden si7as ; atotetha gallasan nena maaddas ”
47006003	Oonikka nu oosuwa borana melanne nunan dhubettana mela koyokko .
47006004	Gidoshin , nu tuma Xoossaa oosanchchota gideyssa nu oothiya ubbaban bessida . Daro genccan , waayen , meton , un77an ,
47006005	garaafetethan , qashon , ixon kumida wocaman , daaburan , dhiskko dhayon , xooman ,
47006006	geeshshatethan , eratethan , dandda7an , keehatethan , Geeshsha Ayyaanan , tuma siiqon ,
47006007	tumaa haasayaninne Xoossaa wolqqan nuuni iya oosanchchota gideyssa bessida . Qassi xillotethay nuus tooranne gonddalle .
47006008	Nuuni bonchchettidanne tooshettida ; cayettidanne galatettida . Tumaa haasayos , shin asay nuna worddanchcho gidosona .
47006009	Nu asan erettida asi , shin erettonna asa mela gidida . Hayqqidosona yaagettida , shin paxa de7oos ; shocettida , shin hayqqibookko .
47006010	Nuuni azzanikkoka ubba wode ufayttoos . Nu manqo daanos , shin daro asaa dureyoos . Qassi aykkoyka baynna asi daanos , shin ubbay nubaa .
47006011	Qoronttoosa asaw , nu hinttew qonccen odida ; nu uluwaa hinttena bessida .
47006012	Hintte nuna hintte siiquwa bessonna diggidetappe attin nu nu siiquwa hinttena diggibookko .
47006013	Aawu ba naytas odeyssada ta hinttew odays ; nu hinttena nu uluwaa bessidayssada , hintteka hintte uluwaa nuna bessite .
47006014	Ammanonna asaara bessonna ogen waaxettofite . Xillotethasinne nagaras aybi gahetethi de7ii ? Poo7osinne dhumas aybi issifetethi de7ii ?
47006015	Kiristtoosanne Xalahe issife gathiyabay aybe ? Qassi ammaneysinne ammanonnayssi issife koxiyabay aybe ?
47006016	Xoossaa Keethas eeqatara aybi issifetethi de7ii ? Xoossay , “ Taani entta giddon de7ana , entta giddon hamuttana . Taani entta Xoossaa gidana ; enttika ta ase gidana ” “ Entta giddofe shaakettidi keyite ; tuna gididabaa bochchofite ; ta hinttena ekkana .
47006017	
47006018	Ta hinttew aawa gidana ; hintte taw adde naytanne macca nayta gidana ; yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqqaama Goday ” yaagis .
47007001	Hiza , ta siiqoto , ha ufayssay nuus de7iya gisho nu ashuwanne nu shemppuwa tunisiyabaa ubbaafe nuna geeshshoos . Xoossaas yayyidi nu geeshshatethaa polo oothoos .
47007002	Hintte uluwaa nuna bessite . Nuuni oonakka naaqqibookko ; oonakka qohibookko ; oonakka cimmibookko .
47007003	Taani hessa hintte bolla pirddanaw giikke . Hayssafe kase ta hinttew odidayssada , hintte nu wozanan de7eeta ; nu paxa de7inkka hayqqinkka hinttefe shaakettoko .
47007004	Ta odiyabaa hinttefe qottike ; ta hinttenan ceeqettays ; nu waaye ubban minettays ; qassi gita ufayssi ufayttays .
47007005	Nuuni Maqedooniya bida wode ubba baggara waayettidappe attin shemppibookko . Karera morkketan , nu gaathan yashshan un77ettida .
47007006	Shin azzanidayssata minthethiya Xoossay , Tito yuussan nuna minthethis .
47007007	Nuna minthethiday Tito yuussaa xalaala gidonnashin hintteka iya minthethidayssana . Hintte tana laamoteyssa , taw azzaneyssanne taw qoppeyssa ta si7ida wode tana daro ufayssis .
47007008	Ta dabddaabbey hinttena azzanthikokka ays xaafadinaashsha gada qiirottike . Ta qiirottiday ta xaafida dabddaabbey hinttena guutha wodes azzanthida gishossa .
47007009	Ha77i taani ufayttiday , ta hinttena azzanthida gisho gidonnashin hintte azzanoy hinttena hintte nagaraappe zaarida gishossa . Xoossay ba sheniyada hinttena azzanthisippe attin nu hinttena aybinkka qohibookko .
47007010	Xoossay koyaa azzanoy , atotethaakko gathiya nagaraappe simo ehees ; iyan qiiroyabay baawa . Shin ha sa7aa azzanoy hayqo ehees .
47007011	Hintte azzanoy hinttenan ayfisida ayfiyaa be7ite . He azzanoy hinttena ay mela denthethidaakko , ay mela zaaro immanaada giigisidaakko , he uraa bolla ay mela hanqisidaakko , ay mela taw yayyana mela oothidaakko , ay mela amoyidaakko , he uraa seeranaw ay mela giigidaakko be7ite . Ha ubbaban hintte geeshshi gideyssa markkayideta .
47007012	Hessa gisho , taani ha dabddaabbiya hinttew xaafiday , naaqqida uraa woykko naaqettida uraa gisho gidenna . Shin hintte nuus ay mela qoppiyako Xoossaa sinthan hinttee , hinttena be7ana mela xaafas .
47007013	Nuuni ufayttiday hessa gishossa . Nu ufayssaafe aadhdhidi nuna daro ufayssiday , hintte Tito ufayssidayssanne iya wozanaa shemppisidayssa .
47007014	Taani hinttena nashshada iyaw odin hintte tana yeellayibeekketa . Shin nuuni ubba wode hinttew tumaa odida ; hessadakka nuuni Tito sinthan hinttena nashshidayssi tuma gidis .
47007015	Hintte iyaw yashshan kokkoridi , iya mokkidayssa qassi iyaw ay mela kiitettidaakko I qoppiya wode hinttew de7iya siiqoy minnishe bis .
47007016	Taani ubbaban hinttenan ammanettiya gisho ufayttays .
47008001	Nu ishato , Xoossay Maqedooniyan de7iya woosa keethatas immida aadho keehatethaa hintte erana mela nu koyoos .
47008002	Entti gita meton paacettidosona , shin entta ufayssay wolqqaama . Entta manqotethaas zawi baawa , shin bantta imuwan daro keehidosona .
47008003	Entti bantta wolqqaa melanne bantta wolqqaafe aadhdheyssa dosidi immidayssas ta markka .
47008004	Entti Xoossaa asaa maaddiya lo77o ooso nuura oothanaw koyidi nuna daro woossidosona .
47008005	Entti nuuni qoppidayssafe aathidi oothidosona . Koyrottidi banttana Godaas immidosona ; kaallidi , Xoossaa sheniyada banttana nuus immidosona .
47008006	Ha lo77o oosuwa doommida Titoy gujji oothanaadanne hinttena maaddidi , he oosuwa polisanaada iya woossida .
47008007	Shin hintte ubbaban , ammanon , haasayan , eratethan , gita amon , nuna siiqoninne ubbaban durettidayssada ha lo77o oosuwankka hintte keeha gidana mela nu koyoos .
47008008	Taani hessa kiittanaw giikke . Shin harata gita amuwaa hintte siiquwara gatha be7ada hintte ay keena tumeekko eranaw gays .
47008009	Hintte nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethaa ereeta . Kiristtoosi dure gidi uttidi , hintte iya manqotethan duretanaada hintte gisho manqis .
47008010	Taani ha odan hinttena maaddiya zore zoranaw koyays . Hintte zillaythi immanaw xalaala gidonnashin hessa oothanaw amotethankka hintte koyro .
47008011	Hintte oothanaw doomida oosuwa ha77i polite . Hintte hinttew de7eyssa keena immiko , hessi hintte immanaw daro amotteyssa qonccisees .
47008012	Issi asi immanaw amottiko , iya imoy Xoossaa sinthan ekettey , I baw de7idayssa keena imminappe attin baynnabaappe immanaw un77ettin gidenna .
47008013	Taani hessa gey , hintte ubbay issi gina gidana melassafe attin harati waayappe shemppin hintte waayettana melassa gidenna .
47008014	Wode entta palahay hintte pacaa kunthana mela ha77i hintte palahay entta pacaa kuntho . Hessan hintte gina gidana .
47008015	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Daro shiishidayssas palahibeenna ; guutha shiishidayssas paccibeenna ” geetetti xaafettidayssa mela .
47008016	Nu hinttew qoppeyssada Titoykka hinttew qoppana mela oothida Xoossay galatetto .
47008017	Titoy hintteko biday , nu iya denthethida gisho xalaala gidonnashin I ba shenen baanaw amottida gishossa .
47008018	Wonggelaa markkatethan woosa keetha ubban daro erettida ishaa , nuuni Titora issife kiittoos .
47008019	Hessa bolla nuuni ha keeha imotaa efiya wode nuura baana mela ha lo77o oosuwan Godaa bonchchanawunne harata maaddanaw de7iya amuwa bessanaw I woosa keethatan doorettis .
47008020	Ha imettida keeha imuwa , nu ooso bolla peeshshiya wode borettonna mela naagettoos .
47008021	Nuuni Godaa sinthan xalaala gidonnashin asa sinthankka lo77o gididabaa oothoos .
47008022	Qassi daro wode paacen minnidi aadhdhida nu ishaa , enttara hintteko kiittida . I hinttenan keehi ammanettiya gisho ha77i hinttena maaddanaw daro amottees .
47008023	Titobaa eranaw koykko , I hinttena maaddanaw taara oothiya ta ooso laggiya . Hankko ishatabaa gidikko woosa keethati kiittidayssata ; qassi asay entta duussaa be7idi Kiristtoosa bonchchosona .
47008024	Hessa gisho , woosa keethati hintte siiquwanne nu hinttena nashsheyssi tuma gideyssa qonccisanaw hintte siiquwa ha asata bessite .
47009001	Ammaniya asaas kessiya miishiyabaa ta hinttew xaafanaw koshshenna .
47009002	Hintte maaddanaw keehi amotteyssa ta erays . Hintte Akkaya asay , zillaythafe doomidi maaddanaw giigettidayssa taani Maqedooniya asaas doona kunthada odas . Hintte gita amoykka enttafe darota denthethis .
47009003	Ha oosuwan hinttenan nu ceeqettiya ceeqoy hada gidonna mela koyro hinttebaa ta odidayssada hintte giigettidi naagana mela ha ishata hintteko kiittas .
47009004	Maqedooniya asay taara bidi , hintte giigettonna de7ishin , demmiko , nu hinttenan yeellatana ; qassi hintte nuuppe aadho yeellatana .
47009005	Hessa gisho , ha ishati taappe sinthattidi hintteko bidi , hintte immana gida imuwa kasetidi giigisana mela ta enttana kiittas . Taani gakkiya wode he imoy giigi uttees . He wode he keehatetha imoy wolqqan gidonnashin dosan gideyssa erisees .
47009006	Hayssa akeekite ; guuthu zeriday guuthu cakkana ; daro zeriday daro cakkana .
47009007	Xoossay ufayssan immiya uraa dosiya gisho wolqqan woykko dosi baynna gidonnashin issi issi asi ba wozanan qoppidayssada dosan immanaw bessees .
47009008	Ubba wode ubbaban koshshiyaba ubbaa demmidi lo77o ooso ubbaa oothanaw dandda7ana mela Xoossay hinttew ba anjjuwaa darssana .
47009009	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ I ba shaluwa manqotas laallis ; iya xillotethay merinaw de7ana ”
47009010	Zereyssas zerethi , maanaw kathi immiya Goday , hintte zeriya zerethaa darssidi immana . Hintte xillotethaa ayfiyaakka darssana .
47009011	Daro asay hintte immiya imuwa nuuppe ekkidi , Xoossaa galatanaada , hintte ubba wode darssidi immeyssata gidana mela Xoossay hinttena ubba baggara dureyana .
47009012	Ha hintte immiya imoy ammaniyaa asaa pacaa kuntho xalaala gidonnashin asay Xoossaa galatanaw gaaso gidees .
47009013	Ha hintte oosoy hintte ammanuwa ersidi Kiristtoosa Wonggelaa hintte ammanidinne iyaw kiitettidi hinttew de7iyabaa enttaranne haratara shaakettida gisho ubbay Xoossaa bonchchana .
47009014	Xoossay hinttew immida aadho keehatethaa gisho entti hinttew Xoossaa woossishe hinttena be7anaw laamotosona .
47009015	Zawi baynna Xoossaa imuwas Xoossay galatetto .
47010001	Ta hinttera de7iya wode shugo , qassi hinttefe haakkiya wode nu bolla minnees yaagettida , Phawuloosi , keehanne ashkke gidida Kiristtoosa sunthan hinttena woossays .
47010002	Taani hintteko biya wode nu asho qofara simerettiya asi oothidi qoppiya asaa bolla mino qaalan odettanaw qofa qachchas . Hintte bolla hessada odettana mela hintte tana oothonnaada hinttena woossays .
47010003	Nuuni ha sa7an de7ikkoka ha sa7aa asada olettoko .
47010004	Nu ola miishey ha sa7ayssa gidenna . Shin miixa laallanaw wolqqara de7iya Xoossaa toora . Tumaara eqettiya palamaanne ,
47010005	Xoossaa eronna mela diggiya otoro qofa ubbaa laalloos . Asa qofa ubbaa di77idi Kiristtoosas kiitettana mela oothoos .
47010006	Hintte kiitettethay polo gidiya wode nuuni kiitetetha ixo ubbaa seeranaw giigettana .
47010007	Hintte ayfey be7ida mela pirddeeta . Oonikka bana Kiristtoosabaa gidi qoppiyabaa gidikko , nukka Kiristtoosabaa gideyssa ero .
47010008	Goday taw immida maatan ceeqetikokka hessan yeellatikke . He maatay taw imettiday hinttena dichchanaassafe attin qohanaassa gidenna .
47010009	Taani ta dabddaabbiyan hinttena yashisanaw koyada xaafidabaa daanoppo .
47010010	Issi issi asay , “ Phawuloosa dabddaabbey deexonne wolqqaama , shin iya som77on be7iya wode I daaburanchcho ; iya odaykka pathenna ” yaagosona .
47010011	He asati nu haahon de7ishe xaafiya dabddaabbiyaninne matan hinttera de7ishe oothiya oosuwa giddon dummatethi baynnayssa akeeko .
47010012	Nuuni banttana nashshiya asatara nuna ginayanaw woykko gaaddeyanaw koyokko . Shin entti banttana banttara ginayidi woykko gaaddeyidi be7ishe eeya .
47010013	Shin nuuni Xoossay nuus immida dhassan ceeqettoosippe attin zawaa pinnidi ceeqettoko ; he zaway hinttekokka gakkees .
47010014	Nuuni besseyssafe aathidi ceeqettoko , shin Kiristtoosa Wonggelaa hintteko gathidayssan ceeqettoos .
47010015	Nuuni Xoossay essida zawappe pinnidi , harati oothida ooson ceeqettoko . Gidoshin , hintte ammanoy diccana mela Xoossay immida zawan hintte giddon nu oothiya oosoy dalggana gidi qoppoos .
47010016	Nuuni hara asi ba zawan oothida ooson gelidi ceeqettoko , shin hinttefe pinnidi haratas Wonggelaa markkattanaw dandda7os .
47010017	Shin , Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Ceeqqiya ubbay Godaa lo77otethan ceeqqo ” yaagidi xaafettis .
47010018	Goday nashshiya uraappe attin bana baw nashshiya uray nashettenna .
47011001	Ta guutha eeyatethaa hintte ha77ika dandda7ana gada qoppays ; hayyana dandda7ite .
47011002	Xoossay hinttew qoppidaysssada , takka hinttew qoppays . Taani hinttena geeshsha geela7ida issi addiya , Kiristtoosas immanaw oychcha wothas .
47011003	Shin shooshay ba geniyan Hewaanno balethidayssada ooni eri hintte wozanay iitidi Kiristtoosas de7iya hintte suuretethaanne geeshshatethaa agganddetii gada hirggays .
47011004	Issi asi yidi , nuuni hinttew markkattida Yesuusappe hara Yesuusa hinttew markkatiko , woykko hintte ekkida Ayyaanaappenne Wonggelaappe hara ayyaananne Wonggelaa hinttew odikko , si77i gidi ekkeeta .
47011005	Shin taani Yesuus kiittida “ Gita hawaaretappe ” guuxays gada qoppike .
47011006	Taani oda eronna asi gidikkoka , eratethi taw de7ees . Hessa ta hinttew daro ogen qonccisas .
47011007	Taani miishe oychchonna Xoossaa Wonggelaa hinttew coo odidaysinne hinttena dhoqqu oothada tana toochchidayssi taw nagara gidi ?
47011008	Taani hinttew oothanaw hara woosa keethatappe miishe bonqqa ekkas .
47011009	Ta hinttera de7iya wode tana metinkka hinttefe issi asikka waaysabiikke . Maqedooniyappe yida ammaneyssati tana koshshiyaba ubban maaddidosona . Hachchi gakkanaw ta hinttew tooho gidabiikke sinthaskka tooho gidikke .
47011010	Kiristtoosa tumatethay tanan de7ishin , ta ceequwa Akkaya biittan tana oonikka diggenna .
47011011	Ta hayssa ays gaynaa ? Hinttena dosonna gishosseyye ? Taani hinttena doseyssa Xoossay erees .
47011012	“ Nukka hintte mela oothoos ” yaagidi ceeqqiya hankko hawaareta ceequwa gaasuwa dhayssanaw ha77i ta ootheyssa sinthaskka oothana .
47011013	Hayssa mela asati Kiristtoosa hawaare daananaw banttana laammiya worddanchcho hawaaretanne cimmiya oosanchchota .
47011014	Hessi malaalisiyabaa gidenna ; ays giikko , Xalahey poo7o kiitanchcho daananaw bana laammees .
47011015	Hessa gisho , Xalahe oosanchchoti xillotethaa oosanchchota daananaw banttana laammiko hessi gitabaa gidenna . Entti wurssethan bantta oosuwada ekkana .
47011016	Oonikka tana eeya gidi qopponna mela zaaradakka odays . Ta hinttew eeya daanikkoka ta guuthara ceeqettana mela tana eeya oothidi ekkite .
47011017	Taani hayssada ceeqettada odettey , Goday koyeyssada gidonnashin eeyatethan odays .
47011018	Daro asay ha sa7aaban ceeqettiya gisho takka ceeqettana .
47011019	Hintte wozanaama gidiya gisho eeya asabaa ufayssan dandda7eeta .
47011020	Oonikka hinttena aylleykko woykko hinttena bonqiko woykko baw maadettanaw hintteko shiiqikko woykko hintte bolla otortiko woykko hinttena baqqiko hintte dandda7eeta .
47011021	Nuuni hessa oothanaw daro daaburanchcho gideyssa yeellatashe ta odays . Shin oonikka minnidi ceeqqettiko , takka ceeqqettanaw minnays . Taani hessa eeya asada odettays .
47011022	Entti Ibraawe ? Takka Ibraawe . Entti Isra7eele ? Takka Isra7eele . Entti Abrahame sheeshee ? Takka Abrahame sheeshi .
47011023	Entti Kiristtoosa oosanachcho ? Taani gooshsha asada odays , enttafe aadhdhiya Kiristtoosa oosanchcho . Taani ooson daro daaburas ; daro wode qashettas ; garaafettas ; daro wode hayqoppe attas .
47011024	Ayhudeti tana hasttamanne uddufuna ichchashu toho garaafidosona .
47011025	Heedzu toho xam77an shocettas ; issi toho shuchchan cadettas ; markkabey heedzu toho me77is ; abbaa giddon issi qamma kumethi aqada pee7as .
47011026	Taani daro ogiya daaburan hamuttas . Kixa haathafenne panggafe attas . Ayhudetinne Ayhude gidonna asay ta bolla meto gathidosona . Katamay , bazzoy , abbay , tana yashshis ; ammaniyaa daaniya asati tana waaysidosona .
47011027	Taani ooson daaburasinne cawattas , daro toho dhiskko dhayas , koshattas , saamottas , daro toho xoomas , meegettas , kallottas .
47011028	Haraba ubbaa taybonna ubba wode tana qofisey woosa keethatabaa .
47011029	Issi asi daaburiya wode iyara ta daaburabiikinna ? Issi asi nagaran dhubettiya wode ta awude qiirottonna aggadina ?
47011030	Ta ceeqettanaw koshshiyabaa gidikko taani daaburanchcho gideyssa erisiyaban ceeqettana .
47011031	Merinaw bonchchettida Xoossay , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Aaway , ta worddotonnayssa erees .
47011032	Damasqqo kataman Aretaasa giya kawuwappe garssara haareyssi tana oythanaw koyidi Damasqqo katamaa penggiya naagisis .
47011033	Shin asay tana daachchon yeggidi , katamaa dirssaa maskkootiyara wodhisin taani iya kushiyappe attas .
47012001	Ceeqetethas go77i baynnayssa erays . Shin ceeqettanaw koshshiko , Godaappe ekkida qonccethan ceeqqana .
47012002	Tammanne oyddu laythafe kase , Kiristtoosa ammaniyaa issi uray heedzantho saluwa bidayssa ta erays . He uray ashon woykko ashoppe karera bidaakko ta erikke ; Xoossay erees .
47012003	He uray heedzantho saluwa ekettidayssa erays . Shin I ashon woykko ashoppe karera ekettidaakko ta erikke ; Xoossay erees .
47012004	He uray gannate ekettidi asi qonccisanawunne asi odanaw dandda7onnabaa si7is .
47012005	Taani he addiyaban ceeqettana , shin taani ta daaburaappe attin tanan ceeqettiyabay baawa .
47012006	Taani tumaa odettiya gisho ceeqettanaw koykkoka eeya gidikke . Shin asi ta ootheyssa be7eyssafenne si7eyssafe aathidi qoppona mela gada ceeqetethi aggays .
47012007	Taw qonccida gita qonccethan ta otorttonna mela tana waaysanaw ta ashuwan caddiya Xalahiya kiitanchchoy taw imettis .
47012008	Ha waaysiyaba taappe diggana mela taani Godaa heedzu toho woossas .
47012009	Shin Goday , “ Ta wolqqay ne daaburan qoncciya gisho ta aadho keehatethay new gidana ” yaagis . Kiristtoosa wolqqay tanan qonccana mela ta daaburan ufayttashe ceeqettays .
47012010	Taani Kiristtoosa gisho daaburiya wode cayettiya wode waayettiya wode goodettiya wode metootiya wode ta daaburan ufayttays . Ays giikko , ta daaburiya wode he wode minnays .
47012011	Taani eeya asada ceeqettas . Hessada ta ceeqettana mela oothiday hinttena . Ta , ta huu7en erettonna asi gidikkoka , “ Gita hawaareta ” geetetteyssatappe guuxike . Hessa taw markkattanaw bessey hinttenashin .
47012012	Ta hintte giddon de7ashe dandda7an oothida malaatatinne mallati ta tuma hawaare gideyssa bessosona .
47012013	Ta hinttew tooho gidonnayssafe attin hara woosa keethatappe hintte aybin guuxidetii ? Hessi bala gidikko tana maarite .
47012014	Taani hintteko baanaw giigettishin hayssi taw heedzantho . Ta hinttenappe attin hinttew de7iyabaa koyonna gisho hinttena waaysanaw koyikke . Yelidayssati bantta naytas shalo minjjoosonappe attin nayti banttana yelidayssatas shalo minjjokona .
47012015	Ta hintte gisho taw de7iyabaanne tana aatha imminkka tana ufayssees . Yaatin , taani hinttena hessada keeha siiqiya wode hintte tana guuthara siiqetii ?
47012016	Gidikkoka , ta hinttew tooho gidikke ; waaysabiikke ; shin hinttena cimoninne genen oykkidabaa hinttew daanonna aggenna .
47012017	Hari attoshin , ta hintteko kiittida asatappe hinttena cimmida asi de7ii ?
47012018	Titoy hintteko baana mela taani woossas ; qassi ammaniyaa ishaakka iyara yeddas . Yaatin , Titoy hinttena cimmide ? Nuuni nu oosuwa issi ayyaanan oothibookko ? Qassi nu hanoykka issino gidennee ?
47012019	Nu ubba wode hintte sinthan nuna xillisanaw mootettiyabaa hinttew daanii ? Nu Kiristtoosan de7idi Xoossaa sinthan ha77i gakkanaw odoos . Nu siiqo ishato , nu ha ubbaa oothey hinttena dichchanaassa .
47012020	Ta hintteko biya wode ooni eri hintte ta koyeyssada hanonna , qassi takka hintte koyeyssada hanonna gahettonna aggoko gada yayyays . Qassi ooni eri hintte giddon palami , qanaatey , hanqoy , yiiqey , zigirssi , asa sunthu iisoy , otoroynne kachchi doonna aggenna gada yayyays .
47012021	Taani nam77antho hintteko biya wode Xoossay hintte sinthan tana kawushshana gada yayyays . Kase nagara oothidi he bantta oothida tunatethaafe , laymatethafenne yeellayaa oosuwappe simmiboonna asata be7ada azzanonna aggike gada yayyays .
47013001	Ta hintteko bishin hayssi heedzantho . Ay mootoykka nam77u woykko heedzu markkan minnees .
47013002	Taani nam77antho hinttera gahettida wode hintte giddon kase nagara oothida uraanne harata ubbaa seeronna aggike gada oda wothas . Ha77i ta haakkada de7ikkoka simmada hintteko biya wode ooddeskka qadhettike .
47013003	Tanan de7idi odey Kiristtoosa gideyssa hintte eranaw koyeeta . I hinttera haasayaa wode wolqqaamappe attin hintte giddon daaburanchcho gidenna .
47013004	Kiristtoosi masqaliya bolla daaburan kaqettis , shin Xoossaa wolqqan de7on de7ees . I daaburanchcho gididayssada , nukka daaburanchcho . Shin hinttena haggaazanaw Xoossaa wolqqan iyara de7on daana .
47013005	Ammanon minnidi de7iyakko hinttena hinttew paaci be7ite . Paacen hintte kunddonna attiko , Kiristtoosi hinttenan de7eyssa hintte ereeta . Shin Kiristtoosi hinttenan doonna ixxiko hintte kunddeeta .
47013006	Nuuni paacen kunddonayssa hintte ereeta gada ammanays .
47013007	Hintte iitabaa oothonna mela nuuni Xoossaa woossos . Nuuni mino gideyssa asay be7ana mela gidonnashin nuuni mino gidonna ixxikokka , hintte lo77o oothana mela nuuni woossos .
47013008	Nuuni tumaas oothoosippe attin tumaara eqettiyabaa aybaakka oothoko .
47013009	Nu daaburiya wode hintte qassi minniya wode nuna ufayssees . Hintte borey baynnayssata gidana mela nu hinttew Xoossaa woossos .
47013010	Taani hinttefe haakkada de7ashe xaafiday hessa gishossa . Taani hintteko biya wode Goday taw immida maatan zemppada hintte bolla godattanaw koyikke . Goday taw maata immiday , hinttena maaddanaassafe attin qohanaassa gidenna .
47013011	Wurssethan ta ishato , saro de7ite . Borey baynna de7ite ; ta zoriya si7ite . Issi wozanan gididi de7ite ; sarotethan de7ite . Siiqonne saro immiya Xoossay hinttera gido .
47013012	Geeshsha yeeretethi yeerettishe , issoy issuwa sarothite .
47013013	Xoossaa asa ubbay hinttena saro saro yaagosona .
47013014	Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethay , Xoossaa siiqoy , Geeshsha Ayyaana issifetethay hintte ubbaara gido .
48001001	Asappe woykko asa baggara gidonnashin Yesuus Kiristtoosappenne iya hayqoppe denthida Xoossaa Aawappe hawaare gidana mela kiitettida ta Phawuloosi ,
48001002	taara de7iya ammaniyaa ishati ubbay , Galaatiyan de7iya woosa keethatas kiittida kiitaa .
48001003	Xoossay nu Aawaynne nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosi hinttew aadho keehatethaanne sarotethaa immo .
48001004	Ha iita wodiyappe nuna ashshanaw , nu Xoossaa , nu Aawa shenen Kiristtoosi nu nagara gisho bana aathi immis .
48001005	Xoossaas Merinaappe merinaa gakkanaw bonchchoy gido . Amin77i .
48001006	Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethan hinttena xeegida Xoossaa aggidi , hara Wonggelaakko , hintte ellesidi , waanidi simmidaakko tana malaalisees .
48001007	Hinttena balethanawunne Kiristtoosa Wonggelaa wobbisanw koyaa guutha asati de7oosonappe attin tuma Wonggelay issino .
48001008	Shin nuna gidin woykko salo kiitanchcho gidin nuuni hinttew koyro odida Wonggelaappe dummattiya hara Wonggelaa hinttew odiyabaa gidikko , I qanggettidabaa gido .
48001009	Hayssafe sinthe nuuni gidayssada ha77ika zaarada gays . Hintte ekkida Wonggelaappe dummattiya Wonggelaa oonikka hinttew odikko he uray qanggettidabaa gido .
48001010	Yaatin , tana asi nashshana mela koyaynayye ? Woykko Xoossi nashshana mela koyaynaa ? Woykko ta ase ufayssanaw koyaynaa ? Ta ase ufayssanaw koyabaa gidikko , Kiristtoosa aylle gidikke .
48001011	Ta ishato , ta hinttew odida Wonggelay asappe gidonnayssa hintte erana mela ta koyays .
48001012	Taw ha Wonggelaa Yesuusi Kiristtoosi qonccisisippe attin asappe ekkabiikke woykko asi tana tamaarssibeenna .
48001013	Ta kase Ayhude ammanon de7iya wode waana de7idaakko , hintte si7ideta . Ta woosa keethaa qadhey baynna gooddanawunne dhayssanaw baaxetas .
48001014	Ayhude ammano naagon , ta woden de7iya Ayhude ishatappe aadhdhays . Nu aawata wogaaskka aadhdhada mishettays .
48001015	Shin ta buroo ta aaye ulon de7ishin Xoossay tana dooris ; ba aadho keehatethan tana xeegis .
48001016	Ayhude gidonna asaas Wonggelaa odana mela Xoossay ba Na7aa taw qonccisida wode ta oodderakka zorettabiikke .
48001017	Woykko taappe sinthe hawaare gididayssatara gahettanaw Yerusalaame babiikke . Shin ta kasetada Arabe biittaa bas ; hessafe simmada Damasqqo katamaa yas .
48001018	Heedzu laythafe guye , Phexiroosara gahettanaw Yerusalaame bada iyara tammanne ichchashu gallas uttas .
48001019	Shin Godaa ishaa Yayqoobappe attin hankko hawaareta be7abiikke .
48001020	Ta hinttew xaafiydayssi worddo gidonnayssa Xoossaa sinthan hinttew qonccisays .
48001021	Hessafe guye , taani Sooriya biittaanne Kilqiya biittaa bas .
48001022	Yihudan de7iya woosa keethaa asay tana be7idi eribookkona .
48001023	Shin entti , “ Kase nuna gooddiya uray , ha77i he I dhayssanaw koyaa ammanuwabaa sabbakees ” yaageyssa si7idosona .
48001024	Si7ida ubbay ta gaason Xoossaa galatidosona .
48002001	Tammanne oyddu laythafe guye , Barnnabaasara zaarada Yerusalaame bas . He wode Tito taara ekkada bas .
48002002	Xoossay taw qonccisida qonccethan yaa bada Ayhude gidonna asaa giddon ta sabbakiya Wonggelaa enttaw qonccisas . Kase ta woxxida wothaynne ha77ika ta woxxiya wothay hada gidonna mela gada kaaletheyssata dumma shiishada enttaw odas .
48002003	Hari attoshin , taara de7iya Titoy Girike asi gidikkoka , qaxxaretto gidi un77ethibookkona .
48002004	Gidoshin , ammaniyaa ishata daanidi nu giddo gelida issoti issoti I qaxxarettana mela koyidosona . He asati Kiristtoos Yesuusan nuus de7iya la77atethaa wochchidi be7anaw geeman nu giddo gelidi zaaridi nuna aylle oothanaw koyoosona .
48002005	Shin tuma Wonggelay hinttenan minnidi daana mela nuuni hari attoshin , guutha wodeskka enttaw kushe immibookko .
48002006	Shin halaqa daaniya asata oonatethay taw aykkoka gidenna . Xoossay asa som77o be7idi pirddenna . Ha asati ta markkattiya Wonggelaa bolla gujjidabay baawa .
48002007	Shin Phexiroosi , Ayhudetas Wonggelaa odana mela Xoossay iyaw hadara immidayssada tawukka Ayhude gidonna asaas Wonggelaa odiya hadaraa immidayssa entti guyeppe be7idosona .
48002008	Hiza , Phexiroosi Ayhudeta hawaare gidana mela oothida Xoossay , takka Ayhude gidonna asaas hawaare gidana mela oothis .
48002009	Qassi tuussu daanidi benttiya Yayqoobi , Phexiroosinne Yohaannisi , taw imettida aadho keehatethaa be7ida wode nuura issifidayssa qonccisanaw ta kushiyanne Barnnabaasa kushiya oykkidosona . Nuuni Ayhude gidonna asaakko , qassi entti Ayhude asaakko baanaw giigidosona .
48002010	Entti nuna minthidi hadara giday , nuuni manqotas qoppanayssa . Kasekka ta hessa oothanaw amotteys .
48002011	Phexiroosi Anxookiya katamaa yida wode I balida gisho taani iya som77on “ Neeni baladasa ” gas .
48002012	Yayqoobi kiittida guutha asay yaanappe sinthe I Ayhude gidonna asaara mees , shin entti yidaappe guye , “ Ayhude gidonna asaappe ammanidayssati qaxxarettanaw bessees ” giya asaas yayyidi enttafe shaakettis .
48002013	Qassi hankko ammanida Ayhudeti Phexiroosa hanuwa kaallidosona . Hari attoshin , Barnnabaasikka iya qofan gooshettis .
48002014	Shin entti Wonggelaa tumatethan suure hamuttonnayssa be7ada , Phexiroosa asa ubbaa sinthan , “ Neeni Ayhude gidashe , Ayhude wogaatho gidonnashin Ayhude gidonna asada de7aasa ; yaatin , waanada Ayhude gidonnayssata , ‘ Ayhude wogan de7ite gada wolqqatay ? ’ ” yaagas .
48002015	Nuuni yeletan Ayhude , shin nagaranchcho gidida Ayhude gidonna asaa mela gidokko .
48002016	Shin asi Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammanidi xilleesippe attin higge naagidi xillonnayssa eroos . Oonikka higge naagidi xillonna gisho nukka higge naagidi gidonnashin Kiristtoosan ammanidi xillana mela Kiristtoos Yesuusa ammanida .
48002017	Nu Ayhudetikka Kiristtoosa baggara xillanaw koshshees . Hessa gidikko nukka hara asada nagaranchcho gideyssa be7oos . Yaatin , nu nagara oothana mela denthethey Kiristtoosa guusseyye ? Ubbaka gidenna !
48002018	Hiza , ta laallidayssa zaarada keexiyabaa gidikko taani ta huu7en higge mentheyssa gideyssa qonccisays .
48002019	Taani Xoossaas daana mela higge baggara higges hayqqas .
48002020	Taani Kiristtoosara masqaliya bolla kaqettas . Taani hizappe taw de7ikke , shin Kiristtoosi tanan de7ees . Ta ha77i de7iya de7uwa , tana dosidi ta gisho bana aathi immida Xoossaa Na7aa ammanada de7ays .
48002021	Taani Xoossaa aadho keehatethaa hada oothike . Xillotethi asas higge baggara benttiyabaa gidiyakko , Kiristtoosi coo hayqqis guussu .
48003001	Hinttenoo , akeeki baynna Galaatiya asaw , hintte ayfiyaa sinthan Kiristtoosi masqale bolla kaqettida misileda qonccidi benttees . Yaatin , tumaas hintte kiitettonna mela hinttena bitiday oonee ?
48003002	Ta issibaa eranaw koyays ; hintte Geeshsha Ayyaana ekkiday higge naagidiyye woykko hintte si7ida Wonggelaa ammanidi ekkideti ?
48003003	Hintte hessa mela eeye ? Hintte Xoossaa Ayyaanan doomidi , ha77i wolqqan polanaw koyeetii ?
48003004	Hintte Wonggelaa gaason daro waayettiday melee ? He waaye ubbay coo gididee ?
48003005	Xoossay hinttew Geeshsha Ayyaana immeynne hintte giddon malaatata oothey , hintte higge naagida gishoyye woykko Wonggelaa si7idi ammanida gisho ?
48003006	Ane Abrahame be7ite , “ I Xoossaa ammanis ; Xoossay iyaw hessa xillotethi oothidi ekkis ” geetettidi xaafettis .
48003007	Hiza , ammaneyssati Abrahame nayta gideyssa erite .
48003008	Xoossay Ayhude gidonna asaa ammanon xillisanayssa Geeshsha Maxaafay be7idi , “ Kawotetha ubbay nenan anjjettana ” yaagidi , Wonggelaa Abrahames kasetidi odis .
48003009	Hessa gisho , ammaniyaa ubbay ammanida Abrahamera issife anjjettidosona .
48003010	Higge naagidi xillana giya oonikka qanggettidayssa . Ays giikko , Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Higge maxaafan xaafettida ubbaa naagonna oonikka qanggettidayssa gido ” geetettidi xaafettis .
48003011	“ Xilloy ammanon daana ” geetettidi xaafettida gisho oonikka Xoossaa sinthan higge naagidi xillonnayssi erettidabaa .
48003012	Higgey ammanon zemppenna . Shin , “ Higgiya naagiya oonikka higgiyan de7on daana ” yaagees .
48003013	“ Mitha bolla kaqettidi hayqqiya oonikka qanggettidayssa ” geetetti xaafettida gisho Kiristtoosi nu gisho qanggettidayssa gididi , nuna higge qanggethafe wozis .
48003014	Xoossay Abrahames immida anjjoy , Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara Ayhude gidonna asaa gakkana melanne Xoossay immana gida Geeshsha Ayyaana nuuni ammanon ekkana mela hessa oothis .
48003015	Ta ishato , ta hinttew asa de7on meeze gididi de7iyabaa leemiso oothada odays . Asi caaqqida caaqoy minnidaappe guye , oonikka he caaquwa shaaranaw woykko iya bolla haraa gujjanaw dandda7enna .
48003016	Xoossay he keeke qaalaa Abrahamesinne iya zerethaas immis . Geeshsha Maxaafay , daro asas odiyada , “ Ne zerethatas ” geenna . Shin issi asas odiyada , “ Ne zerethaas ” yaagees ; ikka Kiristtoosa .
48003017	Taani gey hayssa ; oyddu xeetanne hasttamu laythafe guye imettida higgey , koyro Xoossay minthida caaquwa shaaridi ufayssa qaala dhayssanaw dandda7enna .
48003018	Xoossay immiya laatay higgen ekettiyabaa gidiyakko Xoossay immida ufayssaa baggara gideyssi attees . Shin Xoossay ba aadho keehatethan laata Abrahames ufayssa qaala baggara immis .
48003019	Yaatin , higgey ays imettidee ? Higgey imettiday , Abrahames ufayssa qaali imettida zerethay yaana gakkanaw iita oosoy aybeekko erisanaassa . Higgey kiitanchchota baggara imettidi , giddo gididi sigethiya issi asa baggara ooso bolla pee7is .
48003020	Giddo gididi sigethiya uray issi asa xalaalas gidenna , shin Xoossay issino .
48003021	Yaatin , higgey Xoossaa ufayssa qaalara eqettiyye ? Akkay , gidenna ! Higgey imettiday asas de7o immanaw gidiyakko , xillotethi higge baggara benttanashin .
48003022	Shin Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammanin benttiya ufayssa qaalay ammaneyssatas imettana mela kumetha alamey nagaras haarettidi de7eyssa Geeshsha Maxaafay odees .
48003023	Shin ammanoy yaanappe kase higgey nuna qachchi wothis . He ammanoy qonccana gakkanaw higgey nu bolla gorddi wothis .
48003024	Hessa gisho , nuuni ammanon xillana mela Kiristtoosi yaana gakkanaw higgey na7a naagiya asa mela nuna naageyssa gidis .
48003025	Shin ha77i ammanoy yida gisho higgey hizappe guye na7a naagiya asa mela nuna naageyssi attis .
48003026	Hintte ubbay Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammanidi Xoossaa nayta gidideta .
48003027	Kiristtoosara issino gidanaw xammaqettida ubbay Kiristtoosa ma7oda ma77ideta .
48003028	Hintte ubbay Kiristtoosan issino gidiya gisho Ayhude asaa giddoninne Girike asaa giddon , aylle giddoninne womaanno giddon , adde giddoninne maccasa giddon dummatethi baawa .
48003029	Hiza , hintte Kiristtoosabaa gidikko hintte Abrahame zare . Xoossaa ufayssa qaalada hintte laatteyssata .
48004001	Ta geyssi hayssa . Laattey na7aa gidi de7ishe , shalo ubbay iyabaa gidikkoka , I ayllefe aykkoka dummatenna .
48004002	Shin iya aaway gida wodey gakkanaw I hadara ekkidayssata kusheninne naageyssata kushen de7ees .
48004003	Hessadakka , nuuni na7atethan de7iya wode alamiya wogaas ayllettidi de7ida .
48004004	Shin wodey gakkida wode Xoossay higgefe garssan , maccasappe yelettida ba na7aa kiittis .
48004005	I hessa oothiday , higges haarettidi de7eyssata wozanawunne nuna ba nayta oothanaassa .
48004006	Nu Xoossaa nayta gidiya gisho “ Abbaa , Aawaw ” gidi xeegiya ba Na7aa Ayyaana nu wozanaa giddo kiittis .
48004007	Hessa gisho , hizappe neeni Xoossaa na7appe attin aylle gidakka . Neeni iya na7a gidikko , Xoossaa laatteyssa gidadasa .
48004008	Hintte kase Xoossaa eronna wode xoosse gidonnayssatas aylle gididi haarettideta .
48004009	Shin ha77i hintte Xoossaa erideta ; ubbarakka Xoossan erettideta . Yaatin pathonnanne go77onna alame wogatakko guye waanidi simmeetii ? Wodhdhi eqqidi , waanidi enttaw aylle gidanaw koyeetii ?
48004010	Dumma gidida gallasata , ageenata , wodetanne laythata hintte loythi bonchcheta .
48004011	Tana hinttebay yashshees ; ta hinttew coo daaburadinaashsha ?
48004012	Ta ishato , ta hintteda hanida gisho hintteka taada hanite gada hinttena woossays . Hintte tana aybinkka qohibeekketa .
48004013	Taani koyro harggettashe hinttew Wonggelaa odidayssa hintte ereeta .
48004014	Ta harggey hinttew paace gidikkoka , tana saletibekketa ; ixxibeeketa . Shin tana Xoossaa kiitanchcho woykko Kiristtoos Yesuusa mokkeyssada mokkideta .
48004015	Yaatin , he hinttew de7iya ufayssay ubbay aw bidee ? Hinttew dandda7ettidaakko , hintte taw , hintte ayfiyaa kessidi immiyako ixxonnayssa ta markkattays .
48004016	Yaatin , ta hinttew tuma odida gisho hinttew morkke gidadinaayye ?
48004017	He asati hinttena banttako zaaranaw koyoosona , shin entta qofay lo77ossa gidenna . Entta qofay hinttena shaakkanaassanne hintte enttaw qoppana mela oothanaassa .
48004018	Lo77obaa oothanaw amottiko lo77o , shin hessi ta hinttera de7iya wode xalaala gidonnashin ubba wode gido .
48004019	Ta siiqo nayto , Kiristtoosi hinttenan misilettana gakkanaw yelos maccasi miixotteyssada ta hintte gisho miixottays .
48004020	Hinttebay taw haddirssi gidin ta un77ettas ; ha77i hintte giddon ta benttada shenetada odiyakko ay mela dosaynashin .
48004021	Muse higgen haarettidi daanaw koyeyssato , ane taw odite ; higgey ay giyakko erekketii ?
48004022	Geeshsha Maxaafay , “ Abrahames ayllefenne godattefe yelettida nam77u nayti de7oosona ” yaagees .
48004023	Aylle na7ay asi na7a yeliya maaran yelettis , shin godatte na7ay Xoossaa ufayssa qaalan yelettis .
48004024	Ha maccasati nam77u caaqotas leemiso gididi ekettoosona . Enttafe issinniya , Siina Deriyappe yidaara , ba nayta aylletethas yelasu ; iyakka Aggaaro .
48004025	Aggaara Arabe biittan de7iya Siina Deriyan leemisettada ha77i de7iya Yerusalaame daanawusu . Ays giikko , iya ba naytara aylletethan de7awusu .
48004026	Shin salon de7iya Yerusalaamey aylletethan de7ukku ; iya nu ubbaas aayo .
48004027	Geeshsha Maxaafay , “ Naatte , yelonna maynthete ufaytta ; naatte miixotta eronnaree ilila . Azinara de7iya maccaseeppe , azini baynna maccasees nayti daro ” yaagees .
48004028	Ta ishato , hintte Yisaaqada Xoossaa ufayssa qaalan yelettida nayta .
48004029	Shin he wode asa maarada yelettidayssi , Ayyaana wolqqan yelettidayssa goodis . Hachchika hessa mela .
48004030	Shin Geeshsha Maxaafay woygi ? “ Aylle na7ay godatte na7aara issife laattonna gisho aylliw I na7aara wolla kessa yedda ” yaagees .
48004031	Hessa gisho , ta ishato , nuuni godattee naytappe attin ayllee nayta gidokko .
48005001	Nuuni la77atethan daana mela Kiristtoosi nuna aylletethaafe kessis . Hiza , minnidi eqqite ; zaaridi aylletetha qambbaran geloppite .
48005002	Ta , Phawuloosi , geyssa si7ite . Hintte qaxxarettanaw koykko , Kiristtoosi hinttena aykkoka maaddenna .
48005003	Qaxxarettiya oonikka higgey kiittiya ubbaa polanaw besseyssa gujjada ta odays .
48005004	Higge naagidi xillanaw koyeyssato , Kiristtoosappe shaakettideta ; Xoossaa aadho keehatethaafe kunddideta .
48005005	Shin nuuni Xoossaa Ayyaana baggara ammanon xillanaw ufayssan naagoos .
48005006	Hiza , Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7ikko , siiqon qoncciya ammanoppe attin qaxxarettin , qaxxarettonna aggin nuna aykkoka maaddenna .
48005007	Kase hintte lo77o woxxeeta , shin ha77i tumaas kiitettonna mela hinttena diggiday oonee ?
48005008	Hayssa mela iita cimoy hinttena xeegida Xoossaafe yibeenna .
48005009	Hessika , “ Guutha irshshoy munuqa ubbaa denthees . ” geetettidi xaafettidayssa mela .
48005010	Hinttew hara qofi baynnayssas ta Godan ammanettays . Shin hinttena buqiya oonikka Xoossafe ba pirddaa ekkana .
48005011	Ta ishato , ta ha77i gakkanaw qaxxaro sabbakkiyabaa gidikko , yaatin tana ays gooddonaa ? Hessi tuma gidiyakko Kiristtoosa masqaliyabaa tamaarssoy asaas dhube gidennashin .
48005012	Hinttena buqeyssati qaxxaretetha xalaala gidonnashin banttana qaaratiyakkoka ta dosays .
48005013	Ta ishato , hintte la77a daanaw xeegettideta . Gidoshin , hintte la77atethay asho amo polanaw hinttew gaaso gidoppo ; hessafe aathidi issoy issuwa siiqon maaddite .
48005014	Higge ubbay , “ Ase needa dosa ” yaagiya issi qaalan qashettis .
48005015	Shin hintte issoy issuwara saxetiyabaanne meetettiyabaa gidikko , hintte woli wurssonna mela naagettite .
48005016	Hiza , ta hinttew odays ; Ayyaanan de7ite ; hintte asho amuwaa poloppite .
48005017	Asho amoy Ayyaana amuwaara morkke ; qassi Ayyaana amoykka asho amuwaara morkke . Entti issoy issuwara ixettiya gisho hintte dosiyabaa oothanaw dandda7ekketa .
48005018	Shin Ayyaanay hinttena kaalethiyabaa gidikko higgey hinttena haarenna .
48005019	Asho oosoti erettidayssata ; enttika , laymatethi , tunatethi , qayxe ,
48005020	eeqa goynno , bita , morkketethi , kachchi , qanaate , hanqo , bana doso , shaaketethi , iita tobbe
48005021	gene , matho , yethinne hessa hessa melata . Kase ta hinttew odidayssada ha77ika ta hinttew odays . Hayssa melabata ootheyssati Xoossaa kawotethaa laattokona .
48005022	Shin Ayyaana ayfey , siiqo , ufayssi , sarotethi , dandda7a , keehatethi , lo77otethi , ammano ,
48005023	ashkketethi , bana haaro . Hayssa melabata ixxiya higgey baawa .
48005024	Kiristtoos Yesuusabaa gididayssati bantta ashuwa iya iita qofaranne iya amuwaara issife masqaliya bolla kaqqidosona .
48005025	Nu Ayyaanan de7iyabaa gidikko , nuna Ayyaanay kaaletho .
48005026	Ane issoy issuwa yiloyishenne qanaatishe coo ceeqetteyssa aggoos .
48006001	Ta ishato , issi asi nagaran kunddiko , Ayyaanan de7iya hintte he uraa ashkketethan suurisite . Shin neeni hessa melaban paacettonna mela nena naaga .
48006002	Issoy issuwa deexo toohuwa tookkite . Yaatikko Kiristtoosa higgiya poleeta .
48006003	Issi asi aykkoyka baawashin , bana haratappe lo77o gidi qoppiko , I bana cimmees .
48006004	Shin issi issi asi ba oosuwa paacco . Hessafe guye , haratara bana gaaddeyeyssa aggidi baw ceeqettiyabaa demmees .
48006005	Issi issi asi ba toohuwa baw tookkanaw bessees .
48006006	Xoossaa qaala tamaariya oonikka lo77obaa ubbaa ba asttamaariyara shaakettees .
48006007	Hinttee , hinttena cimmofite . Asi ba zeridabaa zaaridi cakkiya gisho Xoossaa bolla qelqisoppite .
48006008	Ba asho amuwaa kunthanaw zeriya oonikka , ba asho amuwaappe hayqo buuccana . Shin Ayyaanaa ufayssanaw zeriya oonikka Ayyaanaappe merinaa de7o cakkana .
48006009	Ane lo77o ooso oothanaw azalleyssa aggoos . Nuuni azallonna ixxiko wodey gakkiya wode nu zeridayssa cakkana .
48006010	Nu injje wode demmiko , asa ubbaas , aathidikka ammaniyaa asaas lo77obaa oothoos .
48006011	Taani ta kushen , ay mela gita pidaalen hinttew xaafidaakko be7ite .
48006012	Asa sinthan lo77o gididi benttanaw koyaa asati hintte qaxxarettana mela koyoosona . Shin hessa entti oothey , Kiristtoosa masqaliya gisho enttana goodi gakkonna melassa .
48006013	Entti hintte qaxxaretethan ceeqettanaw koyidi hinttena qaxxaretto goosonappe attin qaxxarettidayssatikka bantta huu7en higgiya naagokkona .
48006014	Shin alamey taw kaqettidayssafenne taanikka alamiyas kaqettida , Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa masqaliyappe attin hara ceeqetethi taappe haakko .
48006015	Hiza , qaxxarettin qaxxarettonna aggin aykkoka maaddenna . Maaddey ooratha medhetethi gido .
48006016	Ha wogaa kaalliya ubbaasinne Xoossaa dere gidida Isra7eeles sarotethaynne maarotethay gido .
48006017	Taani Yesuusas madunxida beeta ta asatethan tookkida gisho hizappe tana oonikka waaysoppo .
48006018	Ta ishato , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethay hinttera gido . Amin77i .
49001001	Xoossaa shenen Kiristtoos Yesuusa hawaare gidida Phawuloosappe , Efesoonan de7iya geeshshatasinne Kiristtoos Yesuusa ammaneyssatas xaafettida kiitaa .
49001002	Xoossaa nu Aawappenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hinttew gido .
49001003	Salon de7iya ayyaana anjjo ubban Kiristtoosa baggara nuna anjjida , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Aaway , Xoossay galatetto .
49001004	Nuuni iya sinthan geeshshatanne borey baynnayssata gidana mela Xoossay alamey medhettanaappe kase Kiristtoosa baggara ba siiquwan nuna dooris .
49001005	Xoossay ba sheniyan ba dosidayssada Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara nuna ba nayta oothanaw kasetidi qoppi wothis .
49001006	Xoossay ba siiqiya Na7aa baggara nuus coo immida aadho keehatethay bonchchettana mela hessa oothis .
49001007	Xoossaa aadho keehatethaa duretethaada Kiristtoosa suuthan wozettidi nagara atotethaa demmida .
49001008	Ba aadho keehatethaa cinccatethaninne eratethan kunthidi nuus immis .
49001009	Xoossay ba dosidayssada Kiristtoosa baggara iya sheniya xuuraa nu erana mela oothis .
49001010	Wodey gakkiya wode Xoossay polanaw qoppida qofay , saloninne sa7an de7iya medhetetha ubbay Kiristtoosappe garssan gidana melassa .
49001011	Ubbabaa ba sheniyada oothiya Xoossay , kasetidi ba qoppi wothidayssada Kiristtoosa baggara nuuni iyabaa gidana mela nuna dooris .
49001012	Hessa I oothiday , Kiristtoosan ufayssi wothidi naagon koyro gidida nuuni Xoossaa bonchchuwa galatan qonccisana melassa .
49001013	Hintteka hintte atotethaa Wonggelaa , hessika tuma qaala si7ida wode Kiristtoosa ammanideta . Xoossay hinttew immana gida Geeshsha Ayyaanan hintte attamettideta .
49001014	Xoossaa bonchchoy galatettana mela Xoossay ba asaa wozana gakkanaw Geeshsha Ayyaana nuus oythu oothidi immis .
49001015	Hessa gisho , Godaa Yesuusa hintte ammaneyssanne geeshshata ubbaa hintte siiqeyssa ta si7ida wode
49001016	ta woosan hinttena qoppashe hintte gisho Xoossaa galateyssa aggabikke .
49001017	Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Xoossay , bonchcho Aaway , Xoossaa hintte aathi eranaada cinccatethaanne qonccetha ayyaana hinttew immanaada taani Xoossaa woossays .
49001018	Xoossay hinttena xeegida ufayssaynne geeshshati laattiya bonchcho laatay ay mela darookko hintte erana mela Xoossay hintte wozana ayfiyaa dooyana mela taani Xoossaa woossays .
49001019	Qassi iya ammaniyaa nunan oothiya iya wolqqay ay mela aadhdhida giteekko hintte erana mela woossays . He wolqqay xoonettonanne daaburonna wolqqaa . Ha nunan de7idi oothiya wolqqaynne ,
49001020	Kiristtoosa hayqoppe denthidi , salon Xoossaafe ushachcha baggara utisida gita wolqqay issino .
49001021	Iya sunthay , ayseyssatappenne maata aawatappe , haareyssatappenne godatappe , bolla gididi ha alamiya xalaalan gidonnashin sinthafe yaana alamiyankka hara sunthata ubbaafe dhoqqa .
49001022	Xoossay ubbaa Kiristtoosa tohuwappe garssan haarisis ; qassi woosa keethan ubbaban Goda gidana mela iya shuumis .
49001023	Woosa keethay Kiristtoosa kumethi oothiya iya asatethaa . Medhetethay de7iya bessa ubban Kiristtoosi ba huu7en ubbabaa kuntheyssa .
49002001	Hayssafe kase hinttee , hintte nagaraanne hintte qohuwa gaason hayqqidayssata .
49002002	He wode hintte ha alamiya iita ogiya kaallideta . Carkkuwa bolla de7iya ayyaana wolqqata halaqaasinne ha77ika Xoossaas kiitettonna asaa haariya ayyaanas kiitettideta .
49002003	Nu ubbayka kase he asata giddon nu asho amuwaanne nu wozanaa sheniya kaallidi de7ida . Nukka harata mela nu medhetethan Xoossaa hanquwa ekkanaw de7eyssata .
49002004	Shin Xoossaa gita maarotethaafenne nuus de7iya gita siiquwappe denddidayssan ,
49002005	hari attoshin nuuni nu qohuwan hayqqidi de7ishin Kiristtoosa baggara nuus de7o immis . Hintteka attiday Xoossaa aadho keehatethaana .
49002006	Xoossay nuna Kiristtoosara issife hayqoppe denthidi salo sohuwan iyara issife wothis .
49002007	I hessa oothiday , Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara nuus qonccisida ba keehatethaanne zawi baynna ba aadho keehatetha duretethaa yaana laythan nuna bessanaassa .
49002008	Hintte aadho keehatethan ammanon attideta . Hessika , Xoossaa imotappe attin hintte ooson benttidabaa gidenna .
49002009	Oonikka ceeqettonna mela atotethay benttiday ooson gidenna .
49002010	Nuuni Xoossaa medhetethi ; I nuus kasetidi giigisi wothida lo77o oosota oothana mela Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara oorathi medhettida .
49002011	Hessa gisho , hinttenoo yeletan Ayhude gidonnayssato , Ayhudeti banttaw asa kushen qaxxarettidi , hinttena qassi qaxxarettiboonayssata gidi xeegeyssa akeekite .
49002012	He wode hintte Kiristtoosappe shaaketti de7idayssa , Isra7eele asaas allaga gididi de7idayssa , Xoossaa ufayssa qaalappe haakkidi de7idayssanne ha alamiyan ufayssinne Xoossi baynna de7idayssa akeekite .
49002013	Shin hintte kase haakkidi de7idayssati , ha77i Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7idi Kiristtoosa suuthan mata shiiqideta .
49002014	Kiristtoosi nu sarotethaa ; I Ayhudenne Ayhude gidonna asaa timidi , nam77aa shaakki wothida morkketetha godaa laallis .
49002015	I banan ha nam77u zaretappe issi ooratha ase medhdhidi , higgiya iya kiitaranne wogatara issife ba asatethan dhayssidi sarotethi immis .
49002016	Kiristtoosi masqaliya bolla hayqqidi morkketethaa dhayssis ; qassi nam77u zareta issi asatethi oothidi Xoossaara sigethis .
49002017	Kiristtoosi yidi , Xoossaafe haakkidi de7iya hinttew , qassi matidi de7iya enttaw sarotetha Wonggelaa odis .
49002018	Nu ubbay iya baggara issi Ayyaanan Aawa sinthe shiiqanaw dandda7os .
49002019	Hizappe hintte allaga woykko imathe gidekketa , shin hintte ha77i geeshshata biittaa asinne Xoossaa soo asi .
49002020	Hintte hawaaretinne nabeti baasida baasuwa bolla keexettideta . Godaa xaphuwa minthiya shuchchay Kiristtoos Yesuusa .
49002021	Iyan keetha ubbay issife oykettidi Godan geeshsha Xoossa keethi gidanaw diccees .
49002022	Hintte qassi Xoossay ba Ayyaanan de7iya keethi gidanaw Kiristtoosan issife keexetteta .
49003001	Hessa gisho , taani , Phawuloosi , Ayhude gidonna hintte gisho Kiristtoos Yesuusan qasho asi gidas .
49003002	Ta hinttena maaddana mela Xoossay ba aadho keehatethan taw immida ha oosuwabaa hintte loythi si7ideta .
49003003	Ta hinttew kase qanthan xaafidayssada Xoossay ba xuuraa qonccethan taw qonccisis .
49003004	Ta xaafidayssa hintte nabbabiya wode Kiristtoosa xuuraa ta ay mela eridaakko hintte akeekanaw dandda7eeta .
49003005	Ha xuuray geeshsha hawaaretasinne nabetas ha77i Ayyaana baggara qonccidayssada beni wode asaas hessada qonccisibeenna .
49003006	Xuuray hayssa : Ayhude gidonna asay Wonggelaa baggara Isra7eeletara issife Xoossaa anjjuwaa laattoosona . Isra7eeletara issi keetha asi gidoosona ; Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara Xoossaa ufayssa qaala ekkoosona .
49003007	Xoossay ba oothiya wolqqaa baggara taw immida aadho keehatethan ha Wonggelas oosanchcho gidas .
49003008	Taani geeshshata ubbaafe laafa gidikkoka Ayhude gidonna asaas zawi baynna Kiristtoosa duretethaa Wonggelaa odana mela ha aadho keehatethay taw imettis .
49003009	Qassi kase wodiyan ubbaa medhdhida Xoossan qosettidi de7iya xuuras , Xoossaa qofay aybeekko qonccisanaw aadho keehatethay taw imettis .
49003010	Xoossay hessa oothiday ha77i wodiyan woosa keetha baggara salo sohuwan de7iya halaqatasinne haareyssatas ba dumma dumma qonccethaa erisanaassa .
49003011	Xoossay ba merinaa qofaa nu Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara polanaw hessa oothis .
49003012	Nu ammanon yashshi baynna Xoossako shiiqana mela Kiristtoosi nuus minotethinne la77atethi immis .
49003013	Taani hintte gisho waaye ekkiya gisho hintte ta waayan yeellatonnaada hinttena woossays ; taani hintte bonchchuwas waayettays .
49003014	Taani aawa sinthan gulbbatada woossey hessa gishossa .
49003015	Saloninne sa7an de7iya issi issi soo asay iyan sunthettees .
49003016	Xoossay ba bonchcho duretethaafe hintte garssa asatethaa minthiya wolqqaa ba Ayyaana baggara immana mela hinttew woossays .
49003017	Qassi ammanon Kiristtoosi hintte wozanan daana melanne hintte siiqon xapho yeddidi minnidi daana mela woossays .
49003018	Hessadakka , Kiristtoosa siiqoy ay mela dalggeko , adusseeko , dhoqqekonne ciimmooko geeshshata ubbaara eriya wolqqaa hintte akeekana mela woossays .
49003019	Eratethaafe aadhdhiya Kiristtoosa siiquwa hintte erana mela qassi de7o immiya Xoossaa wolqqan hintte kumana mela ta woossays .
49003020	Hiza , nu giddon oothiya ba wolqqaa baggara nuuni woosseyssafe woykko qoppeyssafe aathidi oothanaw dandda7iya Xoossaas ,
49003021	woosa keethaninne Kiristtoos Yesuusan wode ubban merinaappe merinaa gakkanaw bonchchoy gido . Amin77i .
49004001	Hiza , Godaa gisho qashettida taani , hintte xeegettida xeessas bessiya de7o daana mela hinttena woossays .
49004002	Hintte ubba wode aadanne hayo gidite ; issoy issuwa dandda7itenne siiqon de7ite .
49004003	Sarotethan qashettidi Ayyaanay immiya issifetethaa naaganaw minnite .
49004004	Xoossay hinttena xeegida wode issi ufayssas xeegidayssada issi asatethinne issi Ayyaani de7ees .
49004005	Issi Goday , issi ammanoynne issi xinqqatey de7ees .
49004006	Ubbaafe bolla gidida , ubbaa baggara oothiyanne ubbaa giddon de7iya issi Xoossay , ubbaa Aaway de7ees .
49004007	Shin Kiristtoosi immanaw koyidayssada nu issoy issoy dumma dumma imota ekkida .
49004008	Hessa gisho , Xoossaa qaalay , “ I pude keyida wode di7ettida darota baara ekkidi bis ; asaaskka imotaa immis ”
49004009	Yaatin , “ Pude keyis ” guussay woy guussee ? I koyro duge , sa7aa ziqqa bessaa wodhdhis guussu gidonna ixxiko ay gussee ?
49004010	Ha duge wodhdhidayssi , ubba bessan benttanaw ubbaafe dhoqqa saluwa keyidayssi iya .
49004011	I issota issota hawaareta , issota issota nabeta , issota issota Wonggela sabaaketa , issota issota woosa keethi heemmeyssata , issota issota asttamaareta oothidi immis .
49004012	I hessa oothiday Kiristtoosa asatethi gidida woosa keethi dichchanawunne ammaniyaa asaa Xoossaa oosos giigisanaassa .
49004013	Hessadakka , nu ubbay Xoossaa Na7aa eridi ammanon benttiya issifetethaakko gakkidi , Kiristtoosa ayyaana de7uwa kumethaa gakkidi diccana melassa .
49004014	Hizappe guye , asaa gene cimon giigida balethiya worddo timirtte carkkoninne hobben gedenne haa kuullo kaa7iya nayta mela gidanaw bessenna .
49004015	Shin nuuni tumaa siiqon odishe asatethaas huu7e gidiya Kiristtoosara de7iya issifetethaa gujji gujji dichchoos .
49004016	Kumetha asatethay Kiristtoosa bolla zemppees qassi dumma dumma asatetha billiteti issoy issuwara oykettidi uttis . Issi issi asatetha kifiley ba oosuwa oothiya wode kumetha asatethay siiqon diccees .
49004017	Hessa gisho , taani hayssa hinttew Godaa sunthan odaysinne markkattays . Go77i baynna qofaa qoppiya Ayhude gidonna asatada de7oppite .
49004018	Entta qofay dhumis ; bantta wozanaa muumisidosona . Entti eratetha dhayoninne ixxas gidi Xoossay immiya de7uwappe haakkidosona .
49004019	Entti yeella giyabaa erokkonna ; entti laymatethas banttana aathi immidosona ; qassi tunabaa ubbaa guye goonna oothoosona .
49004020	Shin hintte Kiristtoosa eriday hessa mela ogen gidenna .
49004021	Iyabaa tuma si7ideta . Qassi Yesuusan de7iya tumaa mela iyappe tamaarideta .
49004022	Hintte kase de7iya de7o ogiya aggite . Qassi ba cimmiya amon dhaya hintte ceega asatethaa diggite .
49004023	Hintte wozanaa qofan ooraxite .
49004024	Tuma xillotethaninne geeshshatethan Xoossaa leemison medhettida ooratha asatethaa ma77ite .
49004025	Hiza , worddo odettofite . Nuuni ubbay Kiristtoosa asatethaa billiteta gidiya gisho asa ubbaara tuma odettite .
49004026	Hanqettite , shin hintte hanquwan nagara oothofite . Hintte hanqeti de7ishin awi wullofo .
49004027	Xalahes besse immofite .
49004028	Kaysiya uray hizappe guye kaysotoppo . Shin manqota maaddiyabay iyaw daana mela ba kushen lo77obaa ootho .
49004029	Hintte doonappe iita qaali keyoppo . Shin si7eyssata go77ana melanne harata minthethiya koshshiya lo77o qaali hintte doonappe keyo .
49004030	Xoossay hinttena woziya gallasaas hinttena attamidi wothida Xoossaa Ayyaana azzanthofite .
49004031	Cametethi , yilo , hanqo , waaso , cashshenne iita ubbaa hinttefe haassite .
49004032	Aathidi issoy issuwas keehanne qadhetteyssata gidite . Xoossay Kiristtoosa baggara hinttew atto gidayssada hintteka wolis atto giite .
49005001	Hiza , Xoossay dosiya naytada iya daanite .
49005002	Kiristtoosi nuna dosidi bana nu gisho Xoossaas sawiya imonne yarshsho oothidi immidayssada hintteka siiqon de7ite .
49005003	Shin laymatethi , tunatethinne uuzetethi ammaniyaa asaas bessonna gisho hintte giddon ubbaraka si7ettofo .
49005004	Xoossaa galatiteppe attin yeellayabaynne eeya odi woykko qidhey hinttew bessonna gisho hintte giddon ubbaka de7oppo .
49005005	Hayssa erite ; oonikka laymatey woykko tunabaa oothey woykko uuzettey Kiristtoosa kawotethaanne Xoossaa kawotethaa laattanaw dandda7enna . Uuzetethi eeqa goynno mela .
49005006	Hayssata gaason Xoossaa hanqoy kiitettonna asaa bolla yaana gisho oonikka hinttena pathonna odan cimmofo .
49005007	Hessa mela asaara issifetethi oothofite .
49005008	Kase hintte dhuman de7ideta , shin ha77i Godaa baggara poo7on de7eeta . Hiza , poo7o asada poo7on simerettite .
49005009	Poo7oy lo77otethi , xillotethinne tumatethi ayfees .
49005010	Godaa ufayssiyabaa oothanaw koyite .
49005011	Go77i baynna dhuma ooso qonccisiteppe attin iyara issifoppite .
49005012	Entti geeman oothiya oosuwa hari attoshin odanawukka yeellayees .
49005013	Shin ubbabay poo7on keyaa wode qonccen benttees .
49005014	Poo7oy ubbabaa qonccen bessees . Hessa gisho , “ Neno dhiskkeysso barkka ; hayqoppe dendda ; Kiristtoosi ne bolla poo7ana ” yaagettis .
49005015	Hiza , hintte waanidi de7iyakko akeeki be7ite . Cinccata giditeppe attin eeyata gidoppite .
49005016	Laythay iita gidiya gisho injjetiya wode ubbaa go7ettite .
49005017	Hessa gisho , Godaa sheney aybeekko akeekiteppe attin eeyoppite .
49005018	Geeshsha Ayyaanan gallas gallas kumiteppe attin dhayokko hinttena kaalethiya gisho woyne ushshan mathottofite .
49005019	Mazmuren , sabaninne ayyaana yethan , issoy issuwara odetite . Qassi hintte wozanan zammarishenne sabbishe Godaa galatite .
49005020	Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunthan ubba wode Xoossaa Aawa ubbabaas galatite .
49005021	Kiristtoosa bonchchuwas gidi issoy issuwas haarettite .
49005022	Machcheto , Godaas haaretteyssada hintte azinatas haarettite .
49005023	Kiristtoosi woosa keethaas huu7e gideyssada azinikka ba machchees huu7e . Qassi Kiristtoosi ba asatethi gidida woosa keethaa ashsheyssa .
49005024	Shin woosa keethay Kiristtoosas haaretteyssada machcheti bantta azinatas ubbaban haarettanaw bessees .
49005025	Azinatoo , Kiristtoosi woosa keethaa dosidi bana iw immidayssada hintteka hintte machcheta dosite .
49005026	I woosa keethaa ba qaala baggara haathan meeccidi geeshshis .
49005027	Kiristtoosi woosa keethaa qiti woykko som77o tuussi woykko hessa melabay baynna I kumetha bonchchuwara geeshshinne borettonnaaro oothidi baakko shiishanaw koyidi hessa oothis .
49005028	Hessadakka , azinati banttana doseyssada bantta machcheta dosanaw bessees . Ba machchiw doseyssi bana dosees .
49005029	Bana ixxiya asi oonikka baawa , shin Kiristtoosi woosa keethaas ootheyssada ba asatethaa muzeesinne naagees .
49005030	Nuuni Kiristtoosa asatethaa billiteta .
49005031	Xoossaa qaalay , “ Hessa gisho , asi ba aawanne ba aayiw aggidi , ba machcheera issife daana ; entti nam77ayka issi asho gidana ” yaagees .
49005032	Hayssi gita xuura , shin taani hessa Kiristtoosabaanne woosa keethabaa leemiso oothada odays .
49005033	Gidoshin , hintte issoy issoy hintte machcheta hinttee , hinttena doseyssada dosite . Issi issi machcha ba azinaa bonchchanaw bessees .
49006001	Nayto , hintte Godaaba gidiya gisho hinttena yelidayssatas kiitettite . Hessi hinttew bessiyabaa .
49006002	“ Ne aayiwunne ne aawa bonchcha . ” Hessi ufayssa qaali de7iya koyro kiitaa .
49006003	“ Ne hessa poliyabaa gidikko ubbay new injjetana ; ne laythay sa7a bolla aduqqana . ”
49006004	Aawato , hintte nayta Godaa qaala tamaarssoninne entta kaaleson dichchiteppe attin enttana caamisoppite .
49006005	Aylleto , Kiristtoosas kiitetteyssada hintte sa7a godatas yashshan , bonchchoninne suure wozanan kiitettite .
49006006	Entta sinthan saba demmanaw entti be7iya wode xalaala oothofite . Shin Kiristtoosa aylletada Xoossaa sheniya wozanappe polite .
49006007	Asas gidonnashin Godaas gidi hintte kumetha wozanaappe oothite .
49006008	Aylle gidin woykko goda gidin issoy issoy ba oothida lo77o oosuwas Godaappe woyto ekkanayssa ereeta .
49006009	Godato , asa som77o be7idi maaddonna Goday , saluwan de7eyssaa ereeta . Hessa gisho , hintte aylleta manddeyssa aggidi entti hinttew bonchchon kiitetteyssa mela hintte enttaw lo77obaa oothite .
49006010	Wurssethan , Godaaninne iya gita wolqqan minnite .
49006011	Xalahe cimuwa eqettanaw dandda7ana mela Xoossay hinttew immida ola miishiya ubbaa ma77ite .
49006012	Nu olay asara gidonnashin salon de7iya tuna ayyaana olanchchotara , maata aawatara , haareyssataranne ha dhuma alamiya wolqqatara .
49006013	Hessa gisho , iita gallasaa teqqanawunne ubbaa polidi , minnidi eqqanaw hintte dandda7ana mela Xoossaa ola miisheta ubbaa ma77ite .
49006014	Tumaa xeessan danccoda danccidi , xillotethaa xurureda tiran wothidi , sarotethaa Wonggelaa hintte tohuwan caammada aathidi minnidi eqqite .
49006015	
49006016	He ubbaafe aathidi , Xalahey yeddiya laxiya tama dongge ubbaa toysanaw dandda7iya ammanuwa ubba wode gonddalleda oykkite .
49006017	Xoossaa atotetha biraata barnneexada hintte huu7en wothite ; qassi Geeshsha Ayyaana mashshaa , ikka Xoossaa qaalaa oykkite .
49006018	Woossa aggofite ; harataskka gaannatite ; ubba wode Ayyaanan woossite . Hessan , geeshshatas salettonna minnidi ubba wode woossite .
49006019	Taani Wonggelaa xuuraa yashshi baynna qonccisada odana mela Xoossay taw qaala immana mela woossite .
49006020	Taani hessa oothanaw kiitetas ha77ika qashon de7ey he Wonggelaa gishossa . Yaaniya gisho , taani yashshi baynna besseyssada odana mela taw woossite .
49006021	Taani waana de7iyakkonne ay oothiyako hintte erana mela nu siiqo ishay , Godaa oosuwan ammanettida oosanchchoy , Tikiqoosi , tabaa ubbaa hinttew odana .
49006022	Nuuni ubbay waanidi de7iyakko hinttew odana melanne hinttena minthethana mela taani iya hintteko kiittas .
49006023	Xoossaa Aawappe , Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe sarotethaynne siiqoy ammanora issife ammaniyaa ubbaas gido .
49006024	Irxxonna siiqon nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa siiqiya ubbaara Xoossaa aadho keehatethay gido .
50001001	Kiristtoos Yesuusara issifida gisho Xoossabaa gidida , Filphisiyuusa kataman de7iya woosa keethaa cimatasinne daaqoneta ubbaas . Yesuus Kiristtoosa aylle gidida , Phawuloosappenne Ximotiyoosappe kiitettida kiitaa .
50001002	Nu Aawa Xoossaafenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hinttew gido .
50001003	Taani hinttena qoppiya wode ubban , ta Xoossaa galatays .
50001004	Taani hintte ubbaas Xoossaa woossiya wode ufayssan woossays .
50001005	Hintte koyro gallasappe ha77i gakkanaw , Wonggelaa markkatteyssan taara issife gididi , tana maaddida gisho Xoossaa galatays .
50001006	Hintte giddon lo77o ooso doomida Xoossay , Kiristtoos Yesuusi simmiya gallasay gakkanaw , polanayssa erays .
50001007	Hintte ubba wode ta wozanan de7eeta . Taani ubba wodekka hessada qoppanaw bessees . Ha77i taani qashon de7ashenne qashettanaappe sinthe Wonggelaa naagoninne Wonggelaa mintha eson Xoossay taw qaadida qaadaa hintteka taara shaakettideta .
50001008	Taani hinttena ubbaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa siiquwan ay mela laamotiyakko Xoossay taw markka .
50001009	Hintte siiqoy tuma eratetharanne akeekara issife gujji gujji diccana mela Xoossaa woossays .
50001010	Hessan hintte lo77obaa shaakkidi , dooreyssata , Kiristtoosi simmiya gallasan geeshshatanne borettonnayssata gidana .
50001011	Hintte de7oy Xoossaa bonchchuwasinne galatas Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara benttiya xillotethaa ayfiyaan kumidi ayfana .
50001012	Ta ishato , tana gakkida ubbay Wonggelay dalggana mela tuma maaddidayssa hintte erana mela koyays .
50001013	Taani Kiristtoosa gisho qashettidayssa , kawo keethaa naageyssatinne hayssan de7iya harati ubbay eroosona .
50001014	Ta qashuwa gaason nu ishatappe daroti Godan keehi ammanettidosona . Hessa gisho , Xoossaa qaala yashshi baynna kaseyssafe aadhdhi minnidi odana mela minotethi demmidosona .
50001015	Gidoshin , issoti issoti qanaateninne palaman Kiristtoosabaa odoosona , shin harati suure wozanappe odoosona .
50001016	Suure wozanappe odeyssati , Xoossay taw Wonggelaa naago ooso immidayssa eriya gisho siiqon odoosona .
50001017	Shin tana qanaateyssati ta qashuwa bolla hara meto ehanabaa enttaw daanin banttana dosidi Kiristtoosabaa odoosonappe attin tuma wozanappe odokkona .
50001018	Hessi aykkoka metenna . Tuma ogen gidin woykko worddo ogen gidin he ubban Kiristtoosi sabbakettees . Tana hessi ufayssees . Qassi harabay tana ufayssiyabay ,
50001019	taani hintte woosaninne Yesuus Kiristtoosa Ayyaana maaduwan attanayssa eriya gisho tana ufayssees .
50001020	Ta gita amoynne ufayssan naagiya naagoy ta yeellatonna attanayssa . Shin ubba wode ootheyssada , ha77ika taani paxa de7in woykko hayqqin yayyonna ta kumetha asatethan Kiristtoosi bonchchettana gada minotethan odays .
50001021	Ta de7ikkoka Kiristtoosa xalaalas de7ays ; qassi ta hayqqikokka taw aadhdhida wodhe .
50001022	Shin ta paxa de7ikko ayfey de7iya ooso oothana . Shin paxa de7eyssafenne hayqoppe awussa dooranekko taw erettenna .
50001023	Taani ha nam77atappe awussa dooranekko un77ettas . Ha de7uwappe shaakettada Kiristtoosara issife daanaw amottays ; Kiristtoosara issife de7eyssi ubbaafe aadhdhida lo77o .
50001024	Shin taani hintte gisho paxa de7eyssi hinttew daro koshshiyabaa .
50001025	Hessa taani geeshshada erays ; taani , hintte ammanon diccanaadanne ufayttanaada hinttera paxa daana .
50001026	Hessa gisho , taani hintteko simmada yaa wode Kiristtoos Yesuusara hintte de7iya de7uwan tanan de7iya ceeqetethay hinttew darana .
50001027	Ubbaafe aathidi , hintte Kiristtoosa Wonggelaas bonchcho ehiya de7o de7ite . Ta hinttena be7in woykko be7onna ixxin hintte issi qofan minnidi eqqidi , harati Wonggelan ammanana mela issi wozanan gididi issife baaxeteyssa ta si7ana .
50001028	Hintte morkketas yayyofite . Entti hinttera eqettiyaba gidikko hessi hinttew atotethaas , enttaw dhayos Xoossaafe gidida malla .
50001029	Kiristtoosas oothiya qaaday hinttew imettiday , hintte iya ammanana mela xalaala gidonnashin hintte iya gisho meto ekkana melassa .
50001030	Hessa gisho , hintte ta waaya kase be7ideta ; ha77ika ta waayetteyssa si7eeta . Hintteka ta waaya mela waayetteta .
50002001	Kiristtoosan hintte de7iya de7oy hinttena minthees ; qassi iya siiqoykka hinttena minthethees . Geeshsha Ayyaanaara hinttew issifetethi de7ees ; hintte haratas keehetanne qadhetteeta .
50002002	Hiza , hintte issi qofan , siiqon , issi wozananinne ayyaanan issino gididi tana polo ufayssite .
50002003	Hinttena doson woykko ceeqettiya hada amon issibaakka oothofite . Shin hintte issoy issuwafe gitatays yaagidi qopponna hinttena kawushshite .
50002004	Hintte issoy issoy , hara asi maaddiyabaa koyiteppe attin hinttena maaddiyabaa xalaala koyoppite .
50002005	Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7iya qofay hinttenan daanaw bessees .
50002006	Iyaw ubba wode Xoossaa hanotethi de7ees . Yaaniya gisho , iya Xoossaara issino oothiya hanotaa , wolqqan ekkanaw koyibeenna .
50002007	Gidoshin , I baw de7iya bonchchuwa ubbaa aggidi , aylle medheta ekkis ; ase daanidi qonccis .
50002008	I bana kawushshis ; hayqqana gakkanaw , hari attoshin masqaliya bolla hayqqanaw kiitettis .
50002009	Hessa gisho , Xoossay iya daro dhoqqu dhoqqu oothis ; qassi suntha ubbaafekka aadhdhiya dhoqqa sunthaa immis .
50002010	Saloninne sa7an , sa7appe garssan de7iya ubbay , Yesuusa sunthaa bonchchuwas gulbbatana .
50002011	Asa ubbay bantta inxarssan , Yesuus Kiristtoosa Goda yaagidi , Xoossaa Aawa bonchchuwas markkattana .
50002012	Ta ishato , taani hinttera de7iya wode ubban hintte kiitettidayssada , ha77i taani hintte matappe haakkinkka , kaseyssafe aathidi , kiitettanaw bessees . Xoossaas yashshaninne kokkorssan hintte atotethaa polanaw oothite .
50002013	Xoossay , hintte iyaw ero gidi kiitettana mela ubba wode hintte giddon oothees .
50002014	Ay ooso oothishekka zuuzummonna woykko palamonna oothite .
50002015	Geellanne nagaranchcho asaa giddon borettonnayssata , geeshshatanne pokkoy baynna Xoossaa nayta gidite . Hintte entta giddon salo xoolinttoda poo7ishe ,
50002016	de7o immiya kiitaa enttaw odite . He wode ta daaburissaynne ta oosoy mela attiboonna gisho Kiristtoosi yaa gallas ta hinttenan ceeqettana .
50002017	Hintte Xoossaas immiya ammano imotaa bolla ta suuthay ushsha yarshshoda gukkikokka tana ufayssees . Hintteka taara ufayttana .
50002018	Hessada hintteka ufayttidi tanakka ufayssanaw bessees .
50002019	Taani hintte de7uwabaa si7ada ufayttanaw Ximotiyoosa hintteko ellesada yeddana mela Godaa Yesuusi tana maaddanayssa ammanettays .
50002020	Hintte de7uwas wozanappe qoppiya iya mela asi hari oonikka baawa .
50002021	Harati banttana go77iyabaa koyoosonappe attin Yesuus Kiristtoosi koyabaa oothokona .
50002022	I taara issife gididi na7i ba aawas ootheyssada Wonggelaa ooso oothidayssanne ammanettiya asi gideyssa hintte ereeta .
50002023	Hessa gisho , tabay haniyabaa be7ada ellesada iya hintteko yeddana gada qoppays .
50002024	Taani , ta huu7en mata woden hintteko baanayssa Godan ammanettays .
50002025	Hessadakka , taani , ta ishaa Ephafiroditusa , taara issife ta bagga gididi oothidayssa , olettidayssanne , tana maaddanaw hinttew kiitettidayssa , hintteko kiittanaw qoppas .
50002026	I hinttena ubbaa be7anaw daro laamotees . Qassi I harggettidayssa hintte si7ida gisho ba wozanan daro un77ettis .
50002027	I tuma harggettidi hayqqi kichchidi attis . Shin Xoossay iyaw qadhettis . Iya xalaalas gidonnashin azzanoy azzano bolla guzhettonnaada , tawukka qadhettis .
50002028	Hiza , hintte iya zaari be7idi ufayttanaada tawukka ta wozanaa seelay irxxanaada taani iya ellesada hintteko yeddanaw amottays .
50002029	Godaas haggaaziya asada iya kumetha ufayssan mokkite . Qassi iya mela asa ubbaaka bonchchite .
50002030	Hintte ta matan gididi oothanaw dandda7onna maadiya maaddidi Kiristtoosa oosuwa gisho ba shemppuwas mishettonna ixxidi hayqqi kichchidi attis .
50003001	Wurssethan , ta ishato , hintte Godaaba gidiya gisho ufayttite . Taani kase xaafidayssa zaarada xaafanayssi tana waaysenna , shin hinttena balappe naagana .
50003002	Iitabaa oothiya kanatappe , qassi qaxxarettanaw koshshees giya iita asatappe naagettite .
50003003	Nuuni Xoossaa Geeshsha Ayyaanan goynniya gishonne nu de7uwan Kiristtoos Yesuusan ceeqettiya gisho tuma qaxxaro qaxxarettidayssata . Nuuni kare asatethaa bolla oosettiyaban ceeqettoko .
50003004	Ta kare asatethan ceeqettanaw koshshiko ta daroban ceeqettanaw dandda7ays . Ay asikka ba kare asatethan ceeqettiyabay baw de7ees gidi qoppiko , taani iyappe daro aadhdhada ceeqettiyabay de7ees .
50003005	Taani yelettida saaminttara qaxxarettas . Taani yeletan Isra7eele ; taani Biniyame zare ; taani walaki baynna Ayhude ase . Ayhude higge naagon gidikko taani Farisaawe .
50003006	Ayhude ammanuwas mishetethan gidikko taani woosa keethaa yedethas . Issi asi higge naagidi xilliyaba gidikko , tanan borey benttibeenna .
50003007	Shin kase tana maaddees gada qoppidabaa ubbaa , Kiristtoosa gisho gada maaddonnabaa oothada taybas .
50003008	Hessa xalaala gidonnashin taani ta Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa ereyssi haraba ubbaafe daro aadhdhiya gisho he ubbaa wodhey baynnabaada taybas . Taani iya gisho ubbabaa dhayas . Kiristtoosa demmanaw ubbabaa wora holettida buureda taybays . Taani Yesuusara issino gidas .
50003009	Taani higges kiitettada demmiya ta huu7e xillotethi taw baawa . Kiristtoosa ammanin benttiya xillotethay , Xoossaa matappe yaa xillotethay ha77i taw de7ees .
50003010	Taani Kiristtoosanne iya denddo wolqqaa eranaw koyays . Taani iya metuwa iyara shaakettanawunne iya hayquwan iya daananaw amottays .
50003011	Hessadakka , hayqoppe denddada merinaw de7on daanayssa ufayssi oothays .
50003012	Taani ha77i gaxa gakkas woykko tanan bali baawa giikke . Shin Kiristtoos Yesuusi tana oykkida gisho taani ta sinthan de7iya woytuwa oykkanaw woxxaysinne butetays .
50003013	Ta ishato , taani hessa demmas gada qoppike , shin taani issibaa oothays . Taappe guyera de7eyssa dogada sinthan de7eyssa oykkanaw zaaturays .
50003014	Hessa gisho , taani gaxa gakkanaw woxxays . Xoossay Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara salo de7uwas xeegida woytuwa ekkanaw daaburays .
50003015	Hiza , nuuni Ayyaanan gashttida ubbay hessa qoppanaw bessees . Hinttefe baggatas dummattiya qofi de7ikko , hessaka Xoossay hinttew qonccisana .
50003016	Gidikkoka , nuuni hanno gakkanaw de7ida de7uwan , ane sinthe boos .
50003017	Ta ishato , tana daanite ; hessadakka , nu leemisuwa kaalliya asata akeekidi be7ite .
50003018	Taani hessa hinttew kase daro toho odas , shin ha77ika zaarada afuthan odays . Kiristtoosi masqaliya bolla hayqqidayssas banttana morkke oothida daro asati de7oosona .
50003019	Entta wurssethay dhayo ; entta uloy enttaw xoosse . Yeellatanaw bessiyaban entti ceeqettoosona ; qassi ha sa7abaa xalaala qoppoosona .
50003020	Nu biittay saluwana . Saloppe yidi nuna ashshanaw de7iya Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa naagoos .
50003021	Kiristtoosi ubbabaa ba maatappe garssan oothanaw dandda7iya ba wolqqan nu daaburanchcho asatethaa laammidi ba bonchcho asatethaa daanisana .
50004001	Ta ishato , ta doseyssato , ta laamoteyssato , tana ufaysseyssato , tana gitayeyssato hiza Godan minnidi eqqite .
50004002	Ewoodinne Sinxiika , hintte nam77ay , issi qofan michchida Godan daanada taani hinttena zorays .
50004003	Taara oothiya ammantheysso , neeni ha maccasata maaddana mela ta nena woossays . Ha maccasati taara , Qeleminxoosaranne entta sunthay Xoossaa de7o maxaafan xaafettida haratara issife Wonggelaa ubba bessaa gathanaw daaburidosona .
50004004	Godaara hintte de7iya de7uwan ubba wode ufayttite . Taani hessa gujjadakka odays ; ufayttite .
50004005	Asa ubbay hintte ashkketethaa ero ; Goday matan yaana .
50004006	Xoossaa hintte woossiya wode ubban iya galatishe , hinttena koshshiyaba ubbaas woossiteppe attin aybibaaskka hirggofite .
50004007	Asa eratetha ubbaafe aadhdhiya Xoossaa sarotethay , hintte wozanaanne hintte qofaa Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara naagana .
50004008	Wurssethan , ta ishato , hintte wozanan lo77obaanne galatisiyabaa qoppite . Tuma gidiyabaa ubbaa , bonchchoba ubbaa , qoho gidonnaba ubbaa , geeshshaba ubbaa , siiqobaa ubbaanne ufayssiyaba ubbaa qoppite .
50004009	Hintte taappe tamaaridabaa , ekkidabaa , si7idabaanne be7idabaa ubbaa oothite . Sarotethaa immiya Xoossay hinttera issife gidana .
50004010	Daro wodeppe guye , hintte tabaa zaaridi qoppanaw doomida gisho taani Godan daro ufayttays . Hessa guussay , taw qoppanaw hinttew injjetonna ixxidayssafe attin taw qofaa aggibeeketa .
50004011	Taani hessa tana metida gisho giikke ; taw de7iyabay gidana guussu tamaaras .
50004012	Taani metootettidi de7iya duussi erays ; qassi durettidi de7iya duussika erays . Awun gidin qassi ay wodekka taani kalonne kosha , pacenne palaha tamaaras .
50004013	Kiristtoosi taw immiya wolqqan ubbabaa oothanaw dandda7ays .
50004014	Gidikkoka , hintte ta metuwa taara ekkidayssan lo77o oothideta .
50004015	Filphisiyuusa asaw , Wonggelaa koyro odanaw taani Maqedooniyappe keyaa wode immiyabankka ekkiyabankka hintte woosa keethaafe attin hari tana maaddiboonayssa hintte ereeta .
50004016	Teselonqen metoy gakkida wodekka tana zaari zaaridi maaddideta .
50004017	Taani , hinttefe imota ekkanaw koyada gidonnashin imoppe yaa anjjuwaa hintte ekkana melassa .
50004018	Taani , hintte immida ubbaanne gididi palaheyssa ekkas . Hintte yeddida ubbaa Ephafiraditusappe ekkas ; koshshiyaba ubbay taw de7ees . Hintte taw yeddida imoy Xoossaas sawo tonggu giya , I dosiya , I ufayttiya yarshsho mela .
50004019	Ta Xoossay ba bonchcho duretethaafe , Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara hinttew koshshiyaba ubbaa immana .
50004020	Nu Aawa Xoossaas merinaappe merinaa gakkanaw bonchchoy gido . Amin77i .
50004021	Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara Xoossabaa gidida ubbaa saro giite . Taara de7iya ishati hinttena saro goosona .
50004022	Xoossabaa gidida asa ubbay , ubbaafe aathidi Kawuwa Qeesare keethan de7eyssati hinttena saro goosona .
50004023	Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethay hinttera gido .
51001001	Xoossaa shenen Kiristtoosi Yesuusa hawaare gidida Phawuloosinne nu ishaa Ximotiyoosi ,
51001002	Qolaasiyasa kataman de7iya Kiristtoosan geeshshatasinne ammanettida asaas xaafida kiitaa . Xoossaa nu Aawappe aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hinttew gido .
51001003	Nuuni hinttew woossiya wode Xoossaa nu Godaa , Yesuus Kiristtoosa Aawa ubba wode galatoos .
51001004	Nuuni Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7iya hintte ammanuwanne geeshshata ubbaas de7iya hintte siiquwa si7ida .
51001005	Hessa hintte oothiday hintte ufayssay salon hinttew naagettida gishossa . Hintte tuma kiitta gidida Wonggelaa koyro ammanida wode he ufayssaa si7ideta .
51001006	Hintte he Wonggelaa si7ida wodenne Xoossaa aadho keehatethaa tumaa shaakki erida wodeppe doomidi hintte giddon haanidayssada biitta ubban diccishenne ayfishe de7ees .
51001007	Hintte hessa nuura issife Kiristtoosas oothiya ammanettida , dosettida Ephafirappe tamaarideta .
51001008	I hessa bolla gujjidi Ayyaanay hinttew immida siiquwabaa nuus odis .
51001009	Hessa gisho , nuuni hinttebaa si7ida gallasaappe doomidi , Xoossay ba sheniya hinttena bessana melanne , Geeshsha Ayyaanay immiya eratethaaninne cinccatetha ubban hinttena kunthana mela ubba wode hinttew Xoossaa woossos .
51001010	Hessadakka , Goday koyeyssada hintte daana mela , ubba wode iya ufayssana mela , lo77o ooso ubban hintte ayfe ayfana melanne Xoossaa aathi erishe diccana mela Xoossaa woossos .
51001011	Xoossaa bonchcho wolqqay hintte ubbabaa genccanaadanne dandda7anaada ba minotethaa immidi hinttena ufaysso .
51001012	Qassi geeshshata poo7o kawotethaa laattana mela hinttena oothida Aawa galatite .
51001013	I nuna dhuma wolqqaafe ashshidi ba dosiya na7aa kawotethaako ehis .
51001014	Iyan wozettidi iya suuthan nagara atotethi demmida .
51001015	Kiristtoosi benttonna Xoossaas tuma leemiso . I medhetetha ubbaafe bayra .
51001016	Ubbabay iya baggara medhettis . Benttiyabatinne benttonnabati , wolqqatinne godati , haareyssatinne maata aawati , saloninne sa7an de7iya ubbay iyawunne iya baggara medhettis .
51001017	I ubbabaappe kase de7ees . Ubbabay iyan ba bessan bessan oykettidi de7ees .
51001018	I ba asatethi gidida woosa keethas huu7e . I ubbaafe bolla gidanaw hayqoppe denddon sinthenne bayra .
51001019	Xoossay ba kumetha Xoossatethaara iyan daanaw koyis .
