51001020	Qassi masqaliya bolla gussida ba na7aa suuthan sarotethi medhdhidi saloninne sa7an de7iya ubbaa iya baggara baara sigethis .
51001021	Hayssafe kase hintte qofaa iitatethay hinttena Xoossaafe shaakkisinne iyara morkke oothis ; hintte oosoykka iita .
51001022	Shin ha77i Kiristtoosi ashon hayqqida hayquwa baggara Xoossay hinttena baara sigethidi , geeshshata , borey baynnayssatanne xillota oothis .
51001023	Hinttee , hintte ammanuwan qaaxxonna minnidinne xaphphidi daanaw bessees . Hintte Wonggelaa qaalaa si7ida wode ekkida ufayssaa minthi oykkite . He Wonggelay hintte si7idayssanne biitta ubban sabbakettidayssa . Ta , Phawuloosikka ha Wonggelaas oosanchcho gidas .
51001024	Taani hintte gisho ha77i ekkiya waayan ufayttays . Kiristtoosi iya asatethi gidida woosa keethaas ekkida waaya taani ta ashuwan polays .
51001025	Xoossaa qaalaa hinttew polada odana mela taw imettida maatan woosa keethaas oosanchcho gidas .
51001026	Ha qaalay kase aadhdhida wodiyan yeletethaa ubbaafe geemmidi de7is . Shin ha77i Xoossay ha xuuraa ammaniyaa ubbaas qonccisis .
51001027	Xoossay Ayhude gidonna asaa giddon ha xuuraa bonchcho duretethaa qonccisis . Ikka bonchcho ufayssi gidida hintte giddon de7iya Kiristtoosa .
51001028	Hessa gisho , issi issi asi Kiristtoosan kumetha asi oothidi shiishanaw cinccatetha ubban asaa tamaarssoninne zoren Kiristtoosabaa sabbakoos .
51001029	Xoossay ba gita wolqqan tanan oothiya gisho ha77i gakkanaw iya wolqqan baaxetaysinne daaburays .
51002001	Ta hinttewunne Loodoqiya kataman de7iya asaas , hessadakka tana ayfen be7iboonna asa ubbaas ay mela baaxetiyakko hintte erana mela koyays .
51002002	Ta baaxetiya gaasoykka entti bantta wozanan minnidi , siiqon qashettidi , polo gidida kumetha akeeka duretethaa demmidi Xoossaa xuuraa Kiristtoosa erana melassa .
51002003	Iyan Xoossay minjjida eraynne cinccatetha ubbay de7ees .
51002004	Ta hessa oonikka hinttena cimo qaalan balethonna mela koyada gays .
51002005	Ta hinttefe haakkada de7ikkoka ayyaanan hinttera de7ays . Hintte duussaa maaranne Kiristtoosa hintte minnidi ammaneyssa be7ada ufayttays .
51002006	Hintte Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa ekkidayssada iyan de7ite .
51002007	Iyan xapho yeddite ; iyan keexettite . Hintte tamaaridayssada ammanon minnite ; Xoossaas kumidi palahida galataa immite .
51002008	Kiristtoosappe gidonnashin asa woganinne ha alamiya coo wogan katida timirttiyaninne asappe yida eratethan oonikka hinttena cimmi balethidi di77onna mela naagettite .
51002009	Xoossaa Xoossatethay Kiristtoosa asatethan kumethi de7ees .
51002010	Hintteka maatasinne wolqqa ubbaas huu7e gidiya Kiristtoosan kumideta .
51002011	Hintte Kiristtoosa ammanidi qaxxarettideta . Hessika asa kushen gidonnashin hinttena iita hanotethaafe diggiya Kiristtoosan oosettida qaxxaretethi .
51002012	Hintte xammaqettida wode Kiristtoosara issife moogettidi , Kiristtoosa hayqoppe denthida Xoossaa wolqqaa ammanidi , Kiristtoosara issife denddideta .
51002013	Hinttee , hintte nagaraa gishonne hintte ceega asatethaa qaxxarettonna gisho hayqqidi de7ishin , Xoossay hintte nagaraa atto gis . Kiristtoosara hinttew de7o immis .
51002014	I nuna mootiyanne nuura eqettiya , nu bolla xaafettida acuwa daakkidi masqaliya bolla dhishidi ogeppe diggis .
51002015	Kiristtoosi wolqqatanne maatata masqaliyan xoonidi , entta ola danccuwa bilisidi , di7ettida asada oothidi entta qonccen yuushshidi bessis .
51002016	Hessa gisho , miyaban woykko uyaaban , baale gallas woykko ageeni xeeriya qammaa bonchchon oonikka hintte bolla pirddofo .
51002017	Hayssati sinthafe yaanaw de7iyabatas eesho , shin tumay Kiristtoosaa .
51002018	Qoodheppe qommo ashkketethaninne kiitanchcho goynnon ceeqettiya oonikka hinttena hintte woytuwappe ashshofo . Hessa mela asi ba be7ida qonccethan nashettishe ba asho qofan coo otorttees .
51002019	Hessa mela asaas huu7e gidida Kiristtoosara gahetethi baawa . I asatetha ubbaa shayaninne kesson keson gathi oythidi muzidi dichchees . Xoossay hessa mela ogen asatetha ubbaas dichchi immees .
51002020	Hintte Kiristtoosara hayqqidi ha alamiya haariya ayyaanata wolqqaafe la77a keyideta . Yaatin , ays shaakettonna asada gididi ha wogatas haretetii ?
51002021	Ha wogati , “ Oykkofa ; laaccofa ; bochchofa ” geetetteyssata .
51002022	Ha ubbay asa woganne timirtte gidiya gisho ooso bolla pee7idaappe guye dhayana .
51002023	Ha kiitati bonchchonne cinccatethi daanidi benttanaw dandda7osona . Ha wogati Xoosse daro dosisiyaba , ashkkenne hintte asatethaa haarisiyabaa daanosona , shin nu iita amotetha bolla wolqqi enttaw baawa .
51003001	Hiza , hintte Kiristtoosara hayqoppe denddidayssada , Xoossaafe ushachcha baggan uttida Kiristtoosi de7iya bessan , salon de7iyabata koyite .
51003002	Salon de7eyssata bolla hintte qofaa wothiteppe attin sa7an de7iyabata bolla wothofite .
51003003	Hintte hayqon shaakettida mela ha alamiyappe shaakettideta . Hintte de7oy Kiristtoosara issife Xoossan geemmis .
51003004	Hinttew de7o gidida Kiristtoosi qoncciya wode he wode hintteka iyara bonchchon qonccana .
51003005	Hessa gisho , hinttenan de7iya alame amota wodhite . Hessatikka laymatethi , tunatethi , laymatanaw amotethi , eeqa goynno mela gidida uuzetethi .
51003006	Hayssata gaason Xoossaa hanqoy kiitettonna asaa bolla yaana .
51003007	Hintteka kase he iita ogiyan biya asaa gidon de7ishe hayssata oothideta .
51003008	Ha77i hintte hessata oothofite . Qassi hanqo , ixo , kachchi , zigirssinne borsso oda hinttefe diggit .
51003009	Ceega asatethaa iya oosuwara hinttefe qaarida gisho issoy issuwas worddotoppite .
51003010	Xoossaa medho daaniya , eratethan laamettida ooratha asatethaa ma77ite .
51003011	Ha ooratha medhetethan , Girike asi woykko Ayhude asi , qaxxarettiday woykko qaxxarettonnay , Barbaare asi woykko Iskute asi aylley woykko womaannoy baawa . Kiristtoosi ubbaa ; I ubban de7ees .
51003012	Hessa gisho , Xoossan doorettida asada geeshshatanne dosettidayssata gididi , maarotethaa , keehatethaa , ashkketethanne dandda7a ma77ite .
51003013	Issoy issuwa dandda7ite . Oonikka ba laggiyan qohettidabay de7ikko iyaw atto go . Goday hinttew atto gidayssada hintteka wolis atto giite .
51003014	He ubbaa bolla ubbabaa issife shiishidi qachchiya siiqo ma77ite .
51003015	Xoossay hinttena issi asi oothidi xeegiday , sarotethas gidiya gisho Kiristtoosa sarotethay hintte wozanaa haaro .
51003016	Kiristtoosa qaalay hintte wozanan kumidi de7o . Cinccatetha ubban issoy issuwa tamaarssitenne zorite . Mazmuren , sabaninne ayyaana yethan Xoossaa wozanappe galatishe yexxite .
51003017	Xoossaa Aawa Yesuusa baggara galatishe hintte odettiyabaa woykko oothiyabaa ubbaa Godaa Yesuusa sunthan oothite .
51003018	Machcheto , ammaniyaa asaas bessiyabaa gidiya gisho hintte azinatas haarettite .
51003019	Azinatoo , hintte machcheta siiqite ; enttaw iitoppite .
51003020	Nayto , hinttena yelidayssatas ubbaban kiitettite ; hessi Godaa ufayssiyabaa .
51003021	Aawato , hintte nayti ufayssi qanxonna mela entta camethofite .
51003022	Aylleto , sa7an hinttew goda gididayssatas ubbaban kiitettite . Godaa bonchchishe suure wozanappe kiitettidi entta ufayssiteppe attin asi be7o gidi oothofite .
51003023	Hintte oothiya ooso ubbaa asas gidonnashin Godaas oothiya mela wozanappe oothite .
51003024	Godaappe laata woyto oothidi hintte ekkeyssa erite ; hintte Godaa Kiristtoosa haggaazeeta .
51003025	Xoossay asa som77o be7idi pirddonna gisho oonikka iita ooso oothiko ba iita oosuwa gisho zaaro ekkana .
51004001	Godato , hinttewuka qassi salon Goday de7eyssa eridi , hintte aylletas xillotethaninne issuwa issuwafe shaakkonna koshshiyabaa oothite .
51004002	Xoossaa barkkidi galatishe qanxonna woossite .
51004003	Xoossay ba qaalas pengge dooyana melanne taani hessa gaason qashon de7iya Kiristtoosa xuuraa awaajjana mela nuuskka woossite .
51004004	Qassi takka besseyssada qaala qonccisada odana mela taw Xoossaa woossite .
51004005	Injjetiya wode ubbaa go7ettishe ammanonna asaa matan cinccatethan de7ite .
51004006	Hintte asa ubbaas koshshiya zaaro imo erana mela hintte oday ubba wode aadho keehatethan kumidayssanne maxineda mal77iyabaa gidanaw bessees .
51004007	Nu siiqo ishay Tikiqoosi , taara issife Godaa oosuwan aylle gidida , ammanettiya oosanchchoy , ta de7uwabaa hinttew odana .
51004008	Taani iya hintteko kiittiday , nu waanidi de7iyakko hinttew odidi hinttena minthethana melassa .
51004009	Anasmoosi , ammanettiya siiqo ishay , hintte baggay , iyara hintteko bees . Entti hayssan haniyaba ubbaa hinttew odana .
51004010	Taara qashettida Arisxirokoosinne Barnnabaasa ishaa na7ay Marqqoosi , hinttena saro yaagosona . Ta hinttew kase odidayssada Marqqoosi hintteko biikko iya mokkite .
51004011	Yesuusa giy Yasxxoosi hinttena saro saro yaagees . Xoossaa kawotethaa gisho taara oothiya asata giddofe Ayhude gididayssati ha heedzata ; entti tana daro minthethidosona .
51004012	Hintte baggay , Kiristtoos Yesuusa aylley , Ephafiri hinttena saro saro yaagees . I hintte Xoossaa sinthan minnidi eqqanaadanne Xoossaa sheniya eridi polana mela ubba wode Xoossaa hintte gisho woossees .
51004013	I hintte gishonne Loodoqiyaninne Hirapoolisa kataman de7iya asaa gisho daro daaburidayssa ta markkattays .
51004014	Nu siiqo ishay dottorey Luuqaasinne Deemasi , hinttena saro saro yaagosona .
51004015	Loodoqiyan de7iya nu ishatas , Nimfaasinne I keethan shiiqiya asaas nu sarothuwa odite .
51004016	Ha dabddaabbiya hintte nabbabidaappe guye , Loodoqiya woosa keethan nabbabisite . Hintteka Loodoqiya woosa keethay hinttew yeddiya dabddaabbiya nabbabite .
51004017	Qassi Arkkiphaasa , “ Goday new immida oosuwa polanayssa dogoppa ” yaagidi qofisite .
51004018	Taani , Phawuloosi , ha sarothuwa ta kushen xaafas . Ta qashuwa qoppite . Xoossaa aadho keehatethay hinttera gido .
52001001	Phawuloosi Sillaaseynne Ximotiyoosi Teselonqe woosa keethan de7iya , Xoossaa Aawabaanne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosabaa gidida asaas xaafida kiita . Aadho keehatethaynne saroy hinttew gido .
52001002	Nuuni Xoossaa woossiya wode ubban hinttena qoppishe hintte gisho ubba wode Xoossaa galatoos .
52001003	Xoossaa nu Aawa sinthan ammanon hintte oothida oosuwa , siiqon hintte daaburida daaburanne Yesuus Kiristtoosan de7iya ufayssaa ekkanaw hintte minnidi eqqida equwa ubba wode qoppoos .
52001004	Nu ishato , Xoossay hinttena doseyssanne ba ase oothidi hinttena dooridayssa eroos .
52001005	Ays giikko , nuuni Wonggelaa doona xalaalan gidonnashin wolqqan , Geeshsha Ayyaananinne Wonggelaa tumaa ammanon hinttew ehida . Nuuni hinttera gam77ida wode ubban hintte gisho waanidi de7idaakko hintte ereeta .
52001006	Hintte daro meto ekkikokka Geeshsha Ayyaanay immiya ufayssan kiitaa ekkideta ; nunanne Godaa daanideta .
52001007	Hessa gisho , Maqedooniyanne Akkaya biittan de7iya ammaniyaa ubbaas leemiso gidideta .
52001008	Godaa qaalay hinttefe keyidi , Maqedooniyaninne Akkaya xalaalan gidonnashin Xoossaa hintte ammaneyssi ubbason si7ettis . Hiza , nuuni gaanabay aykkoyka baawa .
52001009	Nuuni hintteko bida wode hintte nuna mokkida mokuwanne hinttee , hintte eeqa aggidi tumaanne de7o Xoossaa haggaazanaw hintte simmidayssa entti bantta huu7en odoosona .
52001010	Qassi Xoossaa Na7ay , Yesuusi , Xoossay hayqoppe denthidayssi , sinthafe yaana Xoossaa hanquwafe nuna ashshanayssi , saloppe yaanayssa hintte naageyssa entti markkattosona .
52002001	Ta ishato , nuuni hintteko biday mela gidonnayssa hinttee , hintte huu7en ereeta .
52002002	Shin nuuni hintteko Teselonqe yaanappe sinthe Filphisiyuusa kataman waayettidayssanne cayettidayssa hintte ereeta . Daro ixoy de7ikkoka hinttew iya Wonggelaa odana mela Xoossay nuus minotethi immis .
52002003	Nuuni hinttena zoriday baleson woykko cimon woykko genen gidenna .
52002004	Shin Xoossay nunan ammanettidi ba Wonggelaa odana mela nuus hadara immida gisho odoos . Nu hessa oothey nu wozanaa be7iya Xoossaa ufayssanaassafe attin ase ufayssanaassa gidenna .
52002005	Nu miishe yaaridi worddo hinttena sabbishe hintteko yoonnayssa loythidi ereeta ; Xoossay nuus markka .
52002006	Nuuni hinttefe gidin woykko hara asa ooddefekka bonchcho koyibookko .
52002007	Nuuni Kiristtoosa hawaare gideyssada nuus koshshiyabaa immite gidi ekkanaw dandda7os , shin aaya ba nayta dichcheyssa mela hintte giddon ashkke gidida .
52002008	Nu hinttena dosida gisho Xoossaa Wonggelaa hinttew shaako xalaala gidonnashin nu de7uwakka hinttew immanaw giigida . Hintte nuus daro al77o .
52002009	Nu ishato , nu oosuwanne nu daabura ereeta . Hinttew Xoossaa Wonggelaa odishe , hinttena waaysonna mela qammanne gallas oothida .
52002010	Nu de7oy hintte ammaneyssata mataninne Xoossaa sinthan geeshshi , xillonne borettonnayssa gideyssas hintte markka .
52002011	Nuuni hinttew huu7en huu7en yelidayssati bantta naytas haneyssada hanidayssa ereeta .
52002012	Nu hinttena zorida , minthethida . Qassi ba kawotethaanne ba bonchchuwa shaakkanaw hinttena xeegiya Xoossaa ufayssiya de7o hintte daana mela hinttew minthidi odida .
52002013	Hinttew nuuni Xoossaa qaalaa odida wode asa qaalada gidonnashin Xoossaa qaalada si7idi ekkida gisho nuuni ubba wode Xoossaa galatoos . I tuma Xoossaa qaala ; Xoossaa qaalay ammaniyaa hinttenan oothees .
52002014	Ta ishato , hintte Yihuda biittan de7iya woosa keethatanne yan Kiristtoos Yesuusa kaalliya asatada hanideta . Entta Ayhudeti waaysidayssada hinttenakka hintte biittaa asay waaysidosona .
52002015	He Ayhudeti Godaa Yesuusanne nabeta wodhdhidosona ; qassi nuna goodidosona . Entti Xoossaa ufayssonayssatanne ase ubbaa ixxeyssata .
52002016	Entti hari attoshin , Ayhude gidonna asay attana mela nuuni enttaw qaalaa odeyssa diggoosona . Hessada hanidi entta nagaraa xuu7ay kumana gakkanaw ubba wode nagara oothoosona . Wurssethan , Xoossaa hanqoy entta bolla wodhdhees .
52002017	Shin nu ishato , nuuni nu qofan gidonnashin ashon hinttefe shaakettidi guutha wode gam77idayssan hinttena daro laamotidi be7anaw koyida .
52002018	Nu simmi hintteko baanaw koyida . Taani ta huu7en hintteko baanaw koyas , shin Xalahey nuna diggis .
52002019	Hiza , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosi yaa wode nu ufayssay woykko nu ceeqettiya nu kallachchay oonee ? Hinttena gidekketiyye ?
52002020	Tuma hintte nu bonchchonne nu ufayssi .
52003001	Hessa gisho , nuus genccanaw dandda7ettonna ixxin , Ateena kataman nurkka attanaw qofa qachchida .
52003002	Hinttena zoranaadanne ammanon hinttena minthethanaada nuura issife Xoossas ootheyssanne Kiristtoosa Wonggelaa odiya nu ishaa Ximotiyoosa hintteko kiittida .
52003003	Hinttena gakkida goodan hinttefe oonikka guye simmofo . He gooday nuus Xoossaa shene gideyssa hinttee , hintte huu7en ereeta .
52003004	Nu hinttera de7iya wode goodi gakkanayssa hinttew koyrottidi odida . Hintte ereyssa mela hessada hanis .
52003005	Hessa gisho , taw genccanaw dandda7ettona ixxin , “ Ooni eri Xalahey entta paaccidi nu daaburaa mela ashshonna aggenna ” gada hintte ammanuwabaa eranaw Ximotiyoosa hintteko kiittas .
52003006	Ha77i Ximotiyoosi hintte matappe yidi , hintte ammanuwabaanne hintte siiquwabaa lo77o wore odis . Qassi hintte ubba wode nuus lo77o qoppeyssanne nuuni hinttena be7anaw laamoteyssada hintteka nuna be7anaw laamoteyssa I nuus odis .
52003007	Ta ishato , nuna gakkiya waayaninne nu meto ubban hintte ammanuwa gisho hinttenan minettida .
52003008	Hintte Godan minnidi de7ikko nukka de7on de7oos .
52003009	Hiza , nuuni hintte gaason demmida ufayssas Xoossaa waati galatino ?
52003010	Nuuni hinttena be7anawunne hintte ammanuwan paccidabaa kunthanaw qammanne gallas nu kumetha wozanan Xoossaa woossos .
52003011	Xoossay nu aaway ba huu7eninne nu Goday Yesuus Kiristtoosi nu hintteko baana ogiya giigiso .
52003012	Nu hinttena daro doseyssada Goday hintte issoy issuwa siiqiya siiqonne ase ubbaa siiqiya siiqo hinttew darssonne gujjo .
52003013	Nu Goday Yesuus Kiristtoosi ba geeshshatara yaa wode Xoossaa , nu aawa sinthan hintte wozanay geeshshinne borey baynnayssa oothidi I hinttena minthethana .
52004001	Wurssethan , ta ishato , Xoossaa ufayssanaw hintte waanidi daanaw bessiyako nuuppe tamaarideta . Hessi hintte koyroppe de7ida de7uwa , shin ha77i hintte kaseyssafe aathidi oothanaada Godaa Yesuusa sunthan hinttena woossosinne zoroos .
52004002	Nuuni Godaa Yesuusa maatan hinttena kiittida kiitay awusseeko ereeta .
52004003	Xoossay , hintte geeshshi gidana melanne laymatonna mela koyees .
52004004	Hintte issoy issoy , hintte machchetara geeshshatethaninne bonchchon daanaw bessees .
52004005	Xoossaa eronnanne ammanonna asada laymatetha amon xuugettofite .
52004006	Nu kase hinttew odidayssadanne minthi zoridayssada Goday hessa melabaa oothiya ubbaa pirddiya gisho oonikka hayssatan ba ammaniyaa ishaa naaqqanawunne cimmanaw bessenna .
52004007	Xoossay nuuni geeshshtethan daana melappe attin tunatethan daana mela xeegibeenna .
52004008	Hessa gisho , ha timirttiya ixxiya oonikka hinttew Geeshsha Ayyaana immiya Xoossaa ixxeesppe attin ase gidenna .
52004009	Hintte issoy issuwa waati siiqaneekko Xoossay hinttena tamaarssida gisho ha77i siiqobaa nu hnttew xaafanaw koshshenna .
52004010	Qassi Maqedooniya biittan de7iya ammaniyaa ishata ubbaa tuma hintte doseeta . Shin nu ishato , ha77ika hintte entta aathi dosana mela hinttena woossos .
52004011	Nuuni kase hinttew odidayssada woppu gida de7uwa de7ite . Hinttee , hintte ooso oothidi hinttew duussas koshshiyabaa demmite .
52004012	Hessada hanikko , ammanonnayssata matan hintte bonchchettana ; qassi hinttena koshshiyabas oonakka aadasheketa .
52004013	Nu ishato , ammanidi hayqqida asati hananabaa hintte erana mela koyoos . Hintte entta gisho ufayssi baynna asada kayottofite .
52004014	Nuuni , Yesuusi hayqqidayssanne qassi hayqoppe denddidayssa ammanoos . Hessadakka , Xoossay Yesuusa ammanidi hayqqidayssata iyara wolla ehanayssa ammanoos .
52004015	Goday nuus odidayssada Goday yaa gallas iyara gahettanaw nuuni paxa de7eyssati , hayqqidayssatappe sinthatokko .
52004016	Goday wolqqaama kiitara , kiitanchchota halaqaa girssaraa , Xoossaa moyze punora , saloppe wodhdhana . Kiristtoosa ammanidi hayqqidayssati koyrottidi hayqoppe denddana .
52004017	Hessafe guye , he wode nuuni paxa de7eyssati , Godaara shaaran gahettanaw enttara issife salo ekettana . Hessafe guye , nuuni Godaara issife merinaw daana .
52004018	Hessa gisho , ha qaalan issoy issuwa minthethite .
52005001	Ta ishato , ha hanoti hanana wodiyanne ageena hinttew xaafanaw koshshenna .
52005002	Godaa Gallasay kaysoy qamma yeyssada yaanayssa hintte loythi ereeta .
52005003	Asay , “ Sa7i saro , aykkoyka hanenna ” yaagishin , maccas iqethi oykkeyssada dhayoy entti qopponna entta bolla yaana . Entti ay ogenkka kessi ekkokona .
52005004	Shin nu ishato , he gallasay hinttew kaysoy yeyssada yaanaw hintte dhuman de7ekketa .
52005005	Hintte ubbay poo7o asinne gallasan de7iya asi ; nuuni qamma asi woykko dhuma asi gidokko .
52005006	Hessa gisho , nuuni harati dhiskkeyssada dhiskkanaw bessenna ; nuuni barkkanwunne giigidi daanaw bessees .
52005007	Dhiskkeyssati qamma dhiskkoosona ; mathotteyssati qamma mathottosona .
52005008	Shin nuuni gallasa asi gidiya gisho giigidi daanaw bessees . Ammanonne siiqo xurureda tiran ma77idi , atotethaa ufayssaa huu7en wothiya ola biraata barneexada wothidi daanaw bessees .
52005009	Xoossay nuna nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara kumetha atotethi ekkana mela doorisppe attin hanqos dooribeenna .
52005010	Nuuni paxa de7in woykko hayqqin , Kiristtoosi yaa wode iyara issife daana mela Kiristtoosi nu gisho hayqqis .
52005011	Hessa gisho , hintte kase ootheyssada , issoy issuwa minthethitenne dichchite .
52005012	Nu ishato , hintte giddon ootheyssata , hinttena kaalethana melanne zorana mela Goday dooridayssata bonchchana mela hinttena woossos .
52005013	Entti oothiya oosuwa gisho entta daro bonchchitenne siiqite . Issoy issuwara sarotethan de7ite .
52005014	Nu ishato , nuuni hinttena zoroos . Boozata hanqite ; babbeyssata minthethite ; daaburanchchota maaddite ; ase ubbaa dandda7ite .
52005015	Oonikka iita gisho iita zaaronna mela naagettite . Hintte wolisinne asa ubbaas lo77obaa oothanaw minnite .
52005016	Ubba wode ufayttite .
52005017	Ubba wode Xoossaa woossite .
52005018	Ubbaban galatite . Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara Xoossay hinttefe koyey hessa .
52005019	Geeshsha Ayyaana oosuwa toysoppite .
52005020	Tinbbite qaala kadhoppite .
52005021	Ubbabaa paaccite ; lo77obaa ekkite .
52005022	Iita ooso ubbaafe haakkite .
52005023	Saro immiya Xoossay ba huu7en hinttena polo geeshsho . Nu Goday Yesuus Kiristtoosi yaana gallasaas , Xoossay hintte ayyaanaa , hintte shemppuwanne hintte kumetha asatethaa borey baynna naago .
52005024	Hinttena xeegeyssi ammanettidayssa gidiya gisho hessa I polana .
52005025	Nu ishato , nuus Xoossaa woossite .
52005026	Ammaniya asa ubbaa geeshsha yeeretethan sarothite .
52005027	Hintte ha kiitaa ammaniyaa asa ubbaas nabbabanaada Godaa sunthan hinttena woossays .
52005028	Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethay hinttera issife gido . Amin77i .
53001001	Phawuloosi , Sillaaseynne Ximotiyoosi Teselonqe woosa keethan de7iya , Xoossaa Aawabaanne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosabaa gidida asaas xaafida kiitaa .
53001002	Xoossaa nu Aawappenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hinttew gido .
53001003	Nu ishato , hintte ammanoynne hintte issoy issuwanne harata siiqiya siiqoy daro dicciya gisho nuuni hessas Xoossaa ubba wode galatanaw bessees .
53001004	Hinttena gakkida goodaninne waaye ubban genccaninne ammanon minnidi eqqida gisho nuuni nu huu7en Xoossaa woosa keethatan hinttebaa markkattishe hinttenan ceeqettoos .
53001005	Hintte iya gisho gidi meto ekkiya Xoossaa kawotethaas besseyssata gididi taybettana mela Xoossaa xillo pirddaas hayssi malla .
53001006	Xoossay tuma pirddaa pirddana . Xoossay hinttena waayseyssata bolla waaye ehana .
53001007	Goday Yesuusi ba wolqqaama kiitanchchotara , tama lacora saloppe yaa wode waayettiya hinttenanne nuna shemppisana .
53001008	Qassi Xoossay bana eronnayssatanne nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Wonggelaas kiitettonayssata pirddana .
53001009	Entti Godaa sinthafenne iya bonchchuwa wolqqaafe shaakettidi merinaa dhayuwan pirddettana .
53001010	He gallas , I bayssataninne bana ammaneyssata ubban bonchchettanwunne sabettanaw yaa wode nu hinttew odida kiitaa hintte ammanida gisho hintte iya bonchcheyssata giddoninne sabbeyssata giddon daana .
53001011	Nuuni hinttew ubba wode Xoossaa woossey hessassa . Nu Xoossay hinttena xeegida de7uwas besseyssata gididi taybettana mela nuuni woossos . Hintte lo77obaa oothanaw amottiya amuwaanne hintte ammano oosuwa I ba wolqqan polo .
53001012	Hessan nu Xoossaanne nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethan , Godaa Yesuusa sunthaa hintte bonchchana ; hinttenakka I bonchchana .
53002001	Nu ishato , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa yuussabaanne nu iyara gahettanaw shiiqanabas nu hinttena woossos .
53002002	Tinbbiten woykko hara asappe si7ida qaalan woykko nuuppe ekkida kiitada oothidi , “ Godaa gallasay gakkis ” gidi hintte wozanay dagammofonne waabbaqoppo .
53002003	Hinttena oonikka ay ogenkka balethofo . Kasetidi wurssetha uraa geellatethay qoncconnanne dhayoy bessiya geella uray yoonna de7ishin , Godaa gallasay gakkenna .
53002004	Asi goynniyabanne xoossayaba ubbaa I ixxananne bana dhoqqu oothana . Hari attoshin , Xoossa keethi geli uttidi , “ Taani Xoosse ” gaana .
53002005	Taani hinttera de7ashe hinttew odidayssa akeekekketii ?
53002006	I ba gallasan yaanappe attin ha77i yoonnaada aybi iya teqqiyako ereeta .
53002007	Asaas qoncciboonna geellatetha xuura wolqqay ha77ika oothees , shin ha77i iya teqqeyssi de7ees . Iya teqqeyssi ogeppe kichchana gakkanaw I qonccenna .
53002008	Hessafe guye , geella uray qonccana , shin Godaa Yesuusi ba doonappe keyaa shemppuwan ba bonchcho yuussan iya wodhana .
53002009	Geella uray Xalahiya wolqqan yidi worddo malaatatanne malaalisiyabata oothana .
53002010	Hessadakka , dhayos de7iya asata dumma dumma cimmiya iita ooson balethana . Entti dhayiday ashshiya tumaa dosidi ekkonna ixxida gishossa .
53002011	Hessa gisho , entti worddo gidiyabaa ammanana mela Xoossay wolqqaama baleso entta bolla yeddana .
53002012	Hessika , tumaa ammanonna asati , nagara ooson ufayttessati ubbay pirddettana melassa .
53002013	Goday dosiya nu ishato , nuuni Xoossaa hintte gisho ubba wode galatanaw bessees . Hintte attana mela Xoossay Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqqan hinttena geeshshidayssanne hintteka tumaa ammanidayssan I hinttena bayrada dooris .
53002014	Xoossay , nu hinttew odida Wonggelaa baggara hinttena xeegiday , hintte nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosara issife bonchchettanassa .
53002015	Hiza , nu ishato , minnidi eqqite . Nuuni hinttena nu doonan gidin woykko dabddaabbiyan gidin tamaarssida timirttiya oykkite .
53002016	Xoossay nu aaway nuna dosees . I nuus keeha ; I merinaa minthethonne lo77o ufayssaa nuus immis . Hintte ubba wode lo77obaa oothanawunne odettanaw I minthethana melanne maaddana mela nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosanne Xoossaa nu aawa woossos .
53002017	
53003001	Wurssethan nu ishato , Godaa qaalay hintte giddon ellesidi dalgganaadanne bonchchettanaada nuus woossite .
53003002	Hessadakka , asi ubbay qaalaa si7idi ammanonna gisho Xoossay geellatappenne iita asatappe nuna ashshana mela nuus woossite .
53003003	Shin Goday ammanettidayssa ; I hinttena minthethananne Xalaheppe naagana .
53003004	Nuuni hinttena kiitteyssa ha77ika sinthafekka hintte oothanayssas Godan nuuni ammanettos .
53003005	Goday hintte wozanaa Xoossaa siiquwakkonne Kiristtoosa dandda7aakko kaaletho .
53003006	Nu ishato , hintte nuuppe ekkida kiitaa kaallonnayssatappenne ooso billiya azalla ammaniyaa asatappe hintte shaakettanaada Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunthan hinttena kiittoos .
53003007	Nuuda hanidi daanaw besseyssa hinttee , hintte huu7en ereeta . Nuuni hinttera de7iya wode ooso billibookko .
53003008	Nuuni ooddefekka kathi mela mibookko . Nuus dandda7ettida mela qammanne gallas oothi daaburidi de7idappe attin ooddeskka tooho gidibookko .
53003009	Nuuni hessa oothiday , hinttew leemiso gidanaassafe attin hinttefe maade oychchanaw nuus maati dhayina gidenna .
53003010	Nu hinttera de7iya wodekka , “ Oothanaw koyonna asi oonikka mooppo ” yaagidi kiittida .
53003011	Nuuni hessa giday , hintte giddon issi issi azallati de7eyssa si7ida gishossa . He asati gelssonnaban gelidi harata ooso bilisoosonappe attin aykkoka oothokona .
53003012	Nuuni hessa mela asati maara de7o daanadanne banttana koshshiyabaa oothidi demmanaada Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunthan entta kiittosinne zoroos .
53003013	Shin nu ishato , lo77o ooso oothanaw azallofite .
53003014	Ha77i nuuni ha dabddaabbiyan kiittida kiitas kiitettonna asi oonikka de7ikko he uraa erite . I yeellatana mela iyappe shaakettite .
53003015	Shin iya ishada seeriteppe attin morkkeda xeellofite .
53003016	Saro immiya Goday , ba huu7en hinttew ubba wodenne ubba baggara saro immo . Goday hintte ubbaara gido .
53003017	Taani Phawuloosi , ha kiitaa ta kushen xaafas . Ta kiita ubbaas mallay hayssa ; taani hessada xaafays .
53003018	Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethay hintte ubbaara gido .
54001001	Nuna ashshiya Xoossaaninne nu ufayssan naagiya Yesuus Kiristtoosan kiitettida , Yesuus Kiristtoosa hawaare gidida , Phawuloosappe ,
54001002	ammanon taw tuma na7a gidida Ximotiyoosas . Xoossaa nu Aawa , nu Godaa Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethay , maarotethaynne sarotethay new gido .
54001003	Taani Maqedooniya bashe nena hadaridayssada , issi issi asati worddo timirttiya tamaarsseyssa digganaw ne Efesoonan gam77ana mela koyays .
54001004	Entti go77i baynna hayse odanne bantta kochcha taybuwa agganaada oda . Hessa melabay palama kaaletheesippe attin ammanon oosettiya Xoossaa oosuwas maaddenna .
54001005	Ha kiitaa huu7e qofay geeshsha wozanappe , lo77o kahappenne tuma ammanuwappe benttiya siiquwa denthethanaassa .
54001006	Issi issi asati hayssa aggidi , pathonna odakko simmidosona .
54001007	Entti Xoossaa higgiya asttamaare gidanaw koyoosona . Shin entti ay odiyakko woykko tuma oothidi odeyssi i aybeekko erokkona .
54001008	Asi besseyssada higgiyan go7ettiko higgey lo77o gideyssa eroos .
54001009	Issibaa akeekanaw koshshees . Higgey lo77o asaas medhettibeenna . Shin higgey , higge mentheyssata , worandzota , Xoosse yayyonnayssata , shemppo wodheyssata , nagaranchchota , geeshshatethi baynnayssata , tunata , hari attoshin bantta aayiw woykko aawa wodheyssata ,
54001010	laammeyssata , addey addera laymateyssata , ase bayzeyssata , worddanchchota , worddon caaqqeyssata , woykko tuma timirttiyara gahettonna ay ooso ootheyssata seeranaw keyis .
54001011	He timirttey bonchchonne anjjettida Xoossay taani awaajjana mela taw hadara immida Wonggelaa giddon de7ees .
54001012	Taani oothiya oosuwan taw wolqqaa immida nu Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa galatays . Tana ba oosuwas shuumidi he oosuwas bessaasa gidi taybida gisho iya galatays .
54001013	Taani hayssafe kase iya cayeyssa , iya yedetheyssanne metootheyssa gidikkoka taani hessa eronnanne ammanonna oothida gisho Xoossay tana maaris .
54001014	Nu Goday ba aadho keehatethaa ta bolla gussidi , he aadho keehatethaara ammanonne siiqo Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara taw immis .
54001015	“ Kiristtoos Yesuusi nagaranchchota ashshanaw ha alamiya yis ” giya qaalay ammantheyssanne asa ubbay ekkanaw besseyssa . Ubbaafe aadhdhida nagaranchchoy tana .
54001016	Shin merinaa de7uwa ekkanaw iya ammaniyaa asaas taani leemiso gidana mela Yesuus Kiristtoosi daro dandda7is . Taw ubbaafe aadhdhida nagaranchchuwas Xoossay ba maarota darssis .
54001017	Ayfen benttonnayssas , issi Xoossaas , hayqqonnayssas , merinaa Kawuwas , merinaappe merinaa gakkanaw galataynne bonchchoy gido . Amin77i .
54001018	Ximotiyoosa , ta na7aw , kase nebaa nabeti odida qaala bolla eqqada ha kiitaa hadara new immays . Ne he qaala kaalliko lo77o olaa olettana .
54001019	Ammanoynne lo77o kahi new de7o . Issoti issoti kaha dhayidi markkabey hobben dhayeyssada bantta ammanuwa dhayssidosona .
54001020	Hessa hanidayssata giddon Hemeneyoosinne Iskkinddirey de7oosona . Entti tamaaridi Xoossaa cayeyssa aggana mela taani Xalahes enttana aatha immas .
54002001	Ubbaafe sinthatada , asa ubbaas Xoossaa oychchanaw , woossanaw , gaannatanawunne galatanaw besseyssa taani nena akeekisays .
54002002	Nuuni tuma ayyaana de7oninne geeshshatethan Xoossaa goynnishe sarotethaninne woppu gida de7on daana mela kawotasinne shuumata ubbaas woossite .
54002003	Hessa mela woosay nuna ashshiya Xoossaa sinthan lo77onne ufayssiyabaa .
54002004	Xoossay asi ubbay attanaadanne tumaa eranaada koyees .
54002005	Issi Xoossi de7ees . Xoossafenne asappe giddon gididi sigethiya issoy de7ees ; ikka ase gidida Kiristtoos Yesuusa .
54002006	I asa ubbaa wozanaw bana aathi immis . Xoossay ba wodiyan asa ubbaa wozanaw koyeyssa bessiya markkay hayssa .
54002007	Xoossay tana Wonggelaas asttamaarenne hawaare oothidi dooriday hessassa . Taani tuma odays ; worddotikke ; ammanonne tumaa Ayhude gidonna asaas markkattana mela Xoossay tana shuumis .
54002008	Hessa gisho , ubba bessan de7iya addeti , bantana Xoossaas dummayidi , hanqonne palama diggidi , bantta kushiya pude denthidi Xoossaa woossana mela koyays .
54002009	Hessada maccasay banttana haaridayssa qonccisiya , bonchchoynne maari de7iya ma7uwa ma77anaw bessees . Entti maari baynna huu7e dathan , worqqan woykko inqon , woykko al77o afilan banttana alleeqisoppo .
54002010	Shin Xoossaas goynnays giya maccasay banttaw besseyssada lo77obaa oothona .
54002011	Maccasi kiitetethan si77i gidi tamaaro .
54002012	Taani maccasay tamaarssana mela woykko adde bolla aawatana mela gidonnashin si77i gidi daana mela koyays .
54002013	Addaamey koyro medhettis ; guyeppe Hewaanna medhettasu .
54002014	Qassi cimettada Xoossaa higgiya menthiday maccasippe attin Addaame gidenna .
54002015	Shin maccasi ammanon , siiqoninne geeshshatethan banttana haaridi de7ikko nayta yelon attana .
54003001	Oonikka , “ Woosa keethi kaalethiya asi gidanaw koykko lo77obaa amottees ” giya oday tuma .
54003002	Woosa keethaa kaalethiya asi borettonnayssa , issi machchi xalaali de7eyssa , maaran de7eyssa , bana haareyssa , besseyssada ootheyssa , imathe mookkeyssa , tamaarssanaw dandda7eyssa ,
54003003	mathottonayssa , ooyettonayssa , palamonnayssa , miishe siiqonnayssa ,
54003004	iya nayti iyaw kiitetteyssanne bonchcheyssa , ba keethaa aysanaw dandda7eyssa gidanaw bessees .
54003005	Issi asi ba keethaa aysanaw dandda7onnaa ixxiko , Xoossaa woosa keethi waati aysanaw dandda7ii ?
54003006	Otoron sugettidi , Xalahey Xoossaa pirddan kunddidayssada kunddonna mela , oorathi ammanida asi gidanaw bessenna .
54003007	Boreninne Xalahe xihen gelonna mela he uray ammanonna asa matan nashetteyssa gidanaw bessees .
54003008	Hessada qassi woosa keethaa daaqoneti bonchchettidayssata , nam77u doona odettonayssata , daro woyne ushshaa uyonnayssata , miishe yaaretonnayssata ,
54003009	ammanuwa xuuraa geeshsha kahan naageyssata gidanaw bessees .
54003010	Entti koyrottidi paacettanaw koshshees ; entta bolla borey baynna ixxiko , woosa keethaa daaqone gididi ootho .
54003011	Hessadakka , entta maccasati bonchchettidayssata , zigironnayssata , maaran de7eyssata , ubbaban ammanetteyssata gidanaw bessees .
54003012	Woosa keethaa daaqoneti issi machchi xalaali de7eyssa gido . Ba naytanne ba keethaa loythi ayseyssa gidanaw bessees .
54003013	Woosa keethaa daaqone gididi , lo77o ooso ootheyssati , enttaw gita bonchcho qassi Kiristtoos Yesuusan banttaw de7iya ammanuwabaa odanaw daro minotethi demmana .
54003014	Taani ha kiitaa new xaafashe , ellesada neekko baana gada ufayssi wothays .
54003015	Shin taani boonna gam77iko , Xoossaa Keethan asay waanidi daanaw bessiyako erana mela hayssa new xaafays . De7o Xoossaa keethay tumatethaas tuussinne baaso .
54003016	Nu ammanuwa xuuray sidhey baynna gita . Kiristtoosi asho ma77idi qonccis ; Iya tumatethaa Geeshsha Ayyaanay markkattis . Kiitanchchotas benttis ; I kawotetha ubbaas sabbakettis . Alamen de7iya asan ammanettis ; bonchchon salo ekettis .
54004001	Yaana wodiyan balethiya ayyaanatanne tuna ayyaanata timirttiya kaallidi , issi issi asay ammanuwa kaddanayssa Geeshsha Ayyaanay qonccisidi odis .
54004002	Hessa mela timirttey entta kahay doccin , asaa balethiya worddanchcho asttamaaretappe yees .
54004003	Hessa mela asati ekonne gelo qassi issi issi kathata moonna mela diggoosona . Shin ammaneyssatinne tumaa ereyssati Xoossaa galati woossidi maana mela Xoossay kathi medhdhis .
54004004	Xoossay medhdhida ubbabay lo77o . Xoossaa galatidi miikko wora wodhdhiyabay aybikka baawa .
54004005	Ubbabay Xoossaa qaalaninne woosan geeshshi gidees .
54004006	Hessa gisho , neeni ha timirttiya ammaneyssata tamaarssiko , nu ammanuwaninne lo77o timirttiya kiitettada diccida Kiristtoos Yesuusa lo77o aylle gidana .
54004007	Shin go77i baynna tuma gidonna odappenne cima maccasaa haysiyappe baqata . Tuma ayyaana de7on daanaw nena loohisa .
54004008	Asi ba asatethaa minthanaw oothiya oosoy guuthi maaddees . Shin tuma ayyaana de7on bana loohisoy ha77ika merinawukka de7o immiya ufayssi de7iya gisho ubbaas maaddees .
54004009	Ha qaalay asa ubbay ekkanaw bessiya tuma oda .
54004010	Nuuni asa ubbaa , ubbaafe aathidi ammaneyssata ashshiya de7o Xoossaafe ekkana gidi ufayssan naagiya gisho , hessas nuuni ooson daaburosinne baaxetoos .
54004011	Hayssa kiittanne tamaarssa .
54004012	Neeni yalaga gidiya gisho nena oonikka kadhoppo . Shin ammaneyssatas neeni odan , ooson , siiqon , ammanoninne geeshshatethan leemiso gida .
54004013	Taani yaana gakkanaw asaas Geeshsha maxaafaa nabbabon , sabbakoninne tamaarsson minna .
54004014	Tinbbitey odettin , cimati bantta kushiya ne bolla wothida wode neeni ekkida , nenan de7iya Geeshsha Ayyaana imotaa kadhoppa .
54004015	Ne dichchay asa ubbaas qonccana mela hessa mintha qoppa ; hayssa ubba wode ootha .
54004016	Ne huu7iyasinne ne timirttiyas naageeta . Neeni hessa ubba wode oothiko nenanne nena si7eyssata ashshaasa .
54005001	Cima addeta ne aawada bonchchafe attin hanqettofa . Yalaga addeta ne ishada oothada xeella .
54005002	Cima maccasata ne aayida , yalaga maccasata ne michchida , polo geeshshatethan oykka .
54005003	Azini hayqqida tuma am77eta bonchcha .
54005004	Shin am77ees nayti woykko nayta nayti de7ikko , he nayti tuma ayyaana de7on de7eyssa bessanaw banttana yelidayssatanne , bantta wogga aayiwunne wogga aawa maaddidi kushe zaaro tamaaro . Hessi Xoossaa ufayssiyabaa .
54005005	Barkka de7iya tuma am77iya Xoossafe maade demmanaw ufayssan naagasu . Gallasinne qamma Xoossay bana maaddana mela woossawusunne oychchawusu .
54005006	Shin ha alamiyan lo77o duussaa xalaala koyaa am77iya paxa de7ashe hayqqidaaro .
54005007	Oonikka entta boronna mela ha kiitaa enttaw imma .
54005008	Shin ba dabbotas , ubbaafe aathidi ba soo asaas qopponna oonikka ba ammanuwa kaddidayssa ; ammanonna asappeka aadhdhida iita .
54005009	Laythi usuppun tammu kumiboonna am77ee sunthaa mazggaban xaafoppa . Qassi hessa bolla iya ba azinaas ammanettidaaro gidanaw koshshees .
54005010	Nayta dishon , imathe mokon , geeshshata tohuwa meechchan , metootiya asaa maaden , lo77o ooso ubbaas bana aatha immidaaronne lo77o ooson erettidaaro gidanaw bessees .
54005011	Shin yalaga am77eta sunthaa mazggaban xaafoppa . Enttana azina gelo gelo giya asho amoy oykkiya wode Kiristtoosa aggana .
54005012	Entti koyro gelida qaala menthida gisho pirddettana .
54005013	Hessa bolla entti ooso dhayidi keethafe keethe yuuyana . Yuushsha xalaala gidonnashin zigirssaninne banttana gathonnaban gelidi bessonnabaa odettoosona .
54005014	Hessa gisho , nu morkketi nu bolla odettiya iitabaa demmonna mela yalaga am77eti azina gelidi , na7a yelidi , bantta keethaa aysana mela zorays .
54005015	Hayssafe kase guutha am77eti Xalahe kaallanaw guye simmidosona .
54005016	Issi ammaniyaa maccasees soo asaa giddon am77eti de7ikko iya entta maaddanaw bessees . Hessada oothiko , woosa keethaas toohoy kawuyees . He wode woosa keethay maade bessiya tuma am77eta maaddanaw dandda7ees .
54005017	Woosa keethi loythi heemmiya cimati , ubbaafe aathidi , qaala sabbakoninne tamaarsson daabureyssati dakko bonchcho ekkanaw bessees .
54005018	Geeshsha Maxaafay , “ Wudumman kathaa yedhdhiya booraa doona qachchofa ” hessadakka , “ Oosanchchoy ba damooziya ekkanaw bessees ” yaagees .
54005019	Nam77u woykko heedzu markki baynna , woosa keetha cima mootiyabaa si7oppa .
54005020	Harati yayyana mela nagara oothiya oonakka asa ubbaa sinthan hanqetta .
54005021	Neeni asa som77o be7onna , issuwa issuwafe dummayonna ha kiitaa naagana mela Xoossaa , Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosanne doorettida kiitanchchota sinthan ta nena zorays .
54005022	Oodde bollaka ne kushiya wothada shuumanaw ellessoppa . Harata nagaran geloppa ; nena geeshshatethan naaga .
54005023	Neeni ubba wode harggettiya gishonne ne ulo harggiya gisho haatha xalaala uyoppa ; guutha woyne uya .
54005024	Issi issi asata nagaray qoncce ; entta nagaray entta pirddanaw enttafe sinthe aadhdhees , shin harata nagaray guyeppe gam77idi qonccees .
54005025	Hessada , lo77o oosoykka qoncce ; qoncconna ixxikokka geemmanaw dandda7enna .
54006001	Xoossaa sunthaynne nu timirttey cayettonna mela aylletethan de7eyssati banttana haariya godata bonchcho .
54006002	Ammaniya godati de7iya aylleti , entta godati enttaw isha gidiya gisho entta kadhoppo . Entta oosuwan maaddettiya godati , ammaneyssatanne dosettidayssata gidiya gisho entti kaseyssafe aathidi oothanaw bessees . Neeni hayssa tamaarssanawunne entti oothana mela zoranaw bessees .
54006003	Oonikka dumma timirttiya tamaarssiyaba gidikko , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa tuma qaalaranne nu ammanuwa timirttiyara gahettenna .
54006004	He uray otoron sugetteesippe attin aykkoka erenna . Enttaw issi qofa bolla palamanawunne ooyettanaw iita amoy de7ees . Hessi qanaate , ooshshi , cashshe , iita sidhenne ,
54006005	giigonna palamaa kaalethees . Qassi enttaw iita wozani de7ees ; tumaakka balidosona ; entti Xoossaa ammanoy duretethas oge gidi qoppoosona .
54006006	Shin taw de7iyabay gidana giya asas tuma ayyaana de7oy gita wodhe .
54006007	Nuuni ha alamiya aykkoka ehibookko ; qassi iyappe aykkoka ekkidi bookko .
54006008	Nuus kathinne ma7oy de7ikko hessi gidana .
54006009	Shin duretethi koyeyssati paaceninne xihen geloosona . Qassi enttana duge dafiyanne dhayssiya eeyatethinne qohiya amon kunddoosona .
54006010	Miishe siiqoy iitatetha ubbaas pultto . Issoti issoti miishe amottishe ammanoppe balettidi daro meton banttana yeggidosona .
54006011	Shin neno , Xoossaa asoo , hessafe baqata . Xillotethaa , Xoossaa daano , ammano , siiqo , dandda7anne ashkketethi kaalla .
54006012	Ammano baaxiya loytha baaxeta . Daro asaa sinthan ne markkattida ne ammanuwabaa , Xoossay nena iyaw xeegida merinaa de7uwa oykka .
54006013	Ubbaas de7o immiya Xoossaa sinthaninne , Phenxe Philaaxoosa sinthan lo77o markka markkattida Kiristtoos Yesuusa sinthan ta nena kiittays .
54006014	Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosi qonccana gakkanaw ha kiitaa balinne borey baynna naaga .
54006015	Ba xalaala ubbaa haariya bonchcho Xoossay , kawota kawoy , godata Goday , ba qoppida qamman Yesuus Kiristtoosa zaari kiittana .
54006016	Issi iya xalaali hayqqenna . Oonikka shiiqanaw dandda7onna poo7on de7ees . Oonikka iya be7ibeenna ; qassi be7anawukka dandda7enna . Bonchchoynne merinaa wolqqay iyaw gido . Amin77i .
54006017	Ha alamiya dureti coo dhayaa shalon otorttonna melanne ceeqqonna mela oda . Nuus koshshiyabaa palahisidi immiya nuna anjjiya , dure Xoossan ammanettana mela entta kiitta .
54006018	Entti lo77o ooso oothanaada lo77o ooson duretanaada , keehatanne haratas shaakkeyssata gidana mela kiitta .
54006019	Hessi enttaw sinthas mino baaso gidiya gisho he wode entti tuma de7oy ay daaniyakko erana .
54006020	Ximotiyoosa , issi issi asay , “ Eratethi ” giya eeya palamappenne hada odappe baqata ; new imettida hadaraa naaga .
54006021	Issoti issoti nuus eratethi de7ees yaagishe ammanuwa aggidosona . Xoossaa aadho keehatethay hintte ubbaara gido .
55001001	Xoossaa shenen , Yesuus Kiristtoosan benttida de7o ufayssaa markkattanaw Yesuus Kiristtoosa hawaare gidida Phawuloosappe ,
55001002	ta dosiya na7aa Ximotiyoosas kiitettida kiita . Xoossaa Aawappenne nu Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusappe aadho keehatethay , maarotethaynne sarotethay new gido .
55001003	Taani , ta woosan qammanne gallas nena qoppays . Taani woossiya wode ta mayzata Xoossaanne taani lo77o kahan haggaaziya Xoossaa ne gisho galatays .
55001004	Taani ne afuthaa qoppays ; nena be7ada ufayttanaw daro laamotays .
55001005	Qassi new de7iya tuma ammanuwa erays . He ammanoy beni ne wogga aaye Loydininne ne aaye Ewuniqin de7iya ammanuwa mela .
55001006	Hessa gisho , taani ta kushiya ne bolla wothida wode Xoossay new immida imotaa neeni zaara eethana mela akeekisays .
55001007	Ays giikko , Xoossay nuus wolqqaa , siiqonne nu huu7e haariya Ayyaana immisppe attin yashsha ayyaana immibeenna .
55001008	Hiza , nu Godaas markkattanaw yeellatoppa ; qassi iya gisho qashettida tanankka yeellatoppa . Shin Xoossay new immiya wolqqan Wonggelaa gisho taara meto ekka .
55001009	Xoossay ba sheneninne ba aadho keehatethan nuna ashshidi , ba geeshsha dere oothanaw nuna doorisppe attin nuuni oothida oosuwa gisho gidenna . Ha aadho keehatethaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara alamey medhettanaappe sinthe nuus immis .
55001010	Ha77i ha aadho keehatethay nuna ashshiya Kiristtoos Yesuusa yuussan qonccis . I hayqo wolqqaa dhayssidi , Wonggelaa baggara dhayonna de7o nuus qonccisis .
55001011	Taani Wonggelaa sabaake , hawaarenne asttamaare gidana mela Xoossay tana dooris .
55001012	Taani hessa gisho ha metuwa ekkays ; shin ta ammaney ooneekko eriya gisho yeellatikke . Taw imettida hadaraa he gallasay gakkanaw I naaganaw dandda7eyssa erays .
55001013	Taani nena tamaarssida tuma qaala leemiso ootha oykkada Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara nubaa gidida ammanuwaninne siiquwan de7a .
55001014	Nu giddon de7iya Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqqan new imettida lo77o hadaraa naaga .
55001015	Iisiya biittan de7iya ubbay taappe haakkidayssa eraasa ; entta giddon Figeluusinne Hermmogeneesi de7oosona .
55001016	Anesfoori tana daro wode minthethida gisho Goday iya soo asaas qadhetto . Taani qasho keethan de7iya wode I tanan yeellatibeenna .
55001017	Hessa bolla I Roome katamaa yida wode tana minthi koyidi demmis .
55001018	Wurssetha gallasan Goday iyaw qadhettana mela taani Godaa woossays . Efesoona kataman I tana ay mela maaddidaakko ne loytha eraasa .
55002001	Hiza , ta na7aw , Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7iya maarotethan minna .
55002002	Daro markkatta sinthan taani nena tamaarssida timirttiya , harata tamaarssanaw dandda7iya ammanettida asaas hadara imma .
55002003	Yesuus Kiristtoosas ammanthiya wotaaddare gidada taara meto ekka .
55002004	Ola wotaaddarey ba halaqaa ufayssanaw giigetteesippe attin hara ooson bana peeshshenna .
55002005	Hessadakka , gaadde woxxiya oonikka bessiya ogera gaaddettonna ixxiko woyto ekkenna .
55002006	Goshshan daaburiya goshshanchchoy ba daabura ayfiyaappe miya koyro asi gidanaw bessees .
55002007	Ne akeekana mela Goday nena maaddana gisho ta new odidabaa ne wozanan naaga .
55002008	Taani markkattiya Wonggelaa mela hayqoppe denddida , Dawite zerethi gidida Yesuus Kiristtoosa qoppa .
55002009	Taani Wonggelaa odiya gisho iitabaa oothida asada , qashettada meto ekkas . Shin Xoossaa qaalay qashettenna .
55002010	Hessa gisho , Xoossay doorida asati Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7iya atotethaa merinaa bonchchuwara ekkana mela entta gisho ubbaban waayettays .
55002011	Hayssada yaagiya tuma qaali de7ees ; “ Nuuni iyara hayqqidabaa gidikko , Iyara issife de7ana .
55002012	Nuuni gencciko , iyara issife kawotana . Nuuni iya kaddiko , i nuna kaddana .
55002013	Nuuni ammanettonna ixxiko , I ammanettidayssa gididi daana . Ays giikko , I bana kaddanaw dandda7enna ” yaagees .
55002014	Neeni entta hayssa akeekisa ; entti qaalata gaason palamonna mela , Godaa sinthan entta zora . Hessi si7eyssata dhayssesippe attin aykkoka maaddenna .
55002015	Neeni tuma qaala suuretethan tamaarsseyssanne yeellayonna oosanchcho gidada , Xoossay nashshiya asada , nenatethaa iyaw immanaw minna .
55002016	Shin ha alamiyas injjetiya go77onna odappe baqata . Hessa mela oday ase Xoossaafe haassees .
55002017	Hessa mela oday asatethi midigiya paxonna woyzazire maduntha mela . Hessa mela odaa odetteyssata giddofe Hemeneyoosinne Filixoosi de7oosona .
55002018	Ha asati tuma ogiya aggidi , “ Hayqqida asay hayqoppe beni denddidosona ” yaagidi guutha asata ammanuwa dhayssidosona .
55002019	Gidoshin , Xoossay mino zaalla hiixida gisho qaaxxanaw dandda7enna . Iya bolla , “ Goday bayssata erees . Godaa sunthaa xeegiya oonikka iita oosoppe haakko ” yaagiya qaalay xaafettis .
55002020	Issi gita keethan worqqafe woykko birappe oosettida miisheta xalaala gidonnashin mithafe woykko urqqafe oosettida miishetikka de7oosona . Hessatappe baggati bonchcho oosos , qassi baggati tooshettiya oosos pee7osona .
55002021	Hessa gisho , oonikka iita ubbaa aggikonne bana geeshshiko , bonchcho ooso oothiya miishe gidana . Entta de7oy geeshshinne Godaa ufayssiyabaa , qassi entti lo77o ooso ubbaa oothanaw dandda7eyssata gidana .
55002022	Na7atetha iita amuwaappe baqata . Geeshsha wozanan Godaa xeegiya asatara issife , xillotethaa , ammanuwa , siiqonne sarotethaa kaalla .
55002023	Shin ooshshi medhdheyssa erada eeyatethinne hada gidida palamappe haakka .
55002024	Godaa oosanchchoy asa ubbaas keeha , lo77o tamaarsseyssanne dandda7anchcho gidanaw besseesippe attin ooyettanaw bessenna .
55002025	I baara eqetteyssata ashkketethan seereyssa gidanaw bessees . Entti bantta nagaraappe simmidi tumaa eranaada Xoossay oothaneekko ooni eri .
55002026	Entti bantta wozanaakko simmidi ba sheniya oothana mela entta oykkida Xalahe xihiyappe kessi ekkana .
55003001	Wurssetha gallasan un77ethiya wodey yaanayssa era .
55003002	Asay banttana doseyssata , miishe siiqeyssata , ceeqetteyssata , otoreyssata , cayeyssata , bantana yelidayssatas kiitettonayssta , galatonnayssta , geeshshatethi baynnayssata ,
55003003	siiqoy baynnayssata , maarotethi eronnayssata , zigireyssata , banttana haaronnayssata , qadhey baynnayssata , lo77o dosonnayssata ,
55003004	morkkees aathi immeyssata , qofi baynnayssata , otoron sugetteyssata , Xoossaafe aathidi asho ufayssanaw doseyssata gidana .
55003005	Entti ammaniyaa daanosonappe attin ammano wolqqaa kaddoosona ; neeni hessa mela asatappe baqata .
55003006	Enttafe issoti issoti asa keethi gelidi nagaran oykettidayssatanne dumma dumma amon sugettiya daaburanchcho maccasata bolla godatosoona .
55003007	He maccasati ubba wode tamaarosona , shin tumaa eranaw dandda7okkona .
55003008	Yaanesinne Yambbareesi Musera eqettidayssada ha asati guuggey oothonayssatanne ammanon kunddida asata gidiya gisho tumaara eqettoosona .
55003009	Shin Yaanesanne Yambbareesa eeyatethay qonccidayssada entta eeyatethayka asa ubbaa sinthan qonccana gisho enttaw hanenna .
55003010	Shin neeni ta timirttiya , ta duussaa , ta qofaa , ta ammanuwa , ta dandda7aa , ta siiquwa , ta genccaa ,
55003011	ta yedetethaanne ta metuwa eraasa . Anxookiyan , Iqooniyonen , Lisxira katamatan tana gakkidabaanne taani dandda7ida metuwa eraasa ; Goday tana he ubbaafe ashshis .
55003012	Kiristtoos Yesuusan Xoossaa ufayssiya de7o daanaw koyaa ubbay goodettana .
55003013	Iita asatinne baletheyssaati banttaw balettishenne harata balethishe kaseppe iiti iiti baana .
55003014	Shin ne tamaarida tumaaninne ne ammanida ammanuwan eqqa . Ne ooddefe tamaaridaakko eraasa .
55003015	Neeni ne na7atethafe doomada Kiristtoos Yesuusa ammanada atotethi demmiya cinccatethi immanaw dandda7iya Geeshsha Maxaafata eradasa .
55003016	Geeshsha Maxaafaa ubbay Xoossaafe imettida qaala . He maxaafay tumaa tamaarssanaw , balidayssata seeranaw , suurisanawunne xillotetha duussaas koshshiya zore immanaw maaddees .
55003017	Xoossaa asi polonne lo77o ooso ubbaa oothanaw giigidayssa gidana mela maaddees .
55004001	Taani nena Xoossaa sinthaninne , kawo gididi haaranaw qoncciya wode paxatanne hayqqidayssata pirddanaw de7iya Kiristtoos Yesuusa sinthan zorays .
55004002	Qaala oda ; wodey injjetin injjetonna ixxin minnada oda . Daro dandda7aninne tamaarsson asaa zora , seeranne denthetha .
55004003	Asay tuma timirttiya si7onna ixxiya wodey yaana . Entti bantta amuwaa kaallidi , banttaw si7anaw ufayssiyabaa odiya asttamaareta shiishoosona .
55004004	Entti tuma timirttiya aggidi , tuma gidonna odaa si7anaw bantta haytha zaarosona .
55004005	Shin neeni ubbaban nena haara . Metuwa dandda7a . Wonggelaa markkatethaa oosuwa ootha . New imettida Xoossaa ooso ubbaa pola .
55004006	Taani yarshshettiya wodey gakkis ; ha alamiya aggada biya wodey matis .
55004007	Taani lo77o ola olettas ; ta gaaddiya woxxada wurssas ; ammanuwa naagas .
55004008	Sinthafe xillotetha kallachchay tana naagees . Hessa xillo pirddaa pirddiya Goday he gallas taw immana . Hessa ta xalaalas gidonnashin iya qonccethaa amottiya ubbaas immana .
55004009	Ellesa yada tana be7a .
55004010	Deemasi ha alamiyan de7iyabata dosidi , tana aggidi , Teselonqe katamaa bis . Qerqisi Galaatiya biittaa , qassi Titoy Dilmmaxiya biittaa bis .
55004011	Luuqaasa xalaali taara de7ees . Marqqoosi Xoossaa ooson tana maaddanaw dandda7iya gisho neera ekkada ya .
55004012	Taani Tikiqoosa Efesoona katamaa kiittas .
55004013	Neeni yashe , Xiro7aada kataman Karppoosa matan aggada yida ta kootiyanne maxaafata taw ekkada ya . Ubbaka galbban xaafettida maxaafata ekkonna yooppa .
55004014	Biraata qoxxiya Iskkinddirey tana daro qohis ; Goday iya oosuwada iyaw zaarana .
55004015	I nu timirttiya daro ixxiya gisho iyappe nena naaga .
55004016	Koyro ta mootettiya wode ubbay aggidi bidosonappe attin oonikka tana maaddibeenna . Xoossay he balaa enttaw tayboppo .
55004017	Shin taani kumetha kiitaa Ayhude gidonna asa ubbaas markkatin , entti si7ana mela Goday ta matan eqqidi taw wolqqa immis . Qassi koshattida gaammoda doona dooyida hayquwappe tana ashshis .
55004018	Goday tana iita ubbaafe ashshidi ba salo kawotetha saron efana . Iyaw merinaappe merinaa gakkanaw bonchchoy gido . Amin77i .
55004019	Phirisqilas , Aqiilasinne Anesfoora soo asaas ta sarothuwa oda .
55004020	Erasxoosi Qoronttoosa kataman attis . Xirofimoosi harggettida gisho Miliixe kataman aggas .
55004021	Balggoy gelanaappe sinthe ellesada ya . Ewubulusi , Phudeesi , Linuusi , Qilaadeynne hara ammaniyaa asati ubbay nena saro saro goosona .
55004022	Goday Yesuus Kiristtoosi ne ayyaanaara gido . Xoossaa maarotethay hintte ubbaara gido .
56001001	Yesuus Kiristtoosa hawaareynne Xoossaa aylley , Phawuloosi , xaafida dabddaabbiya . Xoossay doorida asaa ammanuwa dichchanaadanne tuma ayyaana de7uwa waanidi daanekko bessiya tumaa eraakko entta kaalethanaw taani kiitettas .
56001002	He ammanoynne eratethay merinaa de7uwa ufayssaa bolla zemppis . Hessa daro wodeppe sinthe worddotonna Xoossay nuus immana gidi qaala gelis .
56001003	Nuna ashshiya Xoossay ba woden ha kiitaa odana mela taw hadara immis .
56001004	Nu kothe ammanuwan ta tuma na7aa gidida Tito , Xoossaa Aawappenne nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosappe aadho keehatethay , maarotethaynne sarotethay new gido .
56001005	Taani nena Qarxeesan aggada yiday , neeni attidabaa giigisanaadanne taani kiittidayssada katamaa ubban woosa keetha cimata doorana melassa .
56001006	Cimi borettonnayssa , issi machche azinaa , maara dhayon woykko kiitetetha ixon asi boronna ammaniyaa nayti de7iya asi gidanaw bessees .
56001007	Woosa keetha cimi Xoossaa oosuwa hadara ekkida gisho borettonnayssa , otorttonayssa , elle yilottonnayssa , mathottonayssa , oda medhdhonayssanne bessonna go77as dafettonayssa gidanaw bessees .
56001008	Shin imathe mokkeyssa , lo77obaa ubbaa doseyssa , akeekanchcho , xillo , geeshshinne bana haareyssa gidanaw bessees .
56001009	Harata suure timirttiyan minthethanawunne he timirttiya ixxeyssata zaaranaw ba tamaarida tuma qaalan minnidi eqqanaw bessees .
56001010	Kiitettonayssati , pathonna oda odetteyssati , cimmeyssati ubbaka qaxxaretetha wogaa naagiya daro asati de7oosona .
56001011	Entti bessonna ogen miishe demmanaw koyidi , tamaarssanaw bessonnabaa tamaarssishe keetha asaa ubbaa iissiya gisho entta timirttiya teqqanaw bessees .
56001012	Entta nabetappe issoy , “ Qarxeesa asay ubba wode worddo odettoosona ; iita do7atanne azalla yarambbata ” yaagis .
56001013	Ha markkatethay tuma markkatethi . Hessa gisho , enttaw tuma ammanoy daana mela entta hanqetta .
56001014	Tumaa ixxiya asaa timirttiyanne Ayhudeta pathonna tossiya si7onna mela entta seera .
56001015	Banttaw geeshshi gididayssatas ubbay geeshshi , shin tunatasinne ammanonnaysstas entta qofaynne kahay tunida gisho enttaw aybikka geeshshi gidenna .
56001016	Entti nu Xoossaa eroos goosona , shin bantta oosuwan iya kaddoosona . Entti Xoossan ixettidayssata , kiitettonayssatanne lo77o ooso ubbaas gidonnayssata .
56002001	Shin neeni suure timirttiya phalqqonna timirtte tamaarssanaw bessees .
56002002	Cima addeti banttana haareyssata , woppu gidayssata , bonchchettidayssata , ammanon , siiqoninne dandda7an , mino gidana mela zora .
56002003	Hessadakka , cima maccasay bantta duussan geeshshata , zigironnayssata , woyne ushshan haarettonnayssatanne lo77obaa tamaarsseyssata gidana mela tamaarssa .
56002004	Entti hessada hanikko yalaga maccasay bantta azinatanne bantta nayta siiqana mela tamaarssanaw dandda7osona .
56002005	Xoossaa qaalay borettonna mela banttana haareyssata , geeshshata , bantta son ootheyssata , keehatanne bantta azinatas kiitetteyssata gidana mela yalaga maccasaa tamaarssona .
56002006	Hessadakka , yalaga addati banttana haarana mela zora .
56002007	Neeni ne huu7en lo77o ooso ubban enttaw leemiso gida . Neeni ne timirttiyan eqqidayssanne ammanettidayssa gida .
56002008	Nu morkketi nuna zigiranaw gaasoyaabay enttaw dhayin entti yeellatana mela neeni borettonna lo77o oda odetta .
56002009	Aylleti ubbaban bantta godatas kiitettana mela , entta ufayssana melanne enttara palamonna mela zora .
56002010	Entti bantta godatappe kaysotoppo . Hessika , nuna ashshiya Xoossaa timirttey , ubba ogen dosettidayssa gidana mela bantta oothiya oosuwan ammanetteyssata gideyssa bessana mela entta zora .
56002011	Ase ashshiya Xoossaa aadho keehatethay asa ubbaas qonccis .
56002012	He aadho keehatethay , nu nagaranne ha alamiya amuwaa aggidi , ha wodiyan nuna haaridi , tuma ayyaana de7uwaninne xillotethan daana mela nuna tamaarssees .
56002013	Nuuni anjjettida ufayssaa gidida gita Xoossaanne nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosa bonchcho qonccethaa naagoos .
56002014	Iita ooso ubbaafe nuna wozanawunne lo77obaa oothanaw amottiya ba geeshsha asi kessanaw nu gisho bana aathi immis .
56002015	Neeni hayssa tamaarssa ; kumetha maatan zora , seera ; oonikka nena kadhoppo .
56003001	Asay deriya haareyssatas , aawatethay de7eyssatas haarettanaw , kiitettanawunne lo77o ooso ubbaa oothanaw giigettidayssata gidana mela akeekisa .
56003002	Qassi entti oodde bollaka iita odettonna mela , saro asi gidana mela , ashkketanne asa ubbaas kadhetteyssata gidana mela zora .
56003003	Nuuni kase eeyata , kiitettonayssata , balettidayssata , dumma dumma asho ufayssasinne amos ayllettidayssata . Nuuni iitatethaninne qanaaten kumidayssata ; nu ase ixxeyssata , asikka nuna ixxeyssata .
56003004	Shin ashshiya Xoossaa keehatethaynne siiqoy qonccida wode
56003005	nu oothida xillo oosuwa gisho gidonnashin ba maarotethaa gisho nuna ashshis . Nuna I ashshiday , nam77antho yeletethaa meechchaninne Geeshsha Ayyaana baggara immida ooratha de7uwana .
56003006	He Ayyaana , Xoossay nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara nu bolla darssidi gussis .
56003007	Ba aadho keehatethaa baggara nuna xillisidi merinaa de7uwa laata ufayssaa oykkana mela hessa oothis .
56003008	Ha qaalay ammanettida qaala . Xoossaa ammaneyssati lo77o ooso oothanaw giigidayssata gidana mela ne ha qaala miinthada odana mela ta koyays . Hayssati ase ubbaas lo77onne go77eyssata .
56003009	Shin eeyatetha palamappe , kochcha tayboppe , kachchafenne higge gaason denddiya ooshshaafe naagetta . Hessi go77inne wodhey baynnabaa .
56003010	Shaahotethi medhdhiya uraa koyro zora ; nam77antho hanqetta hessafe guye iyappe haakka .
56003011	Hessa mela asi geellanne nagaranchcho ; I ba bolla pirddeyssa era .
56003012	Taani balggo yan shaaccanaw qoppida gisho Arxemaasa woykko Tikiqoosa neekko kiittiya wode ne taakko Niqophiliyoona yaanaw minna .
56003013	Higge eriya Zeenasinne Aphiloosi oge biya wode enttaw koshshiyabay pacconna mela entta maadda .
56003014	Nu asaykka pathonna asi gididi attonna mela banttaw koshshiyabaa demmana mela lo77o ooso oothanaw minnidi tamaaro .
56003015	Taara de7iya ubbay nena saro goosona ; ammanon nuna siiqiya asaa saro ga . Xoossaa aadho keehatethay hintte ubbaara gido . Amin77i .
57001001	Taani Phawuloosi , Yesuus Kiristtoosa gisho qashon de7eysinne nu ishaa Ximotiyoosi , nuura oothiya nuuni dosiya Filmmoonas ,
57001002	ne son shiiqiya woosa keethaas , nu michche Afibiyasinne nuura issife de7iya wotaaddare Arkkiphaasas xaafida kiita .
57001003	Xoossaa nu Aawappenne nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hinttew gido .
57001004	Neeni geeshshata doseyssanne Godaa Yesuusa ammaneyssa taani si7iya gisho Xoossaa woossashe nena qoppiya wode ubban ta Xoossaa galatays .
57001005	
57001006	Neeni ne ammanuwa haratas shaakkeyssi nuus Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara yaa lo77obaa ubbaa erisana mela taani Xoossaa woossays .
57001007	Geeshshata wozanay ne oosuwan minnida gisho ta ishaw , taani ne siiquwan daro ufayssinne minthetho demmas .
57001008	Hessa gisho , neeni oothanaw bessiyabaa oothana mela nena kiittanaw Kiristtoosa baggara taw minotethi de7ees .
57001009	Taani , cimay Phawuloosi , Kiristtoos Yesuusas ha77ika qashon de7eyssi , siiqon nena woossays .
57001010	Taani qashon de7ashe iyaw zoriya aawa gidada ta na7aa Anasmoosa gisho nena woossays .
57001011	I kase nena maaddenna , shin ha77i nenakka tanakka tuma maaddiya asi .
57001012	Taani wozanappe dosiya Anasmoosa neekko yeddays . Taani Wonggelaa gisho qashettidashin , ne gisho taw oothidi tana maaddana mela ta matan iya ashshanaw koyas .
57001013	
57001014	Shin ne sheneda oothanaw koyasippe attin neera zorettonna wolqqan aykkoka oothanaw koyikke .
57001015	Anasmoosi guutha wode neeppe shaakettidayssi , ooni eri simmidi ubba wode neera de7onna aggenna .
57001016	Hiza , hayssafe guye Anasmoosi aylle gidonnashin ayllefe I daro aadhdhees . I taw ay mela siiqo ishee ! Qassi I new asa baggarakka Godaa baggarakka aadhdhida isha .
57001017	Hiza , neeni tana ne lagge giyabaa gidikko tana mokkeyssada iya mokka .
57001018	I nena qohidabay woykko I acottidabay de7ikko taappe ekka .
57001019	He acuwa taani qanxana gada taani , Phawuloosi , ta kushen xaafays . Neeni taw ne shemppuwa acota uttidayssa taani nena akeekisanaw koshshenna .
57001020	Ta ishaw , Godaa baggara neeppe maade demmanaw koyays . Kiristtoosa baggara tana minthetha .
57001021	Taani gidayssafe daro neeni oothanayssa erada qassi ne taw kiitettanayssa ammanada hayssa xaafays .
57001022	Xoossay hintte woosa si7idi tana hintteko guye zaarana gada qoppiya gisho taw imathi shemppiya keethi giigisa .
57001023	Kiristtoos Yesuusa gisho taara qashon de7iya Ephafiri nena saro saro gees .
57001024	Qassi taara issife oothiya Marqqoosi , Arsxirokoosi , Deemasinne Luuqaasi nena saro saro goosona .
57001025	Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethay hintte ayyaanaara gido .
58001001	Kase Xoossay , nu aawatas nabeta baggara dumma dumma ogen daro wode odis .
58001002	Shin ha wurssetha wodiyan ubbaa iya laatisida qassi alamiya iya baggara medhdhida ba Na7aa baggara nuus odis .
58001003	Na7ay Xoossaa bonchchuwa phoolethaanne kumetha Xoossaa Xoossatethaa ekkidi , ba wolqqaama qaalan ha alamiya katisidi oykkis . Asaa entta nagaraappe geeshshidaappe guye Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa ushachcha baggan saluwan uttis .
58001004	Iyaw imettida sunthay kiitanchchota sunthaafe bolla gideyssada I enttafe bolla .
58001005	Hiza , Xoossay kiitanchchotappe ooddeko , “ Neeni ta Na7a ; ta hachchi new aawa gidas ” gidee ? “ Taani iyaw aawa gidana ; ikka taw na7a gidana ” gidee ? “ Xoossaa kiitanchchoti ubbay iyaw goynno ” “ Xoossay ba Kiitanchchota carkko , ba aylleta tama laco oothees ” “ Xoossaw , ne kawotethay merinaw de7ees . Ne kawotethaa ne xillotethan ayssasa .
58001006	
58001007	
58001008	
58001009	Neeni xillotethi dosadasa ; iita ixxadasa . Xoossay , ne Goday , nena ne laggetappe aathidi dooris , ufayssa zayte nena tiyis ” “ Godaw , koyro neeni sa7aa medhdhadasa ; saloti ne kushe ooso .
58001010	
58001011	Hessati ubbay dhayana ; shin neeni daana . Entti ubbay afilada wurana .
58001012	Neeni entta salenaada xaaxana ; qassi entti afilada laamettana . Shin neeni ubba wode nena ; ne laythayka wurenna ” “ Taani ne morkketa ne tohoy yedhdhiyaso oothana gakkanaw , hayssan taappe ushachcha baggan utta ” gidee ?
58001013	
58001014	Kiitanchchoti ubbay atotethi demmanaw de7iya asata maaddanaw Xoossay kiittida ayyaanata gidokkonaayye ?
58002001	Hessa gisho , nuuni si7ida tumaappe harasoo ekettonna mela he si7idayssa minthidi naaganaw bessees .
58002002	Hiza , kiitanchchota baggara odettida qaalay tuma gidikko , iya naaqoynne kiitettonna ixxoy pirdda ehiyabaa gidikko ,
58002003	yaatin , nuuni hayssa mela gita atotethaa ixxas giikko , waanidi attanee ? Koyro Goday ba huu7en he atotethaa odis ; qassi iyappe si7idayssati nuus geeshshidi markkattidosona .
58002004	Qassi Xoossay malaatatan , oorathabatan , dumma dumma mallataninne ba sheniyada immida Geeshsha Ayyaana imotatan markkatethaa minthis .
58002005	Xoossay ha nuuni odiya sinthafe yaana alamiya , kiitanchchotas haarisibeenna .
58002006	Geeshsha Maxaafay issi bessan hayssada yaagees : “ Neeni asas qoppanaw asi aybe ? Woykko neeni iya naaganaw I aybe ?
58002007	Ne iya kiitanchchotappe guutha wodes guuthadasa ; Iya huu7en bonchchonne saba kallachcha wothadasa .
58002008	Qassi ubbabaa iya tohuwappe garssan wothadasa ”
58002009	Shin nuuni kiitanchchotappe guuthara guuxida Yesuusa be7oos . Xoossaa aadho keehatethaa gaason Yesuusi asa ubbaas hayqqis . I waaye hayqo hayqqida gisho bonchchonne saba kallachcha iya huu7en wothis .
58002010	Ubbabay iyawunne iya gaason medhettida Xoossay , daro nayta baara bonchchisanaw entta atotethaa huu7iya , Yesuusa waayen polo oothanaw iyaw bessees .
58002011	Yesuusinne he I geeshshida asa ubbay issi aawa nayta . Yesuusi entta , “ Ta ishata ” gidi xeeganaw yeellatonnay hessassa .
58002012	Yesuusi , “ Taani ne sunthaa ta ishatas awaajjana ; deriya shiiquwan nena galatana ”
58002013	Qassi I , “ Taani ta ammanuwa iya bolla wothana ” Qassika , “ Xoossay taw immida naytara ta hayssan de7ays ” yaagees .
58002014	Nayti ashoynne suuthi de7eyssata gidiya gisho Yesuusikka enttada ase gidis . I hessa oothiday , hayqo bolla wolqqi de7iya Xalahiya ba hayquwan dhayssanaassa .
58002015	Qassi bantta de7o laytha ubban hayqo yashshan ayllettidi de7eyssata aylletethaafe wozanaassa .
58002016	Tuma Yesuusi yiday Abrahame zerethi maaddanaassafe attin kiitanchchota maaddanaassa gidenna .
58002017	Asaa nagaray atto geetettana mela Xoossaa sinthan maariyanne ammanettida kahine halaqa gidis . Hessa gisho , I ubbaban ba ishata daananaw bessees .
58002018	I ba huu7en paacen waayettida gisho paacetteyssata maaddanaw dandda7ees .
58003001	Hessa gisho , Xoossay xeegida geeshsha ishato , nu ammanon Godaa gidi xeegiya hawaariyanne kahine halaqaa Yesuusa be7ite .
58003002	Musey Xoossaa Keetha ubban ammanettidayssada Yesuusikka bana doorida Xoossaas ammanettidayssa .
58003003	Keethe keexeyssi keethafe aadhdhidi bonchchetteyssada Yesuusi Museppe aadhdhiya bonchcho ekkanaw bessees .
58003004	Issi issi keethaa keexida asi de7ees , shin ubbaa giigisiday Xoossaa .
58003005	Musey Xoossaa Keetha ubban ammanettida aylle gididi , Xoossay sinthafe gaanabaas markka gidis .
58003006	Shin Kiristtoosi Xoossa Keethan na7ada ammanettidayssa . Nuuni ekkana gidi naagiya ufayssaa minthidi naagikko Xoossaa keethi gidoos .
58003007	Hessa gisho , Geeshsha Ayyaanay geyssada , “ Hachchi hintte Xoossay geyssa si7iya wode
58003008	bazzo biittan paaciya gallas , hintte aawati makkalidayssada , hintte wozanaa minthofite .
58003009	Hintte aawati tana paaccidosona ; oytamu laythi ta oosuwa be7idosona .
58003010	Hessa gisho , ta he yeletethaa hanqettada , ‘ Entti ubba wode bantta wozanan baloosona ; ta ogiya eribookkona ’ yaagas .
58003011	Hessa gisho , taani ta hanquwan caaqqada , ‘ Ta shemppo bessaa ubbaka gelokkona ’ yaagas ”
58003012	Ta ishato , hinttefe ooddenkka , de7o Xoossaafe hinttena shaakkiya iitanne ammanonna wozani doonna mela naagettite .
58003013	Hinttefe oonakka nagari balethin , ba wozanaa minthonna mela “ Hachchi ” yaagettidi xeegettishin gallas gallas issoy issuwara zorettite .
58003014	Nu koyro ammanuwa nuuni wurssethi gakkanaw minthidi naagikko , Kiristtoosara issife laattana .
58003015	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Hachchi Xoossay geyssa hintte si7iya wode he wode entti makkalatethan hanidayssada , hintte wozanaa minthofite ”
58003016	Xoossay giyabaa si7idi makkaliday oonee ? Musey Gibxxefe kaalethi kessida ubbaa gidokkonaayye ?
58003017	Xoossay oytamu laythi oona hanqettidee ? Nagara oothidayssatanne entta ahay bazzo biittan wodhdhi attida asata gidokkonaayye ?
58003018	Qassi Xoossay , “ Ta shemppo bessaa gelekketa ” yaagidi caaqqiday , iyaw kiitettonna ixxida asaappe attin ooddesse ?
58003019	Hiza , entti he shemppo bessaa gelonna attiday ammaniboonna gisho gideyssa nu be7oos .
58004001	Hiza , Xoossay nuna ba shemppo bessaa gelssana gida qaalay buroo sinthafe de7iya gisho hinttefe oonikka he shemppo bessaa gelonna attonna mela naagettoos .
58004002	Enttaw Wonggelay sabbakettidayssada , nuuskka sabbakettis . Shin entti si7idabaa ammanidi ekkiboonna gisho entta go77ibeenna .
58004003	Gidoshin , alamey medhettosappe doomidi Xoossaa oosoy polettidayssa gidikkoka , Xoossay , “ Taani ta hanquwan caaqqada , ta shemppo bessaa ubbaka gelokkona ” “ Xoossay giyabaa hachchi hintte si7iya wode hintte wozanaa minthofite ”
58004004	Laappuntha gallasaaba issi bessan , “ Xoossay laappuntha gallasan ba ooso ubbaafe shemppis ” yaagis .
58004005	Qassika he bessan , “ Entti ta shemppo bessaa ubbarakka gelokkona ” yaagis .
58004006	Koyro Wonggelaa si7idayssati kiitettonna ixxidi shemppo bessaa gelibookkona . Yaaniya gisho , ha77ika he shemppo bessaa gelana issi issi asati de7oosona .
58004007	Hessa gisho , Xoossay , “ Hachchi ” gidi xeegishe issi gallas nuus qanxis . Daro wodeppe guye Xoossay Dawite baggara , “ Xoossay giyabaa hachchi hintte si7iya wode hintte wozanaa minthofite ” yaagidi odis .
58004008	Iyyaasuy enttaw shemppuwa immidabaa gidiyakko , Xoossay hara gallasabaa guyeppe odennashin .
58004009	Hiza , Xoossaa asaas Sambbaata shemppoy naagettidi de7ees .
58004010	Xoossaa shemppo bessaa geliya oonikka , Xoossay ba oosuwappe shemppidayssada ikka ba oosuwappe shemppana .
58004011	Hessa gisho , oonikka he asaa kiitetetha ixxuwa kaallidi , kunddonaada Xoossaa shemppo bessaa gelanaw minnoos .
58004012	Xoossaa qaalay de7onne ootheyssa . Nam77u baggara qarattida mashshafe aadhdhidi oco . I shemppo , ayyaana , xaphonne kolize gakkanaw kanthidi caddees . Qassi asa wozanan de7iya geemmida qofaanne amuwaa shaakkidi pirddees .
58004013	Xoossaa sinthafe qosettiyabay ayba medhetethika baawa . Iya ayfe sinthan ubbabay qonccenne kallo de7ees . Nuuni zaaro immanaw bessey iya sinthana .
58004014	Hiza , salo keyida gita kahine halaqay , Xoossaa na7ay Yesuusi , nuus de7iya gisho nu ammanuwa minthidi naagoos .
58004015	Nu kahine halaqay nu daaburiya wode nuus qadhettanaw dandda7eyssa . I nagara oothibeenna , shin nuuda ubbaban paacettis .
58004016	Hiza , maarotethaa ekkanawunne maade koshshiya wode aadho keehatethaa demmanaw aadho keehatethay de7iyasuwa Xoossaa araatakko yayyonna shiiqoos .
58005001	Issi issi kahine halaqi asaa giddofe doorettidi , Xoossaara gathiyaban asaa gisho imotanne nagara yarshsho yarshshanaw shuumettees .
58005002	I ba huu7en daaburanchcho gidiya gisho eronnayssatasinne baleyssatas qadhettanaw dandda7ees .
58005003	I ba nagara gishonne asa ubbaa nagara gisho yarshsho yarshshanaw bessey hessassa .
58005004	Oonikka ha bonchchuwa baw ekkanaw dandda7enna , shin Aaroni kahine halaqa gidanaw xeegettidayssada Xoossan xeegettanaw bessees .
58005005	Hessadakka , Kiristtoosi kahine halaqa gidiya bonchchuwa baw ekkibeenna . Shin Xoossay iya , “ Neeni ta Na7aa . hachchi ta new Aawa gidas ” “ Malkkexaadiqey kahine gididayssada , neeni merinaw kahine gidana ”
58005006	
58005007	Yesuusi ase gididi ha alamiyan de7iya wode bana hayqoppe ashshanaw dandda7iya Xoossaa daro yeehoninne afuthan woossis . I , iya bonchchidi kiitettida gisho Xoossay iya woosaa si7is .
58005008	Yesuusi Xoossaa Na7a gidikkoka ba waayettida waayan kiitetethi tamaaris .
58005009	Hessankka , Yesuusi ba oosuwa polidaappe guye baw kiitettiya ubbay merinaa atotethaa demmana mela gaaso gidis .
58005010	Xoossay Malkkexaadiqe shuumidayssada kahine halaqa oothidi iya shuumis .
58005011	Ha nu oda bolla gujji haasayanabay darobay de7ees , shin hintte akeekay guutha gidiya gisho hinttew odi gelssanaw waayses .
58005012	Hintte hannoode asttamaare gidanaw bessees , shin Xoossaa qaalaa koyro timirttiya hinttena zaari tamaarssiya hara asi koshshees . Hintte mino kathi maanaw dandda7onna gisho maathi koshshees .
58005013	Maathi paahettiya oonikka yooga na7a gidiya gisho lo77onne iita shaakki erenna .
58005014	Shin mino kathi lo77onne iita shaakkidi eriya kahaama asaassa .
58006001	Hiza , Kiristtoosabaa tamaarssiya koyro timirttiya aggidi Kiristtoosan kahaamatethako boos . Hayqo oosoppe simobaanne Xoossaa ammanobaa koyro timirttiyako guye simmoko .
58006002	Hessadakka , xinqqatetabaa , kushe wosobaa , hayqoppe denddobaanne merinaa pirddabaa zaari tamaarokko .
58006003	Xoossay giikko nu hessa oothana .
58006004	Issi toho poo7oy poo7idayssata , salo imota ekkidayssata , Geeshsha Ayyaanan shaakettidayssata ,
58006005	lo77o Xoossaa qaalanne sinthafe yaana alamiya wolqqaa be7idayssata ,
58006006	guyeppe kaddidayssata nagaraappe nam77antho zaaranaw dandda7ettenna . Ays giikko , entti bantta dhayuwas Xoossaa Na7aa zaari kaqqiya mela masqaliya bolla iya kaqqosonanne asa sinthan kawushshosona .
58006007	Ubba wode I bolla bukkiya iraa uyada , goyida uraa maaddiya kathi immiya biittiya Xoossan anjjettidaaro .
58006008	Shin agunthunne kinchchote doliya biittiya aybibaakka maadduku ; iw qanggethay matattis ; wurssethan xuugettana .
58006009	Nu siiqo ishato , nuuni hayssada odiyabaa gidikkoka , hinttena atotethaako kaalethiya lo77obay hinttew de7eyssa eroos .
58006010	Xoossay suure pirddeyssa . Xoossay , hintte oothida oosuwanne kase gidin ha77ika ammaneyssata maaddidi , iyaw de7iya siiquwa bessidayssa dogenna .
58006011	Hintte ubbay ufayssan naageyssa demmana gakkanaw ha minotethaa wurssethi gakkanaw bessana mela nu amottoos .
58006012	Hintte ammanoninne dandda7an naagiya ufayssaa laattiya asaa daanana melappe attin azalla gidana mela koyokko .
58006013	Xoossay Abrahames immana gidi caaqqida wode baappe aadhdhiya hari giti baynna gisho ba huu7en caaqqis .
58006014	Iyaakko , “ Taani nena anjjana ; ne zerethaaka darssana ” yaagis .
58006015	Abrahamey dandda7an naagidi Xoossay immana gida ufayssaa ekkis .
58006016	Asi caaqqishe baappe gitatiya uran caaqqees ; he caaqoy geetettidabaa minthidi , palama ubbaa teqqees .
58006017	Hessa gisho , Xoossay ba laamettonna qofaa ufayssa qaala laatteyssatas qonccisanaw koyida gisho caaqon minthis .
58006018	Xoossay worddotenna . Iya ufayssa qaalaynne caaqoy , nam77ayka laamettokona . Ha nam77ubatan nu sinthan de7iya ufayssaa oykkanaw danadda7ana mela geshe demmanaw iyaakko baqatida nuuni , wolqqaama minthetho demmana .
58006019	Ha ufayssay nu shemppuwas , markkabey qaaxxonnaada minthidi oykkiya biraata mela . He ufayssay magaraajjuwafe guye baggan de7iya geeshsha bessaa gelis .
58006020	Yesuusi Malkkexaadiqe shuumatethaada merinaw kahine halaqa gididi , nu gisho nuuppe sinthattidi he bessaa gelis .
58007001	Malkkexaadiqey , Saaleme Kawoy , Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa kahine . He Malkkexaadiqey Abrahamey kawota oli xoonidi simmishin iyara gahettidi iya anjjis .
58007002	Abrahamey ba di77idabaa ubbaafe iyaw asraata kessidi immis . Malkkexaadiqe sunthay koyro “ Xillotethaa kawo ” , nam77antho , “ Saaleme kawo ” birshshethay , “ Sarotethaa kawuwa ” guussu .
58007003	Malkkexaadiqes aaya woykko aawu woykko zare paydoy baawa . Iya yeletethaas doomethi woykko iya de7uwas wurssethi baawa , shin Xoossaa Na7a daanidi merinaw kahine gidis .
58007004	Malkkexaadiqey ay mela giteekko be7ite . Nu aawata mayzay , Abrahamey , ba de77idabaappe iyaw asraata immis .
58007005	Kahine gidiya Leewe zarey Isra7eele asappe , hessika Abrahame zerethi gidida bantta ishatappe asraata ekkana mela higgey kiittees .
58007006	Malkkexaadiqey Leewe zare gidonna ixxikokka Abrahameppe asraata ekkis ; ufayssa qaali de7iya Abrahame anjjis .
58007007	Guuthay gitan anjjetteyssi palanthenna .
58007008	Issi baggara , asraata ekkeyssati hayqqiya asata , shin hara baggara asraata ekkeyssi de7on de7ees yaagidi odettidayssa .
58007009	Hiza , asraata ekkiya Leewey , Abrahame baggara asraata immis gaanaw dandda7ettees .
58007010	Ays giikko , Malkkexaadiqey Abrahamera gahettiya wode Leewey yelettiboonnabaa gidikkoka , ba mayzaa Abrahame gulbbatan de7ees .
58007011	Isra7eele asaas higgey Leewe kahinetethaa baggara imettis . Ha Leewe kahinetethay polo gididabaa gidiyakko Aaronayssa mela gidonnashin , Malkkexaadiqe mela hara kahine shuumanaw ays koshshidee ?
58007012	Hiza , kahineti laamettiya wode higgeykka qassi laamettanaw bessees .
58007013	Ha nu iyabaa odiya uray hara zare ; iya sheeshaappe oonikka yarshsho bessan kahinetethan oothibeenna .
58007014	Nu Goday Yihuda sheeshaappe yidayssi erettidayssa . Gidoshin , Musey kahintebaa odishe Yihuda zariyaba aybaakka odibeenna .
58007015	Malkkexaadiqe mela hara kahiney yidabaa gidiyakko ha nu odiyabay aadhdhi qonccana .
58007016	I kahine gididay dhayonna de7uwa wolqqaanappe attin iya mayzaa higgeninne wogan gidenna .
58007017	Geeshsha Maxaafay , “ Malkkexaadiqe kahinetethaa mela , neeni merinaw kahine ”
58007018	Koyro higgey daaburanchchonne maaddonabaa gidiya gisho shaarettis .
58007019	Muse higgey aybinkka polo oothanaw dandda7ibeenna . Shin nuuni iya baggara Xoossaakko shiiqiya ubbaafe aadhdhiya ufayssa qaalay nuus imettis .
58007020	Kiristtoosi kahine gidiya wode Xoossay caaqqis , shin harati kahine gidida wode hessa mela caaqoy baawa .
58007021	Shin Yesuusi caaqon kahine gidis . Xoossay yaagidi caaqqis ; “ Goday caaqqis ; I ba qofaa laammenna ; ‘ Neeni merinaa kahine ’ ”
58007022	Ha caaquwa gaason Yesuusi nuus ubbaafe aadhdhiya qaala caaquwas waase gidis .
58007023	Kahinetethan oothonna mela hayqoy entta diggida gisho koyro kahineta tayboy daro .
58007024	Shin Yesuusi merinaw de7iya gisho iya kahinetethaa hari laattenna .
58007025	Hessa gisho , I ubba wode entta gisho gaannatanaw merinaw de7iya gisho Xoossaakko iya baggara yeyssata polo ashshanaw dandda7ees .
58007026	Hiza , nuus koshshiyabaa immiya , geeshshay , boreynne tuni baynnayssi , nagaranchchotappe shaakettidaysinne saluwappe aadhdhidi dhoqqida kahine halaqay nuus koshshees .
58007027	I hankko kahine halaqata mela koyro ba nagara gisho kaallidi asaa nagaraa gisho gallas gallas yarshsho yarshshanaw koshshenna . I bana yarshshida wode zaarethonna ogen issi toho bana yarshshis .
58007028	Muse higgey daaburanchcho asaa kahine halaqa oothidi shuumees . Shin higgiyafe guye yida caaqo qaalay merinaw polo gidida Xoossaa Na7aa shuumis .
58008001	Nuuni haasayaa gitabay hessa . Saluwan Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa araatappe ushachcha baggan uttida hayssa mela kahine halaqay nuus de7ees .
58008002	I asan gidonnashin Godan eqqida tuma dunkkaaniyan Xoossa Keethan oothees .
58008003	Kahine halaqa ubbay imonne yarshsho yarshshanaw shuumettees . Hessa gisho , ha kahiney yarshshanaw issibay daanaw koshshees .
58008004	Higgey kiiteyssada yarshshiya kahineti de7iya gisho Kiristtoosi sa7an de7iyabaa gidiyakko kahine gidenna .
58008005	Entti kahinetethan oothiya dunkkaaney salon de7eyssas leemisonne kuya . Musey dunkkaaniya essiya wode Xoossay iyaakko , “ Taani nena deriya bolla bessida leemisuwa kaallada ootha ” yaagis .
58008006	Shin Yesuusi giddo gididi sigethiya caaqoy , koyro caaquwappe aadhdheyssada I ekkida oosoy enttayssafe aadhdhees . Hessi eqqiday aadhdhiya caaqo qaalana .
58008007	Koyro caaquwan bali baynaba gidiyakko nam77antho caaqo koshshenna .
58008008	Shin Goday iya boridi , hayssada yaagis : “ Taani Isra7eele asaaranne Yihuda asaara ooratha caaqo caaqqiya wodey yaana .
58008009	He caaqoy ta entta aawata Gibxxe biittaafe kushiya oykkada , goochcha kessida wode enttara caaqqida caaquwa mela gidenna . Entti ta caaquwan ammanettiboonna gisho taani entta yegga aggas yaagees Goday .
58008010	Shin hizappe guye Isra7eele asaara ta caaqqana caaqoy hayssa yaagees Goday . Taani ta higgiya entta guugiyan wothana ; entta wozanan xaafana . Taani entta Xoossaa gidana ; enttika ta ase gidana .
58008011	Enttafe oonikka ba shooruwa woykko ba ishaa , ‘ Godaa era ’ yaagidi tamaarssenna . Entti guuthafe gita gakkanaw ubbay tana erana .
58008012	Taani entta naaquwa atto gaana ; entta nagaraa zaara qoppike ” yaagees .
58008013	Xoossay ha caaquwa “ Oorathi ” gidi xeegishe koyroyssa gal77isis . Hiza , gal77aynne ceegay dhayaa wodey gakkis .
58009001	Koyro caaquwas Xoossaa goynniya wogaynne sa7a Xoossa Keethay de7ees .
58009002	Dunkkaaney eqqis . Iyan xomppe wothiya kocay , xarpheezaynne Godaa sinthan wothiya uythay de7ees ; he bessay Geeshsha Bessaa geetettees .
58009003	Nam77antho magaraajjuwafe guye baggara de7iya bessay Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa geetettees .
58009004	Iya giddon ixaane cuyisiya worqqa saaxineynne worqqan meeshettida caaqo Taabotey de7ees . He caaqo Taabotiyan mannay de7iya worqqa xaaroy , aacida Aarona xam77aynne Muse higgey xaafettida nam77u lochche shuchchati de7oosona .
58009005	He Taabotiyappe bolla baggara atotetha kamaa bantta qefiyan genthiya bonchcho kiruubeti de7oosona . Shin ha77i he ubbaa qonccisidi odanaw dandda7okko .
58009006	Ha ubbay hayssada giigidaappe guye , kahineti ubba wode bantta oosuwa oothanaw dunkkaaniyas koyro kifiliya geloosona .
58009007	Shin kahine halaqaa xalaali dunkkaaniyas nam77antho kifiliya laythafe issi toho gelees . I yaa gelishe ba nagaraa gishonne asay eronna oothida nagaraa gisho suutha yarshsho ekkonna gelenna .
58009008	Koyro dunkkaaney eqqidi de7ishin , Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa efiya ogey buroo dooyettiboonnayssa Geeshsha Ayyaanay hessan erisees .
58009009	Hessi ha wodiyas leemiso ; Xoossas immetiya imoynne yarshshoy goynniya uraa kaha geeshshanaw dandda7onayssa hayssi bessees .
