58009010	Hessati muussabaa , ushshabaanne dumma dumma meechcha wogata odeyssata . Entti ooratha wogay yaana gakkanaw oosettiya kare bagga wogata .
58009011	Shin Kiristtoosi ha77i nu demmida lo77obaatas kahine halaqa gididi yis . I gelida dunkkaaney gitanne polo gididayssa . He dunkkaaney asa kushen oosettibeenna qassi ha alamiyabaa gidenna .
58009012	Kiristtoosi Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa geliya wode deesha suuthinne mara suuthi ekkidi gelibeenna . Shin merinaa atotethaa immanaw ba suuthaa ekkidi zaarethonna ogen issi toho gelis .
58009013	Deesha suuthaynne kormma suuthay , xuugettida ussa bidoy , tunida asaa bolla dharccettidi enttana geeshshiyabaa gidikko ,
58009014	merinaa Geeshsha Ayyaana baggara borey baynna yarshsho oothidi , Xoossaas bana immida Kiristtoosa suuthay , de7o Xoossaa goynnana mela hayqo kaalethiya oosuwappe nu kaha waati aathi geeshshennee ?
58009015	Hessa gisho , xeegettidayssati Xoossay immida merinaa laata ekkana mela Kiristtoosi ooratha caaquwas giddo gididi sigetheyssa gidis . Hessi haniday asay koyro caaquwappe garssan de7iya wode oothida nagaraappe enttana wozanaw I hayqqidayssana .
58009016	Hiza , keekey de7ikko , he keekida uraa hayqoy erettanaw koshshees .
58009017	Keekida uray hayqqiko iya keekey minnees . Keekida uray hayqqonna attiko iya keekey oothenna .
58009018	Hari attoshin , koyro caaqoykka suuthi baynna minnibeenna .
58009019	Musey higge kiita ubbaa asaas odidaappe guye mara suuthinne deesha suuthi haathara walakkidi , zo7o dorssa ikisenne hisophe boncco ekkidi , maxaafaa bollanne asaa bolla wurxxis .
58009020	Musey asaakko , “ Hintte naagana mela Xoossay kiittida suutha caaqoy hayssa ” yaagis .
58009021	Hessadakka , dunkkaaniya bollanne oothiya miishe ubbaa bolla suuthaa wurxxis .
58009022	Tumakka higgey geyssada guuthabatappe attin ubbabay suuthan geeyees . Suuthi gukkonnashin atotethi baawa .
58009023	Saluwabaas leemiso gididayssati ubbay mehe yarshshon geeyanaw koshshees . Shin salobati bantta huu7en hessafe aadhdhiya yarshshuwan geeyanaw koshshees .
58009024	Kiristtoosi tuma Xoossa Keethas leemiso gidida , asa kushen oosettida Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa gelibeenna . Shin I ha77i nu gisho Xoossaa sinthan benttanaw saluwa gelis .
58009025	Kahine halaqay laythan laythan ba suuthi gidonnayssa ekkidi , Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessa gelees . Shin Kiristtoosi daro toho bana yarshshanaw salo gelibeenna .
58009026	Hessada hanidabaa gidiyakko , Kiristtoosi alamey medhettosappe doomidi daro toho waayettanaw koshshees . Shin ha77i wodiya wurssethan nagara digganaw bana yarshshidi zaarethonna ogen issi toho benttis .
58009027	Asi ubbay issi toho hayqqanaw hessafe guye pirddettanaw bessees .
58009028	Hessadakka , Kiristtoosi daro asaa nagara digganaw issi toho yarshshettis . Shin I nagara tookkanaw gidonnashin bana naageyssata ashshanaw nam77antho qonccana .
58010001	Muse higgey yaanaw de7iya lo77obatas kuyappe attin ba huu7en waanna gidenna . Hessa gisho , laythan laythan pacey baynna yarshshettiya yarshshoy goynnanaw shiiqiya asaa polo oothanaw dandda7enna .
58010002	Higgey entta polo oothanaw dandda7idabaa gidiyakko entti yarshsho yarshsheyssa agganashin . Qassi goynnanaw shiiqiya asay bantta nagaraappe geeyana ; entta kahaykka enttana bala gidi mootenna .
58010003	Shin he yarshshoti laythan laythan nagara qofisoosona .
58010004	Ays giikko , kormma suuthinne deesha suuthi nagara digganaw dandda7enna .
58010005	Hessa gisho , Kiristtoosi ha alamiya yida wode hayssada yaagis : “ Neeni yarshshonne imo koyabaakka ; shin taw asho giigisadasa .
58010006	Neeni xuugettiya yarshshoninne nagara yarshshuwan ufayttabaakka .
58010007	He wode ‘ Ta gisho maxaafan xaafettidayssada , Godaw , taani ne sheniya oothanaw yas ’ yaagas ”
58010008	Yarshshoy yarshshettana mela higgey kiittiyabaa gidikkoka , Kiristtoosi koyro , “ Neeni yarshshonne imo , xuugettiya yarshshonne nagara yarshsho koyabaakka ; enttan ufayttabaakka ” yaagis .
58010009	Kaallidikka I , “ Godaw , hekko taani ne sheniya oothanaw yas ” yaagis . Hessa gisho , Kiristtoosi nam77anthuwa essanaw koyroyssa shaaris .
58010010	Yesuus Kiristtoosi Xoossaa sheniya oothidi , zaarethonna ogen issi toho ba ashuwa yarshshida gisho nuuni geeyida .
58010011	Kahine ubbay , nagara digganaw dandda7onna he yarshshota gallas gallas yarshshishe eqqidi ba oosuwa oothees .
58010012	Shin Kiristtoosi ubba wodes gidiya issi nagara yarshshuwa yarshshidi , Xoossaafe ushachcha baggan uttis .
58010013	He wodiyappe doomidi iya morkketi iya tohoy yedhdhiyabaa oothana gakkanaw naagees .
58010014	I zaarethonna ogen issi toho bana yarshshida yarshshuwan geeshshata merinaw polo oothis .
58010015	Qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanay nuus hayssa markkattees . Koyro hayssada yaagis :
58010016	“ He gallasatappe guye , taani enttara caaqqiya caaqoy hayssa : Taani ta higgiya entta qofan wothana ; entta wozanan xaafana ” “ Taani entta nagaraanne entta iita oosuwa zaara qoppike ”
58010017	
58010018	Hiza , nagari atto geetettidaappe guye nagaras yarshshettiya yarshsho koshshenna .
58010019	Hiza , ta ishato , nuuni Yesuusa suuthaa baggara Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa gelanaw nuus minotethi de7ees .
58010020	Nu gelanay Kiristtoosi ba magaraajjuwa , hessika ba ashuwa baggara nuus dooyida oorathinne de7o gidida ogiyana .
58010021	Nuus Xoossa Keetha bolla shuumettida gita kahine halaqay de7ees .
58010022	Nuuni iita kahappe geeyanaw nu wozanaa wurxettidi , nu asatethaa xillo haathan meecettidi , suure wozananinne polo ammanon Xoossaako shiiqoos .
58010023	Nuus ufayssa qaala immida Xoossay ammanttidayssa gidiya gisho nu markkattiya ufayssaa ushachchi haddirssi goonna minthidi oykkoos .
58010024	Issoy issuwa siiqosinne lo77o oosos waati denthethaneekko ane qoppoos .
58010025	Issoti issoti meeze oothidi shiiqeyssa aggidayssada nuuni issife shiiqeyssa aggoko . Shin Godaa gallasay matattidayssa hintte be7iya gisho hessa kaseyssafe aathidi oothite .
58010026	Nuuni tumaa eratethaa ekkidaappe guye erishe nagara oothiko , hizappe nu nagaraa gisho yarshshettana yarshshoy baawa .
58010027	Shin hiza attiday yashshiya pirddaanne Xoossaa morkketa xuugganaw giigida wolqqaama tamaa .
58010028	Muse higgiya kiitettonna ixxida oonikka nam77u woykko heedzu asi iya bolla markkatiko qadhey baynnashin hayqqees .
58010029	Yaatin , Xoossaa Na7aa kadhida uray , bana geeshshida Xoossaa caaqo suuthaa tunabaada qoppida uray , qassi aadho keehatetha Ayyaanaa cayida uray , ay mela iita pirddaa ekkanaw bessiyako ane qoppite .
58010030	Hiza , “ Halo kesoy tabaa , ta kushe zaarana ” gidayssa nu eroos . Qassika , “ Goday ba asaa pirddana ” yaagis .
58010031	De7o Xoossaa kushen kunddethi daro yashshees .
58010032	Hinttew Xoossaa poo7oy poo7idaappe guye hintte daro waayen , gita baaxen genccida beni wodiya qoppite .
58010033	Issi issi toho hintte asa sinthan cayettideta ; goodettideta ; issi issi toho hessa mela waayey gakkida asaara issife waayideta .
58010034	Qashon de7iya asaaskka qadhettideta . Hinttew lo77onne dhayonna shaloy salon de7eyssa hintte erida gisho hintte shaloy bonqettiya wode ufayssan dandda7ideta .
58010035	Hessa gisho , gita woytoy de7iya hintte minotethaa yeggofite .
58010036	Xoossaa sheniya polidi , I hinttew immana gida ufayssaa ekkana gakkanaw genccanaw koshshees .
58010037	Hiza , Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ I , yaana gidayssi yaana ; gam77enna .
58010038	Shin ta xilloy , tanan ammanettidi daana ; oonikka guye simmiko tana ufayssenna ”
58010039	Nuuni ammanettidi attiyaa asaa baggafe attin guye simmidi dhaya asaa bagga gidokko .
58011001	Ammanoy guussay , demmana gidi ufayssan ammanettidi naagiyabaanne nu be7onnabaa be7iyada oothidi ekkiyabaa .
58011002	Beni aawati ammanon Xoossaafe markkatethi ekkidosona .
58011003	Alamey Xoossaa qaalan medhettidayssa nu ammanon eroos . Qassi benttiyabay benttonnabaappe medhettis .
58011004	Aabeli Qaa7elayssafe aadhdhiya yarshsho Xoossaas yarshshiday ammanona . Xoossay Aabela imuwa ufayttidi ekkida wode I xillo gididayssa markkattis . Aabeli hari attoshin , hayqqidikka ba ammanuwan ha77i gakkanaw odees .
58011005	Heenokey hayqqonna salo biday ammanona . Xoossay iya ekkida gisho oonikka iya be7anaw dandda7ibeenna . Heenokey salo ekettanaappe sinthe I Xoossaa ufayssida asi gideyssi odettis .
58011006	Ammanoy baynna oonikka Xoossaa ufayssanaw dandda7enna . Xoossaakko yaa oonikka Xoossay de7eyssanne bana koyeyssatas woyto immeyssa ammananaw koshshees .
58011007	Nohey buroo benttonnabaas Xoossay iyaw odida wode Xoossaas yayyidi , bananne ba soo asaa ashshanaw ammanon markkabe keexxis . Yaatidi ba ammanuwan alamiya pirddidi , ammanon benttiya xillotethaa Xoossaafe ekkis .
58011008	Abrahamey laata oothidi ekkana biittaa baana mela Xoossay iya xeegida wode hari attoshin , I aw biyakko eronna ixxikokka kiitettiday ammanona .
58011009	Abrahamey Xoossay iyaw immana gida biittan bete asada de7iday ammanona . Xoossay he immana gidayssa iyara issife laattanaw de7iya Yisaaqaranne Yayqoobara wolla dunkkaanen de7is .
58011010	I , Xoossay qoppidi keexida xaala baasoy de7iya katamaa naagees .
58011011	Saara ba huu7en cimidabaa gidikkoka ufayssi immida Xoossay ammanettidayssa gideyssa erida gisho qanthatanaw wolqqa demmiday ammanona .
58011012	Hessa gisho , hayqqida asi daaniya issi addiyafe salo xoolintto melanne abbaa gaxan de7iya tayboy baynna shafe mela zerethay yelettidosona .
58011013	He asa ubbay banttaw geetettida ufayssaa qaala ekkonna ammanon hayqqidosona . Shin haahora hessa be7idi , demmidaada oothidi , ufayssan ekkidosona . Qassi entti sa7an imathenne bete asi gideyssa eridosona .
58011014	Hessada giya asay bantta biittaa naageyssa qonccen bessees .
58011015	Entti he aggidi keyida biittaa guye qoppidabaa gidiyakko guye simmanaw dandda7osona .
58011016	Shin ha77i aadhdhi lo77iya salo biittaa laamotosona . Hessa gisho , Xoossay enttaw katama giigisida gisho “ Entta Xoossaa ” geetettidi xeegettanaw yeellatenna .
58011017	Abrahamey paacettida wode Yisaaqa yarshshiday ammanonna . He ufayssa qaala ekkida Abrahamey ba issi na7aa yarshshanaw giigis .
58011018	Xoossay Abrahamekko , “ Ne zerethay Yisaaqa baggara xeegettana ” yaagidi odis .
58011019	Xoossay hayqoppe denthanaw dandda7eyssa Abrahamey ammanida gisho Yisaaqa hayqoppe paxi denddidaada oothidi zaari ekkis .
58011020	Yisaaqi wodeppe hananabaa eridi Yayqoobanne Eesawe anjjiday ammanona .
58011021	Yayqoobi hayqqana hanishe , issi issi Yoosefa nayta anjjidaynne guufe bolla katidi goynniday ammanonna .
58011022	Yoosefi hayqqanaw matida wode Isra7eele asay Gibxxefe keyanayssa odidaynne ba meqethaa oothanabaa entta kiittiday ammanona .
58011023	Musey yelettidaappe guye iya aayanne iya aaway mala lo77o na7a gididayssa be7idi heedzu ageena qottiday ammanona ; entti kawuwa awaajjuwa yayyibookkona .
58011024	Musey diccidaappe guye Gibxxe kawuwa na7ee na7a geetettanayssa ixxiday ammanona .
58011025	Musey nagaran guutha wodes ufayttanaappe , Xoossaa asaara waaye ekkanayssa dooris .
58011026	I wodeppe demmana woytuwa tishshi oothidi xeellida gisho Gibxxe shaluwappe aathidi Kiristtoosa gisho borettanayssi daro aadhdhiya duretethi gididayssa eris .
58011027	Musey Kawuwa hanquwa yayyonna , Gibxxefe keyiday ammanona . Benttonna Xoossaa be7ida asada hanidi ba qofan genccis .
58011028	Hayqo ehiya kiitanchchoy Isra7eele asaa bayra nayta wodhonna mela Musey Faasikanne suutha wurxetha wogaa oothiday ammanona .
58011029	Isra7eele asay mela biittara hamuttiyada hamuttidi , Zo7o Abbaa pinniday ammanona . Shin Gibxxe asay gelanaw paaci be7ishin haathay entta mittis .
58011030	Isra7eele asay Iyaarkko katamaa shuchcha dirssaa laappun gallas yuuyidi , kunddisiday ammanona .
58011031	Laymiya Ra7aaba biittaa wochcheyssata mokkida gisho kiitettonna asaara hayqqonna attiday ammanona .
58011032	Hiza , haraa ta ay go ? Gediyoonabaa , Baaraqabaa , Samsoonabaa , Yofttaahebaa , Dawitebaa , Saamu7eelabaa , qassi nabetabaa odanaw taw wodey gidenna .
58011033	Entti ammanon kawotethata xoonidosona ; xillotethan aysidosona ; Xoossay immana gida ufayssaa ekkidosona ; gaammota doona gorddidosona ;
58011034	tama wolqqaa toysidosona ; morkkata mashshaafe attidosona ; bantta daaburan minnidosona ; olan wolqqaama gididosona ; allaga toora goodidosona .
58011035	Maccasati bantta hayqqidayssati hayqoppe paxin ekkidosona . Qassi harati aadhdhiya hayqoppe dendduwa ekkanaw koyidi qashuwappe bilettanayssa ixxidosona .
58011036	Harati asan borettidi lisson garaafettidosona ; harati santhalaatan qashettidi qasho keethan yegettidosona .
58011037	Entti suchchan cadettidosona ; magaazen nam77a keyidi phalqqettidosona ; paacettidosona ; mashshan hayqqidosona ; enttaw ubbabay dhayin metootidosona . Dorssa itenne deesha ite ma77idi yuuyidosona .
58011038	Enttaw ha alamey giigonna ixxin bazzo biittan , dere bolla , gonggoloninne olla giddon yuuyidosona .
58011039	Xoossay entta ammanuwabaa markkattikokka , he ubbay geetettida ufayssa qaala ekkibookkona .
58011040	Xoossay nuus lo77obaa qoppi wothida gisho entti nuuni baynna polo gidokkona .
58012001	Hiza , shaarada nu yuushuwan darida hayssa mela markkatti nu matan de7iya gisho nuna dhubbiya ubbaanne oykkidi haariya nagaraa diggidi , nu sinthan de7iya gaadde wothaa genccan woxxoos .
58012002	Nu ammanuwas oge dooyidayssanne nu wurssetha poluwakko nuna gathiya Yesuusa bolla nu ayfiyaa wothoos . Yesuusi wodeppe de7iya ufayssaa gisho masqaliya waaya dandda7idi , yeella hayquwa kadhidi , Xoossaafe ushachcha baggan uttis .
58012003	Hiza , hintte doccidi ufayssi qanxonna mela nagaranchchota ixuwa dandda7ida Yesuusa qoppite .
58012004	Nagarara de7iya baaxiyan buroo suuthu gussana gakkanaw eqettibeekketa .
58012005	Xoossay ba qaalan , ba naytada hinttena zoridayssa dogideta . “ Ta na7aw , Xoossaa seera leqqofa ; i nena seeriya wode ufayssi qanxofa .
58012006	Goday ba dosiya uraa seeres ; qassi ba na7ada ekkiya ubbaa garaafees ”
58012007	Xoossay hinttena ba naytada seeriya wode genccite ; Aaway seeronna na7i oonee ?
58012008	Xoossay ba nayta ubbaa seeres ; hintte seerettonna ixxiko tuma iya nayta gidonnashin balakko nayta .
58012009	Qassi nuna yelida nu aawati nuna seerosona ; nukka enttana bonchchoos . Yaatin , nuuni nu ayyaana Aawas waanidi aathi haarettoko ?
58012010	Hiza , nu aawati banttaw lo77o daanida mela guutha wodes nuna seeridosona . Shin Xoossay nu go77aas , nu iya geeshshatethan shaakettana mela seeres .
58012011	Nuuni seerettiya wode yiloyeesippe attin ufayssenna . Shin guyeppe seeretethaa meezetida asaas seeray , saroy kumida xillotethaa ayfe ayfisees .
58012012	Hiza , hintte arggaacida qesiyanne hintte daaburida gulbbata minthite .
58012013	Wobbey paxana melappe attin aathi meqqonna mela hintte tohuwas suure oge giigisite .
58012014	Asa ubbaara saro daanawunne geeshshatethan daanaw minnite ; geeshshatethi baynna oonikka Godaa be7anaw dandda7enna .
58012015	Hinttefe ooddeskka Xoossaa aadho keehatethay pacconnaada , qassi camo ayfe ayfidi daro asaa tunisiyanne dhayssiya zerethada gidonna mela naagettite .
58012016	Hintte giddon laymatiya asi woykko issi toho miya kathas ba bayratethaa toochchidi bayzida Eesawe mela asi doonna mela naagettite .
58012017	Guyeppe Eesawey he anjjuwaa ekkanaw koyida wode digettidayssa ereeta . I he anjjuwaa afuthan minnidi koykkoka , demmanaw dandda7ibeenna ; I nagaraappe simmanaw qaada demmibeenna .
58012018	Hintte kushen boshettiya Siina deriyakko , eexiya tamaakko , dhumaakko , caaganaakko , gotiyakko ,
58012019	moyziya waasuwako woykko qaalay si7ettiya bessaako yibeekketa . He qaala si7ida asay hara guzha qaala si7onna mela woossidosona .
58012020	Ays giikko , “ Hari attoshin , do7i he deriya bochchiko , shuchchan cadettidi hayqo ” yaagida kiitaa entti tookkanaw dandda7ibookkona .
58012021	He haniyabay daro daganthiyaba gidida gisho Musey , “ Taani yashshan kokkoras ” yaagis .
58012022	Shin hintte Xiyoone Deriyakko , de7o Xoossay de7iya Yerusalaame katamaakko , issife shiiqidi ufayttiya daro mukulu kiitanchchotakko saluwa yideta .
58012023	Entta sunthay salon xaafettida woosa keethaa bayra naytakko , asa ubbaa pirddiya Xoossaakko , polo gidida xillo asaa ayyaanatakko yideta .
58012024	Ooratha caaquwas giddo gididi sigethiya Yesuusakko , Aabela suuthaafe aadhdhiyabaa odiya wurxettida suuthaakko yideta .
58012025	Hinttew odiya uraa qaala ixxas goonna mela naagettite . Kaseyssati sa7an gididi odida kiitaa si7onna ixxidi attiboonnabaa gidikko yaatin , salon gididi odiya qaala nuuni ixxas giikko waanidi attanee ?
58012026	He wode iya qaalay sa7a qaathis . Shin ha77i taani , “ Sa7a xalaala gidonnashin issi toho zaarada saluwakka qaathana ” yaagis .
58012027	“ Issi toho zaarada ” giya qaalay qaaxxonnobay minnidi daana mela qaaxxiya medhettidabati dhayanayssa bessees .
58012028	Nuuni qaaxxanaw dandda7onna kawotethaa ekkiya gisho Xoossaa galatoos ; Xoossaa ufayssiya ogen bonchchoninne yashshatethan iya goynnos .
58012029	Hiza , nu Xoossay tuma xuuggiya tama .
58013001	Ammaniya asada issoy issuwara polo siiqetite .
58013002	Imathe mokkeyssa dogoppite . Issi issi asati hessada oothishe eronna kiitanchchota mokkidosona .
58013003	Qashon de7eyssata hintteka enttara issife qashon de7iyada oothidi enttana qoppite . Waaye ekkiya asaara issife hintteka waaye ekkiyada oothidi enttana qoppite .
58013004	Ekoynne geloy asa ubbaa matan bonchchettidabaa gido . Qassi Xoossay laymateyssatanne laammeyssata pirddanaw de7iya gisho azinaynne machchiya issoy issuwas ammanettanaw bessees .
58013005	Miishe siiqoppe hinttena naagite ; hinttew de7iyaban alite . Xoossay , “ Taani nena ubbarakka yeggike woykko aggike ” yaagis .
58013006	Hessa gisho , nuuni ammanettidi , “ Goday tana maaddeyssa ; ta yayyike ; asi tana ay oothanee ? ”
58013007	Xoossaa qaala koyro hinttew odida hinttena kaaletheyssata qoppite . Entti waanidi de7idaakko entta duussaa be7idi entta ammanuwa kaallite .
58013008	Yesuus Kiristtoosi zinekka hachchika merinawukka laamettenna .
58013009	Dumma dumma ooratha timirtten harasoo bidi dhayoppite ; booppite . Nu wozanay Xoossaa aadho keehatethan minnanaw besseesppe attin min go77onna kathan wogaa polon gidoppo .
58013010	Shin dunkkaaniya giddon oothiya kahineti he yarshsho kathaafe maanaw enttaw maati baynna yarshsho bessay nuus de7ees .
58013011	Kahine halaqay nagara yarshshos mehe suuthi ekkidi yarshshanaw Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa gelees . Shin he mehiya ashuwa dirssaafe karen xuuggees .
58013012	Hessadakka , Yesuusi deriya nagaraappe ba suuthan geeshshanaw katamaa penggiyafe karen waayettis .
58013013	Hiza , nuuni boriya tookkidi dirssaafe kare iyakko keyoos .
58013014	Hiza , nuus hayssan merinaw de7iya katami baawa , shin nuuni yaana katamaa naagoos .
58013015	Hiza , Yesuusa baggara ubba wode iya sunthaas markkattiya mettershsha galata yarshsho Xoossaas immoos .
58013016	Lo77obaa oosonne hinttew de7iyabaappe metootida asaas imo dogoppite . Hiza , hessa mela yarshshoy Xoossaa ufayssees .
58013017	Hinttena kaaletheyssatas kiitettite ; entti giyabaa oothite . Entti bantta oothiyabas Xoossaa sinthan oyshettanaw de7iya gisho hinttena heemmoosona . Hintte enttaw kiitettiko , bantta oosuwa ufayttidi oothana ; hessi hanonna ixxiko , entti azzanishe oothana ; hessi hinttena aybibaakka maaddenna .
58013018	Nuus Xoossaa woossite . Nu kahay geeshshi ; nu ubba wode lo77obaa oothanaw koyoos .
58013019	Taani hintteko ellesada yaana mela hintte taw minthidi Xoossaa woossana mela ta hinttena hadara gays .
58013020	Sarotethaa Xoossay , dorssa heemmiya nu Godaa Yesuusa , ba merinaa caaqo suuthan hayqoppe denthidayssi ,
58013021	iya sheniya oothana mela lo77obaa ubban I hinttena dancciso . Iya ufayssiyabaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara nunan Xoossay ootho . Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara Xoossaas merinaappe merinaa gakkanaw bonchchoy gido . Amin77i .
58013022	Ta ishato , ta ha dabddaabbiya hinttew qanthan xaafida gisho hintte ta zoriya salettonna ekkana mela ta hinttena woossays .
58013023	Nu ishay , Ximotiyoosi qashoppe bilettidayssa erite . I ellesidi taakko yiikko ta iyara hinttena bada be7ana .
58013024	Hinttena kaaletheyssatanne ammaniyaa ubbaa saro giite . Xaaleppe yida ammaniyaa asay hinttena saro yaagoosona .
58013025	Xoossaa aadho keehatethay hintte ubbaara gido . Amin77i .
59001001	Xoossaanne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aylley , Yayqoobi , biitta ubban laalettida tammanne nam77u sheeshatas kiittida kiita . Saro , ay mela de7eetii ?
59001002	Ta ishato , hinttena dumma dumma paacey gakkiya wode hintte lo77obaa demmidaada kumetha ufayssan ekkite .
59001003	Hintte ammanuwa paacetethay dandda7a hinttew immeyssa ereeta .
59001004	Hintte wurssethi gakkanaw dandda7ikko aybi pacey baynna polonne kumethi gideta .
59001005	Hinttefe ooddeskka cinccatethi dhayikko Xoossaa woosso . Iyaw imettana . Xoossay oonakka boronna ubbaas keehatethan immiya Xoosse .
59001006	Shin I woossiya wode sidhonna ammanon Xoossaa woosso . Sidhiya oonikka carkkoy sugin qaaxxiya abbaa zule mela .
59001007	Nam77u qofi de7eynne ba ogiyan eqqonna oonikka Godaappe aykkoka demmana gidi qoppofo .
59001008	
59001009	Ammaniya manqo asati , Xoossay enttana dhoqqu oothiya wode ufaytto .
59001010	Qassi ammaniyaa dure asati Xoossay enttana ziqqi oothiya wode ufaytto . Dure asati ciishshada dhayana .
59001011	Away ba mishaara keyidi maataa melisin , ciishshay qolettees ; iya lo77otethayka dhayees . Hessadakka , dure asati bantta oosuwan daaburishe dhayana .
59001012	Metuwa xoonidi aadhdhidaappe guye , Xoossay bana siiqeyssatas immana gidi qaala gelida de7o kallachchaa ekkana gisho meton gencciya asi anjjettidayssa .
59001013	Oonikka paacettiya wode “ Tana Xoossay paaces ” gooppo . Xoossay iitan paacettenna ; qassi I oonakka paaccenna .
59001014	Shin issi issi asi ba iita amuwaan gooshettiya wodenne cimettiya wode paacettees .
59001015	Hessafe guye , amotethi qanthattidi nagara yelees ; qassi nagari diccidi hayqo yelees .
59001016	Ta siiqo ishato , cimettofite .
59001017	Lo77o imoynne kumetha anjjo ubbay saloppenne saluwa poo7uwa medhdhida Xoossaa aawappe yees . Xoossay kuyada ubba wode laamettenna .
59001018	Nuuni , iya medhetethaas koyro gidana mela nuna tuma qaalan ba shenen yelis .
59001019	Ta siiqo ishato , hayssa akeekite . Asi ubbay si7anaw elleso , shin odettanawunne hanqettanaw ellesoppo .
59001020	Asa hanqoy Xoossay koyaa xillotethaa ehenna .
59001021	Hessa gisho , tuna hanotanne iitatetha ubbaa diggidi , Xoossay hintte wozanan tokkida hintte shemppuwa ashshanaw dandda7iya qaala aadatethan ekkite .
59001022	Shin Xoossaa qaala ooson peeshshiteppe attin sissa xalaalan hinttena cimmofite .
59001023	Qaalaa si7idi oothonna asi , I ba som77uwa masttoten be7iya asa mela .
59001024	I ba som77uwa be7idi bees , shin I ay daaniyakko ellesi dogees .
59001025	Shin oonikka aylletethafe kessiya polo higgiya akeekan be7idi , kaallidi naagey , si7idayssa dogonna ooson peeshshiya uray , ba ooso ubban anjjettana .
59001026	Ba inxarssaa naagonna ammanays giya uray bana cimmees ; iya ammanoy hada .
59001027	Xoossaa Aawa sinthan borey baynna geeshsha ammanoy hayssa : aaya aawu baynna naytanne am77eta maadonne alamiya tunaappe bana naago .
59002001	Ta ishato , hintte nu bonchcho Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammaniyabaa gidikko , asa som77o xeellidi ase bonchchofite .
59002002	Leemisos , worqqa migiddo aathidi , lo77o ma7o ma77ida dure asi hintte shiiquwa yis . Qassi curqqa ma7o ma77ida manqo asikka yis .
59002003	Lo77o ma7o ma77ida addiya hintte aathi bonchchidi , “ Ne hayssan lo77iya oydiyan utta ” gidi , qassi manqo addiya , “ Ne yan eqqa woykko hayssan ta tohuwa matan sa7an utta ” geeta .
59002004	Yaatin , hinttee , hintte giddon shaaketethi medhdheyssatanne iita qofara de7iya daynnata mela gidekketiyye ?
59002005	Ta siiqo ishato , si7ite . Ammanon dure gidana melanne bana siiqeyssatas immana gida salo kawotethaa laattana mela ha sa7an de7iya manqota Xoossay dooribeenneyye ?
59002006	Shin hintte manqota toochcheeta . Hinttena un77etheyssati dureta gidokkonaayye ? Hinttena daynna sinthi goochcheyssati entta gidokkonaayye ?
59002007	Hintte xeegettida lo77o Godaa sunthaa cayeyssati entta gidokkonaayye ?
59002008	Shin Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Ase ubbaa nena ne doseyssada dosa ” geetettidi xaafettida Xoossaa kawotethaa higgiya hintte polikko lo77o ootheeta .
59002009	Shin hintte asa som77o xeellidi bonchchiko , nagara ootheeta qassi higgey hinttena higge menthida asada pirddana .
59002010	Oonikka higge ubbaafe issuwa menthidi , attida ubbaa naagikko ubbaa menthidaada taybettees .
59002011	“ Laammofa ” gida Goday , qassi “ Wodhoppa ” gis . Shin neeni laammonna aggada wodhidabaa gidikko , higgiya menthadasa .
59002012	Aylletethafe kessiya higgiya sinthan pirdda ekkanaw de7iya asada odetitenne oothite .
59002013	Ase maaronna oonakka Xoossay maaronna pirddana . Shin maarotethay pirddaa xoonees .
59002014	Ta ishato , hinttefe issi asi taw ammanoy de7ees gidi , ba ammanuwa ooson bessonna ixxiko iya ay maaddanee ? Iya ammanoy iya ashshanaw dandda7ii ?
59002015	Leemisos issi ishay woykko issi michchiya kallotikonne enttaw miyabay dhayikko ,
59002016	hinttefe issi asi enttako , “ Saro biite ! Tama kayite ! Kallidi miite ! ” gidi , koshshiyabaa enttaw immonna ixxiko entta ay maaddii ?
59002017	Hessa gisho , oosoy baynna ammanoy barkka hayqqidayssa .
59002018	Shin issi asi , “ New ammanoy de7ees ; qassi taw oosoy de7ees . Neeni ne ammanuwa ne oosuwappe shaakkada tana bessa ; takka ta ammanuwa ta oosuwan nena bessana ” gaana .
59002019	Neeni , issi Xoossay de7eyssa ammanaasa ; hessi lo77o . Tuna ayyaanatikka ammanoosona ; yashshan kokkorosona .
59002020	Neno eeyaw ! Ammanoy oosoppe shaakettidi maaddonnayssa eranaw koyay ?
59002021	Nu aawa Abrahamey , ba na7aa Yisaaqa yarshsho bessaa bolla wothida wode ba oosuwan xillibeenne ?
59002022	Iya ammanoynne iya oosoy issife oothidayssa be7ikki ? Iya ammanoy iya oosuwan polettis .
59002023	Geeshsha Maxaafay , “ Abrahamey Xoossaa ammanis . Xoossay hessa iyaw xillotethi oothidi taybis ” gidayssi polettis . Qassi I Xoossaa dabbo geetettidi xeegettis .
59002024	Asi ammano xalaalan gidonnashin ooson xilleyssa be7aasa .
59002025	Hessadakka , laymiya Ra7aaba Isra7eeleppe kiitettidayssata mokkada hara ogera entta moyzida wode ba oosuwan xillabeekke ?
59002026	Shemppoy shaakettida asatethay hayqo gideyssada , oosoy shaakettida ammanoykka hayqqidayssa .
59003001	Ta ishato , hinttefe daroti asttamaare gidoppo . Nu , asttamaareti haratappe aadhdhiya pirddaa ekkanayssa hintte ereeta .
59003002	Nu ubbay daroban balettoos . Ba odan balettonna oonikka banatethaa naaganaw dandda7iya polo asi .
59003003	Parati nuus kiitettana mela bixaala barssidi nuuni koyaa bessi ubbaa efoos .
59003004	Markkabey hessa mela gita gidishe wolqqaama carkkuwan sugettikokka , iya laaggeyssi ba koyaa bessi zaaridi laaggiya guutha mithan laagettidi bees .
59003005	Hessada inxarssi asatethaa giddon guutha gidikkoka daro gitaban ceeqettees . Guutha tami daro gita woraa xuuggees .
59003006	Inxarssi tama mela . Inxarssi nu asatethaa giddon iitan kumida alame ; asatetha ubbaa tunisees . Gaannameppe keyaa tamada nu de7uwa wotha ubbaa xuuggees .
59003007	Do7atanne kafota , ulora gooshetteyssatanne abban de7iya medhetethata ubbaa asi haarees ; enttika haarettidosona .
59003008	Shin oonikka inxarssi haaranaw dandda7ibeenna . Inxarssi wodhiya marzey kumida haarettonna iita medhetethi .
59003009	Nu inxarssan , nu , Godaanne Xoossaa galatoos . Qassi iyara Xoossaa leemison Medhettida asaa qanggoos .
59003010	Issi doonappe galatinne qanggethi keyees . Ta ishato , hessada hananaw bessenna .
59003011	Pulttoy issi ollafe mal77iya haathinne cammiya haathi pulttanaw dandda7ii ?
59003012	Ta ishato , balase mithi shamaho ayfanaw dandda7ii ? Woykko woyne mithi balase mitha ayfe ayfanaw dandda7ii ? Camo haathafe mal77o haathi keyanaw dandda7enna .
59003013	Hintte giddon cinccinne akeekanchchoy oonee ? Ba lo77o de7uwa , ashkketethaninne cinccatethan oosettida ooson besso .
59003014	Shin hintte wozanan cammiya qanaateynne bana dosoy de7ikko ceeqettofite ; tumaa bolla worddotoppite .
59003015	Hessa mela cinccatethay saloppe yidabaa gidonnashin hessi asabaa , alamebaa , xalahebaa .
59003016	Qanaateynne bana dosoy de7iya son ooshshinne iita ooso ubbay de7oosona .
59003017	Shin bollafe yaa cinccatethay ubbaafe sinthe geeshshi . Qassi sarotethi , aadatethi , si7idi ekkeyssa , qadhetteyssa , lo77o ayfey kumidayssa , ase shaakkonnayssanne cubbotethi baynnayssa .
59003018	Sarotethaa doseyssati sarotethi zeridi xillotethi buuccosona .
59004001	Ooshshinne oli hintte giddo awuppe yii ? Entti yey hintte asatethaa haaranaw olettiya hintte asho amuwaappe gidenneyye ?
59004002	Hintte amotteeta , shin demmeketa ; hessa gisho , wodheeta . Minthi koyeeta , shin demmanaw dandda7ekketa ; hessa gisho , ooyetteetanne oletteeta . Hintte Xoossaa woossonna gisho koyabaa demmeketa .
59004003	Hintte woosseta , shin demmeketa . Hintte asho amuwaa polanaw wobbe ogen woossiya gisho demmeketa .
59004004	Hinttenoo , laymateyssato ! Ha alamiya dosey Xoossara morkke gideyssa erekketii ? Ha alamiyara dabbotanaw koyey oonikka Xoossaara morkke .
59004005	Geeshsha Maxaafay , “ Xoossay nunan daana mela oothida Ayyaanay , nuuni iyaw buzo gidana mela amottees ” gidayssa coo gidabaa daanii ?
59004006	Shin Geeshsha Maxaafay , “ Xoossay otoranchchota ixxees , shin banttana kawushsheyssatas maarotethaa immees ” yaagiya gisho Xoossay maarotethaa darssidi immees .
59004007	Hessa gisho , Xoossaas haarettite ; Xalahiyara eqettite ; I hinttefe haakkana .
59004008	Xoossaakko shiiqite ; I hintteko shiiqana . Hinttenoo , nagaranchchoto , hintte kushiya meecettite ; nam77u qofi de7eyssato , hintte wozanaa geeshshite .
59004009	Kayottite , yeekkitenne afuxite . Hintte miichchay yeehon , hintte ufayssay azzanon laameto .
59004010	Godaa sinthan hinttenatethaa kawushshite ; I hinttena dhoqqu dhoqqu oothana .
59004011	Ta ishato , issoy issuwa zigiroppite . Ba ishaa zigireynne iya bolla pirddey higge zigireesinne higge bolla pirddees . Neeni higge bolla pirddiko higge bolla pirddeyssa gidaasappe attin higge poleyssa gidakka .
59004012	Higge immeynne pirddey Xoossaa xalaala . Ashshanawunne dhayssanaw dandda7ey iya . Yaatin , asa bolla pirddiya neeni oonee ?
59004013	Hintte , “ Nuuni hachchi woykko wontto ya katamaa woykko ha katamaa baana ; yan laythi uttana ; zal77idi wodhisana ” yaageyssato , si7ite .
59004014	Wontto aybi hananeekko hintte erekketa . Hintte de7oy waananekko erey oonee ? Hintte guutha wode benttidi dhayaa akka mela .
59004015	Hessa aggidi , “ Goday giikko nuuni daana ; hayssa woykko hessa oothana ” yaaganaw bessees .
59004016	Shin hintte ha77i otortteetanne ceeqetteeta . Hessa mela ceeqo ubbay iita .
59004017	Hessa gisho , lo77obaa oothanaw erishe oothonna uraas hessi nagara .
59005001	Hinttenoo , dureto , hintte bolla iita metoy yaa gisho yeekkitenne zeleelite .
59005002	Hintte shaloy buuqqis ; hintte afilaykka bilan meetettis .
59005003	Hintte worqqaynne hintte biray shi7is . He shi7ay hintte bolla markka gidana . I hintte asatethaa tamada maana . Hintte ha wurida qammatan hinttew shalo dagayeeta .
59005004	Hintte gaden oothi pee7ida asaa kera miishiya qanxibeekketa . Hessi hintte bolla waasses . He asata waasoy wolqqaama Godaa haythan si7ettis .
59005005	Ha sa7an hintte ulo xalaalas qoppidi , injjen de7ideta . Shukas giigettida meheda hinttena dhiikkideta .
59005006	Hinttera eqettanaw dandda7onna xillo asa bolla pirddideta ; iya wodhideta .
59005007	Ta ishato , Goday yaana gakkanaw genccite . Goshshanchchoy torchche iraynne sila iray yaana gakkanaw genccidi al77o kathaa naagidi waati gathi ekkiyako qoppite .
59005008	He goshshanchchuwada hintteka genccite . Godaa yuussay matattida gisho ufayssan naagite .
59005009	Ta ishato , Xoossay hintte bolla pirddonna mela issoy issuwa bolla zuuzummofite . Pirddeyssi penggen eqqis .
59005010	Ta ishato , waayan genccida , Godaa sunthan odida nabeta leemiso oothidi ekkite .
59005011	Dandda7an genccidayssata nuuni anjjettidayssata goos . Iyyoobey waanidi genccidaako hintte si7ideta . Goday wurssethan iya waati maaddidaakko be7ideta . I maarotinne qadhey kumida Godaa gidiya gisho hessa oothis .
59005012	Shin ubbaafe sinthe , ta ishato , saluwan gidin woykko sa7an gidin woykko hara aybinkka caaqqofite . Xoossaa pirddan hintte gelonnaada hintte oday ee gidikko , “ Ee ” giite ; akkay gidikko , “ Akkay ” giite .
59005013	Hintte giddon meto ekkiya oonikka de7ikko Xoossaa woosso . Ufayttiya oonikka de7ikko galatan yexxo .
59005014	Hinttefe harggettiya oonikka de7ikko woosa keetha cimata xeego . Entti Godaa sunthan shamaho zayte tiyidi iyaw Xoossaa woosso .
59005015	Ammanon woossida woosay hargganchchuwa pathana . Goday iya , harggiyafe denthana ; I nagara oothidabaa gidikkoka Goday iya maarana .
59005016	Hessa gisho , hintte paxana mela hintte nagara issoy issuwas paaxitenne issoy issuwas woossite . Xillo asa woosay wolqqaama ooso oothees .
59005017	Eliyaasi nu mela ase . Iri sa7an bukkonna mela minthidi Xoossaa woossin heedzu laythinne usuppun ageena sa7an iri bukkibeenna .
59005018	Zaaridi I Xoossaa woossin saloppe iri bukkis ; sa7aykka kathi mokkis .
59005019	Ta ishato , hinttefe oonikka tuma ogiyappe buutikko , haray iya tumaakko zaarikko ,
59005020	nagaranchchuwa iya bala ogiyappe zaariya oonikka , iya shemppuwa hayqoppe ashsheyssanne iya daro nagaraas maarota immeyssa ero .
60001001	Taani , Yesuus Kiristtoosa hawaarey Phexiroosi ; Phanxoosan , Galaatiyan , Qaphadooqiyan , Iisiyaninne Bitiiniyan betanchchoda laalettidi de7iya Xoossay doorida , asaas ha dabddaabbiya xaafas .
60001002	Yesuus Kiristtoosas hintte kiitettana melanne iya suuthan geeyana mela , Xoossaa Aaway ba kase eran dooridayssatasinne Geeshsha Ayyaanan geeyida , hinttew aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay gido .
60001003	Yesuus Kiristtoosa hayqoppe denthidi ba gita maarotethan nam77antho yeletethaanne dhayonna ufayssaa immida nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Aaway , Xoossay galatetto .
60001004	Qassi Xoossay hinttew dhayonna , iitonnanne buuqqonna laata salon giigisis .
60001005	He laatay wode wurssethan qonccanaw de7iya atotethaas Xoossaa wolqqan ammanon hinttew naagettidi de7ees .
60001006	Ha77i guutha wodes hintte dumma dumma paacen un77ettikokka hessan ufayttite .
60001007	He paacey hinttena gakkiday , taman yeggin dhayaa worqqafe hintte ammanoy aadhonne tuma gideyssa bessanaassa . He paacettida ammanuwan Yesuus Kiristtoosi qoncciya wode galataa , bonchchonne saba hintte ekkana .
60001008	Hintte Yesuusa be7ibeekketa , shin iya siiqeta . Hintte ha77i iya be7iboonnabaa gidikkoka , iya ammaneeta . Qassi odan qonccisanaw dandda7ettona ufayssaninne bonchchon kumideta .
60001009	Hintte ammanon naagiya hintte shemppuwa atotethaa ekkana .
60001010	Aadho keehatethaa baggara hinttew giigida ha atotethaabaa nabeti eranaw gita koshshaninne naagon koyidosona .
60001011	Enttan de7iya Kiristtoosa Ayyaanay iya waayabanne hessafe guye yaana bonchchuwabaa kasetidi markkattishe , awude woykko waanidi hananeekko akeekan pilggidosona .
60001012	Nabeti odida tinbbitey banttaw gidonnashin hinttew gideyssa Xoossay hinttew qonccisis . Ha77i asay hinttew odida Wonggelaa saloppe kiitettida Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqqan hinttew odidosona . Kiitanchchotika hessa be7anaw amottidosona .
60001013	Hessa gisho , oosos hinttena giigisite ; hinttena haarite . Yesuus Kiristtoosi qoncciya wode hintte ekkana aadho keehatethaa ufayssan naagite .
60001014	Xoossaa naytada iyaw kiitettite ; hintte kase eronna oothida iita amuwaa kaallofite .
60001015	Shin hinttena xeegida Xoossay geeshshi gididayssada hintteka hintte duussa ubban geeshshi gidite .
60001016	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Taani geeshshi gidida gisho hintteka geeshshi gidite ” geetetti xaafettis .
60001017	Asa som77o be7onna iya oosuwada pirddiya Xoossaa , “ Nu Aawaw ” gidi xeegiyabaa gidikko , ha sa7aa imathatetha duussaa yashshan de7ite .
60001018	Hinttee , hintte aawatappe laattida pathonna de7uwappe wozettidayssi , dhaya biran woykko worqqan gidonnayssa ereeta .
60001019	Borey woykko borssoy baynna dorssa suuthada al77o gidida Kiristtoosa suuthan wozettideta .
60001020	Xoossay alamey medhettanaappe kase Kiristtoosa dooris , shin ha wurssetha wodiyan Kiristtoosi hintte gisho qonccis .
60001021	Hintte ammanoynne hintte ufayssay Xoossan gidana mela iya hayqoppe denthidi , bonchchida Kiristtoosa baggara Xoossan ammaneeta .
60001022	Hintte tumatethaas kiitettidi hinttenatethaa geeshshideta . Hintte issoy issuwa wozanappe siiqeta , shin ha77ika tuma wozanappe minthidi siiqite .
60001023	Hintte nam77antho yelettiday dhayaa zerethafe gidonnashin merinaw de7iya Xoossaa qaalan dhayonna zerethaafe yelettideta .
60001024	Xoossaa qaalay , “ Asi ubbay maata mela ; iya bonchcho ubbay ciishsha mela . Maatay melees , ciishshaykka qolettees .
60001025	Shin Godaa qaalay merinaw de7ees ”
60002001	Hiza , iitatethi ubbaa , cimo ubbaa , cubbotethi qanaatenne zigirssi ubbaa hinttefe diggite .
60002002	Goday keeha gideyssa hintte eridi meezetidayssada ha77i yelettida guutha naytada hintte atotethan diccishe baanaw Xoossaa geeshsha qaala maathaa ubba wode amottite .
60002003	
60002004	Asan borettidi Xoossan doorettida al77o gidida de7o shuchchaa , Godaa Yesuusakko shiiqite .
60002005	Hintte Ayyaana keethi keexettiya de7o shuchchata . Hintte Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara Xoossaa ufayssiya ayyaana yarshsho yarshshiya geeshsha kahineta .
60002006	Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Hekko , taani Xiyoone kataman godaa xaphuwa minthiya , doorettida , al77o shuchchaa wothas ; iyan ammaniyaa oonikka yeellatenna ” “ Gimbbeyssati kadhidi ixxida shuchchay godaa xaphuwa minthiya , ubbaafe aadhdhiya shuchchu gidis . ” “ Ha shuchchay ase dhubbiya shuchchunne ase kunddisiya zaalla ”
60002007	
60002008	
60002009	Shin Xoossay dhumappe malaalisiya ba poo7uwakko hinttena xeegiday , hintte iya lo77otethaa haratas odanaw doorettida zare , kawo kahine , geeshsha derenne Xoossaa dumma dere .
60002010	Hintte kase Xoossaa dere gidekketa , shin ha77i hintte iya dere . Hintte kase maarotethi demmibeekketa , shin ha77i maarotethi demmideta .
60002011	Ta ishato , hintte ha sa7an imathenne betanchcho gididayssada hintte shemppuwa oliya asho amoppe haakkana mela taani hinttena woossays .
60002012	Ammanonna asay hinttena iita oothiya asada zigiryaa wode Xoossay nuna be7anaw yaa gallas , entti hintte lo77o oosuwa be7idi Xoossaa galatana mela hinttew lo77o de7oy de7o .
60002013	Godaa gisho gidi maatara de7iya asatas haarettite ; ubbaafe bolla gidiya gisho kawuwaskka haarettite .
60002014	Entti iita ootheyssata seeranawunne lo77o ootheyssata sabbanaw kawuwappe kiitettida gisho deriya ayseyssatas haarettite .
60002015	Hinttee , hintte lo77o oosuwan eronna eeya asaa doona oythanayssi Xoossaa shene .
60002016	Xoossaa aylle gididi la77atethan de7iteppe attin hintte la77atethaa iita oosos kama oothofite .
60002017	Asa ubbaa bonchchite ; ammaniyaa asaa siiqite ; Xoossaa yayyite ; kawo bonchchite .
60002018	Aylleto , lo77o godatasinne keeha godata xalaalas gidonnashin iitaataskka bonchchon haarettite .
60002019	Asi Xoossaa gisho gidi bessonna waaye waayettiko Xoossay iya anjjana .
60002020	Shin hintte nagara oothin hinttena dechchiya wode hintte dandda7ikko hinttew ay galati de7ii ? Shin lo77obaa oothidi waaye dandda7ikko Xoossay hinttena hessas anjjana .
60002021	Xoossay hinttena xeegiday hessa gishossa ; Kiristtoosi hinttew waayettis ; hintte iya kaallana mela , hinttew leemiso gidis .
60002022	I nagara oothibeenna ; iya doonankka worddoy benttibeenna .
60002023	Entti iya cayaa wode zaaridi cayibeenna . Shin waaye ekkishe xillo pirddiya Xoossaas ba pirdda aggaagisppe attin manddibeenna .
60002024	Nuuni nagaras hayqqidi xillotethas daana mela Kiristtoosi ba ashuwan nu nagaraa masqaliya bolla tookkis ; hintte iya madunthan paxideta .
60002025	Kase hintte oge balidi dhayida dorssa mela , shin ha77i hintte shemppuwa heemmeyssakkonne naageyssakko simmideta .
60003001	Hessadakka , machcheto , hintte azinatappe Xoossaa qaalas kiitettonayssati de7ikkoka aykkoka odettonashin , hintte yashshatethaanne hintte geeshsha de7uwa be7idi ammanana mela enttaw haarettite .
60003002	
60003003	Hinttee , hintte huu7e pixoninne worqqa aason woykko lo77o ma7on hintte bolla asatethaa loyson gidoppo .
60003004	Shin hintte wozanaa giddon de7iya yegelsatethay Xoossaa sinthan hinttew daro al77o gididi dhayonna , ashkkenne woppu gida ayyaana gido .
60003005	Xoossay immana gidayssa ammanida geeshsha maccasati bini wode bantta azinatas haarettidi , banttana hessada daro loythidosona .
60003006	Hessada Saara Abrahame , “ Ta godaw ” yaagada xeegashe , iyaw kiitettasu ; hintteka aykkoka yayyonna lo77obaa oothiko I nayta .
60003007	Azinatoo , hintte machcheti hinttefe daaburanchcho medheta gideyssa eridi , enttana bonchchite ; hintte woosa dhubbonna mela Xoossay immida de7uwa entti hinttera issife laattiya gisho entta bonchchite .
60003008	Wurssethan , ubbay issi qofan de7ite . Issoy issuwas qadhettishe , ishada siiqetite ; qassi issoy issuwas keehatanne ashkketa gidite .
60003009	Iita gishos iita woykko cashshaa gisho cayidi zaaroppite ; hessa aggidi , Xoossay hinttew anjjuwaa immanaw hinttena xeegida gisho anjjite .
60003010	Ays giikko , Geeshsha Maxaafay , “ De7o doseynne lo77o wode be7anaw koyey oona gidikkoka ba inxarssan iitabaanne worddo odetteyssa aggo .
60003011	Iitabaa ootheyssa aggidi lo77obaa ootho ; sarotethaakka keehi koyonne kaallo .
60003012	Godaa ayfey xillotakko xeellees ; qassi I ubba wode entta woosaa haayzees . Shin Goday iitabaa ootheyssata ba hanqo som77uwan xeellees ”
60003013	Hintte lo77obaa oothanaw amottikko hinttena qohanay oonee ?
60003014	Hari attoshin , xillotetha gisho hintte waayettiko anjjettidayssata . Asas yayyofitenne hirggofite .
60003015	Kiristtoosa hintte wozanan bonchchitenne godayite . Xoossay hinttew immida ufayssaas gaaso oychchiya ooddeskka zaaro immanaw ubba wode giigi uttite , shin hessa ashkketethaninne yashshan oothite .
60003016	Qassi Kiristtoosan hintte de7iya lo77o de7uwa iitabaa oothidabaada , hinttena cayaa asay zigiryaaban yeellatana mela hintte kahay geeshshi gido .
60003017	Xoossay gidabaa gidikko iitabaa oothida gisho waaye ekkeyssafe lo77obaa oothida gisho waaye ekkeyssi lo77o .
60003018	Kiristtoosi nuna Xoossaakko shiishanaw baw xillo gididi de7ishe , nagaranchchota gisho issi toho nagara ubbaas hayqqis ; I ba asatethan hayqqis , shin ayyaanan paxis .
60003019	Qassi he ayyaanan I bidi qashon de7iya shemppotas qaala odis .
60003020	Nohey markkabiya keexiya wode he shemppoti Xoossaas kiitettonna ixxidosona , shin Xoossay enttana dandda7is . Hosppun asa xalaali markkabiyan gelidi , dhayo haathaafe attidosona .
60003021	He dhayo haathay ha77i hinttena ashshiya xinqqate leemiso gidis . Ha xinqqatey bolla qita meecco gidonnashin lo77o kaha Xoossaafe ekkanaw iya woossiya oge gididi , Kiristtoosa dendduwa baggara hinttena ashshees .
60003022	I salo bidi Xoossaa ushachchan uttidi , kiitanchchota , maata aawatanne wolqqaamata haarees .
60004001	Hessa gisho , Kiristtoosi ba ashuwan nuus waayettida gisho hintteka he qofan hinttena danccisidi minnidi eqqite . Kiristtoosa gisho gidi ba ashuwan waaye ekkida uray nagara oothike gidi qanxida asi .
60004002	He uray ba attida laythan Xoossaa shene oothanaw koyeesippe attin iita asho amon deenna .
60004003	Kase hintte ammanonna asay de7idayssada de7ideta . Hintte iita amon , laymatethan , mathon , tunatethi denthethiya yethan , pokkiya eeqa goynnon kase de7ida duussay gidana .
60004004	Ammanonna asaara hintte shori baynna oosuwa oothonna gisho malaalettidi hinttena cayoosona .
60004005	Shin entti paxata bollanne hayqqida asaa bolla pirddanaw de7iya Xoossaas zaaro immana .
60004006	Hayqqida asaas Wonggelay sabbakettiday hayssa gishossa . Entti asatho bantta ashuwan pirddettana qassi bantta ayyaanan Xoossaatho de7on daana .
60004007	Hiza , ubbabaas wurssethay matattis . Hessa gisho , woossanaw dandda7ettana mela woppu gida wozani de7o ; maarara de7ite .
60004008	Siiqoy daro nagara kammiya gisho ubbaafe aathidi issoy issuwara wozanappe siiqetite .
60004009	Zuuzummonna issoy issuwa imathatethan mokkite .
60004010	Hintte Xoossaafe dumma dumma aadho keehatethaa imota ekkidayssada hintte issoy issoy he imuwa bessiyada oykkidi issoy issuwa haggaazite .
60004011	Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara ubbaban Xoossay galatettana mela oonikka odiyabaa gidikko Xoossaafe qaala ekkidaada odo . Qassi oonikka maaddiyabaa gidikko Xoossay iyaw immiya wolqqaada maaddo . Bonchchoynne wolqqay merinaappe merinaa gakkanaw iyaw gido . Amin77i .
60004012	Ta baggatoo , hintte tamada xuuggiya waaye paaciya giddora aadhdhiya wode oorathabay hanidaada malaalettofite .
60004013	Shin iya bonchchoy qoncciya wode hintte ufayssay gita gidana mela Kiristtoosa waaya hintte ekkeyssan ufayttite .
60004014	Kiristtoosa sunthaa gisho asi hinttena cayaa wode Xoossaa bonchcho Ayyaanay hintte bolla shemppiya gisho hintte anjjettidayssata .
60004015	Hinttefe waaye ekkiya oonikka shemppo wodhidaada woykko kaysotidaada woykko iita oothidaada woykko gelssonnaban gelidaada hanidi waayettofo .
60004016	Gidoshin , ammano gisho waayettiko Kiristtoosa sunthaa gisho Xoossaa galatoppe attin yeellatoppo .
60004017	Pirddi Xoossaa asaa bolla doomiya wodey gakkis . Hiza , he pirdday koyro nu bolla doomiyabaa gidikko , Xoossaa Wonggelaas Kiitettonna asaa wurssethay ay gidanee ?
60004018	Xilloy un77an attiyaabaa gidikko , makkalanchchoynne nagaranchchoy yaatin waananee ?
60004019	Hessa gisho , Xoossaa sheneda waaye ekkeyssati bantta shemppuwa hadaraa banttana medhdhida , ammanthiya Xoossaas immishe lo77obaa ootho .
60005001	Hiza , woosa keethaa cimatara cima gididayssi , Kiristtoosa waaya markkatteysinne qonccanaw de7iya bonchchuwa shaakettanaw de7iya taani , hintte giddon de7iya cimata zorays .
60005002	Hintte aawatethaafe garssan de7iya Xoossaa wudiya heemmite . Xoossay koyeyssada dosanaappe attin un77ettidi heemmofite . Qassi miishe koshshan gidonnashin haggaazanaw de7iya lo77o qofan heemmite .
60005003	Hintte aawatethaafe garssan de7iya wudiyas leemiso giditeppe attin godatoppite .
60005004	Heemmeyssata halaqay qoncciya wode qolettonna bonchcho kallachcha hintte ekkana .
60005005	Hessadakka , yalagato , cimatas haarettite . Hintte issoy issuwas ashkke gidite . Geeshsha Maxaafan , “ Xoossay otoranchchota ixxees , shin ashkketas aadho keehatethaa immees ” yaagees .
60005006	Xoossay ba wode hinttena bonchchana mela wolqqaama Xoossaa kushiyappe garssan hinttena kawushshite .
60005007	I hinttew qoppiya gisho hinttena hirggisiya ubbaa iya bolla yeggite .
60005008	Hintte morkkey Xalahey , mittiyabaa koyidi , gaammoda gudishe hintte matara yuuya gisho hinttena haaritenne barkkite .
60005009	Alamen de7iya hintte ishati hessada waaye ekkeyssa eridi , ammanon minnidi , Xalahiyara eqettite .
60005010	Ba merinaa bonchchuwas Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggara hinttena xeegida aadho keehatetha ubbaa Xoossay , guutha wodes hintte waayettidappe guye , I ba huu7en hinttena shiishana , katisana , minthidi essana , xaalisana .
60005011	Merinaappe merinaa gakkanaw Xoossay kawoto . Amin77i .
60005012	Ammanettida ishaa gada ta ekkiya Sillaase baggara ha dabddaabbiya hinttew qanthan xaafas . Ta hessa hinttew xaafiday , hinttena zoranawunne Xoossaa aadho keehatethay tuma gideyssa markkattanaassa . He aadho keehatethan minnidi eqqite .
60005013	Hinttera issife doorettida Baabiloonen de7iya woosa keetha asaynne ta na7aa Marqqoosi hinttena , “ Saro saro ” yaagees .
60005014	Siiqo yeeretetha yeerettishe , issoy issuwa sarothite . Kiristtoosan de7iya hintte ubbaas saroy gido . Amin77i .
61001001	Yesuus Kiristtoosa hawaareynne iya aylley , taani , Simoon Phexiroosi , nu Xoossaanne nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosa xillotethaa baggara nuyssa mela al77o ammano ekkidayssatas ha dabddaabbiya xaafas .
61001002	Xoossaanne nu Godaa Yesuusa eron aadho keehatethaynne saroy hinttew kumo .
61001003	Ba bonchchoninne lo77otethan nuna xeegida iya eron de7osinne Xoossaa daanidi daanaw koshshiyaba ubbaa Xoossay ba wolqqan nuus immis .
61001004	Hintte iita amo gaason medhettiya ha alamiyan de7iya bashshaafe kessi ekkanaadanne Xoossaa xoossatethan shaakettanaada , ha imotata baggara daro al77onne gita ufayssaa nuus immis .
61001005	Hessa gisho , minnidi , hintte ammanuwa bolla lo77otethi , lo77otetha bolla eratethi ,
61001006	eratetha bolla bana haaro , bana haaro bolla gencca , gencca bolla Xoossaa daano ,
61001007	Xoossaa daano bolla ishatetha keehatethi , ishatetha keehatetha bolla siiqo gujjite .
61001008	Hayssati hinttew daridi de7iyabaa gidikko , Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa eron maaddiya asinne ayfera de7iya asi oothana .
61001009	Shin hessati baynna oonikka matan de7iyabaa xalaala be7iya qooqe . I ba kase nagaraappe geeyidayssa dogis .
61001010	Hessa gisho , ta ishato , hintte xeessanne hintte dooruwa minthanaw kaseyssafe aathidi minnite . Hintte hessata oothiyabaa gidikko , dhubetteketa .
61001011	Hessan nu Godaanne nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosa merinaa kawotethaa geliya kumetha maatay hinttew imettana .
61001012	Hessa gisho , hintte hayssata eriyabaanne he oykkida tuman minnidi de7iyabaa gidikkoka , taani hayssata ubba wode hinttena hassayiso aggike .
61001013	Taani shemppora de7ida wode ubban hinttena hassayisanayssi koshshiyabaa gada qoppays .
61001014	Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosi taw qonccisadayssada taani ha hayqqiya asatethaa gam77onna qaara yeggada baanayssa erays .
61001015	Taani hinttefe shaakettikokka hintte hayssata ubba wode akeekana mela taw dandda7ettiyabaa ubbaa oothana .
61001016	Nuuni Godaa Kiristtoosa wolqqaanne iya yuussabaa hinttew odey , iya gita bonchchuwa be7idippe attin medhdhi kessida hayse gidenna .
61001017	Daro wolqqaama bonchchuwafe , “ Taani ufayttiya , ta dosiya na7ay hayssa ” yaagiya qaalay yida wode Xoossaa Aawappe bonchchonne galata ekkis .
61001018	Nuuni geeshsha deriya bolla iyara de7iya wode he qaalay saloppe yishin si7ida .
61001019	Nuus hessafe aadhdhiya ammanettida tinbbite qaali de7ees . Sa7i wonttana gakkanawunne bakkali hintte wozanan dolana gakkanaw , dhuman poo7iya poo7o asi naageyssada , hintte he qaalaa naagikko lo77o ootheeta .
61001020	Ubbaafe kasetidi hayssa erite . Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida tinbbite qaala oonikka ba dosidaada birshshanaw dandda7enna .
61001021	Tinbbite ubbaa , Xoossay kiittida asati Geeshsha Ayyaanay kaalethin , odidosonappe attin asa shenen odibookkona .
61002001	Shin worddo nabeti kase asaa giddon de7eyssa mela ha77ika worddo asttamaareti hintte giddon denddana . Entti banttana wozida , Godaa kaddidi , dhayssiya worddo timirttiya ehana . Hessan entti bantta bolla ellesidi dhayo ehoosona .
61002002	Daro asay yeellayaa entta iita ogiya kaallana ; entta gaason tuma ogey cayettana .
61002003	Worddo asttamaareti miishe yaaridi banttaw medhdhi kessida hayssen hinttena bonqana . Benippe doomidi entta pirdday giigi uttis ; entta dhayoykka enttana naagi uttis .
61002004	Nagara oothida kiitanchchotas Xoossay qadhettonna , pirdda gallas gakkanaw gaanname dhuma ollan entta qachchi yeggis .
61002005	Hessadakka , Xoossay xillotethabaa odiya Nohenne hara laappun asata ashshidi , Xoossaa goynnona asay de7iya beni alamiya qadhettonna dhayo haathan dhayssis .
61002006	Geellatas leemiso gidana mela Xoossay Soodomenne Gamoora katamata bido oothidi xuuggidi dhayssis .
61002007	Higges kiitettonna laymatiya asata giddon waayettishe de7ida xillo Looxe Xoossay ashshis .
61002008	He xillo addey entta giddon de7ishe , entti oothiya iita oosuwa gallas gallas be7ida wodenne si7ida wode iya lo77o wozanay un77ettees .
61002009	Hessa gidikko , Goday , bana goynniya asata paaceppe waati ashshaneekko , qassi nagaranchchota pirdda gallasaas gakkanaw waattidi seerishe naagisaneekko erees .
61002010	Ubbaafe aathidi tuna amon asho qofa kaalleyssatanne maata aawata kadheyssata , pirdda gallas gakkanaw Goday naagisis . He asati ganjje minonne otoranchcho gidiya gisho salo medhetethata cayishe yayyokonna .
61002011	Shin kiitanchchoti worddo asttamaaretappe wolqqaninne minotethan daro aadhdhoosonashin Godaa sinthan salo medhetethata cayokkona .
61002012	Shin he asati bantta eronnaban gelidi cayoosona . Entti oykettanawnne hayqqanaw yelettida , wozani baynna do7a mela hanoosona ; enttika wora do7ada coo dhayana .
61002013	Entti gathida metuwada zaari metootana . Seeta gallas yexxishe guppeyssa ufayssiyabaa gidi qoppoosona . Entti kawushshatanne tunata gidi de7ishe hinttera shaakettiya siiqo imatuwan ufayttoosona .
61002014	Laymatiya maccasi xeellidi aggonna ayfey enttaw de7ees ; qassi nagara ootheyssa aggokona . Ammanon minniboonna asaa cimmoosona . Enttaw ubba wode amottiya wozani de7ees ; entti qanggettidayssata .
61002015	Entti suure oge aggidi , makkala miishe siiqidi balida , Bi7oora na7aa Balaama ogiya kaallidosona .
61002016	I ba nagara gaason hanqettis ; dooni baynna harey asada haasayidi nabiya gooshshatethaa teqqis .
61002017	He asati melida pulttota melanne carkkoy tookkidi efiya shaara mela ; entta naagey sakkana dhumaa .
61002018	Entti hadanne otoro oda odettishe balan de7iya asaa giddofe kessi ekkidi buroo minniboonna asata laymatetha asho amon cimmidi balethoosona .
61002019	Entti banttaw dhayo aylletethan de7ishe haratakko , “ Hintte aylletethafe keyana ” yaagosona . Ays giikko , asi ba xoonettidaba ubbaas aylle .
61002020	Entti ashshiya nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa eridi ha alamiya tunatethaafe kessi ekkidaappe guye , zaari qaxettidi xoonettiko kase de7iya de7uwappe guyeyssi enttaw iita gidana .
61002021	Entti xillotetha ogiya eri simmidi aggeyssafe koyrottidi geeshsha kiitta eronnaako enttaw lo77oshin .
61002022	“ Kani ba cooshshaako guye simmees ” qassi , “ Meecettida gudunthoy guye simmidi urqqan gonddorettees ” giya leemisoy tuma gideyssi entta bolla oothees .
61003001	Ta siiqo ishato , hayssi ta hinttew xaafida dabddaabbey nam77antho . Taani ha nam77u dabddaabbetakka hinttew xaafiday , hintte suure qofaa qoppanaada hinttena denthethanaassa .
61003002	Qassi geeshsha nabeti beni odida qaalanne nuna ashshiya Goday , hawaareta baggara kiittida kiitta hintte hassayana mela koyays .
61003003	Ubbaafe kasetidi , wode wurssethan bantta amuwaa kaallidi ase toochcheyssati , toochchishe yaanayssa erite .
61003004	Entti , “ Ta yaana gidayssi awun de7ii ? Nu aawati hayqqidosona , shin ubbabay sa7ay medhettosappe doomidi de7eyssada de7ees ” yaagosona .
61003005	Daro wodeppe kase saloy Xoossaa qaalan medhettidayssa ; qassi sa7ay haathafenne haathan medhettidayssa erishe kaddoosona .
61003006	He wode de7iya sa7ay haathan mitettidi dhays .
61003007	Shin ha77i de7iya saloynne sa7ay , geellati pirddettiya gallasaynne dhayaa gallasay gakkanaw he qaalan tamas naagettidi de7oosona .
61003008	Shin ta siiqo ishato , ha issibaa dogoppite . Godaa matan issi gallasi mukulu laytha mela gideyssanne mukulu laythi issi gallasa mela gideyssa dogoppite .
61003009	Issoti issoti gam77is gidi qoppeyssada , Goday ba ufayssa qaala gisho gam77enna . Shin oonikka dhayonna mela koyidi , ubbay bantta nagaraappe simmana mela hintte gisho gidi genccees .
61003010	Shin Godaa gallasay kaysoda yaana . He gallasan saloti wolqqaama guunthan dhayana ; salo medhetethati taman xuugettana ; sa7aynne iya bolla de7iya ubbay dhayana .
61003011	Hiza , ubbabay hessada hanida dhayaabaa gidikko hintte ay mela asi gidanaw bessii ? Hintte geeshshinne Xoossaa daaniya de7o daanaw bessees .
61003012	Hintte sinthara yaa Xoossaa gallasaa naagishe hinttew dandda7ettiyaba ubbaa oothidi he gallasaa eesoyite . He gallas salotinne iyan de7iyabay taman xuugettana ; wolqqaama suulan til77ana .
61003013	Shin nuuni xillotethi haariya ooratha salonne ooratha sa7a Xoossaa ufayssa qaalada naagoos .
61003014	Hessa gisho , ta siiqo ishato , nu he gallasaa naagiya gisho pokkoynne borey baynnayssata gididi , Godaara saron daanaw minnite .
61003015	Asi ubbay attana mela koyidi Goday dandda7eyssa dogoppite . Qassi nu siiqo ishay , Phawuloosi , Xoossay iyaw immida cinccatethan hessada hinttew xaafis .
61003016	I ba dabddaabbeta ubban hessatabaa xaafis . Iya dabddaabbeta giddon akeekanaw waaysiya qofati de7oosona . Tamaariboonnanne minniboonna asati hara Xoossaa qaala mirqeyssada ha kiitatakka dhayanaw machchidi mirqoosona .
61003017	Hessa gisho , ta siiqo ishato , hintte hessa eriya gisho makkalata balan cimettidi , dhayonna melanne minnidi de7iya bessaafe kunddonna mela naagettite .
61003018	Shin hintte nuna ashshiya nu Godaa , Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethaaninne eratethan diccite . Iyaw ha77ika merinawukka bonchchoy gido . Amin77i .
62001001	Nuuni koyroppe doomidi de7iya , nu haythan si7ida , nu xeellida , ayfiyaan be7ida , nu kushiyan bochchida de7o qaalabaa hinttew xaafoos .
62001002	He de7oy qonccin , nuuni iya be7idi , iyabaa markkattoos . Aawa matan de7iya nuus qonccida , merinaa de7uwabaa hinttew awaajjos .
62001003	Nuura hinttew issifetethi daana mela nuuni be7idayssanne si7idayssa hinttew odoos . Hinttew nuura issifetethi de7iya gisho Aawaranne iya Na7aa Yesuus Kiristtoosara issifetethi de7ees .
62001004	Nu ufayssay polo gidana mela hessa hinttew xaafoos .
62001005	Nuuni de7o gidida iyappe si7idi , hinttew odiya kiitay hayssa : “ Xoossay poo7o ; iyan dhumi baawa ” yaageyssa .
62001006	Nuus iyara issifetethi de7ees yaagishe dhuman de7ikko , nu odaaninne nu oosuwan worddotoos .
62001007	Shin poo7on I de7eyssada , nukka poo7on de7ikko , nuus woli giddon issifetethi de7ees . Iya Na7aa , Yesuusa suuthay nagara ubbaafe nuna geeshshees .
62001008	Nuuni , nunan nagari baawa giikko nu nuna cimmoos ; nunan tumi baawa .
62001009	Shin Xoossaas nu nagara paaxikko , I nu nagara atto gaanawunne nu qoho ooso ubbaafe nuna geeshshanaw , ammanettidayssanne tumaa .
62001010	Nuuni nagara oothibookko giikko Xoossaa worddanchcho kessoos ; iya qaalaykka nunan deenna .
62002001	Ta nayto , nagara hintte oothonna mela taani hayssa hinttew xaafays . Shin oonikka nagara oothiko Aawa matan nuus gaannatiya Xilloy , Yesuus Kiristtoosi , de7ees .
62002002	Nu nagaray Kiristtoosa baggara atto geetettees . I nu nagaraa xalaalas gidonnashin asa ubbaa nagaraas yarshshettis .
62002003	Nuuni Xoossaa kiitaa naagikko , sidhey baynnashin , tuma nu iya eroos .
62002004	Oonikka , “ Taani iya erays ” yaagishe , iya kiitaa naagonna ixxiko he uray worddanchcho ; tumatethi iyan baawa .
62002005	Shin iya qaalas nu kiitettiyabaa gidikko he uray Xoossaa siiqiya siiqoy polo gidees . Nuuni Xoossan de7eyssas hessi baw tuma markka .
62002006	Taani , “ Xoossan de7ays ” giya oonikka Kiristtoosi de7idayssada daanaw bessees .
62002007	Ta siiqo ishato , taani hinttew koyroppe de7iya gal77a kiitaa xaafaysippe attin ooratha kiita xaafikke . Ikka hintte si7ida he gal77a kiitaa .
62002008	Gidikkoka , Kiristtoosaninne hinttenan tuma gididi de7iya , ooratha kiitaa xaafays . Dhumay kichchin , ha77i tuma poo7oy poo7ees .
62002009	“ Poo7on de7ays ” gishe ba ishaa ixxiya oonikka , ha77ika dhuman de7ees .
62002010	Ba ishaa dosiya oonikka poo7on de7ees . He uran hara asi dhubbiyabay baawa .
62002011	Shin ba ishaa ixxiya oonikka dhuman de7ees ; dhuman hamuttees . Dhumay iya ayfiyaa qooqisida gisho aw biyakko erenna .
62002012	Ta nayto , Kiristtoosa sunthaa baggara hintte nagaray atto geetettida gisho taani hinttew xaafays .
62002013	Aawato , koyroppe de7iya , iya hintte erida gisho hinttew xaafays . Yalagato , Xalahiya hintte xoonida gisho hinttew xaafays .
62002014	Guutha nayto , Xoossaa hintte erida gisho hinttew xaafays . Aawato , koyroppe de7iya iya hintte erida gisho hinttew xaafays . Yalagato , hintte mino gidiya gisho Xoossaa qaalay hinttenan de7iya gishonne Xalahiya hintte xoonida gisho hinttew xaafays .
62002015	Alame woykko alamen de7iyabaa dosoppite . Alamiya dosiya oonikka Xoossaa dosenna .
62002016	Alamen de7iya ubbabay , asho amotethi , ayfen be7idi amottiyabaynne miishen ceeqetethi alamebaappe attin Xoossaafe gidenna .
62002017	Alameynne alamen asi amottiya ubbay aadhdhana , shin Xoossaa sheniya poliya oonikka merinaw daana .
62002018	Ta nayto , wodiya wurssethay matattis . Kiristtoosa morkkey sinthafe yaanayssa hintte si7idayssada hari attoshin , ha77ika iya morkketi daroti denddidosona . Hessa gisho , wodiya wurssethay matattidayssa nuuni hessan eroos .
62002019	He morkketi nu bagga gidonna gisho nu giddofe keyidosona . Entti nu bagga gidiyakko nu giddon de7ana , shin enttafe oonikka nu bagga gidonnayssi erettana mela nu giddofe keyidosona .
62002020	Shin Kiristtoosi hintte bolla Geeshsha Ayyaana gussis ; qassi hintte ubbay tumaa ereeta .
62002021	Tumaa hintte eriya gishonne tuman aybi worddoy baynnayssa hintte eriya gisho taani hinttew xaafaysippe attin tumaa hintte eronna gisho gidenna .
62002022	Yesuusi , Xoossay dooridayssa gidenna gidi kaddiya asappe hari worddanchchoy oonee ? Hessa mela asi Kiristtoosa morkke . I na7aa kaddiko Aawakka kaddees .
62002023	Na7aa kaddiya ooddeskka Aaway baawa ; qassi Na7aas markkattiya ooddeskka Aaway de7ees .
62002024	Hessa gisho , koyro hintte si7ida qaala hintte wozanan minthidi naagite . Koyro si7idayssa hintte naagikko hinttew Na7aaranne Aawara issifetethi daana .
62002025	Na7ay nuus merinaa de7uwa immana gidi qaala gelis .
62002026	Hinttena balethiya asaa gisho taani hayssa hinttew xaafas .
62002027	Shin Kiristtoosi hintte bolla ba Geeshsha Ayyaana gussis . Geeshsha Ayyaanay hinttenan de7iya gisho oonikka hinttena tamaarsso koshshenna . Iya Geeshsha Ayyaanay hinttena tumaa tamaarsseesippe attin worddo gidenna . Geeshsha Ayyaanay hinttena tamaarssidayssada Kiristtoosan de7ite .
62002028	Hiza , ta nayto , I qoncciya wode nuuni yashshi baynnanne iya yuussaa gallas iya sinthan nu yeellan qosettona mela iyan de7ite .
62002029	Kiristtoosi xillo gideyssa hintte erikko xillo oothiya ubbay Xoossaa na7a gideyssa erite .
62003001	Nuuni Xoossaa nayta geetettidi xeegettana mela Xoossay nuna ay mela dosidaakko be7ite . Nuuni tumakka Xoossaa nayta . Ha alamey Xoossaa eronna gisho nunakka erenna .
62003002	Ta siiqo ishato , ha77i nuuni Xoossaa nayta ; nuuni ay hananeekko buroo erettibeenna . Shin Kiristtoosi qoncciya wode nuuni iya daananayssa eroos . I tuma de7eyssa nuuni be7ana .
62003003	Kiristtoosa be7ana gidi ufayssan naagiya oonikka , Kiristtoosi geeshshi gididayssada bana geeshshees .
62003004	Nagari higge mentho gidiya gisho nagara oothiya ubbay Xoossaa higge menthees .
62003005	Kiristtoosi asaa nagara dhayssanaw qonccidayssa hintte ereeta ; iyan nagari baawa .
62003006	Kiristtoosan de7iya oonikka nagaran deenna . Qassi nagaran de7iya oonikka iya be7ibeenna woykko eribeenna .
62003007	Ta nayto , hinttena oonikka balethofo . Kiristtoosi xillo gididayssada xillo oothiya oonikka xillo .
62003008	Xalahey koyroppe nagara oothida gisho nagara ubba wode oothiya oonikka Xalahe dabbo . Hessa gisho , Xoossaa Na7ay Xalahe ooso dhayssanaw qonccis .
62003009	Xoossaa na7a gidiya oonikka Xoossaa Ayyaanay iyan de7iya gisho I ubba wode nagaran deenna . Xoossay iya Aawa gidiya gisho nagaran deenna .
62003010	Xoossaa nayta giddoninne Xalahe nayta giddon de7iya dummatethay hessan erettees ; xillo oothonna asi woykko ba ishaa dosonna asi Xoossaa Na7a gidenna .
62003011	Koyroppe hintte si7ida kiitay , “ Issoy issuwa dosanaw bessees ” yaagiya kiitaa .
62003012	Nuuni Qaa7ela mela gidanaw bessenna . Qaa7eli Xalahe dabbo gididi ba ishaa wodhis . I ba ishaa ays wodhide ? Iya oosoy iita gidida gishonne iya ishaa oosoy lo77o gidida gisho wodhis .
62003013	Ta ishato , ha alamiya asay hinttena ixxiko malaalettofite .
62003014	Nuuni nu ishata siiqiya gisho hayqoppe de7o pinnidayssa eroos . Ba ishaa dosonna oonikka hayqo kuyan de7ees .
62003015	Ba ishaa ixxiya oonikka shemppo wodhees . Qassi shemppo wodhiya ooddeskka merinaa de7oy baynnayssa hintte ereeta .
62003016	Kiristtoosi ba shemppuwa nu gisho aathi immidayssan siiqoy aybeekko nuuni erida . Nukka nu ishata gisho nu shemppuwa aathidi immanaw bessees .
62003017	Shin dure gidida oonikka metootanchchuwa be7ishe , iyaw qadhettonna ixxiko ba wozanan Xoossaa siiqoy de7ees gaanaw waanidi dandda7ii ?
62003018	Ta nayto , nuuni oosoninne tumatethan nu siiquwa qonccisanaw besseesppe attin coo oda xalaalan woykko doona xalaalan siiqettanaw bessenna .
62003019	Nuuni issoy issuwa siiqikko , nu tumaa bagga gideyssa eroos ; hessas Xoossaa sinthan yeellatokko .
62003020	Nu wozanay nu bolla pirddiyabaa gidikko , Xoossay nu wozanaappe gita gideyssa eroos ; I ubbabaa erees .
62003021	Ta siiqo ishato , nu wozanay nu bolla pirddonnabaa gidikko nuuni Xoossaa sinthan yayyoko .
62003022	Nuuni iya kiitaa naagiya gishonne iya ufayssiyabaa oothiya gisho woossiya ubbaa iyappe ekkoos .
62003023	Kiristtoosi nuna kiittidayssada Xoossaa Na7aa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunthan ammananaadanne issoy issuwa siiqanaada Xoossay nuna kiittis .
62003024	Xoossaa kiitaa naagiya oonikka Xoossan de7ees ; Xoossaykka iyan de7ees . Xoossay nuus immida Geeshsha Ayyaana baggara I nunan de7eyssa eroos .
62004001	Ta siiqo ishato , ayyaanata ubbaa ammanoppite , shin entti Xoossafe yidaakko paaci be7ite . Ays giikko , daro worddo nabeti alamen denddidosona .
62004002	Xoossaa Ayyaana gideyssa hintte hayssan erana ; “ Yesuus Kiristtoosi ase gididi yidayssa markkattays ” giya ayyaana ubbay Xoossaafe yees .
62004003	Kiristtoosi ase gididi yidayssa ammanays goonna ayyaana ubbay Xoossaafe gidenna . Hessi Kiristtoosa ixxiya ayyaana . Hintte he ayyaanay yaanayssa kase si7ideta ; I hari attoshin ha77ika alamen de7ees .
62004004	Ta nayto , hintte Xoossassa . Hintte giddon de7iya Geeshsha Ayyaanay alamen de7iya ayyaanaappe daro wolqqaama gidiya gisho worddanchcho nabeta hintte xoonideta .
62004005	Entti ha alamiya ase gidiya gisho ha alamiyabaa odoosona ; ha alamiya asay entta odaa si7oosona .
62004006	Nuuni Xoossaafe yelettida ; Xoossaa eriya oonikka nuna si7ees . Xoossaa eronna oonikka nuna si7enna . Nuuni tuma ayyaananne worddo ayyaanaa hessan shaakkos .
62004007	Ta siiqo ishato , siiqoy Xoossafe yaa gisho ane issoy issuwara siiqettoos . Siiqiya oonikka Xoossaa na7a ; I Xoossaa erees .
62004008	Xoossay siiqo gidiya gisho siiqonna oonikka Xoossaa erenna .
62004009	Nuuni Kiristtoosa baggara de7uwa demmana mela Xoossay ba issi Na7aa ha alamiya kiittis . Xoossay nuna ba siiquwa hessan bessis .
62004010	Tuma siiqo guussay hayssa : nuuni Xoossaa siiqida gisho gidonnashin Xoossay nuna siiqida gishonne nu nagaraappe nuna maaranaw ba Na7aa kiittida gishossa .
62004011	Ta siiqo ishato , Xoossay nuna hayssada siiqikko , nukka issoy issuwa siiqanaw bessees .
62004012	Xoossaa be7iday oonikka baawa . Nuuni issoy issuwa siiqikko Xoossay nunan de7ees ; iya siiqoykka nunan polo gidees .
62004013	Xoossay ba Geeshsha Ayyaana nuus immida gisho nuuni Xoossan de7eyssanne ikka nunan de7eyssa eroos .
62004014	Aaway ba Na7aa , ha alamiya ashsheyssa gidana mela kiittidayssa nuuni be7idi markkattoos .
62004015	Yesuusi Xoossaa Na7aa gideyssa markkattiya ooddenkka Xoossay de7ees ; ikka Xoossan de7ees .
62004016	Xoossay nuna siiqeyssa nuuni eroosinne ammanoos . Xoossay siiqo . Siiqon de7iya oonikka Xoossan de7ees ; Xoossaykka iyan de7ees .
62004017	Nu de7oy ha alamiyan Kiristtoosi de7idayssa mela gidiya gisho pirdda gallas yayyonna iya sinthe shiiqanaw iya siiqoy nunan polo gidees .
62004018	Siiqon yashshi baawa , tuma siiqoy yashshi kessi holees . Yashshinne pirddi issife biya gisho yayyaa uraa siiqoy polo gidenna .
62004019	Xoossay koyro nuna siiqida gisho nu siiqoos .
62004020	Oonikka , “ Xoossaa siiqays ” gishe ba ishaa ixxiko , I worddanchcho . Ays giikko , be7iya ba ishaa siiqonna oonikka be7iboonna Xoossaa siiqanaw waanidi dandda7ii ?
62004021	Kiristtoosi nuus immida kiitay hayssa ; “ Xoossaa siiqiya oonikka ba ishaa siiqanaw bessees ” yaageyssa .
62005001	Yesuusa , I Kiristtoosa yaagidi , ammaniyaa oonikka Xoossaa na7a . Aawa siiqiya oonikka iya Na7aakka siiqees .
62005002	Nuuni Xoossaa siiqiya gishonne iya kiitaa naagiya gisho Xoossaa nayta siiqeyssa eroos .
62005003	Nuuni Xoossaa siiqikko , iya kiitata naagoos . Iya kiitati deexo gidokkona .
62005004	Ays giikko , Xoossaa na7a gidiya oonikka ha alamiya xoonanaw dandda7ees . Nuuni ha alamiya xoonanay nu ammanuwana .
62005005	Alamiya xoonanaw dandda7ey oonee ? Yesuusi Xoossaa Na7aa gideyssa ammaniyaa asa xalaali xoonana .
62005006	Yesuus Kiristtoosi haatha xinqqatiyaranne ba hayquawa suuthara yis . I , haatharanne suuthara yisippe attin haatha xalaalara yibeenna . Geeshsha Ayyaanay tuma gidiya gisho hessi tuma gideyssa markkattees .
62005007	Heedzu markkati de7oosona .
62005008	Hessati , Geeshsha Ayyaana , haathaanne suuthaa . Ha heedzata markkatethay issino .
62005009	Nu asi markkatteyssa ammanoos . Shin Xoossaa markkatethay asayssafe daro aadhdhees . Xoossay ba Na7aas markkattida markkatethay hayssa .
62005010	Xoossaa Na7aa ammaniyaa uraa wozanan ha markkatethay de7ees . Xoossaa ammanonna oonikka Xoossay ba Na7aas markkattida markkatethaa ammaniboonna gisho Xoossaa worddanchcho oothees .
62005011	Hiza , markkatethay hayssa ; Xoossay nuus merinaa de7o immis ; he de7oykka iya Na7an de7ees yaageyssa .
62005012	Xoossaa Na7ay de7iya ooddeskka de7oy de7ees . Xoossaa Na7ay baynna ooddeskka de7oy baawa .
62005013	Xoossaa Na7an ammaniyaa hinttew merinaa de7oy de7eyssa hintte erana mela hayssa hinttew xaafas .
62005014	Xoossaa sheniyada aybibaakka iya woossiko , I si7eyssa nuuni eriya gisho iyan ammanettos .
62005015	Nuuni woossiya ubbaa I si7eyssa erikko , nuuni woossiyabaa I immanayssa eroos .
62005016	Oonikka ba ishay hayqo bessonna nagara oothishin be7ikko , Xoossaa iyaw woossanaw bessees . Hayqo bessonna nagara oothidayssatas Xoossay de7o immana . Hayqo bessiya nagari de7ees . Taani hinttena hessas Xoossaa woossite giikke .
62005017	Iita ooso ubbay nagara , shin hayqo bessonna nagari de7ees .
62005018	Xoossaa Na7ay iya naagiya gisho Xoossaa na7a gidida oonikka nagaran ubba wode de7onnayssa nuuni eroos . Xalahey iya qohanaw dandda7enna .
62005019	Nuuni Xoossassa gideyssanne ha kumetha alamey Xalahen haaretteyssa eroos .
62005020	Nuuni tuma Xoossaa eranaada Xoossaa Na7ay yidayssanne nuus akeeka immidayssa eroos . Nuuni iya na7a , Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara tuma Xoossan de7oos . Yesuusi tuma Xoossaanne merinaa de7uwa .
62005021	Ta nayto , eeqatappe hintte haakkite .
63001001	Ta cimay doorettida godattesinne I naytas kiittida kiita . Ta xalaala gidonnashin tumaa eriya ubbay hinttena dosoosona .
63001002	Ha tumay nunan de7iya gishonne merinaw nuura daana gisho taani hinttena tuma dosays .
63001003	Xoossaa nu Aawanne iya Na7aa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethay , maarotethaynne sarotethay tumanine siiqon issife nuura gido .
63001004	Aaway nuna kiittidayssada , ne naytappe baggati , tumaas kiitetteyssa be7ada taani daro ufayttas .
63001005	Godattee , ha77ika nuuni ubbay issoy issuwa siiqana mela taani nena woossays . Ha kiitay koyroppe nuura de7iya kiitaappe attin taani new ooratha kiita xaafikke .
63001006	Tuma siiqoy nuuni Xoossaa kiitaa naagidi daanayssa . Qassi koyroppe hintte si7idayssada iya kiitay , hintte ubbay siiqon daana melassa .
63001007	Yesuus Kiristtoosi ase gididi yidayssa ammanonna , daro balethiya asati , alamen denddidosona . Hessa mela asi oonikka baletheyssanne Kiristtoosa morkke .
63001008	Hintte oothida kumetha woytuwa ekkanaw minnite . Hintte oothidayssi dhayonna mela naagettite .
63001009	Kiristtoosa timirttiyan doonnayssasinne iyappe haakkiya uraas Xoossay baawa . Kiristtoosa timirttiyan de7iya uraas Aawaynne Na7ay de7oosona .
63001010	Oonikka hintteko yishe ha timirttiya ehonna ixxiko , hintte soo gelssofite ; sarokka gooppite .
63001011	Iya saro giya oonikka iya iita oosuwan iyara shaakettees .
63001012	Taani hinttew xaafanaw koyida darobay de7ees , shin worqqateninne qalamen xaafanaw koyikke . Nu ufayssay polettana mela hinttera som77on gahettada odettanaw hintteko baana gada qoppays .
63001013	Xoossay doorida ne michche nayti nena saro yaagosona .
64001001	Taani cimay , tumaa dosiya Gaayoosas kiittida kiita .
64001002	Ta siiquwaw , neeni ne shemppuwan lo77o de7eyssa ta ereyssada new payyatethi daana melanne ne oothiyabay suurana mela new Xoossaa woossays .
64001003	Guutha ammaniyaa asati yidi , ubba wode neeni tuman de7eyssanne ne tumatethabaa markkattida wode taani daro ufayttas .
64001004	Ta nayti tumatethan de7eyssa si7eyssafe aadhdhidi , tana ufayssiyabay baawa .
64001005	Ta siiquwaw , entti new imathe gidikkoka , neeni ammaniyaa asatas ammanthiya ooso oothaasa .
64001006	Entti ne siiquwabaa woosa keethan markkattoosona . Ha77ika entti biya ogiyan Xoossay doseyssada oothada entta maaddiko lo77o oothaasa .
64001007	Entti Kiristtoosa sunthaa gisho keyishe , ammanonna asatappe aykkoka ekkibookkonna .
64001008	Nuuni tuma oosuwa enttara issife oothanaw hayssa mela asata maaddanaw bessees .
64001009	Taani woosa keethatas dabddaabbe xaafas , shin entta halaqaa gidanaw koyaa Diyotirafiisi nuuni geyssa ekkenna .
64001010	Hessa gisho , taani yaa biya wode I nu bolla odettiya iita odanne I oothida oosuwa odana . I hessi guuxis gidi , nu ishati yaa wode mokkenna . Hari attoshin , entta mokkanaw koyeyssatakka diggidi woosa keethafe kessees .
64001011	Ta siiquwaw , lo77obaa daanappe attin iitabaa daanoppa . Lo77obaa oothiya oonikka Xoossaa asi , shin iitabaa oothiya oonikka Xoossaa be7ibeenna .
64001012	Dimexiroosi lo77o asi gideyssa asa ubbay markkattees . Tumay ba huu7en iyabaa markkattees ; nukka iyabaa markkattoos ; nu markkatethay tuma gideyssa hintte ereeta .
64001013	Taani new xaafanaw koyida darobay de7ees , shin qalameninne worqqaten xaafanaw koyikke .
64001014	Shin taani matara neera gahettanaw qoppays ; he wode nuuni odettana .
64001015	Saroy new gido . Ne dabboti nena saro yaagosona . Nu dabbota ubbaa entta sunthaa sunthaa xeegada tana “ Saro gis ” yaaga .
65001001	Taani Yihudi , Yesuus Kiristtoosa aylley , Yayqooba ishay ; Xoossay xeegidayssatas , Xoossaa Aaway doseyssatasinne Yesuus Kiristtoosan naagettidayssatas ha dabddaabbiya xaafays .
65001002	Maarotethi , sarotethinne siiqoy hinttew kumo .
65001003	Ta siiqo ishato , nuuni issife shaakettiya atotethaabaa hinttew xaafanaw taani daro amottas . Shin ammaniyaa asaas issi tohonne wurssethi gakkanaw imettida ammanuwas olettana mela hinttena zorashe xaafanayssi taw koshshiyabaa gidis .
65001004	Entta pirdday benippe xaafettidi uttida , issi issi asati oonikka eronna hintte giddo gelidosona . Entti Xoossaa eronnayssata , entti nu Xoossaa aadho keehatethaa laymatanaw go7ettiya oge oothidi ekkoosona . Ba xalaala kawo gidida , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa kaddoosona .
65001005	Shin hintte ha ubbaa eriyabaa gidikkoka , Goday Isra7eele asaa Gibxxe biittaafe waati kessidaakko , qassi guyeppe ammanonnayssata dhayssidayssa ta hinttena akeekisanaw koyays .
65001006	Bantta de7iyasuwa aggidi , banttaw imettida maata naagiboonna kiitanchchota , gita pirdda gallasay gakkanaw Xoossay entta dhumaappe garssan merinaa santhalaatan qachchi wothis .
65001007	Hessada , Soodomenne Gamoora asaynne entta matan de7iya katamatan de7iya asay laymatidosona ; laymatethara gahettiya tunatethaa oothidosona . Entti merinaa taman waayettanayssatas leemiso gididosona .
65001008	Hessadakka , ha amuhanchchoti bantta asatethaa tunisoosona ; maata aawata kadhoosona ; salo medhetethata cayoosona .
65001009	Shin kiitanchchota halaqay Mika7eeley Muse ahaas Xalahera palamida wode “ Goday nena seero ” yaagisippe attin iya bolla cashsha qaala odidi mootanaw koyibeenna .
65001010	Shin ha asati banttaw eronnabaa ubbaa cayoosona ; qassi entti wozani baynna meheda medhon eriya eray , I enttana dhayssana .
65001011	Enttana ayye ! Entti Qaa7ela ogiyan bidosona . Miishe koyidi Balaama balan kunddidosona . Qorey Xoossaa bolla denddidayssada entti Xoossaa bolla denddidi dhayidosona .
65001012	Ha asati , hintte siiqo gibira miya bessan hinttera uttiya wode yeelli baynna kawushshata . Entti banttana xalaala heemmeyssata . Entti carkkoy efiya iri baynna shaara mela . Qassi ayfe woden ayfe ayfonna , xaphora shodettid , nam77u toho melida mitha mela .
65001013	Entti hanqettida abbaa zuliya mela bantta pokkuwa goppontteyssata . Entti merinaw sakkana dhumay naagiya toylattiya xoolinttota .
65001014	Addaameppe doomidi , laappuntha yeleta gidida Heenokey , ha asatabaa tinbbite odishe , “ Hekko , Goday , ba daro mukulu geeshshatara yaana .
65001015	Asa ubbaa pirddana ; geellata ubbaa entti oothida iita ooso ubbaa gishonne makkalatethan entti Xoossaa bolla odettida iita odaa ubbaa gisho pirddana ” yaagis .
65001016	He asati ubba wode zuuzummeyssatanne oda koyeyssata . Qassi bantta iita amuwaa kaalloosona ; banttanan ceeqqosonanne banttana go77iyabaa demmanaw harata sabboosona .
65001017	Shin ta ishato , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa hawaareti kase hinttew odida qaala akeekite .
65001018	Entti , “ Wurssetha wodiyan , bantta amuwaa kaallidi toochcheyssati yaana ” yaagidosona .
65001019	He asati asaa giddon shaahotethi medhdheyssata , bantta asho amuwaas haaretteyssatanne Geeshsha Ayyaanay baynnayssata .
65001020	Shin ta ishato , geeshshi gidida hintte ammanuwan hinttena dichchanaw minnite ; qassi Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqqan woossite .
65001021	Hinttena merinaa de7uwakko gathiya nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa maarotethaa naagishe hinttena Xoossaa siiquwan naagite .
65001022	Sidhey de7iya asaas qadhettite .
65001023	Issi issi asata tamappe kessi ekkite . Qassi iita amon tunida entta ma7uwa ixxishe haratas yashshan qadhettite .
65001024	Hintte kunddonna mela naaganaw borey baynnayssatanne gita ufayssan kumidayssata oothidi ba bonchchuwa sinthan hinttena shiishanaw dandda7iya ,
65001025	nuna ashshiya issi Xoossaas , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggara bonchchoy , gitatethi , wolqqinne maati , kasekka , ha77ika , merinawukka iyaw gido . Amin77i .
66001001	Eeson hananaw de7iyabaa ba aylleta bessana mela Xoossay iyaw immida Yesuus Kiristtoosa qonccethay hayssa . Yesuusi ba kiitanchchuwa kiittidi , ba aylliya Yohaannisas qonccisis .
66001002	Yohaannisi Xoossaa kiitaa , Yesuus Kiristtoosi oothidabaanne odidabaa ubbaa markkattis .
66001003	Ha ubbay hananaw wodey matida gisho ha tinbbite qaala nabbabiya oonikka anjjettidayssa ; qassi ha qaala si7eyssatinne xaafettida kiitaa naagiya ubbay anjjettidayssata .
66001004	Ha dabddaabbey , Yohaannisappe , Iisiya biittan de7iya laappun woosa keethatas xaafettis . Kasekka , ha77ika de7iya , sinthafekka yaanaw de7iya Xoossaafe , qassi iya araata sinthan de7iya laappun ayyaanatappe , hessadakka , hayqoppe denddon koyro gididayssafe , sa7aa kawota haariya ammanettiya markka gidida Yesuus Kiristtoosappe , aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hinttew gido . Yesuusi nuna siiqees , qassi ba suuthan nagara aylletethaafe nuna la77a kessis .
66001005	
66001006	Nuuni Xoossaa iya Aawas oothana mela nuna kawotethaa kahine oothis . Iyaw merinaappe merinaa gakkanaw bonchchoynne wolqqay gido . Amin77i .
66001007	Hekko , Yesuusi shaarara yees . Asa ubbay hari attoshin , iya caddida asaykka iya be7ana . Sa7an de7iya asa ubbay iya gisho yeekkana . Hessi tuma hanana ! Amin77i .
66001008	“ Kasekka , ha77ika de7eyssi , sinthafekka yaana Goday , Ubbaafe Wolqqaama Xoossay , Alfanne Oomegi tana ” yaagees Godaa Xoossay .
66001009	Taani , Yohaannisi , hintte ishay , hinttera issife Yesuusan waaya , iya kawotethaanne iya dandda7aa be7as . Taani Xoossaa qaalaa gishonne Yesuusabaa markkattida gisho Paximo giya haathan teqettida biittan de7ays .
66001010	Godaa gallasan ta Geeshsha Ayyaanan haarettada de7ays ; taappe guyera moyze puno mela gita girssi si7as .
66001011	He girssay tana , “ Ne be7eyssa maxaafan xaafada , Iisiyan de7iya laappun woosa keethatas , Efesoona , Samirnneesa , Pherggamoona , Tiyatiroona , Sarddeesa , Filaadelfiyanne Loodoqiya yedda ” yaagis .
66001012	Taani taw odiya girssaa be7anaw guye simmada xomppe wothiya laappun worqqa kocata be7as .
66001013	He kocata giddon asa na7a daaneyssa be7as . I adussa afila ba tohuwa gathi ma77is , worqqa danccon ba tiraa danccis .
66001014	Iya huu7eynne iya binaanay bootha dorssa ikise mela woykko shachcha mela boothi ; iya ayfey tama laco daanees .
66001015	Iya tohoy taman seeridi zo77ida naase biraata daanees ; iya girssaykka gita shaafa kooshinchcha mela .
66001016	I ba ushachcha kushen laappun xoolinttota oykkis . Iya doonappe nam77u baggara qarattida mashshi keyees . Iya som77oy seeta gallasa awa ayfe daanees .
66001017	Taani iya be7ida wode hayqqida asada hanada iya tohuwa matan kunddas . I ba ushachcha kushiya ta bolla wothidi , “ Yayyofa ; Koyroy Wurssethay tana .
66001018	Taani de7on de7ays ; taani hayqqas , shin hekko meri merinawukka de7on de7ays . Hayqonne Si7oole qulppey ta kushena .
66001019	Hiza , ha77i haniyabanne sinthafe hananabaa ne be7idabaa xaafa .
