66001020	Neeni ta ushachcha kushen be7ida laappun xoolinttotanne laappun worqqa kocata birshshethay hayssa : Laappun xoolinttoti laappun woosa keethata kiitanchchota ; laappun worqqa kocati laappun woosa keethata . ”
66002001	“ Efesoona woosa keetha kiitanchchuwas hayssada yaagada xaafa .
66002002	Taani ne oosuwa , ne daaburanne ne genccaa erays . Neeni iita asatabaa genccanaw dandda7aboonnayssa erays . Qassi hawaare gidonnashin banttana , hawaare geyssata pilgga erada entti worddanchcho gideyssa demmidayssa ta erays .
66002003	Neeni genccadasa ; ta sunthaa gisho meto dandda7adasa ; xoonettabaakka .
66002004	Gidoshin , ha77i ta nena boriyabay de7ees ; hessika neeni kase ne siiquwa aggadasa .
66002005	Hiza , ne ay mela dhoqqa bessafe kunddidaako akeeka ! Ne nagaraappe simma ; neeni kase oothiya oosuwa ootha . Neeni ne nagaraappe simmona ixxiko , ne xomppe wothiya kocaa iya bessaafe ekkana .
66002006	Ha77i ta nena nashshiya issibay de7ees ; ta ixxiya Niqoolaweta oosuwa nekka ixxadasa .
66002007	Geeshsha Ayyaanay woosa keethatas giyabaa si7anaw haythi de7iya oonikka si7o . Xooniya oonikka Xoossaa gannatiyan de7iya de7o mithee ayfeppe maana mela maata immana .
66002008	“ Samirnneesa woosa keethaa kiitanchchuwas hayssada yaagada xaafa .
66002009	Taani ne waayanne ne manqotethaa erays ; gidoshin neeni dure . Ayhude gidonnashin banttana Ayhude geyssati cayaa cashshaa ta erays , shin entti Xalahe maabaran de7oosona .
66002010	Neeni ekkanaw de7iya waaya babbofa . Xalahey hinttefe issota issota paaccanaw qasho keethan yeggana ; tammu gallas gakkanaw hintte waayettana . Hayqqana gakkanaw ammanettidayssa gida ; ta new de7o kallachcha immana .
66002011	Geeshsha Ayyaanay woosa keethatas giyabaa si7anaw haythi de7iya oonikka si7o . Xooniya oonikka nam77antho hayquwan qohettenna .
66002012	“ Pherggamoona woosa keethaa kiitanchchuwas hayssada yaagada xaafa .
66002013	Taani ne de7iya bessaa erays ; neeni Xalahe araatay de7iya bessan de7aasa ; ta sunthaa mintha naagadasa . Hari attoshin , Xalahey de7iya hintte kataman hayqqida taw ammanettida markkay , Antiphaasi , de7iya wodekka ammanuwa aggabaakka .
66002014	Gidoshin , ta nena boriya guuthabati de7oosona . Hessika Isra7eele asay eeqas yarshshettida kathaa midi tunana melanne laymatetha nagara oothana mela Baalaqa tamaarssida Balaama timirttiya ekkida issi issi asati neera de7oosona .
66002015	Hessadakka , Niqoolaweta timirttiya tamaariya asati neera de7oosona .
66002016	Hessa gisho , neeni ne nagaraappe simma . Hessi hanonna ixxiko , ta neekko ellesa yada he asata ta doonappe keyaa mashshan olana .
66002017	Geeshsha Ayyaanay woosa keethatas giyabaa si7anaw haythi de7iya oonikka si7o . Xooniya ooddeskka qosettidi de7iya mannaafe immana . Qassi ekkiya uraappe attin hara asi eronna ooratha sunthay xaafettida bootha shuchchaa ta iyaw immana .
66002018	“ Tiyatiroona woosa keethaa kiitanchchuwas hayssada yaagada xaafa .
66002019	Taani ne oosuwa , ne siiquwa , ne ammanuwa , ne oosuwanne ne genccaa erays . Neeni koyro ootheyssafe ha77i aathada ootheyssaka erays .
66002020	Gidoshin , ta nena boriya issibay de7ees ; bana nabe giya maccasiw , Elzaabelo , aykkoka gabaakka . He maccasiya eeqas yarshshettida kathaa midi tunanaadanne laymatanaada oothada ta aylleta balethasu .
66002021	Iya ba nagaraappe simmana mela ta iw wode immas , shin iya simmanaw koyabuukku .
66002022	Entti I bala ogiyappe simmona ixxiko , ta iyo iita harggen yeggana ; iira laymateyssatikka iita waaye waayettana .
66002023	Taani I nayta wodhana ; qassi woosa keetha ubbay ta asa qofanne asa wozana ereyssa gideyssa erana . Ta issuwas issuwas hintte oosuwada oosuwada immana .
66002024	Shin Tiyatiroonan de7iya harata , he iita timirttiya ekkiboonnayssatanne , “ Xalahe gita xuura ” geetettiya ha timirttiya tamaariboonna hinttena hara deexo tooho toossike .
66002025	Gidoshin , ta yaana gakkanaw hinttew de7iyabaa minthi naagite .
66002026	Xooneyssasinne wurssethi gakkanaw taw kiitettiya ooddeskka kawotethata haarana mela maata immana .
66002027	‘ I entta biraata xam77an haarana ; meqqa miishedakka mentherethana . ’
66002028	Qassi ta iyaw bakkala xoolintto immana .
66002029	Geeshsha Ayyaanay woosa keethatas giyabaa si7iya haythi de7iya oonikka si7o .
66003001	“ Sarddeesa woosa keetha kiitanchchuwas hayssada yaagada xaafa .
66003002	Barkka ! Guutha attidabaanne hayqqanaw matidabaa mintha . Ne oosoy Xoossaa sinthan polo gidonnayssa demmas .
66003003	Hiza , ne ekkidabaanne si7idabaa akeeka ; naaga ; ne nagaraappe simma . Neeni barkkonna ixxiko ta kaysoda yaana ; ta ay wode yaanekko ne erakka .
66003004	Shin bantta ma7uwa qitayonna guutha asati Sarddeesan de7oosona . Enttaw bessiyabaa gidiya gisho bootha ma7o ma77idi taara hamuttana .
66003005	Xooniya oonikka enttayssada bootha ma7o ma77ana . Taani iya sunthaa de7o maxaafappe quchchike . Taani ta Aawa sinthaninne iya kiitanchchota sinthan I tabaa gideyssa markkattana .
66003006	Geeshsha Ayyaanay woosa keethatas giyabaa si7iya haythi de7iya oonikka si7o .
66003007	“ Filaadelfiya woosa keetha kiitanchchuwas hayssada yaagada xaafa .
66003008	Taani ne oosuwa eras ; hekko ta ne sinthan oonikka gorddanaw dandda7onna dooya pengge wothas . Ne wolqqay guutha gidikkoka , ta qaalaa naagadasa ; tana kaddabaakka .
66003009	Ayhude gidonnashin banttana Ayhude giya worddotanne Xalahe baggata neekko ehananne ne sinthan gulbbatisana . Ta nena doseyssa enttana erisana .
66003010	Neeni , ‘ Gencca ’ gada ta kiittida kiitaa naagida gisho kumetha alamiya paccanaw yaa waaye wodiyappe taani nena naagana .
66003011	Taani ellesada yaana ; oonikka ne kallachchaa ekkonna mela new de7iyabaa minthada oykka .
66003012	Xoonidayssa ta Xoossa Keethan tuussu oothana ; i yan merinaw daana . Taani ta Xoossaa sunthaanne ta Xoossaa katamaa sunthaa iya bolla xaafana ; iyakka ta Xoossaa matappe wodhdhiya ooratha Yerusalaame . Qassi ta ta ooratha sunthaaka i bolla xaafana .
66003013	Geeshsha Ayyaanay woosa keethatas giyabaa si7iya haythi de7iya oonikka si7o .
66003014	“ Loodoqiya woosa keetha kiitanchchuwas hayssada yaagada xaafa .
66003015	Taani ne oosuwa ubbaa erays ; neeni irxxa woykko misha gidakka ; neeni nam77aafe issuwa gidikko lo77o !
66003016	Neeni irxxa woykko misha gidonnashin bol77o gidiya gisho ta nena ta doonappe cuttana hanays .
66003017	Hiza , neeni , ‘ Taani dure , shallora de7ays , taw aybibaykka paccibeenna ’ yaagasa . Shin neeni metootanchcho , manqo , qooqenne kallotida asi gideyssa erakka .
66003018	Hessa gisho , ne duretanaw taman geeyida worqqaa , ne yeella kalluwa kammanaw bootha ma7onne loytha xeellanaw maaddiya ayfe dhale taappe shammana mela nena zorays .
66003019	Ta dooseyssa seeraysinne hanqays ; hiza minna ; ne nagaraappe simma .
66003020	Hekko , ta karen eqqada xeegays . Oonikka ta xeessaa si7idi , wulaa dooyikko , iyaakko gelana ; iyara issife kathi maana ; ikka taara issife maana .
66003021	Ta xoonada ta Aawara iya araatan uttidayssada xooniday taara ta araatan uttana mela maata immana .
66003022	Geeshsha Ayyaanay woosa keethatas giyabaa si7iya haythi de7ey oonikka si7o ” yaagis .
66004001	Hessafe guye , taani salo xeelliya wode dooyettida pengge be7as . Qassi ta kase si7ida moyze girssaa melay taakko , “ Ha keya ; hayssafe guye , hananaw de7iyabaa ta nena bessana ” yaagis .
66004002	He wode ta Ayyaanan haarettada de7ays . Hekko , saluwan araata bolla issoy uttidayssa be7as .
66004003	He uttidayssa malay iyasphedenne sarddiyoona giya al77o shuchchaa mela . Iya araata yuushuwan al77o shuchchi daaniya zuullay de7ees .
66004004	He araata yuushuwan laatamanne oyddu araatati de7oosona ; entta bolla bootha ma7o ma77idi , huu7en worqqa kallachchaa wothida laatamanne oyddu cimati uttidosona .
66004005	Araatappe wol77anthi , guunthinne deshoy keyees . Araata sinthan laappun poo7iya xomppeti de7oosona ; entti laappun Xoossaa ayyaanata .
66004006	Araata sinthan birille daaniya phooliya burccuko abbay de7ees . Sintharanne guyera ayfey de7iya oyddu de7ora de7iya medhetethati araata yuushuwaninne araata giddon de7oosona .
66004007	Koyro medhetethaa medhoy gaammo daanees ; nam77anthoy boori daanees ; heedzanthoy ase daanees ; qassi oyddanthoy piradhdhiya argganthi daanees .
66004008	Oyddu medhetethata ubbaas usuppun qefey de7ees ; entta asatetha ubbay ayfen kumis . Entti qammanne gallas qanxonna ,
66004009	He medhetethati araatan uttidayssasinne merinaw de7eyssas saba , bonchchonne galata immida wode
66004010	laatamanne oyddu cimati araatan uttidayssanne merinaw de7eyssa sinthan gufannidi goynnidosona ; bantta kallachchaa araata sinthan wothidi ,
66004011	“ Nu Godaw , nu Xoossaw , neeni bonchcho , sabanne wolqqaa ekkanaw bessaasa . Neeni ubbaa medhdhadasa ; ubbabay ne sheniyada hanis , medhettis ”
66005001	Hessafe guye , araata bolla uttidayssa ushachcha kushen giddoranne karera xaafettida laappun maatamen gorddettida xaatha maxaafaa be7as .
66005002	Issi mino kiitanchchoy ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Maatamiya billanawunne maxaafaa dooyanaw bessey oonee ? ” yaagidi awaajjishin be7as .
66005003	Shin salon gidin sa7an woykko sa7appe garssan gidin he xaatha maxaafaa billanawunne gidduwa be7anaw dandda7ey oonikka benttibeenna .
66005004	Xaatha maxaafaa billanawunne iya gidduwa be7anaw bessiya asi dhayida gisho ta daro yeekkas .
66005005	Yaatin , cimatappe issoy taakko , “ Yeekkofa ! Hekko , Yihuda zerethi gidiya gaammoy , Dawite sheeshay , laappun maatameta billanawunne maxaafaa dooyanaw dandda7is ” yaagis .
66005006	Hessafe guye , shukettida Dorssay araatas , oyddu de7on de7iya medhetethatasinne cimatas giddon , eqqidayssa be7as . Iyaw laappun kacetinne laappun ayfeti de7oosona . Hessati sa7a ubbaa kiitettida Xoossaa laappun ayyaanata .
66005007	He Dorssay bidi , araata bolla uttidayssa ushachcha kusheppe xaatha maxaafaa ekkis .
66005008	I he xaatha maxaafaa ekkida wode de7on de7iya oyddu medhetethatinne laatamanne oyddu cimati Dorssa sinthan kunddidosona . Entti issoy issoy diithinne geeshshata woosaa gidida ixaaney kumida worqqa shaate oykkidosona .
66005009	Entti , “ Xaatha maxaafaa ekkanaw , maatamiya billanaw new bessees . Ays giikko , neeni shukettadasa ; zerethi ubbaafe , dumma dumma doonappe , yaratappenne kawotethata ubbaafe ne suuthan Xoossaas wozadasa .
66005010	Entti iya Xoossaa Aawas oothana mela enttana kahine kawotethi oothadasa . Enttika biitta ubbaa haarana ”
66005011	Ta be7iya wode mukulu toho mukulunne tammu mukulu toho tammu mukulu gidiya kiitanchchota girssaa si7as . Enttika araataa , oyddu de7on de7iya medhetethatanne , cimata yuushuwan eqqidosona .
66005012	He kiitanchchoti dhoqqu gida qaalan , “ Shukettida Dorssay wolqqaa , duretethi , cinccatethinne minotethi , bonchcho , sabanne galataa ekkanaw bessees ”
66005013	Hessafe guye , sa7an , salon , sa7appe garssaninne abbaa giddon de7iya medhetethi ubbay , “ Araata bolla uttidayssasinne Dorssas , galatay , bonchchoy , sabaynne wolqqay meri merinaw gido ”
66005014	Oyddu de7on de7iya medhetethati , “ Amin77i ” yaagidosona ; qassi cimati gufannidi goynnidosona .
66006001	Dorssay laappun maatamiyappe issuwa dooyishin be7as . Qassi oyddu de7on de7iya medhetethatappe issoy , dada desho girssan , “ Haaya ! ” yaagishin si7as .
66006002	Hekko bootha paraa be7as . He paraa toggidasi dongge oykkis ; iya huu7en kallachchi de7ees . Ikka xoonishe xoonanaw keyis .
66006003	Qassi dorssay nam77antho maatamiya dooyida wode de7on de7iya nam77antho medhetethay , “ Haaya ! ” yaagishin si7as .
66006004	Qassi hara siha zo7o pari keyis . He paraa toggidayssas sa7appe saro dhayssana melanne asay woli wurssana mela maatinne gita mashshi imettis .
66006005	Dorssay heedzantho maatamiya dooyida wode de7on de7iya heedzantho medhetethay , “ Haaya ! ” yaagishin si7as . Hekko kareetha para be7as ; ikka ba kushen mizaane oykkis .
66006006	Oyddu de7on de7iya medhetethata giddofe , “ Issi gallasa oosos damooze , bagga kilo gistte ; qassi issi gallasa oosos damooze , issi kilonne bagga bangga gido . Shin zaytiyanne woyniya qohoppa ” yaagishin si7as .
66006007	Dorssay oyddantho maatamiya dooyida wode oyddantho de7on de7iya medhetethay , “ Haaya ! ” yaagishin si7as .
66006008	Hekko wancco para be7as . He paraa toggidayssa sunthay hayqo ; iya geedo Si7ooley kaallees . Enttaw alameppe oyddantho kushiya olan , koshan , gadoninne do7an wodhisana mela maati imettis .
66006009	Dorssay ichchashantho maatamiya dooyida wode entti Xoossaa qaala odida gishonne bantta markkatethan ammanettida gisho shukettida asaa shemppota yarshsho bessaafe garssan be7as .
66006010	Entti bantta qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Ubbaa haariya Godaw , geeshshaw , tumanchchuwaw , sa7an de7iya asaa bolla ne pirddanaynne nu suuthaa gisho halo keyanay awude ? ” yaagidosona .
66006011	Entta issuwas issuwas bootha ma7oy imettis . Enttayssada hanidi hayqqanaw bessiya entta laggeta tayboy kumana gakkanaw guutha wode shemppana mela enttaw odettis .
66006012	Dorssay usuppuntha maatamiya dooyida wode ta be7as ; wolqqaama biitta qaaxoy hanis . Awaa ayfey kaarexidi kalle daanis . Ageenaykka zo77idi suuthu daanis .
66006013	Wolqqaama carkkoy carkkidi balase mitha qawu7e ayfiyaa qoqqofeyssada saluwa xoolinttoti sa7an qoqqofettidosona .
66006014	Saloy xaatha maxaafada xaaxettidi aadhdhis ; zumaynne abban teqettida biittati bantta bessaafe dhayidosona .
66006015	Biitta kawoti , deriya haareyssati , olla kaaletheyssati , dureti , wolqqaamati , aylletinne , womaannoti gonggoloninne deriya bolla de7iya zaalla hom77on qosettidosona .
66006016	Enttika zumaakkonne zaallako , “ Nu bolla wodhdhite ; nuna qosite ; araatan uttidayssa ayfiyaappenne Dorssa hanquwafe nuna genthite .
66006017	Hiza , gita hanqo gallasay gakkis ; oone dandda7idi eqqanay ? ” yaagidosona .
66007001	Hessafe guye , oyddu kiitanchchoti oyddu sa7aa gaxan eqqidayssata be7as . He kiitanchchoti sa7a bolla woykko abbaa bolla woykko ay mitha bolla carkkoy oyddu sa7aa gaxappe carkkonna mela teqqidosona .
66007002	Qassi de7o Xoossaa maatamiya oykkida hara kiitanchchoy doloha baggafe keyeyssa be7as . He kiitanchchoy ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , sa7aanne abbaa qohanaw wolqqi imettida oyddu kiitanchchota ,
66007003	xeegidi , “ Nuuni Xoossaa aylleta som77on maatamiya wothana gakkanaw biittaa woykko abbaa woykko mithaa qohoppite ” yaagis .
66007004	Yaatin , taani Xoossaa maatamey som77on wosettidayssata payduwa si7as . Isra7eele mayzata ubbaafe xeetanne oytamanne oyddu mukulu asaas som77on maatame wothis .
66007005	Yihuda zerethaafe tammanne nam77u mukulu , Roobela zerethaafe tammanne nam77u mukulu , Gaade zerethaafe tammanne nam77u mukulu ,
66007006	Aseere zerethaafe tammanne nam77u mukulu , Niftaaleme zerethaafe tammanne nam77u mukulu , Minaase zerethaafe tammanne nam77u mukulu ,
66007007	Simoona zerethaafe tammanne nam77u mukulu ; Leewe zerethaafe tammanne nam77u mukulu , Yisaakore zerethaafe tammanne nam77u mukulu ,
66007008	Zaabiloone zerethaafe tammanne nam77u mukulu , Yoosefa zerethaafe tammanne nam77u mukulu , Biniyame zerethaafe tammanne nam77u mukulu ,
66007009	Hessafe guye , zerethi ubbaafe , kawotetha ubbaafe , yara ubbaafenne dumma dumma doonappe zawi baynna daro asaa be7as . He asay bootha ma7o ma77idi , zambba haythi bantta kushen oykkidi , araata sinthaninne Dorssa sinthan eqqidosona .
66007010	Entti bantta qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Atotethay araatan uttida nu Xoossaafenne Dorssaafe yees ” yaagidosona .
66007011	Kiitanchchoti ubbay , araataa , cimatanne oyddu medhetethata yuushuwan eqqidosona . Entti araata sinthan gufannidi Xoossaa goynnidosona .
66007012	“ Amin77i ! Anjjoy , bonchchoy , cinccatethay , galatay , sabay wolqqay , minotethay meri merinaw nu Xoossaas gido . Amin77i ! ”
66007013	Cimatappe issoy taakko , “ Ha bootha ma7uwa ma77ida asati oonantee ? Entti awuppe yidonaa ? ” yaagidi oychchis .
66007014	Taani zaarada , “ Godaw , ne eraasa ” yaagas . Ikka taakko , “ Hayssati daro waaye waayidi aadhdhidayssata . Entti bantta ma7uwa Dorssaa suuthan meeccidi geeshshidosona .
66007015	Hessa gisho , entti Xoossaa araata sinthan gididi qammanne gallas iya keethan oothoosona . Qassi araata bolla uttidayssi enttaw kuya gidana .
66007016	Hizappe guye , entti koshattokona , saamottokona . Awi woykko mishi entta meenna .
66007017	Araata giddon uttida Dorssay entta heemmana . De7o pultto haathako entta kaalethana . Xoossay entta ayfiyaappe afutha ubbaa quchchana ”
66008001	Dorssay laappuntha maatamiya dooyida wode bagga saate gideyssa mela saloy si77i gis .
66008002	Hessafe guye , taani laappun moyzeti imettida laappun kiitanchchota Xoossaa sinthan eqqidayssata be7as .
66008003	Ixaane cuyisiya worqqa shaate oykkida hara kiitanchchoy yidi , yarshsho bessaa matan eqqis . I araata sinthan de7iya worqqa yarshsho bessaa bolla geeshshata ubbaa woosaara gujjidi yarshshana mela iyaw daro ixaaney imettis .
66008004	Ixaaniya cuyay geeshshata woosaara issife kiitanchchuwa kusheppe pude Xoossaakko keyis .
66008005	Hessafe guye , kiitanchchoy ixaane cuyisiya shaatiya ekkidi , iyan yarshsho bessaafe bonqqo tama kunthidi sa7a duge holis . Yaatin deshoy , wol77anthi , girssinne biitta qaaxoy hanis .
66008006	Hessafe guye , laappun kiitanchchoti bantta moyziya punnanaw giigettidosona .
66008007	Koyro kiitanchchoy ba moyziya punniya wode shachchinne suuthara walakettida tami saloppe bukkis . Sa7aappe sikkoy xuugettis ; mithaafe sikkoy xuugettis ; cil77o maata ubbay xuugettis .
66008008	Nam77antho kiitanchchoy ba moyziya punnida wode wolqqaama dere daaniyabay taman eexishe abban yegettis . Yaatin , abbaafe sikkoy suuthu gidis .
66008009	Abban de7on de7iya medhetethaafe sikkoy hayqqis ; markkabetappe sikkoy dhays .
66008010	Heedzantho kiitanchchoy ba moyziya punnida wode xomppeda eexiya wolqqaama xoolinttoy shaafappe sikkuwa bollanne pulttota bolla saloppe wodhdhis .
66008011	He xoolinttuwa sunthay Camo geetettees . Haathaafe sikkuwa camisis ; haathay cammida gisho daro asay he haathaa uyidi hayqqidosona .
66008012	Oyddantho kiitanchchoy ba moyziya punnis . Awaappe , ageenaappenne xoolinttotappe sikkuwa dechchis ; entta poo7uwappe sikkoy dhumis . Gallasaappe sikkoy , qammaafekka sikkoy dhumis .
66008013	Issi argganthi salo dhoqqu gidi , piradhishin be7as . He argganthay ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Attida heedzu kiitanchchoti bantta moyziya punnanaw de7iya gisho sa7an de7iya asaa ayye ! Ayye ! Ayye ! ” yaagishin si7as .
66009001	Hessafe guye , ichchashantho kiitanchchoy ba moyziya punnin saloppe duge sa7a kunddida xoolintto be7as . He xoolinttuwas wolqqaama ollaa qulppey imettis .
66009002	Xoolinttoy ollaa dooyida wode dalgga cooceppe keyaa cuya mela cuyay he ollaafe keyis . He ollaafe keyida cuyan awaynne saloy dhumidosona .
66009003	He cuyappe booley keyidi sa7an wodhdhis . Sa7an de7iya kornnetas de7iya wolqqaa mela wolqqi booletas imettis .
66009004	Xoossaa maatamey som77on baynna asaa xalaalappe attin sa7an de7iya maata woykko mithi woykko ay cil77obaa gidin qohonna mela booletas odettis .
66009005	Booleti asaa ichchashu ageena gakkanaw paxa kaa7ana mela maati imettisppe attin asaa wodhana mela gidenna . Kornney ase dukkin zaameyssa mela booley dukkidi zaamisees .
66009006	He gallasatan asay hayqo koyana , shin demmenna . Entti hayqqanaw amottana , shin hayqoy enttafe haakkana .
66009007	Booley olas giigi uttida para daanees . Booliya huu7en worqqa kallachchi de7ees ; entta som77oykka asa som77o daanees .
66009008	Iya binaanay maccasa binaana mela adusse . Entta achchaykka gaammo achchi daanees .
66009009	Enttaw tira bolla wothiya biraata xururey de7ees ; entta qefiya girssay olettanaw gaallabiya paranne para gaare girssaa mela .
66009010	Enttaw kornne goyna daaniya goyninne dukkiya yiishshi de7ees . He goynan ichchashu ageena asaa qohana mela maati imettis .
66009011	Enttana haariya kawoy de7ees ; he kawoy olla kiitanchchuwa . Iya sunthay Ibraysxe doonan Abddoona ; qassi Girike doonan Apholiyoona geetettees . Iya sunthaa birshshethay “ Dhaysseyssa ” guussu .
66009012	Koyro ayyey aadhdhis ; hekko , buroo hara nam77u ayyeti eeson hanana .
66009013	Usuppuntha kiitanchchoy ba moyziya punnis . Xoossaa sinthan eqqida , worqqa yarshsho bessan de7iya oyddu kacetappe issi girssi si7as .
66009014	He girssay moyze oykkida usuppuntha kiitanchchuwako , “ Efiraxiise giya gita shaafan qashettida oyddu kiitanchchota birshsha ” yaagis .
66009015	Biitta bolla de7iya asaappe sikkuwa wodhana mela he saatiyas , he gallasaas , he ageenasinne he laythas giigidi uttida oyddu kiitanchchoti birshshettidosona .
66009016	Ola paraa toggiya olanchchota paydoy daro xeetu miloone gideyssa si7as .
66009017	Qassi ta qonccethan paratanne he parata toggida asaa be7as . He asay tiran wothiya biraata xururey tama bonqqo mela zo7o , yaakintte mela , kaaretha kalose melanne diinne mela ciliilo . Parata huu7ey gaammo huu7e mela ; entta doonappe tami , cuyinne diinney keyis .
66009018	Parata doonappe keyida taman , cuyaninne dinniyan he heedzu gadotan sa7an de7iya asaappe sikkoy hayqqis .
66009019	He parata wolqqay entta doona giddoninne goynan de7ees . Entta goynaykka shoosha huu7e mela ; entti iyara asaa qohoosona .
66009020	Ha gadotappe attidayssati bantta kushe oosuwappe simmibookkonna . Entti tuna ayyaanan worqqafe , birappe , naase biraatappenne shuchchafe oosettida eeqas goynnosona . Xeellanaw , si7anaw , hamuttanaw dandda7onna eeqatas goynneyssa aggibookona .
66009021	Asay wodheyssa , biteyssa , laymateyssanne kayseyssa aggidi maarota oychchibookkona .
66010001	Hessafe guye , ta hara wolqqaama kiitanchchoy saloppe sa7a wodhdhishin be7as . I shaara ma77is ; iya huu7iya bolla zuullay de7ees . Iya som77oy awa mela ; iya tohoy tama tuussa mela .
66010002	He kiitanchchoy dooya de7iya issi guutha xaatha maxaafaa ba kushen oykkidi , ba ushachcha tohuwa abbaa bolla , ba haddirssa tohuwa biitta bolla essis .
66010003	Gudiya gaammoda ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi waassis . I waassida wode laappun dadati bantta guunthaa sissidosona .
66010004	Laappun dadati odettida wode ta xaafanaw giigettas . Shin saloppe , “ Laappun dadati odidayssa maatamen gorddafe attin xaafoppa ” yaagiya girssaa si7as .
66010005	Yaatidi , abbaa bollanne biittaa bolla eqqida , ta be7ida kiitanchchoy , ba ushachcha kushiya salo pude miccis .
66010006	I miccidi saloninne iya giddon de7iya ubbaa , sa7aninne iya giddon de7iya ubbaa , abbaanne iya giddon de7iya ubbaa medhdhida , merinaw de7iya Xoossaa sunthan caaqqidi , “ Hizappe guye , Xoossay gam77enna .
66010007	Shin laappuntha kiitanchchoy ba moyziya punniya wode Xoossay ba aylle gidida nabeta baggara qonccisida xuura qofay polettana ” yaagis .
66010008	Hessafe guye , abbaa bollanne biittaa bolla eqqidi , “ Iya kushen dooyettidi de7iya xaatha maxaafaa kiitanchchuwa kusheppe ekka ” yaagidi nam77antho taw odishin si7as .
66010009	Taani he kiitanchchuwako bada , guutha xaatha maxaafaa imma gada oychchas . I taakko , “ Ekkada ma ; I ne ulon cammana , shin ne doonan eessada mal77ana ” yaagis .
66010010	Taani kiitanchchuwa kusheppe he guutha xaatha maxaafaa ekkada mas ; ta doonan eessada mal77is , shin ta ulon cammis .
66010011	Hessafe guye , taakko , “ Neeni yara ubbaas , dere ubbaas , dumma dumma doonan odetteyssatasinne kawotas tinbbite zaara odanaw bessees ” yaagis .
66011001	Hessafe guye , taw wadha xam77a immidi , “ Bada Xoossa Keethanne yarshsho bessaa wadhdha ; yan goynniya asatakka payda .
66011002	Shin Xoossa Keetha kare dabaabay Ayhude gidonna asaas imettida gisho wadhdhonna aggaaga . Ayhude gidonna asay geeshsha katamaa oytamanne nam77u ageena haarana .
66011003	Taani kalle ma77ida ta nam77u markkatta kiittana ; entti 1260 gallas tinbbite odana ” yaagis .
66011004	He nam77u markkati alamiya Godaa sinthan eqqiya nam77u shamaho mithatanne nam77u xomppe wothiya kocata .
66011005	Oonikka entta qohanaw koykko entta doonappe tami keyidi , entta morkketa dhayssees . Entta qohanaw koyaa oonikka hessada hayqqana .
66011006	Entti tinbbite odiya wode iri bukkonna mela saluwa gorddanaw enttaw maati de7ees . Enttaw haathe suuthi kessanaw , qassi entti koyida mela biittaa dumma dumma gadon dhayssanaw enttaw maati de7ees .
66011007	Entti bantta markkatethaa onggidaappe guye , ollaafe keyaa do7ay enttana olana . He do7ay entta xoonana ; wodhana .
66011008	Entta Goday masqaliya bolla kaqettida gita katamaa ogiya bolla entta ahay yegettana . He katamay leemison Soodome woykko Gibxxe geetetti xeegettees .
66011009	Qassi zerethi ubbaafe , yara ubbaafe , dumma dumma doonappenne kawotethi ubbaafe yida asay entta ahaa heedzu gallasinne bagga gakkanaw be7ana . Entta ahay moogettonna mela asay diggana .
66011010	Ha nam77u nabeti sa7an de7iya asaa waaysida gisho asay entta hayquwan ufayttana . Bantta ufayssaa bessanaw issoy issuwas imota immana .
66011011	Heedzu gallasinne baggafe guye , de7o ayyaanay Xoossaa matappe yidi enttan gelin , entti denddi eqqidosona . Entta be7ida ubbay gita yashshi yayyidosona .
66011012	Hessafe guye , he nam77u nabeti , “ Haa pude keyite ” giya qaala saloppe si7idosona . Entta morkketi enttana be7ishin , entti shaaran gelidi pude salo bidosona .
66011013	He saatiyan biittay wolqqaama qaaxo qaaxxin , katamaappe tammantho kushey dhays . Qassi biitta qaaxon laappun mukulu asay hayqqis . Attida asay daro kokkoridi babbidi ; salo Xoossaas bonchcho immidosona .
66011014	Nam77antho ayyey aadhdhis , shin hekko heedzantho ayyey eeson yaana .
66011015	Laappuntha kiitanchchoy ba moyziya punnis . Saloppe , “ Sa7aa kawotethay nu Godaasinne Kiristtoosas gidis ; I merinaappe merinaa gakkanaw haarana ” yaagiya wolqqaama qaalay si7ettis .
66011016	Yaatin , Xoossaa sinthan , bantta araatan uttida laatamanne oyddu cimati gufannidi , Xoossas goynnidi ,
66011017	“ Ha77ika kasekka de7eysso , Godaw , Ubbaafe Wolqqaama Xoossaw , neeni gita wolqqaa oykkadasa . Neeni haaranaw doomida gisho nuuni nena galatoos .
66011018	Ayhude gidonna asay hanqettidosona , shin ne hanqoy yis . Hayqqidayssata bolla ne pirddiya wodey yis . Neeni ne aylleta , nabetas geeshshatasinne ne sunthaas yayyeyssatas , guuthatasinne gitatas , entta oosuwada immiya wodey gakkis . Alamiya dhaysseyssata dhayssiya wodey yis ”
66011019	Salon de7iya Xoossa Keethay dooyettis ; iya giddon Xoossaa caaqo taabotey benttis . Qassi wol77anthi wol77ammis , deshoy dechchis ; dadi dhuuqqis ; biitti qaaxxis ; shachchi bukkis .
66012001	Hessafe guye , salon wolqqaama malaati benttis . Awaa ma77ada , ageena bolla eqqada , tammanne nam77u xoolintto kallachcha ba huu7en wothida de7iya , issi maccasiya benttasu .
66012002	He maccasiya qantheshin , iyo iqethi oykkin un77ettada waassasu .
66012003	Qassi hara malaati salon benttis . Laappun huu7etinne tammu kaceti de7iya gita zo7o dawey benttis . I ba huu7eta bolla laappun kallachcha wothis .
66012004	He dawey ba goynan xoolinttotappe sikkuwa saloppe dafidi sa7an yeggis . He dawey na7ay yeleti wodhdhida mela mittanaw koyidi , yelanaw eqettiya maccase sinthan eqqis .
66012005	He maccasiya kawotethaa ubbaa biraata xam77an haaranaw de7iya adde na7a yelasu . Na7ay Xoossaakonne iya araatakko pude ekettis .
66012006	Maccasiya 1260 gallas gakkanaw iyo naagana mela Xoossay iw giigisi wothida bessaa bazzo biitta baqatasu .
66012007	Salon oli medhettis . Mika7eeley ba kiitanchchotara dawiyara olettis ; dawey ba kiitanchchotara gididi zaari olettis .
66012008	Shin dawey xoonettidi salon enttaw de7iya bessi dhayidosona .
66012009	Gita dawey , beni shooshay , sa7an yegettis . Ikka Daabulosa woykko Xalahe geetettiya alamiya baletheyssa . I ba kiitanchchotara issife duge alamiya yegettis .
66012010	Hessafe guye , salon hayssada yaagiya qaala si7as . “ Ha77i atotethay , wolqqaynne kawotethay , nu Xoossassa ; maatay Kiristtoosas gidis . Hiza , qammanne gallas Xoossaa sinthan , nu ishata mooteyssi saloppe duge holettis .
66012011	Entti dorssa suuthaaninne bantta markkatethaa qaalan , iya olidi xoonidosona . Entti bantta shemppuwas mishettonna banttana hayqos aathi immidosona .
66012012	Hessa gisho , saloninne iya giddon de7eyssato ufayttite . Shin biittaanne abbaa ayye ! Hiza , Xalahey baw guutha wodey attidayssa erida gisho wolqqaama hanqon hintteko wodhdhis ”
66012013	Qassi dawey bana sa7a yeggidayssa be7ida wode adde na7a yelida maccasiw goodis .
66012014	Maccasiw shooshay qohonna mela heedzu laythinne bagga mashenne uyashe iya naagettiya bessi bazzo biitta piradhdhada baana mela nam77u wolqqaama arggantha qefey iw imettis .
66012015	Yaatidi , maccasiw di7oy di77idi efana mela dawey shaafa haatha mela ba doonappe maccase guyera cooyis .
66012016	Shin biittay maccasiw maaddis ; biittay ba doona dooyidi dawiya doonappe keyida haathaa mittis .
66012017	He dawey maccase bolla daro hanqettidi , I zerethata , Xoossaa kiitaa naageyssatanne Yesuusi qonccisida tumaas ammanettidayssata olanaw bidi .
66013001	abbaa gaxan de7iya shafiyan eqqis . Hessafe guye , issi do7ay abbaafe keyishin be7as . Iyaw tammu kaceynne laappun huu7ey de7ees . He tammu kaceta bolla tammu kallachchati de7oosona . He huu7eta bolla Xoossaa cashsha sunthati xaafettidi uttis .
66013002	Ta be7ida do7ay maahe daanees ; iya tohoy babbantha toho mela ; iya doonaykka gaammo doona daanees . Dawey ba wolqqaa , ba araatanne ba gita maataa he do7aas immis .
66013003	He do7aa huu7iyappe issuwa bolla hayqos gathiya madunthi be7as , shin he madunthay paxis . Alamiya asa ubbay malaalettidi he do7aa kaallis .
66013004	Dawey ba maataa do7aas immida gisho asa ubbay dawiya goynnidosona . Qassi asay , “ Do7aa meli oonee ? Iyara olettanaw dandda7ey oonee ? ” yaagidi do7aas goynnidosona .
66013005	He do7aas otorttana melanne cayana mela dooni imettis ; oytamanne nam77u ageena haarana mela maati iyaw imettis .
66013006	He do7ay Xoossaa , iya sunthaa , I de7iya bessaanne salon de7iya ubbaa qanggethi oykkis .
66013007	He do7ay geeshshatara olettidi , enttana xoonana mela wolqqi iyaw imettis . Yara ubbaa , dere ubbaa , dumma dumma doona ubbaa bollanne zerethi ubbaa bolla maati iyaw imettis .
66013008	Alamey medhettosappe doomidi , shukettida Dorssaa de7o maxaafan entta sunthay xaafettona ha sa7an de7iya asa ubbay he do7aas goynnana .
66013009	Si7iya haythi de7iya asi si7o .
66013010	Oonikka di7ettanaw de7ey di7ettees . Mashshan hayqqanaw de7ey mashshan shukettana . Hessankka geeshshata dandda7aynne ammanoy erettana .
66013011	Qassika , hara do7i sa7appe keyishin be7as . Iyaw dorssa kace daaniya nam77u kacey de7ees ; iya haasayay daweyssa mela .
66013012	He do7ay koyro do7aa bessan , iya maatan oothees . Ikka hayqos gathiya madunthaafe paxida koyro do7aas ; biittan de7iya asa ubbay goyinnana mela oothees .
66013013	He nam77antho do7ay hari attoshin , tama saloppe asa ubbaa sinthan wodhisana gakkanaw gita malaatata oothis .
66013014	Koyro do7aa bessan oothana mela , iyaw imettida malaatatan sa7an de7iya asa ubbaa I balethis . Mashshan madunxidi paxida do7aa bonchchos misile giigisana mela enttana kiittis .
66013015	Nam77antho do7ay koyro do7aa misiliyas shemppo immidi odettana melanne iyaw goynnonayssati hayqqana mela oothiya maati imettis .
66013016	He nam77antho do7ay gitinne guuthi , manqoynne durey , womaanoynne aylley ba ushachcha kushen woykko ba som77on malla wothana mela oothis .
66013017	He do7aa sunthay woykko iya sunthaa payduwa mallay baynna asi oonikka bayzanawunne shammanaw dandda7enna .
66013018	Cinccatethi koshshey hessana . Eratethi de7iya oonikka he do7aa payduwa birshshethaa ero ; he paydoy asa sunthi . He paydoy usuppun xeetanne usppun tammanne usuppuna .
66014001	Hessafe guye , Dorssay Xiyoone Deriya bolla eqqidayssa be7as . Iyara iya sunthaynne iya Aawa sunthay entta som77on xaafettida , 144,000 asay de7ees .
66014002	Saloppe gita haatha guunthunne dada guunthu daaniya wolqqaama girssi si7as . Qassi ta si7ida girssay diithi diixishin si7ettiya girssaa mela .
66014003	144,000 asay araata sinthan , oyddu de7on de7iya medhetethata sinthaninne cimata sinthan eqqidi enttafe hara oonikka tamaaranaw dandda7onna ooratha mazmure yexxidosona .
66014004	Hayssati maccasara banttana tunisonna naagida geeshshata . Entti dorssay biyaso ubbaa kaalloosona . Entti Xoossaasinne Dorssaas bayra gididi , shiiqanaw sa7a asaa giddofe wozettidosona .
66014005	Entti worddoynne borey baynna asata .
66014006	Hessafe guye , merinaa Wonggelaa sa7a bolla de7iya kawotethaa ubbaas , zerethi ubbaas , yara ubbaasinne dumma dumma doona ubbaas markkattanaw salora piradhdhiya hara kiitanchcho be7as .
66014007	He kiitanchchoy ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Xoossay alamiya pirddiya saatey gakkida gisho Xoossaas yayyite ; iya bonchchite . Salo , sa7aa , abbaanne pultto haathaa medhdhida Xoossaa goynnite ” yaagis .
66014008	Koyroyssa kaallidi hara nam77antho kiitanchchoy , “ Dere ubbaa tunanne mathoya woyne ushshida , gita Baabilooney kunddasu ! Kunddasu ! ” yaagidi waassis .
66014009	Heedzantho kiitanchchoy entta kaallidi , ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Do7aanne iya misiliya goynniya qassi iya malla ba som77on woykko ba kushen wothiya oonikka de7ikko ,
66014010	I hanqo xuu7an kumida Xoossaa hanqo woyniya uyana . Entti geeshsha kiitanchchota sinthaninne Dorssa sinthan eexiya diinne taman waayettana .
66014011	Entta waaya cuyay meri merinaw cuyishe daana . Do7aanne iya misiliya goynney qassi he do7aa sunthaa mallay de7iya oonikka qammanne gallas shemppoy baynna kaa7ettana ” yaagis .
66014012	Xoossaa kiitaa naageyssatinne Yesuusa ammanetteyssati gencciya minotethay qoncciya wodey hessa .
66014013	Hessafe guye , “ Hizappe Godan hayqqeyssati anjjettidayssata ” yaagiya qaala saloppe si7as . Ayyaanay , “ Ee tuma , entta oosoy entta kaalliya gisho entti bantta daaburappe shemppana ” yaagees .
66014014	Hessafe guye , bootha shaara bolla uttida Asa Na7a daaneyssa be7as . I ba huu7en worqqa kallachcha wothis ; qassi ba kushen baaca oykkis .
66014015	Hara kiitanchchoy Xoossa keethafe keyidi , shaara bolla uttidayssako ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Kathaa shiisho wodey gakkida gisho ne baaca yeddada kathaa cakka ; sa7an de7iya kathay gakkis ” yaagis .
66014016	Yaatin shaara bolla uttidayssi ba baaca sa7a yeddidi , sa7an de7iya kathaa cakkis .
66014017	Qassika salon de7iya Xoossa keethafe hara kiitanchchoy keyis ; iyawukka oco baaci de7ees .
66014018	Tama bolla maati de7iya hara kiitanchchoy yarshsho bessaafe keyis . I ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi oco baaca oykkida kiitanchchuwako , “ Woyne ayfey teerida gisho ne oco baaca yeddada , sa7an de7iya woyniyappe qanxa ” yaagis .
66014019	He kiitanchchoy ba baaca yeddidi , sa7an de7iya woyniyappe qanxidi , Xoossaa gita hanquwa gum77iya bessan yeggis .
66014020	Entti Katamaappe gaxan de7iya woyne ayfe gum77iya bessan yedhettidosona . Suuthi woyniya gum77iya bessaafe keyidi issi mukulunne usppun xeetu kilo mitire mela haakkidi , para puulo gakkiya mela eellidi dhoqqu gis .
66015001	Taani salon hara gitanne malaalisiya malaata be7as . Xoossaa wurssetha hanquwa qonccisiya laappun boshata oykkida laappun kiitanchchoti de7oosona .
66015002	Qassi tamara walakettida burccuko abbaa daaneyssa be7as . He abbaa gaxan do7aa , iya misiliyanne iya sunthaa taybuwa xoonidayssata be7as . Xoossay enttaw immida diithaa oykkidi eqqidosona .
66015003	Entti Xoossaa aylliya Muse mazmuriyanne Dorssa mazmuriya hayssada yaagid yexxoosona . “ Godaw , Ubbaafe Wolqqaama Xoossaw , ne oosoy gitanne malaalisiyabaa . Dere ubbaa kawaw , ne ogey xillonne tuma .
66015004	Geeshshi ne xalaala gidiya gisho Godaw , new yayyonnaynne ne sunthaa bonchchonnay oonee ? Ne xillo oosoy asa ubbaas qoncce gidiya gisho kawotethi ubbay ne sinthe yidi goynnana ”
66015005	Hessafe guye , salon dooyettidi de7iya Xoossa Keethaa , ikka Markkatetha Dunkkaaniya be7as .
66015006	Laappun boshata oykkida laappun kiitanchchoti Xoossa keethafe keyidosona . Entti geeshshinne phooliya liino ma7o ma77idosona ; bantta tiran worqqa dancco danccidosona .
66015007	Oyddu medhetethatappe issoy , merinaw de7iya Xoossaa hanqoy kumida laappun worqqa xuu7ata laappun kiitanchchotas immis .
66015008	Xoossaa bonchchuwafenne iya wolqqaafe denddoyssan Xoossa Keethay cuyan kumis . Laappun kiitanchchoti oykkida laappun boshati polettana gakkanaw Xoossa Keetha oonikka gelanaw dandda7ibeenna .
66016001	Hessafe guye , Xoossa keethafe laappun kiitanchchotakko , “ Bidi Xoossaa hanquwa laappun xuu7atappe sa7an gussite ” yaagidi , odiya wolqqaama qaala si7as .
66016002	Koyro kiitanchchoy bidi , ba xuu7an de7eyssa sa7an gussin , do7aa mallay de7eyssata bollanne iya misiliya goynnidayssata bolla iitanne zaamiya madunthi keyis .
66016003	Nam77antho kiitanchchoy ba xuu7an de7eyssa abban gussin , abbay hayqqida asa suuthi daanis . Qassi abban de7iya medhetetha ubbay hayqqis .
66016004	Heedzantho kiitanchchoy ba xuu7an de7eyssa shaafataninne pultto haathatan gussin , haathati suuthi gididosona .
66016005	Hessafe guye , haatha bolla maati de7iya kiitanchchoy hayssada yaagishin si7as . “ Ha77ika benikka de7iya geeshshaw , hayssada ne pirddida gisho neeni xillo .
66016006	Entti geeshshata suuthaanne nabeta suuthaa gussida gisho entti suuthu uyana mela oothadasa . Entti banttaw bessiyabaa ekkidosona ” “ Godaw , Ubbaafe Wolqqaama Xoossaw , ne pirdday tumanne xillo ”
66016007	
66016008	Oyddantho kiitanchchoy ba xuu7an de7eyssa awa bolla gussin , away ba seelan asaa xuuggana mela awaas wolqqi imettis .
66016009	Asay wolqqaama seelan xuugettidi , he boshata bolla maati de7iya Xoossaa sunthaa baaddidosona ; bantta nagaraappe simmidi Xoossaa bonchchibookona .
66016010	Ichchashantho kiitanchchoy ba xuu7an de7eyssa do7aa araata bolla gussin , he do7aa kawotethay dhumis . Asay un77aa gisho bantta inxarssaa saxxoosona .
66016011	Qassi asay un77aa gishonne madunthaa gisho salo Xoossaa baaddidosona ; bantta oothida nagaraappe simmibookkonna .
66016012	Usuppuntha kiitanchchoy ba xuu7an de7eyssa gita Efiraxiise shaafan gussin , doloha baggafe yaana kawotas ogey giigana mela haathay melis .
66016013	Hessafe guye , shodhdhe daaniya heedzu tuna ayyaanati dawiya doonappe , do7aa doonappenne worddo nabiya doonappe keyishin be7as .
66016014	Entti malaatata oothiya tuna ayyaanata . He heedzu tuna ayyaanati Ubbaafe Wolqqaama Xoossaa gita gallasan hananaw de7iya olaas shiishanaw alame kawota ubbaako baana .
66016015	“ Hekko , ta kaysoda yaana ! Asa sinthan kallottonaadanne yeellatonnaada barkkidi , ba ma7uwa naagiya uray anjjettidayssa ! ” yaagis .
66016016	He tuna ayyaanati kawota Ibraysxe doonan Armmagedoone giya bessan shiishidosona .
66016017	Laappuntha kiitanchchoy ba xuu7an de7eyssa carkko bolla gussin , Xoossa Keethan de7iya araatappe , “ Polettis ” yaagiya wolqqaama qaalay yis .
66016018	Hessafe wol77anthi wol77ammis ; daday dhuuqqis , biittay qaaxxis . Asi sa7an medhettosappe biitti hessa mela qaaxo qaaxxibeenna . Hessi ubbaafe aadhdhida qaaxo .
66016019	Gita katamay heedzu keyidi shaakettis ; Biitta ubban de7iya katamati dhayidosona . Xoossay gita katamaa Baabiloone qoppidi , ba iita hanqo woyne ushshay kumida xuu7aa iw immis .
66016020	Haathan teqettida biittati dhayidosona ; deretikka benttibookkona .
66016021	Asaa bolla oytamanne ichchashu kilo giraame mela deexiya wolqqaama shachchi saloppe bukkis . Boshay daro iita gidiya gisho asay shachcha boshaa gisho Xoossaa baaddidosona .
66017001	Laappun xuu7ata oykkida laappun kiitanchchotappe issoy taakko yidi , “ Haaya ; daro haathata bolla uttida gita laymatiya maccase bolla yaanaw de7iya pirddaa ta nena bessana .
66017002	Alamiya kawoti iira laymatidosona ; alamen de7iya asaykka I laymatetha woyniya uyidi mathottidosona ” yaagis .
66017003	He kiitanchchoy tana Geeshsha Ayyaanan bazzo biitta efis . Yan issi maccasiya cashsha sunthay i bolla ubban xaafettidi uttida , zo7o do7aa toggidaaro be7as ; he do7aas laappun huu7eynne tammu kacey de7ees .
66017004	He maccasiya kaalose ma7onne zo7o ma7o ma77asu ; iya worqqan , bonchcho shuchchaninne inqo giya al77o shuchchan alleeqettasu . Iya ba kushen borssiyabaanne laymatetha tunatethan kumida worqqa xuu7a oykkasu .
66017005	I som77on xuura ooso birshshethay de7iya sunthay , “ Gita Baabilooney , laymatethasinne sa7an de7iya tunabaa ubbaas aayo ” yaagiya xuufey xaafettidi uttis .
66017006	Qassi he maccasiya geeshshata suuthaanne Yesuusas markkattishe hayqqidayssata suuthaa uyada mathottidaaro ta be7ada malaaletas .
66017007	Kiitanchchoy taakko , “ Neeni ays malaalettay ? Taani new maccasse xuuraanne iya tookkida laappun huu7eynne tammu kacey de7iya do7aa xuuraa odana .
66017008	Neeni be7ida do7ay koyro de7ees , shin ha77i baawa . He do7ay ciimmo ollaafe keyidi dhayos baana . Sa7ay medhettosappe doomidi , de7o maxaafan entta sunthay xaafettiboonna sa7an de7iya asay do7aa be7idi malaalettana . Hiza , I kase de7ees ; ha77i baawa , shin sinthafe yaana .
66017009	“ Hayssi cinccatethinne akeeka koyees . Laappun huu7eti maccasiya uttiya laappun dereta ; hessati qassi laappun kawota .
66017010	Enttafe ichchashu kawoti kunddidosona . Issoy ha77i gakkanaw haarees ; hankko Kawoy yibeenna . I yidi guutha wode takkanaw bessees .
66017011	Sinthe de7ida do7ay , ha77i baynnayssi , I ba huu7en hosppuntha do7aa . I laappun do7atappe issuwa ; I dhayanaw bees .
66017012	Neeni be7ida tammu kaceti haaro doomiboonna tammu kawota . Shin entti do7aara issife issi saate kawotidi haaranaw enttaw maati imettana .
66017013	Entta ubbaas issi qofay de7ees ; entti bantta wolqqaanne bantta maataa do7aas immana .
66017014	Entti Dorssaara olettana , shin dorssay godata Godaanne kawota Kawo gidiya gisho I xeegidayssati , dooridayssatinne ammanettidayssati he kawota xoonana ” yaagis .
66017015	Kiitanchchoy qassika taakko , “ Laymatiyara uttida he neeni be7ida haathati yarata , kawotethata , zerethatanne dumma dumma doonan odetteyssata .
66017016	Qassi neeni be7ida tammu kaceynne do7ay laymatiyaro ixxana . Entti iw de7iya ubbabaa ekkana . Qassi iyo kallo ashshananne I ashuwa midigana ; yaatidi entti iyo taman xuuggana .
66017017	Hiza , Xoossaa qaalay polettana gakkanaw entta qofay issino gidana mela entti bantta aysiya wolqqaa do7aas immanaadanne Xoossay qoppidayssa entti oothanaada entta wozanan Xoossay amo wothis .
66017018	He neeni be7ida maccasiya sa7a kawota haariya gita katamiw ” yaagis .
66018001	Yaatidi , gita maati de7iya hara kiitanchchoy saloppe wodhdhishin ta be7as . He kiitanchchuwa bonchchoy sa7aa poo7isis .
66018002	He kiitanchchoy ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Iya kunddasu ! Gita Baabilooney kunddasu ! Baabilooney tuna ayyaanati aqiya bessi gidasu . Dumma dumma iitabatas keethe gidasu ; tuna kafotinne do7ati shemppiya bessi gidasu .
66018003	Asa zerethi ubbaa ba laymatetha woyniya ushshasu . Sa7aa kawoti iira laymatidosona . I miikkotethaafe denddoyssan biittan de7iya zal77anchchoti durettidosona ”
66018004	Hessafe guye , ta saloppe hayssada yaagiya hara qaala si7as . “ I nagaraa iira koxonna melanne , iya ekkanaw de7iya seera hintte ekkonna mela , ta deriyaw iippe keyite .
66018005	Hiza , I nagaray salo gakkanaw doorettis . Xoossay I naaquwa akeekis .
66018006	Iya immidayssa mela zaaridi iw immite . Iya oothida oosuwas nam77u kushe iw zaarite . Iya giigisida ushshaa bolla hintte nam77u kushe mathoya ushshaa I xuu7an kunthite .
66018007	Iya bonchchettidayssadanne iw injjetidayssa mela , iyo metoothitenne kayoyite . Iya ba wozanan , ‘ Taani kaweeda uttas ; ta azini baynna maccas gidikke ; taani ubbaka kayottike ’ yaagasu .
66018008	Hessa gisho , bosha ubbay , harggey , kayoynne koshi iyo issi gallas oykkana . Qassi iya taman xuugettana ; ays giikko , I bolla pirddiya Xoossay wolqqaama ”
66018009	“ Iira laymatidayssatinne I miikkotethan de7ida , alamiya kawoti he katamiya xuugettin keyaa cuya be7ida wode iw waassidi yeekkana .
66018010	Entti he katamee waaya be7idi yayyida gisho haakki eqqidi , ‘ Ha gita katamee ! Wolqqaama katamee ! Baabiloonee , nena ayye ! Neeni issi saate giddon ne pirddaa ekkadasa ’ yaagana .
66018011	“ Entta markkabiya caanaa hizappe shammiya asi baynna gisho sa7an de7iya zal77anchchoti he katamees waassananne kayottana .
66018012	Entta worqqaa , biraa , bonchcho shuchchaa , inqo giya al77o shuchchaa , kaalose ma7o , liino ma7o , haare ma7o , zo7o ma7o , dumma dumma sawo mithaa , zaale , al77o mithaa , naase biraata , goole shuchchu ,
66018013	qarafa , qimame , ixaane , karbbe , shitto , woyne , zayte , liiqo dhiille , gistte , mehe , dorsse , para , para gaare , aylletanne hara asata shammiya oonikka baawa .
66018014	“ Zal77anchchoti maccaseekko , ‘ Neeni amottida lo77obaa ubbay neeppe dhays . Ne aqoynne alleeqettidabaa ubbay neeppe haakkis . Neeni zaarada entta ubbaa demmaka ’ yaagidosona .
66018015	He kataman zal77idi durettida zal77anchchoti I metuwa babbidi iippe haakkidi eqqana . Entti yeekkananne kayottana .
66018016	Qassi , ‘ Liino ma7o , kaalose ma7onne zo7o ma7o ma77ada , worqqan , bonchcho shuchchaninne inqo giya al77o shuchchan alleeqettida , he gita katamees ayye !
66018017	Hayssa mela gita shalo ubbay issi saate giddon dhays ’ yaagidosona . “ Markkabiya laaggiya ubbay , markkabiyan biya ubbay , markkabiya bolla oothiya ubbaynne abban zal77iya ubbay haakki eqqidosona .
66018018	He katamiya xuugettin keyaa cuya be7ida wode ‘ Ha gita katamiw daaniya hara katami de7ishshaa ? ’ yaagidosona .
66018019	Entti bantta huu7en baana qolidi , waassidosonanne kayottidosona . ‘ Abbaa bolla markkabeti de7iya ubbay , I shaluwan durettida ubbay , he katamiya issi saaten dhayida gisho ayye ! Ayye !
66018020	Saluwaw , I dhayuwan ufaytta ! Geeshshato , hawaareto , nabeto , Xoossay hintte gisho I bolla pirddida gisho ufayttite . ’ yaagidosona . ”
66018021	Yaatin , mino kiitanchchoy woxa daaniya gita shuchchu denthidi abban holishe , “ Gita katamiya Baabilooney wolqqan holettada hayssada kunddana ; iya hachchife guye ubbaka benttuku .
66018022	Diithi diixeyssatinne yexeyssati , suusul77enne moyze punneyssati , hizappe guye ne giddon ubbaka si7ettokona . Ay kochcha zal77e zal77iya asikka ne giddon benttenna . Woxa girssi hizappe guye ne giddon si7ettenna .
66018023	xomppe poo7oy zaaridi ne giddon poo7enna . Machcho ekkeysanne azina geliyari qaali hizappe guye ne giddon si7ettenna . Ne zal77anchchoti biitta ubban erettida wolqqaamata . Ne bitan kawotethata ubbaa cimmadasa ” yaagis .
66018024	Nabeta suuthay , geeshshata suuthaynne biitta bolla hayqqida asa ubbaa suuthay I giddon benttida gisho Baabilooney pirddettasu .
66019001	Yaatin , salon daro asay , “ Xoossay galatetto ! Atotethay , bonchchoynne wolqqay nu Xoossaas gido .
66019002	Iya pirdday tumanne xillo . Sa7aa tunisida iita laymiw Xoossay pirddis . Xoossay ba aylleta suuthaa iippe achchis ”
66019003	He asay zaaridi bantta qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Xoossaa galati gakko . He katamiya merinaw cuyashe daana ”
66019004	Laatamanne oyddu cimatinne de7on de7iya oyddu medhetethati araatan uttida Xoossaas gufannidi , “ Amin77i ! Xoossaa galati gakko ”
66019005	Yaatin , “ Xoossa aylleti , Xoosse yayyaa guuthinne giti ubbay , nu Xoossaa galatite ”
66019006	Yaatin , daro asada wocamiya , wolqqaama shaafada guummiya , dadada dechchiya girssay , “ Xoossaa galati gakko ; nu Goday , Ubbaafe Wolqqaama Xoossay kawotis .
66019007	Dorssaa yaaganoy gakkida gishonne iya geliyara giigida gisho nu ufayttoos , galatoosinne Dorssaa bonchchos .
66019008	Gelos giigidaara phooliyanne geeshshi gidida liino ma7o ma77ana mela iw imettis ”
66019009	Hessafe guye , kiitanchchoy taakko , “ Dorssa yaaganuwa xeegettidayssati anjjettidayssata ” gada xaafa . He kiitanchchoy gujjidi , “ Hayssi Xoossaa tuma qaalaa ” yaagis .
66019010	He wode ta iya goynnanaw iya tohuwa bolla kunddas . Shin I , “ Hessa oothofa ! Taani Yesuusabaa markkattiya ne melanne ne ishata mela . Ne Xoossaa goynna ” yaagis . Hiza , Yesuusabaa markkattidayssatas nabetetha ayyaani de7ees .
66019011	Yaatin , saloy dooyettin , yan bootha pari de7eyssa be7as . He paraa toggidayssi Ammanettidayssanne Tumanchcho geetettees . I xillotethan pirddesinne olettees .
66019012	Iya ayfey tama laco daanees ; iya huu7en daro kallachchi de7ees . Iya bolla I attin hari oonikka eronna xaafettida sunthi de7ees .
66019013	I suuthan muukettida ma7o ma77is ; iya sunthaykka Xoossaa Qaalaa .
66019014	Phooliyanne geeshshi gidida liino ma7o ma77ida salo olanchchoti bootha parata toggidi iya geedo kaalloosona .
66019015	Kawotethata qanxiya mashshi iya doonappe keyees . I biraata xam77an asaa haarana . Ubbaafe Wolqqaama Xoossaa hanqo woyne ushshaa gum77iya bessaa I yedhdhana .
66019016	Iya ma7uwa bollanne iya wodiriya bolla , “ Kawota Kawuwanne godata Godaa ” yaagiya sunthay xaafettis .
66019017	Hessafe guye , issi kiitanchchoy awa bolla eqqidayssa be7as . He kiitanchchoy salora piradhdhiya kafo ubbaas ba qaala dhoqqu oothidi , “ Haa yiite ! Xoossaa gibiraa maanaw issi bessi shiiqite .
66019018	Yidi kawota ashuwa , shalaqata ashuwa , wotaaddareta ashuwa , parata ashuwa , parata toggeyssata ashuwa , asa ubbaa ashuwa , aylleta ashuwa , womaannota ashuwa , gitatanne guuthata ashuwa miite ” yaagis .
66019019	Do7ay , paraa toggidayssaranne iya olanchchotara olettanaw sa7a kawotinne entta olanchchoti issi bessi shiiqidashin be7as .
66019020	Shin he do7aynne iya sunthan malaatata oothida worddo nabey iyara issife oykettis . He malaatatan do7aa mallay de7eyssatanne iya misiliya goynneyssata I balethis . Do7aynne worddo nabey nam77ayka diinnen eexiya tama abban paxa yegettidosona .
66019021	Attidayssati paraa toggidayssa doonappe keyaa mashshan hayqqidosona . Kafoti ubbay entta ashuwa midi kallidosona .
66020001	Zawi baynna ollaa qulppiyanne gita santhalaata ba kushen oykkida issi kiitanchchoy saloppe wodhdhishin be7as .
66020002	I dawiya oykkidi mukulu laythas qachchis . He dawey koyro shooshaa , Daabuloosa woykko Xalahe .
66020003	Kiitanchchoy zawi baynna ollan iya yeggidi , mukulu laythi wurana gakkanaw kawotethata zaari balethonna mela qulppen gorddidi attamis . Hessafe guye , dawey guutha wodes bilettanaw bessees .
66020004	Hessafe guye , araatatanne araatata bolla uttidi pirddana mela maati imettidayssata be7as . Yesuusas markkattida gishonne Xoossaa qaala odida gisho bantta qoodhiya goyrettida asaa shemppuwa be7as . Entti do7aa woykko do7aa misiliya goynnibookkona . Entti do7aa malla bantta som77on woykko bantta kushen wothibookkona . Entti hayqoppe denddidi Kiristtoosara issife mukulu laythi haaridosona .
66020005	Hayssi koyro dendduwa ; attida hankko hayqqidayssati mukulu laythay wurana gakkanaw hayqoppe denddibookkona .
66020006	Koyro dendduwas qaadi de7eyssati anjjettidayssatanne geeshshata . Entta bolla nam77antho hayquwas wolqqi baawa . Entti Xoossaasinne Kiristtoosas kahine gidana ; iyara issife mukulu laythi haarana .
66020007	Mukulu laythay wuridaappe guye Xalahey qashoppe bilettana .
66020008	I sa7aa gaxappe gaxa gakkanaw de7iya kawotethata , enttika , Googenne Maagoge geetetteyssata balethidi olas shiishanaw keyana . Entta paydoy abbaa gaxan de7iya shafe mela .
66020009	Entti biitta ubban laalettidi , geeshshata heeranne Xoossay dosiya katamaa teqqidosona . Shin tami saloppe wodhdhidi enttana mis .
66020010	Entta balethida Xalahey , do7aynne worddo nabey yegettida eexiya diinne tama abban yegettis . Entti qammanne gallas merinaw paxa kaa7ettana .
66020011	Hessafe guye , gita bootha araata bolla uttidayssa be7as . Sa7inne saloy iya sinthafe baqatidosona ; entti zaari benttibookkona .
66020012	Hayqqidayssati , gitatinne guuthati araata sinthan eqqidayssata be7as ; maxaafati dooyettidosona ; qassi de7o maxaafa gidida hara maxaafi dooyettis . Hayqqidayssati maxaafan xaafettida bantta oosuwada pirdda ekkidosona .
66020013	Abbay ba giddon de7iya hayqqidayssata immis ; hayqoynne Si7ooley bantta giddon de7iya hayqqidayssata immidosona . Issi issi asi ba oosuwada pirdda ekkis .
66020014	Yaatin , hayqoynne Si7ooley tama abban yegettidosona . He tama abbay nam77antho hayqo .
66020015	De7o maxaafan iya sunthay xaafettiboonna oonikka tama abban yegettis .
66021001	Taani ooratha salonne ooratha sa7a be7as . Koyro saloynne koyro sa7ay dhays ; abbayka dhays .
66021002	Geeshsha katamiya , ooratha Yerusalaamey , azina gelanaw alleeqettada giigada de7iya maccasada saloppe Xoossaa matappe duge wodhdhishin be7as .
66021003	Araatappe hayssada yaagidi , odiya gita qaala si7as ; “ Xoossa Keethay asaara de7ees ; Xoossay ba bonchchuwara asaara issife daana . Entti iya dere gidana ; Xoossay ba huu7en enttara daana ; I entta Xoossaa gidana .
66021004	Xoossay entta ayfeppe afutha ubbaa quchchana . Hizappe hayqoy woykko kayoy woykko waasoy woykko waayey deenna . Gal77a ubbay aadhdhis ” yaagis .
66021005	Araata bolla uttidayssi , “ Taani ubbaa oorathi oothana ” yaagis . Qassi zaaridi taakko , “ Taani odeyssi ammantheyssanne tuma gidiya gisho xaafa ” yaagis .
66021006	Qassi taakko , “ Polettis ! Taani Alfanne Oomega ; Doomethinne Polo . Saamottida oonakka de7o haathaa pulttuwafe cigi baynna coo ushshana .
66021007	Xooniya oonikka hessa ubbaa laattana ; taani iyaw Xoossaa gidana ; ikka ta na7a gidana .
66021008	Shin yashshanchchota , ammanettonnayssata , tunata , shemppo wodheyssata , laymateyssata , biteyssata , eeqa goynneyssatanne worddanchchota qaaday diinney eexiya tama abban gidana . Hessi nam77antho hayqo ” yaagis .
66021009	Laappun wurssetha boshati kumida laappun xuu7ata oykkida laappun kiitanchchotappe issoy taakko yidi , “ Haaya , taani nena gelos giigida Dorssaa machchiw bessana ” yaagis .
66021010	Kiitanchchoy tana daro dhoqqa deriya huu7e Geeshsha Ayyaanan kessidi , geeshsha katamay , Yerusalaamey , saloppe Xoossaa matappe duge wodhdhishin bessis .
66021011	He katamay Xoossaa bonchchon poo7ees . He katamaa poo7oy yasphphiide giya al77o shuchchaa mela ; geeshsha birilleda phoolees .
66021012	He katamaa dirssay wolqqaamanne adusse . Iyaw tammanne nam77u penggetinne he penggeta naagiya tammanne nam77u kiitanchchoti de7oosona . Penggeta bolla tammanne nam77u Isra7eele zerethata sunthay xaafettis .
66021013	Doloha baggara heedzu penggeti , pudeha baggara heedzu penggeti , dugeha baggara heedzu penggetinne wuloha baggara heedzu penggeti de7oosona .
66021014	Katamaa gimbbe dirssay tammanne nam77u shuchcha baasota bolla eqqis . Entta bolla tammanne nam77u Dorssaa hawaareta sunthay xaafettis .
66021015	Taw odiya kiitanchchuwas , katamaa , iya penggetanne iya dirssaa wadhdhiya worqqa xam77ay de7ees .
66021016	Katamaas oyddu maazaneti de7oosona ; katamaa geesaynne gomppay issi gina . Kiitanchchoy katamaa ba xam77an wadhdhin , katamay tammanne nam77u mukulu kilo mitire gidis ; katamaa geesay , gomppaynne dhoqqatethay issi gina .
66021017	Kiitanchchoy qassi dirssaa wadhdhin , kiitanchchoy go7ettiya asa kushen issi xeetanne oytamanne oyddu wadha gidis .
66021018	Katamaa dirssay yasphphiide giya shuchchan direttis . Katamay masttoteda phooliya geeshsha worqqan oosettis .
66021019	Katamaa dirssaa baasoy ubba qommo bonchchettida shuchchan alleeqettis . Koyro hiixettida shuchchay yasphphiide , nam77anthoy samppeere , heedzanthoy kelqqedoone , oyddanthoy baalure ,
66021020	ichchashanthoy sarddonkise , usuppunthoy sarddiyoone , laappunthay kiristiloobe , hosppunthoy birille , uddufunthoy tophaaziyone , tammanthoy kirisphiraasise , tammanne issinthoy yaakintte , tammanne nam77anthoy ametesxinoose .
66021021	Tammanne nam77u penggetas tammanne nam77u inqo giya al77o shuchchi de7ees . Issi issi penggey issi inqon oosettis . Katamaa wogga ogey masttoteda phooliya geeshsha worqqafe oosettis .
66021022	Goday , Ubbaafe Wolqqaama Xoossaynne Dorssay katamaas keethe gidiya gisho ta he kataman Xoossa keethi be7abiikke .
66021023	Xoossaa bonchchoy he katamaas poo7iya gishonne Dorssay iyaw xomppe gidiya gisho katamaas awa woykko ageena poo7o koshshenna .
66021024	Kawotethati he katamaa poo7on hamuttana ; kawotikka bantta bonchchuwa yaa ehana .
66021025	Qammi yan baynna gisho katamaa penggeti ubba wode dooya gidana ; gorddettokona .
66021026	Kawotethata gitatethaynne bonchchoy he katamaa yaana .
66021027	Dorssaa de7o maxaafan sunthay xaafettidayssata xalaali attin tunabaa woykko yeellayabaa oothey woykko worddotey oonikka he katamaa gelenna .
66022001	Yaatidi , kiitanchchoy tana Xoossaa kawotetha araatappenne Dorssaa kawotethaa araatappe goggiya masttoteda phooliya de7o haathaa shaafaa bessis .
66022002	He shaafay katama ogiya giddora duge goggees . Shaafappe hefintha baggaranne hafintha baggara ageenan issi toho ; laythan tammanne nam77u toho ayfiyaa de7o mithi de7ees . He mitha bonccoy kawotethata ubbaa harggefe pathees .
66022003	He kataman aybi qanggethika deenna . Xoossaa kawotetha araataynne Dorssaa kawotetha araatay he kataman daana . Xoossaa aylleti Xoossaas oothana .
66022004	Entti iya som77uwa be7ana ; iya sunthay entta som77on xaafettana .
66022005	Hizappe qammi deenna ; Godaa Xoossay enttaw xomppe gidiya gisho enttaw xomppe woykko awa poo7o koshshenna . Entti meri merinaw kawotana .
66022006	Kiitanchchoy taakko , “ Ha ta odiya qaalay tumanne ammantheyssa . Goday , nabeta ba Geeshsha Ayyaanan kiittiya Xoossay , matan hananabaa ba aylleta bessanaw ba kiitanchchuwa kiittis ” yaagis .
66022007	Yesuusi , “ Hekko ta ellesada yaana ; ha maxaafan de7iya tinbbite qaala naagiya oonikka anjjettidayssa ” yaagis .
66022008	Taani , Yohaannisi , he ubbabaa si7as ; be7as . Taani hessa si7ida wodenne be7ida wode hessa tana bessida kiitanchchuwa goynnanaw iya tohuwa bolla kunddas .
66022009	Shin kiitanchchoy taakko , “ Hessa oothofa ! Taani needa , nabetada ne ishatadanne ha maxaafan de7iya ubbaa kiitettiya aylleta mela ; Xoossaa goynna ” yaagis .
66022010	Kiitanchchoy zaaridi , “ Ha ubbay polettiya wodey matattida gisho ha maxaafan xaafettida tinbbite qaala maatamen gorddofa .
66022011	Iita oothey gujjidi iita ootho ; tuney gujjidi tuno . Lo77o oothey gujjidi lo77o ootho ; geeyey gujjidi geeyo ” yaagis .
66022012	Yesuusi , “ Hekko , taani ellesada yaana . Issuwas issuwas iya oosuwada immanaw ta woytoy taara de7ees .
66022013	Taani Alfanne Oomega ; Koyronne Wurssethi ; Doomethinne Polo .
66022014	“ Bantta ma7uwa meeccidi geeshsheyssati anjjettidayssata . De7o mithee ayfiyaa maanawunne katamaa penggiyara gelanaw enttaw maati imettis .
66022015	Shin kanati , biteyssati , laymateyssati , shemppo wodheyssati , eeqa goynneyssati , worddo doseyssatinne ootheyssati karen de7oosona .
66022016	“ Taani , Yesuusi , ha markkatethaa hinttew , woosa keethatas odana mela ta kiitanchchuwa kiittas . Taani Dawite sheeshinne zerethi . Taani poo7iya guura bakkalaa ” yaagis .
66022017	Geeshsha Ayyaanaynne gelanaw giigida maccasiya , “ Haaya ” yaagosona . Qassi hayssa si7iya oonikka , “ Haaya ” yaago . Saamottida oonikka haayo ; de7o haathaa koyaa oonikka coo ekko .
66022018	Taani ha maxaafan xaafettida tinbbite qaala si7iya oonakka zorays . Oonikka ha qaalaa bolla issibaa gujjiko , Xoossay ha maxaafan xaafettida boshaa iya bolla gujjana .
66022019	Oonikka maxaafan de7iya tinbbite qaalappe issibaa pacisikko , Xoossay ha maxaafan xaafettida de7o mithaa ayfiyaappenne geeshsha katamaappe iya qaadaa pacisana .
66022020	Ha ubbaa markkatteyssi , “ Tuma , taani ellesada yaana ” yaagees . Amin77i ; Godaa Yesuusa , haaya .
66022021	Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aadho keehatethay hintte ubbaara gido . Amin77i .
